atk-s0505a:14: Sūcanā sūdanā ceva, yasmā suttaṃ pavuccati.
atk-s0505a:18: Vacanāni ayaṃ tesaṃ, nipāto ca yato tato.
atk-s0505a:23_0: Evaṃ samadhigatasaṅkho ca yasmā esa vaggato uragavaggo, cūḷavaggo, mahāvaggo, aṭṭhakavaggo,
atk-s0505a:23_1: pārāyanavaggoti pañca vaggā honti; tesu uragavaggo ādi. Suttato uragavagge dvādasa
atk-s0505a:23_2: suttāni, cūḷavagge cuddasa, mahāvagge dvādasa, aṭṭhakavagge soḷasa, pārāyanavagge
atk-s0505a:23_3: soḷasāti sattati suttāni. Tesaṃ uragasuttaṃ ādi. Pariyattipamāṇato aṭṭha bhāṇavārā.
atk-s0505a:24: “Yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi;
atk-s0505a:25: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇa”nti. –
atk-s0505a:26: Ayaṃ gāthā ādi. Tasmā assā ito pabhuti atthavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ idaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0505a:27: “Yena yattha yadā yasmā, vuttā gāthā ayaṃ imaṃ;
atk-s0505a:29_0: Kena panāyaṃ gāthā vuttā, kattha, kadā, kasmā ca vuttāti? Vuccate – yo so bhagavā
atk-s0505a:29_1: catuvīsatibuddhasantike laddhabyākaraṇo yāva vessantarajātakaṃ, tāva pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0505a:29_2: tusitabhavane uppajji, tatopi cavitvā sakyarājakule upapattiṃ gahetvā, anupubbena
atk-s0505a:29_4: pavattetvā deva-manussānaṃ hitāya dhammaṃ desesi, tena bhagavatā sayambhunā anācariyakena
atk-s0505a:29_5: sammāsambuddhena vuttā. Sā ca pana āḷaviyaṃ. Yadā ca bhūtagāmasikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:29_6: tadā tattha upagatānaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ vuttāti. Ayamettha saṅkhepavissajjanā. Vitthārato
atk-s0505a:29_8: dīpaṅkarato yāva paccuppannavatthukathā, avidūrenidānaṃ nāma tusitabhavanato yāva
atk-s0505a:29_9: paccuppannavatthukathā, santikenidānaṃ nāma bodhimaṇḍato yāva paccuppannavatthukathāti.
atk-s0505a:30_0: Tattha yasmā avidūrenidānaṃ santikenidānañca dūrenidāneyeva samodhānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0505a:30_1: tasmā dūrenidānavasenevettha vitthārato vissajjanā veditabbā. Sā panesā jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:30_2: vuttāti idha na vitthāritā. Tato tattha vitthāritanayeneva veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso
atk-s0505a:30_3: – tattha paṭhamagāthāya sāvatthiyaṃ vatthu uppannaṃ, idha āḷaviyaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:31_0: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye. Tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0505a:31_1: āḷavakā bhikkhū navakammaṃ karontā rukkhaṃ chindantipi chedāpentipi. Aññataropi āḷavako
atk-s0505a:31_2: bhikkhu rukkhaṃ chindati. Tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca
atk-s0505a:31_3: – ‘mā, bhante, attano bhavanaṃ kattukāmo mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ chindī’ti. So bhikkhu anādiyanto
atk-s0505a:31_4: chindiyeva. Tassā ca devatāya dārakassa bāhuṃ ākoṭesi. Atha kho tassā devatāya etadahosi
atk-s0505a:31_5: – ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ idheva jīvitā voropeyya’nti. Atha kho tassā devatāya
atk-s0505a:31_6: etadahosi – ‘na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ idheva jīvitā voropeyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:31_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ āroceyya’nti. Atha kho sā devatā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0505a:31_8: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi. ‘Sādhu, sādhu devate, sādhu kho tvaṃ,
atk-s0505a:31_9: devate, taṃ bhikkhuṃ jīvitā na voropesi. Sacajja tvaṃ, devate, taṃ bhikkhuṃ jīvitā
atk-s0505a:31_10: voropeyyāsi, bahuñca tvaṃ, devate, apuññaṃ pasaveyyāsi. Gaccha tvaṃ, devate, amukasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:32: Evañca pana vatvā puna bhagavā tassā devatāya uppannakodhavinayanatthaṃ –
atk-s0505a:33: “Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye”ti. –
atk-s0505a:34_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi. Tato “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā rukkhaṃ chindissantipi,
atk-s0505a:34_1: chedāpessantipi, ekindriyaṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jīvaṃ viheṭhentī”ti evaṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0505a:34_2: ujjhāyitaṃ sutvā bhikkhūhi ārocito bhagavā – “bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiya”nti
atk-s0505a:34_3: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā tattha upagatānaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ –
atk-s0505a:37: Imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi. Evamidaṃ ekaṃyeva vatthu tīsu ṭhānesu saṅgahaṃ gataṃ – vinaye, dhammapade, suttanipāteti. Ettāvatā ca yā sā mātikā ṭhapitā –
atk-s0505a:38: “Yena yattha yadā yasmā, vuttā gāthā ayaṃ imaṃ;
atk-s0505a:40: Sā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca pakāsitā hoti ṭhapetvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:41_0: 1. Ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā. Yoti yo yādiso khattiyakulā vā pabbajito, brāhmaṇakulā
atk-s0505a:41_1: vā pabbajito, navo vā majjhimo vā thero vā. Uppatitanti uddhamuddhaṃ patitaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0505a:41_2: pavattanti attho, uppannanti vuttaṃ hoti. Uppannañca nāmetaṃ vattamānabhutvāpagatokāsakatabhūmiladdhavasena
atk-s0505a:41_3: anekappabhedaṃ. Tattha sabbampi saṅkhataṃ uppādādisamaṅgi vattamānuppannaṃ nāma,
atk-s0505a:41_4: yaṃ sandhāya “uppannā dhammā, anuppannā dhammā, uppādino dhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇarasamanubhavitvā
atk-s0505a:41_7: pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti ca, “yathā ca uppannassa satisambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0505a:41_8: bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti ca evamādīsu suttantesu daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yānissa tāni pubbe katāni
atk-s0505a:41_9: kammānī”ti evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ kammaṃ atītampi samānaṃ aññassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0505a:41_10: attano vipākassokāsaṃ katvā ṭhitattā, tathā katokāsañca vipākaṃ anuppannampi evaṃ
atk-s0505a:41_11: kate okāse avassamuppattito okāsakatuppannaṃ nāma. Tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamūhatamakusalaṃ
atk-s0505a:42_0: Ettha ca bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – bhūmi nāma
atk-s0505a:42_1: vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā. Bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma tesu uppattārahaṃ
atk-s0505a:42_2: kilesajātaṃ. Tena hi sā bhūmiladdhā nāma hotīti. Tasmā “bhūmiladdha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:42_3: Tañca pana na ārammaṇavasena. Ārammaṇavasena hi sabbepi atītādibhede pariññātepi
atk-s0505a:42_4: ca khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti mahākaccāyanauppalavaṇṇādīnaṃ khandhe
atk-s0505a:42_5: ārabbha soreyyaseṭṭhiputtanandamāṇavakādīnaṃ viya. Yadi cetaṃ bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma siyā,
atk-s0505a:42_6: tassa appaheyyato na koci bhavamūlaṃ jaheyya. Vatthuvasena pana bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma
atk-s0505a:42_7: veditabbaṃ. Yattha yattha hi vipassanāya apariññātā khandhā uppajjanti, tattha tattha
atk-s0505a:42_8: uppādato pabhuti tesu vaṭṭamūlaṃ kilesajātaṃ anuseti. Taṃ appahīnaṭṭhena bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ
atk-s0505a:42_9: nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha ca yassa khandhesu appahīnānusayitā kilesā, tassa te eva
atk-s0505a:42_10: khandhā tesaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthu, na itare khandhā. Atītakkhandhesu cassa appahīnānusayitānaṃ
atk-s0505a:42_11: kilesānaṃ atītakkhandhā eva vatthu, na itare. Eseva nayo anāgatādīsu. Tathā kāmāvacarakkhandhesu
atk-s0505a:42_12: appahīnānusayitānaṃ kilesānaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhā eva vatthu, na itare. Esa nayo rūpārūpāvacaresu.
atk-s0505a:43_0: Sotāpannādīnaṃ pana yassa yassa ariyapuggalassa khandhesu taṃ taṃ vaṭṭamūlaṃ kilesajātaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_1: tena tena maggena pahīnaṃ, tassa tassa te te khandhā pahīnānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ vaṭṭamūlakilesānaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_2: avatthuto bhūmīti saṅkhaṃ na labhanti. Puthujjanassa pana sabbaso vaṭṭamūlānaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_3: appahīnattā yaṃ kiñci kariyamānaṃ kammaṃ kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā hoti, iccassa kilesappaccayā
atk-s0505a:43_4: vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhati. Tassetaṃ vaṭṭamūlaṃ rūpakkhandhe eva, na vedanākkhandhādīsu…pe…
atk-s0505a:43_5: viññāṇakkhandhe eva vā, na rūpakkhandhādīsūti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Avisesena pañcasu
atk-s0505a:43_6: khandhesu anusayitattā. Kathaṃ? Pathavīrasādimiva rukkhe. Yathā hi mahārukkhe pathavītalaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_8: vaḍḍhitvā nabhaṃ pūretvā yāvakappāvasānaṃ bījaparamparāya rukkhapaveṇīsantāne ṭhite
atk-s0505a:43_9: “taṃ pathavīrasādi mūle eva, na khandhādīsu, phale eva vā, na mūlādīsū”ti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:43_10: Kasmā? Avisesena sabbesveva mūlādīsu anugatattā, evaṃ. Yathā pana tasseva rukkhassa
atk-s0505a:43_11: pupphaphalādīsu nibbinno koci puriso catūsu disāsu maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ nāma rukkhe visaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_12: payojeyya, atha so rukkho tena visasamphassena phuṭṭho pathavīrasaāporasapariyādinnena
atk-s0505a:43_13: appasavanadhammataṃ āgamma puna santānaṃ nibbattetuṃ samattho na bhaveyya, evamevaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_14: khandhappavattiyaṃ nibbinno kulaputto tassa purisassa catūsu disāsu rukkhe visappayojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:43_15: viya attano santāne catumaggabhāvanaṃ ārabhati. Athassa so khandhasantāno tena catumaggavisasamphassena
atk-s0505a:43_18: na hoti. Kevalaṃ pana carimaviññāṇanirodhena nirindhano viya jātavedo anupādāno parinibbāti.
atk-s0505a:43_19: Evaṃ bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:44_1: Tattha vattamānuppannameva samudācāruppannaṃ. Cakkhādīnaṃ pana āpāthagate ārammaṇe
atk-s0505a:44_2: pubbabhāge anuppajjamānampi kilesajātaṃ ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā eva aparabhāge
atk-s0505a:44_3: avassamuppattito ārammaṇādhiggahituppannanti vuccati. Kalyāṇigāme piṇḍāya carato
atk-s0505a:44_7: avikkhambhituppannaṃ nāma. Taṃ “ayampi kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito
atk-s0505a:44_8: bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro uppannuppanne pāpake
atk-s0505a:44_9: akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samathavipassanāvasena vikkhambhitampi
atk-s0505a:44_10: kilesajātaṃ ariyamaggena asamūhatattā uppattidhammataṃ anatītanti katvā asamūhatuppannanti
atk-s0505a:44_11: vuccati. Ākāsena gacchantassa aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino therassa kusumitarukkhe upavane
atk-s0505a:44_12: pupphāni ocinantassa madhurassarena gāyato mātugāmassa gītassaraṃ sutavato uppannakilesajātañcettha
atk-s0505a:44_13: nidassanaṃ. Tassa “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne pāpake akusale
atk-s0505a:44_14: dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”tiādīsu payogo daṭṭhabbo. Tividhampi cetaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahitāvikkhambhitāsamūhatuppannaṃ
atk-s0505a:45_1: kodho uppannoti veditabbo. Kasmā? Evaṃvidhassa vinetabbato. Evaṃvidhameva hi uppannaṃ
atk-s0505a:45_2: yena kenaci vinayena vinetuṃ sakkā hoti. Yaṃ panetaṃ vattamānabhutvāpagatokāsakatasamudācārasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:45_3: uppannaṃ, ettha aphalo ca asakyo ca vāyāmo. Aphalo hi bhutvāpagate vāyāmo vāyāmantarenāpi
atk-s0505a:45_4: tassa niruddhattā. Tathā okāsakate. Asakyo ca vattamānasamudācāruppanne kilesavodānānaṃ
atk-s0505a:49_0: Ayañhi saṃvaravinayo, pahānavinayoti duvidho vinayo. Ettha ca duvidhe vinaye ekameko
atk-s0505a:49_1: vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati. Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro,
atk-s0505a:49_2: khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho. Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgappahānaṃ, vikkhambhanappahānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:50: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādīsu sīlasaṃvaro, “rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”tiādīsu satisaṃvaro.
atk-s0505a:55_0: Ādīsu ñāṇasaṃvaro, “khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”tiādīsu khantisaṃvaro, “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
atk-s0505a:55_1: nādhivāseti, pajahati, vinodetī”tiādīsu vīriyasaṃvaro veditabbo. Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro
atk-s0505a:55_2: yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyavacīduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
atk-s0505a:55_3: vinayanato vinayoti vuccati. Evaṃ tāva saṃvaravinayo pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:56_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanaṅgesu yāva attano aparihānavasena pavatti,
atk-s0505a:56_1: tāva tena tena ñāṇena tassa tassa anatthasantānassa pahānaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – nāmarūpavavatthānena
atk-s0505a:56_3: kaṅkhāvitaraṇena kathaṃkathībhāvassa, kalāpasammasanena “ahaṃ mamā”ti gāhassa, maggāmaggavavatthānena
atk-s0505a:56_4: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0505a:56_5: bhayadassanena sabhayesu abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanena
atk-s0505a:56_7: anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvassa, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittaggāhassa
atk-s0505a:56_8: pahānaṃ, etaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedassa samādhino yāva
atk-s0505a:56_9: attano aparihānipavatti, tāva tenābhihatānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ yathāsakaṃ vitakkādipaccanīkadhammānañca
atk-s0505a:56_10: anuppattisaṅkhātaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ
atk-s0505a:56_11: bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne yathāsakaṃ “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:56_12: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagahanassa puna accantaappavattibhāvena
atk-s0505a:56_13: samucchedasaṅkhātaṃ pahānaṃ, idaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ
atk-s0505a:56_14: kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ, idaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇattā
atk-s0505a:56_15: pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ, etaṃ nissaraṇappahānaṃ nāma. Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ
atk-s0505a:56_16: yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ, vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:56_17: taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:56_18: Evaṃ pahānavinayopi pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo. Evamekekassa pañcadhā bhinnattā
atk-s0505a:57_0: Tesu paṭippassaddhivinayaṃ nissaraṇavinayañca ṭhapetvā avasesena aṭṭhavidhena vinayenesa
atk-s0505a:57_1: tena tena pariyāyena vinetīti pavuccati. Kathaṃ? Sīlasaṃvarena kāyavacīduccaritāni
atk-s0505a:57_2: vinentopi hi taṃsampayuttaṃ kodhaṃ vineti, satipaññāsaṃvarehi abhijjhādomanassādīni
atk-s0505a:57_3: vinentopi domanassasampayuttaṃ kodhaṃ vineti, khantisaṃvarena sītādīni khamantopi
atk-s0505a:57_4: taṃtaṃāghātavatthusambhavaṃ kodhaṃ vineti, vīriyasaṃvarena byāpādavitakkaṃ vinentopi
atk-s0505a:57_5: taṃsampayuttaṃ kodhaṃ vineti. Yehi dhammehi tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedappahānāni
atk-s0505a:57_6: honti, tesaṃ dhammānaṃ attani nibbattanena te te dhamme pajahantopi tadaṅgappahātabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:57_7: vikkhambhetabbaṃ samucchinditabbañca kodhaṃ vineti. Kāmañcettha pahānavinayena vinayo
atk-s0505a:57_8: na sambhavati. Yehi pana dhammehi pahānaṃ hoti, tehi vinentopi pariyāyato “pahānavinayena
atk-s0505a:57_9: vinetī”ti vuccati. Paṭippassaddhippahānakāle pana vinetabbābhāvato nissaraṇappahānassa
atk-s0505a:57_10: ca anuppādetabbato na tehi kiñci vinetīti vuccati. Evaṃ tesu paṭippassaddhivinayaṃ
atk-s0505a:57_11: nissaraṇavinayañca ṭhapetvā avasesena aṭṭhavidhena vinayenesa tena tena pariyāyena
atk-s0505a:58_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0505a:58_1: Katame pañca? Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, mettā tasmiṃ puggale bhāvetabbā…pe…
atk-s0505a:58_2: karuṇā… upekkhā… asati-amanasikāro tasmiṃ puggale āpajjitabbo, evaṃ tasmiṃ puggale
atk-s0505a:58_3: āghāto paṭivinetabbo. Kammassakatā eva vā tasmiṃ puggale adhiṭṭhātabbā kammassako
atk-s0505a:59: Evaṃ pañca āghātapaṭivinayā vuttā. Ye ca –
atk-s0505a:60_0: “Pañcime, āvuso, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0505a:60_1: Katame pañca? Idhāvuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro hoti, parisuddhavacīsamācāro,
atk-s0505a:61: Evamādināpi nayena pañca āghātapaṭivinayā vuttā. Tesu yena kenaci āghātapaṭivinayena vinentopesa vinetīti pavuccati. Apica yasmā –
atk-s0505a:62: “Ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okkanteyyuṃ, tatrāpi yo mano padoseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti –-
atk-s0505a:67: Paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati”. ;
atk-s0505a:68_0: “Sattime, bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṃ āgacchanti itthiṃ
atk-s0505a:68_1: vā purisaṃ vā. Katame satta? Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati – ‘aho,
atk-s0505a:68_2: vatāyaṃ dubbaṇṇo assā’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya
atk-s0505a:68_3: nandati. Kodhanāyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kiñcāpi so
atk-s0505a:68_4: hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano, atha kho so dubbaṇṇova
atk-s0505a:68_5: hoti kodhābhibhūto. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ
atk-s0505a:69_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati – ‘aho, vatāyaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:69_1: sayeyyā’ti…pe… ‘na pacurattho assā’ti…pe… ‘na bhogavā assā’ti…pe… ‘na yasavā assā’ti…pe…
atk-s0505a:69_2: ‘na mittavā assā’ti…pe… ‘kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ
atk-s0505a:69_3: upapajjeyyā’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamanena
atk-s0505a:69_4: nandati. Kodhanāyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṃ
atk-s0505a:69_5: carati, vācāya… manasā duccaritaṃ carati. So kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā…pe… vācāya…pe…
atk-s0505a:69_6: manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā…pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati kodhābhibhūto”ti.
atk-s0505a:70: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati…pe…. ;
atk-s0505a:75: “Ekāparādhaṃ khama bhūripañña, na paṇḍitā kodhabalā bhavantī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:76: Evamādinā nayena kodhe ādīnavañca paccavekkhatopi kodho vinayaṃ upeti. Tasmā evaṃ paccavekkhitvā kodhaṃ vinentopi esa vinetīti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:77_0: Kodhanti “anatthaṃ me acarīti āghāto jāyatī”tiādinā nayena sutte vuttānaṃ navannaṃ,
atk-s0505a:77_1: “atthaṃ me na carī”ti ādīnañca tappaṭipakkhato siddhānaṃ navannamevāti aṭṭhārasannaṃ,
atk-s0505a:77_2: khāṇukaṇṭakādinā aṭṭhānena saddhiṃ ekūnavīsatiyā āghātavatthūnaṃ aññatarāghātavatthusambhavaṃ
atk-s0505a:77_3: āghātaṃ. Visaṭanti vitthataṃ. Sappavisanti sappassa visaṃ. Ivāti opammavacanaṃ, i-kāra
atk-s0505a:77_4: lopaṃ katvā va-icceva vuttaṃ. Osadhehīti agadehi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā visatikicchako
atk-s0505a:77_5: vejjo sappena daṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ kāyaṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃ mūlakhandhatacapattapupphādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:77_6: aññatarehi nānābhesajjehi payojetvā katehi vā osadhehi khippameva vineyya, evamevaṃ
atk-s0505a:77_7: yo yathāvuttenatthena uppatitaṃ cittasantānaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ kodhaṃ yathāvuttesu
atk-s0505a:77_8: vinayanūpāyesu yena kenaci upāyena vineti nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkarotīti.
atk-s0505a:78_0: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāranti so evaṃ kodhaṃ vinento bhikkhu yasmā kodho tatiyamaggena
atk-s0505a:78_1: sabbaso pahīyati, tasmā orapārasaññitāni pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni jahātīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:78_2: Avisesena hi pāranti tīrassa nāmaṃ, tasmā orāni ca tāni saṃsārasāgarassa pārabhūtāni
atk-s0505a:78_3: cāti katvā “orapāra”nti vuccati. Atha vā “yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva
atk-s0505a:78_4: osadhehi”, so tatiyamaggena sabbaso kodhaṃ vinetvā anāgāmiphale ṭhito bhikkhu jahāti
atk-s0505a:78_5: orapāraṃ. Tattha oranti sakattabhāvo, pāranti parattabhāvo. Oraṃ vā cha ajjhattikāni
atk-s0505a:78_6: āyatanāni, pāraṃ cha bāhirāyatanāni. Tathā oraṃ manussaloko, pāraṃ devaloko. Oraṃ
atk-s0505a:78_7: kāmadhātu, pāraṃ rūpārūpadhātu. Oraṃ kāmarūpabhavo, pāraṃ arūpabhavo. Oraṃ attabhāvo,
atk-s0505a:78_8: pāraṃ attabhāvasukhūpakaraṇāni. Evametasmiṃ orapāre catutthamaggena chandarāgaṃ pajahanto
atk-s0505a:78_9: “jahāti orapāra”nti vuccati. Ettha ca kiñcāpi anāgāmino kāmarāgassa pahīnattā idhattabhāvādīsu
atk-s0505a:78_10: chandarāgo eva natthi; apica kho panassa tatiyamaggādīnaṃ viya vaṇṇappakāsanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:78_11: sabbametaṃ orapārabhedaṃ saṅgahetvā tattha chandarāgappahānena “jahāti orapāra”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:79_0: Idāni tassatthassa vibhāvanatthāya upamaṃ āha “urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇa”nti.
atk-s0505a:79_1: Tattha urena gacchatīti urago, sappassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. So duvidho – kāmarūpī ca
atk-s0505a:79_2: akāmarūpī ca. Kāmarūpīpi duvidho – jalajo thalajo ca. Jalajo jale eva kāmarūpaṃ labhati,
atk-s0505a:79_3: na thale, saṅkhapālajātake saṅkhapālanāgarājā viya. Thalajo thale eva, na jale. So
atk-s0505a:79_4: jajjarabhāvena jiṇṇaṃ, cirakālatāya purāṇañcāti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Tacaṃ jahanto catubbidhena
atk-s0505a:79_5: jahāti – sajātiyaṃ ṭhito, jigucchanto, nissāya, thāmenāti. Sajāti nāma sappajāti
atk-s0505a:79_6: dīghattabhāvo. Uragā hi pañcasu ṭhānesu sajātiṃ nātivattanti – upapattiyaṃ, cutiyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:79_7: vissaṭṭhaniddokkamane, samānajātiyā methunapaṭisevane, jiṇṇatacāpanayane cāti. Sappo
atk-s0505a:79_8: hi yadā tacaṃ jahāti, tadā sajātiyaṃyeva ṭhatvā jahāti. Sajātiyaṃ ṭhitopi ca jigucchanto
atk-s0505a:79_9: jahāti. Jigucchanto nāma yadā upaḍḍhaṭṭhāne mutto hoti, upaḍḍhaṭṭhāne amutto olambati,
atk-s0505a:79_10: tadā naṃ aṭṭīyanto jahāti. Evaṃ jigucchantopi ca daṇḍantaraṃ vā mūlantaraṃ vā pāsāṇantaraṃ
atk-s0505a:79_11: vā nissāya jahāti. Nissāya jahantopi ca thāmaṃ janetvā, ussāhaṃ katvā, vīriyena vaṅkaṃ
atk-s0505a:79_12: naṅguṭṭhaṃ katvā, passasantova phaṇaṃ karitvā jahāti. Evaṃ jahitvā yenakāmaṃ pakkamati.
atk-s0505a:79_13: Evamevaṃ ayampi bhikkhu orapāraṃ jahitukāmo catubbidhena jahāti – sajātiyaṃ ṭhito,
atk-s0505a:79_14: jigucchanto, nissāya, thāmenāti. Sajāti nāma bhikkhuno “ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti vacanato
atk-s0505a:79_15: sīlaṃ. Tenevāha “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sappañño”ti. Evametissaṃ sajātiyaṃ ṭhito bhikkhu
atk-s0505a:79_16: taṃ sakattabhāvādibhedaṃ orapāraṃ jiṇṇapurāṇatacamiva dukkhaṃ janentaṃ tattha tattha
atk-s0505a:79_17: ādīnavadassanena jigucchanto kalyāṇamitte nissāya adhimattavāyāmasaṅkhātaṃ thāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:79_18: janetvā “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti vuttanayena
atk-s0505a:79_19: rattindivaṃ chadhā vibhajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto urago viya, vaṅkaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0505a:79_20: ābhujitvā urago viya passasanto, ayampi asithilaparakkamatāya vāyamanto urago viya
atk-s0505a:79_21: phaṇaṃ karitvā, ayampi ñāṇavipphāraṃ janetvā uragova tacaṃ orapāraṃ jahāti. Jahitvā
atk-s0505a:79_22: ca urago viya ohitataco yenakāmaṃ ayampi ohitabhāro anupādisesanibbānadhātudisaṃ
atk-s0505a:80: “Yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi;
atk-s0505a:81: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇa”nti.
atk-s0505a:84: “Yena yattha yadā yasmā, vuttā gāthā ayaṃ imaṃ;
atk-s0505a:86_0: Ayameva mātikā. Tato parañca sabbagāthāsu. Ativitthārabhayena pana ito pabhuti mātikaṃ
atk-s0505a:86_1: anikkhipitvā uppattidassananayeneva tassā tassā atthaṃ dassento atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0505a:86_2: Seyyathidaṃ yo rāgamudacchidā asesanti ayaṃ dutiyagāthā.
atk-s0505a:87_0: Tassuppatti – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0505a:87_1: ārāme. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa upaṭṭhāko aññataro suvaṇṇakāraputto
atk-s0505a:87_2: therassa santike pabbajito. Thero tassa “daharānaṃ asubhaṃ sappāya”nti mantvā rāgavighātatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:87_3: asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. Tassa tasmiṃ āsevanamattampi cittaṃ na labhati. So “anupakāraṃ
atk-s0505a:87_4: mameta”nti therassa ārocesi. Thero “daharānametaṃ sappāya”nti mantvā punapi tadevācikkhi.
atk-s0505a:87_5: Evaṃ cattāro māsā atītā, so kiñcimattampi visesaṃ na labhati. Tato naṃ thero bhagavato
atk-s0505a:87_6: santikaṃ nesi. Bhagavā “avisayo, sāriputta, tuyhetassa sappāyaṃ jānituṃ, buddhaveneyyo
atk-s0505a:87_7: eso”ti vatvā pabhassaravaṇṇaṃ padumaṃ iddhiyā nimminitvā tassa hatthe pādāsi – “handa,
atk-s0505a:87_8: bhikkhu, imaṃ vihārapacchāyāyaṃ vālikātale nāḷena vijjhitvā ṭhapehi, abhimukhañcassa
atk-s0505a:87_9: pallaṅkena nisīda ‘lohitaṃ lohita’nti āvajjento”ti. Ayaṃ kira pañca jātisatāni suvaṇṇakārova
atk-s0505a:87_10: ahosi. Tenassa “lohitakanimittaṃ sappāya”nti ñatvā bhagavā lohitakakammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0505a:87_11: So tathā katvā muhutteneva yathākkamaṃ tattha cattāripi jhānāni adhigantvā anulomapaṭilomādinā
atk-s0505a:87_12: nayena jhānakīḷaṃ ārabhi. Atha bhagavā ‘taṃ padumaṃ milāyatū’ti adhiṭṭhāsi. So jhānā
atk-s0505a:87_13: vuṭṭhito taṃ milātaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ disvā “pabhassararūpaṃ jarāya parimaddita”nti aniccasaññaṃ
atk-s0505a:87_14: paṭilabhi. Tato naṃ ajjhattampi upasaṃhari. Tato “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:87_15: tadanattā”ti tayopi bhave āditte viya passi. Evaṃ passato cassāvidūre padumassaro
atk-s0505a:87_16: atthi. Tattha dārakā orohitvā padumāni bhañjitvā bhañjitvā rāsiṃ karonti. Tassa tāni
atk-s0505a:87_17: udake padumāni naḷavane aggijālā viya khāyiṃsu, pattāni patantāni papātaṃ pavisantāni
atk-s0505a:87_18: viya khāyiṃsu, thale nikkhittapadumānaṃ aggāni milātāni aggiḍaḍḍhāni viya khāyiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:87_19: Athassa tadanusārena sabbadhamme upanijjhāyato bhiyyosomattāya tayo bhavā ādittamiva
atk-s0505a:87_20: agāraṃ appaṭisaraṇā hutvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa
atk-s0505a:87_21: bhikkhuno upari sarīrābhaṃ muñci. Sā cassa mukhaṃyeva ajjhotthari. Tato so “kimeta”nti
atk-s0505a:87_22: āvajjento bhagavantaṃ āgantvā samīpe ṭhitamiva disvā uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ paṇāmesi.
atk-s0505a:87_23: Athassa bhagavā sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsi “yo rāgamudacchidā asesa”nti.
atk-s0505a:88_0: Tattha rañjanavasena rāgo, pañcakāmaguṇarāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Udacchidāti ucchindati,
atk-s0505a:88_1: bhañjati, vināseti. Atītakālikānampi hi chandasi vattamānavacanaṃ akkharacintakā
atk-s0505a:88_2: icchanti. Asesanti sānusayaṃ. Bhisapupphaṃva saroruhanti sare virūḷhaṃ padumapupphaṃ
atk-s0505a:88_3: viya. Vigayhāti ogayha, pavisitvāti attho. Sesaṃ pubbasadisameva. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?
atk-s0505a:88_4: Yathā nāma ete dārakā saraṃ oruyha bhisapupphaṃ saroruhaṃ chindanti, evamevaṃ yo
atk-s0505a:91: “Ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃ kataṃ makkaṭakova jālaṃ”. ;
atk-s0505a:92: “Ratto kho, āvuso, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇampi hanatī”ti –
atk-s0505a:93_1: saṃvarehi saviññāṇakāviññāṇakesu vatthūsu asubhasaññāya ca thokaṃ thokaṃ rāgaṃ samucchindanto
atk-s0505a:93_2: anāgāmimaggena avasesaṃ arahattamaggena ca tato anavasesampi ucchindati pubbe vuttappakāreneva
atk-s0505a:93_3: so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇanti. Evamesā bhagavatā arahattanikūṭena
atk-s0505a:93_4: gāthā desitā. Desanāpariyosāne ca so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhitoti.
atk-s0505a:94_0: 3. Yo taṇhamudacchidāti kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Aññataro bhikkhu
atk-s0505a:94_1: gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre viharanto taṇhāvasena akusalavitakkaṃ vitakketi. Bhagavā
atk-s0505a:95_0: Tattha tassatīti taṇhā. Visayehi tittiṃ na upetīti attho. Kāmabhavavibhavataṇhānametaṃ
atk-s0505a:95_1: adhivacanaṃ. Saritanti gataṃ pavattaṃ, yāva bhavaggā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:95_2: hoti. Sīghasaranti sīghagāminiṃ, sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikaṃ ādīnavaṃ agaṇetvā muhutteneva
atk-s0505a:95_3: paracakkavāḷampi bhavaggampi sampāpuṇituṃ samatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evametaṃ saritaṃ
atk-s0505a:97: Ye ca taṃ anugijjhanti, te honti cakkadhārino”ti.
atk-s0505a:100: “Ūno loko atitto taṇhādāsoti kho, mahārājā”ti ca –
atk-s0505a:101_0: Evamādīnavapaccavekkhaṇena vuttappakārehi sīlasaṃvarādīhi ca yo thokaṃ thokaṃ visosayitvā
atk-s0505a:101_1: arahattamaggena asesaṃ ucchijjati, so bhikkhu tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sabbappakārampi jahāti
atk-s0505a:101_2: orapāranti. Desanāpariyosāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhitoti.
atk-s0505a:102_0: 4. Yo mānamudabbadhīti kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Aññataro bhikkhu
atk-s0505a:102_1: gaṅgāya tīre viharanto gimhakāle appodake sote kataṃ naḷasetuṃ pacchā āgatena mahoghena
atk-s0505a:102_2: vuyhamānaṃ disvā “aniccā saṅkhārā”ti saṃviggo aṭṭhāsi. Tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavā
atk-s0505a:103_0: Tattha mānoti jātiādivatthuko cetaso uṇṇāmo. So “seyyohamasmī”ti māno, “sadisohamasmī”ti
atk-s0505a:103_1: māno, “hīnohamasmī”ti mānoti evaṃ tividho hoti. Puna “seyyassa seyyohamasmīti, seyyassa
atk-s0505a:103_2: sadiso, seyyassa hīno, sadisassa seyyo, sadisassa sadiso, sadisassa hīno, hīnassa
atk-s0505a:103_3: seyyo, hīnassa sadiso, hīnassa hīnohamasmī”ti mānoti evaṃ navavidho hoti. Taṃ sabbappakārampi mānaṃ –
atk-s0505a:105_0: Ādinā nayena tattha ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇena vuttappakārehi sīlasaṃvarādīhi ca yo thokaṃ
atk-s0505a:105_1: thokaṃ vadhento kilesānaṃ abaladubbalattā naḷasetusadisaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ atibalattā
atk-s0505a:105_2: mahoghasadisena arahattamaggena asesaṃ udabbadhi, anavasesappahānavasena ucchindanto
atk-s0505a:105_3: vadhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. So bhikkhu tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sabbappakārampi jahāti orapāranti.
atk-s0505a:106_0: 5. Ti kā uppatti? Imissā gāthāya ito parānañca dvādasannaṃ ekāyeva uppatti. Ekaṃ
atk-s0505a:106_1: samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo attano
atk-s0505a:106_2: dhītuyā vāreyye paccupaṭṭhite cintesi – “kenaci vasalena aparibhuttapubbehi pupphehi
atk-s0505a:106_3: dārikaṃ alaṅkaritvā patikulaṃ pesessāmī”ti. So santarabāhiraṃ sāvatthiṃ vicinanto
atk-s0505a:106_4: kiñci tiṇapupphampi aparibhuttapubbaṃ nāddasa. Atha sambahule dhuttakajātike brāhmaṇadārake
atk-s0505a:106_5: sannipatite disvā “ete pucchissāmi, avassaṃ sambahulesu koci jānissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0505a:106_6: pucchi. Te taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ uppaṇḍentā āhaṃsu – “udumbarapupphaṃ nāma, brāhmaṇa, loke
atk-s0505a:106_7: na kenaci paribhuttapubbaṃ. Tena dhītaraṃ alaṅkaritvā dehī”ti. So dutiyadivase kālasseva
atk-s0505a:106_8: vuṭṭhāya bhattavissaggaṃ katvā aciravatiyā nadiyā tīre udumbaravanaṃ gantvā ekamekaṃ
atk-s0505a:106_9: rukkhaṃ vicinanto pupphassa vaṇṭamattampi nāddasa. Atha vītivatte majjhanhike dutiyatīraṃ
atk-s0505a:106_10: agamāsi. Tattha ca aññataro bhikkhu aññatarasmiṃ manuññe rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisinno
atk-s0505a:106_11: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. So tattha upasaṅkamitvā amanasikaritvā, sakiṃ nisīditvā,
atk-s0505a:106_12: sakiṃ ukkuṭiko hutvā, sakiṃ ṭhatvā, taṃ rukkhaṃ sabbasākhāviṭapapattantaresu vicinanto
atk-s0505a:106_13: kilamati. Tato naṃ so bhikkhu āha – “brāhmaṇa, kiṃ maggasī”ti? “Udumbarapupphaṃ,
atk-s0505a:106_14: bho”ti. “Udumbarapupphaṃ nāma, brāhmaṇa, loke natthi, musā etaṃ vacanaṃ, mā kilamā”ti.
atk-s0505a:106_15: Atha bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā obhāsaṃ muñcitvā samuppannasamannāhārabahumānassa
atk-s0505a:106_16: imā obhāsagāthāyo abhāsi “yo nājjhagamā bhavesu sāra”nti sabbā vattabbā.
atk-s0505a:107_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva nājjhagamāti nādhigacchi, nādhigacchati vā. Bhavesūti
atk-s0505a:107_2: niccabhāvaṃ attabhāvaṃ vā. Vicinanti paññāya gavesanto. Pupphamiva udumbaresūti yathā
atk-s0505a:107_3: udumbararukkhesu pupphaṃ vicinanto esa brāhmaṇo nājjhagamā, evaṃ yo yogāvacaropi
atk-s0505a:107_4: paññāya vicinanto sabbabhavesu kiñci sāraṃ nājjhagamā. So asārakaṭṭhena te dhamme
atk-s0505a:107_5: aniccato anattato ca vipassanto anupubbena lokuttaradhamme adhigacchanto jahāti orapāraṃ
atk-s0505a:107_6: urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇanti ayamattho yojanā ca. Avasesagāthāsu panassa yojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:113: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti. ;
atk-s0505a:117_0: Evaṃ kāraṇavemajjhacittādīsu sambahulesu atthesu dissati. Idha pana citte. Tato yassantarato
atk-s0505a:117_1: na santi kopāti tatiyamaggena samūhatattā yassa citte na santi kopāti attho. Yasmā
atk-s0505a:117_2: pana bhavoti sampatti, vibhavoti vipatti. Tathā bhavoti vuddhi, vibhavoti hāni. Bhavoti
atk-s0505a:117_3: sassato, vibhavoti ucchedo. Bhavoti puññaṃ, vibhavoti pāpaṃ. Vibhavo abhavoti ca
atk-s0505a:117_4: atthato ekameva. Tasmā itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti ettha yā esā sampattivipattivuḍḍhihānisassatucchedapuññapāpavasena
atk-s0505a:117_5: iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati. Catūhipi maggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena
atk-s0505a:117_6: nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti evamattho ñātabbo.
atk-s0505a:118_0: 7. Yassa vitakkāti ettha pana yassa bhikkhuno tayo kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkā, tayo
atk-s0505a:118_2: ete nava vitakkā samantabhaddake vuttanayena tattha tattha ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0505a:118_3: paṭipakkhavavatthānena tassa tassa pahānasamatthehi tīhi heṭṭhimamaggehi ca vidhūpitā
atk-s0505a:118_4: bhusaṃ dhūpitā santāpitā daḍḍhāti attho. Evaṃ vidhūpetvā ca ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā
atk-s0505a:118_5: asesā, niyakajjhattabhūte attano khandhasantāne ajjhattajjhattabhūte citte ca yathā
atk-s0505a:118_6: na puna sambhavanti, evaṃ arahattamaggena asesā chinnā. Chinnañhi kappitanti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:119_0: 8. Idāni yo nāccasārīti ettha yo nāccasārīti yo nātidhāvi. Na paccasārīti na ohīyi.
atk-s0505a:119_1: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Accāraddhavīriyena hi uddhacce patanto accāsarati, atisithilena
atk-s0505a:119_2: kosajje patanto paccāsarati. Tathā bhavataṇhāya attānaṃ kilamento accāsarati, kāmataṇhāya
atk-s0505a:119_3: kāmasukhamanuyuñjanto paccāsarati. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā accāsarati, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā paccāsarati.
atk-s0505a:119_4: Atītaṃ anusocanto accāsarati, anāgata paṭikaṅkhanto paccāsarati. Pubbantānudiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0505a:119_5: accāsarati, aparantānudiṭṭhiyā paccāsarati. Tasmā yo ete ubho ante vajjetvā majjhimaṃ
atk-s0505a:119_6: paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto nāccasārī na paccasārīti evaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbaṃ accagamā
atk-s0505a:119_7: imaṃ papañcanti tāya ca pana arahattamaggavosānāya majjhimāya paṭipadāya sabbaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0505a:119_8: vedanāsaññāvitakkappabhavaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ tividhaṃ papañcaṃ accagamā atikkanto,
atk-s0505a:120_0: 9. Tadanantaragāthāya pana sabbaṃ vitathamidanti ñatvā loketi ayameva viseso. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:120_1: – sabbanti anavasesaṃ, sakalamanūnanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ santepi pana vipassanupagaṃ
atk-s0505a:120_3: Niccanti vā sukhanti vā subhanti vā attāti vā yathā yathā kilesavasena bālajanehi
atk-s0505a:120_4: gayhati, tathātathābhāvato vitathanti vuttaṃ hoti. Idanti tameva sabbaṃ paccakkhabhāvena
atk-s0505a:120_5: dassento āha. Ñatvāti maggapaññāya jānitvā, tañca pana asammohato, na visayato. Loketi
atk-s0505a:120_6: okāsaloke sabbaṃ khandhādibhedaṃ dhammajātaṃ “vitathamida”nti ñatvāti sambandho.
atk-s0505a:121_0: 10-13. Idāni ito parāsu catūsu gāthāsu vītalobho vītarāgo vītadoso vītamohoti ete
atk-s0505a:121_1: visesā. Ettha lubbhanavasena lobho. Sabbasaṅgāhikametaṃ paṭhamassa akusalamūlassa
atk-s0505a:121_2: adhivacanaṃ, visamalobhassa vā. Yo so “appekadā mātumattīsupi lobhadhammā uppajjanti,
atk-s0505a:121_3: bhaginimattīsupi lobhadhammā uppajjanti, dhītumattīsupi lobhadhammā uppajjantī”ti
atk-s0505a:121_4: evaṃ vutto. Rajjanavasena rāgo, pañcakāmaguṇarāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Dussanavasena
atk-s0505a:121_5: doso, pubbe vuttakodhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Muyhanavasena moho, catūsu ariyasaccesu
atk-s0505a:121_6: aññāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha yasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu lobhaṃ jigucchanto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:121_7: ārabhi “kudāssu nāmāhaṃ lobhaṃ vinetvā vigatalobho vihareyya”nti, tasmā tassa lobhappahānūpāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:121_9: imaṃ gāthamāha. Esa nayo ito parāsupi. Keci panāhu – “yathāvutteneva nayena ete dhamme
atk-s0505a:121_10: jigucchitvā vipassanamāraddhassa tassa tassa bhikkhuno ekamekāva ettha gāthā vuttā”ti.
atk-s0505a:121_11: Yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Esa nayo ito parāsu catūsu gāthāsu.
atk-s0505a:122_0: 14. Ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā – appahīnaṭṭhena santāne sayantīti anusayā kāmarāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchābhavarāgāvijjānaṃ
atk-s0505a:122_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ attano ākārānuvidhānaṭṭhena mūlā; akhemaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:122_2: akusalā; dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtātipi mūlā; sāvajjadukkhavipākaṭṭhena akusalā; ubhayampetaṃ
atk-s0505a:122_3: lobhadosamohānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Te hi “lobho, bhikkhave, akusalañca akusalamūlañcā”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:122_4: nayena evaṃ niddiṭṭhā. Evamete anusayā tena tena maggena pahīnattā yassa keci na
atk-s0505a:122_5: santi, ete ca akusalamūlā tatheva samūhatāse, samūhatā icceva attho. Paccattabahuvacanassa
atk-s0505a:122_6: hi se-kārāgamaṃ icchanti saddalakkhaṇakovidā. Aṭṭhakathācariyā pana “seti nipāto”ti
atk-s0505a:122_7: vaṇṇayanti. Yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ettha pana “kiñcāpi so evaṃvidho bhikkhu
atk-s0505a:122_8: khīṇāsavo hoti, khīṇāsavo ca neva ādiyati, na pajahati, pajahitvā ṭhito”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:122_9: Tathāpi vattamānasamīpe vattamānavacanalakkhaṇena “jahāti orapāra”nti vuccati. Atha
atk-s0505a:122_10: vā anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanto attano ajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:123_0: Tattha kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā cāti dvidhā anusayānaṃ abhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:123_1: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā hi kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tatiyamaggena abhāvo hoti, mānānusayassa
atk-s0505a:123_4: abhāvo hoti. Dutiyamaggena kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tanubhāvo, tatiyamaggena
atk-s0505a:123_5: sabbaso abhāvo, catutthamaggena mānānusayabhavarāgānusayāvijjānusayānaṃ abhāvo hoti.
atk-s0505a:123_6: Tattha yasmā na sabbe anusayā akusalamūlā; kāmarāgabhavarāgānusayā eva hi lobhākusalamūlena
atk-s0505a:123_7: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Paṭighānusayāvijjānusayā ca “doso akusalamūlaṃ, moho akusalamūlaṃ”
atk-s0505a:123_8: icceva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti, diṭṭhimānavicikicchānusayā pana na kiñci akusalamūlaṃ honti,
atk-s0505a:123_9: yasmā vā anusayābhāvavasena ca akusalamūlasamugghātavasena ca kilesappahānaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tasmā –
atk-s0505a:124: “Yassānusayā na santi keci, mūlā ca akusalā samūhatāse”. –
atk-s0505a:126_0: 15. Yassa darathajāti ettha pana paṭhamuppannā kilesā pariḷāhaṭṭhena darathā nāma,
atk-s0505a:126_1: aparāparuppannā pana tehi darathehi jātattā darathajā nāma. Oranti sakkāyo vuccati.
atk-s0505a:126_2: Yathāha – “orimaṃ tīranti kho, bhikkhu, sakkāyassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Āgamanāyāti
atk-s0505a:126_3: uppattiyā. Paccayāseti paccayā eva. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yassa pana upādānakkhandhaggahaṇāya
atk-s0505a:126_4: paccayabhūtā ariyamaggena pahīnattā, keci darathajavevacanā kilesā na santi, pubbe
atk-s0505a:127_0: 16. Yassa vanathajāti etthapi darathajā viya vanathajā veditabbā. Vacanatthe pana
atk-s0505a:127_1: ayaṃ viseso – vanute, vanotīti vā vanaṃ yācati sevati bhajatīti attho. Taṇhāyetaṃ
atk-s0505a:127_2: adhivacanaṃ. Sā hi visayānaṃ patthanato sevanato ca “vana”nti vuccati. Taṃ pariyuṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0505a:127_3: vanaṃ tharati tanotīti vanatho, taṇhānusayassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vanathā jātāti vanathajāti.
atk-s0505a:127_4: Keci panāhu “sabbepi kilesā gahanaṭṭhena vanathoti vuccanti, aparāparuppannā pana
atk-s0505a:127_5: vanathajā”ti. Ayameva cettha uragasutte attho adhippeto, itaro pana dhammapadagāthāyaṃ.
atk-s0505a:127_6: Vinibandhāya bhavāyāti bhavavinibandhāya. Atha vā cittassa visayesu vinibandhāya
atk-s0505a:127_7: āyatiṃ uppattiyā cāti attho. Hetuyeva hetukappā.
atk-s0505a:128_0: 17. Yo nīvaraṇeti ettha nīvaraṇāti cittaṃ, hitapaṭipattiṃ vā nīvarantīti nīvaraṇā,
atk-s0505a:128_1: paṭicchādentīti attho. Pahāyāti chaḍḍetvā. Pañcāti tesaṃ saṅkhyāparicchedo. Īghābhāvato
atk-s0505a:128_2: anīgho. Kathaṃkathāya tiṇṇattā tiṇṇakathaṃkatho. Vigatasallattā visallo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:128_3: hoti? Yo bhikkhu kāmacchandādīni pañca nīvaraṇāni samantabhaddake vuttanayena sāmaññato
atk-s0505a:128_4: visesato ca nīvaraṇesu ādīnavaṃ disvā tena tena maggena pahāya tesañca pahīnattā
atk-s0505a:128_5: eva kilesadukkhasaṅkhātassa īghassābhāvena anīgho, “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā
atk-s0505a:128_6: nayena pavattāya kathaṃkathāya tiṇṇattā tiṇṇakathaṃkatho, “tattha katame pañca sallā?
atk-s0505a:128_7: Rāgasallo, dosasallo, mohasallo, mānasallo, diṭṭhisallo”ti vuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ sallānaṃ
atk-s0505a:128_8: vigatattā visallo. So bhikkhu pubbe vuttanayeneva jahāti orapāranti.
atk-s0505a:129_0: Atrāpi ca kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā cāti dvidhā eva nīvaraṇappahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:129_1: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā hi kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa byāpādanīvaraṇassa ca tatiyamaggena pahānaṃ
atk-s0505a:129_2: hoti, thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa ca catutthamaggena. “Akataṃ vata
atk-s0505a:129_3: me kusala”ntiādinā nayena pavattassa vippaṭisārasaṅkhātassa kukkuccanīvaraṇassa vicikicchānīvaraṇassa
atk-s0505a:129_4: ca paṭhamamaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā pana kukkuccanīvaraṇassa vicikicchānīvaraṇassa
atk-s0505a:129_5: ca paṭhamamaggena pahānaṃ hoti, kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa byāpādanīvaraṇassa ca dutiyamaggena
atk-s0505a:129_6: tanubhāvo hoti, tatiyena anavasesappahānaṃ. Thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa
atk-s0505a:130: “Yo nīvaraṇe pahāya pañca, anīgho tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo;
atk-s0505a:131: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇa”nti. –
atk-s0505a:132_0: Arahattanikūṭeneva bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Desanāpariyosāne so bhikkhu arahatte
atk-s0505a:132_1: patiṭṭhito. “Ekacce yena yena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yā yā gāthā desitā, tena tena tassā
atk-s0505a:132_2: tassā gāthāya pariyosāne so so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhito”ti vadanti.
atk-s0505a:136_0: 18. Pakkodanoti dhaniyasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Tena samayena
atk-s0505a:136_1: dhaniyo gopo mahītīre paṭivasati. Tassāyaṃ pubbayogo – kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane
atk-s0505a:136_2: dibbamāne vīsati vassasahassāni divase divase saṅghassa vīsati salākabhattāni adāsi.
atk-s0505a:136_3: So tato cuto devesu uppanno. Evaṃ devaloke ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0505a:136_4: kāle videharaṭṭhamajjhe pabbataraṭṭhaṃ nāma atthi tattha dhammakoraṇḍaṃ nāma nagaraṃ,
atk-s0505a:136_5: tasmiṃ nagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā abhinibbatto, goyūthaṃ nissāya jīvati. Tassa hi tiṃsamattāni
atk-s0505a:136_6: gosahassāni honti, sattavīsasahassā gāvo khīraṃ duyhanti. Gopā nāma nibaddhavāsino
atk-s0505a:136_7: na honti. Vassike cattāromāse thale vasanti, avasese aṭṭhamāse yattha tiṇodakaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:136_8: labbhati, tattha vasanti. Tañca nadītīraṃ vā jātassaratīraṃ vā hoti. Athāyampi vassakāle
atk-s0505a:136_9: attano vasitagāmato nikkhamitvā gunnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya okāsaṃ gavesanto mahāmahī
atk-s0505a:136_10: bhijjitvā ekato kālamahī ekato mahāmahicceva saṅkhaṃ gantvā sandamānā puna samuddasamīpe
atk-s0505a:136_11: samāgantvā pavattā. Yaṃ okāsaṃ antaradīpaṃ akāsi, taṃ pavisitvā vacchānaṃ sālaṃ attano
atk-s0505a:136_12: ca nivesanaṃ māpetvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Tassa satta puttā, satta dhītaro, satta suṇisā,
atk-s0505a:136_13: aneke ca kammakārā honti. Gopā nāma vassanimittaṃ jānanti. Yadā sakuṇikā kulāvakāni
atk-s0505a:136_14: rukkhagge karonti, kakkaṭakā udakasamīpe dvāraṃ pidahitvā thalasamīpadvārena vaḷañjenti,
atk-s0505a:136_15: tadā suvuṭṭhikā bhavissatīti gaṇhanti. Yadā pana sakuṇikā kulāvakāni nīcaṭṭhāne udakapiṭṭhe
atk-s0505a:136_16: karonti, kakkaṭakā thalasamīpe dvāraṃ pidahitvā udakasamīpadvārena vaḷañjenti, tadā
atk-s0505a:137_0: Atha so dhaniyo suvuṭṭhikanimittāni upasallakkhetvā upakaṭṭhe vassakāle antaradīpā
atk-s0505a:137_1: nikkhamitvā mahāmahiyā paratīre sattasattāhampi deve vassante udakena anajjhottharaṇokāse
atk-s0505a:137_2: attano vasanokāsaṃ katvā samantā parikkhipitvā, vacchasālāyo māpetvā, tattha nivāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:137_3: kappesi. Athassa dārutiṇādisaṅgahe kate sabbesu puttadārakammakaraporisesu samāniyesu
atk-s0505a:137_4: jātesu nānappakāre khajjabhojje paṭiyatte samantā catuddisā meghamaṇḍalāni uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:137_5: So dhenuyo duhāpetvā, vacchasālāsu vacche saṇṭhāpetvā, gunnaṃ catuddisā dhūmaṃ kārāpetvā,
atk-s0505a:137_6: sabbaparijanaṃ bhojāpetvā, sabbakiccāni kārāpetvā tattha tattha dīpe ujjālāpetvā,
atk-s0505a:137_7: sayaṃ khīrena bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā, mahāsayane sayanto attano sirisampattiṃ disvā, tuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0505a:137_8: hutvā, aparadisāya meghatthanitasaddaṃ sutvā nipanno imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi “pakkodano
atk-s0505a:138_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – pakkodanoti siddhabhatto. Duddhakhīroti gāvo duhitvā gahitakhīro.
atk-s0505a:138_1: Ahanti attānaṃ nidasseti, asmīti attano tathābhāvaṃ. Pakkodano duddhakhīro ca ahamasmi
atk-s0505a:138_2: bhavāmīti attho. Itīti evamāhāti attho. Niddese pana “itīti padasandhi, padasaṃsaggo,
atk-s0505a:138_3: padapāripūri, akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāmeta”nti evamassa attho
atk-s0505a:138_4: vaṇṇito. Sopi idameva sandhāyāti veditabbo. Yaṃ yaṃ hi padaṃ pubbapadena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:138_5: tassa tassa evamāhāti etamatthaṃ pakāsentoyeva itisaddo pacchimena padena metteyyo
atk-s0505a:138_6: iti vā bhagavā iti vā evamādinā padasandhi hoti, nāññathā.
atk-s0505a:139_0: Dhaniyo gopoti tassa seṭṭhiputtassa nāmasamodhānaṃ. So hi yānimāni thāvarādīni pañca
atk-s0505a:139_1: dhanāni, tesu ṭhapetvā dānasīlādianugāmikadhanaṃ, khettavatthu-ārāmādito thāvaradhanatopi,
atk-s0505a:139_3: aṅgasamadhanatopi yaṃ taṃ lokassa pañcagorasānuppadānena bahūpakāraṃ taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0505a:139_4: “natthi gosamitaṃ dhana”nti evaṃ visesitaṃ godhanaṃ, tena samannāgatattā dhaniyo,
atk-s0505a:139_5: gunnaṃ pālanato gopo. Yo hi attano gāvo pāleti, so “gopo”ti vuccati. Yo paresaṃ vetanena
atk-s0505a:139_6: bhaṭo hutvā, so gopālako. Ayaṃ pana attanoyeva, tena gopoti vutto.
atk-s0505a:140_0: Anutīreti tīrassa samīpe. Mahiyāti mahāmahīnāmikāya nadiyā. Samānena anukūlavattinā
atk-s0505a:140_1: parijanena saddhiṃ vāso yassa so samānavāso, ayañca tathāvidho. Tenāha “samānavāso”ti.
atk-s0505a:140_2: Channāti tiṇapaṇṇacchadanehi anovassakā katā. Kuṭīti vasanagharassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:140_3: Āhitoti ābhato, jālito vā. Ginīti aggi. Tesu tesu ṭhānesu aggi “ginī”ti voharīyati.
atk-s0505a:140_4: Atha ce patthayasīti idāni yadi icchasīti vuttaṃ hoti. Pavassāti siñca, pagghara,
atk-s0505a:140_5: udakaṃ muñcāti attho. Devāti meghaṃ ālapati. Ayaṃ tāvettha padavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0505a:141_0: Ayaṃ pana atthavaṇṇanā – evamayaṃ dhaniyo gopo attano sayanaghare mahāsayane nipanno
atk-s0505a:141_5: “Āhito ginī”ti yasmā gopālakā parikkhepadhūmadāruaggivasena tayo aggī karonti. Te
atk-s0505a:141_6: ca tassa gehe sabbe katā, tasmā sabbadisāsu parikkhepaggiṃ sandhāya “āhito ginī”ti
atk-s0505a:141_7: bhaṇanto vāḷamigāgamananivāraṇaṃ dīpeti, gunnaṃ majjhe gomayādīhi dhūmaggiṃ sandhāya
atk-s0505a:141_8: ḍaṃsamakasādīhi gunnaṃ anābādhaṃ, gopālakānaṃ sayanaṭṭhāne dāruaggiṃ sandhāya gopālakānaṃ
atk-s0505a:141_9: sītābādhapaṭighātaṃ. So evaṃ dīpento attano vā gunnaṃ vā parijanassa vā vuṭṭhipaccayassa
atk-s0505a:141_10: kassaci ābādhassa abhāvato pītisomanassajāto āha – “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti.
atk-s0505a:142_0: 19. Evaṃ dhaniyassa imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsamānassa assosi bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya
atk-s0505a:142_1: atikkantamānusikāya jetavanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ viharanto. Sutvā ca pana buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0505a:142_2: lokaṃ volokento addasa dhaniyañca pajāpatiñcassa “ime ubhopi hetusampannā. Sace ahaṃ
atk-s0505a:142_3: gantvā dhammaṃ desessāmi, ubhopi pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti. No ce gamissāmi,
atk-s0505a:142_4: sve udakoghena vinassissantī”ti taṃ khaṇeyeva sāvatthito satta yojanasatāni dhaniyassa
atk-s0505a:142_5: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ ākāsena gantvā tassa kuṭiyā upari aṭṭhāsi. Dhaniyo taṃ gāthaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0505a:142_6: bhāsatiyeva, na niṭṭhāpeti, bhagavati gatepi bhāsati. Bhagavā ca taṃ sutvā “na ettakena
atk-s0505a:142_7: santuṭṭhā vā vissatthā vā honti, evaṃ pana hontī”ti dassetuṃ –
atk-s0505a:144: Vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:145_0: Imaṃ paṭigāthaṃ abhāsi byañjanasabhāgaṃ no atthasabhāgaṃ. Na hi “pakkodano”ti, “akkodhano”ti
atk-s0505a:145_1: ca ādīni padāni atthato samenti mahāsamuddassa orimapārimatīrāni viya, byañjanaṃ
atk-s0505a:145_2: panettha kiñci kiñci sametīti byañjanasabhāgāni honti. Tattha purimagāthāya sadisapadānaṃ
atk-s0505a:146_0: Visesapadānaṃ panāyaṃ padato atthato ca vaṇṇanā – akkodhanoti akujjhanasabhāvo. Yo
atk-s0505a:146_1: hi so pubbe vuttappakāraāghātavatthusambhavo kodho ekaccassa suparittopi uppajjamāno
atk-s0505a:146_2: hadayaṃ santāpetvā vūpasammati, yena ca tato balavataruppannena ekacco mukhavikuṇanamattaṃ
atk-s0505a:146_3: karoti, tato balavatarena ekacco pharusaṃ vattukāmo hanusañcalanamattaṃ karoti, aparo
atk-s0505a:146_4: tato balavatarena pharusaṃ bhaṇati, aparo tato balavatarena daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā
atk-s0505a:146_5: gavesanto disā viloketi, aparo tato balavatarena daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā āmasati, aparo
atk-s0505a:146_6: tato balavatarena daṇḍādīni gahetvā upadhāvati, aparo tato balavatarena ekaṃ vā dve
atk-s0505a:146_7: vā pahāre deti, aparo tato balavatarena api ñātisālohitaṃ jīvitā voropeti, ekacco
atk-s0505a:146_8: tato balavatarena pacchā vippaṭisārī attānampi jīvitā voropeti sīhaḷadīpe kālagāmavāsī
atk-s0505a:146_9: amacco viya. Ettāvatā ca kodho paramavepullappatto hoti. So bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍeyeva
atk-s0505a:146_10: sabbaso pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato, tasmā bhagavā “akkodhanohamasmī”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:147_0: Vigatakhiloti apagatakhilo. Ye hi te cittabandhabhāvena pañca cetokhilā vuttā, ye
atk-s0505a:147_1: hi ca khilabhūte citte seyyathāpi nāma khile bhūmibhāge cattāro māse vassantepi deve
atk-s0505a:147_2: sassāni na ruhanti, evamevaṃ saddhammassavanādikusalahetuvasse vassantepi kusalaṃ
atk-s0505a:147_3: na ruhati te ca bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍeyeva sabbaso pahīnā, tasmā bhagavā “vigatakhilohamasmī”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:148_0: Ekarattiṃ vāso assāti ekarattivāso. Yathā hi dhaniyo tattha cattāro vassike māse
atk-s0505a:148_1: nibaddhavāsaṃ upagato, na tathā bhagavā. Bhagavā hi taṃyeva rattiṃ tassa atthakāmatāya
atk-s0505a:148_2: tattha vāsaṃ upagato. Tasmā “ekarattivāso”ti āha. Vivaṭāti apanītacchadanā. Kuṭīti
atk-s0505a:148_3: attabhāvo. Attabhāvo hi taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca kāyotipi guhātipi dehotipi sandehotipi
atk-s0505a:148_4: nāvātipi rathotipi vaṇotipi dhajotipi vammikotipi kuṭītipi kuṭikātipi vuccati. Idha
atk-s0505a:148_5: pana kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca gehanāmikā kuṭi viya aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca saṅkhyaṃ gatattā
atk-s0505a:149_0: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kaṭṭhañca paṭicca, valliñca paṭicca, mattikañca paṭicca, tiṇañca
atk-s0505a:149_1: paṭicca, ākāso parivārito agāraṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati; evameva kho, āvuso, aṭṭhiñca
atk-s0505a:149_2: paṭicca, nhāruñca paṭicca, maṃsañca paṭicca, cammañca paṭicca, ākāso parivārito rūpantveva
atk-s0505a:154: Sā kuṭi yena taṇhāmānadiṭṭhichadanena sattānaṃ channattā punappunaṃ rāgādikilesavassaṃ ativassati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:156: Tasmā channaṃ vivaretha, evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī”ti. ;
atk-s0505a:157_0: Ayaṃ gāthā dvīsu ṭhānesu vuttā khandhake theragāthāyañca. Khandhake hi “yo āpattiṃ
atk-s0505a:157_1: paṭicchādeti, tassa kilesā ca punappunaṃ āpattiyo ca ativassanti, yo pana na paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0505a:157_2: tassa nātivassantī”ti imaṃ atthaṃ paṭicca vuttā. Theragāthāyaṃ “yassa rāgādicchadanaṃ
atk-s0505a:157_3: atthi, tassa puna iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu rāgādisambhavato channamativassati. Yo vā uppanne
atk-s0505a:157_4: kilese adhivāseti, tasseva adhivāsitakilesacchadanacchannā attabhāvakuṭi punappunaṃ
atk-s0505a:157_5: kilesavassaṃ ativassati. Yassa pana arahattamaggañāṇavātena kilesacchadanassa viddhaṃsitattā
atk-s0505a:157_6: vivaṭā, tassa nātivassatī”ti. Ayamattho idha adhippeto. Bhagavatā hi yathāvuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:157_7: chadanaṃ yathāvutteneva nayena viddhaṃsitaṃ, tasmā “vivaṭā kuṭī”ti āha. Nibbutoti
atk-s0505a:157_8: upasanto. Ginīti aggi. Yena hi ekādasavidhena agginā sabbamidaṃ ādittaṃ. Yathāha
atk-s0505a:157_9: – “ādittaṃ rāgagginā”ti vitthāro. So aggi bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggasalilasekena
atk-s0505a:158_0: Evaṃ vadanto ca dhaniyaṃ atuṭṭhabbena tussamānaṃ aññāpadeseneva paribhāsati, ovadati,
atk-s0505a:158_1: anusāsati. Kathaṃ? “Akkodhano”ti hi vadamāno, dhaniya, tvaṃ “pakkodanohamasmī”ti
atk-s0505a:158_2: tuṭṭho, odanapāko ca yāvajīvaṃ dhanaparikkhayena kattabbo, dhanaparikkhayo ca ārakkhādidukkhapadaṭṭhāno,
atk-s0505a:158_3: evaṃ sante dukkheneva tuṭṭho hosi. Ahaṃ pana “akkodhanohamasmī”ti tussanto sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikadukkhābhāvena
atk-s0505a:158_4: tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti. “Vigatakhilo”ti vadamāno tvaṃ “duddhakhīrohamasmī”ti tussanto
atk-s0505a:158_6: tussanto katakiccova tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti. “Anutīre mahiyekarattivāso”ti vadamāno
atk-s0505a:158_7: tvaṃ anutīre mahiyā samānavāsoti tussanto catumāsanibaddhavāsena tuṭṭho. Nibaddhavāso
atk-s0505a:158_8: ca āvāsasaṅgena hoti, so ca dukkho, evaṃ sante dukkheneva tuṭṭho hosi. Ahaṃ pana
atk-s0505a:158_9: ekarattivāsoti tussanto anibaddhavāsena tuṭṭho, anibaddhavāso ca āvāsasaṅgābhāvena
atk-s0505a:158_10: hoti, āvāsasaṅgābhāvo ca sukhoti sukheneva tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:159_0: “Vivaṭā kuṭī”ti vadamāno tvaṃ channā kuṭīti tussanto channagehatāya tuṭṭho, gehe
atk-s0505a:159_1: ca te channepi attabhāvakuṭikaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativassati, yena sañjanitehi catūhi
atk-s0505a:159_2: mahoghehi vuyhamāno anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyyāsi, evaṃ sante atuṭṭhabbeneva tuṭṭho hosi.
atk-s0505a:159_3: Ahaṃ pana “vivaṭā kuṭī”ti tussanto attabhāvakuṭiyā kilesacchadanābhāvena tuṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:159_4: Evañca me vivaṭāya kuṭiyā na taṃ kilesavassaṃ ativassati, yena sañjanitehi catūhi
atk-s0505a:159_5: mahoghehi vuyhamāno anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyyaṃ, evaṃ sante tuṭṭhabbeneva tuṭṭho homīti
atk-s0505a:159_6: dīpeti. “Nibbuto ginī”ti vadamāno tvaṃ āhito ginīti tussanto akatūpaddavanivāraṇova
atk-s0505a:159_7: katūpaddavanivāraṇosmīti mantvā tuṭṭho. Ahaṃ pana nibbuto ginīti tussanto ekādasaggipariḷāhābhāvato
atk-s0505a:159_8: katūpaddavanivāraṇatāyeva tuṭṭhoti dīpeti. “Atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti vadamāno
atk-s0505a:159_9: evaṃ vigatadukkhānaṃ anuppattasukhānaṃ katasabbakiccānaṃ amhādisānaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:159_10: sobhati, atha ce patthayasi, pavassa deva, na no tayi vassante vā avassante vā vuḍḍhi
atk-s0505a:159_11: vā hāni vā atthi, tvaṃ pana kasmā evaṃ vadasīti dīpeti. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ vadanto
atk-s0505a:159_12: ca dhaniya atuṭṭhabbeneva tussamānaṃ aññāpadeseneva paribhāsati ovadati, anusāsatī”ti,
atk-s0505a:160_0: 20. Evamimaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāpi dhaniyo gopo “ko ayaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsatī”ti
atk-s0505a:160_1: avatvā tena subhāsitena parituṭṭho punapi tathārūpaṃ sotukāmo aparampi gāthamāha
atk-s0505a:160_3: eke. Makasāti makasāyeva. Na vijjareti natthi. Kaccheti dve kacchā – nadīkaccho ca
atk-s0505a:160_4: pabbatakaccho ca. Idha nadīkaccho. Ruḷhatiṇeti sañjātatiṇe. Carantīti bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0505a:160_5: karonti. Vuṭṭhimpīti vātavuṭṭhiādikā anekā vuṭṭhiyo, tā āḷavakasutte pakāsayissāma.
atk-s0505a:160_6: Idha pana vassavuṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Saheyyunti khameyyuṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Ettha
atk-s0505a:160_7: dhaniyo ye andhakamakasā sannipatitvā rudhire pivantā muhutteneva gāvo anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0505a:160_8: pāpenti, tasmā vuṭṭhitamatteyeva te gopālakā paṃsunā ca sākhāhi ca mārenti, tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:160_9: abhāvena gunnaṃ khemataṃ, kacche ruḷhatiṇacaraṇena addhānagamanaparissamābhāvaṃ vatvā
atk-s0505a:160_10: khudākilamathābhāvañca dīpento “yathā aññesaṃ gāvo andhakamakasasamphassehi dissamānā
atk-s0505a:160_11: addhānagamanena kilantā khudāya milāyamānā ekavuṭṭhinipātampi na saheyyuṃ, na me
atk-s0505a:160_12: tathā gāvo, mayhaṃ pana gāvo vuttappakārābhāvā dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhatuṃ vā vuṭṭhimpi saheyyu”nti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:161_0: 21. Tato bhagavā yasmā dhaniyo antaradīpe vasanto bhayaṃ disvā, kullaṃ bandhitvā,
atk-s0505a:161_1: mahāmahiṃ taritvā, taṃ kacchaṃ āgamma “ahaṃ suṭṭhu āgato, nibbhayeva ṭhāne ṭhito”ti
atk-s0505a:161_2: maññamāno evamāha, sabhaye eva ca so ṭhāne ṭhito, tasmā tassa āgamanaṭṭhānā attano
atk-s0505a:161_3: āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ uttaritarañca paṇītatarañca vaṇṇento “baddhāsi bhisī”ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi,
atk-s0505a:162: Tattha bhisīti pattharitvā puthulaṃ katvā baddhakullo vuccati loke. Ariyassa pana dhammavinaye ariyamaggassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ariyamaggo hi –
atk-s0505a:164: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”. ;
atk-s0505a:166_0: Imāyapi gāthāya bhagavā purimanayeneva taṃ ovadanto imaṃ atthaṃ āhāti veditabbo –
atk-s0505a:166_1: dhaniya, tvaṃ kullaṃ bandhitvā, mahiṃ taritvā, imaṃ ṭhānamāgato, punapi ca te kullo
atk-s0505a:166_2: bandhitabbo eva bhavissati, nadī ca taritabbā, na cetaṃ ṭhānaṃ khemaṃ. Mayā pana
atk-s0505a:166_3: ekacitte maggaṅgāni samodhānetvā ñāṇabandhanena baddhā ahosi bhisi. Sā ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammaparipuṇṇatāya
atk-s0505a:166_5: devamanussesu kenaci mocetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca susaṅkhatā. Tāya camhi tiṇṇo, pubbe
atk-s0505a:166_6: patthitaṃ tīrappadesaṃ gato. Gacchantopi ca na sotāpannādayo viya kañcideva padesaṃ
atk-s0505a:166_7: gato. Atha kho pāragato sabbāsavakkhayaṃ sabbadhammapāraṃ paramaṃ khemaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0505a:166_8: gato, tiṇṇoti vā sabbaññutaṃ patto, pāragatoti arahattaṃ patto. Kiṃ vineyya pāragatoti
atk-s0505a:166_9: ce? Vineyya oghaṃ, kāmoghādicatubbidhaṃ oghaṃ taritvā atikkamma taṃ pāraṃ gatoti.
atk-s0505a:166_10: Idāni ca pana me puna taritabbābhāvato attho bhisiyā na vijjati, tasmā mameva yuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:167_0: 22. Tampi sutvā dhaniyo purimanayeneva “gopī mama assavā”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi. Tattha
atk-s0505a:167_1: gopīti bhariyaṃ niddisati. Assavāti vacanakarā kiṃkārapaṭisāvinī. Alolāti mātugāmo
atk-s0505a:167_2: hi pañcahi lolatāhi lolo hoti – āhāralolatāya, alaṅkāralolatāya, parapurisalolatāya,
atk-s0505a:167_3: dhanalolatāya, pādalolatāya. Tathā hi mātugāmo bhattapūvasurādibhede āhāre lolatāya
atk-s0505a:167_4: antamaso pārivāsikabhattampi bhuñjati, hatthotāpakampi khādati, diguṇaṃ dhanamanuppadatvāpi
atk-s0505a:167_5: suraṃ pivati. Alaṅkāralolatāya aññaṃ alaṅkāraṃ alabhamāno antamaso udakatelakenapi
atk-s0505a:167_6: kese osaṇḍetvā mukhaṃ parimajjati. Parapurisalolatāya antamaso puttenapi tādise padese
atk-s0505a:167_7: pakkosiyamāno paṭhamaṃ asaddhammavasena cinteti. Dhanalolatāya “haṃsarājaṃ gahetvāna
atk-s0505a:167_8: suvaṇṇā parihāyatha”. Pādalolatāya ārāmādigamanasīlo hutvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ vināseti.
atk-s0505a:167_9: Tattha dhaniyo “ekāpi lolatā mayhaṃ gopiyā natthī”ti dassento alolāti āha.
atk-s0505a:168_0: Dīgharattaṃ saṃvāsiyāti dīghakālaṃ saddhiṃ vasamānā komārabhāvato pabhuti ekato vaḍḍhitā.
atk-s0505a:168_1: Tena parapurise na jānātīti dasseti. Manāpāti evaṃ parapurise ajānantī mameva manaṃ
atk-s0505a:168_2: allīyatīti dasseti. Tassā na suṇāmi kiñci pāpanti “itthannāmena nāma saddhiṃ imāya
atk-s0505a:168_3: hasitaṃ vā lapitaṃ vā”ti evaṃ tassā na suṇāmi, kañci aticāradosanti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:169_0: 23. Atha bhagavā etehi guṇehi gopiyā tuṭṭhaṃ dhaniyaṃ ovadanto purimanayeneva “cittaṃ
atk-s0505a:169_1: mama assava”nti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi, atthasabhāgaṃ, byañjanasabhāgañca. Tattha uttānatthāneva
atk-s0505a:169_2: padāni. Ayaṃ pana adhippāyo – dhaniya, tvaṃ “gopī mama assavā”ti tuṭṭho, sā pana
atk-s0505a:169_3: te assavā bhaveyya vā na vā; dujjānaṃ paracittaṃ, visesato mātugāmassa. Mātugāmañhi
atk-s0505a:169_4: kucchiyā pariharantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ durakkhacittattā eva na sakkā
atk-s0505a:169_5: tumhādisehi itthī alolāti vā saṃvāsiyāti vā manāpāti vā nippāpāti vā jānituṃ. Mayhaṃ
atk-s0505a:169_6: pana cittaṃ assavaṃ ovādapaṭikaraṃ mama vase vattati, nāhaṃ tassa vase vattāmi. So
atk-s0505a:169_7: cassa assavabhāvo yamakapāṭihāriye channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ aggidhārāsu ca udakadhārāsu ca
atk-s0505a:169_8: pavattamānāsu sabbajanassa pākaṭo ahosi. Agginimmāne hi tejokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:169_9: udakanimmāne āpokasiṇaṃ, nīlādinimmāne nīlādikasiṇāni. Buddhānampi hi dve cittāni
atk-s0505a:169_10: ekato nappavattanti, ekameva pana assavabhāvena evaṃ vasavatti ahosi. Tañca kho pana
atk-s0505a:169_11: sabbakilesabandhanāpagamā vimuttaṃ, vimuttattā tadeva alolaṃ, na tava gopī. Dīpaṅkarabuddhakālato
atk-s0505a:169_12: ca pabhuti dānasīlādīhi dīgharattaṃ paribhāvitattā saṃvāsiyaṃ, na tava gopī. Tadetaṃ
atk-s0505a:169_13: anuttarena damathena damitattā sudantaṃ, sudantattā attano vasena chadvāravisevanaṃ
atk-s0505a:169_14: pahāya mameva adhippāyamanassa vasenānuvattanato manāpaṃ, na tava gopī.
atk-s0505a:170_0: Pāpaṃ pana me na vijjatīti iminā pana bhagavā tassa attano cittassa pāpābhāvaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0505a:170_1: dhaniyo viya gopiyā. So cassa pāpābhāvo na kevalaṃ sammāsambuddhakāleyeva, ekūnatiṃsa
atk-s0505a:170_2: vassāni sarāgādikāle agāramajjhe vasantassāpi veditabbo. Tadāpi hissa agāriyabhāvānurūpaṃ
atk-s0505a:170_3: viññupaṭikuṭṭhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ vā vacīduccaritaṃ vā manoduccaritaṃ vā na uppannapubbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:170_4: Tato paraṃ māropi chabbassāni anabhisambuddhaṃ, ekaṃ vassaṃ abhisambuddhanti satta
atk-s0505a:170_5: vassāni tathāgataṃ anubandhi “appeva nāma vālagganitudanamattampissa pāpasamācāraṃ
atk-s0505a:170_6: passeyya”nti. So adisvāva nibbinno imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:173_0: Buddhakālepi naṃ uttaramāṇavo satta māsāni anubandhi ābhisamācārikaṃ daṭṭhukāmo.
atk-s0505a:173_1: So kiñci vajjaṃ adisvāva parisuddhasamācāro bhagavāti gato. Cattāri hi tathāgatassa
atk-s0505a:174_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa arakkheyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Parisuddhakāyasamācāro,
atk-s0505a:174_1: bhikkhave, tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa kāyaduccaritaṃ, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya
atk-s0505a:174_2: ‘mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī’ti, parisuddhavacīsamācāro…pe… parisuddhamanosamācāro…pe…
atk-s0505a:174_3: parisuddhājīvo, bhikkhave, tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa micchājīvo, yaṃ tathāgato
atk-s0505a:175_0: Evaṃ yasmā tathāgatassa cittassa na kevalaṃ sammāsambuddhakāle, pubbepi pāpaṃ natthi
atk-s0505a:175_1: eva, tasmā āha – “pāpaṃ pana me na vijjatī”ti. Tassādhippāyo – mameva cittassa pāpaṃ
atk-s0505a:175_2: na sakkā suṇituṃ, na tava gopiyā. Tasmā yadi etehi guṇehi tuṭṭhena “atha ce patthayasī
atk-s0505a:176_0: 24. Tampi sutvā dhaniyo tatuttaripi subhāsitarasāyanaṃ pivitukāmo attano bhujissabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:176_1: dassento āha “attavetanabhatohamasmī”ti. Tattha attavetanabhatoti attaniyeneva ghāsacchādanena
atk-s0505a:176_2: bhato, attanoyeva kammaṃ katvā jīvāmi, na parassa vetanaṃ gahetvā parassa kammaṃ
atk-s0505a:176_3: karomīti dasseti. Puttāti dhītaro ca puttā ca, te sabbe puttātveva ekajjhaṃ vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:176_4: Samāniyāti sannihitā avippavuṭṭhā. Arogāti nirābādhā, sabbeva ūrubāhubalāti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:176_5: Tesaṃ na suṇāmi kiñci pāpanti tesaṃ corāti vā paradārikāti vā dussīlāti vā kiñci pāpaṃ na suṇāmīti.
atk-s0505a:177_0: 25. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā purimanayeneva dhaniyaṃ ovadanto imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi – “nāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:177_1: bhatako”ti. Atrāpi uttānatthāneva padāni. Ayaṃ pana adhippāyo – tvaṃ “bhujissohamasmī”ti
atk-s0505a:177_2: mantvā tuṭṭho, paramatthato ca attano kammaṃ karitvā jīvantopi dāso evāsi taṇhādāsattā,
atk-s0505a:177_3: bhatakavādā ca na parimuccasi. Vuttañhetaṃ “ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso”ti. Paramatthato
atk-s0505a:177_4: pana nāhaṃ bhatakosmi kassaci. Ahañhi kassaci parassa vā attano vā bhatako na homi.
atk-s0505a:177_5: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Yasmā nibbiṭṭhena carāmi sabbaloke. Ahañhi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato yāva bodhi,
atk-s0505a:177_6: tāva sabbaññutaññāṇassa bhatako ahosiṃ. Sabbaññutaṃ patto pana nibbiṭṭho nibbiso
atk-s0505a:177_7: rājabhato viya. Teneva nibbiṭṭhena sabbaññubhāvena lokuttarasamādhisukhena ca jīvāmi.
atk-s0505a:177_8: Tassa me idāni uttarikaraṇīyassa kataparicayassa vā abhāvato appahīnapaṭisandhikānaṃ
atk-s0505a:177_9: tādisānaṃ viya pattabbo koci attho bhatiyā na vijjati. “Bhaṭiyā”tipi pāṭho. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:177_10: yadi bhujissatāya tuṭṭhena “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti vattabbaṃ, mayāvetaṃ vattabbanti.
atk-s0505a:178_0: 26. Tampi sutvā dhaniyo atittova subhāsitāmatena attano pañcappakāragomaṇḍalaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:178_1: dassento āha “atthi vasā”ti. Tattha vasāti adamitavuḍḍhavacchakā. Dhenupāti dhenuṃ
atk-s0505a:178_2: pivantā taruṇavacchakā, khīradāyikā vā gāvo. Godharaṇiyoti gabbhiniyo. Paveṇiyoti
atk-s0505a:178_3: vayappattā balībaddehi saddhiṃ methunapatthanakagāvo. Usabhopi gavampatīti yo gopālakehi
atk-s0505a:178_4: pāto eva nhāpetvā, bhojetvā, pañcaṅgulaṃ datvā, mālaṃ bandhitvā – “ehi, tāta, gāvo
atk-s0505a:178_5: gocaraṃ pāpetvā rakkhitvā ānehī”ti pesīyati, evaṃ pesito ca tā gāvo agocaraṃ pariharitvā,
atk-s0505a:178_6: gocare cāretvā, sīhabyagghādibhayā parittāyitvā āneti, tathārūpo usabhopi gavampati
atk-s0505a:179_0: 27. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā tatheva dhaniyaṃ ovadanto imaṃ paccanīkagāthaṃ āha “natthi
atk-s0505a:179_1: vasā”ti. Ettha cesa adhippāyo – idha amhākaṃ sāsane adamitaṭṭhena vuḍḍhaṭṭhena ca
atk-s0505a:179_2: vasāsaṅkhātā pariyuṭṭhānā vā, taruṇavacchake sandhāya vasānaṃ mūlaṭṭhena khīradāyiniyo
atk-s0505a:179_3: sandhāya paggharaṇaṭṭhena dhenupāsaṅkhātā anusayā vā, paṭisandhigabbhadhāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:179_5: patthanā taṇhā vā, ādhipaccaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca gavampatiusabhasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:179_6: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ vā natthi, svāhaṃ imāya sabbayogakkhemabhūtāya natthitāya tuṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:179_7: Tvaṃ pana sokādivatthubhūtāya atthitāya tuṭṭho. Tasmā sabbayogakkhematāya tuṭṭhassa
atk-s0505a:179_8: mamevetaṃ yuttaṃ vattuṃ “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti.
atk-s0505a:180_0: 28. Tampi sutvā dhaniyo tatuttaripi subhāsitaṃ amatarasaṃ adhigantukāmo attano gogaṇassa
atk-s0505a:180_1: khilabandhanasampattiṃ dassento āha “khilā nikhātā”ti. Tattha khilāti gunnaṃ bandhanatthambhā.
atk-s0505a:180_2: Nikhātāti ākoṭetvā bhūmiyaṃ pavesitā khuddakā mahantā khaṇitvā ṭhapitā. Asampavedhīti
atk-s0505a:180_3: akampakā. Dāmāti vacchakānaṃ bandhanatthāya katā ganthitapāsayuttā rajjubandhanavisesā.
atk-s0505a:180_4: Muñjamayāti muñjatiṇamayā. Navāti acirakatā. Susaṇṭhānāti suṭṭhu saṇṭhānā, suvaṭṭitasaṇṭhānā
atk-s0505a:180_5: vā. Na hi sakkhintīti neva sakkhissanti. Dhenupāpi chettunti taruṇavacchakāpi chindituṃ.
atk-s0505a:181_0: 29. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā dhaniyassa indriya-paripākakālaṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva taṃ
atk-s0505a:181_1: ovadanto imaṃ catusaccadīpikaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “usabhoriva chetvā”ti. Tattha usabhoti
atk-s0505a:181_2: gopitā gopariṇāyako goyūthapati balībaddo. Keci pana bhaṇanti “gavasatajeṭṭho usabho,
atk-s0505a:181_3: sahassajeṭṭho vasabho, satasahassajeṭṭho nisabho”ti. Apare “ekagāmakhette jeṭṭho
atk-s0505a:181_4: usabho, dvīsu jeṭṭho vasabho, sabbattha appaṭihato nisabho”ti. Sabbepete papañcā,
atk-s0505a:181_5: apica kho pana usabhoti vā vasabhoti vā nisabhoti vā sabbepete appaṭisamaṭṭhena veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:181_6: Yathāha – “nisabho vata bho samaṇo gotamo”ti. Ra-kāro padasandhikaro. Bandhanānīti
atk-s0505a:181_7: rajjubandhanāni kilesabandhanāni ca. Nāgoti hatthī. Pūtilatanti gaḷocīlataṃ. Yathā
atk-s0505a:181_8: hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo pūtikāyo, vassasatikopi sunakho kukkuro, tadahujātopi siṅgālo
atk-s0505a:181_9: “jarasiṅgālo”ti vuccati, evaṃ abhinavāpi gaḷocīlatā asārakattena “pūtilatā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:181_10: Dālayitvāti chinditvā. Gabbhañca seyyañca gabbhaseyyaṃ. Tattha gabbhaggahaṇena jalābujayoni,
atk-s0505a:181_11: seyyaggahaṇena avasesā. Gabbhaseyyamukhena vā sabbāpi tā vuttāti veditabbā. Sesamettha
atk-s0505a:182_0: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – dhaniya, tvaṃ bandhanena tuṭṭho, ahaṃ pana bandhanena aṭṭīyanto
atk-s0505a:182_3: dālayitvā, atha vā usabhoriva bandhanāni anusaye nāgo pūtilataṃva pariyuṭṭhānāni
atk-s0505a:182_4: chetvā dālayitvāva ṭhito. Tasmā na puna gabbhaseyyaṃ upessaṃ. Sohaṃ jātidukkhavatthukehi
atk-s0505a:182_5: sabbadukkhehi parimutto sobhāmi – “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti vadamāno. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:182_6: sace tvampi ahaṃ viya vattumicchasi, chinda tāni bandhanānīti. Ettha ca bandhanāni
atk-s0505a:182_7: samudayasaccaṃ, gabbhaseyyā dukkhasaccaṃ, “na upessa”nti ettha anupagamo anupādisesavasena,
atk-s0505a:182_8: “chetvā dālayitvā”ti ettha chedo padālanañca saupādisesavasena nirodhasaccaṃ, yena
atk-s0505a:183_0: Evametaṃ catusaccadīpikaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā gāthāpariyosāne dhaniyo ca pajāpati cassa
atk-s0505a:183_1: dve ca dhītaroti cattāro janā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha dhaniyo aveccappasādayogena
atk-s0505a:183_2: tathāgate mūlajātāya patiṭṭhitāya saddhāya paññācakkhunā bhagavato dhammakāyaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:183_3: dhammatāya coditahadayo cintesi – “bandhanāni chindiṃ, gabbhaseyyo ca me natthī”ti
atk-s0505a:183_4: avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā yāva bhavaggā ko añño evaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadissati aññatra bhagavatā,
atk-s0505a:183_5: āgato nu kho me satthāti. Tato bhagavā chabbaṇṇarasmijālavicitraṃ suvaṇṇarasasekapiñjaraṃ
atk-s0505a:183_6: viya sarīrābhaṃ dhaniyassa nivesane muñci “passa dāni yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0505a:184_0: 30. Atha dhaniyo anto paviṭṭhacandimasūriyaṃ viya samantā pajjalitapadīpasahassasamujjalitamiva
atk-s0505a:184_1: ca nivesanaṃ disvā “āgato bhagavā”ti cittaṃ uppādesi. Tasmiṃyeva ca samaye meghopi
atk-s0505a:184_2: pāvassi. Tenāhu saṅgītikārā “ninnañca thalañca pūrayanto”ti. Tattha ninnanti pallalaṃ.
atk-s0505a:184_3: Thalanti ukkūlaṃ. Evametaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ sabbampi samaṃ katvā pūrayanto mahāmegho
atk-s0505a:184_4: pāvassi, vassituṃ ārabhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tāvadevāti yaṃ khaṇaṃ bhagavā sarīrābhaṃ
atk-s0505a:184_5: muñci, dhaniyo ca “satthā me āgato”ti saddhāmayaṃ cittābhaṃ muñci, taṃ khaṇaṃ pāvassīti.
atk-s0505a:185_1: vassato devassa saddaṃ sutvā dhaniyo pītisomanassajāto imamatthaṃ abhāsatha “lābhā
atk-s0505a:185_2: vata no anappakā”ti dve gāthā vattabbā.
atk-s0505a:186_0: Tattha yasmā dhaniyo saputtadāro bhagavato ariyamaggapaṭivedhena dhammakāyaṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:186_1: lokuttaracakkhunā rūpakāyaṃ disvā, lokiyacakkhunā saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhi. Tasmā āha
atk-s0505a:186_2: – “lābhā vata no anappakā, ye mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasāmā”ti. Tattha vata iti vimhayatthe
atk-s0505a:186_3: nipāto. No iti amhākaṃ. Anappakāti vipulā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Saraṇaṃ taṃ upemāti
atk-s0505a:186_4: ettha pana kiñcāpi maggapaṭivedhenevassa siddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ, tattha pana nicchayagamanameva
atk-s0505a:186_5: gato, idāni vācāya attasanniyyātanaṃ karoti. Maggavasena vā sanniyyātanasaraṇataṃ
atk-s0505a:186_6: acalasaraṇataṃ patto, taṃ paresaṃ vācāya pākaṭaṃ karonto paṇipātasaraṇagamanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0505a:186_7: Cakkhumāti bhagavā pakatidibbapaññāsamantabuddhacakkhūhi pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā.
atk-s0505a:186_8: Taṃ ālapanto āha – “saraṇaṃ taṃ upema cakkhumā”ti. “Satthā no hohi tuvaṃ mahāmunī”ti
atk-s0505a:186_9: idaṃ pana vacanaṃ sissabhāvūpagamanenāpi saraṇagamanaṃ pūretuṃ bhaṇati, gopī ca ahañca
atk-s0505a:186_10: assavā, brahmacariyaṃ sugate carāmaseti idaṃ samādānavasena.
atk-s0505a:187_1: “Brahmacārī”ti evamādīsu hi methunavirati brahmacariyanti vuccati. “Idaṃ kho pana
atk-s0505a:187_2: me pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāyā”ti evamādīsu maggo. “Abhijānāmi kho
atk-s0505a:187_3: panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritā”ti evamādīsu samaṇadhammo.
atk-s0505a:188: “Mayañca bhariyā nātikkamāma, amhe ca bhariyā nātikkamanti;
atk-s0505a:189: Aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāma, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
atk-s0505a:190_0: Evamādīsu sadārasantoso. Idha pana samaṇadhammabrahmacariyapubbaṅgamaṃ uparimaggabrahmacariyamadhippetaṃ.
atk-s0505a:190_1: Sugateti sugatassa santike. Bhagavā hi antadvayamanupaggamma suṭṭhu gatattā, sobhaṇena
atk-s0505a:190_2: ca ariyamaggagamanena samannāgatattā, sundarañca nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā
atk-s0505a:190_3: sugatoti vuccati. Samīpatthe cettha bhummavacanaṃ, tasmā sugatassa santiketi attho.
atk-s0505a:190_4: Carāmaseti carāma. Yañhi taṃ sakkate carāmasīti vuccati, taṃ idha carāmaseti. Aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-s0505a:190_5: pana “seti nipāto”ti bhaṇanti. Teneva cettha āyācanatthaṃ sandhāya “carema se”tipi
atk-s0505a:190_6: pāṭhaṃ vikappenti. Yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:191_0: Evaṃ dhaniyo brahmacariyacaraṇāpadesena bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajjapayojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:191_1: dīpento āha “jātīmaraṇassa pāragū, dukkhassantakarā bhavāmase”ti. Jātimaraṇassa pāraṃ
atk-s0505a:191_2: nāma nibbānaṃ, taṃ arahattamaggena gacchāma. Dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhassa. Antakarāti
atk-s0505a:191_3: abhāvakarā. Bhavāmaseti bhavāma, atha vā aho vata mayaṃ bhaveyyāmāti. “Carāmase”ti
atk-s0505a:191_4: ettha vuttanayeneva taṃ veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ vatvāpi ca puna ubhopi kira bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:191_5: vanditvā “pabbājetha no bhagavā”ti evaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsūti.
atk-s0505a:192_0: 33. Atha māro pāpimā evaṃ te ubhopi vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yācante disvā – “ime mama
atk-s0505a:192_1: visayaṃ atikkamitukāmā, handa nesaṃ antarāyaṃ karomī”ti āgantvā gharāvāse guṇaṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:192_2: imaṃ gāthamāha “nandati puttehi puttimā”ti. Tattha nandatīti tussati modati. Puttehīti
atk-s0505a:192_3: puttehipi dhītarehipi, sahayogatthe, karaṇatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ, puttehi saha nandati,
atk-s0505a:192_4: puttehi karaṇabhūtehi nandatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Puttimāti puttavā puggalo. Itīti evamāha.
atk-s0505a:192_5: Māroti vasavattibhūmiyaṃ aññataro dāmarikadevaputto. So hi saṭṭhānātikkamitukāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:192_6: janaṃ yaṃ sakkoti, taṃ māreti. Yaṃ na sakkoti, tassapi maraṇaṃ icchati. Tena “māro”ti
atk-s0505a:192_7: vuccati. Pāpimāti lāmakapuggalo, pāpasamācāro vā. Saṅgītikārānametaṃ vacanaṃ, sabbagāthāsu
atk-s0505a:192_8: ca īdisāni. Yathā ca puttehi puttimā, gopiyo gohi tatheva nandati. Yassa gāvo atthi,
atk-s0505a:192_9: sopi gopiyo, gohi saha, gohi vā karaṇabhūtehi tatheva nandatīti attho.
atk-s0505a:193_0: Evaṃ vatvā idāni tassatthassa sādhakakāraṇaṃ niddisati, “upadhī hi narassa nandanā”ti.
atk-s0505a:193_1: Tattha upadhīti cattāro upadhayo – kāmūpadhi, khandhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi, abhisaṅkhārūpadhīti.
atk-s0505a:193_2: Kāmā hi “yaṃ pañcakāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti
atk-s0505a:193_3: evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena
atk-s0505a:193_4: upadhīti vuccanti. Khandhāpi khandhamūlakadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa
atk-s0505a:193_5: adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, abhisaṅkhārāpi bhavadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvatoti. Idha pana kāmūpadhi
atk-s0505a:193_6: adhippeto. So sattasaṅkhāravasena duvidho. Tattha sattapaṭibaddho padhāno, taṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:193_7: “puttehi gohī”ti vatvā kāraṇamāha – “upadhī hi narassa nandanā”ti. Tassattho – yasmā
atk-s0505a:193_8: ime kāmūpadhī narassa nandanā, nandayanti naraṃ pītisomanassaṃ upasaṃharantā, tasmā
atk-s0505a:193_9: veditabbametaṃ “nandati puttehi puttimā, gopiyo gohi tatheva nandati, tvañca puttimā
atk-s0505a:193_10: gopiyo ca, tasmā etehi, nanda, mā pabbajjaṃ pāṭikaṅkhi. Pabbajitassa hi ete upadhayo
atk-s0505a:193_11: na santi, evaṃ sante tvaṃ dukkhassantaṃ patthentopi dukkhitova bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0505a:194_0: Idāni tassapi atthassa sādhakakāraṇaṃ niddisati “na hi so nandati, yo nirūpadhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:194_1: Tassattho – yasmā yassete upadhayo natthi, so piyehi ñātīhi vippayutto nibbhogūpakaraṇo
atk-s0505a:194_2: na nandati, tasmā tvaṃ ime upadhayo vajjetvā pabbajito dukkhitova bhavissasīti.
atk-s0505a:195_0: 34. Atha bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā imesaṃ antarāyāya āgato”ti viditvā phalena phalaṃ
atk-s0505a:195_1: pātento viya tāyeva mārenābhatāya upamāya māravādaṃ bhindanto tameva gāthaṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0505a:195_2: “upadhi sokavatthū”ti dassento āha “socati puttehi puttimā”ti. Tattha sabbaṃ padatthato
atk-s0505a:195_3: uttānameva. Ayaṃ pana adhippāyo – mā, pāpima, evaṃ avaca “nandati puttehi puttimā”ti.
atk-s0505a:195_4: Sabbeheva hi piyehi, manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo, anatikkamanīyo ayaṃ vidhi, tesañca
atk-s0505a:195_6: sattā ummattakāpi honti khittacittā, maraṇampi nigacchanti maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:195_7: Tasmā evaṃ gaṇha – socati puttehi puttimā. Yathā ca puttehi puttimā, gopiyo gohi
atk-s0505a:195_8: tatheva socatīti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Upadhī hi narassa socanā. Yasmā ca upadhī hi narassa
atk-s0505a:195_9: socanā, tasmā eva “na hi so socati, yo nirūpadhi”. Yo upadhīsu saṅgappahānena nirupadhi
atk-s0505a:195_10: hoti, so santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena, kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena,
atk-s0505a:195_11: yena yeneva pakkamati, samādāyeva pakkamati. Seyyathāpi nāma pakkhī sakuṇo …pe… nāparaṃ
atk-s0505a:195_12: itthattāyāti pajānāti. Evaṃ sabbasokasamugghātā “na hi so socati, yo nirupadhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:195_13: Iti bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ vosāpesi. Atha vā yo nirupadhi, yo nikkileso,
atk-s0505a:195_14: so na socati. Yāvadeva hi kilesā santi, tāvadeva sabbe upadhayo sokapphalāva honti.
atk-s0505a:195_15: Kilesappahānā pana natthi sokoti. Evampi arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ vosāpesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0505a:195_16: dhaniyo ca gopī ca ubhopi pabbajiṃsu. Bhagavā ākāseneva jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Te pabbajitvā
atk-s0505a:195_17: arahattaṃ sacchikariṃsu. Vasanaṭṭhāne ca nesaṃ gopālakā vihāraṃ kāresuṃ. So ajjāpi
atk-s0505a:199_0: Sabbesu bhūtesūti khaggavisāṇasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Sabbasuttānaṃ catubbidhā uppatti
atk-s0505a:199_1: – attajjhāsayato, parajjhāsayato, aṭṭhuppattito, pucchāvasito cāti. Dvayatānupassanādīnañhi
atk-s0505a:199_2: attajjhāsayato uppatti, mettasuttādīnaṃ parajjhāsayato, uragasuttādīnaṃ aṭṭhuppattito,
atk-s0505a:199_3: dhammikasuttādīnaṃ pucchāvasito. Tattha khaggavisāṇasuttassa avisesena pucchāvasito
atk-s0505a:199_4: uppatti. Visesena pana yasmā ettha kāci gāthā tena tena paccekasambuddhena puṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:199_5: vuttā, kāci apuṭṭhena attanā adhigatamagganayānurūpaṃ udānaṃyeva udānentena, tasmā
atk-s0505a:199_6: kāyaci gāthāya pucchāvasito, kāyaci attajjhāsayato uppatti.
atk-s0505a:200_0: Tattha yā ayaṃ avisesena pucchāvasito uppatti, sā ādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbā –
atk-s0505a:200_1: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa rahogatassa
atk-s0505a:200_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi – “buddhānaṃ patthanā ca abhinīhāro
atk-s0505a:200_3: ca dissati; tathā sāvakānaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ na dissati; yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:200_4: upasaṅkamitvā puccheyya”nti. So paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yathākkamena
atk-s0505a:200_5: etamatthaṃ pucchi. Athassa bhagavā pubbayogāvacarasuttaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:201_0: “Pañcime, ānanda, ānisaṃsā pubbayogāvacare diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0505a:201_1: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti, atha maraṇakāle aññaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0505a:201_2: No ce maraṇakāle aññaṃ ārādheti, atha devaputto samāno aññaṃ ārādheti, atha buddhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:201_3: sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño hoti, atha pacchime kāle paccekasambuddho hotī”ti –
atk-s0505a:203: “Paccekabuddhā nāma, ānanda, abhinīhārasampannā pubbayogāvacarā honti. Tasmā buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ sabbesaṃ patthanā ca abhinīhāro ca icchitabbo”ti.
atk-s0505a:204_0: So āha – “buddhānaṃ, bhante, patthanā kīva ciraṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? Buddhānaṃ, ānanda, heṭṭhimaparicchedena
atk-s0505a:204_1: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca, majjhimaparicchedena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0505a:204_3: Ete ca bhedā paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena ñātabbā. Paññādhikānañhi saddhā
atk-s0505a:204_4: mandā hoti, paññā tikkhā. Saddhādhikānaṃ paññā majjhimā hoti, saddhā balavā. Vīriyādhikānaṃ
atk-s0505a:204_5: saddhāpaññā mandā, vīriyaṃ balavanti. Appatvā pana cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0505a:204_6: divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ dānaṃ dentopi tadanurūpasīlādisabbapāramidhamme
atk-s0505a:204_7: ācinantopi antarā buddho bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā? Ñāṇaṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-s0505a:204_8: na gaṇhāti, vepullaṃ nāpajjati, paripākaṃ na gacchatīti. Yathā nāma timāsacatumāsapañcamāsaccayena
atk-s0505a:204_9: nipphajjanakaṃ sassaṃ taṃ taṃ kālaṃ appatvā divase divase sahassakkhattuṃ keḷāyantopi
atk-s0505a:204_10: udakena siñcantopi antarā pakkhena vā māsena vā nipphādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0505a:204_11: Kasmā? Sassaṃ gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti, vepullaṃ nāpajjati, paripākaṃ na gacchatīti. Evamevaṃ
atk-s0505a:204_12: appatvā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni…pe… netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti. Tasmā yathāvuttameva kālaṃ
atk-s0505a:204_13: pāramipūraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ ñāṇaparipākatthāya. Ettakenapi ca kālena buddhattaṃ patthayato
atk-s0505a:208_0: Abhinīhāroti ca mūlapaṇidhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha manussattanti manussajāti.
atk-s0505a:208_1: Aññatra hi manussajātiyā avasesajātīsu devajātiyampi ṭhitassa paṇidhi na ijjhati.
atk-s0505a:208_2: Ettha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthentena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā manussattaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:208_3: patthetabbaṃ. Tattha ṭhatvā paṇidhi kātabbo. Evañhi samijjhati. Liṅgasampattīti purisabhāvo.
atk-s0505a:208_4: Mātugāmanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānañhi manussajātiyaṃ ṭhitānampi paṇidhi na samijjhati.
atk-s0505a:208_5: Tattha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthentena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā purisabhāvoyeva
atk-s0505a:208_6: patthetabbo. Tattha ṭhatvā paṇidhi kātabbo. Evañhi samijjhati. Hetūti arahattassa
atk-s0505a:208_7: upanissayasampatti. Yo hi tasmiṃ attabhāve vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho,
atk-s0505a:208_8: tassa samijjhati, no itarassa, yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi dīpaṅkarapādamūle pabbajitvā
atk-s0505a:208_9: tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho ahosi. Satthāradassananti buddhānaṃ sammukhādassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:208_10: Evañhi ijjhati, no aññathā; yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi dīpaṅkaraṃ sammukhā disvā
atk-s0505a:208_11: paṇidhesi. Pabbajjāti anagāriyabhāvo. So ca kho sāsane vā kammavādikiriyavāditāpasaparibbājakanikāye
atk-s0505a:208_12: vā vaṭṭati yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi sumedho nāma tāpaso hutvā paṇidhesi. Guṇasampattīti
atk-s0505a:208_13: jhānādiguṇapaṭilābho. Pabbajitassāpi hi guṇasampannasseva ijjhati, no itarassa; yathā
atk-s0505a:208_14: sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi pañcābhiñño aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ca hutvā paṇidhesi. Adhikāroti
atk-s0505a:208_15: adhikakāro, pariccāgoti attho. Jīvitādipariccāgañhi katvā paṇidahatoyeva ijjhati,
atk-s0505a:208_16: no itarassa; yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa. So hi –
atk-s0505a:210: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:211_0: Evaṃ jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā paṇidhesi. Chandatāti kattukamyatā. Sā yassa balavatī
atk-s0505a:211_1: hoti, tassa ijjhati. Sā ca, sace koci vadeyya “ko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca
atk-s0505a:211_2: kappe niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti, taṃ sutvā yo “aha”nti vattuṃ ussahati,
atk-s0505a:211_3: tassa balavatīti veditabbā. Tathā yadi koci vadeyya “ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ
atk-s0505a:211_4: aṅgārānaṃ pūraṃ akkamanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati, ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi
atk-s0505a:211_5: ākiṇṇaṃ akkamanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati, ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ samatittikaṃ
