atk-s0505a:211_6: udakapuṇṇaṃ uttaritvā buddhattaṃ icchati, ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ nirantaraṃ veḷugumbasañchannaṃ
atk-s0505a:211_7: maddanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti taṃ sutvā yo “aha”nti vattuṃ ussahati,
atk-s0505a:211_8: tassa balavatīti veditabbā. Evarūpena ca kattukamyatāchandena samannāgato sumedhapaṇḍito paṇidhesīti.
atk-s0505a:212_0: Evaṃ samiddhābhinīhāro ca bodhisatto imāni aṭṭhārasa abhabbaṭṭhānāni na upeti. So
atk-s0505a:212_1: hi tato pabhuti na jaccandho hoti, na jaccabadhiro, na ummattako, na eḷamūgo, na
atk-s0505a:212_2: pīṭhasappī, na milakkhūsu uppajjati, na dāsikucchiyā nibbattati, na niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko
atk-s0505a:212_3: hoti, nāssa liṅgaṃ parivattati, na pañcānantariyakammāni karoti, na kuṭṭhī hoti,
atk-s0505a:212_4: na tiracchānayoniyaṃ vaṭṭakato pacchimattabhāvo hoti, na khuppipāsikanijjhāmataṇhikapetesu
atk-s0505a:212_5: uppajjati, na kālakañcikāsuresu, na avīciniraye, na lokantarikesu, kāmāvacaresu na
atk-s0505a:212_6: māro hoti, rūpāvacaresu na asaññībhave, na suddhāvāsabhavesu uppajjati, na arūpabhavesu,
atk-s0505a:213: Yā cimā ussāho ummaṅgo avatthānaṃ hitacariyā cāti catasso buddhabhūmiyo, tāhi samannāgato hoti. Tattha –
atk-s0505a:216_0: Veditabbā. Ye cāpi ime nekkhammajjhāsayo, pavivekajjhāsayo, alobhajjhāsayo, adosajjhāsayo,
atk-s0505a:216_1: amohajjhāsayo, nissaraṇajjhāsayoti cha ajjhāsayā bodhiparipākāya saṃvattanti, yehi
atk-s0505a:216_2: samannāgatattā nekkhammajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā kāme dosadassāvino, pavivekajjhāsayā
atk-s0505a:216_3: ca bodhisattā saṅgaṇikāya dosadassāvino, alobhajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā lobhe dosadassāvino,
atk-s0505a:216_4: adosajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā dose dosadassāvino, amohajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā mohe
atk-s0505a:216_5: dosadassāvino, nissaraṇajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā sabbabhavesu dosadassāvinoti vuccanti,
atk-s0505a:217_0: Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana kīva ciraṃ patthanā vaṭṭatīti? Paccekabuddhānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0505a:217_1: kappasatasahassañca. Tato oraṃ na sakkā. Pubbe vuttanayenevettha kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:217_2: Ettakenāpi ca kālena paccekabuddhattaṃ patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe pañca sampattiyo
atk-s0505a:220: Tattha vigatāsavadassananti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ yassa kassaci dassananti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:221_0: Atha sāvakānaṃ patthanā kittakaṃ vaṭṭatīti? Dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0505a:221_1: kappasatasahassañca, asītimahāsāvakānaṃ kappasatasahassaṃ, tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:221_2: upaṭṭhākassa puttassa cāti. Tato oraṃ na sakkā. Vuttanayamevettha kāraṇaṃ. Imesaṃ
atk-s0505a:221_3: pana sabbesampi adhikāro chandatāti dvaṅgasampannoyeva abhinīhāro hoti.
atk-s0505a:222_0: Evaṃ imāya patthanāya iminā ca abhinīhārena yathāvuttappabhedaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0505a:222_1: buddhā loke uppajjantā khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā uppajjanti, paccekabuddhā
atk-s0505a:222_3: buddhā iva sabbabuddhā saṃvaṭṭamāne kappe na uppajjanti, vivaṭṭamāne kappe uppajjanti.
atk-s0505a:222_4: Paccekabuddhā buddhe appatvā buddhānaṃ uppajjanakāleyeva uppajjanti. Buddhā sayañca
atk-s0505a:222_5: bujjhanti, pare ca bodhenti. Paccekabuddhā sayameva bujjhanti, na pare bodhenti.
atk-s0505a:222_6: Attharasameva paṭivijjhanti, na dhammarasaṃ. Na hi te lokuttaradhammaṃ paññattiṃ
atk-s0505a:222_7: āropetvā desetuṃ sakkonti, mūgena diṭṭhasupino viya vanacarakena nagare sāyitabyañjanaraso
atk-s0505a:222_8: viya ca nesaṃ dhammābhisamayo hoti. Sabbaṃ iddhisamāpattipaṭisambhidāpabhedaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0505a:222_9: guṇavisiṭṭhatāya buddhānaṃ heṭṭhā sāvakānaṃ upari honti, aññe pabbājetvā ābhisamācārikaṃ
atk-s0505a:222_10: sikkhāpenti, “cittasallekho kātabbo, vosānaṃ nāpajjitabba”nti iminā uddesena uposathaṃ
atk-s0505a:222_11: karonti, ‘ajjuposatho’ti vacanamattena vā. Uposathaṃ karontā ca gandhamādane mañjūsakarukkhamūle
atk-s0505a:222_12: ratanamāḷe sannipatitvā karontīti. Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:222_13: sabbākāraparipūraṃ patthanañca abhinīhārañca kathetvā, idāni imāya patthanāya iminā
atk-s0505a:222_14: ca abhinīhārena samudāgate te te paccekabuddhe kathetuṃ “sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya
atk-s0505a:222_15: daṇḍa”ntiādinā nayena imaṃ khaggavisāṇasuttaṃ abhāsi. Ayaṃ tāva avisesena pucchāvasito
atk-s0505a:223_0: 35. Idāni visesena vattabbā. Tattha imissā tāva gāthāya evaṃ uppatti veditabbā –
atk-s0505a:223_1: ayaṃ kira paccekabuddho paccekabodhisattabhūmiṃ ogāhanto dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0505a:223_2: pāramiyo pūretvā kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā āraññiko hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ
atk-s0505a:223_3: pūrento samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇantā
atk-s0505a:223_4: nāma natthi. Kiṃ panetaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ nāma? Haraṇapaccāharaṇanti. Taṃ yathā
atk-s0505a:224_0: Idhekacco bhikkhu harati, na paccāharati; ekacco paccāharati, na harati; ekacco pana
atk-s0505a:224_1: neva harati, na paccāharati; ekacco harati ca paccāharati ca. Tattha yo bhikkhu pageva
atk-s0505a:224_2: vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā, bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā, pānīyaghaṭaṃ
atk-s0505a:224_3: pūretvā pānīyamāḷe ṭhapetvā, ācariyavattaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ katvā, dveasīti khuddakavattāni
atk-s0505a:224_4: cuddasa mahāvattāni ca samādāya vattati, so sarīraparikammaṃ katvā, senāsanaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0505a:224_5: yāva bhikkhācāravelā tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā, velaṃ ñatvā, nivāsetvā, kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0505a:224_6: bandhitvā, uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā, saṅghāṭiṃ khandhe karitvā, pattaṃ aṃse ālaggetvā,
atk-s0505a:224_7: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ patvā, cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā, gāmasamīpe
atk-s0505a:224_8: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā, pattamādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, evaṃ paviṭṭho ca lābhī bhikkhu
atk-s0505a:224_9: puññavā upāsakehi sakkatagarukato upaṭṭhākakule vā paṭikkamanasālāyaṃ vā paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0505a:224_10: upāsakehi taṃ taṃ pañhaṃ pucchiyamāno tesaṃ pañhavissajjanena dhammadesanāvikkhepena
atk-s0505a:224_11: ca taṃ manasikāraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamati, vihāraṃ āgatopi bhikkhūnaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho
atk-s0505a:224_12: katheti, dhammaṃ bhaṇati, taṃ taṃ byāpāramāpajjati, pacchābhattampi purimayāmampi
atk-s0505a:224_13: majjhimayāmampi evaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ papañcitvā kāyaduṭṭhullābhibhūto pacchimayāmepi
atk-s0505a:224_14: sayati, neva kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti, ayaṃ vuccati harati, na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0505a:225_0: Yo pana byādhibahulo hoti, bhuttāhāro paccūsasamaye na sammā pariṇamati, pageva vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0505a:225_1: yathāvuttaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasi kātuṃ, aññadatthu yāguṃ
atk-s0505a:225_2: vā bhesajjaṃ vā patthayamāno kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pavisati. Tattha yāguṃ
atk-s0505a:225_3: vā bhesajjaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā laddhā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā, paññattāsane nisinno
atk-s0505a:225_4: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi katvā, visesaṃ patvā vā appatvā vā, vihāraṃ āgantvā, teneva manasikārena
atk-s0505a:225_5: viharati. Ayaṃ vuccati paccāharati na haratīti. Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā, vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:225_6: ārabhitvā, buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu
atk-s0505a:225_7: tesu gāmesu āsanasālāya na taṃ āsanaṃ atthi, yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ patto bhikkhu natthīti.
atk-s0505a:226_0: Yo pana pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro, sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhanabaddhacitto
atk-s0505a:226_1: viharanto kammaṭṭhānamanasikāramananuyutto gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā gihipapañcena
atk-s0505a:226_2: papañcito tucchako nikkhamati, ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0505a:227_0: Yo pana pageva vuṭṭhāya purimanayeneva sabbavattāni paripūretvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0505a:227_1: tāva pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma duvidhaṃ –
atk-s0505a:227_2: sabbatthakaṃ, pārihāriyañca. Sabbatthakaṃ nāma mettā ca maraṇassati ca. Taṃ sabbattha
atk-s0505a:227_3: icchitabbato “sabbatthaka”nti vuccati. Mettā nāma āvāsādīsu sabbattha icchitabbā.
atk-s0505a:227_4: Āvāsesu hi mettāvihārī bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti, tena phāsu asaṅghaṭṭho
atk-s0505a:227_5: viharati. Devatāsu mettāvihārī devatāhi rakkhitagopito sukhaṃ viharati. Rājarājamahāmattādīsu
atk-s0505a:227_6: mettāvihārī, tehi mamāyito sukhaṃ viharati. Gāmanigamādīsu mettāvihārī sabbattha
atk-s0505a:227_7: bhikkhācariyādīsu manussehi sakkatagarukato sukhaṃ viharati. Maraṇassatibhāvanāya
atk-s0505a:228_0: Yaṃ pana sadā pariharitabbaṃ caritānukūlena gahitattā dasāsubhakasiṇānussatīsu aññataraṃ,
atk-s0505a:228_1: catudhātuvavatthānameva vā, taṃ sadā pariharitabbato, rakkhitabbato, bhāvetabbato
atk-s0505a:228_2: ca pārihāriyanti vuccati, mūlakammaṭṭhānantipi tadeva. Tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:228_3: manasi karitvā pacchā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti, taṃ catudhātuvavatthānamukhena dassessāma.
atk-s0505a:229_0: Ayañhi yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati – yaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre
atk-s0505a:229_1: vīsatikoṭṭhāsesu kakkhaḷaṃ kharagataṃ, sā pathavīdhātu. Yaṃ dvādasasu ābandhanakiccakaraṃ
atk-s0505a:229_2: snehagataṃ, sā āpodhātu. Yaṃ catūsu paripācanakaraṃ usumagataṃ, sā tejodhātu. Yaṃ
atk-s0505a:229_3: pana chasu vitthambhanakaraṃ vāyogataṃ, sā vāyodhātu. Yaṃ panettha catūhi mahābhūtehi
atk-s0505a:229_4: asamphuṭṭhaṃ chiddaṃ vivaraṃ, sā ākāsadhātu. Taṃvijānanakaṃ cittaṃ viññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0505a:229_5: Tato uttari añño satto vā puggalo vā natthi. Kevalaṃ suddhasaṅkhārapuñjova ayanti.
atk-s0505a:230_0: Evaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānato kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā, kālaṃ ñatvā, uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0505a:230_1: nivāsetvā, pubbe vuttanayeneva gāmaṃ piṇḍāya gacchati. Gacchanto ca yathā andhaputhujjanā
atk-s0505a:230_2: abhikkamādīsu “attā abhikkamati, attanā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti vā, “ahaṃ abhikkamāmi,
atk-s0505a:230_3: mayā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmīti citte
atk-s0505a:230_4: uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā sandhāraṇavāyodhātu uppajjati.
atk-s0505a:230_5: Sā imaṃ pathavīdhātvādisannivesabhūtaṃ kāyasammataṃ aṭṭhikasaṅghāṭaṃ vippharati,
atk-s0505a:230_6: tato cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhikasaṅghāṭo abhikkamati.
atk-s0505a:230_7: Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddhāraṇe catūsu dhātūsu vāyodhātuanugatā tejodhātu
atk-s0505a:230_8: adhikā uppajjati, mandā itarā. Atiharaṇavītiharaṇāpaharaṇesu pana tejodhātuanugatā
atk-s0505a:230_9: vāyodhātu adhikā uppajjati, mandā itarā. Orohaṇe pana pathavīdhātuanugatā āpodhātu
atk-s0505a:230_10: adhikā uppajjati, mandā itarā. Sannikkhepanasamuppīḷanesu āpodhātuanugatā pathavīdhātu
atk-s0505a:230_11: adhikā uppajjati, mandā itarā. Iccetā dhātuyo tena tena attano uppādakacittena saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:230_12: tattha tattheva bhijjanti. Tattha ko eko abhikkamati, kassa vā ekassa abhikkamana”nti
atk-s0505a:230_13: evaṃ ekekapāduddhāraṇādippakāresu ekekasmiṃ pakāre uppannadhātuyo, tadavinibbhuttā
atk-s0505a:230_14: ca sesā rūpadhammā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttā ca sesā arūpadhammāti
atk-s0505a:230_15: ete rūpārūpadhammā. Tato paraṃ atiharaṇavītiharaṇādīsu aññaṃ pakāraṃ na sampāpuṇanti,
atk-s0505a:230_16: tattha tattheva bhijjanti. Tasmā aniccā. Yañca aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:230_17: tadanattāti evaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati. Atthakāmā
atk-s0505a:230_18: hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi saṭṭhipi
atk-s0505a:230_19: sattatipi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti – “āvuso, tumhe na iṇaṭṭhā,
atk-s0505a:230_20: na bhayaṭṭhā, na jīvikāpakatā pabbajitā; dukkhā muccitukāmā panettha pabbajitā. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:230_21: gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne nisajjāya, sayane uppannakilesaṃ
atk-s0505a:230_22: gamaneyeva niggaṇhathā”ti. Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu
atk-s0505a:230_23: pāsāṇā honti, tāya saññāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāva gacchanti. Sace kassaci gamane
atk-s0505a:230_24: kileso uppajjati, tattheva naṃ niggaṇhāti. Tathā asakkonto tiṭṭhati. Athassa pacchato
atk-s0505a:230_25: āgacchantopi tiṭṭhati. So – “ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannavitakkaṃ jānāti, ananucchavikaṃ
atk-s0505a:230_26: te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0505a:230_27: Tathā asakkonto nisīdati. Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti soyeva nayo. Ariyabhūmi
atk-s0505a:230_28: okkamituṃ asakkontopi taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati.
atk-s0505a:230_29: Na kammaṭṭhānavippayuttena cittena pādaṃ uddharati. Uddharati ce, paṭinivattitvā
atk-s0505a:230_30: purimappadesaṃyeva eti sīhaḷadīpe ālindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viya.
atk-s0505a:231_0: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi. Manussāpi sudaṃ
atk-s0505a:231_1: antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni karontā theraṃ tathā gacchantaṃ
atk-s0505a:231_2: disvā – “ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṃ nu kho maggamūḷho, udāhu
atk-s0505a:231_3: kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti. So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:231_4: karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:231_5: adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi. Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca
atk-s0505a:231_6: devānamindo, brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamaṃsu. Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsī
atk-s0505a:231_7: mahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi “rattibhāge āyasmato santike obhāso ahosi,
atk-s0505a:231_8: kiṃ so obhāso”ti? Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti, maṇiobhāsopī”ti
atk-s0505a:231_9: evamādiṃ āha. So “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho “āmā”ti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0505a:232_0: Kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya ca. Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento
atk-s0505a:232_1: “paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjemī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:232_2: Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Evaṃ kammaṭṭhānayutteneva
atk-s0505a:232_3: cittena pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhaṭe pana paṭinivattanto gāmasamīpaṃ
atk-s0505a:232_4: gantvā, “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā, saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ
atk-s0505a:232_5: gahetvā, gāmadvāraṃ patvā, kacchakantarato udakaṃ gahetvā, gaṇḍūsaṃ katvā gāmaṃ pavisati
atk-s0505a:232_6: “bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā upagate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenapi
atk-s0505a:232_7: mā me kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī”ti sace pana “ajja, bhante, kiṃ sattamī, udāhu aṭṭhamī”ti
atk-s0505a:232_8: divasaṃ pucchanti, udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti. Sace divasapucchakā na honti, nikkhamanavelāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:233_0: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsabhikkhū viya ca. Te kira vassūpanāyikauposathadivase
atk-s0505a:233_1: katikavattaṃ akaṃsu – “arahattaṃ appatvā aññamaññaṃ nālapissāmā”ti. Gāmañca piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:233_2: pavisantā gāmadvāre udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu, divase pucchite udakaṃ gilitvā
atk-s0505a:233_3: ārocesuṃ, apucchite gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvā vihāraṃ āgamaṃsu. Tattha manussā niṭṭhubhanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:233_4: disvā jāniṃsu “ajja eko āgato, ajja dve”ti. Evañca cintesuṃ “kiṃ nu kho ete amheheva
atk-s0505a:233_5: saddhiṃ na sallapanti, udāhu aññamaññampi? Yadi aññamaññampi na sallapanti, addhā
atk-s0505a:233_6: vivādajātā bhavissanti, handa nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:233_7: Tattha paññāsabhikkhūsu vassaṃ upagatesu dve bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu. Tato yo
atk-s0505a:233_8: tesu cakkhumā puriso, so evamāha – “na, bho, kalahakārakānaṃ vasanokāso īdiso hoti,
atk-s0505a:233_9: susammaṭṭhaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ, sunikkhittā sammajjaniyo, sūpaṭṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0505a:233_10: pānīyaparibhojanīya”nti. Te tatova nivattā. Te bhikkhū antotemāseyeva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:233_11: ārabhitvā arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0505a:234_0: Evaṃ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū
atk-s0505a:234_1: viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ patvā, udakagaṇḍūsaṃ
atk-s0505a:234_2: katvā, vīthiyo sallakkhetvā, yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0505a:234_3: vā natthi, taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya
atk-s0505a:234_4: javena gacchati, javanapiṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma natthi. Visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ
atk-s0505a:234_5: pana udakabharitasakaṭamiva niccalova hutvā gacchati. Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:234_6: adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā, patirūpe
atk-s0505a:234_7: okāse nisīditvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā, akkhabbhañjanavaṇālepanaputtamaṃsūpamāvasena
atk-s0505a:234_8: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, neva davāya na madāya…pe… bhuttāvī
atk-s0505a:234_9: ca udakakiccaṃ katvā, muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā, yathā pure bhattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:234_10: evaṃ pacchā bhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:234_11: vuccati harati ceva paccāharati cāti. Evametaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇaṃ gatapaccāgatavattanti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:235_0: Etaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti, paṭhamavaye eva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. No
atk-s0505a:235_1: ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti, atha majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti. No ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0505a:235_2: atha maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti. No ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti, atha devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0505a:235_3: No ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti, atha paccekasambuddho hutvā parinibbāti. No ce paccekasambuddho
atk-s0505a:235_4: hutvā parinibbāti, atha buddhānaṃ santike khippābhiñño hoti; seyyathāpi – thero bāhiyo,
atk-s0505a:235_5: mahāpañño vā hoti; seyyathāpi thero sāriputto.
atk-s0505a:236_0: Ayaṃ pana paccekabodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā, āraññiko hutvā,
atk-s0505a:236_1: vīsati vassasahassāni etaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā, kālaṃ katvā, kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0505a:236_2: uppajji. Tato cavitvā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:236_3: Kusalā itthiyo tadaheva gabbhasaṇṭhānaṃ jānanti, sā ca tāsamaññatarā, tasmā taṃ gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:236_4: rañño nivedesi. Dhammatā esā, yaṃ puññavante satte gabbhe uppanne mātugāmo gabbhaparihāraṃ
atk-s0505a:236_5: labhati. Tasmā rājā tassā gabbhaparihāraṃ adāsi. Sā tato pabhuti nāccuṇhaṃ kiñci
atk-s0505a:236_6: ajjhoharituṃ labhati, nātisītaṃ, nātiambilaṃ, nātiloṇaṃ, nātikaṭukaṃ, nātitittakaṃ.
atk-s0505a:236_7: Accuṇhe hi mātarā ajjhohaṭe gabbhassa lohakumbhivāso viya hoti, atisīte lokantarikavāso
atk-s0505a:236_8: viya, accambilaloṇakaṭukatittakesu bhuttesu satthena phāletvā ambilādīhi sittāni
atk-s0505a:236_9: viya gabbhaseyyakassa aṅgāni tibbavedanāni honti. Aticaṅkamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsayanatopi
atk-s0505a:236_10: naṃ nivārenti – “kucchigatassa sañcalanadukkhaṃ mā ahosī”ti. Mudukattharaṇatthatāya
atk-s0505a:236_11: bhūmiyaṃ caṅkamanādīni mattāya kātuṃ labhati, vaṇṇagandhādisampannaṃ sādusappāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:236_12: annapānaṃ labhati. Pariggahetvāva naṃ caṅkamāpenti, nisīdāpenti, vuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-s0505a:237_0: Sā evaṃ parihariyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle sūtigharaṃ pavisitvā paccūsasamaye puttaṃ
atk-s0505a:237_1: vijāyi pakkatelamadditamanosilāpiṇḍisadisaṃ dhaññapuññalakkhaṇūpetaṃ. Tato naṃ pañcamadivase
atk-s0505a:237_2: alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ rañño dassesuṃ, rājā tuṭṭho chasaṭṭhiyā dhātīhi upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:237_3: So sabbasampattīhi vaḍḍhamāno na cirasseva viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ soḷasavassuddesikameva
atk-s0505a:237_4: samānaṃ rājā rajje abhisiñci, vividhanāṭakāni cassa upaṭṭhāpesi. Abhisitto rājaputto
atk-s0505a:237_5: rajjaṃ kāresi nāmena brahmadatto sakalajambudīpe vīsatiyā nagarasahassesu. Jambudīpe
atk-s0505a:237_6: hi pubbe caturāsīti nagarasahassāni ahesuṃ. Tāni parihāyantāni saṭṭhi ahesuṃ, tato
atk-s0505a:237_7: parihāyantāni cattālīsaṃ, sabbaparihāyanakāle pana vīsati honti. Ayañca brahmadatto
atk-s0505a:237_8: sabbaparihāyanakāle uppajji. Tenassa vīsati nagarasahassāni ahesuṃ, vīsati pāsādasahassāni,
atk-s0505a:237_9: vīsati hatthisahassāni, vīsati assasahassāni, vīsati rathasahassāni, vīsati pattisahassāni,
atk-s0505a:237_10: vīsati itthisahassāni – orodhā ca nāṭakitthiyo ca, vīsati amaccasahassāni. So mahārajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:237_11: kārayamāno eva kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññāyo, aṭṭha samāpattiyo ca nibbattesi.
atk-s0505a:237_12: Yasmā pana abhisittaraññā nāma avassaṃ aṭṭakaraṇe nisīditabbaṃ, tasmā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0505a:237_13: pageva pātarāsaṃ bhuñjitvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīdi. Tattha uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:237_14: So “ayaṃ saddo samāpattiyā upakkileso”ti pāsādatalaṃ abhiruhitvā “samāpattiṃ appemī”ti
atk-s0505a:237_15: nisinno nāsakkhi appetuṃ, rajjavikkhepena samāpatti parihīnā. Tato cintesi “kiṃ rajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:237_16: varaṃ, udāhu samaṇadhammo”ti. Tato “rajjasukhaṃ parittaṃ anekādīnavaṃ, samaṇadhammasukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:237_17: pana vipulamanekānisaṃsaṃ uttamapurisasevitañcā”ti ñatvā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi
atk-s0505a:237_18: – “imaṃ rajjaṃ dhammena samena anusāsa, mā kho adhammakāraṃ akāsī”ti sabbaṃ niyyātetvā
atk-s0505a:237_19: pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā samāpattisukhena viharati, na koci upasaṅkamituṃ labhati aññatra
atk-s0505a:238_0: Tato addhamāsamatte vītikkante mahesī pucchi “rājā uyyānagamanabaladassananāṭakādīsu
atk-s0505a:238_1: katthaci na dissati, kuhiṃ gato”ti? Tassā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Sā amaccassa pāhesi
atk-s0505a:238_2: “rajje paṭicchite ahampi paṭicchitā homi, etu mayā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetū”ti. So
atk-s0505a:238_3: ubho kaṇṇe thaketvā “asavanīyameta”nti paṭikkhipi. Sā punapi dvattikkhattuṃ pesetvā
atk-s0505a:238_4: anicchamānaṃ tajjāpesi – “yadi na karosi, ṭhānāpi te cāvemi, jīvitāpi voropemī”ti.
atk-s0505a:238_5: So bhīto “mātugāmo nāma daḷhanicchayo, kadāci evampi kārāpeyyā”ti ekadivasaṃ raho
atk-s0505a:238_6: gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sirisayane saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. Sā puññavatī sukhasamphassā. So
atk-s0505a:238_7: tassā samphassarāgena ratto tattha abhikkhaṇaṃ saṅkitasaṅkitova agamāsi. Anukkamena
atk-s0505a:239_0: Tato rājamanussā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā na saddahati. Dutiyampi tatiyampi
atk-s0505a:239_1: ārocesuṃ. Tato nilīno sayameva disvā sabbāmacce sannipātāpetvā ārocesi. Te – “ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:239_2: rājāparādhiko hatthacchedaṃ arahati, pādacchedaṃ arahatī”ti yāva sūle uttāsanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:239_3: tāva sabbakammakāraṇāni niddisiṃsu. Rājā – “etassa vadhabandhanatāḷane mayhaṃ vihiṃsā
atk-s0505a:239_4: uppajjeyya, jīvitā voropane pāṇātipāto bhaveyya, dhanaharaṇe adinnādānaṃ, alaṃ evarūpehi
atk-s0505a:239_5: katehi, imaṃ mama rajjā nikkaḍḍhathā”ti āha. Amaccā taṃ nibbisayaṃ akaṃsu. So attano
atk-s0505a:239_6: dhanasārañca puttadārañca gahetvā paravisayaṃ agamāsi. Tattha rājā sutvā “kiṃ āgatosī”ti
atk-s0505a:239_7: pucchi. “Deva, icchāmi taṃ upaṭṭhātu”nti. So taṃ sampaṭicchi. Amacco katipāhaccayena
atk-s0505a:239_8: laddhavissāso taṃ rājānaṃ etadavoca – “mahārāja, amakkhikamadhuṃ passāmi, taṃ khādanto
atk-s0505a:239_9: natthī”ti. Rājā “kiṃ etaṃ uppaṇḍetukāmo bhaṇatī”ti na suṇāti. So antaraṃ labhitvā
atk-s0505a:239_10: punapi suṭṭhutaraṃ vaṇṇetvā ārocesi. Rājā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchi. “Bārāṇasirajjaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0505a:239_11: Rājā “maṃ netvā māretukāmosī”ti āha. So “mā, deva, evaṃ avaca, yadi na saddahasi,
atk-s0505a:239_12: manusse pesehī”ti. So manusse pesesi. Te gantvā gopuraṃ khaṇitvā rañño sayanaghare uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:240_0: Rājā disvā “kissa āgatātthā”ti pucchi. “Corā mayaṃ, mahārājā”ti. Rājā tesaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0505a:240_1: dāpetvā “mā puna evamakatthā”ti ovaditvā vissajjesi. Te āgantvā tassa rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:240_2: So punapi dvattikkhattuṃ tatheva vīmaṃsitvā “sīlavā rājā”ti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā
atk-s0505a:240_3: sīmantare ekaṃ nagaraṃ upagamma tattha amaccassa pāhesi “nagaraṃ vā me dehi yuddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:240_4: vā”ti. So brahmadattassa tamatthaṃ ārocāpesi “āṇāpetu devo kiṃ yujjhāmi, udāhu nagaraṃ
atk-s0505a:240_5: demī”ti. Rājā “na yujjhitabbaṃ, nagaraṃ datvā idhāgacchā”ti pesesi. So tathā akāsi.
atk-s0505a:240_6: Paṭirājāpi taṃ nagaraṃ gahetvā avasesanagaresupi tatheva dūtaṃ pāhesi. Tepi amaccā
atk-s0505a:240_7: tatheva brahmadattassa ārocetvā tena “na yujjhitabbaṃ, idhāgantabba”nti vuttā bārāṇasiṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:241_0: Tato amaccā brahmadattaṃ āhaṃsu – “mahārāja, tena saha yujjhāmā”ti. Rājā – “mama
atk-s0505a:241_1: pāṇātipāto bhavissatī”ti vāresi. Amaccā – “mayaṃ, mahārāja, taṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0505a:241_2: idheva ānessāmā”ti nānāupāyehi rājānaṃ saññāpetvā “ehi mahārājā”ti gantuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0505a:241_3: Rājā “sace sattamāraṇappaharaṇavilumpanakammaṃ na karotha, gacchāmī”ti bhaṇati. Amaccā
atk-s0505a:241_4: “na, deva, karoma, bhayaṃ dassetvā palāpemā”ti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā ghaṭesu
atk-s0505a:241_5: dīpe pakkhipitvā rattiṃ gacchiṃsu. Paṭirājā taṃ divasaṃ bārāṇasisamīpe nagaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0505a:241_6: idāni kinti rattiṃ sannāhaṃ mocāpetvā pamatto niddaṃ okkami saddhiṃ balakāyena. Tato
atk-s0505a:241_7: amaccā bārāṇasirājānaṃ gahetvā paṭirañño khandhāvāraṃ gantvā sabbaghaṭehi dīpe niharāpetvā
atk-s0505a:241_8: ekapajjotāya senāya saddaṃ akaṃsu. Paṭirañño amacco mahābalaṃ disvā bhīto attano
atk-s0505a:241_9: rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “uṭṭhehi amakkhikamadhuṃ khādāhī”ti mahāsaddaṃ akāsi. Tathā
atk-s0505a:241_10: dutiyopi, tatiyopi. Paṭirājā tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajji. Ukkuṭṭhisatāni
atk-s0505a:241_11: pavattiṃsu. So “paravacanaṃ saddahitvā amittahatthaṃ pattomhī”ti sabbarattiṃ taṃ
atk-s0505a:241_12: taṃ vippalapitvā dutiyadivase “dhammiko rājā, uparodhaṃ na kareyya, gantvā khamāpemī”ti
atk-s0505a:241_13: cintetvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā “khama, mahārāja, mayhaṃ aparādha”nti
atk-s0505a:241_14: āha. Rājā taṃ ovaditvā “uṭṭhehi, khamāmi te”ti āha. So raññā evaṃ vuttamatteyeva
atk-s0505a:241_15: paramassāsappatto ahosi, bārāṇasirañño samīpeyeva janapade rajjaṃ labhi. Te aññamaññaṃ sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:242_0: Atha brahmadatto dvepi senā sammodamānā ekato ṭhitā disvā “mamekassa cittānurakkhaṇāya
atk-s0505a:242_1: asmiṃ janakāye khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitabindu na uppannaṃ. Aho sādhu,
atk-s0505a:242_2: aho suṭṭhu, sabbe sattā sukhitā hontu, averā hontu, abyāpajjhā hontū”ti mettājhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:242_3: uppādetvā, tadeva pādakaṃ katvā, saṅkhāre sammasitvā, paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ sacchikatvā,
atk-s0505a:242_4: sayambhutaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhitaṃ hatthikkhandhe nisinnaṃ
atk-s0505a:242_5: amaccā paṇipātaṃ katvā āhaṃsu – “yānakālo, mahārāja, vijitabalakāyassa sakkāro kātabbo,
atk-s0505a:242_6: parājitabalakāyassa bhattaparibbayo dātabbo”ti. So āha – “nāhaṃ, bhaṇe, rājā, paccekabuddho
atk-s0505a:242_7: nāmāha”nti. Kiṃ devo bhaṇati, na edisā paccekabuddhā hontīti? Kīdisā, bhaṇe, paccekabuddhāti?
atk-s0505a:242_8: Paccekabuddhā nāma dvaṅgulakesamassu aṭṭhaparikkhārayuttā bhavantīti. So dakkhiṇahatthena
atk-s0505a:242_9: sīsaṃ parāmasi, tāvadeva gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyi, pabbajitaveso pāturahosi, dvaṅgulakesamassu
atk-s0505a:242_10: aṭṭhaparikkhārasamannāgato vassasatikattherasadiso ahosi. So catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0505a:242_11: hatthikkhandhato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā padumapupphe nisīdi. Amaccā vanditvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0505a:242_12: bhante, kammaṭṭhānaṃ, kathaṃ adhigatosī”ti pucchiṃsu. So yato assa mettājhānakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:242_13: ahosi, tañca vipassanaṃ vipassitvā adhigato, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento udānagāthañca
atk-s0505a:242_14: byākaraṇagāthañca imaññeva gāthaṃ abhāsi “sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍa”nti.
atk-s0505a:243_0: Tattha sabbesūti anavasesesu. Bhūtesūti sattesu. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana
atk-s0505a:243_1: ratanasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma. Nidhāyāti nikkhipitvā. Daṇḍanti kāyavacīmanodaṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0505a:243_2: kāyaduccaritādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Kāyaduccaritañhi daṇḍayatīti daṇḍo, bādheti anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0505a:243_3: pāpetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ manoduccaritaṃ ca. Paharaṇadaṇḍo eva vā
atk-s0505a:243_4: daṇḍo, taṃ nidhāyātipi vuttaṃ hoti. Aviheṭhayanti aviheṭhayanto. Aññatarampīti yaṃkiñci
atk-s0505a:243_5: ekampi. Tesanti tesaṃ sabbabhūtānaṃ. Na puttamiccheyyāti atrajo, khetrajo, dinnako,
atk-s0505a:243_6: antevāsikoti imesu catūsu puttesu yaṃ kiñci puttaṃ na iccheyya. Kuto sahāyanti sahāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:244_0: Ekoti pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko, adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāpahānena eko, ekantavigatakilesoti
atk-s0505a:244_1: eko, eko paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko. Samaṇasahassassāpi hi majjhe vattamāno
atk-s0505a:244_2: gihisaññojanassa chinnattā eko – evaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko. Eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati,
atk-s0505a:244_3: eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko iriyati vattatīti – evaṃ adutiyaṭṭhena eko.
atk-s0505a:249_0: Evaṃ taṇhāpahānaṭṭhena eko. Sabbakilesāssa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā
atk-s0505a:249_1: āyatiṃ anuppādadhammāti – evaṃ ekantavigatakilesoti eko. Anācariyako hutvā sayambhū
atk-s0505a:249_2: sāmaññeva paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti – evaṃ eko paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.
atk-s0505a:250_0: Careti yā imā aṭṭha cariyāyo; seyyathidaṃ – paṇidhisampannānaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0505a:250_1: iriyāpathacariyā, indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ ajjhattikāyatanesu āyatanacariyā, appamādavihārīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:250_2: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu saticariyā, adhicittamanuyuttānaṃ catūsu jhānesu samādhicariyā,
atk-s0505a:250_3: buddhisampannānaṃ catūsu ariyasaccesu ñāṇacariyā, sammā paṭipannānaṃ catūsu ariyamaggesu
atk-s0505a:250_4: maggacariyā, adhigatapphalānaṃ catūsu sāmaññaphalesu patticariyā, tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:250_5: sabbasattesu lokatthacariyā, tattha padesato paccekabuddhasāvakānanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:250_6: “cariyāti aṭṭha cariyāyo iriyāpathacariyā”ti vitthāro. Tāhi cariyāhi samannāgato
atk-s0505a:250_7: bhaveyyāti attho. Atha vā yā imā “adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena
atk-s0505a:250_8: carati, upaṭṭhahanto satiyā carati, avikkhitto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya
atk-s0505a:250_9: carati, vijānanto viññāṇena carati, evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyatantīti āyatanacariyāya
atk-s0505a:250_10: carati, evaṃ paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti visesacariyāya caratī”ti evaṃ aparāpi
atk-s0505a:250_11: aṭṭha cariyā vuttā. Tāhipi samannāgato bhaveyyāti attho. Khaggavisāṇakappoti ettha
atk-s0505a:250_12: khaggavisāṇaṃ nāma khaggamigasiṅgaṃ. Kappasaddassa atthaṃ vitthārato maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:250_13: pakāsayissāma. Idha panāyaṃ “satthukappena vata, bho, kira sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā”ti
atk-s0505a:250_14: evamādīsu viya paṭibhāgo veditabbo. Khaggavisāṇakappoti khaggavisāṇasadisoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:251_0: Adhippāyānusandhito pana evaṃ veditabbā – yvāyaṃ vuttappakāro daṇḍo bhūtesu pavattiyamāno
atk-s0505a:251_1: ahito hoti, taṃ tesu appavattanena tappaṭipakkhabhūtāya mettāya parahitūpasaṃhārena
atk-s0505a:251_2: ca sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, nihitadaṇḍattā eva ca. Yathā anihitadaṇḍā sattā
atk-s0505a:251_3: bhūtāni daṇḍena vā satthena vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā viheṭhayanti, tathā aviheṭhayaṃ
atk-s0505a:251_4: aññatarampi tesaṃ. Imaṃ mettākammaṭṭhānamāgamma yadeva tattha vedanāgataṃ saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇagataṃ
atk-s0505a:251_5: tañca tadanusāreneva tadaññañca saṅkhāragataṃ vipassitvā imaṃ paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti
atk-s0505a:252_0: Ayaṃ pana anusandhi – evaṃ vutte te amaccā āhaṃsu – “idāni, bhante, kuhiṃ gacchathā”ti?
atk-s0505a:252_1: Tato tena “pubbapaccekasambuddhā kattha vasantī”ti āvajjetvā ñatvā “gandhamādanapabbate”ti
atk-s0505a:252_2: vutte punāhaṃsu – “amhe dāni, bhante, pajahatha, na icchathā”ti. Atha paccekabuddho
atk-s0505a:252_3: āha – “na puttamiccheyyā”ti sabbaṃ. Tatrādhippāyo – ahaṃ idāni atrajādīsu yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0505a:252_4: puttampi na iccheyyaṃ, kuto pana tumhādisaṃ sahāyaṃ? Tasmā tumhesupi yo mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:252_5: gantuṃ mādiso vā hotuṃ icchati, so eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. Atha vā tehi “amhe
atk-s0505a:252_6: dāni, bhante, pajahatha na icchathā”ti vutte so paccekabuddho “na puttamiccheyya
atk-s0505a:252_7: kuto sahāya”nti vatvā attano yathāvuttenatthena ekacariyāya guṇaṃ disvā pamudito
atk-s0505a:252_8: pītisomanassajāto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi – “eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. Evaṃ vatvā
atk-s0505a:252_9: pekkhamānasseva mahājanassa ākāse uppatitvā gandhamādanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:253_0: Gandhamādano nāma himavati cūḷakāḷapabbataṃ, mahākāḷapabbataṃ, nāgapaliveṭhanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:253_1: candagabbhaṃ, sūriyagabbhaṃ, suvaṇṇapassaṃ, himavantapabbatanti satta pabbate atikkamma
atk-s0505a:253_2: hoti. Tattha nandamūlakaṃ nāma pabbhāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanokāso. Tisso ca guhāyo
atk-s0505a:253_3: – suvaṇṇaguhā, maṇiguhā, rajataguhāti. Tattha maṇiguhādvāre mañjūsako nāma rukkho
atk-s0505a:253_4: yojanaṃ ubbedhena, yojanaṃ vitthārena. So yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni
atk-s0505a:253_5: tāni pupphayati visesena paccekabuddhāgamanadivase. Tassūparito sabbaratanamāḷo hoti.
atk-s0505a:253_6: Tattha sammajjanakavāto kacavaraṃ chaḍḍeti, samakaraṇavāto sabbaratanamayaṃ vālikaṃ
atk-s0505a:253_7: samaṃ karoti, siñcanakavāto anotattadahato ānetvā udakaṃ siñcati, sugandhakaraṇavāto
atk-s0505a:253_8: himavantato sabbesaṃ gandharukkhānaṃ gandhe āneti, ocinakavāto pupphāni ocinitvā
atk-s0505a:253_9: pāteti, santharakavāto sabbattha santharati. Sadā paññattāneva cettha āsanāni honti,
atk-s0505a:253_10: yesu paccekabuddhuppādadivase uposathadivase ca sabbapaccekabuddhā sannipatitvā nisīdanti.
atk-s0505a:253_11: Ayaṃ tattha pakati. Abhisambuddha-paccekabuddho tattha gantvā paññattāsane nisīdati.
atk-s0505a:253_12: Tato sace tasmiṃ kāle aññepi paccekabuddhā saṃvijjanti, tepi taṅkhaṇaṃ sannipatitvā
atk-s0505a:253_13: paññattāsanesu nisīdanti. Nisīditvā ca kiñcideva samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0505a:253_15: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati. Tadāpi so tameva attano udānabyākaraṇagāthaṃ bhāsati. Puna
atk-s0505a:253_16: bhagavāpi āyasmatā ānandena puṭṭho tameva gāthaṃ bhāsati, ānando ca saṅgītiyanti
atk-s0505a:253_17: evamekekā gāthā paccekasambodhiabhisambuddhaṭṭhāne, mañjūsakamāḷe, ānandena pucchitakāle,
atk-s0505a:255_0: 36. Saṃsaggajātassāti kā uppatti? Ayampi paccekabodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane
atk-s0505a:255_1: vīsati vassasahassāni purimanayeneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:255_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā, nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā, lakkhaṇasammasanaṃ katvā, ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0505a:255_3: anadhigamma brahmaloke nibbatti. So tato cuto bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0505a:255_4: uppajjitvā purimanayeneva vaḍḍhamāno yato pabhuti “ayaṃ itthī ayaṃ puriso”ti visesaṃ
atk-s0505a:255_5: aññāsi, tatupādāya itthīnaṃ hatthe na ramati, ucchādananhāpanamaṇḍanādimattampi na
atk-s0505a:255_6: sahati. Taṃ purisā eva posenti, thaññapāyanakāle dhātiyo kañcukaṃ paṭimuñcitvā purisavesena
atk-s0505a:255_7: thaññaṃ pāyenti. So itthīnaṃ gandhaṃ ghāyitvā saddaṃ vā sutvā rodati, viññutaṃ pattopi
atk-s0505a:255_8: itthiyo passituṃ na icchati, tena taṃ anitthigandhotveva sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0505a:256_0: Tasmiṃ soḷasavassuddesike jāte rājā “kulavaṃsaṃ saṇṭhapessāmī”ti nānākulehi tassa
atk-s0505a:256_1: anurūpā kaññāyo ānetvā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi “kumāraṃ ramāpehī”ti. Amacco upāyena
atk-s0505a:256_2: taṃ ramāpetukāmo tassa avidūre sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā nāṭakāni payojāpesi. Kumāro
atk-s0505a:256_3: gītavāditasaddaṃ sutvā – “kasseso saddo”ti āha. Amacco “taveso, deva, nāṭakitthīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:256_4: saddo, puññavantānaṃ īdisāni nāṭakāni honti, abhirama, deva, mahāpuññosi tva”nti
atk-s0505a:256_5: āha. Kumāro amaccaṃ daṇḍena tāḷāpetvā nikkaḍḍhāpesi. So rañño ārocesi. Rājā kumārassa
atk-s0505a:256_6: mātarā saha gantvā, kumāraṃ khamāpetvā, puna amaccaṃ appesi. Kumāro tehi atinippīḷiyamāno
atk-s0505a:256_7: seṭṭhasuvaṇṇaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakāre āṇāpesi – “sundaraṃ itthirūpaṃ karothā”ti. Te vissakammunā
atk-s0505a:256_8: nimmitasadisaṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ itthirūpaṃ katvā dassesuṃ. Kumāro disvā vimhayena
atk-s0505a:256_9: sīsaṃ cāletvā mātāpitūnaṃ pesesi “yadi īdisiṃ itthiṃ labhissāmi, gaṇhissāmī”ti. Mātāpitaro
atk-s0505a:256_10: “amhākaṃ putto mahāpuñño, avassaṃ tena saha katapuññā kāci dārikā loke uppannā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0505a:256_11: taṃ suvaṇṇarūpaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā amaccānaṃ appesuṃ “gacchatha, īdisiṃ dārikaṃ gavesathā”ti.
atk-s0505a:256_12: Te gahetvā soḷasa mahājanapade vicarantā taṃ taṃ gāmaṃ gantvā udakatitthādīsu yattha
atk-s0505a:256_13: yattha janasamūhaṃ passanti, tattha tattha devataṃ viya suvaṇṇarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā nānāpupphavatthālaṅkārehi
atk-s0505a:256_14: pūjaṃ katvā, vitānaṃ bandhitvā, ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhanti – “yadi kenaci evarūpā diṭṭhapubbā
atk-s0505a:256_15: bhavissati, so kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpessatī”ti? Etenupāyena aññatra maddaraṭṭhā sabbe janapade
atk-s0505a:256_16: āhiṇḍitvā taṃ “khuddakaraṭṭha”nti avamaññamānā tattha paṭhamaṃ agantvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:257_0: Tato nesaṃ ahosi “maddaraṭṭhampi tāva gacchāma, mā no bārāṇasiṃ paviṭṭhepi rājā puna
atk-s0505a:257_1: pāhesī”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamaṃsu. Sāgalanagare ca maddavo nāma rājā.
atk-s0505a:257_2: Tassa dhītā soḷasavassuddesikā abhirūpā hoti. Tassā vaṇṇadāsiyo nhānodakatthāya titthaṃ
atk-s0505a:257_3: gatā. Tattha amaccehi ṭhapitaṃ taṃ suvaṇṇarūpaṃ dūratova disvā “amhe udakatthāya
atk-s0505a:257_4: pesetvā rājaputtī sayameva āgatā”ti bhaṇantiyo samīpaṃ gantvā “nāyaṃ sāminī, amhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:257_5: sāminī ito abhirūpatarā”ti āhaṃsu. Amaccā taṃ sutvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā anurūpena
atk-s0505a:257_6: nayena dārikaṃ yāciṃsu, sopi adāsi. Tato bārāṇasirañño pāhesuṃ “laddhā dārikā, sāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:257_7: āgacchissati, udāhu amheva ānemā”ti? So ca “mayi āgacchante janapadapīḷā bhavissati,
atk-s0505a:258_0: Amaccā dārikaṃ gahetvā nagarā nikkhamitvā kumārassa pāhesuṃ – “laddhā suvaṇṇarūpasadisī
atk-s0505a:258_1: dārikā”ti. Kumāro sutvāva rāgena abhibhūto paṭhamajjhānā parihāyi. So dūtaparamparaṃ
atk-s0505a:258_2: pesesi “sīghaṃ ānetha, sīghaṃ ānethā”ti. Te sabbattha ekarattivāseneva bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0505a:258_3: patvā bahinagare ṭhitā rañño pāhesuṃ – “ajja pavisitabbaṃ, no”ti? Rājā “seṭṭhakulā
atk-s0505a:258_4: ānītā dārikā, maṅgalakiriyaṃ katvā mahāsakkārena pavesessāma, uyyānaṃ tāva naṃ nethā”ti
atk-s0505a:258_5: āṇāpesi. Te tathā akaṃsu. Sā accantasukhumālā yānugghātena ubbāḷhā addhānaparissamena
atk-s0505a:258_6: uppannavātarogā milātamālā viya hutvā rattiṃyeva kālamakāsi. Amaccā “sakkārā paribhaṭṭhamhā”ti
atk-s0505a:258_7: parideviṃsu. Rājā ca nāgarā ca “kulavaṃso vinaṭṭho”ti parideviṃsu. Nagare mahākolāhalaṃ
atk-s0505a:258_8: ahosi. Kumārassa sutamatteyeva mahāsoko udapādi. Tato kumāro sokassa mūlaṃ khaṇitumāraddho.
atk-s0505a:258_9: So cintesi – “ayaṃ soko nāma na ajātassa hoti, jātassa pana hoti, tasmā jātiṃ paṭicca
atk-s0505a:258_10: soko”ti. “Jāti pana kiṃ paṭiccā”ti? Tato “bhavaṃ paṭicca jātī”ti evaṃ pubbabhāvanānubhāvena
atk-s0505a:258_11: yoniso manasikaronto anulomapaṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādaṃ disvā saṅkhāre sammasanto tattheva
atk-s0505a:258_12: nisinno paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Taṃ maggaphalasukhena sukhitaṃ santindriyaṃ santamānasaṃ
atk-s0505a:258_13: nisinnaṃ disvā, paṇipātaṃ katvā, amaccā āhaṃsu – “mā soci, deva, mahanto jambudīpo,
atk-s0505a:258_14: aññaṃ tato sundarataraṃ ānessāmā”ti. So āha – “nāhaṃ socako, nissoko paccekabuddho
atk-s0505a:258_15: aha”nti. Ito paraṃ sabbaṃ purimagāthāsadisameva ṭhapetvā gāthāvaṇṇanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:259_0: Gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana saṃsaggajātassāti jātasaṃsaggassa. Tattha dassana, savana, kāya,
atk-s0505a:259_1: samullapana, sambhogasaṃsaggavasena pañcavidho saṃsaggo. Tattha aññamaññaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:259_2: cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma. Tattha sīhaḷadīpe kāḷadīghavāpīgāme
atk-s0505a:259_4: kenaci upāyena taṃ alabhitvā, kālakatā kuṭumbiyadhītā, tassā nivāsanacoḷakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0505a:259_5: disvā “evarūpavatthadhāriniyā nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālattha”nti hadayaṃ phāletvā
atk-s0505a:259_6: kālakato. So eva ca daharo nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:260_0: Parehi pana kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ sutvā sotaviññāṇavīthivasena
atk-s0505a:260_1: uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma. Tatrāpi girigāmavāsīkammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi
atk-s0505a:260_2: saddhiṃ padumassaraṃ gantvā, nhatvā mālaṃ āropetvā, uccāsaddena gāyantiyā ākāsena
atk-s0505a:260_3: gacchanto saddaṃ sutvā kāmarāgena visesā parihāyitvā anayabyasanaṃ patto pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsī
atk-s0505a:261_0: Aññamaññaṃ aṅgaparāmasanena uppannarāgo kāyasaṃsaggo nāma. Dhammagāyanadaharabhikkhu
atk-s0505a:261_1: cettha nidassanaṃ. Mahāvihāre kira daharabhikkhu dhammaṃ bhāsati. Tattha mahājane
atk-s0505a:261_2: āgate rājāpi agamāsi saddhiṃ antepurena. Tato rājadhītāya tassa rūpañca saddañca
atk-s0505a:261_3: āgamma balavarāgo uppanno, tassa ca daharassāpi. Taṃ disvā rājā sallakkhetvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0505a:261_4: parikkhipāpesi. Te aññamaññaṃ parāmasitvā āliṅgiṃsu. Puna sāṇipākāraṃ apanetvā passantā
atk-s0505a:262_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālapanasamullapane uppanno rāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma. Bhikkhubhikkhunīhi
atk-s0505a:262_1: saddhiṃ paribhogakaraṇe uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. Dvīsupi cetesu pārājikappatto
atk-s0505a:262_2: bhikkhu ca bhikkhunī ca nidassanaṃ. Maricivaṭṭināmamahāvihāramahe kira duṭṭhagāmaṇi
atk-s0505a:262_3: abhayamahārājā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā ubhatosaṅghaṃ parivisati. Tattha uṇhayāguyā
atk-s0505a:262_4: dinnāya saṅghanavakasāmaṇerī anādhārakassa saṅghanavakasāmaṇerassa dantavalayaṃ datvā
atk-s0505a:262_5: samullāpaṃ akāsi. Te ubhopi upasampajjitvā saṭṭhivassā hutvā paratīraṃ gatā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0505a:262_6: samullāpena pubbasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tāvadeva jātasinehā sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamitvā pārājikā ahesunti.
atk-s0505a:263_0: Evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yena kenaci saṃsaggena jātasaṃsaggassa bhavati sneho, purimarāgapaccayā
atk-s0505a:263_1: balavarāgo uppajjati. Tato snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti tameva snehaṃ anugacchantaṃ
atk-s0505a:263_3: bhavati, jāyati. Apare pana “ārammaṇe cittassa vossaggo saṃsaggo”ti bhaṇanti. Tato
atk-s0505a:264_0: Evamatthappabhedaṃ imaṃ aḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā so paccekabuddho āha – “svāhaṃ yamidaṃ
atk-s0505a:264_1: snehanvayaṃ sokādidukkhaṃ pahoti, tassa dukkhassa mūlaṃ khananto paccekasambodhimadhigato”ti.
atk-s0505a:264_2: Evaṃ vutte te amaccā āhaṃsu – “amhehi dāni, bhante, kiṃ kātabba”nti? Tato so āha
atk-s0505a:264_3: – “tumhe vā aññe vā yo imamhā dukkhā muccitukāmo, so sabbopi ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno,
atk-s0505a:264_4: eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. Ettha ca yaṃ “snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotī”ti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:264_5: “tadeva sandhāya ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā
atk-s0505a:264_6: yathāvuttena saṃsaggena saṃsaggajātassa bhavati sneho, snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti,
atk-s0505a:264_7: etaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno ahaṃ adhigatoti. Evaṃ abhisambandhitvā
atk-s0505a:264_8: catutthapādo pubbe vuttanayeneva udānavasena vuttopi veditabbo. Tato paraṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:266_0: 37. Mitte suhajjeti kā uppatti? Ayaṃ paccekabodhisatto purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva
atk-s0505a:266_1: uppajjitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārento paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā “kiṃ samaṇadhammo
atk-s0505a:266_2: varo, rajjaṃ vara”nti vīmaṃsitvā catunnaṃ amaccānaṃ hatthe rajjaṃ niyyātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:266_3: karoti. Amaccā “dhammena samena karothā”ti vuttāpi lañjaṃ gahetvā adhammena karonti.
atk-s0505a:266_4: Te lañjaṃ gahetvā sāmike parājentā ekadā aññataraṃ rājavallabhaṃ parājesuṃ. So rañño
atk-s0505a:266_5: bhattahārakena saddhiṃ pavisitvā sabbaṃ ārocesi. Rājā dutiyadivase sayaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:266_6: agamāsi. Tato mahājanakāyā – “amaccā sāmike asāmike karontī”ti mahāsaddaṃ karontā
atk-s0505a:266_7: mahāyuddhaṃ viya akaṃsu. Atha rājā vinicchayaṭṭhānā vuṭṭhāya pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0505a:266_8: samāpattiṃ appetuṃ nisinno tena saddena vikkhittacitto na sakkoti appetuṃ. So “kiṃ
atk-s0505a:266_9: me rajjena, samaṇadhammo varo”ti rajjasukhaṃ pahāya puna samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā pubbe
atk-s0505a:266_10: vuttanayeneva vipassanto paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Kammaṭṭhānañca pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:268: Etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:269_0: Tattha mettāyanavasena mittā. Suhadayabhāvena suhajjā. Keci hi ekantahitakāmatāya
atk-s0505a:269_1: mittāva honti, na suhajjā. Keci gamanāgamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsamullāpādīsu hadayasukhajananena
atk-s0505a:269_2: suhajjāva honti, na mittā. Keci tadubhayavasena suhajjā ceva mittā ca. Te duvidhā
atk-s0505a:269_3: honti – agāriyā anagāriyā ca. Tattha agāriyā tividhā honti – upakāro, samānasukhadukkho,
atk-s0505a:269_4: anukampakoti. Anagāriyā visesena atthakkhāyino eva. Te catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:270_0: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi upakāro mitto suhado veditabbo – pamattaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0505a:270_1: pamattassa sāpateyyaṃ rakkhati, bhītassa saraṇaṃ hoti, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu
atk-s0505a:272_0: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi samānasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo – guyhamassa
atk-s0505a:272_1: ācikkhati, guyhamassa parigūhati, āpadāsu na vijahati, jīvitampissa atthāya pariccattaṃ hoti”.
atk-s0505a:274: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo – abhavenassa na nandati, bhavenassa nandati, avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānaṃ nivāreti, vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānaṃ pasaṃsati”.
atk-s0505a:276: “Catūhi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi atthakkhāyī mitto suhado veditabbo – pāpā nivāreti, kalyāṇe niveseti, assutaṃ sāveti, saggassa maggaṃ ācikkhatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:277: Tesvidha agāriyā adhippetā. Atthato pana sabbepi yujjanti. Te mitte suhajje. Anukampamānoti anudayamāno. Tesaṃ sukhaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo dukkhaṃ apaharitukāmo ca.
atk-s0505a:278_0: Hāpeti atthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena tividhaṃ, tathā attatthaparatthaubhayatthavasenāpi
atk-s0505a:278_1: tividhaṃ. Atthaṃ laddhavināsanena aladdhānuppādanenāti dvidhāpi hāpeti vināseti.
atk-s0505a:278_2: Paṭibaddhacittoti “ahaṃ imaṃ vinā na jīvāmi, esa me gati, esa me parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ
atk-s0505a:278_3: attānaṃ nīce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti. “Ime maṃ vinā na jīvanti, ahaṃ
atk-s0505a:278_4: tesaṃ gati, tesaṃ parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto
atk-s0505a:278_5: hoti. Idha pana evaṃ paṭibaddhacitto adhippeto. Etaṃ bhayanti etaṃ atthahāpanabhayaṃ,
atk-s0505a:278_6: attano samāpattihāniṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Santhaveti tividho santhavo – taṇhādiṭṭhimittasanthavavasena.
atk-s0505a:278_7: Tattha aṭṭhasatappabhedāpi taṇhā taṇhāsanthavo, dvāsaṭṭhibhedāpi diṭṭhi diṭṭhisanthavo,
atk-s0505a:278_8: paṭibaddhacittatāya mittānukampanā mittasanthavo. So idhādhippeto. Tena hissa samāpatti
atk-s0505a:278_9: parihīnā. Tenāha – “etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno ahamadhigato”ti. Sesaṃ vuttasadisamevāti veditabbanti.
atk-s0505a:280_0: 38. Vaṃso visāloti kā uppatti? Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane tayo paccekabodhisattā
atk-s0505a:280_1: pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā. Tato
atk-s0505a:280_2: cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirājakule nibbatto, itare paccantarājakulesu. Te ubhopi
atk-s0505a:280_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā, rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā, anukkamena paccekabuddhā hutvā,
atk-s0505a:280_4: nandamūlakapabbhāre vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “mayaṃ kiṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:280_5: imaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ anuppattā”ti āvajjetvā paccavekkhamānā kassapabuddhakāle attano
atk-s0505a:280_6: cariyaṃ addasaṃsu. Tato “tatiyo kuhi”nti āvajjentā bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārentaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:280_7: tassa guṇe saritvā “so pakatiyāva appicchatādiguṇasamannāgato ahosi, amhākaññeva
atk-s0505a:280_8: ovādako vattā vacanakkhamo pāpagarahī, handa, naṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā mocessāmā”ti
atk-s0505a:280_9: okāsaṃ gavesantā taṃ ekadivasaṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0505a:280_10: uyyānadvāre veḷugumbamūle aṭṭhaṃsu. Mahājano atitto rājadassanena rājānaṃ oloketi.
atk-s0505a:280_11: Tato rājā “atthi nu kho koci mama dassane abyāvaṭo”ti olokento paccekabuddhe addakkhi.
atk-s0505a:280_12: Saha dassaneneva cassa tesu sineho uppajji.
atk-s0505a:281_0: So hatthikkhandhā oruyha santena upacārena te upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, kiṃ nāmā tumhe”ti
atk-s0505a:281_1: pucchi. Te āhaṃsu “mayaṃ, mahārāja, asajjamānā nāmā”ti. “Bhante, ‘asajjamānā’ti etassa
atk-s0505a:281_2: ko attho”ti? “Alagganattho, mahārājā”ti. Tato taṃ veḷugumbaṃ dassentā āhaṃsu – “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0505a:281_3: mahārāja, imaṃ veḷugumbaṃ sabbaso mūlakhandhasākhānusākhāhi saṃsibbitvā ṭhitaṃ asihattho
atk-s0505a:281_4: puriso mūle chetvā āviñchanto na sakkuṇeyya uddharituṃ, evameva tvaṃ anto ca bahi
atk-s0505a:281_5: ca jaṭāya jaṭito āsattavisatto tattha laggo. Seyyathāpi vā panassa vemajjhagatopi
atk-s0505a:281_6: ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīro asañjātasākhattā kenaci alaggo ṭhito, sakkā ca pana agge vā mūle
atk-s0505a:281_7: vā chetvā uddharituṃ, evameva mayaṃ katthaci asajjamānā sabbadisā gacchāmā”ti tāvadeva
atk-s0505a:281_8: catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā passato eva rañño ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:281_9: Tato rājā cintesi – “kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ asajjamāno bhaveyya”nti tattheva nisīditvā
atk-s0505a:281_10: vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Purimanayeneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:282: “Vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
atk-s0505a:284_0: Tattha vaṃsoti veḷu. Visāloti vitthiṇṇo. Cakāro avadhāraṇattho, evakāro vā ayaṃ,
atk-s0505a:284_1: sandhivasenettha ekāro naṭṭho. Tassa parapadena sambandho, taṃ pacchā yojessāma.
atk-s0505a:284_2: Yathāti paṭibhāge. Visattoti laggo, jaṭito saṃsibbito. Puttesu dāresu cāti puttadhītubhariyāsu.
atk-s0505a:284_3: Yā apekkhāti yā taṇhā yo sneho. Vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamānoti vaṃsakaḷīro viya alaggamāno.
atk-s0505a:284_4: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā vaṃso visālo visatto eva hoti, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā,
atk-s0505a:284_5: sāpi evaṃ tāni vatthūni saṃsibbitvā ṭhitattā visattā eva. Svāhaṃ tāya apekkhāya apekkhavā
atk-s0505a:284_6: visālo vaṃso viya visattoti evaṃ apekkhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ apekkhaṃ maggañāṇena
atk-s0505a:284_7: chindanto ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrova rūpādīsu vā lobhādīsu vā kāmabhavādīsu vā diṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0505a:284_8: vā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena asajjamāno paccekabodhiṃ adhigatoti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0505a:286_0: 39. Migo araññamhīti kā uppatti? Eko kira bhikkhu kassapassa bhagavato sāsane yogāvacaro
atk-s0505a:286_1: kālaṃ katvā, bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhikule uppanno aḍḍhe mahaddhane mahābhoge, so subhago
atk-s0505a:286_2: ahosi. Tato paradāriko hutvā tattha kālakato niraye nibbatto tattha paccitvā vipākāvasesena
atk-s0505a:286_3: seṭṭhibhariyāya kucchimhi itthipaṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Nirayato āgatānaṃ gattāni uṇhāni
atk-s0505a:286_4: honti. Tena seṭṭhibhariyā ḍayhamānena udarena kicchena kasirena taṃ gabbhaṃ dhāretvā
atk-s0505a:286_5: kālena dārikaṃ vijāyi. Sā jātadivasato pabhuti mātāpitūnaṃ sesabandhuparijanānañca
atk-s0505a:286_6: dessā ahosi. Vayappattā ca yamhi kule dinnā, tatthāpi sāmikasassusasurānaṃ dessāva
atk-s0505a:286_7: ahosi appiyā amanāpā. Atha nakkhatte ghosite seṭṭhiputto tāya saddhiṃ kīḷituṃ anicchanto
atk-s0505a:286_8: vesiṃ ānetvā kīḷati. Sā taṃ dāsīnaṃ santikā sutvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nānappakārehi
atk-s0505a:286_9: anunayitvā āha – “ayyaputta, itthī nāma sacepi dasannaṃ rājūnaṃ kaniṭṭhā hoti, cakkavattino
atk-s0505a:286_10: vā dhītā, tathāpi sāmikassa pesanakarā hoti. Sāmike anālapante sūle āropitā viya
atk-s0505a:286_11: dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Sace ahaṃ anuggahārahā, anuggahetabbā. No ce, vissajjetabbā,
atk-s0505a:286_12: attano ñātikulaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Seṭṭhiputto – “hotu, bhadde, mā soci, kīḷanasajjā
atk-s0505a:286_13: hohi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āha. Seṭṭhidhītā tāvatakenapi sallāpamattena ussāhajātā
atk-s0505a:286_14: “sve nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti bahuṃ khajjabhojjaṃ paṭiyādeti. Seṭṭhiputto dutiyadivase
atk-s0505a:286_15: anārocetvāva kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Sā “idāni pesessati, idāni pesessatī”ti maggaṃ olokentī
atk-s0505a:286_16: nisinnā ussūraṃ disvā manusse pesesi. Te paccāgantvā “seṭṭhiputto gato”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:286_17: Sā sabbaṃ taṃ paṭiyāditaṃ ādāya yānaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānaṃ gantuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0505a:287_0: Atha nandamūlakapabbhāre paccekasambuddho sattame divase nirodhā vuṭṭhāya anotatte
atk-s0505a:287_1: mukhaṃ dhovitvā nāgalatādantapoṇaṃ khāditvā “kattha ajja bhikkhaṃ carissāmī”ti āvajjento
atk-s0505a:287_2: taṃ seṭṭhidhītaraṃ disvā “imissā mayi sakkāraṃ karitvā taṃ kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ gamissatī”ti
atk-s0505a:287_3: ñatvā pabbhārasamīpe saṭṭhiyojanaṃ manosilātalaṃ, tattha ṭhatvā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0505a:287_4: abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā ākāsenāgantvā tassā paṭipathe oruyha bārāṇasībhimukho
atk-s0505a:287_5: agamāsi. Taṃ disvā dāsiyo seṭṭhidhītāya ārocesuṃ. Sā yānā oruyha sakkaccaṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0505a:287_6: pattaṃ gahetvā, sabbarasasampannena khādanīyabhojanīyena pūretvā, padumapupphena
atk-s0505a:287_7: paṭicchādetvā heṭṭhāpi padumapupphaṃ katvā, pupphakalāpaṃ hatthena gahetvā, paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:287_8: upasaṅkamitvā, tassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā, vanditvā, pupphakalāpahatthā patthesi “bhante,
atk-s0505a:287_9: yathā idaṃ pupphaṃ, evāhaṃ yattha yattha uppajjāmi, tattha tattha mahājanassa piyā
atk-s0505a:287_10: bhaveyyaṃ manāpā”ti. Evaṃ patthetvā dutiyaṃ patthesi “bhante, dukkho gabbhavāso,
atk-s0505a:287_11: taṃ anupagamma padumapupphe evaṃ paṭisandhi bhaveyyā”ti. Tatiyampi patthesi “bhante,
atk-s0505a:287_12: jigucchanīyo mātugāmo, cakkavattidhītāpi paravasaṃ gacchati, tasmā ahaṃ itthibhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:287_13: anupagamma puriso bhaveyya”nti. Catutthampi patthesi “bhante, imaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:287_14: atikkamma pariyosāne tumhehi pattaṃ amataṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:288_0: Evaṃ caturo paṇidhayo katvā, taṃ padumapupphakalāpaṃ pūjetvā, paccekabuddhassa pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0505a:288_1: vanditvā “pupphasadiso eva me gandho ceva vaṇṇo ca hotū”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ paṇidhiṃ
atk-s0505a:288_2: akāsi. Tato paccekabuddho pattaṃ pupphakalāpañca gahetvā ākāse ṭhatvā –
atk-s0505a:290: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:291_0: Imāya gāthāya seṭṭhidhītāya anumodanaṃ katvā “seṭṭhidhītā maṃ gacchantaṃ passatū”ti
atk-s0505a:291_1: adhiṭṭhahitvā nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi. Seṭṭhidhītāya taṃ disvā mahatī pīti uppannā.
atk-s0505a:291_2: Bhavantare kataṃ akusalakammaṃ anokāsatāya parikkhīṇaṃ, ciñcambiladhotatambabhājanamiva
atk-s0505a:291_3: suddhā jātā. Tāvadeva cassā patikule ñātikule ca sabbo jano tuṭṭho “kiṃ karomā”ti
atk-s0505a:291_4: piyavacanāni paṇṇākārāni ca pesesi. Seṭṭhiputto manusse pesesi “sīghaṃ sīghaṃ ānetha
atk-s0505a:291_5: seṭṭhidhītaraṃ, ahaṃ vissaritvā uyyānaṃ āgato”ti. Tato pabhuti ca naṃ ure vilittacandanaṃ
atk-s0505a:291_6: viya āmuttamuttāhāraṃ viya pupphamālaṃ viya ca piyāyanto parihari.
atk-s0505a:292_0: Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ issariyabhogasukhaṃ anubhavitvā kālaṃ katvā purisabhāvena devaloke
atk-s0505a:292_1: padumapupphe uppajji. So devaputto gacchantopi padumapupphagabbheyeva gacchati, tiṭṭhantopi,
atk-s0505a:292_2: nisīdantopi, sayantopi padumagabbheyeva sayati. Mahāpadumadevaputtoti cassa nāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:292_3: akaṃsu. Evaṃ so tena iddhānubhāvena anulomapaṭilomaṃ chadevaloke eva saṃsarati.
atk-s0505a:293_0: Tena ca samayena bārāṇasirañño vīsati itthisahassāni honti. Rājā ekissāpi kucchiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:293_1: puttaṃ na labhati. Amaccā rājānaṃ viññāpesuṃ “deva, kulavaṃsānupālako putto icchitabbo,
atk-s0505a:293_2: atraje avijjamāne khetrajopi kulavaṃsadharo hotī”ti. Rājā “ṭhapetvā mahesiṃ avasesā
atk-s0505a:293_3: nāṭakitthiyo sattāhaṃ dhammanāṭakaṃ karothā”ti yathākāmaṃ bahi carāpesi, tathāpi
atk-s0505a:293_4: puttaṃ nālattha. Puna amaccā āhaṃsu – “mahārāja, mahesī nāma puññena ca paññāya ca
atk-s0505a:293_5: sabbitthīnaṃ aggā, appeva nāma devo mahesiyāpi kucchismiṃ puttaṃ labheyyā”ti. Rājā
atk-s0505a:293_6: mahesiyā etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Sā āha – “mahārāja, yā itthī saccavādinī sīlavatī, sā
atk-s0505a:293_7: puttaṃ labheyya, hirottapparahitāya kuto putto”ti pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā pañca sīlāni
atk-s0505a:293_8: samādiyitvā punappunaṃ anumajjati. Sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya pañca sīlāni anumajjantiyā
atk-s0505a:294_0: Atha sakko āsanatāpakāraṇaṃ āvajjento etamatthaṃ viditvā “sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya
atk-s0505a:294_1: puttavaraṃ demī”ti ākāsenāgantvā deviyā sammukhe ṭhatvā “kiṃ patthesi devī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0505a:294_2: “Puttaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Dammi te, devi, puttaṃ, mā cintayī”ti vatvā devalokaṃ gantvā
atk-s0505a:294_3: “atthi nu kho ettha khīṇāyuko”ti āvajjento “ayaṃ mahāpadumo uparidevaloke uppajjituṃ
atk-s0505a:294_4: ito cavatī”ti ñatvā tassa vimānaṃ gantvā “tāta mahāpaduma, manussalokaṃ gacchāhī”ti
atk-s0505a:294_5: yāci. So āha – “mahārāja, mā evaṃ bhaṇi, jeguccho manussaloko”ti. “Tāta, tvaṃ manussaloke
atk-s0505a:294_6: puññaṃ katvā idhūpapanno, tattheva ṭhatvā pāramiyo pūretabbā, gaccha, tātā”ti. “Dukkho,
atk-s0505a:294_7: mahārāja, gabbhavāso, na sakkomi tattha vasitu”nti. “Kiṃ te, tāta, gabbhavāsena,
atk-s0505a:294_8: tathā hi tvaṃ kammamakāsi, yathā padumagabbheyeva nibbattissasi, gaccha, tātā”ti
atk-s0505a:295_0: Tato mahāpadumo devalokā cavitvā bārāṇasirañño uyyāne silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumagabbhe
atk-s0505a:295_1: nibbatto. Tañca rattiṃ mahesī paccūsasamaye supinantena vīsatiitthisahassaparivutā
atk-s0505a:295_2: uyyānaṃ gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumassare puttaṃ laddhā viya ahosi. Sā pabhātāya
atk-s0505a:295_3: rattiyā sīlāni rakkhamānā tatheva tattha gantvā ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ addasa. Taṃ neva
atk-s0505a:295_4: tīre hoti na gambhīre. Saha dassaneneva cassā tattha puttasineho uppajji. Sā sāmaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:295_5: pavisitvā taṃ pupphaṃ aggahesi. Pupphe gahitamatteyeva pattāni vikasiṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0505a:295_6: taṭṭake āsittasuvaṇṇapaṭimaṃ viya dārakaṃ addasa. Disvāva “putto me laddho”ti saddaṃ
atk-s0505a:295_7: nicchāresi. Mahājano sādhukārasahassāni muñci, rañño ca pesesi. Rājā sutvā “kattha
atk-s0505a:295_8: laddho”ti pucchitvā laddhokāsañca sutvā “uyyānañca pokkharaṇiyaṃ padumañca amhākaññeva
atk-s0505a:295_9: khettaṃ, tasmā amhākaṃ khette jātattā khetrajo nāmāyaṃ putto”ti vatvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0505a:295_10: vīsatisahassaitthiyo dhātikiccaṃ kārāpesi. Yā yā kumārassa ruciṃ ñatvā patthitapatthitaṃ
atk-s0505a:295_11: khādanīyaṃ khādāpeti, sā sā sahassaṃ labhati. Sakalabārāṇasī calitā, sabbo jano kumārassa
atk-s0505a:295_12: paṇṇākārasahassāni pesesi. Kumāro taṃ taṃ atinetvā “imaṃ khāda, imaṃ bhuñjā”ti vuccamāno
atk-s0505a:295_13: bhojanena ubbāḷho ukkaṇṭhito hutvā, gopuradvāraṃ gantvā, lākhāguḷakena kīḷati.
atk-s0505a:296_0: Tadā aññataro paccekabuddho bārāṇasiṃ nissāya isipatane vasati. So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0505a:296_2: “ajja kattha bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī”ti āvajjento kumārassa sampattiṃ disvā “esa pubbe
atk-s0505a:296_3: kiṃ kammaṃ karī”ti vīmaṃsanto “mādisassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā, catasso patthanā patthesi
atk-s0505a:296_4: tattha tisso siddhā, ekā tāva na sijjhati, tassa upāyena ārammaṇaṃ dassemī”ti bhikkhācariyavasena
atk-s0505a:296_5: kumārassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Kumāro taṃ disvā “samaṇa, mā idha āgacchi, ime hi tampi
atk-s0505a:296_6: ‘idaṃ khāda, idaṃ bhuñjā’ti vadeyyu”nti āha. So ekavacaneneva tato nivattitvā attano
atk-s0505a:296_7: senāsanaṃ pāvisi. Kumāro parijanaṃ āha – “ayaṃ samaṇo mayā vuttamattova nivatto,
atk-s0505a:296_8: kuddho, nu, kho mamā”ti. Tato tehi “pabbajitā nāma, deva, na kodhaparāyaṇā honti,
atk-s0505a:296_9: parena pasannamanena yaṃ dinnaṃ hoti, tena yāpentī”ti vuccamānopi “kuddho eva mamāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:296_10: samaṇo, khamāpessāmi na”nti mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā, mahatā rājānubhāvena
atk-s0505a:296_11: isipatanaṃ gantvā, migayūthaṃ disvā, pucchi “kiṃ nāma ete”ti? “Ete, sāmi, migā nāmā”ti.
atk-s0505a:296_12: Etesaṃ “imaṃ khādatha, imaṃ bhuñjatha, imaṃ sāyathā”ti vatvā paṭijaggantā atthīti.
atk-s0505a:296_13: Natthi sāmi, yattha tiṇodakaṃ sulabhaṃ, tattha vasantīti.
atk-s0505a:297_0: Kumāro “yathā ime arakkhiyamānāva yattha icchanti, tattha vasanti, kadā nu, kho,
atk-s0505a:297_1: ahampi evaṃ vaseyya”nti etamārammaṇaṃ aggahesi. Paccekabuddhopi tassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0505a:297_2: senāsanamaggañca caṅkamañca sammajjitvā, maṭṭhaṃ katvā, ekadvikkhattuṃ caṅkamitvā,
atk-s0505a:297_3: padanikkhepaṃ dassetvā, divāvihārokāsañca paṇṇasālañca sammajjitvā, maṭṭhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:297_4: pavisanapadanikkhepaṃ dassetvā, nikkhamanapadanikkhepaṃ adassetvā, aññatra agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:297_5: Kumāro tattha gantvā taṃ padesaṃ sammajjitvā maṭṭhaṃ kataṃ disvā “vasati maññe ettha
atk-s0505a:297_6: so paccekabuddho”ti parijanena bhāsitaṃ sutvā āha – “pātopi so samaṇo kuddho, idāni
atk-s0505a:297_7: hatthiassādīhi attano okāsaṃ akkantaṃ disvā, suṭṭhutaraṃ kujjheyya, idheva tumhe
atk-s0505a:297_8: tiṭṭhathā”ti hatthikkhandhā oruyha ekakova senāsanaṃ paviṭṭho vattasīsena susammaṭṭhokāse
atk-s0505a:297_9: padanikkhepaṃ disvā, “ayaṃ samaṇo ettha caṅkamanto na vaṇijjādikammaṃ cintesi, addhā
atk-s0505a:297_10: attano hitameva cintesi maññe”ti pasannamānaso caṅkamaṃ āruhitvā, dūrīkataputhuvitakko
atk-s0505a:297_11: gantvā, pāsāṇaphalake nisīditvā, sañjātaekaggo hutvā, paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā, vipassanto
atk-s0505a:297_12: paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ adhigantvā, purimanayeneva purohitena kammaṭṭhāne pucchite gaganatale
atk-s0505a:298: “Migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya;
atk-s0505a:299: Viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:300_0: Tattha migoti dve migā eṇīmigo, pasadamigo cāti. Apica sabbesaṃ āraññikānaṃ catuppadānametaṃ
atk-s0505a:300_1: adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana pasadamigo adhippeto. Araññamhīti gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0505a:300_2: avasesaṃ araññaṃ, idhaṃ pana uyyānamadhippetaṃ, tasmā uyyānamhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāti
atk-s0505a:300_3: paṭibhāge. Abaddhoti rajjubandhanādīhi abaddho, etena vissatthacariyaṃ dīpeti. Yenicchakaṃ
atk-s0505a:300_4: gacchati gocarāyati yena yena disābhāgena gantumicchati, tena tena disābhāgena gocarāya
atk-s0505a:301_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āraññako migo araññe pavane caramāno vissattho gacchati,
atk-s0505a:301_1: vissattho tiṭṭhati, vissattho nisīdati, vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti. Taṃ kissa hetu?
atk-s0505a:301_2: Anāpāthagato, bhikkhave, luddassa; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
atk-s0505a:301_3: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakāsi
atk-s0505a:301_4: māraṃ apadaṃ, vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0505a:302_0: Viññū naroti paṇḍitapuriso. Seritanti sacchandavuttitaṃ aparāyattataṃ. Pekkhamānoti
atk-s0505a:302_1: paññācakkhunā olokayamāno. Atha vā dhammaseritaṃ puggalaseritañca. Lokuttaradhammā
atk-s0505a:302_2: hi kilesavasaṃ agamanato serino tehi samannāgatā puggalā ca, tesaṃ bhāvaniddeso seritā.
atk-s0505a:302_3: Taṃ pekkhamānoti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? “Yathā migo araññamhi abaddho yenicchakaṃ gacchati
atk-s0505a:302_4: gocarāya, kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ gaccheyya”nti iti me tumhehi ito cito ca parivāretvā
atk-s0505a:302_5: ṭhitehi baddhassa yenicchakaṃ gantuṃ alabhantassa tasmiṃ yenicchakagamanābhāvena
atk-s0505a:302_6: yenicchakagamane cānisaṃsaṃ disvā anukkamena samathavipassanā pāripūriṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:302_7: Tato paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhi. Tasmā aññopi viññū paṇḍito naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno
atk-s0505a:302_8: eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0505a:304_0: 40. Āmantanā hotīti kā uppatti? Atīte kira ekavajjikabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi
atk-s0505a:304_1: mudukajātiko. Yadā amaccā tena saha yuttaṃ vā ayuttaṃ vā mantetukāmā honti, tadā
atk-s0505a:304_2: naṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ ekamantaṃ nenti. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ divāseyyaṃ upagataṃ aññataro
atk-s0505a:304_3: amacco “deva, mama sotabbaṃ atthī”ti ekamantaṃ gamanaṃ yāci. So uṭṭhāya agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:304_4: Puna eko mahāupaṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ varaṃ yāci, eko hatthikkhandhe, eko assapiṭṭhiyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:304_5: eko suvaṇṇarathe, eko sivikāya nisīditvā uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ yāci. Rājā tato orohitvā
atk-s0505a:304_6: ekamantaṃ agamāsi. Aparo janapadacārikaṃ gacchantaṃ yāci, tassāpi vacanaṃ sutvā hatthito
atk-s0505a:304_7: oruyha ekamantaṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ so tehi nibbinno hutvā pabbaji. Amaccā issariyena
atk-s0505a:304_8: vaḍḍhanti. Tesu eko gantvā rājānaṃ āha – “amukaṃ, mahārāja, janapadaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0505a:304_9: Rājā “taṃ itthannāmo bhuñjatī”ti bhaṇati. So rañño vacanaṃ anādiyitvā “gacchāmahaṃ
atk-s0505a:304_10: taṃ janapadaṃ gahetvā bhuñjāmī”ti tattha gantvā, kalahaṃ katvā, puna ubhopi rañño
atk-s0505a:304_11: santikaṃ āgantvā, aññamaññassa dosaṃ ārocenti. Rājā “na sakkā ime tosetu”nti tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:304_12: lobhe ādīnavaṃ disvā vipassanto paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi. So purimanayeneva imaṃ
atk-s0505a:305: “Āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya;
atk-s0505a:306: Anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:307_0: Tassattho – sahāyamajjhe ṭhitassa divāseyyasaṅkhāte vāse ca, mahāupaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte
atk-s0505a:307_1: ṭhāne ca, uyyānagamanasaṅkhāte gamane ca, janapadacārikasaṅkhātāya cārikāya ca “idaṃ
atk-s0505a:307_2: me suṇa, idaṃ me dehī”tiādinā nayena tathā tathā āmantanā hoti, tasmā ahaṃ tattha
atk-s0505a:307_3: nibbijjitvā yāyaṃ ariyajanasevitā anekānisaṃsā ekantasukhā, evaṃ santepi lobhābhibhūtehi
atk-s0505a:307_4: sabbakāpurisehi anabhijjhitā anabhipatthitā pabbajjā, taṃ anabhijjhitaṃ paresaṃ avasavattanena
atk-s0505a:307_5: dhammapuggalavasena ca seritaṃ pekkhamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā anukkamena paccekasambodhiṃ
atk-s0505a:309_0: 41. Khiḍḍā ratīti kā uppatti? Bārāṇasiyaṃ ekaputtakabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:309_1: So cassa ekaputtako piyo ahosi manāpo pāṇasamo. So sabbiriyāpathesu puttaṃ gahetvāva
atk-s0505a:309_2: vattati. So ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ ṭhapetvā gato. Kumāropi taṃ divasaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:309_3: uppannena byādhinā mato. Amaccā “puttasinehena rañño hadayampi phaleyyā”ti anārocetvāva
atk-s0505a:309_4: naṃ jhāpesuṃ. Rājā uyyāne surāmadena matto puttaṃ neva sari, tathā dutiyadivasepi
atk-s0505a:309_5: nhānabhojanavelāsu. Atha bhuttāvī nisinno saritvā “puttaṃ me ānethā”ti āha. Tassa
atk-s0505a:309_6: anurūpena vidhānena taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Tato sokābhibhūto nisinno evaṃ yoniso
atk-s0505a:309_7: manasākāsi “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti. So evaṃ anukkamena
atk-s0505a:309_8: anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sammasanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Sesaṃ saṃsaggagāthāya
atk-s0505a:310_0: Atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana khiḍḍāti kīḷanā. Sā duvidhā hoti – kāyikā, vācasikā ca. Tattha
atk-s0505a:310_1: kāyikā nāma hatthīhipi kīḷanti, assehipi, rathehipi, dhanūhipi, tharūhipīti evamādi.
atk-s0505a:310_2: Vācasikā nāma gītaṃ, silokabhaṇanaṃ, mukhabherīti evamādi. Ratīti pañcakāmaguṇarati.
atk-s0505a:310_3: Vipulanti yāva aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca ṭhānena sakalattabhāvabyāpakaṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:310_4: Anusandhiyojanāpi cettha saṃsaggagāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbā, tato parañca sabbanti.
atk-s0505a:312_0: 42. Cātuddisoti kā uppatti? Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pañca paccekabodhisattā
atk-s0505a:312_1: pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā. Tato
atk-s0505a:312_2: cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasiyaṃ rājā ahosi, sesā pākatikarājāno. Te cattāropi
atk-s0505a:312_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā, rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā, anukkamena paccekabuddhā hutvā
atk-s0505a:312_4: nandamūlakapabbhāre vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vaṃsakaḷīragāthāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0505a:312_5: attano kammañca sahāyañca āvajjetvā ñatvā bārāṇasirañño upāyena ārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0505a:312_6: okāsaṃ gavesanti. So ca rājā tikkhattuṃ rattiyā ubbijjati, bhīto vissaraṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:312_7: mahātale dhāvati. Purohitena kālasseva vuṭṭhāya sukhaseyyaṃ pucchitopi “kuto me,
atk-s0505a:312_8: ācariya, sukha”nti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Purohitopi “ayaṃ rogo na sakkā yena
atk-s0505a:312_9: kenaci uddhaṃvirecanādinā bhesajjakammena vinetuṃ, mayhaṃ pana khādanūpāyo uppanno”ti
atk-s0505a:312_10: cintetvā “rajjahānijīvitantarāyādīnaṃ pubbanimittaṃ etaṃ mahārājā”ti rājānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0505a:312_11: ubbejetvā tassa vūpasamanatthaṃ “ettake ca ettake ca hatthiassarathādayo hiraññasuvaṇṇañca
atk-s0505a:312_12: dakkhiṇaṃ datvā yañño yajitabbo”ti taṃ yaññayajane samādapesi.
atk-s0505a:313_0: Tato paccekabuddhā anekāni pāṇasahassāni yaññatthāya sampiṇḍiyamānāni disvā “etasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:313_1: kamme kate dubbodhaneyyo bhavissati, handa naṃ paṭikacceva gantvā pekkhāmā”ti vaṃsakaḷīragāthāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:313_2: vuttanayeneva āgantvā piṇḍāya caramānā rājaṅgaṇe paṭipāṭiyā agamaṃsu. Rājā sīhapañjare
atk-s0505a:313_3: ṭhito rājaṅgaṇaṃ olokayamāno te addakkhi, saha dassaneneva cassa sineho uppajji.
atk-s0505a:313_4: Tato te pakkosāpetvā ākāsatale paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā katabhattakicce
atk-s0505a:313_5: “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. “Mayaṃ, mahārāja, cātuddisā nāmā”ti. “Bhante, cātuddisāti imassa
atk-s0505a:313_6: ko attho”ti? “Catūsu disāsu katthaci kutoci bhayaṃ vā cittutrāso vā amhākaṃ natthi,
atk-s0505a:313_7: mahārājā”ti. “Bhante, tumhākaṃ taṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ kāraṇā na hotī”ti? “Mayañhi, mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:313_8: mettaṃ bhāvema, karuṇaṃ bhāvema, muditaṃ bhāvema, upekkhaṃ bhāvema, tena no taṃ bhayaṃ
atk-s0505a:313_9: na hotī”ti vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā attano vasatiṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:314_0: Tato rājā cintesi “ime samaṇā mettādibhāvanāya bhayaṃ na hotīti bhaṇanti, brāhmaṇā
atk-s0505a:314_1: pana anekasahassapāṇavadhaṃ vaṇṇayanti, kesaṃ nu kho vacanaṃ sacca”nti. Athassa etadahosi
atk-s0505a:314_2: – “samaṇā suddhena asuddhaṃ dhovanti, brāhmaṇā pana asuddhena asuddhaṃ. Na ca sakkā
atk-s0505a:314_3: asuddhena asuddhaṃ dhovituṃ, pabbajitānaṃ eva vacanaṃ sacca”nti. So “sabbe sattā
atk-s0505a:314_4: sukhitā hontū”tiādinā nayena mettādayo cattāropi brahmavihāre bhāvetvā hitapharaṇacittena
atk-s0505a:314_5: amacce āṇāpesi “sabbe pāṇe muñcatha, sītāni pānīyāni pivantu, haritāni tiṇāni khādantu,
atk-s0505a:314_6: sīto ca nesaṃ vāto upavāyatū”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:315_0: Tato rājā “kalyāṇamittānaṃ vacaneneva pāpakammato muttomhī”ti tattheva nisinno vipassitvā
atk-s0505a:315_1: paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Amaccehi ca bhojanavelāyaṃ “bhuñja, mahārāja, kālo”ti
atk-s0505a:315_2: vutte “nāhaṃ rājā”ti purimanayeneva sabbaṃ vatvā imaṃ udānabyākaraṇagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:317: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:318_0: Tattha cātuddisoti catūsu disāsu yathāsukhavihārī, “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:318_1: vā nayena brahmavihārabhāvanāpharitā catasso disā assa santītipi cātuddiso. Tāsu
atk-s0505a:318_2: disāsu katthaci satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihaññatīti appaṭigho. Santussamānoti
atk-s0505a:318_3: dvādasavidhassa santosassavasena santussako, itarītarenāti uccāvacena paccayena.
atk-s0505a:318_4: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhīti ettha parissayanti kāyacittāni, parihāpenti vā tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:318_5: sampattiṃ, tāni vā paṭicca sayantīti parissayā, bāhirānaṃ sīhabyagghādīnaṃ abbhantarānañca
atk-s0505a:318_6: kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittupaddavānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Te parissaye adhivāsanakhantiyā
atk-s0505a:318_7: ca vīriyādīhi dhammehi ca sahatīti parissayānaṃ sahitā. Thaddhabhāvakarabhayābhāvena
atk-s0505a:318_8: achambhī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā te cattāro samaṇā, evaṃ itarītarena paccayena santussamāno
atk-s0505a:318_9: ettha paṭipattipadaṭṭhāne santose ṭhito catūsu disāsu mettādibhāvanāya cātuddiso,
atk-s0505a:318_10: sattasaṅkhāresu paṭihananabhayābhāvena appaṭigho ca hoti. So cātuddisattā vuttappakārānaṃ
atk-s0505a:318_11: parissayānaṃ sahitā, appaṭighattā achambhī ca hotīti evaṃ paṭipattiguṇaṃ disvā yoniso
atk-s0505a:318_12: paṭipajjitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti. Atha vā te samaṇā viya santussamāno itarītarena
atk-s0505a:318_13: vuttanayeneva cātuddiso hotīti ñatvā evaṃ cātuddisabhāvaṃ patthayanto yoniso paṭipajjitvā
atk-s0505a:318_14: adhigatomhi. Tasmā aññopi īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayamāno cātuddisatāya parissayānaṃ sahitā
atk-s0505a:318_15: appaṭighatāya ca achambhī hutvā eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0505a:320_0: 43. Dussaṅgahāti kā uppatti? Bārāṇasirañño kira aggamahesī kālamakāsi. Tato vītivattesu
atk-s0505a:320_1: sokadivasesu ekaṃ divasaṃ amaccā “rājūnaṃ nāma tesu tesu kiccesu aggamahesī avassaṃ
atk-s0505a:320_2: icchitabbā, sādhu, devo, aññaṃ deviṃ ānetū”ti yāciṃsu. Rājā“tena hi, bhaṇe, jānāthā”ti
atk-s0505a:320_3: āha. Te pariyesantā sāmantarajje rājā mato. Tassa devī rajjaṃ anusāsati. Sā ca gabbhinī
atk-s0505a:320_4: hoti. Amaccā “ayaṃ rañño anurūpā”ti ñatvā taṃ yāciṃsu. Sā “gabbhinī nāma manussānaṃ
atk-s0505a:320_5: amanāpā hoti, sace āgametha, yāva vijāyāmi, evaṃ hotu, no ce, aññaṃ pariyesathā”ti
atk-s0505a:320_6: āha. Te raññopi etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā “gabbhinīpi hotu ānethā”ti. Te ānesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:320_7: Rājā taṃ abhisiñcitvā sabbaṃ mahesībhogaṃ adāsi. Tassā parijanañca nānāvidhehi paṇṇākārehi
atk-s0505a:320_8: saṅgaṇhāti. Sā kālena puttaṃ vijāyi. Tampi rājā attano jātaputtamiva sabbiriyāpathesu
atk-s0505a:320_9: aṅke ca ure ca katvā viharati. Tato deviyā parijano cintesi “rājā ativiya saṅgaṇhāti
atk-s0505a:320_10: kumāraṃ, ativissāsaniyāni rājahadayāni, handa naṃ paribhedemā”ti.
atk-s0505a:321_0: Tato kumāraṃ – “tvaṃ, tāta, amhākaṃ rañño putto, na imassa rañño, mā ettha vissāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:321_1: āpajjī”ti āhaṃsu. Atha kumāro “ehi puttā”ti raññā vuccamānopi hatthe gahetvā ākaḍḍhiyamānopi
atk-s0505a:321_2: pubbe viya rājānaṃ na allīyati. Rājā “kiṃ eta”nti vīmaṃsanto taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “are,
atk-s0505a:321_3: ete mayā evaṃ saṅgahitāpi paṭikūlavuttino evā”ti nibbijjitvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito.
atk-s0505a:321_4: “Rājā pabbajito”ti amaccaparijanāpi bahū pabbajitā, “saparijano rājā pabbajito”ti
atk-s0505a:321_5: manussā paṇīte paccaye upanenti. Rājā paṇīte paccaye yathāvuḍḍhaṃ dāpeti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:321_6: ye sundaraṃ labhanti, te tussanti. Itare ujjhāyanti “mayaṃ pariveṇasammajjanādīni
atk-s0505a:321_7: sabbakiccāni karontā lūkhabhattaṃ jiṇṇavatthañca labhāmā”ti. So tampi ñatvā “are,
atk-s0505a:321_8: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ diyyamānepi nāma ujjhāyanti, aho, ayaṃ parisā dussaṅgahā”ti pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0505a:321_9: ādāya eko araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi. Tattha
atk-s0505a:321_10: āgatehi ca kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:323: Appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:324_0: Sā atthato pākaṭā eva. Ayaṃ pana yojanā – dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke, ye asantosābhibhūtā,
atk-s0505a:324_1: tathāvidhā eva ca atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā. Etamahaṃ dussaṅgahabhāvaṃ jigucchanto
atk-s0505a:324_2: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0505a:326_0: 44. Oropayitvāti kā uppatti? Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira cātumāsikabrahmadatto nāma rājā gimhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:326_1: paṭhame māse uyyānaṃ gato. Tattha ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge nīlaghanapattasañchannaṃ koviḷārarukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:326_2: disvā “koviḷāramūle mama sayanaṃ paññāpethā”ti vatvā uyyāne kīḷitvā sāyanhasamayaṃ
atk-s0505a:326_3: tattha seyyaṃ kappesi. Puna gimhānaṃ majjhime māse uyyānaṃ gato. Tadā koviḷāro pupphito
atk-s0505a:326_4: hoti, tadāpi tatheva akāsi. Puna gimhānaṃ pacchime māse gato. Tadā koviḷāro sañchinnapatto
atk-s0505a:326_5: sukkharukkho viya hoti. Tadāpi so adisvāva taṃ rukkhaṃ pubbaparicayena tattheva seyyaṃ
atk-s0505a:326_6: āṇāpesi. Amaccā jānantāpi “raññā āṇatta”nti bhayena tattha sayanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. So
atk-s0505a:326_7: uyyāne kīḷitvā sāyanhasamayaṃ tattha seyyaṃ kappento taṃ rukkhaṃ disvā “are, ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:326_8: pubbe sañchannapatto maṇimayo viya abhirūpadassano ahosi. Tato maṇivaṇṇasākhantare
atk-s0505a:326_10: cassa heṭṭhā bhūmibhāgo bandhanā pamuttapupphasañchanno rattakambalasanthato viya
atk-s0505a:326_11: ahosi. So nāmajja sukkharukkho viya sākhāmattāvaseso ṭhito. ‘Aho, jarāya upahato
atk-s0505a:326_12: koviḷāro”’ti cintetvā “anupādinnampi tāva jarā haññati, kimaṅga pana upādinna”nti
atk-s0505a:326_13: aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhi. Tadanusāreneva sabbasaṅkhāre dukkhato anattato ca vipassanto
atk-s0505a:326_14: “aho vatāhampi sañchinnapatto koviḷāro viya apetagihibyañjano bhaveyya”nti patthayamāno
atk-s0505a:326_15: anupubbena tasmiṃ sayanatale dakkhiṇena passena nipannoyeva paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:326_16: Tato gamanakāle amaccehi “kālo gantuṃ, mahārājā”ti vutte “nāhaṃ rājā”tiādīni vatvā
atk-s0505a:328: Chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:329_1: Etāni hi gihibhāvaṃ byañjayanti, tasmā “gihibyañjanānī”ti vuccanti. Sañchinnapattoti
atk-s0505a:329_2: patitapatto. Chetvānāti maggañāṇena chinditvā. Vīroti maggavīriyasamannāgato. Gihibandhanānīti
atk-s0505a:329_3: kāmabandhanāni. Kāmā hi gihīnaṃ bandhanāni. Ayaṃ tāva padattho.
atk-s0505a:330_0: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyo – “aho vatāhampi oropayitvā gihibyañjanāni sañchinnapatto yathā
atk-s0505a:330_1: koviḷāro bhaveyya”nti evañhi cintayamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0505a:332_0: 45-46. Sace labhethāti kā uppatti? Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane dve paccekabodhisattā
atk-s0505a:332_1: pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā. Tato
atk-s0505a:332_2: cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirañño putto ahosi, kaniṭṭho purohitassa putto ahosi.
atk-s0505a:332_3: Te ekadivasaṃyeva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā ekadivasameva mātukucchito nikkhamitvā sahapaṃsukīḷitasahāyakā
atk-s0505a:332_4: ahesuṃ. Purohitaputto paññavā ahosi. So rājaputtaṃ āha – “samma, tvaṃ pituno accayena
atk-s0505a:332_5: rajjaṃ labhissasi, ahaṃ purohitaṭṭhānaṃ, susikkhitena ca sukhaṃ rajjaṃ anusāsituṃ
atk-s0505a:332_6: sakkā, ehi sippaṃ uggahessāmā”ti. Tato ubhopi pubbopacitakammā hutvā gāmanigamādīsu
atk-s0505a:332_7: bhikkhaṃ caramānā paccantajanapadagāmaṃ gatā. Tañca gāmaṃ paccekabuddhā bhikkhācāravelāya
atk-s0505a:332_8: pavisanti. Atha manussā paccekabuddhe disvā ussāhajātā āsanāni paññāpenti, paṇītaṃ
atk-s0505a:332_9: khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ upanāmenti, mānenti, pūjenti. Tesaṃ etadahosi – “amhehi sadisā
atk-s0505a:332_10: uccākulikā nāma natthi, atha ca panime manussā yadi icchanti, amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ denti,
atk-s0505a:332_11: yadi ca nicchanti, na denti, imesaṃ pana pabbajitānaṃ evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0505a:332_12: addhā ete kiñci sippaṃ jānanti, handa nesaṃ santike sippaṃ uggaṇhāmā”ti.
atk-s0505a:333_0: Te manussesu paṭikkantesu okāsaṃ labhitvā “yaṃ, bhante, tumhe sippaṃ jānātha, taṃ
atk-s0505a:333_1: amhepi sikkhāpethā”ti yāciṃsu. Paccekabuddhā “na sakkā apabbajitena sikkhitu”nti
atk-s0505a:333_2: āhaṃsu. Te pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajiṃsu. Tato nesaṃ paccekabuddhā “evaṃ vo nivāsetabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:333_3: evaṃ pārupitabba”ntiādinā nayena ābhisamācārikaṃ ācikkhitvā “imassa sippassa ekībhāvābhirati
atk-s0505a:333_4: nipphatti, tasmā ekeneva nisīditabbaṃ, ekena caṅkamitabbaṃ, ṭhātabbaṃ, sayitabba”nti
atk-s0505a:333_5: pāṭiyekkaṃ paṇṇasālamadaṃsu. Tato te attano attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:333_6: Purohitaputto nisinnakālato pabhuti cittasamādhānaṃ laddhā jhānaṃ labhi. Rājaputto
atk-s0505a:333_7: muhutteneva ukkaṇṭhito tassa santikaṃ āgato. So taṃ disvā “kiṃ, sammā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0505a:333_8: “Ukkaṇṭhitomhī”ti āha. “Tena hi idha nisīdā”ti. So tattha muhuttaṃ nisīditvā āha
atk-s0505a:333_9: – “imassa kira, samma, sippassa ekībhāvābhirati nipphattī”ti purohitaputto “evaṃ,
atk-s0505a:333_10: samma, tena hi tvaṃ attano nisinnokāsaṃ eva gaccha, uggahessāmi imassa sippassa nipphatti”nti
atk-s0505a:333_11: āha. So gantvā punapi muhutteneva ukkaṇṭhito purimanayeneva tikkhattuṃ āgato.
atk-s0505a:334_0: Tato naṃ purohitaputto tatheva uyyojetvā tasmiṃ gate cintesi “ayaṃ attano ca kammaṃ
atk-s0505a:334_1: hāpeti, mama ca idhābhikkhaṇaṃ āgacchanto”ti. So paṇṇasālato nikkhamma araññaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:334_2: Itaro attano paṇṇasālāyeva nisinno punapi muhutteneva ukkaṇṭhito hutvā tassa paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0505a:334_3: āgantvā ito cito ca maggantopi taṃ adisvā cintesi – “yo gahaṭṭhakāle paṇṇākārampi
atk-s0505a:334_4: ādāya āgato maṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhati, so nāma mayi āgate dassanampi adātukāmo pakkāmi,
atk-s0505a:334_5: aho, re citta, na lajjasi, yaṃ maṃ catukkhattuṃ idhānesi, sodāni te vase na vattissāmi,
atk-s0505a:334_6: aññadatthu taṃyeva mama vase vattāpessāmī”ti attano senāsanaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:334_7: ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi. Itaropi
atk-s0505a:334_8: araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā tattheva agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:334_9: Te ubhopi manosilātale nisīditvā pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ imā udānagāthāyo abhāsiṃsu –
