atk-s0505a:518_9: suvaṇṇavinaddhā. Paṭhamanaṅgale aṭṭha balibaddā yuttā, sesesu cattāro cattāro, avasesā
atk-s0505a:518_10: kilantaparivattanatthaṃ ānītā. Ekekagumbe ekamekaṃ bījasakaṭaṃ ekeko kasati, ekeko vapati.
atk-s0505a:519_0: Brāhmaṇo pana pageva massukammaṃ kārāpetvā nhatvā sugandhagandhehi vilitto pañcasatagghanakaṃ
atk-s0505a:519_1: vatthaṃ nivāsetvā sahassagghanakaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā ekamekissā aṅguliyā dve dve katvā
atk-s0505a:519_2: vīsati aṅgulimuddikāyo, kaṇṇesu sīhakuṇḍalāni, sīse ca brahmaveṭhanaṃ paṭimuñcitvā
atk-s0505a:519_3: suvaṇṇamālaṃ kaṇṭhe katvā brāhmaṇagaṇaparivuto kammantaṃ vosāsati. Athassa brāhmaṇī
atk-s0505a:519_4: anekasatabhājanesu pāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā mahāsakaṭesu āropetvā gandhodakena nhāyitvā
atk-s0505a:519_5: sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā brāhmaṇīgaṇaparivutā kammantaṃ agamāsi. Gehampissa sabbattha
atk-s0505a:519_6: gandhehi suvilittaṃ pupphehi sukatabalikammaṃ, khettañca tesu tesu ṭhānesu samussitapaṭākaṃ
atk-s0505a:519_7: ahosi. Parijanakammakārehi saha kammantaṃ osaṭaparisā aḍḍhateyyasahassā ahosi. Sabbe
atk-s0505a:520_0: Atha brāhmaṇo yattha sāmaṃ bhuñjati, taṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovāpetvā pāyāsassa pūretvā
atk-s0505a:520_1: sappimadhuphāṇitādīni abhisaṅkharitvā naṅgalabalikammaṃ kārāpesi. Brāhmaṇī pañca
atk-s0505a:520_2: kassakasatāni suvaṇṇarajatakaṃsatambamayāni bhājanāni gahetvā nisinnāni suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ
atk-s0505a:520_3: gahetvā pāyāsena parivisantī gacchati. Brāhmaṇo pana balikammaṃ kārāpetvā rattasuvaṇṇabandhūpāhanāyo
atk-s0505a:520_4: ārohitvā rattasuvaṇṇadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā “idha pāyāsaṃ detha, idha sappiṃ, idha sakkharaṃ
atk-s0505a:520_5: dethā”ti vosāsamāno vicarati. Atha bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova brāhmaṇassa parivesanaṃ
atk-s0505a:520_6: vattamānaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ kālo brāhmaṇaṃ dametu”nti nivāsetvā, kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā,
atk-s0505a:520_7: saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā, pattaṃ gahetvā, gandhakuṭito nikkhami yathā taṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathi.
atk-s0505a:520_8: Tenāha āyasmā ānando “atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā”ti.
atk-s0505a:521_0: Tattha atha iti nipāto aññādhikāravacanārambhe khoti padapūraṇe. Bhagavāti vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:521_1: Pubbaṇhasamayanti divasassa pubbabhāgasamayaṃ, pubbaṇhasamayeti attho, pubbaṇhe vā
atk-s0505a:521_2: samayaṃ pubbaṇhasamayaṃ, pubbaṇhe ekaṃ khaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ accantasaṃyoge
atk-s0505a:521_4: veditabbaṃ. Na hi bhagavā tato pubbe anivattho āsi. Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattaṃ hatthehi,
atk-s0505a:521_5: cīvaraṃ kāyena ādiyitvā, sampaṭicchitvā dhāretvāti attho. Bhagavato kira piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:521_6: pavisitukāmassa bhamaro viya vikasitapadumadvayamajjhaṃ, indanīlamaṇivaṇṇaṃ selamayaṃ
atk-s0505a:521_7: pattaṃ hatthadvayamajjhaṃ āgacchati. Tasmā evamāgataṃ pattaṃ hatthehi sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0505a:521_8: cīvarañca parimaṇḍalaṃ pārutaṃ kāyena dhāretvāti evamassa attho veditabbo. Yena vā
atk-s0505a:521_9: tena vā hi pakārena gaṇhanto ādāya icceva vuccati yathā “samādāyeva pakkamatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:522_0: Yenāti yena maggena. Kammantoti kammakaraṇokāso. Tenāti tena maggena. Upasaṅkamīti
atk-s0505a:522_1: gato, yena maggena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto gammati, tena maggena gatoti
atk-s0505a:522_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha kasmā, bhikkhū, bhagavantaṃ nānubandhiṃsūti? Vuccate – yadā bhagavā
atk-s0505a:522_3: ekakova katthaci upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti, bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ dvāraṃ pidahitvā antogandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0505a:522_4: pavisati. Tato bhikkhū tāya saññāya jānanti – “ajja bhagavā ekakova gāmaṃ pavisitukāmo,
atk-s0505a:522_5: addhā kañci eva vinetabbapuggalaṃ addasā”ti. Te attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā, gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0505a:522_6: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā, bhikkhācāraṃ gacchanti. Tadā ca bhagavā evamakāsi. Tasmā bhikkhū
atk-s0505a:523_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yena samayena bhagavā kammantaṃ upasaṅkami, tena samayena
atk-s0505a:523_1: tassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati, bhattavissaggo vattatīti attho. Yaṃ pubbe avocumha
atk-s0505a:523_2: – “brāhmaṇī pañca kassakasatāni suvaṇṇarajatakaṃsatambamayāni bhājanāni gahetvā nisinnāni
atk-s0505a:523_3: suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā pāyāsena parivisantī gacchatī”ti. Atha kho bhagavā yena
atk-s0505a:523_4: parivesanā tenupasaṅkami. Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Brāhmaṇassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ. Na hi bhagavā
atk-s0505a:523_5: kapaṇapuriso viya bhottukāmatāya parivesanaṃ upasaṅkamati. Bhagavato hi dve asītisahassasaṅkhyā
atk-s0505a:523_6: sakyakoliyarājāno ñātayo, te attano sampattiyā nibaddhabhattaṃ dātuṃ ussahanti. Na
atk-s0505a:523_7: pana bhagavā bhattatthāya pabbajito, apica kho pana “anekāni asaṅkhyeyyāni pañca
atk-s0505a:523_8: mahāpariccāge pariccajanto pāramiyo pūretvā mutto mocessāmi, danto damessāmi; santo
atk-s0505a:523_9: samessāmi, parinibbuto parinibbāpessāmī”ti pabbajito. Tasmā attano muttattā…pe… parinibbutattā
atk-s0505a:523_10: ca paraṃ mocento…pe… parinibbāpento ca loke vicaranto brāhmaṇassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:524_0: Upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti evaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ca ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantanti
atk-s0505a:524_1: bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, ekokāsaṃ ekapassanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhummatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:524_2: tassa dassanūpacāre kathāsavanaṭṭhāne, yattha ṭhitaṃ brāhmaṇo passati, tattha uccaṭṭhāne
atk-s0505a:524_3: aṭṭhāsi. Ṭhatvā ca suvaṇṇarasapiñjaraṃ sahassacandasūriyobhāsātibhāsayamānaṃ sarīrābhaṃ
atk-s0505a:524_4: muñci samantato asītihatthaparimāṇaṃ, yāya ajjhottharitattā brāhmaṇassa kammantasālābhittirukkhakasitamattikāpiṇḍādayo
atk-s0505a:524_5: suvaṇṇamayā viya ahesuṃ. Atha manussā pāyāsaṃ bhuttā asītianubyañjanaparivāradvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitasarīraṃ
atk-s0505a:524_7: padumassaraṃ, raṃsijālujjalitatārāgaṇamiva gaganatalaṃ, ādittamiva ca kanakagirisikharaṃ
atk-s0505a:524_8: siriyā jalamānaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā hatthapāde dhovitvā añjaliṃ
atk-s0505a:524_9: paggayha samparivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Evaṃ tehi samparivāritaṃ addasa kho kasibhāradvājo
atk-s0505a:524_10: brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ. Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ahaṃ kho, samaṇa,
atk-s0505a:525_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ evamāha? Kiṃ samantapāsādike pasādanīye uttamadamathasamathamanuppattepi
atk-s0505a:525_1: bhagavati appasādena, udāhu aḍḍhateyyānaṃ janasahassānaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetvāpi kaṭacchubhikkhāya
atk-s0505a:525_2: maccherenāti? Ubhayathāpi no, apica khvāssa bhagavato dassanena atittaṃ nikkhittakammantaṃ
atk-s0505a:525_3: janaṃ disvā “kammabhaṅgaṃ me kātuṃ āgato”ti anattamanatā ahosi. Tasmā evamāha. Bhagavato
atk-s0505a:525_4: ca lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “sacāyaṃ kammante payojayissa, sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ
atk-s0505a:525_5: sīse cūḷāmaṇi viya abhavissa, ko nāmassa attho na sampajjissa, evamevaṃ alasatāya
atk-s0505a:525_6: kammante appayojetvā vappamaṅgalādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjanto kāyadaḷhībahulo vicaratī”tipissa
atk-s0505a:525_7: ahosi. Tenāha – “ahaṃ kho, samaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca, kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:525_8: Na me kammantā byāpajjanti, na camhi yathā tvaṃ evaṃ lakkhaṇasampannoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:525_9: Tvampi samaṇa…pe… bhuñjassu, ko te attho na sampajjeyya evaṃ lakkhaṇasampannassāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:526_0: Apicāyaṃ assosi – “sakyarājakule kira kumāro uppanno, so cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya
atk-s0505a:526_1: pabbajito”ti. Tasmā “idāni ayaṃ so”ti ñatvā “cakkavattirajjaṃ kira pahāya kilantosī”ti
atk-s0505a:526_2: upārambhaṃ karonto āha “ahaṃ kho samaṇā”ti. Apicāyaṃ tikkhapañño brāhmaṇo, na bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:526_3: avakkhipanto bhaṇati, bhagavato pana rūpasampattiṃ disvā paññāsampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno
atk-s0505a:526_4: kathāpavattanatthampi evamāha – “ahaṃ kho samaṇā”ti. Tato bhagavā veneyyavasena sadevake
atk-s0505a:526_5: loke aggakassakavappakabhāvaṃ attano dassento āha “ahampi kho brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0505a:527_0: Atha brāhmaṇassa cintā udapādi – “ayaṃ samaṇo ‘kasāmi ca vapāmi cā’ti āha. Na cassa
atk-s0505a:527_1: oḷārikāni yuganaṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni passāmi, so musā nu kho bhaṇati, no”ti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:527_2: pādatalā paṭṭhāya yāva upari kesantā sammālokayamāno aṅgavijjāya katādhikārattā dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇasampattimassa
atk-s0505a:527_3: ñatvā “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ evarūpo musā bhaṇeyyā”ti tāvadeva sañjātabahumāno
atk-s0505a:527_4: bhagavati samaṇavādaṃ pahāya gottena bhagavantaṃ samudācaramāno āha “na kho pana
atk-s0505a:528_0: Evañca pana vatvā tikkhapañño brāhmaṇo “gambhīratthaṃ sandhāya iminā etaṃ vutta”nti
atk-s0505a:528_1: ñatvā pucchitvā tamatthaṃ ñātukāmo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi. Tenāha āyasmā
atk-s0505a:528_2: ānando “atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:529_1: pana yasmā pubbadhammasabhāgena ropetvā kathanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, tasmā buddhānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:529_2: dīpento pubbadhammasabhāgena ropento āha – “saddhā bīja”nti. Ko panettha pubbadhammasabhāgo,
atk-s0505a:529_3: nanu brāhmaṇena bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhārasamāyogaṃ pucchito atha ca pana
atk-s0505a:529_4: apucchitassa bījassa sabhāgena ropento āha – “saddhā bīja”nti, evañca sati ananusandhikāva
atk-s0505a:529_5: ayaṃ kathā hotīti? Vuccate – na buddhānaṃ ananusandhikā nāma kathā atthi, nāpi buddhā
atk-s0505a:529_6: pubbadhammasabhāgaṃ anāropetvā kathenti. Evañcettha anusandhi veditabbā – anena hi
atk-s0505a:529_7: brāhmaṇena bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhāravasena kasiṃ pucchito. So tassa anukampāya
atk-s0505a:529_8: “idaṃ apucchita”nti aparihāpetvā samūlaṃ saupakāraṃ sasambhāraṃ saphalaṃ kasiṃ ñāpetuṃ
atk-s0505a:529_9: mūlato paṭṭhāya kasiṃ dassento āha – “saddhā bīja”nti. Bījañhi kasiyā mūlaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:529_10: sati kattabbato, asati akattabbato, tappamāṇena ca kattabbato. Bīje hi sati kasiṃ
atk-s0505a:529_11: karonti, asati na karonti. Bījappamāṇena ca kusalā kassakā khettaṃ kasanti, na ūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:529_12: “mā no sassaṃ parihāyī”ti, na adhikaṃ “mā no mogho vāyāmo ahosī”ti. Yasmā ca bījameva
atk-s0505a:529_13: mūlaṃ, tasmā bhagavā mūlato paṭṭhāya kasiṃ dassento tassa brāhmaṇassa kasiyā pubbadhammassa
atk-s0505a:529_14: bījassa sabhāgena attano kasiyā pubbadhammaṃ ropento āha – “saddhā bīja”nti. Evamettha
atk-s0505a:530_0: Pucchitaṃyeva vatvā apucchitaṃ pacchā kiṃ na vuttanti ce? Tassa upakārabhāvato dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvato
atk-s0505a:530_1: ca. Ayañhi brāhmaṇo paññavā, micchādiṭṭhikule pana jātattā saddhāvirahito. Saddhāvirahito
atk-s0505a:530_2: ca paññavā paresaṃ saddhāya attano visaye apaṭipajjamāno visesaṃ nādhigacchati, kilesakālussiyabhāvāpagamappasādamattalakkhaṇāpi
atk-s0505a:530_3: cassa dubbalā saddhā balavatiyā paññāya saha vattamānā atthasiddhiṃ na karoti, hatthinā
atk-s0505a:530_4: saha ekadhure yuttagoṇo viya. Tasmā tassa saddhā upakārikā. Evaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:530_5: saupakārabhāvato taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saddhāya patiṭṭhāpentena pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho
atk-s0505a:530_6: pubbe vutto desanākusalatāya yathā aññatrāpi “saddhā bandhati pātheyya”nti ca, “saddhā
atk-s0505a:530_7: dutiyā purisassa hotī”ti ca, “saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”nti ca, “saddhāya
atk-s0505a:530_8: tarati ogha”nti ca, “saddhāhattho mahānāgo”ti ca, “saddhesiko kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakoti
atk-s0505a:530_9: cā”ti. Bījassa ca upakārikā vuṭṭhi, sā tadanantaraññeva vuccamānā samatthā hoti.
atk-s0505a:530_10: Evaṃ dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvato pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho pubbe vutto, añño
atk-s0505a:531_0: Tattha sampasādanalakkhaṇā saddhā, okappanalakkhaṇā vā, pakkhandanarasā, adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0505a:531_2: vā, ādāsajalatalādīnaṃ pasādo viya cetaso pasādabhūtā, udakappasādakamaṇi viya udakassa,
atk-s0505a:531_3: sampayuttadhammānaṃ pasādikā. Bījanti pañcavidhaṃ – mūlabījaṃ, khandhabījaṃ, phalubījaṃ,
atk-s0505a:531_4: aggabījaṃ, bījabījameva pañcamanti. Taṃ sabbampi viruhanaṭṭhena bījaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:532_0: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa kasiyā mūlabhūtaṃ bījaṃ dve kiccāni karoti, heṭṭhā mūlena
atk-s0505a:532_1: patiṭṭhāti, upari aṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpeti; evaṃ bhagavato kasiyā mūlabhūtā saddhā heṭṭhā
atk-s0505a:532_2: sīlamūlena patiṭṭhāti, upari samathavipassanaṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpeti. Yathā ca taṃ mūlena
atk-s0505a:532_3: pathavirasaṃ āporasaṃ gahetvā nāḷena dhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati; evamayaṃ
atk-s0505a:532_5: vaḍḍhati. Yathā ca taṃ subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mūlaṅkurapaṇṇanāḷakaṇḍappasavehi
atk-s0505a:532_6: vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā, khīraṃ janetvā, anekasāliphalabharitaṃ sālisīsaṃ
atk-s0505a:532_8: vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīraṃ janetvā anekapaṭisambhidābhiññābharitaṃ
atk-s0505a:533_0: Tattha siyā “paropaññāsakusaladhammesu ekato uppajjamānesu kasmā saddhāva bījanti
atk-s0505a:533_1: vuttā”ti? Vuccate – bījakiccakaraṇato. Yathā hi tesu viññāṇaṃyeva vijānanakiccaṃ
atk-s0505a:533_2: karoti, evaṃ saddhā bījakiccaṃ, sā ca sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtā. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:534_0: “Saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ odahati,
atk-s0505a:534_1: ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati,
atk-s0505a:534_2: atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando
atk-s0505a:534_3: jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussāhetvā tulayati, tulayitvā padahati, pahitatto samāno
atk-s0505a:534_4: kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca naṃ ativijjhapassatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:535_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana indriyasaṃvaro adhippeto. Vuṭṭhīti vassavuṭṭhivātavuṭṭhītiādinā
atk-s0505a:535_2: anekavidhā. Idha vassavuṭṭhi adhippetā. Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa vassavuṭṭhisamanuggahitaṃ
atk-s0505a:535_3: bījaṃ bījamūlakañca sassaṃ viruhati na milāyati nipphattiṃ gacchati, evaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0505a:535_4: indriyasaṃvarasamanuggahitā saddhā saddhāmūlā ca sīlādayo dhammā viruhanti na milāyanti
atk-s0505a:535_5: nipphattiṃ gacchanti. Tenāha – “tapo vuṭṭhī”ti. “Paññā me”ti ettha ca vutto me-saddo
atk-s0505a:535_6: imesupi padesu yojetabbo “saddhā me bījaṃ, tapo me vuṭṭhī”ti. Tena kiṃ dīpeti? Yathā,
atk-s0505a:535_7: brāhmaṇa, tayā vapite bīje sace vuṭṭhi atthi, sādhu, no ce atthi, udakampi dātabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:535_8: hoti, tathā mayā hiri-īse paññāyuganaṅgale manoyottena ekābaddhe kate vīriyabalibadde
atk-s0505a:535_9: yojetvā satipācanena vijjhitvā attano cittasantānakhette saddhābīje vapite vuṭṭhi-abhāvo
atk-s0505a:535_10: nāma natthi. Ayaṃ pana me satataṃ samitaṃ tapo vuṭṭhīti.
atk-s0505a:536_0: Pajānāti etāya puggalo, sayaṃ vā pajānātīti paññā, sā kāmāvacarādibhedato anekavidhā.
atk-s0505a:536_1: Idha pana saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā. Yuganaṅgalanti yugañca naṅgalañca.
atk-s0505a:536_2: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa yuganaṅgalaṃ, evaṃ bhagavato duvidhāpi paññā. Tattha yathā yugaṃ
atk-s0505a:536_3: īsāya upanissayaṃ hoti, purato hoti, īsābaddhaṃ hoti, yottānaṃ nissayaṃ hoti, balibaddānaṃ
atk-s0505a:536_4: ekato gamanaṃ dhāreti, evaṃ paññā hiripamukhānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayā hoti. Yathāha
atk-s0505a:536_5: – “paññuttarā sabbe kusalā dhammā”ti ca, “paññā hi seṭṭhā kusalā vadanti, nakkhattarājāriva
atk-s0505a:536_6: tārakāna”nti ca. Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena purato ca hoti. Yathāha – “sīlaṃ
atk-s0505a:536_7: hirī cāpi satañca dhammo, anvāyikā paññavato bhavantī”ti. Hirivippayogena anuppattito
atk-s0505a:536_8: īsābaddhā hoti, manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassa nissayapaccayato yottānaṃ nissayo
atk-s0505a:536_9: hoti, accāraddhātilīnabhāvapaṭisedhanato vīriyabalibaddānaṃ ekato gamanaṃ dhāreti.
atk-s0505a:536_10: Yathā ca naṅgalaṃ phālayuttaṃ kasanakāle pathavighanaṃ bhindati, mūlasantānakāni
atk-s0505a:536_11: padāleti, evaṃ satiyuttā paññā vipassanākāle dhammānaṃ santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ
atk-s0505a:536_12: bhindati, sabbakilesamūlasantānakāni padāleti. Sā ca kho lokuttarāva itarā pana lokiyāpi
atk-s0505a:537_0: Hirīyati etāya puggalo, sayaṃ vā hirīyati akusalappavattiṃ jigucchatīti hirī. Taggahaṇena
atk-s0505a:537_1: sahacaraṇabhāvato ottappaṃ gahitaṃyeva hoti. Īsāti yuganaṅgalasandhārikā dāruyaṭṭhi.
atk-s0505a:537_2: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ sandhāreti, evaṃ bhagavatopi hirī lokiyalokuttarapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:537_3: yuganaṅgalaṃ sandhāreti hiriyā asati paññāya abhāvato. Yathā ca īsāpaṭibaddhaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0505a:537_4: kiccakaraṃ hoti acalaṃ asithilaṃ, evaṃ hiripaṭibaddhā ca paññā kiccakārī hoti acalā
atk-s0505a:538_0: Munātīti mano, cittassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana manosīsena taṃsampayutto samādhi
atk-s0505a:538_1: adhippeto. Yottanti rajjubandhanaṃ. Taṃ tividhaṃ īsāya saha yugassa bandhanaṃ, yugena
atk-s0505a:538_2: saha balibaddānaṃ bandhanaṃ, sārathinā saha balibaddānaṃ bandhananti. Tattha yathā
atk-s0505a:538_3: brāhmaṇassa yottaṃ īsāyugabalibadde ekābaddhe katvā sakakicce paṭipādeti, evaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0505a:538_4: samādhi sabbeva te hiripaññāvīriyadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhepabhāvena bandhitvā sakakicce
atk-s0505a:539_0: Sarati etāya cirakatādimatthaṃ puggalo, sayaṃ vā saratīti sati, sā asammussanalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0505a:539_1: Phāletīti phālo. Pājeti etenāti pājanaṃ. Taṃ idha “pācana”nti vuccati, patodassetaṃ
atk-s0505a:539_2: adhivacanaṃ. Phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ. Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa phālapācanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:539_3: evaṃ bhagavato vipassanāyuttā maggayuttā ca sati. Tattha yathā phālo naṅgalamanurakkhati,
atk-s0505a:539_4: purato cassa gacchati, evaṃ sati kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā ārammaṇe
atk-s0505a:539_5: vā upaṭṭhāpayamānā paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati, tathā hi “satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu
atk-s0505a:539_6: “ārakkhā”ti vuttā. Asammussanavasena cassa purato hoti. Satiparicite hi dhamme paññā
atk-s0505a:539_7: pajānāti, no sammuṭṭhe. Yathā ca pācanaṃ balibaddānaṃ vijjhanabhayaṃ dassentaṃ saṃsīdanaṃ
atk-s0505a:539_8: na deti, uppathagamanañca vāreti, evaṃ sati vīriyabalibaddānaṃ apāyabhayaṃ dassentī
atk-s0505a:539_9: kosajjasaṃsīdanaṃ na deti, kāmaguṇasaṅkhāte agocare cāraṃ nivāretvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojentī
atk-s0505a:540_0: 78. Kāyaguttoti tividhena kāyasucaritena gutto. Vacīguttoti catubbidhena vacīsucaritena
atk-s0505a:540_1: gutto. Ettāvatā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Āhāre udare yatoti ettha āhāramukhena
atk-s0505a:540_2: sabbapaccayānaṃ saṅgahitattā catubbidhepi paccaye yato saṃyato nirupakkilesoti attho.
atk-s0505a:540_3: Iminā ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Udare yatoti udare yato saṃyato mitabhojī, āhāre
atk-s0505a:540_4: mattaññūti vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā bhojane mattaññutāmukhena paccayapaṭisevanasīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:540_5: Tena kiṃ dīpeti? Yathā tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, bījaṃ vapitvā sassaparipālanatthaṃ kaṇṭakavatiṃ
atk-s0505a:540_6: vā rukkhavatiṃ vā pākāraparikkhepaṃ vā karosi, tena te gomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ
atk-s0505a:540_7: alabhantā sassaṃ na vilumpanti, evamahampi saddhābījaṃ vapitvā nānappakārakusalasassaparipālanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:540_8: kāyavacīāhāraguttimayaṃ tividhaparikkhepaṃ karomi. Tena me rāgādiakusaladhammagomahiṃsamigagaṇā
atk-s0505a:541_0: Saccaṃ karomi niddānanti ettha dvīhi dvārehi avisaṃvādanaṃ saccaṃ. Niddānanti chedanaṃ
atk-s0505a:541_1: lunanaṃ uppāṭanaṃ, karaṇatthe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ayañhi ettha attho
atk-s0505a:541_2: “saccena karomi niddāna”nti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā tvaṃ bāhiraṃ kasiṃ kasitvā sassadūsakānaṃ
atk-s0505a:541_3: tiṇānaṃ hatthena vā asitena vā niddānaṃ karosi; evamahampi ajjhattikaṃ kasiṃ kasitvā
atk-s0505a:541_4: kusalasassadūsakānaṃ visaṃvādanatiṇānaṃ saccena niddānaṃ karomi. Ñāṇasaccaṃ vā ettha
atk-s0505a:541_5: saccanti veditabbaṃ, yaṃ taṃ yathābhūtañāṇanti vuccati. Tena attasaññādīnaṃ tiṇānaṃ
atk-s0505a:541_6: niddānaṃ karomīti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Atha vā niddānanti chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ, uppāṭakanti
atk-s0505a:541_7: attho. Evaṃ sante yathā tvaṃ dāsaṃ vā kammakaraṃ vā niddānaṃ karosi, “niddehi tiṇānī”ti
atk-s0505a:541_8: tiṇānaṃ chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakaṃ karosi; evamahaṃ saccaṃ karomīti upayogavacaneneva
atk-s0505a:541_9: vattuṃ yujjati. Atha vā saccanti diṭṭhisaccaṃ. Tamahaṃ niddānaṃ karomi, chinditabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:541_10: lunitabbaṃ uppāṭetabbaṃ karomīti evampi upayogavacaneneva vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-s0505a:542_0: Soraccaṃ me pamocananti ettha yaṃ taṃ “kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo”ti,
atk-s0505a:542_1: evaṃ sīlameva “soracca”nti vuttaṃ, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ, vuttameva etaṃ “kāyagutto”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:542_2: nayena, arahattaphalaṃ pana adhippetaṃ. Tampi hi sundare nibbāne ratabhāvato “soracca”nti
atk-s0505a:542_3: vuccati. Pamocananti yoggavissajjanaṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā tava pamocanaṃ punapi
atk-s0505a:542_4: sāyanhe vā dutiyadivase vā anāgatasaṃvacchare vā yojetabbato appamocanameva hoti,
atk-s0505a:542_5: na mama evaṃ. Na hi mama antarā mocanaṃ nāma atthi. Ahañhi dīpaṅkaradasabalakālato
atk-s0505a:542_6: pabhuti paññānaṅgale vīriyabalibadde yojetvā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0505a:542_7: mahākasiṃ kasanto tāva na muñciṃ, yāva na sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi. Yadā ca me
atk-s0505a:542_8: sabbaṃ taṃ kālaṃ khepetvā bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinnassa sabbaguṇaparivāraṃ
atk-s0505a:542_9: arahattaphalaṃ udapādi, tadā mayā taṃ sabbussukkapaṭippassaddhippattiyā pamuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:542_10: na dāni puna yojetabbaṃ bhavissatīti. Etamatthaṃ sandhāyāha bhagavā – “soraccaṃ me pamocana”nti.
atk-s0505a:543_0: 79. Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhanti ettha vīriyanti “kāyiko vā, cetasiko vā vīriyārambho”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:543_1: nayena vuttapadhānaṃ. Dhurāyaṃ dhorayhaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ, dhuraṃ vahatīti attho. Yathā
atk-s0505a:543_2: hi brāhmaṇassa dhurāyaṃ dhorayhākaḍḍhitaṃ naṅgalaṃ bhūmighanaṃ bhindati, mūlasantānakāni
atk-s0505a:543_3: ca padāleti, evaṃ bhagavato vīriyākaḍḍhitaṃ paññānaṅgalaṃ yathāvuttaṃ ghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0505a:543_4: kilesasantānakāni ca padāleti. Tenāha – “vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayha”nti. Atha vā purimadhuraṃ
atk-s0505a:543_5: vahantā dhurā, mūladhuraṃ vahantā dhorayhā; dhurā ca dhorayhā ca dhuradhorayhā. Tattha
atk-s0505a:543_6: yathā brāhmaṇassa ekamekasmiṃ naṅgale catubalibaddappabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ
atk-s0505a:543_7: uppannānuppannatiṇamūlaghātaṃ sassasampattiñca sādheti, evaṃ bhagavato catusammappadhānavīriyappabhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:544_0: Yogakkhemādhivāhananti ettha yogehi khemattā “yogakkhema”nti nibbānaṃ vuccati, taṃ
atk-s0505a:544_1: adhikatvā vāhīyati, abhimukhaṃ vā vāhīyatīti adhivāhanaṃ. Yogakkhemassa adhivāhanaṃ
atk-s0505a:544_2: yogakkhemādhivāhanaṃ. Tena kiṃ dīpeti? Yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ puratthimaṃ disaṃ
atk-s0505a:544_3: pacchimādīsu vā aññataraṃ abhimukhaṃ vāhīyati, tathā mama dhuradhorayhaṃ nibbānābhimukhaṃ vāhīyati.
atk-s0505a:545_0: Evaṃ vāhiyamānañca gacchati anivattantaṃ. Yathā tava naṅgalaṃ vahantaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ
atk-s0505a:545_1: khettakoṭiṃ patvā puna nivattati, evaṃ anivattantaṃ dīpaṅkarakālato pabhuti gacchateva.
atk-s0505a:545_2: Yasmā vā tena tena maggena pahīnā kilesā punappunaṃ pahātabbā na honti, yathā tava
atk-s0505a:545_3: naṅgalena chinnāni tiṇāni punapi aparasmiṃ samaye chinditabbāni honti, tasmāpi etaṃ
atk-s0505a:545_4: paṭhamamaggavasena diṭṭhekaṭṭhe kilese, dutiyavasena oḷārike, tatiyavasena anusahagate
atk-s0505a:545_5: kilese, catutthavasena sabbakilese pajahantaṃ gacchati anivattantaṃ. Atha vā gacchati
atk-s0505a:545_6: anivattanti nivattanarahitaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho. Nti taṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ. Evampettha
atk-s0505a:545_7: padacchedo veditabbo. Evaṃ gacchantañca yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ na taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:545_8: yattha gantvā kassako asoko nissoko virajo hutvā na socati, etaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:545_9: gacchati, yattha gantvā na socati. Yattha satipācanena etaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ
atk-s0505a:545_10: codento gantvā mādiso kassako asoko nissoko virajo hutvā na socati, taṃ sabbasokasallasamugghātabhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:546: 80. Idāni nigamanaṃ karonto bhagavā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0505a:549_0: Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – mayā brāhmaṇa esā saddhābījā tapovuṭṭhiyā anuggahitā kasi,
atk-s0505a:549_1: paññāmayaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ, hirimayañca īsaṃ, manomayena yottena, ekābaddhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:549_2: paññānaṅgale satiphālaṃ ākoṭetvā, satipācanaṃ gahetvā, kāyavacīāhāraguttiyā gopetvā,
atk-s0505a:549_3: saccaṃ niddānaṃ katvā, soraccaṃ pamocanaṃ vīriyaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ yogakkhemābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:549_4: anivattantaṃ vāhentena kaṭṭhā, kasikammapariyosānaṃ catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pāpitā,
atk-s0505a:549_5: sā hoti amatapphalā, sā esā kasi amatapphalā hoti. Amataṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, nibbānānisaṃsā
atk-s0505a:549_6: hotīti attho. Sā kho panesā kasi na mamevekassa amatapphalā hoti, apica, kho, pana
atk-s0505a:549_7: yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā etaṃ kasiṃ
atk-s0505a:549_8: kasati, so sabbopi etaṃ kasiṃ kasitvāna, sabbadukkhā pamuccati, sabbasmā vaṭṭadukkhadukkhadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhavipariṇāmadukkhā
atk-s0505a:549_9: pamuccatīti. Evaṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena nibbānapariyosānaṃ katvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:550_0: Tato brāhmaṇo gambhīratthaṃ desanaṃ sutvā “mama kasiphalaṃ bhuñjitvā aparajju eva
atk-s0505a:550_1: chāto hoti, imassa pana kasi amatapphalā, tassā phalaṃ bhuñjitvā sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti
atk-s0505a:550_2: ca viditvā pasanno pasannākāraṃ kātuṃ pāyāsaṃ dātumāraddho. Tenāha “atha kho kasibhāradvājo”ti.
atk-s0505a:550_3: Tattha mahatiyāti mahatiyanti attho. Kaṃsapātiyāti suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ, satasahassagghanake
atk-s0505a:550_4: attano suvaṇṇathāle. Vaḍḍhetvāti chupitvā, ākiritvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhagavato upanāmesīti
atk-s0505a:550_5: sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi vicitraṃ katvā, dukūlavitānena paṭicchādetvā, ukkhipitvā, sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0505a:550_6: tathāgatassa abhihari. Kinti? “Bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamo pāyāsaṃ, kassako bhava”nti.
atk-s0505a:550_7: Tato kassakabhāvasādhakaṃ kāraṇamāha “yañhi…pe… kasatī”ti, yasmā bhavaṃ…pe… kasatīti
atk-s0505a:550_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha bhagavā “gāthābhigītaṃ me”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:551_0: 81. Tattha gāthābhigītanti gāthāhi abhigītaṃ, gāthāyo bhāsitvā laddhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:551_1: Meti mayā. Abhojaneyyanti bhuñjanārahaṃ na hoti. Sampassatanti sammā ājīvasuddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:551_2: passataṃ, samantā vā passataṃ sampassataṃ, buddhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nesa dhammoti
atk-s0505a:551_3: “gāthābhigītaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti esa dhammo etaṃ cārittaṃ na hoti, tasmā gāthābhigītaṃ
atk-s0505a:551_4: panudanti buddhā paṭikkhipanti na bhuñjantīti. Kiṃ pana bhagavatā pāyāsatthaṃ gāthā
atk-s0505a:551_5: abhigītā, yena evamāhāti? Na etadatthaṃ abhigītā, apica, kho, pana pāto paṭṭhāya
atk-s0505a:551_6: khettasamīpe ṭhatvā kaṭacchubhikkhampi alabhitvā puna sakalabuddhaguṇe pakāsetvā
atk-s0505a:551_7: laddhaṃ tadetaṃ naṭanaccakādīhi naccitvā gāyitvā ca laddhasadisaṃ hoti, tena “gāthābhigīta”nti
atk-s0505a:551_8: vuttaṃ. Tādisañca yasmā buddhānaṃ na kappati, tasmā “abhojaneyya”nti vuttaṃ. Appicchatānurūpañcetaṃ
atk-s0505a:551_9: na hoti, tasmāpi pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānena ca evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yatra ca nāma parappakāsitenāpi
atk-s0505a:551_10: attano guṇena uppannaṃ lābhaṃ paṭikkhipanti seyyathāpi appiccho ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro,
atk-s0505a:551_11: tatra kathaṃ koṭippattāya appicchatāya samannāgato bhagavā attanāva attano guṇappakāsanena
atk-s0505a:551_12: uppannaṃ lābhaṃ sādiyissati, yato yuttameva etaṃ bhagavato vattunti.
atk-s0505a:552_0: Ettāvatā “appasannaṃ adātukāmaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāthāgāyanena dātukāmaṃ katvā, samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0505a:552_1: bhojanaṃ paṭiggahesi, āmisakāraṇā imassa desanā”ti imamhā lokāpavādā attānaṃ mocento
atk-s0505a:552_2: desanāpārisuddhiṃ dīpetvā, idāni ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dīpento āha “dhamme satī brāhmaṇa
atk-s0505a:552_3: vuttiresā”ti tassattho – ājīvapārisuddhidhamme vā dasavidhasucaritadhamme vā buddhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:552_4: cārittadhamme vā sati saṃvijjamāne anupahate vattamāne vuttiresā ekantavodātā ākāse
atk-s0505a:552_5: pāṇippasāraṇakappā esanā pariyesanā jīvitavutti buddhānaṃ brāhmaṇāti.
atk-s0505a:553_0: 82. Evaṃ vutte brāhmaṇo “pāyāsaṃ me paṭikkhipati, akappiyaṃ kiretaṃ bhojanaṃ, adhañño
atk-s0505a:553_1: vatasmiṃ, dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhāmī”ti domanassaṃ uppādetvā “appeva nāma aññaṃ paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti
atk-s0505a:553_2: ca cintesi. Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā “ahaṃ bhikkhācāravelaṃ paricchinditvā āgato – ‘ettakena
atk-s0505a:553_3: kālena imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pasādessāmī’ti, brāhmaṇo ca domanassaṃ akāsi. Idāni tena domanassena
atk-s0505a:553_4: mayi cittaṃ pakopetvā amatavaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkhissatī”ti brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:553_5: pasādajananatthaṃ tena patthitamanorathaṃ pūrento āha “aññena ca kevalina”nti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:553_6: kevalinanti sabbaguṇaparipuṇṇaṃ, sabbayogavisaṃyuttaṃ vāti attho. Mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:553_7: guṇānaṃ esanato mahesiṃ. Parikkhīṇasabbāsavattā khīṇāsavaṃ. Hatthapādakukkuccamādiṃ
atk-s0505a:553_8: katvā vūpasantasabbakukkuccattā kukkuccavūpasantaṃ. Upaṭṭhahassūti parivisassu paṭimānayassu.
atk-s0505a:553_9: Evaṃ brāhmaṇena citte uppāditepi pariyāyameva bhaṇati, na tu bhaṇati “dehi, āharāhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:554_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “ayaṃ pāyāso bhagavato ānīto nāhaṃ arahāmi taṃ attano chandena kassaci
atk-s0505a:554_1: dātu”nti cintetvā āha “atha kassa cāha”nti. Tato bhagavā “taṃ pāyāsaṃ ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ
atk-s0505a:554_2: tathāgatasāvakañca aññassa ajīraṇadhammo”ti ñatvā āha – “na khvāhaṃ ta”nti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:554_4: sabrahmakavacanena rūpāvacarabrahmaggahaṇaṃ arūpāvacarā pana bhuñjeyyunti asambhāvaneyyā.
atk-s0505a:554_7: Evamettha tīhi vacanehi okāsaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:554_8: Esa saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana āḷavakasutte vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:555_0: Kasmā pana sadevakādīsu kassaci na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyyāti? Oḷārike sukhumojāpakkhipanato.
atk-s0505a:555_1: Imasmiñhi pāyāse bhagavantaṃ uddissa gahitamatteyeva devatāhi ojā pakkhittā yathā
atk-s0505a:555_2: sujātāya pāyāse, cundassa ca sūkaramaddave paccamāne, verañjāyañca bhagavatā gahitagahitālope,
atk-s0505a:555_3: bhesajjakkhandhake ca kaccānassa guḷhakumbhasmiṃ avasiṭṭhaguḷhe. So oḷārike sukhumojāpakkhipanato
atk-s0505a:555_4: devānaṃ na pariṇamati. Devā hi sukhumasarīrā, tesaṃ oḷāriko manussāhāro na sammā
atk-s0505a:555_5: pariṇamati. Manussānampi na pariṇamati. Manussā hi oḷārikasarīrā, tesaṃ sukhumā dibbojā
atk-s0505a:555_6: na sammā pariṇamati. Tathāgatassa pana pakatiaggināva pariṇamati, sammā jīrati. Kāyabalañāṇabalappabhāvenāti
atk-s0505a:555_7: eke tathāgatasāvakassa khīṇāsavassetaṃ samādhibalena mattaññutāya ca pariṇamati,
atk-s0505a:555_8: itaresaṃ iddhimantānampi na pariṇamati. Acintanīyaṃ vā ettha kāraṇaṃ, buddhavisayo esoti.
atk-s0505a:556_0: Tena hi tvanti yasmā aññaṃ na passāmi, mama na kappati, mama akappantaṃ sāvakassāpi
atk-s0505a:556_1: me na kappati, tasmā tvaṃ brāhmaṇāti vuttaṃ hoti. Appahariteti parittaharitatiṇe,
atk-s0505a:556_2: apparuḷharitatiṇe vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhisadise. Appāṇaketi nippāṇake, pāyāsajjhottharaṇakāraṇena
atk-s0505a:556_3: maritabbapāṇarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe. Saha tiṇanissitehi pāṇehi tiṇānaṃ pāṇakānañca
atk-s0505a:556_4: anurakkhaṇatthāya etaṃ vuttaṃ. Cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyatīti evaṃ saddaṃ karoti. Saṃdhūpāyatīti
atk-s0505a:556_5: samantā dhūpāyati. Sampadhūpāyatīti tatheva adhimattaṃ dhūpāyati. Kasmā evaṃ ahosīti?
atk-s0505a:556_6: Bhagavato ānubhāvena, na udakassa, na pāyāsassa, na brāhmaṇassa, na aññesaṃ devayakkhādīnaṃ.
atk-s0505a:556_7: Bhagavā hi brāhmaṇassa dhammasaṃvegatthaṃ tathā adhiṭṭhāsi. Seyyathāpi nāmāti opammanidassanamattametaṃ,
atk-s0505a:556_8: yathā phāloti ettakameva vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃviggo cittena, lomahaṭṭhajāto sarīrena.
atk-s0505a:556_9: Sarīre kirassa navanavutilomakūpasahassāni suvaṇṇabhittiyā āhatamaṇināgadantā viya
atk-s0505a:557_0: Pādesu pana nipatitvā bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
atk-s0505a:557_1: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā”ti. Abbhanumodane hi ayamidha abhikkanta
atk-s0505a:557_2: saddo. Vitthārato panassa maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā āvi bhavissati. Yasmā
atk-s0505a:557_3: ca abbhanumodanatthe, tasmā sādhu sādhu bho gotamāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:559: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
atk-s0505a:560: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Atha vā abhikkantanti abhikantaṃ atiiṭṭhaṃ, atimanāpaṃ, atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:561_0: Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ. Ayañhi ettha
atk-s0505a:561_1: adhippāyo – abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṃ
atk-s0505a:561_2: yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti. Bhagavato eva vā vacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:561_3: dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi – bhoto gotamassa vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato,
atk-s0505a:561_4: abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhājananato, paññājananato, sātthato, sabyañjanato,
atk-s0505a:561_5: uttānapadato, gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṃsanato, aparavambhanato,
atk-s0505a:562_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:562_1: heṭṭhā mukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti uparimukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādicchāditaṃ.
atk-s0505a:562_2: Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0505a:563_0: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā – yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:563_1: asaddhammapatitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya; evaṃ
atk-s0505a:563_2: kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0505a:563_3: vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggapaṭipannassa
atk-s0505a:563_4: me saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāranimuggassa
atk-s0505a:563_6: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi desitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
atk-s0505a:564_0: Atha vā ekacciyena mattena yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dukkhadassanena asubhe “subha”nti vipallāsappahānena
atk-s0505a:564_3: ca mūḷhassa maggācikkhaṇasadiso, maggadassanena anattani “attā”ti vipallāsappahānena
atk-s0505a:564_4: ca andhakāre pajjotasadiso, tasmā seyyathāpi nāma nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya…pe… pajjotaṃ
atk-s0505a:564_5: dhāreyya “cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī”ti, evaṃ pakāsito hoti.
atk-s0505a:565_0: Yasmā panettha saddhātapakāyaguttatādīhi sīlakkhandho pakāsito hoti, paññāya paññākkhandho,
atk-s0505a:565_1: hirimanādīhi samādhikkhandho, yogakkhemena nirodhoti evaṃ tikkhandho ariyamaggo nirodho
atk-s0505a:565_2: cāti sarūpeneva dve ariyasaccāni pakāsitāni. Tattha maggo paṭipakkho samudayassa,
atk-s0505a:565_3: nirodho dukkhassāti paṭipakkhena dve. Iti iminā pariyāyena cattāri saccāni pakāsitāni.
atk-s0505a:566_0: Esāhantiādīsu eso ahanti esāhaṃ. Saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti pādesu nipatitvā paṇipātena saraṇagamanena
atk-s0505a:566_1: gatopi idāni vācāya samādiyanto āha. Atha vā paṇipātena buddhaṃyeva saraṇaṃ gatoti
atk-s0505a:566_2: idāni taṃ ādiṃ katvā sese dhammasaṅghepi gantuṃ āha. Ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:566_3: ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho, da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇehi
atk-s0505a:566_4: upetaṃ pāṇupetaṃ, yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ, anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi
atk-s0505a:566_5: saraṇaṃ gataṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātūti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā anena sutānurūpā
atk-s0505a:566_6: paṭipatti dassitā hoti. Nikkujjitādīhi vā satthusampattiṃ dassetvā iminā “esāha”ntiādinā
atk-s0505a:566_7: sissasampatti dassitā. Tena vā paññāpaṭilābhaṃ dassetvā iminā saddhāpaṭilābho dassito.
atk-s0505a:566_8: Idāni evaṃ paṭiladdhasaddhena paññavatā yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ kattukāmo bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:566_10: cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito, kimaṅgaṃ panāha”nti saddhāya pabbajjaṃ yācati,
atk-s0505a:566_11: tattha paripūrakāritaṃ patthento paññāya upasampadaṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:567_0: Eko vūpakaṭṭhotiādīsu pana eko kāyavivekena, vūpakaṭṭho cittavivekena, appamatto
atk-s0505a:567_1: kammaṭṭhāne satiavijahanena, ātāpī kāyikacetasikavīriyasaṅkhātena ātāpena, pahitatto
atk-s0505a:567_2: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya viharanto aññatarairiyāpathavihārena. Na cirassevāti
atk-s0505a:567_3: pabbajjaṃ upādāya vuccati. Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā, jātikulaputtā, ācārakulaputtā
atk-s0505a:567_4: ca. Ayaṃ pana ubhayathāpi kulaputto. Agārasmāti gharā. Agārānaṃ hitaṃ agāriyaṃ kasigorakkhādikuṭumbaposanakammaṃ
atk-s0505a:567_5: vuccati. Natthi ettha agāriyanti anagāriyaṃ, pabbajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ pabbajantīti
atk-s0505a:567_6: upagacchanti upasaṅkamanti. Tadanuttaranti taṃ anuttaraṃ. Brahmacariyapariyosānanti
atk-s0505a:567_7: maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, arahattaphalanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa hi atthāya
atk-s0505a:567_8: kulaputtā pabbajanti. Diṭṭheva dhammeti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti
atk-s0505a:567_9: attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā, aparappaccayaṃ ñatvāti attho. Upasampajja vihāsīti
atk-s0505a:567_10: pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vā vihāsi. Evaṃ viharanto ca khīṇā jāti…pe… abbhaññāsi. Etenassa
atk-s0505a:568_0: Katamā panassa jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ abbhaññāsīti? Vuccate – na tāvassa atītā
atk-s0505a:568_1: jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā, na anāgatā anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā vijjamānattā.
atk-s0505a:568_2: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā
atk-s0505a:568_3: jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā. Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0505a:568_4: pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ apaṭisandhikaṃ
atk-s0505a:569_0: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti
atk-s0505a:569_1: maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena
atk-s0505a:569_2: soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya
atk-s0505a:569_3: evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanā natthīti. Atha vā itthattāyāti
atk-s0505a:569_4: itthabhāvato, imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ
atk-s0505a:569_5: natthi. Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlako rukkho viyāti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0505a:569_6: Aññataroti eko. Arahatanti arahantānaṃ. Mahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro āyasmā bhāradvājo
atk-s0505a:573_0: 83. Pucchāmi muniṃ pahūtapaññanti cundasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Saṅkhepato tāva attajjhāsayaparajjhāsayaaṭṭhuppattipucchāvasikabhedato
atk-s0505a:573_1: catūsu uppattīsu imassa suttassa pucchāvasikā uppatti. Vitthārato pana ekaṃ samayaṃ
atk-s0505a:573_2: bhagavā mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena pāvā tadavasari.
atk-s0505a:573_3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane. Ito pabhuti
atk-s0505a:573_4: yāva “atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0505a:573_5: yena cundassa kammāraputtassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane
atk-s0505a:574_0: Evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ nisinne bhagavati cundo kammāraputto buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:574_2: upanāmesi. Apaññatte sikkhāpade keci bhikkhū suvaṇṇabhājanāni paṭicchiṃsu keci na
atk-s0505a:574_3: paṭicchiṃsu. Bhagavato pana ekameva bhājanaṃ attano selamayaṃ pattaṃ, dutiyabhājanaṃ
atk-s0505a:574_4: buddhā na gaṇhanti. Tattha aññataro pāpabhikkhu sahassagghanakaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ
atk-s0505a:574_5: attano bhojanatthāya sampattaṃ theyyacittena kuñcikatthavikāya pakkhipi. Cundo parivisitvā
atk-s0505a:574_6: hatthapādaṃ dhovitvā bhagavantaṃ namassamāno bhikkhusaṅghaṃ olokento taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0505a:574_7: addasa, disvā ca pana apassamāno viya hutvā na naṃ kiñci abhaṇi bhagavati theresu
atk-s0505a:574_8: ca gāravena, apica “micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vacanapatho mā ahosī”ti. So “kiṃ nu kho saṃvarayuttāyeva
atk-s0505a:574_9: samaṇā, udāhu bhinnasaṃvarā īdisāpi samaṇā”ti ñātukāmo sāyanhasamaye bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:575_0: Tattha pucchāmīti idaṃ “tisso pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā”tiādinā nayena niddese
atk-s0505a:575_1: vuttanayameva. Muninti etampi “monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ. Yā paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi,
atk-s0505a:575_2: tena ñāṇena samannāgato muni, monappattoti, tīṇi moneyyāni kāyamoneyya”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:575_3: tattheva vuttanayameva. Ayampanettha saṅkhepo. Pucchāmīti okāsaṃ kārento muninti
atk-s0505a:575_4: munimuniṃ bhagavantaṃ ālapati. Pahūtapaññantiādīni thutivacanāni, tehi taṃ muniṃ
atk-s0505a:575_5: thunāti. Tattha pahūtapaññanti vipulapaññaṃ. Ñeyyapariyantikattā cassa vipulatā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:575_6: Iti cundo kammāraputtoti idaṃ dvayaṃ dhaniyasutte vuttanayameva. Ito paraṃ pana ettakampi
atk-s0505a:575_7: avatvā sabbaṃ vuttanayaṃ chaḍḍetvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:576_0: Buddhanti tīsu buddhesu tatiyabuddhaṃ. Dhammassāminti maggadhammassa janakattā puttasseva
atk-s0505a:576_1: pitaraṃ attanā uppāditasippāyatanādīnaṃ viya ca ācariyaṃ dhammassa sāmiṃ, dhammissaraṃ
atk-s0505a:577_0: “So hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā,
atk-s0505a:577_1: anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido. Maggānugā ca pana
atk-s0505a:578_0: Vītataṇhanti vigatakāmabhavavibhavataṇhaṃ. Dvipaduttamanti dvipadānaṃ uttamaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0505a:578_1: kiñcāpi bhagavā na kevalaṃ dvipaduttamo eva, atha kho yāvatā sattā apadā vā dvipadā
atk-s0505a:578_2: vā…pe… nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ uttamo. Atha kho ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-s0505a:578_3: dvipaduttamotveva vuccati. Dvipadā hi sabbasattānaṃ ukkaṭṭhā cakkavattimahāsāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:578_4: tattha uppattito, tesañca uttamoti vutte sabbasattuttamoti vuttoyeva hoti. Sārathīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:578_5: pavaranti sāretīti sārathi, hatthidamakādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tesañca bhagavā pavaro
atk-s0505a:578_6: anuttarena damanena purisadamme dametuṃ samatthabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:579_0: “Hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃ eva disaṃ dhāvati puratthimaṃ
atk-s0505a:579_1: vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā. Assadamakena, bhikkhave, assadammo…pe… godamakena,
atk-s0505a:579_2: bhikkhave, godammo…pe… dakkhiṇaṃ vā. Tathāgatena hi, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0505a:579_3: purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati, rūpī rūpāni passati, ayamekā disā…pe… saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ
atk-s0505a:580: Katīti atthappabhedapucchā. Loketi sattaloke. Samaṇāti pucchitabbaatthanidassanaṃ. Iṅghāti yācanatthe nipāto. Tadiṅghāti te iṅgha. Brūhīti ācikkha kathayassūti.
atk-s0505a:581_0: 84. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā cundaṃ kammāraputtaṃ “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusala”ntiādinā
atk-s0505a:581_1: nayena gihipañhaṃ apucchitvā samaṇapañhaṃ pucchantaṃ disvā āvajjento “taṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0505a:581_2: sandhāya ayaṃ pucchatī”ti ñatvā tassa aññatra vohāramattā assamaṇabhāvaṃ dīpento
atk-s0505a:581_3: āha “caturo samaṇā”ti. Tattha caturoti saṅkhyāparicchedo. Samaṇāti kadāci bhagavā
atk-s0505a:581_4: titthiye samaṇavādena vadati; yathāha – “yāni tāni puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vatakotūhalamaṅgalānī”ti.
atk-s0505a:581_5: Kadāci puthujjane; yathāha – “samaṇā samaṇāti kho, bhikkhave, jano sañjānātī”ti.
atk-s0505a:581_6: Kadāci sekkhe; yathāha – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti. Kadāci
atk-s0505a:581_7: khīṇāsave; yathāha – “āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti. Kadāci attānaṃyeva; yathāha
atk-s0505a:581_8: – “samaṇoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Idha pana tīhi padehi
atk-s0505a:581_9: sabbepi ariye sīlavantaṃ puthujjanañca, catutthena itaraṃ assamaṇampi bhaṇḍuṃ kāsāvakaṇṭhaṃ
atk-s0505a:581_10: kevalaṃ vohāramattakena samaṇoti saṅgaṇhitvā “caturo samaṇā”ti āha. Na pañcamatthīti
atk-s0505a:581_11: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vohāramattakena paṭiññāmattakenāpi pañcamo samaṇo nāma natthi.
atk-s0505a:582_0: Te te āvikaromīti te caturo samaṇe tava pākaṭe karomi. Sakkhipuṭṭhoti sammukhā pucchito.
atk-s0505a:582_1: Maggajinoti maggena sabbakilese vijitāvīti attho. Maggadesakoti paresaṃ maggaṃ desetā.
atk-s0505a:582_2: Magge jīvatīti sattasu sekkhesu yo koci sekkho apariyositamaggavāsattā lokuttare,
atk-s0505a:582_3: sīlavantaputhujjano ca lokiye magge jīvati nāma, sīlavantaputhujjano vā lokuttaramagganimittaṃ
atk-s0505a:582_4: jīvanatopi magge jīvatīti veditabbo. Yo ca maggadūsīti yo ca dussīlo micchādiṭṭhi
atk-s0505a:583_0: 85. “Ime te caturo samaṇā”ti evaṃ bhagavatā saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhe caturo samaṇe “ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:583_1: nāmettha maggajino, ayaṃ maggadesako, ayaṃ magge jīvati, ayaṃ maggadūsī”ti evaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0505a:583_2: asakkonto puna pucchituṃ cundo āha “kaṃ maggajina”nti. Tattha magge jīvati meti yo
atk-s0505a:583_3: so magge jīvati, taṃ me brūhi puṭṭhoti. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:584_0: 86. Idānissa bhagavā caturopi samaṇe catūhi gāthāhi niddisanto āha “yo tiṇṇakathaṃkatho
atk-s0505a:584_1: visallo”ti. Tattha tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visalloti etaṃ uragasutte vuttanayameva. Ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:584_2: pana viseso. Yasmā imāya gāthāya maggajinoti buddhasamaṇo adhippeto, tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0505a:584_4: veditabbo. Pubbe vuttanayena hi tiṇṇakathaṃkathāpi sotāpannādayo paccekabuddhapariyosānā
atk-s0505a:584_6: atiṇṇakathaṃkathāva honti. Bhagavā pana sabbappakārena tiṇṇakathaṃkathoti. Nibbānābhiratoti
atk-s0505a:584_7: nibbāne abhirato, phalasamāpattivasena sadā nibbānaninnacittoti attho. Tādiso ca bhagavā. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:585: “So kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassā eva kathāya pariyosāne, tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi, sannisādemi, ekodiṃ karomi, samādahāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:586_0: Anānugiddhoti kañci dhammaṃ taṇhāgedhena ananugijjhanto. Lokassa sadevakassa netāti
atk-s0505a:586_1: āsayānusayānulomena dhammaṃ desetvā pārāyanamahāsamayādīsu anekesu suttantesu aparimāṇānaṃ
atk-s0505a:586_2: devamanussānaṃ saccapaṭivedhasampādanena sadevakassa lokassa netā, gamayitā, tāretā,
atk-s0505a:586_3: pāraṃ sampāpetāti attho. Tādinti tādisaṃ yathāvuttappakāralokadhammehi nibbikāranti
atk-s0505a:587_0: 87. Evaṃ bhagavā imāya gāthāya “maggajina”nti buddhasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni khīṇāsavasamaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:587_1: niddisanto āha “paramaṃ paramantī”ti. Tattha paramaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ, sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0505a:587_2: aggaṃ uttamanti attho. Paramanti yodha ñatvāti taṃ paramaṃ paramamicceva yo idha
atk-s0505a:587_3: sāsane ñatvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena. Akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhammanti nibbānadhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:587_4: akkhāti, attanā paṭividdhattā paresaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti “idaṃ nibbāna”nti, maggadhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:587_5: vibhajati “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. Ubhayampi vā ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:587_6: saṅkhepadesanāya ācikkhati, vipañcitaññūnaṃ vitthāradesanāya vibhajati. Evaṃ ācikkhanto
atk-s0505a:587_7: vibhajanto ca “idheva sāsane ayaṃ dhammo, na ito bahiddhā”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto akkhāti
atk-s0505a:587_8: ca vibhajati ca. Tena vuttaṃ “akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhamma”nti. Taṃ kaṅkhachidaṃ
atk-s0505a:587_9: muniṃ anejanti taṃ evarūpaṃ catusaccapaṭivedhena attano, desanāya ca paresaṃ kaṅkhacchedanena
atk-s0505a:587_10: kaṅkhacchidaṃ, moneyyasamannāgamena muniṃ, ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvato anejaṃ
atk-s0505a:588_0: 88. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya sayaṃ anuttaraṃ maggaṃ uppādetvā desanāya anuttaro maggadesī
atk-s0505a:588_1: samānopi dūtamiva lekhavācakamiva ca rañño attano sāsanaharaṃ sāsanajotakañca “maggadesi”nti
atk-s0505a:588_2: khīṇāsavasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni sekkhasamaṇañca sīlavantaputhujjanasamaṇañca niddisanto
atk-s0505a:588_3: āha “yo dhammapade”ti. Tattha padavaṇṇanā pākaṭāyeva. Ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā
atk-s0505a:588_4: – yo nibbānadhammassa padattā dhammapade, ubho ante anupagamma desitattā āsayānurūpato
atk-s0505a:588_5: vā satipaṭṭhānādinānappakārehi desitattā sudesite, maggasamaṅgīpi anavasitamaggakiccattā
atk-s0505a:588_6: magge jīvati, sīlasaṃyamena saññato, kāyādīsu sūpaṭṭhitāya cirakatādisaraṇāya vā
atk-s0505a:588_7: satiyā satimā, aṇumattassāpi vajjassa abhāvato anavajjattā, koṭṭhāsabhāvena ca padattā
atk-s0505a:588_9: sevamāno, taṃ bhikkhunaṃ tatiyaṃ maggajīvinti āhūti.
atk-s0505a:589_0: 89. Evaṃ bhagavā imāya gāthāya “maggajīvi”nti sekkhasamaṇaṃ sīlavantaputhujjanasamaṇañca
atk-s0505a:589_1: niddisitvā idāni taṃ bhaṇḍuṃ kāsāvakaṇṭhaṃ kevalaṃ vohāramattasamaṇaṃ niddisanto
atk-s0505a:589_2: āha “chadanaṃ katvānā”ti. Tattha chadanaṃ katvānāti patirūpaṃ karitvā, vesaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0505a:589_3: liṅgaṃ dhāretvāti attho. Subbatānanti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ. Tesañhi sundarāni
atk-s0505a:589_4: vatāni, tasmā te subbatāti vuccanti. Pakkhandīti pakkhandako, anto pavisakoti attho.
atk-s0505a:589_5: Dussīlo hi gūthapaṭicchādanatthaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādicchadanaṃ viya attano dussīlabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:589_6: paṭicchādanatthaṃ subbatānaṃ chadanaṃ katvā “ahampi bhikkhū”ti bhikkhumajjhe pakkhandati,
atk-s0505a:589_7: “ettakavassena bhikkhunā gahetabbaṃ eta”nti lābhe dīyamāne “ahaṃ ettakavasso”ti gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0505a:589_8: pakkhandati, tena vuccati “chadanaṃ katvāna subbatānaṃ pakkhandī”ti. Catunnampi khattiyādikulānaṃ
atk-s0505a:589_9: uppannaṃ pasādaṃ ananurūpapaṭipattiyā dūsetīti kuladūsako. Pagabbhoti aṭṭhaṭṭhānena
atk-s0505a:589_10: kāyapāgabbhiyena, catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena, anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca
atk-s0505a:589_11: samannāgatoti attho. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana mettasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma.
atk-s0505a:590_0: Katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya samannāgatattā māyāvī. Sīlasaṃyamābhāvena asaññato.
atk-s0505a:590_1: Palāpasadisattā palāpo. Yathā hi palāpo anto taṇḍularahitopi bahi thusena vīhi viya
atk-s0505a:590_2: dissati, evamidhekacco anto sīlādiguṇasāravirahitopi bahi subbatacchadanena samaṇavesena
atk-s0505a:590_3: samaṇo viya dissati. So evaṃ palāpasadisattā “palāpo”ti vuccati. Ānāpānassatisutte
atk-s0505a:590_4: pana “apalāpāyaṃ, bhikkhave, parisā, nippalāpāyaṃ, bhikkhave, parisā, suddhā sāre
atk-s0505a:590_5: patiṭṭhitā”ti evaṃ puthujjanakalyāṇopi “palāpo”ti vutto. Idha pana kapilasutte ca
atk-s0505a:590_6: “tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe samaṇamānine”ti evaṃ parājitako “palāpo”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:590_7: Patirūpena caraṃ samaggadūsīti taṃ subbatānaṃ chadanaṃ katvā yathā carantaṃ “āraññiko
atk-s0505a:590_8: ayaṃ rukkhamūliko, paṃsukūliko, piṇḍapātiko, appiccho, santuṭṭho”ti jano jānāti,
atk-s0505a:590_9: evaṃ patirūpena yuttarūpena bāhiramaṭṭhena ācārena caranto puggalo attano lokuttaramaggassa,
atk-s0505a:591_0: 90. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya “maggadūsī”ti dussīlaṃ vohāramattakasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni
atk-s0505a:591_1: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ abyāmissībhāvaṃ dīpento āha “ete ca paṭivijjhī”ti. Tassattho – ete
atk-s0505a:591_2: caturo samaṇe yathāvuttena lakkhaṇena paṭivijjhi aññāsi sacchākāsi yo gahaṭṭho khattiyo
atk-s0505a:591_3: vā brāhmaṇo vā añño vā koci, imesaṃ catunnaṃ samaṇānaṃ lakkhaṇassavanamattena sutavā,
atk-s0505a:591_4: tasseva lakkhaṇassa ariyānaṃ santike sutattā ariyasāvako, teyeva samaṇe “ayañca ayañca
atk-s0505a:591_5: evaṃlakkhaṇo”ti pajānanamattena sappañño, yādiso ayaṃ pacchā vutto maggadūsī, itarepi
atk-s0505a:591_6: sabbe netādisāti ñatvā iti disvā evaṃ pāpaṃ karontampi etaṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ disvā. Tatthāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:591_7: yojanā – ete ca paṭivijjhi yo gahaṭṭho sutavā ariyasāvako sappañño, tassa tāya paññāya
atk-s0505a:591_8: sabbe “netādisā”ti ñatvā viharato iti disvā na hāpeti saddhā, evaṃ pāpakammaṃ karontaṃ
atk-s0505a:591_9: pāpabhikkhuṃ disvāpi na hāpeti, na hāyati, na nassati saddhāti.
atk-s0505a:592_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tesaṃ abyāmissībhāvaṃ dīpetvā idāni iti disvāpi “sabbe netādisā”ti
atk-s0505a:592_1: jānantaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ pasaṃsanto āha “kathañhi duṭṭhenā”ti. Tassa sambandho – etadeva
atk-s0505a:592_2: ca yuttaṃ sutavato ariyasāvakassa, yadidaṃ ekaccaṃ pāpaṃ karontaṃ iti disvāpi sabbe
atk-s0505a:592_3: “netādisā”ti jānanaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Kathañhi duṭṭhena asampaduṭṭhaṃ, suddhaṃ asuddhena
atk-s0505a:592_4: samaṃ kareyyāti? Tassattho – kathañhi sutavā ariyasāvako sappañño, sīlavipattiyā
atk-s0505a:592_5: duṭṭhena maggadūsinā aduṭṭhaṃ itaraṃ samaṇattayaṃ, suddhaṃ samaṇattayamevaṃ aparisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi
atk-s0505a:592_6: asuddhena pacchimena vohāramattakasamaṇena samaṃ kareyya sadisanti jāneyyāti. Suttapariyosāne
atk-s0505a:592_7: upāsakassa maggo vā phalaṃ vā na kathitaṃ. Kaṅkhāmattameva hi tassa pahīnanti.
atk-s0505a:596_0: Evaṃ me sutanti parābhavasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Maṅgalasuttaṃ kira sutvā devānaṃ etadahosi
atk-s0505a:596_1: – “bhagavatā maṅgalasutte sattānaṃ vuḍḍhiñca sotthiñca kathayamānena ekaṃsena bhavo
atk-s0505a:596_2: eva kathito, no parābhavo. Handa dāni yena sattā parihāyanti vinassanti, taṃ nesaṃ
atk-s0505a:596_3: parābhavampi pucchāmā”ti. Atha maṅgalasuttaṃ kathitadivasato dutiyadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:596_4: devatāyo parābhavasuttaṃ sotukāmā imasmiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā ekavālaggakoṭiokāsamatte
atk-s0505a:596_5: dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi saṭṭhipi sattatipi asītipi sukhumattabhāve
atk-s0505a:596_6: nimminitvā sabbadevamārabrahmāno siriyā ca tejena ca adhigayha virocamānaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0505a:596_7: nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tato sakkena devānamindena āṇatto aññataro
atk-s0505a:596_8: devaputto bhagavantaṃ parābhavapañhaṃ pucchi. Atha bhagavā pucchāvasena imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:597_0: Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādi āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ. “Parābhavantaṃ purisa”ntiādinā
atk-s0505a:597_1: nayena ekantarikā gāthā devaputtena vuttā, “suvijāno bhavaṃ hotī”tiādinā nayena ekantarikā
atk-s0505a:597_2: eva avasānagāthā ca bhagavatā vuttā, tadetaṃ sabbampi samodhānetvā “parābhavasutta”nti
atk-s0505a:597_3: vuccati. Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma.
atk-s0505a:598_0: 91. Parābhavantaṃ purisantiādīsu pana parābhavantanti parihāyantaṃ vinassantaṃ. Purisanti
atk-s0505a:598_1: yaṃkiñci sattaṃ jantuṃ. Mayaṃ pucchāma gotamāti sesadevehi saddhiṃ attānaṃ nidassetvā
atk-s0505a:598_2: okāsaṃ kārento so devaputto gottena bhagavantaṃ ālapati. Bhavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgammāti
atk-s0505a:598_3: mayañhi bhavantaṃ pucchissāmāti tato tato cakkavāḷā āgatāti attho. Etena ādaraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:598_4: Kiṃ parābhavato mukhanti evaṃ āgatānaṃ amhākaṃ brūhi parābhavato purisassa kiṃ mukhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:598_5: kiṃ dvāraṃ, kā yoni, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena mayaṃ parābhavantaṃ purisaṃ jāneyyāmāti attho.
atk-s0505a:598_6: Etena “parābhavantaṃ purisa”nti ettha vuttassa parābhavato purisassa parābhavakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:598_7: pucchati. Parābhavakāraṇe hi ñāte tena kāraṇasāmaññena sakkā yo koci parābhavapuriso jānitunti.
atk-s0505a:599_0: 92. Athassa bhagavā suṭṭhu pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:599_1: desanāya parābhavamukhaṃ dīpento āha “suvijāno bhava”nti. Tassattho – yvāyaṃ bhavaṃ
atk-s0505a:599_2: vaḍḍhanto aparihāyanto puriso, so suvijāno hoti, sukhena akasirena akicchena sakkā
atk-s0505a:599_3: vijānituṃ. Yopāyaṃ parābhavatīti parābhavo, parihāyati vinassati, yassa tumhe parābhavato
atk-s0505a:599_4: purisassa mukhaṃ maṃ pucchatha, sopi suvijāno. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti
atk-s0505a:599_5: dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ kāmeti, piheti, pattheti, suṇāti, paṭipajjati, so taṃ
atk-s0505a:599_6: paṭipattiṃ disvā sutvā ca jānitabbato suvijāno hoti. Itaropi dhammadessī parābhavo,
atk-s0505a:599_7: tameva dhammaṃ dessati, na kāmeti, na piheti, na pattheti, na suṇāti, na paṭipajjati,
atk-s0505a:599_8: so taṃ vippaṭipattiṃ disvā sutvā ca jānitabbato suvijāno hotīti. Evamettha bhagavā
atk-s0505a:599_9: paṭipakkhaṃ dassento atthato dhammakāmataṃ bhavato mukhaṃ dassetvā dhammadessitaṃ
atk-s0505a:600_0: 93. Atha sā devatā bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamānā āha “iti heta”nti. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:600_1: – iti hi yathā vutto bhagavatā, tatheva etaṃ vijānāma, gaṇhāma, dhārema, paṭhamo
atk-s0505a:600_2: so parābhavo so dhammadessitālakkhaṇo paṭhamo parābhavo. Yāni mayaṃ parābhavamukhāni
atk-s0505a:600_3: vijānituṃ āgatamhā, tesu idaṃ tāva ekaṃ parābhavamukhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha viggaho,
atk-s0505a:600_4: parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kena ca parābhavanti? Yaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:600_5: tena. Byañjanamattena eva hi ettha nānākaraṇaṃ, atthato pana parābhavoti vā parābhavato
atk-s0505a:600_6: mukhanti vā nānākaraṇaṃ natthi. Evamekaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ vijānāmāti abhinanditvā
atk-s0505a:600_7: tato paraṃ ñātukāmatāyāha “dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukha”nti. Ito
atk-s0505a:600_8: parañca tatiyaṃ catutthantiādīsupi imināva nayenattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:601_0: 94. Byākaraṇapakkhepi ca yasmā te te sattā tehi tehi parābhavamukhehi samannāgatā,
atk-s0505a:601_1: na ekoyeva sabbehi, na ca sabbe ekeneva, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ tāni tāni parābhavamukhāni
atk-s0505a:601_2: dassetuṃ “asantassa piyā hontī”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva desanāya nānāvidhāni
atk-s0505a:602_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā – asanto nāma cha satthāro, ye vā panaññepi avūpasantena
atk-s0505a:602_1: kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatā, te asanto assapiyā honti sunakkhattādīnaṃ acelakakorakhattiyādayo
atk-s0505a:602_2: viya. Santo nāma buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā. Ye vā panaññepi vūpasantena kāyavacīmanokammena
atk-s0505a:602_3: samannāgatā, te sante na kurute piyaṃ, attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na kuruteti
atk-s0505a:602_4: attho. Veneyyavasena hettha vacanabhedo katoti veditabbo. Atha vā sante na kuruteti
atk-s0505a:602_5: sante na sevatīti attho, yathā “rājānaṃ sevatī”ti etasmiñhi atthe rājānaṃ piyaṃ kuruteti
atk-s0505a:602_6: saddavidū mantenti. Piyanti piyamāno, tussamāno, modamānoti attho. Asataṃ dhammo
atk-s0505a:602_7: nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni, dasākusalakammapathā vā. Taṃ asataṃ dhammaṃ roceti,
atk-s0505a:602_8: piheti, pattheti, sevati. Evametāya gāthāya asantapiyatā, santaappiyatā, asaddhammarocanañcāti
atk-s0505a:602_9: tividhaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena hi samannāgato puriso parābhavati parihāyati,
atk-s0505a:602_10: neva idha na huraṃ vuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā “parābhavato mukha”nti vuccati. Vitthāraṃ
atk-s0505a:602_11: panettha “asevanā ca bālānaṃ, paṇḍitānañca sevanā”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma.
atk-s0505a:603_0: 96. Niddāsīlī nāma yo gacchantopi, nisīdantopi, tiṭṭhantopi, sayānopi niddāyatiyeva.
atk-s0505a:603_1: Sabhāsīlī nāma saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ, bhassārāmatamanuyutto. Anuṭṭhātāti vīriyatejavirahito
atk-s0505a:603_2: uṭṭhānasīlo na hoti, aññehi codiyamāno gahaṭṭho vā samāno gahaṭṭhakammaṃ, pabbajito
atk-s0505a:603_3: vā pabbajitakammaṃ ārabhati. Alasoti jātialaso, accantābhibhūto thinena ṭhitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0505a:603_4: ṭhito eva hoti, nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinno eva hoti, attano ussāhena aññaṃ iriyāpathaṃ
atk-s0505a:603_5: na kappeti. Atīte araññe aggimhi uṭṭhite apalāyanaalasā cettha nidassanaṃ. Ayamettha
atk-s0505a:603_6: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo, tato lāmakaparicchedenāpi pana alaso alasotveva veditabbo. Dhajova
atk-s0505a:603_7: rathassa, dhūmova aggino, kodho paññāṇamassāti kodhapaññāṇo. Dosacarito khippakopī
atk-s0505a:603_8: arukūpamacitto puggalo evarūpo hoti. Imāya gāthāya niddāsīlatā, sabhāsīlatā, anuṭṭhānatā,
atk-s0505a:603_9: alasatā, kodhapaññāṇatāti pañcavidhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena hi samannāgato
atk-s0505a:603_10: neva gahaṭṭho gahaṭṭhavuḍḍhiṃ, na pabbajito pabbajitavuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇāti, aññadatthu
atk-s0505a:604_0: 98. Mātāti janikā veditabbā. Pitāti janakoyeva. Jiṇṇakaṃ sarīrasithilatāya. Gatayobbanaṃ
atk-s0505a:604_1: yobbanātikkamena āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā sayaṃ kammāni kātumasamatthaṃ. Pahu santoti
atk-s0505a:604_2: samattho samāno sukhaṃ jīvamāno. Na bharatīti na poseti. Imāya gāthāya mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:604_3: abharaṇaṃ, aposanaṃ, anupaṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena hi samannāgato yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0505a:606: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:607_0: Mātāpitubharaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ na pāpuṇāti, aññadatthu “mātāpitaropi na bharati,
atk-s0505a:607_1: kaṃ aññaṃ bharissatī”ti nindañca vajjanīyatañca duggatiñca pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:608_0: 100. Pāpānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇaṃ, samitattā samaṇaṃ. Brāhmaṇakulappabhavampi vā brāhmaṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:608_1: pabbajjupagataṃ samaṇaṃ, tato aññaṃ vāpi yaṃkiñci yācanakaṃ. Musāvādena vañcetīti
atk-s0505a:608_2: “vada, bhante, paccayenā”ti pavāretvā yācito vā paṭijānitvā pacchā appadānena tassa
atk-s0505a:608_3: taṃ āsaṃ visaṃvādeti. Imāya gāthāya brāhmaṇādīnaṃ musāvādena vañcanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:608_4: vuttaṃ. Etena hi samannāgato idha nindaṃ, samparāye duggatiṃ sugatiyampi adhippāyavipattiñca
atk-s0505a:611: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi catūhi? Musāvādī hotī”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:613_0: “Idha, sāriputta, ekacco samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti, ‘vada, bhante,
atk-s0505a:613_1: paccayenā’ti, so yena pavāreti, taṃ na deti. So ce tato cuto itthattaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:613_2: So yaṃ yadeva vaṇijjaṃ payojeti, sāssa hoti chedagāminī. Idha pana sāriputta…pe…
atk-s0505a:613_3: so yena pavāreti, na taṃ yathādhippāyaṃ deti. So ce tato cuto itthattaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:613_4: So yaṃ yadeva vaṇijjaṃ payojeti, sāssa na hoti yathādhippāyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:614: Evamimāni nindādīni pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tasmā “parābhavato mukha”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:615_1: anekasūpabyañjanabhojanasampanno. Eko bhuñjati sādūnīti sādūni bhojanāni attano puttānampi
atk-s0505a:615_2: adatvā paṭicchannokāse bhuñjatīti eko bhuñjati sādūni. Imāya gāthāya bhojanagiddhatāya
atk-s0505a:615_3: bhojanamacchariyaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena hi samannāgato nindaṃ vajjanīyaṃ
atk-s0505a:615_4: duggatinti evamādīni pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tasmā “parābhavato mukha”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:615_5: Vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ suttānusārena yojetabbaṃ, ativitthārabhayena pana idāni yojanānayaṃ
atk-s0505a:616_0: 104. Jātitthaddho nāma yo “ahaṃ jātisampanno”ti mānaṃ janetvā tena thaddho vātapūritabhastā
atk-s0505a:616_1: viya uddhumāto hutvā na kassaci onamati. Esa nayo dhanagottatthaddhesu. Saññātiṃ
atk-s0505a:616_2: atimaññetīti attano ñātimpi jātiyā atimaññati sakyā viya viṭaṭūbhaṃ. Dhanenāpi ca
atk-s0505a:616_3: “kapaṇo ayaṃ daliddo”ti atimaññati, sāmīcimattampi na karoti, tassa te ñātayo parābhavameva
atk-s0505a:616_4: icchanti. Imāya gāthāya vatthuto catubbidhaṃ, lakkhaṇato ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:617_0: 106. Itthidhuttoti itthīsu sāratto, yaṃkiñci atthi, taṃ sabbampi datvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0505a:617_1: itthiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā sabbampi attano santakaṃ nikkhipitvā surāpānapayutto surādhutto.
atk-s0505a:617_2: Nivatthasāṭakampi nikkhipitvā jūtakīḷanamanuyutto akkhadhutto. Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi
atk-s0505a:617_3: yaṃkiñcipi laddhaṃ hoti, tassa vināsanato laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vināsetīti veditabbo. Evaṃvidho
atk-s0505a:617_4: parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya tividhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:618_0: 108. Sehi dārehīti attano dārehi. Yo attano dārehi asantuṭṭho hutvā vesiyāsu padussati,
atk-s0505a:618_1: tathā paradāresu, so yasmā vesīnaṃ dhanappadānena paradārasevanena ca rājadaṇḍādīhi
atk-s0505a:618_2: parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya duvidhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:619_0: 110. Atītayobbanoti yobbanamaticca āsītiko vā nāvutiko vā hutvā āneti pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0505a:619_1: Timbarutthaninti timbaruphalasadisatthaniṃ taruṇadārikaṃ. Tassā issā na supatīti
atk-s0505a:619_2: “daharāya mahallakena saddhiṃ rati ca saṃvāso ca amanāpo, mā heva kho taruṇaṃ pattheyyā”ti
atk-s0505a:619_3: issāya taṃ rakkhanto na supati. So yasmā kāmarāgena ca issāya ca ḍayhanto bahiddhā
atk-s0505a:619_4: kammante ca appayojento parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya imaṃ issāya asupanaṃ
atk-s0505a:620_0: 112. Soṇḍinti macchamaṃsādīsu lolaṃ gedhajātikaṃ. Vikiraṇinti tesaṃ atthāya dhanaṃ
atk-s0505a:620_1: paṃsukaṃ viya vikiritvā nāsanasīlaṃ. Purisaṃ vāpi tādisanti puriso vāpi yo evarūpo
atk-s0505a:620_2: hoti, taṃ yo issariyasmiṃ ṭhapeti, lañchanamuddikādīni datvā gharāvāse kammante vā
atk-s0505a:620_3: vaṇijjādivohāresu vā tadeva vāvaṭaṃ kāreti. So yasmā tassa dosena dhanakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanto
atk-s0505a:620_4: parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya tathāvidhassa issariyasmiṃ ṭhapanaṃ ekaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:621_0: 114. Appabhogo nāma sannicitānañca bhogānaṃ āyamukhassa ca abhāvato. Mahātaṇhoti
atk-s0505a:621_1: mahatiyā bhogataṇhāya samannāgato, yaṃ laddhaṃ, tena asantuṭṭho. Khattiye jāyate
atk-s0505a:621_2: kuleti khattiyānaṃ kule jāyati. So ca rajjaṃ patthayatīti so etāya mahātaṇhatāya
atk-s0505a:621_3: anupāyena uppaṭipāṭiyā attano dāyajjabhūtaṃ alabbhaneyyaṃ vā parasantakaṃ rajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:621_4: pattheti, so evaṃ patthento yasmā tampi appakaṃ bhogaṃ yodhājīvādīnaṃ datvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:621_5: apāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya rajjapatthanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:622_0: 115. Ito paraṃ yadi sā devatā “terasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi…pe… satasahassimaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0505a:622_1: brūhī”ti puccheyya, tampi bhagavā katheyya. Yasmā pana sā devatā “kiṃ imehi pucchitehi,
atk-s0505a:622_2: ekamettha vuḍḍhikaraṃ natthī”ti tāni parābhavamukhāni asuyyamānā ettakampi pucchitvā
atk-s0505a:622_3: vippaṭisārī hutvā tuṇhī ahosi, tasmā bhagavā tassāsayaṃ viditvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpento
atk-s0505a:623_0: Tattha paṇḍitoti parivīmaṃsāya samannāgato. Samavekkhiyāti paññācakkhunā upaparikkhitvā.
atk-s0505a:623_1: Ariyoti na maggena, na phalena, apica kho, pana etasmiṃ parābhavasaṅkhāte anaye na
atk-s0505a:623_2: iriyatīti ariyo. Yena dassanena yāya paññāya parābhave disvā vivajjeti, tena sampannattā
atk-s0505a:623_3: dassanasampanno. Sa lokaṃ bhajate sivanti so evarūpo sivaṃ khemamuttamamanupaddavaṃ
atk-s0505a:623_4: devalokaṃ bhajati, allīyati, upagacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Desanāpariyosāne parābhavamukhāni
atk-s0505a:623_5: sutvā uppannasaṃvegānurūpaṃ yoniso padahitvā sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalāni pattā
atk-s0505a:631_0: Evaṃ me sutanti aggikabhāradvājasuttaṃ, “vasalasutta”ntipi vuccati. Kā uppatti? Bhagavā
atk-s0505a:631_1: sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayena
atk-s0505a:631_2: pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento aggikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:631_3: saraṇasikkhāpadānaṃ upanissayasampannaṃ disvā “tattha mayi gate kathā pavattissati,
atk-s0505a:631_4: tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo saraṇaṃ gantvā sikkhāpadāni samādiyissatī”ti
atk-s0505a:631_5: ñatvā, tattha gantvā, pavattāya kathāya brāhmaṇena dhammadesanaṃ yācito imaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0505a:631_6: abhāsi. Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādiṃ maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vaṇṇayissāma, “atha kho
atk-s0505a:632_0: Tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassāti yaṃ yaṃ avuttapubbaṃ, taṃ tadeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:632_1: Seyyathidaṃ – so hi brāhmaṇo aggiṃ juhati paricaratīti katvā aggikoti nāmena pākaṭo
atk-s0505a:632_2: ahosi, bhāradvājoti gottena. Tasmā vuttaṃ “aggikabhāradvājassā”ti. Nivesaneti ghare.
atk-s0505a:632_3: Tassa kira brāhmaṇassa nivesanadvāre antaravīthiyaṃ aggihutasālā ahosi. Tato “nivesanadvāre”ti
atk-s0505a:632_4: vattabbe tassapi padesassa nivesaneyeva pariyāpannattā “nivesane”ti vuttaṃ. Samīpatthe
atk-s0505a:632_5: vā bhummavacanaṃ, nivesanasamīpeti attho. Aggi pajjalito hotīti aggiyādhāne ṭhito
atk-s0505a:632_6: aggi katabbhuddharaṇo samidhāpakkhepaṃ bījanavātañca labhitvā jalito uddhaṃ samuggataccisamākulo
atk-s0505a:632_7: hoti. Āhuti paggahitāti sasīsaṃ nhāyitvā mahatā sakkārena pāyāsasappimadhuphāṇitādīni
atk-s0505a:632_8: abhisaṅkhatāni hontīti attho. Yañhi kiñci aggimhi juhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ “āhutī”ti
atk-s0505a:632_9: vuccati. Sapadānanti anugharaṃ. Bhagavā hi sabbajanānuggahatthāya āhārasantuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0505a:632_10: ca uccanīcakulaṃ avokkamma piṇḍāya carati. Tena vuttaṃ “sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno”ti.
atk-s0505a:633_0: Atha kimatthaṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ samantapāsādikaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:633_1: cittaṃ nappasīdati? Kasmā ca evaṃ pharusena vacanena bhagavantaṃ samudācaratīti?
atk-s0505a:633_2: Vuccate – ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo “maṅgalakiccesu samaṇadassanaṃ avamaṅgala”nti evaṃdiṭṭhiko,
atk-s0505a:633_3: tato “mahābrahmuno bhuñjanavelāya kāḷakaṇṇī muṇḍakasamaṇako mama nivesanaṃ upasaṅkamatī”ti
atk-s0505a:633_4: mantvā cittaṃ nappasādesi, aññadatthu dosavasaṃyeva agamāsi. Atha kuddho anattamano
atk-s0505a:633_5: anattamanavācaṃ nicchāresi “tatreva muṇḍakā”tiādi. Tatrāpi ca yasmā “muṇḍo asuddho
atk-s0505a:633_6: hotī”ti brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi, tasmā “ayaṃ asuddho, tena devabrāhmaṇapūjako na hotī”ti
atk-s0505a:633_7: jigucchanto “muṇḍakā”ti āha. Muṇḍakattā vā ucchiṭṭho esa, na imaṃ padesaṃ arahati
atk-s0505a:633_8: āgacchitunti samaṇo hutvāpi īdisaṃ kāyakilesaṃ na vaṇṇetīti ca samaṇabhāvaṃ jigucchanto
atk-s0505a:633_9: “samaṇakā”ti āha. Na kevalaṃ dosavaseneva, vasale vā pabbājetvā tehi saddhiṃ ekato
atk-s0505a:633_10: sambhogaparibhogakaraṇena patito ayaṃ vasalatopi pāpataroti jigucchanto “vasalakā”ti
atk-s0505a:633_11: āha – “vasalajātikānaṃ vā āhutidassanamattasavanena pāpaṃ hotī”ti maññamānopi evamāha.
atk-s0505a:634_0: Bhagavā tathā vuttopi vippasanneneva mukhavaṇṇena madhurena sarena brāhmaṇassa upari
atk-s0505a:634_1: anukampāsītalena cittena attano sabbasattehi asādhāraṇatādibhāvaṃ pakāsento āha “jānāsi
atk-s0505a:634_2: pana, tvaṃ brāhmaṇā”ti. Atha brāhmaṇo bhagavato mukhappasādasūcitaṃ tādibhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0505a:634_3: anukampāsītalena cittena nicchāritaṃ madhurassaraṃ sutvā amateneva abhisittahadayo
atk-s0505a:634_4: attamano vippasannindriyo nihatamāno hutvā taṃ jātisabhāvaṃ visauggirasadisaṃ samudācāravacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:634_5: pahāya “nūna yamahaṃ hīnajaccaṃ vasalanti paccemi, na so paramatthato vasalo, na
atk-s0505a:634_6: ca hīnajaccatā eva vasalakaraṇo dhammo”ti maññamāno “na khvāhaṃ, bho gotamā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:634_7: Dhammatā hesā, yaṃ hetusampanno paccayālābhena pharusopi samāno laddhamatte paccaye muduko hotīti.
atk-s0505a:635_1: “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane. “Sādhu,
atk-s0505a:635_2: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
atk-s0505a:638: Ādīsu sundare. “Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”tiādīsu daḷhīkamme. Idha pana āyācane.
atk-s0505a:639_0: Tena hīti tassādhippāyanidassanaṃ, sace ñātukāmosīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāraṇavacanaṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:639_1: tassa yasmā ñātukāmosi, tasmā, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi, tathā te
atk-s0505a:639_2: bhāsissāmi, yathā tvaṃ jānissasīti evaṃ parapadehi saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo. Tatra
atk-s0505a:639_3: ca suṇāhīti sotindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ, sādhukaṃ manasi karohīti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena
atk-s0505a:639_5: atthavipallāsaggāhavāraṇaṃ. Purimena ca dhammassavane niyojeti, pacchimena sutānaṃ
atk-s0505a:639_6: dhammānaṃ dhāraṇatthūpaparikkhādīsu. Purimena ca “sabyañjano ayaṃ dhammo, tasmā savanīyo”ti
atk-s0505a:639_7: dīpeti, pacchimena “sāttho, tasmā manasi kātabbo”ti. Sādhukapadaṃ vā ubhayapadehi
atk-s0505a:639_8: yojetvā “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ca desanāgambhīro ca, tasmā suṇāhi sādhukaṃ.
atk-s0505a:639_9: Yasmā atthagambhīro paṭivedhagambhīro ca, tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti etamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:640_0: Tato “evaṃ gambhīre kathamahaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhissāmī”ti visīdantamiva taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:640_1: samussāhento āha – “bhāsissāmī”ti. Tattha “yathā tvaṃ ñassasi, tathā parimaṇḍalehi
atk-s0505a:640_2: padabyañjanehi uttānena nayena bhāsissāmī”ti evamadhippāyo veditabbo. Tato ussāhajāto
atk-s0505a:640_3: hutvā “evaṃ bho”ti kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi, sampaṭicchi
atk-s0505a:640_4: paṭiggahesīti vuttaṃ hoti, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ vā paṭipajjanena abhimukho assosīti. Athassa
atk-s0505a:640_5: “bhagavā etadavocā”ti idāni vattabbaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “kodhano upanāhī”ti evamādikaṃ.
atk-s0505a:641_0: 116. Tattha kodhanoti kujjhanasīlo. Upanāhīti tasseva kodhassa daḷhīkammena upanāhena
atk-s0505a:641_1: samannāgato. Paresaṃ guṇe makkheti puñchatīti makkhī, pāpo ca so makkhī cāti pāpamakkhī.
atk-s0505a:641_2: Vipannadiṭṭhīti vinaṭṭhasammādiṭṭhi, vipannāya vā virūpaṃ gatāya dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0505a:641_3: samannāgato. Māyāvīti attani vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya samannāgato.
atk-s0505a:641_4: Taṃ jaññā vasalo itīti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ etesaṃ hīnadhammānaṃ vassanato siñcanato
atk-s0505a:641_5: anvāssavanato “vasalo”ti jāneyyāti, etehi sabbehi brāhmaṇamatthake jāto. Ayañhi paramatthato
atk-s0505a:641_6: vasalo eva, attano hadayatuṭṭhimattaṃ, na paranti. Evamettha bhagavā ādipadeneva
atk-s0505a:641_7: tassa brāhmaṇassa kodhaniggahaṃ katvā “kodhādidhammo hīnapuggalo”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:641_8: ca desanāya kodhādidhamme desento ekena tāva pariyāyena vasalañca vasalakaraṇe ca
atk-s0505a:641_9: dhamme desesi. Evaṃ desento ca “tvaṃ aha”nti paravambhanaṃ attukkaṃsanañca akatvā
atk-s0505a:641_10: dhammeneva samena ñāyena taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vasalabhāve, attānañca brāhmaṇabhāve ṭhapesi.
atk-s0505a:642_0: 117. Idāni yāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi “kadāci pāṇātipātaadinnādānādīni karontopi brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:642_1: evā”ti. Taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭisedhento, ye ca sattavihiṃsādīsu akusaladhammesu tehi tehi
atk-s0505a:642_2: samannāgatā ādīnavaṃ apassantā te dhamme uppādenti, tesaṃ “hīnā ete dhammā vasalakaraṇā”ti
atk-s0505a:642_3: tattha ādīnavañca dassento aparehipi pariyāyehi vasalañca vasalakaraṇe ca dhamme
atk-s0505a:642_4: desetuṃ “ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vā”ti evamādigāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:643_0: Tattha ekajoti ṭhapetvā aṇḍajaṃ avasesayonijo. So hi ekadā eva jāyati. Dvijoti aṇḍajo.
atk-s0505a:643_1: So hi mātukucchito aṇḍakosato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyati. Taṃ ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vāpi.
atk-s0505a:643_2: Yodha pāṇanti yo idha sattaṃ. Vihiṃsatīti kāyadvārikacetanāsamuṭṭhitena vā vacīdvārikacetanāsamuṭṭhitena
atk-s0505a:643_3: vā payogena jīvitā voropeti. “Pāṇāni hiṃsatī”tipi pāṭho. Tattha ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ
atk-s0505a:643_4: vāti evaṃpabhedāni yodha pāṇāni hiṃsatīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Yassa pāṇe dayā
atk-s0505a:643_5: natthīti etena manasā anukampāya abhāvaṃ āha. Sesamettha vuttanayameva. Ito parāsu
atk-s0505a:643_6: ca gāthāsu, yato ettakampi avatvā ito paraṃ uttānatthāni padāni pariharantā avaṇṇitapadavaṇṇanāmattameva karissāma.
atk-s0505a:644_0: 118. Hantīti hanati vināseti. Parirundhatīti senāya parivāretvā tiṭṭhati. Gāmāni
atk-s0505a:644_1: nigamāni cāti ettha ca-saddena nagarānītipi vattabbaṃ. Niggāhako samaññātoti iminā
atk-s0505a:645_0: 119. Gāme vā yadi vāraññeti gāmopi nigamopi nagarampi sabbova idha gāmo saddhiṃ upacārena,
atk-s0505a:645_1: taṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ araññaṃ. Tasmiṃ gāme vā yadi vāraññe yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ, yaṃ
atk-s0505a:645_2: parasattānaṃ pariggahitamapariccattaṃ satto vā saṅkhāro vā. Theyyā adinnamādetīti
atk-s0505a:645_3: tehi adinnaṃ ananuññātaṃ theyyacittena ādiyati, yena kenaci payogena yena kenaci
atk-s0505a:646_0: 120. Iṇamādāyāti attano santakaṃ kiñci nikkhipitvā nikkhepaggahaṇena vā, kiñci anikkhipitvā
atk-s0505a:646_1: “ettakena kālena ettakaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ dassāmī”ti vaḍḍhiggahaṇena vā, “yaṃ ito udayaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0505a:646_2: taṃ mayhaṃ mūlaṃ taveva bhavissatī”ti vā “udayaṃ ubhinnampi sādhāraṇa”nti vā evaṃ
atk-s0505a:646_3: taṃtaṃāyogaggahaṇena vā iṇaṃ gahetvā. Cujjamāno palāyati na hi te iṇamatthīti tena
atk-s0505a:646_4: iṇāyikena “dehi me iṇa”nti codiyamāno “na hi te iṇamatthi, mayā gahitanti ko sakkhī”ti
atk-s0505a:647_0: 121. Kiñcikkhakamyatāti appamattakepi kismiñcideva icchāya. Panthasmiṃ vajantaṃ jananti
atk-s0505a:647_1: magge gacchantaṃ yaṃkiñci itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. Hantvā kiñcikkhamādetīti māretvā
atk-s0505a:648_0: 122. Attahetūti attano jīvitakāraṇā, tathā parahetu. Dhanahetūti sakadhanassa vā
atk-s0505a:648_1: paradhanassa vā kāraṇā. Ca-kāro sabbattha vikappanattho. Sakkhipuṭṭhoti yaṃ jānāsi,
atk-s0505a:648_2: taṃ vadehīti pucchito. Musā brūtīti jānanto vā “na jānāmī”ti ajānanto vā “jānāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:648_3: bhaṇati, sāmike asāmike, asāmike ca sāmike karoti.
atk-s0505a:649_0: 123. Ñātīnanti sambandhīnaṃ. Sakhīnanti vayassānaṃ dāresūti parapariggahitesu. Paṭidissatīti
atk-s0505a:649_1: paṭikūlena dissati, aticaranto dissatīti attho. Sāhasāti balakkārena anicchaṃ. Sampiyenāti
atk-s0505a:649_2: tehi tesaṃ dārehi patthiyamāno sayañca patthayamāno, ubhayasinehavasenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:650_0: 124. Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāti evaṃ mettāya padaṭṭhānabhūtampi, jiṇṇakaṃ gatayobbananti
atk-s0505a:650_1: evaṃ karuṇāya padaṭṭhānabhūtampi. Pahu santo na bharatīti atthasampanno upakaraṇasampanno hutvāpi na poseti.
atk-s0505a:651: 125. Sasunti sassuṃ. Hantīti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā aññena vā kenaci paharati. Rosetīti kodhamassa sañjaneti vācāya pharusavacanena.
atk-s0505a:652_0: 126. Atthanti sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikaparamatthesu yaṃkiñci. Pucchito santoti puṭṭho
atk-s0505a:652_1: samāno. Anatthamanusāsatīti tassa ahitameva ācikkhati. Paṭicchannena mantetīti atthaṃ
atk-s0505a:652_2: ācikkhantopi yathā so na jānāti, tathā apākaṭehi padabyañjanehi paṭicchannena vacanena
atk-s0505a:652_3: manteti, ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ vā katvā dīgharattaṃ vasāpetvā sāvasesameva manteti.
atk-s0505a:653_0: 127. Yo katvāti ettha mayā pubbabhāge pāpicchatā vuttā. Yā sā “idhekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ
atk-s0505a:653_1: caritvā, vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā, manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā, tassa paṭicchādanahetu
atk-s0505a:653_2: pāpikaṃ icchaṃ paṇidahati, mā maṃ jaññāti icchatī”ti evaṃ āgatā. Yathā aññe na jānanti,
atk-s0505a:653_3: tathā karaṇena katānañca avivaraṇena paṭicchannā assa kammantāti paṭicchannakammanto.
atk-s0505a:654: 128. Parakulanti ñātikulaṃ vā mittakulaṃ vā. Āgatanti yassa tena kule bhuttaṃ, taṃ attano gehamāgataṃ pānabhojanādīhi nappaṭipūjeti, na vā deti, avabhuttaṃ vā detīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:656_0: 130. Bhattakāle upaṭṭhiteti bhojanakāle jāte. Upaṭṭhitantipi pāṭho, bhattakāle āgatanti
atk-s0505a:656_1: attho. Roseti vācā na ca detīti “atthakāmo me ayaṃ balakkārena maṃ puññaṃ kārāpetuṃ
atk-s0505a:656_2: āgato”ti acintetvā appatirūpena pharusavacanena roseti, antamaso sammukhabhāvamattampi
atk-s0505a:656_3: cassa na deti, pageva bhojananti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:657_0: 131. Asataṃ yodha pabrūtīti yo idha yathā nimittāni dissanti “asukadivase idañcidañca
atk-s0505a:657_1: te bhavissatī”ti evaṃ asajjanānaṃ vacanaṃ pabrūti. “Asanta”ntipi pāṭho, abhūtanti
atk-s0505a:657_2: attho. Pabrūtīti bhaṇati “amukasmiṃ nāma gāme mayhaṃ īdiso gharavibhavo, ehi tattha
atk-s0505a:657_3: gacchāma, gharaṇī me bhavissasi, idañcidañca te dassāmī”ti parabhariyaṃ paradāsiṃ
atk-s0505a:657_4: vā vañcento dhutto viya. Nijigīsānoti nijigīsamāno maggamāno, taṃ vañcetvā yaṃkiñci
atk-s0505a:658_0: 132. Yo cattānanti yo ca attānaṃ. Samukkaṃseti jātiādīhi samukkaṃsati uccaṭṭhāne
atk-s0505a:658_1: ṭhapeti. Pare ca mavajānātīti tehiyeva pare avajānāti, nīcaṃ karoti. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro.
atk-s0505a:658_2: Nihīnoti guṇavuḍḍhito parihīno, adhamabhāvaṃ vā gato. Sena mānenāti tena ukkaṃsanāvajānanasaṅkhātena attano mānena.
atk-s0505a:659_0: 133. Rosakoti kāyavācāhi paresaṃ rosajanako. Kadariyoti thaddhamaccharī, yo pare
atk-s0505a:659_1: paresaṃ dente aññaṃ vā puññaṃ karonte vāreti, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pāpicchoti asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya
atk-s0505a:659_3: sāṭheyyena samannāgato, asammābhāsī vā akātukāmopi “karomī”tiādivacanena. Nāssa pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0505a:659_4: hirī, nāssa uttāsanato ubbegalakkhaṇaṃ ottappanti ahiriko anottappī.
atk-s0505a:660_2: vā tassa sāvakaṃ, gahaṭṭhaṃ vā paccayadāyakanti attho. Bāhirakaṃ vā paribbājakaṃ
atk-s0505a:660_3: yaṃkiñci gahaṭṭhaṃ vā abhūtena dosena paribhāsatīti evampettha atthaṃ icchanti porāṇā.
atk-s0505a:661_0: 135. Anarahaṃ santoti akhīṇāsavo samāno. Arahaṃ paṭijānātīti “ahaṃ arahā”ti paṭijānāti,
atk-s0505a:661_1: yathā naṃ “arahā aya”nti jānanti, tathā vācaṃ nicchāreti, kāyena parakkamati, cittena
atk-s0505a:661_2: icchati adhivāseti. Coroti theno. Sabrahmake loketi ukkaṭṭhavasena āha – sabbaloketi
atk-s0505a:661_4: paresaṃ dhanaṃ vilumpantā corāti vuccanti. Sāsane pana parisasampattiādīhi paccayādīni
atk-s0505a:662_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, mahācorā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame pañca? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:662_1: ekaccassa mahācorassa evaṃ hoti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ satena vā sahassena vā parivuto
atk-s0505a:662_2: gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍissāmi hananto, ghātento, chindanto, chedāpento, pacanto
atk-s0505a:662_3: pācentoti, so aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0505a:662_4: āhiṇḍati hananto…pe… pācento. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa pāpabhikkhuno
atk-s0505a:662_5: evaṃ hoti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ satena vā…pe… rājadhānīsu cārikaṃ carissāmi sakkato, garukato,
atk-s0505a:662_6: mānito, pūjito, apacito, gahaṭṭhānañceva pabbajitānañca lābhī cīvara…pe… parikkhārāna’nti.
atk-s0505a:662_7: So aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu cārikaṃ
atk-s0505a:662_8: carati sakkato…pe… parikkhārānaṃ. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo mahācoro santo saṃvijjamāno lokasmiṃ.
atk-s0505a:663: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahati, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo…pe… lokasmiṃ.
