atk-s0505a:664: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu suddhaṃ brahmacāriṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantaṃ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṃseti. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo…pe… lokasmiṃ.
atk-s0505a:665_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco, pāpabhikkhu yāni tāni saṅghassa garubhaṇḍāni
atk-s0505a:665_1: garuparikkhārāni, seyyathidaṃ – ārāmo, ārāmavatthu, vihāro, vihāravatthu, mañco,
atk-s0505a:665_2: pīṭhaṃ, bhisi, bimbohanaṃ, lohakumbhī, lohabhāṇakaṃ, lohavārako, lohakaṭāhaṃ, vāsi,
atk-s0505a:665_3: pharasu, kuṭhārī, kudālo, nikhādanaṃ, valli, veḷu, muñjaṃ, pabbajaṃ, tiṇaṃ, mattikā,
atk-s0505a:665_4: dārubhaṇḍaṃ, mattikābhaṇḍaṃ, tehi gihiṃ saṅgaṇhāti upalāpeti. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho…pe… lokasmiṃ.
atk-s0505a:666: “Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya ayaṃ aggo mahācoro, yo asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:667_0: Tattha lokiyacorā lokiyameva dhanadhaññādiṃ thenenti. Sāsane vuttacoresu paṭhamo
atk-s0505a:667_1: tathārūpameva cīvarādipaccayamattaṃ, dutiyo pariyattidhammaṃ, tatiyo parassa brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:667_3: lokiyañca cīvarādipaccayajātaṃ. Yathāha – “theyyāya vo, bhikkhave, raṭṭhapiṇḍo bhutto”ti.
atk-s0505a:667_4: Tattha yvāyaṃ pañcamo mahācoro, taṃ sandhāyāha bhagavā “coro sabrahmake loke”ti.
atk-s0505a:667_5: So hi “sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya ayaṃ aggo mahācoro, yo asantaṃ
atk-s0505a:667_6: abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī”ti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhanathenanato aggo
atk-s0505a:667_7: mahācoroti vutto, tasmā taṃ idhāpi “sabrahmake loke”ti iminā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pakāsesi.
atk-s0505a:668_0: Eso kho vasalādhamoti. Ettha khoti avadhāraṇattho, tena eso eva vasalādhamo. Vasalānaṃ
atk-s0505a:668_1: hīno sabbapacchimakoti avadhāreti. Kasmā? Visiṭṭhavatthumhi theyyadhammavassanato,
atk-s0505a:668_2: yāva taṃ paṭiññaṃ na vissajjeti, tāva avigatavasalakaraṇadhammato cāti.
atk-s0505a:669_0: Ete kho vasalāti. Idāni ye te paṭhamagāthāya āsayavipattivasena kodhanādayo pañca,
atk-s0505a:669_1: pāpamakkhiṃ vā dvidhā katvā cha, dutiyagāthāya payogavipattivasena pāṇahiṃsako eko,
atk-s0505a:669_2: tatiyāya payogavipattivaseneva gāmanigamaniggāhako eko, catutthāya theyyāvahāravasena
atk-s0505a:669_3: eko, pañcamāya iṇavañcanavasena eko, chaṭṭhāya pasayhāvahāravasena panthadūsako eko,
atk-s0505a:669_4: sattamāya kūṭasakkhivasena eko, aṭṭhamāya mittadubbhivasena eko, navamāya akataññuvasena
atk-s0505a:669_5: eko, dasamāya katanāsanavihesanavasena eko, ekādasamāya hadayavañcanavasena eko,
atk-s0505a:669_6: dvādasamāya paṭicchannakammantavasena dve, terasamāya akataññuvasena eko, cuddasamāya
atk-s0505a:669_7: vañcanavasena eko, pannarasamāya vihesanavasena eko, soḷasamāya vañcanavasena eko,
atk-s0505a:669_9: rosakādayo satta, ekūnavīsatimāya paribhāsanavasena dve, vīsatimāya aggamahācoravasena
atk-s0505a:669_10: ekoti evaṃ tettiṃsa catuttiṃsa vā vasalā vuttā. Te niddisanto āha “ete kho vasalā
atk-s0505a:669_11: vuttā, mayā ye te pakāsitā”ti. Tassattho – ye te mayā pubbe “jānāsi pana tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0505a:669_12: vasala”nti evaṃ saṅkhepato vasalā vuttā, te vitthārato ete kho pakāsitāti. Atha vā
atk-s0505a:669_13: ye te mayā puggalavasena vuttā, te dhammavasenāpi ete kho pakāsitā. Atha vā ete kho
atk-s0505a:669_14: vasalā vuttā ariyehi kammavasena, na jātivasena, mayā ye te pakāsitā “kodhano upanāhī”tiādinā nayena.
atk-s0505a:670_0: 136. Evaṃ bhagavā vasalaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā brāhmaṇo sakāya diṭṭhiyā atīva abhiniviṭṭho
atk-s0505a:670_1: hoti, tasmā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭisedhento āha “na jaccā vasalo hotī”ti. Tassattho – paramatthato
atk-s0505a:670_2: hi na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo, apica kho kammunā vasalo hoti, kammunā
atk-s0505a:670_3: hoti brāhmaṇo, aparisuddhakammavassanato vasalo hoti, parisuddhena kammunā aparisuddhavāhanato
atk-s0505a:670_4: brāhmaṇo hoti. Yasmā vā tumhe hīnaṃ vasalaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ maññittha, tasmā
atk-s0505a:670_5: hīnena kammunā vasalo hoti, ukkaṭṭhena kammunā brāhmaṇo hotīti evampi atthaṃ ñāpento evamāha.
atk-s0505a:671_0: 137-139. Idāni tamevatthaṃ nidassanena sādhetuṃ “tadamināpi jānāthā”tiādikā tisso
atk-s0505a:671_1: gāthāyo āha. Tāsu dve catuppādā, ekā chappādā, tāsaṃ attho – yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ “na
atk-s0505a:671_2: jaccā vasalo hotī”tiādi, tadamināpi jānātha, yathā medaṃ nidassanaṃ, taṃ imināpi
atk-s0505a:671_3: pakārena jānātha, yena me pakārena yena sāmaññena idaṃ nidassananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:671_4: Katamaṃ nidassananti ce? Caṇḍālaputto sopāko…pe… brahmalokūpapattiyāti.
atk-s0505a:672: Caṇḍālassa putto caṇḍālaputto. Attano khādanatthāya mate sunakhe labhitvā pacatīti sopāko. Mātaṅgoti evaṃnāmo vissutoti evaṃ hīnāya jātiyā ca jīvikāya ca nāmena ca pākaṭo.
atk-s0505a:673_0: Soti purimapadena sambandhitvā so mātaṅgo yasaṃ paramaṃ patto, abbhutaṃ uttamaṃ ativisiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0505a:673_1: yasaṃ kittiṃ pasaṃsaṃ patto. Yaṃ sudullabhanti yaṃ uḷārakulūpapannenāpi dullabhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:673_2: hīnakulūpapannena sudullabhaṃ. Evaṃ yasappattassa ca āgacchuṃ tassupaṭṭhānaṃ, khattiyā
atk-s0505a:673_3: brāhmaṇā bahū, tassa mātaṅgassa pāricariyatthaṃ khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca aññe ca bahū
atk-s0505a:673_4: vessasuddādayo jambudīpamanussā yebhuyyena upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0505a:674_0: Evaṃ upaṭṭhānasampanno so mātaṅgo vigatakilesarajattā virajaṃ, mahantehi buddhādīhi
atk-s0505a:674_1: paṭipannattā mahāpathaṃ, brahmalokasaṅkhātaṃ devalokaṃ yāpetuṃ samatthattā devalokayānasaññitaṃ
atk-s0505a:674_2: aṭṭhasamāpattiyānaṃ abhiruyha, tāya paṭipattiyā kāmarāgaṃ virājetvā, kāyassa bhedā
atk-s0505a:674_3: brahmalokūpago ahu, sā tathā hīnāpi na naṃ jāti nivāresi brahmalokūpapattiyā, brahmalokūpapattitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:675_0: Ayaṃ panattho evaṃ veditabbo – atīte kira mahāpuriso tena tenupāyena sattahitaṃ karonto
atk-s0505a:675_1: sopākajīvike caṇḍālakule uppajji. So nāmena mātaṅgo, rūpena duddasiko hutvā bahinagare
atk-s0505a:675_2: cammakuṭikāya vasati, antonagare bhikkhaṃ caritvā jīvikaṃ kappeti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0505a:675_3: tasmiṃ nagare surānakkhatte ghosite dhuttā yathāsakena parivārena kīḷanti. Aññatarāpi
atk-s0505a:675_4: brāhmaṇamahāsāladhītā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā devakaññā viya rūpena dassanīyā
atk-s0505a:675_6: sakaṭesu āropetvā sabbasetavaḷavayuttaṃ yānamāruyha mahāparivārena uyyānabhūmiṃ gacchati
atk-s0505a:675_7: diṭṭhamaṅgalikāti nāmena. Sā kira “dussaṇṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ avamaṅgala”nti daṭṭhuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0505a:676_0: Tadā so mātaṅgo kālasseva vuṭṭhāya paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā, kaṃsatāḷaṃ hatthe bandhitvā,
atk-s0505a:676_1: bhājanahattho nagaraṃ pavisati, manusse disvā dūrato eva kaṃsatāḷaṃ ākoṭento. Atha
atk-s0505a:676_2: diṭṭhamaṅgalikā “ussaratha, ussarathā”ti purato purato hīnajanaṃ apanentehi purisehi
atk-s0505a:676_3: nīyamānā nagaradvāramajjhe mātaṅgaṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha. Ahaṃ mātaṅgacaṇḍāloti.
atk-s0505a:676_4: Sā “īdisaṃ disvā gatānaṃ kuto vuḍḍhī”ti yānaṃ nivattāpesi. Manussā “yaṃ mayaṃ uyyānaṃ
atk-s0505a:676_5: gantvā khajjabhojjādiṃ labheyyāma, tassa no mātaṅgena antarāyo kato”ti kupitā “gaṇhatha
atk-s0505a:676_6: caṇḍāla”nti leḍḍūhi paharitvā “mato”ti pāde gahetvā ekamante chaḍḍetvā kacavarena
atk-s0505a:676_7: paṭicchādetvā agamaṃsu. So satiṃ paṭilabhitvā uṭṭhāya manusse pucchi – “kiṃ, ayyā,
atk-s0505a:676_8: dvāraṃ nāma sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, udāhu brāhmaṇānaṃyeva kata”nti? Manussā āhaṃsu – “sabbesaṃ
atk-s0505a:676_9: sādhāraṇa”nti. “Evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā bhikkhāhārena yāpentaṃ maṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya
atk-s0505a:676_10: manussā imaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpesu”nti rathikāya rathikaṃ āhiṇḍanto manussānaṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0505a:676_11: brāhmaṇassa gharadvāre nipajji – “diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:677_0: Brāhmaṇo “gharadvāre mātaṅgo nipanno”ti sutvā “tassa kākaṇikaṃ detha, telena aṅgaṃ
atk-s0505a:677_1: makkhetvā gacchatū”ti āha. So taṃ na icchati, “diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmi”cceva
atk-s0505a:677_2: āha. Tato brāhmaṇo “dve kākaṇikāyo detha, kākaṇikāya pūvaṃ khādatu, kākaṇikāya telena
atk-s0505a:677_3: aṅgaṃ makkhetvā gacchatū”ti āha. So taṃ na icchati, tatheva vadati. Brāhmaṇo sutvā
atk-s0505a:677_4: “māsakaṃ detha, pādaṃ, upaḍḍhakahāpaṇaṃ, kahāpaṇaṃ dve tīṇī”ti yāva sataṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0505a:677_5: So na icchati, tatheva vadati. Evaṃ yācantānaṃyeva sūriyo atthaṅgato. Atha brāhmaṇī
atk-s0505a:677_6: pāsādā oruyha sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāci – “tāta mātaṅga,
atk-s0505a:677_7: diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya aparādhaṃ khama, sahassaṃ gaṇhāhi, dve tīṇī”ti yāva “satasahassaṃ
atk-s0505a:678_0: Evaṃ catūhapañcāhe vītivatte bahumpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ alabhantā
atk-s0505a:678_1: khattiyakumārādayo mātaṅgassa upakaṇṇake ārocāpesuṃ – “purisā nāma anekānipi saṃvaccharāni
atk-s0505a:678_2: vīriyaṃ katvā icchitatthaṃ pāpuṇanti, mā kho tvaṃ nibbijji, addhā dvīhatīhaccayena
atk-s0505a:678_3: diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ lacchasī”ti. So tuṇhībhūto nipajjiyeva. Atha sattame divase samantā
atk-s0505a:678_4: paṭivissakā uṭṭhahitvā “tumhe mātaṅgaṃ vā uṭṭhāpetha, dārikaṃ vā detha, mā amhe sabbe
atk-s0505a:678_5: nāsayitthā”ti āhaṃsu. Tesaṃ kira ayaṃ diṭṭhi “yassa gharadvāre evaṃ nipanno caṇḍālo
atk-s0505a:678_6: marati, tassa gharena saha samantā sattasattagharavāsino caṇḍālā hontī”ti. Tato diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ
atk-s0505a:678_7: nīlapaṭapilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā uḷuṅkakaḷopikādīni datvā paridevamānaṃ tassa santikaṃ
atk-s0505a:678_8: netvā “gaṇha dārikaṃ, uṭṭhāya gacchāhī”ti adaṃsu. Sā passe ṭhatvā “uṭṭhāhī”ti āha,
atk-s0505a:678_9: so “hatthena maṃ gahetvā uṭṭhāpehī”ti āha. Sā naṃ uṭṭhāpesi. So nisīditvā āha – “mayaṃ
atk-s0505a:678_10: antonagare vasituṃ na labhāma, ehi maṃ bahinagare cammakuṭiṃ nehī”ti. Sā naṃ hatthe
atk-s0505a:678_11: gahetvā tattha nesi. “Piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā”ti jātakabhāṇakā. Netvā cassa sarīraṃ telena
atk-s0505a:678_12: makkhetvā, uṇhodakena nhāpetvā, yāguṃ pacitvā adāsi. So “brāhmaṇakaññā ayaṃ mā vinassī”ti
atk-s0505a:678_13: jātisambhedaṃ akatvāva aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ balaṃ gahetvā “ahaṃ vanaṃ gacchāmi, ‘aticirāyatī’ti
atk-s0505a:678_14: mā tvaṃ ukkaṇṭhī”ti vatvā gharamānusakāni ca “imaṃ mā pamajjitthā”ti āṇāpetvā gharā
atk-s0505a:678_15: nikkhamma tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā, kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā, katipāheneva aṭṭha
atk-s0505a:678_16: samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvā “idānāhaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya manāpo bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:678_17: ākāsenāgantvā nagaradvāre orohitvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0505a:679_0: Sā sutvā “koci maññe mama ñātako pabbajito maṃ dukkhitaṃ ñatvā daṭṭhuṃ āgato bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0505a:679_1: cintayamānā gantvā, taṃ ñatvā, pādesu nipatitvā “kissa maṃ anāthaṃ tumhe akatthā”ti
atk-s0505a:679_2: āha. Mahāpuriso “mā tvaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalike dukkhinī ahosi, sakalajambudīpavāsīhi te
atk-s0505a:679_3: sakkāraṃ kāressāmī”ti vatvā etadavoca – “gaccha tvaṃ ghosanaṃ karohi – ‘mahābrahmā
atk-s0505a:679_4: mama sāmiko na mātaṅgo, so candavimānaṃ bhinditvā sattame divase mama santikaṃ āgamissatī”’ti.
atk-s0505a:679_5: Sā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, brāhmaṇamahāsāladhītā hutvā attano pāpakammena imaṃ caṇḍālabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:679_6: pattā, na sakkomi evaṃ vattu”nti. Mahāpuriso “na tvaṃ mātaṅgassa ānubhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti
atk-s0505a:679_7: vatvā yathā sā saddahati, tathā anekāni pāṭihāriyāni dassetvā tatheva taṃ āṇāpetvā
atk-s0505a:679_8: attano vasatiṃ agamāsi. Sā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0505a:680_0: Manussā ujjhāyanti hasanti – “kathañhi nāmāyaṃ attano pāpakammena caṇḍālabhāvaṃ patvā
atk-s0505a:680_1: puna taṃ mahābrahmānaṃ karissatī”ti. Sā adhimānā eva hutvā divase divase ghosantī
atk-s0505a:680_2: nagaraṃ āhiṇḍati “ito chaṭṭhe divase, pañcame, catutthe, tatiye, suve, ajja āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:680_3: Manussā tassā vissatthavācaṃ sutvā “kadāci evampi siyā”ti attano attano gharadvāresu
atk-s0505a:680_4: maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā, sāṇipākāraṃ sajjetvā, vayappattā dārikāyo alaṅkaritvā “mahābrahmani
atk-s0505a:680_5: āgate kaññādānaṃ dassāmā”ti ākāsaṃ ullokentā nisīdiṃsu. Atha mahāpuriso puṇṇamadivase
atk-s0505a:680_6: gaganatalaṃ upārūḷhe cande candavimānaṃ phāletvā passato mahājanassa mahābrahmarūpena
atk-s0505a:680_7: niggacchi. Mahājano “dve candā jātā”ti atimaññi. Tato anukkamena āgataṃ disvā “saccaṃ
atk-s0505a:680_8: diṭṭhamaṅgalikā āha, mahābrahmāva ayaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ dametuṃ pubbe mātaṅgavesenāgacchī”ti
atk-s0505a:680_9: niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ so mahājanena dissamāno diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya vasanaṭṭhāne eva
atk-s0505a:680_10: otari. Sā ca tadā utunī ahosi. So tassā nābhiṃ aṅguṭṭhakena parāmasi. Tena phassena
atk-s0505a:680_11: gabbho patiṭṭhāsi. Tato naṃ “gabbho te saṇṭhito, puttamhi jāte taṃ nissāya jīvāhī”ti
atk-s0505a:680_12: vatvā passato mahājanassa puna candavimānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0505a:681_0: Brāhmaṇā “diṭṭhamaṅgalikā mahābrahmuno pajāpati amhākaṃ mātā jātā”ti vatvā tato tato
atk-s0505a:681_1: āgacchanti. Taṃ sakkāraṃ kātukāmānaṃ manussānaṃ sampīḷanena nagaradvārāni anokāsāni
atk-s0505a:681_2: ahesuṃ. Te diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ hiraññarāsimhi ṭhapetvā, nhāpetvā, maṇḍetvā, rathaṃ āropetvā,
atk-s0505a:681_3: mahāsakkārena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kārāpetvā, nagaramajjhe maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā, tatra
atk-s0505a:681_4: naṃ “mahābrahmuno pajāpatī”ti diṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vasāpenti “yāvassā patirūpaṃ
atk-s0505a:681_5: vasanokāsaṃ karoma, tāva idheva vasatū”ti. Sā maṇḍape eva puttaṃ vijāyi. Taṃ visuddhadivase
atk-s0505a:681_6: saddhiṃ puttena sasīsaṃ nhāpetvā maṇḍape jātoti dārakassa “maṇḍabyakumāro”ti nāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:681_7: akaṃsu. Tato pabhuti ca naṃ brāhmaṇā “mahābrahmuno putto”ti parivāretvā caranti.
atk-s0505a:681_8: Tato anekasatasahassappakārā paṇṇākārā āgacchanti, te brāhmaṇā kumārassārakkhaṃ ṭhapesuṃ,
atk-s0505a:681_9: āgatā lahuṃ kumāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0505a:682_0: Kumāro anupubbena vuḍḍhimanvāya dānaṃ dātuṃ āraddho. So sālāya sampattānaṃ kapaṇaddhikānaṃ
atk-s0505a:682_1: adatvā brāhmaṇānaṃyeva deti. Mahāpuriso “kiṃ mama putto dānaṃ detī”ti āvajjetvā brāhmaṇānaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:682_2: dānaṃ dentaṃ disvā “yathā sabbesaṃ dassati, tathā karissāmī”ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0505a:682_3: pattaṃ gahetvā ākāsena āgamma puttassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Kumāro taṃ disvā “kuto
atk-s0505a:682_4: ayaṃ evaṃ virūpaveso vasalo āgato”ti kuddho imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0505a:684: Saṅkāracoḷaṃ paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe, ko re tuvaṃ hosi adakkhiṇeyyo”ti.
atk-s0505a:685_0: Brāhmaṇā “gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti taṃ gahetvā ākoṭetvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesuṃ. So ākāsena
atk-s0505a:685_1: gantvā bahinagare paccaṭṭhāsi. Devatā kupitā kumāraṃ gale gahetvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ
atk-s0505a:685_2: ṭhapesuṃ. So akkhīhi niggatehi mukhena kheḷaṃ paggharantena gharugharupassāsī dukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:685_3: vedayati. Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā sutvā “koci āgato atthī”ti pucchi. “Āma, pabbajito āgacchī”ti.
atk-s0505a:685_4: “Kuhiṃ gato”ti? “Evaṃ gato”ti. Sā tattha gantvā “khamatha, bhante, attano dāsassā”ti
atk-s0505a:685_5: yācantī tassa pādamūle bhūmiyā nipajji. Tena ca samayena mahāpuriso piṇḍāya caritvā,
atk-s0505a:685_6: yāguṃ labhitvā, taṃ pivanto tattha nisinno hoti, so avasiṭṭhaṃ thokaṃ yāguṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya
atk-s0505a:685_7: adāsi. “Gaccha imaṃ yāguṃ udakakumbhiyā āloletvā yesaṃ bhūtavikāro atthi, tesaṃ akkhimukhakaṇṇanāsābilesu
atk-s0505a:685_8: āsiñca, sarīrañca paripphosehi, evaṃ nibbikārā bhavissantī”ti. Sā tathā akāsi. Tato
atk-s0505a:685_9: kumāre pakatisarīre jāte “ehi, tāta maṇḍabya, taṃ khamāpessāmā”ti puttañca sabbe
atk-s0505a:685_10: brāhmaṇe ca tassa pādamūle nikkujjitvā nipajjāpetvā khamāpesi.
atk-s0505a:686_0: So “sabbajanassa dānaṃ dātabba”nti ovaditvā, dhammakathaṃ katvā, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:686_1: gantvā, cintesi “itthīsu pākaṭā diṭṭhamaṅgalikā damitā, purisesu pākaṭo maṇḍabyakumāro,
atk-s0505a:686_2: idāni ko dametabbo”ti. Tato jātimantatāpasaṃ addasa bandhumatīnagaraṃ nissāya kumbhavatīnadītīre
atk-s0505a:686_3: viharantaṃ. So “ahaṃ jātiyā visiṭṭho, aññehi paribhuttodakaṃ na paribhuñjāmī”ti uparinadiyā
atk-s0505a:686_4: vasati. Mahāpuriso tassa uparibhāge vāsaṃ kappetvā tassa udakaparibhogavelāyaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0505a:686_5: khāditvā udake pakkhipi. Tāpaso taṃ udakena vuyhamānaṃ disvā “kenidaṃ khitta”nti
atk-s0505a:686_6: paṭisotaṃ gantvā mahāpurisaṃ disvā “ko etthā”ti āha. “Mātaṅgacaṇḍālo, ācariyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:686_7: “Apehi, caṇḍāla, mā uparinadiyā vasī”ti. Mahāpuriso “sādhu, ācariyā”ti heṭṭhānadiyā
atk-s0505a:686_8: vasati, paṭisotampi dantakaṭṭhaṃ tāpasassa santikaṃ āgacchati. Tāpaso puna gantvā
atk-s0505a:686_9: “apehi, caṇḍāla, mā heṭṭhānadiyaṃ vasa, uparinadiyāyeva vasā”ti āha. Mahāpuriso “sādhu,
atk-s0505a:686_10: ācariyā”ti tathā akāsi, punapi tatheva ahosi. Tāpaso punapi “tathā karotī”ti duṭṭho
atk-s0505a:686_11: mahāpurisaṃ sapi “sūriyassa te uggamanavelāya sattadhā muddhā phalatū”ti. Mahāpurisopi
atk-s0505a:686_12: “sādhu, ācariya, ahaṃ pana sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ na demī”ti vatvā sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ nivāresi.
atk-s0505a:686_13: Tato ratti na vibhāyati, andhakāro jāto, bhītā bandhumatīvāsino tāpasassa santikaṃ
atk-s0505a:686_14: gantvā “atthi nu kho, ācariya, amhākaṃ sotthibhāvo”ti pucchiṃsu. Te hi taṃ “arahā”ti
atk-s0505a:686_15: maññanti. So tesaṃ sabbamācikkhi. Te mahāpurisaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “sūriyaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:686_16: muñcathā”ti yāciṃsu. Mahāpuriso “yadi tumhākaṃ arahā āgantvā maṃ khamāpeti, muñcāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:687_0: Manussā gantvā tāpasaṃ āhaṃsu – “ehi, bhante, mātaṅgapaṇḍitaṃ khamāpehi, mā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:687_1: kalahakāraṇā mayaṃ nassimhā”ti. So “nāhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ khamāpemī”ti āha. Manussā “amhe
atk-s0505a:687_2: tvaṃ nāsesī”ti taṃ hatthapādesu gahetvā mahāpurisassa santikaṃ nesuṃ. Mahāpuriso
atk-s0505a:687_3: “mama pādamūle kucchiyā nipajjitvā khamāpente khamāmī”ti āha. Manussā “evaṃ karohī”ti
atk-s0505a:687_4: āhaṃsu. Tāpaso “nāhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ vandāmī”ti. Manussā “tava chandena na vandissasī”ti
atk-s0505a:687_5: hatthapādamassugīvādīsu gahetvā mahāpurisassa pādamūle sayāpesuṃ. So “khamāmahaṃ
atk-s0505a:687_6: imassa, apicāhaṃ tassevānukampāya sūriyaṃ na muñcāmi, sūriye hi uggatamatte muddhā
atk-s0505a:687_7: assa sattadhā phalissatī”ti āha. Manussā “idāni, bhante, kiṃ kātabba”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:687_8: Mahāpuriso “tena hi imaṃ galappamāṇe udake ṭhapetvā mattikāpiṇḍenassa sīsaṃ paṭicchādetha,
atk-s0505a:687_9: sūriyarasmīhi phuṭṭho mattikāpiṇḍo sattadhā phalissati. Tasmiṃ phalite esa aññatra
atk-s0505a:687_10: gacchatū”ti āha. Te tāpasaṃ hatthapādādīsu gahetvā tathā akaṃsu. Sūriye muñcitamatte
atk-s0505a:687_11: mattikāpiṇḍo sattadhā phalitvā pati, tāpaso bhīto palāyi. Manussā disvā “passatha,
atk-s0505a:687_12: bho, samaṇassa ānubhāva”nti dantakaṭṭhapakkhipanamādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ vitthāretvā “natthi
atk-s0505a:687_13: īdiso samaṇo”ti tasmiṃ pasīdiṃsu. Tato pabhuti sakalajambudīpe khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo
atk-s0505a:687_14: gahaṭṭhapabbajitā mātaṅgapaṇḍitassa upaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu. So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kāyassa
atk-s0505a:687_15: bhedā brahmaloke uppajji. Tenāha bhagavā “tadamināpi jānātha…pe… brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:688_0: 140-141. Evaṃ “na jaccā vasalo hoti, kammunā vasalo hotī”ti sādhetvā idāni “na jaccā
atk-s0505a:688_1: hoti brāhmaṇo, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo”ti etaṃ sādhetuṃ āha “ajjhāyakakule jātā …pe…
atk-s0505a:688_2: duggatyā garahāya vā”ti. Tattha ajjhāyakakule jātāti mantajjhāyake brāhmaṇakule jātā.
atk-s0505a:688_3: “Ajjhāyakākuḷe jātā”tipi pāṭho. Mantānaṃ ajjhāyake anupakuṭṭhe ca brāhmaṇakule jātāti
atk-s0505a:688_4: attho. Mantā bandhavā etesanti mantabandhavā. Vedabandhū vedapaṭissaraṇāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:688_5: hoti. Te ca pāpesu kammesu abhiṇhamupadissareti te evaṃ kule jātā mantabandhavā ca
atk-s0505a:688_6: samānāpi yadi pāṇātipātādīsu pāpakammesu punappunaṃ upadissanti, atha diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0505a:688_7: gārayhā samparāye ca duggati te evamupadissamānā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve mātāpitūhipi
atk-s0505a:688_8: “nayime amhākaṃ puttā, dujjātā ete kulassa aṅgārabhūtā, nikkaḍḍhatha ne”ti, brāhmaṇehipi
atk-s0505a:688_9: “gahapatikā ete, na ete brāhmaṇā, mā nesaṃ saddhayaññathālipākādīsu pavesaṃ detha,
atk-s0505a:688_10: mā nehi saddhiṃ sallapathā”ti, aññehipi manussehi “pāpakammantā ete, na ete brāhmaṇā”ti
atk-s0505a:688_11: evaṃ gārayhā honti. Samparāye ca nesaṃ duggati nirayādibhedā, duggati etesaṃ paraloke
atk-s0505a:688_12: hotīti attho. Samparāye vātipi pāṭho. Paraloke etesaṃ dukkhassa gati duggati, dukkhappattiyeva
atk-s0505a:688_13: hotīti attho. Na ne jāti nivāreti, duggatyā garahāya vāti sā tathā ukkaṭṭhāpi yaṃ
atk-s0505a:688_14: tvaṃ sārato paccesi, jāti ete pāpakammesu padissante brāhmaṇe “samparāye ca duggatī”ti
atk-s0505a:688_15: ettha vuttappakārāya duggatiyā vā, “diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā”ti ettha vuttappakārāya
atk-s0505a:689_0: 142. Evaṃ bhagavā ajjhāyakakule jātānampi brāhmaṇānaṃ gārayhādikammavasena diṭṭheva
atk-s0505a:689_1: dhamme patitabhāvaṃ dīpento duggatigamanena ca samparāye brāhmaṇajātiyā abhāvaṃ dīpento
atk-s0505a:689_2: “na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo”ti etampi atthaṃ sādhetvā idāni duvidhampi
atk-s0505a:690: “Na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0505a:691: Kammunā vasalo hoti, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0505a:692_0: Sesaṃ kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayameva. Visesato vā ettha nikkujjitaṃ vātiādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:692_1: evaṃ yojanā veditabbā – yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, evaṃ maṃ kammavimukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:692_2: jātivāde patitaṃ “jātiyā brāhmaṇavasalabhāvo hotī”ti diṭṭhito vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā
atk-s0505a:692_3: paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya, evaṃ jātivādapaṭicchannaṃ kammavādaṃ vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa
atk-s0505a:692_4: maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ brāhmaṇavasalabhāvassa asambhinnaujumaggaṃ ācikkhantena,
atk-s0505a:692_5: yathā andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mātaṅgādinidassanapajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0505a:692_6: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0505a:696_0: Karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti mettasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Himavantapassato kira devatāhi
atk-s0505a:696_1: ubbāḷhā bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ sāvatthiṃ āgacchiṃsu. Tesaṃ bhagavā parittatthāya
atk-s0505a:696_2: kammaṭṭhānatthāya ca imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. Ayaṃ tāva saṅkhepo.
atk-s0505a:697_0: Ayaṃ pana vitthāro – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya.
atk-s0505a:697_1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nānāverajjakā bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:697_2: gahetvā tattha tattha vassaṃ upagantukāmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanti. Tatra sudaṃ
atk-s0505a:698_0: Atha kho pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sappāyasenāsanañca
atk-s0505a:698_1: gocaragāmañca pariyesamānāni anupubbena gantvā paccante himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:698_3: sucisātasītalajalāsayaparivāritaṃ pabbatamaddasaṃsu. Atha kho te bhikkhū tatthekarattiṃ
atk-s0505a:698_4: vasitvā pabhātāya rattiyā sarīraparikammaṃ katvā tassa avidūre aññataraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:698_5: pavisiṃsu. Gāmo ghananivesasanniviṭṭhakulasahassayutto, manussā cettha saddhā pasannā,
atk-s0505a:698_6: te paccante pabbajitadassanassa dullabhatāya bhikkhū disvā eva pītisomanassajātā
atk-s0505a:698_7: hutvā te bhikkhū bhojetvā “idheva, bhante, temāsaṃ vasathā”ti yācitvā pañcapadhānakuṭisatāni
atk-s0505a:699_0: Bhikkhū dutiyadivase aññaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Tatthāpi manussā tatheva upaṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0505a:699_1: vassāvāsaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhikkhū “asati antarāye”ti adhivāsetvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0505a:699_2: sabbarattindivaṃ āraddhavīriyā hutvā yāmagaṇḍikaṃ koṭṭetvā yonisomanasikārabahulā
atk-s0505a:699_3: viharantā rukkhamūlāni upagantvā nisīdiṃsu. Sīlavantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tejena vihatatejā
atk-s0505a:699_4: rukkhadevatā attano attano vimānā oruyha dārake gahetvā ito cito ca vicaranti. Seyyathāpi
atk-s0505a:699_5: nāma rājūhi vā rājamahāmattehi vā gāmakāvāsaṃ gatehi gāmavāsīnaṃ gharesu okāse gahite
atk-s0505a:699_6: gharamānusakā gharā nikkhamitvā aññatra vasantā “kadā nu kho gamissantī”ti dūrato
atk-s0505a:699_7: olokenti; evameva devatā attano attano vimānāni chaḍḍetvā ito cito ca vicarantiyo
atk-s0505a:699_8: dūratova olokenti – “kadā nu kho bhadantā gamissantī”ti. Tato evaṃ samacintesuṃ “paṭhamavassūpagatā
atk-s0505a:699_9: bhikkhū avassaṃ temāsaṃ vasissanti. Mayaṃ pana tāva ciraṃ dārake gahetvā okkamma
atk-s0505a:699_10: vasituṃ na sakkhissāma. Handa mayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhayānakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassemā”ti. Tā
atk-s0505a:699_11: rattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇavelāya bhiṃsanakāni yakkharūpāni nimminitvā purato
atk-s0505a:699_12: purato tiṭṭhanti, bheravasaddañca karonti. Bhikkhūnaṃ tāni rūpāni passantānaṃ tañca
atk-s0505a:699_13: saddaṃ suṇantānaṃ hadayaṃ phandi, dubbaṇṇā ca ahesuṃ uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajātā. Tena te
atk-s0505a:699_14: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tesaṃ anekaggacittānaṃ bhayena ca punappunaṃ saṃviggānaṃ
atk-s0505a:699_15: sati sammussi. Tato nesaṃ muṭṭhassatīnaṃ duggandhāni ārammaṇāni payojesuṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:699_16: tena duggandhena nimmathiyamānamiva matthaluṅgaṃ ahosi, bāḷhā sīsavedanā uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:699_17: na ca taṃ pavattiṃ aññamaññassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:700_0: Athekadivasaṃ saṅghattherassa upaṭṭhānakāle sabbesu sannipatitesu saṅghatthero pucchi
atk-s0505a:700_1: – “tumhākaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ katipāhaṃ ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo
atk-s0505a:700_2: ahosi pariyodāto, vippasannāni ca indriyāni etarahi panattha kisā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajātā,
atk-s0505a:700_3: kiṃ vo idha asappāya”nti? Tato eko bhikkhu āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, rattiṃ īdisañca īdisañca
atk-s0505a:700_4: bheravārammaṇaṃ passāmi ca suṇāmi ca, īdisañca gandhaṃ ghāyāmi, tena me cittaṃ na
atk-s0505a:700_5: samādhiyatī”ti. Eteneva upāyena sabbe taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Saṅghatthero āha – “bhagavatā
atk-s0505a:700_6: āvuso dve vassūpanāyikā paññattā, amhākañca idaṃ senāsanaṃ asappāyaṃ, āyāmāvuso bhagavato
atk-s0505a:700_7: santikaṃ, gantvā aññaṃ sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ pucchāmā”ti. “Sādhu bhante”ti te bhikkhū
atk-s0505a:700_8: therassa paṭissuṇitvā sabbe senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anupalittattā
atk-s0505a:700_9: kulesu kañci anāmantetvā eva yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu. Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0505a:701_0: Bhagavā te bhikkhū disvā etadavoca – “na, bhikkhave, antovassaṃ cārikā caritabbāti
atk-s0505a:701_1: mayā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, kissa tumhe cārikaṃ carathā”ti. Te bhagavato sabbaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:701_2: Bhagavā āvajjento sakalajambudīpe antamaso catuppādapīṭhakaṭṭhānamattampi tesaṃ sappāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:701_3: senāsanaṃ nāddasa. Atha te bhikkhū āha – “na, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ aññaṃ sappāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:701_4: senāsanaṃ atthi, tattheva tumhe viharantā āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇeyyātha. Gacchatha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:701_5: tameva senāsanaṃ upanissāya viharatha. Sace pana devatāhi abhayaṃ icchatha, imaṃ
atk-s0505a:701_6: parittaṃ uggaṇhatha, etañhi vo parittañca kammaṭṭhānañca bhavissatī”ti imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:702_0: Apare panāhu – “gacchatha, bhikkhave, tameva senāsanaṃ upanissāya viharathā”ti idañca
atk-s0505a:702_1: vatvā bhagavā āha – “apica kho āraññakena pariharaṇaṃ ñātabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – sāyaṃpātaṃ
atk-s0505a:702_2: karaṇavasena dve mettā, dve parittā, dve asubhā, dve maraṇassatī aṭṭha mahāsaṃvegavatthusamāvajjanañca.
atk-s0505a:702_3: Aṭṭha mahāsaṃvegavatthūni nāma jāti jarā byādhi maraṇaṃ cattāri apāyadukkhānīti.
atk-s0505a:702_4: Atha vā jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ
atk-s0505a:702_5: dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkha”nti.
atk-s0505a:702_6: Evaṃ bhagavā pariharaṇaṃ ācikkhitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mettatthañca parittatthañca
atk-s0505a:703_0: 143. Tattha karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti imissā paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā
atk-s0505a:703_1: – karaṇīyanti kātabbaṃ, karaṇārahanti attho. Atthoti paṭipadā, yaṃ vā kiñci attano
atk-s0505a:703_2: hitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ araṇīyato atthoti vuccati, araṇīyato nāma upagantabbato. Atthe
atk-s0505a:703_3: kusalena atthakusalena, atthachekenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yanti aniyamitapaccattaṃ. Nti
atk-s0505a:703_4: niyamitaupayogaṃ. Ubhayampi vā yaṃ tanti paccattavacanaṃ. Santaṃ padanti upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:703_5: Tattha lakkhaṇato santaṃ, pattabbato padaṃ, nibbānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Abhisameccāti
atk-s0505a:703_6: abhisamāgantvā. Sakkotīti sakko, samattho paṭibaloti vuttaṃ hoti. Ujūti ajjavayutto.
atk-s0505a:703_7: Suṭṭhu ujūti suhuju. Sukhaṃ vaco asminti suvaco. Assāti bhaveyya. Mudūti maddavayutto.
atk-s0505a:704_0: Ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā – karaṇīyamatthakusalena yanta santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti.
atk-s0505a:704_1: Ettha tāva atthi karaṇīyaṃ, atthi akaraṇīyaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato sikkhattayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:704_2: sīlavipatti, diṭṭhivipatti, ācāravipatti, ājīvavipattīti evamādi akaraṇīyaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0505a:705_0: Tattha yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā na attānaṃ sammā payojeti, khaṇḍasīlo hoti, ekavīsatividhaṃ
atk-s0505a:705_1: anesanaṃ nissāya jīvikaṃ kappeti. Seyyathidaṃ – veḷudānaṃ, pattadānaṃ, pupphadānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:705_2: phaladānaṃ, dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ, mukhodakadānaṃ, sinānadānaṃ, cuṇṇadānaṃ, mattikādānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:705_3: cāṭukamyataṃ, muggasūpyataṃ, pāribhaṭutaṃ, jaṅghapesaniyaṃ, vejjakammaṃ, dūtakammaṃ,
atk-s0505a:705_5: Chabbidhe ca agocare carati. Seyyathidaṃ – vesiyagocare vidhavāthullakumārikapaṇḍakabhikkhunipānāgāragocareti.
atk-s0505a:705_6: Saṃsaṭṭho ca viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena
atk-s0505a:705_7: gihisaṃsaggena. Yāni vā pana tāni kulāni asaddhāni appasannāni anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni
atk-s0505a:705_9: kulāni sevati bhajati payirupāsati. Ayaṃ anatthakusalo.
atk-s0505a:706_0: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ sammā payojeti, anesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle
atk-s0505a:706_1: patiṭṭhātukāmo saddhāsīsena pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ, satisīsena indriyasaṃvaraṃ, vīriyasīsena
atk-s0505a:706_2: ājīvapārisuddhiṃ, paññāsīsena paccayapaṭisevanaṃ pūreti ayaṃ atthakusalo.
atk-s0505a:707_0: Yo vā sattāpattikkhandhasodhanavasena pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ, chadvāre ghaṭṭitārammaṇesu
atk-s0505a:707_3: sātthakādīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena sampajaññañca sodheti, ayampi atthakusalo.
atk-s0505a:708_0: Yo vā yathā ūsodakaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ pariyodāyati, chārikaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0505a:708_1: ādāso, ukkāmukhaṃ paṭicca jātarūpaṃ, tathā ñāṇaṃ paṭicca sīlaṃ vodāyatīti ñatvā ñāṇodakena
atk-s0505a:708_2: dhovanto sīlaṃ pariyodāpeti. Yathā ca kikī sakuṇikā aṇḍaṃ, camarīmigo vāladhiṃ, ekaputtikā
atk-s0505a:708_3: nārī piyaṃ ekaputtakaṃ, ekanayano puriso taṃ ekanayanaṃ rakkhati, tathā ativiya appamatto
atk-s0505a:708_4: attano sīlakkhandhaṃ rakkhati, sāyaṃpātaṃ paccavekkhamāno aṇumattampi vajjaṃ na passati, ayampi atthakusalo.
atk-s0505a:709_0: Yo vā pana avippaṭisārakarasīle patiṭṭhāya kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadaṃ paggaṇhāti,
atk-s0505a:709_1: taṃ paggahetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti, kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-s0505a:709_2: ayampi atthakusalo. Yo vā pana samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0505a:710_0: Tattha ye ime yāva avippaṭisārakarasīle patiṭṭhānena, yāva vā kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadāya
atk-s0505a:710_1: paggahaṇena maggaphalena vaṇṇitā atthakusalā, te imasmiṃ atthe atthakusalāti adhippetā.
atk-s0505a:710_2: Tathāvidhā ca te bhikkhū. Tena bhagavā te bhikkhū sandhāya ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:711_0: Tato “kiṃ karaṇīya”nti tesaṃ sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ āha “yanta santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti.
atk-s0505a:711_1: Ayamettha adhippāyo – taṃ buddhānubuddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ santaṃ nibbānapadaṃ paṭivedhavasena
atk-s0505a:711_2: abhisamecca viharitukāmena yaṃ karaṇīyanti. Ettha ca yanti imassa gāthāpādassa ādito
atk-s0505a:711_3: vuttameva karaṇīyanti. Adhikārato anuvattati taṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:711_4: pana yasmā sāvasesapāṭho attho, tasmā “viharitukāmenā”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:712_0: Atha vā santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti anussavādivasena lokiyapaññāya nibbānapadaṃ santanti
atk-s0505a:712_1: ñatvā taṃ adhigantukāmena yantaṃ karaṇīyanti adhikārato anuvattati, taṃ karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti
atk-s0505a:712_2: evampettha adhippāyo veditabbo. Atha vā “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti vutte “ki”nti
atk-s0505a:712_3: cintentānaṃ āha “yanta santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti. Tassevaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo
atk-s0505a:712_4: – lokiyapaññāya santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca yaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, tanti. Yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0505a:713_0: Kiṃ pana tanti? Kimaññaṃ siyā aññatra tadadhigamūpāyato. Kāmañcetaṃ karaṇārahatthena
atk-s0505a:713_1: sikkhattayadīpakena ādipadeneva vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ avocumhā “atthi
atk-s0505a:713_2: karaṇīyaṃ atthi akaraṇīyaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato sikkhattayaṃ karaṇīya”nti. Atisaṅkhepadesitattā
atk-s0505a:713_3: pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kehici viññātaṃ, kehici na viññātaṃ. Tato yehi na viññātaṃ,
atk-s0505a:713_4: tesaṃ viññāpanatthaṃ yaṃ visesato āraññakena bhikkhunā kātabbaṃ, taṃ vitthārento
atk-s0505a:713_5: “sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, suvaco cassa mudu anatimānī”ti imaṃ tāva upaḍḍhagāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:714_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmo lokiyapaññāya vā taṃ abhisamecca
atk-s0505a:714_2: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hutvā saccapaṭivedhāya paṭipajjituṃ sakko assa, tathā
atk-s0505a:714_3: kasiṇaparikammavattasamādānādīsu, attano pattacīvarapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīsu ca yāni tāni
atk-s0505a:714_4: sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni, tesu aññesu ca evarūpesu sakko assa dakkho
atk-s0505a:714_5: analaso samattho. Sakko hontopi ca tatiyapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgamena uju assa. Uju
atk-s0505a:714_6: hontopi ca sakiṃ ujubhāvena santosaṃ anāpajjitvā yāvajīvaṃ punappunaṃ asithilakaraṇena
atk-s0505a:714_7: suṭṭhutaraṃ uju assa. Asaṭhatāya vā uju, amāyāvitāya suhuju. Kāyavacīvaṅkappahānena
atk-s0505a:714_8: vā uju, manovaṅkappahānena suhuju. Asantaguṇassa vā anāvikaraṇena uju, asantaguṇena
atk-s0505a:714_9: uppannassa lābhassa anadhivāsanena suhuju. Evaṃ ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānehi purimadvayatatiyasikkhāhi
atk-s0505a:714_10: payogāsayasuddhīhi ca uju ca suhuju ca assa.
atk-s0505a:715_0: Na kevalañca uju ca suhuju ca, apica pana subbaco ca assa. Yo hi puggalo “idaṃ na
atk-s0505a:715_1: kātabba”nti vutto “kiṃ te diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ te sutaṃ, ko me hutvā vadasi, kiṃ upajjhāyo
atk-s0505a:715_2: ācariyo sandiṭṭho sambhatto vā”ti vadati, tuṇhībhāvena vā taṃ viheṭheti, sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0505a:715_3: vā na tathā karoti, so visesādhigamassa dūre hoti. Yo pana ovadiyamāno “sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0505a:715_4: suṭṭhu vuttaṃ, attano vajjaṃ nāma duddasaṃ hoti, punapi maṃ evarūpaṃ disvā vadeyyātha
atk-s0505a:715_5: anukampaṃ upādāya, cirassaṃ me tumhākaṃ santikā ovādo laddho”ti vadati, yathānusiṭṭhañca
atk-s0505a:715_6: paṭipajjati, so visesādhigamassa avidūre hoti. Tasmā evaṃ parassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0505a:716_0: Yathā ca suvaco, evaṃ mudu assa. Mudūti gahaṭṭhehi dūtagamanappahiṇagamanādīsu niyuñjiyamāno
atk-s0505a:716_1: tattha mudubhāvaṃ akatvā thaddho hutvā vattapaṭipattiyaṃ sakalabrahmacariye ca mudu
atk-s0505a:716_2: assa suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya tattha tattha viniyogakkhamo. Atha vā mudūti abhākuṭiko
atk-s0505a:716_3: uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthāravutti sutitthaṃ viya sukhāvagāho assa. Na kevalañca
atk-s0505a:716_4: mudu, apica pana anatimānī assa, jātigottādīhi atimānavatthūhi pare nātimaññeyya,
atk-s0505a:717_0: 144. Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjamānassa
atk-s0505a:717_1: visesato āraññakassa bhikkhuno ekaccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ vatvā puna tatuttaripi vattukāmo
atk-s0505a:718_0: Tattha “santuṭṭhī ca kataññutā”ti ettha vuttappabhedena dvādasavidhena santosena
atk-s0505a:718_1: santussatīti santussako. Atha vā tussatīti tussako, sakena tussako, santena tussako,
atk-s0505a:718_2: samena tussakoti santussako. Tattha sakaṃ nāma “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0505a:718_3: upasampadamāḷake uddiṭṭhaṃ attanā ca sampaṭicchitaṃ catupaccayajātaṃ. Tena sundarena
atk-s0505a:718_4: vā asundarena vā sakkaccaṃ vā asakkaccaṃ vā dinnena paṭiggahaṇakāle paribhogakāle
atk-s0505a:718_5: ca vikāramadassetvā yāpento “sakena tussako”ti vuccati. Santaṃ nāma yaṃ laddhaṃ hoti
atk-s0505a:718_6: attano vijjamānaṃ, tena santeneva tussanto tato paraṃ na patthento atricchataṃ pajahanto
atk-s0505a:718_7: “santena tussako”ti vuccati. Samaṃ nāma iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu anunayapaṭighappahānaṃ. Tena
atk-s0505a:719_0: Sukhena bharīyatīti subharo, suposoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi bhikkhu sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:719_1: patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti, tesaṃ vā sammukhāva
atk-s0505a:719_2: taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ deti, esa
atk-s0505a:719_3: dubbharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti “dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā positu”nti.
atk-s0505a:719_4: Yo pana yaṃkiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā labhitvā attamano vippasannamukho
atk-s0505a:719_5: hutvā yāpeti, esa subharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti – “amhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:719_6: bhadanto subharo thokathokenapi tussati, mayameva naṃ posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:720_2: attano kesanakhacchedanapattacīvaraparikammādiṃ katvā samaṇadhammakiccaparo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:721_0: Sallahukā vutti assāti sallahukavutti. Yathā ekacco bahubhaṇḍo bhikkhu disāpakkamanakāle
atk-s0505a:721_2: pakkamati, evaṃ ahutvā yo appaparikkhāro hoti, pattacīvarādiaṭṭhasamaṇaparikkhāramattameva
atk-s0505a:721_3: pariharati, disāpakkamanakāle pakkhī sakuṇo viya samādāyeva pakkamati, evarūpo idha
atk-s0505a:721_4: sallahukavuttīti adhippeto. Santāni indriyāni assāti santindriyo, iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu
atk-s0505a:721_5: rāgādivasena anuddhatindriyoti vuttaṃ hoti. Nipakoti viññū vibhāvī paññavā, sīlānurakkhaṇapaññāya
atk-s0505a:722: Na pagabbhoti appagabbho, aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena, catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena, anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitoti attho.
atk-s0505a:723_1: kāyena appatirūpakaraṇaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco saṅghamajjhe pallatthikāya vā nisīdati,
atk-s0505a:723_2: pāde pādamodahitvā vāti evamādi, tathā gaṇamajjhe, gaṇamajjheti catuparisasannipāte,
atk-s0505a:723_3: tathā vuḍḍhatare puggale. Bhojanasālāyaṃ pana vuḍḍhānaṃ āsanaṃ na deti, navānaṃ āsanaṃ
atk-s0505a:723_4: paṭibāhati, tathā jantāghare. Vuḍḍhe cettha anāpucchā aggijālanādīni karoti. Nhānatitthe
atk-s0505a:723_5: ca yadidaṃ “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:723_6: tampi anādiyanto pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca nave ca bādheti. Bhikkhācāramagge
atk-s0505a:723_7: pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍatthaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ purato purato yāti bāhāya bāhaṃ paharanto,
atk-s0505a:723_8: antaragharappavesane vuḍḍhānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ pavisati, daharehi kāyakīḷanaṃ karotīti evamādi.
atk-s0505a:724_1: Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco saṅghamajjhe anāpucchā dhammaṃ bhāsati, tathā pubbe vuttappakāre
atk-s0505a:724_2: gaṇe vuḍḍhatare puggale ca. Tattha manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ anāpucchā
atk-s0505a:724_3: vissajjeti. Antaraghare pana “itthannāme kiṃ atthi, kiṃ yāgu udāhu khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:724_4: kiṃ me dassasi, kimajja khādissāmi, kiṃ bhuñjissāmi, kiṃ pivissāmī”ti edamādiṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0505a:725: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasā eva kāmavitakkādinānappakāraappatirūpavitakkanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:726_0: Kulesvananugiddhoti yāni kulāni upasaṅkamati, tesu paccayataṇhāya vā ananulomiyagihisaṃsaggavasena
atk-s0505a:726_1: vā ananugiddho, na sahasokī, na sahanandī, na sukhitesu sukhito, na dukkhitesu dukkhito,
atk-s0505a:726_2: na uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vā yogamāpajjitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Imissā ca gāthāya
atk-s0505a:726_3: yaṃ “suvaco cassā”ti ettha vuttaṃ “assā”ti vacanaṃ, taṃ sabbapadehi saddhiṃ “santussako
atk-s0505a:726_4: ca assa, subharo ca assā”ti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:727_0: 145. Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa
atk-s0505a:727_1: visesato āraññakassa bhikkhuno tatuttaripi karaṇīyaṃ ācikkhitvā idāni akaraṇīyampi
atk-s0505a:727_2: ācikkhitukāmo “na ca khuddamācare kiñci, yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti imaṃ upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:727_3: Tassattho – evamimaṃ karaṇīyaṃ karonto yaṃ taṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritaṃ khuddaṃ lāmakanti
atk-s0505a:727_4: vuccati, taṃ na ca khuddaṃ samācare. Asamācaranto ca na kevalaṃ oḷārikaṃ, kiṃ pana
atk-s0505a:727_5: kiñci na samācare, appamattakaṃ aṇumattampi na samācareti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:728_0: Tato tassa samācāre sandiṭṭhikamevādīnavaṃ dasseti “yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:728_1: Ettha ca yasmā aviññū pare appamāṇaṃ. Te hi anavajjaṃ vā sāvajjaṃ karonti, appasāvajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:728_2: vā mahāsāvajjaṃ. Viññū eva pana pamāṇaṃ. Te hi anuvicca pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa
atk-s0505a:728_3: avaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, tasmā “viññū pare”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:729_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imāhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa,
atk-s0505a:729_1: tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa visesato āraññakassa āraññakasīsena ca sabbesampi
atk-s0505a:729_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharitukāmānaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānūpacāraṃ vatvā
atk-s0505a:729_3: idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa devatābhayassa paṭighātāya parittatthaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānavasena
atk-s0505a:729_4: kammaṭṭhānatthañca “sukhino va khemino hontū”tiādinā nayena mettakathaṃ kathetumāraddho.
atk-s0505a:730_0: Tattha sukhinoti sukhasamaṅgino. Kheminoti khemavanto, abhayā nirupaddavāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:730_1: hoti. Sabbeti anavasesā. Sattāti pāṇino. Sukhitattāti sukhitacittā. Ettha ca kāyikena
atk-s0505a:730_2: sukhena sukhino, mānasena sukhitattā, tadubhayenāpi sabbabhayūpaddavavigamena vā
atk-s0505a:730_3: kheminoti veditabbā. Kasmā pana evaṃ vuttaṃ? Mettābhāvanākāradassanatthaṃ. Evañhi
atk-s0505a:730_4: mettā bhāvetabbā “sabbe sattā sukhino hontū”ti vā, “khemino hontū”ti vā, “sukhitattā hontū”ti vā.
atk-s0505a:731_0: 146. Evaṃ yāva upacārato appanākoṭi, tāva saṅkhepena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0505a:731_1: vitthāratopi taṃ dassetuṃ “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha. Atha vā yasmā puthuttārammaṇe
atk-s0505a:731_2: paricitaṃ cittaṃ na ādikeneva ekatte saṇṭhāti, ārammaṇappabhedaṃ pana anugantvā kamena
atk-s0505a:731_3: saṇṭhāti, tasmā tassa tasathāvarādidukatikappabhede ārammaṇe anugantvā anugantvā
atk-s0505a:731_4: saṇṭhānatthampi “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha. Atha vā yasmā yassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:731_5: hoti, tassa tattha cittaṃ sukhaṃ tiṭṭhati. Tasmā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yassa yaṃ vibhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:732_0: Ettha hi tasathāvaradukaṃ diṭṭhādiṭṭhadukaṃ dūrasantikadukaṃ bhūtasambhavesidukanti
atk-s0505a:732_1: cattāri dukāni, dīghādīhi ca chahi padehi majjhimapadassa tīsu, aṇukapadassa ca dvīsu
atk-s0505a:732_3: tayo tike dīpeti. Tattha ye kecīti anavasesavacanaṃ. Pāṇā eva bhūtā pāṇabhūtā. Atha
atk-s0505a:732_4: vā pāṇantīti pāṇā. Etena assāsapassāsapaṭibaddhe pañcavokārasatte gaṇhāti. Bhavantīti
atk-s0505a:732_5: bhūtā. Etena ekavokāracatuvokārasatte gaṇhāti. Atthīti santi, saṃvijjanti.
atk-s0505a:733_0: Evaṃ “ye keci pāṇabhūtatthī”ti iminā vacanena dukattikehi saṅgahetabbe sabbe satte
atk-s0505a:733_1: ekajjhaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbepi te tasā vā thāvarā vā anavasesāti iminā dukena saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0505a:734_0: Tattha tasantīti tasā, sataṇhānaṃ sabhayānañcetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tiṭṭhantīti thāvarā,
atk-s0505a:734_1: pahīnataṇhābhayānaṃ arahataṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Natthi tesaṃ avasesanti anavasesā,
atk-s0505a:734_2: sabbepīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yañca dutiyagāthāya ante vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbadukatikehi sambandhitabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:734_3: – ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi tasā vā thāvarā vā anavasesā, imepi sabbe sattā bhavantu
atk-s0505a:734_4: sukhitattā. Evaṃ yāva bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā imepi sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhitattāti.
atk-s0505a:735_0: Idāni dīgharassamajjhimāditikattayadīpakesu dīghā vātiādīsu chasu padesu dīghāti
atk-s0505a:735_1: dīghattabhāvā nāgamacchagodhādayo. Anekabyāmasatappamāṇāpi hi mahāsamudde nāgānaṃ
atk-s0505a:735_2: attabhāvā anekayojanappamāṇāpi macchagodhādīnaṃ attabhāvā honti. Mahantāti mahantattabhāvā
atk-s0505a:735_3: jale macchakacchapādayo, thale hatthināgādayo, amanussesu dānavādayo. Āha ca – “rāhuggaṃ
atk-s0505a:735_4: attabhāvīna”nti. Tassa hi attabhāvo ubbedhena cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni,
atk-s0505a:735_5: bāhū dvādasayojanasataparimāṇā, paññāsayojanaṃ bhamukantaraṃ, tathā aṅgulantarikā,
atk-s0505a:735_6: hatthatalāni dve yojanasatānīti. Majjhimāti assagoṇamahiṃsasūkarādīnaṃ attabhāvā.
atk-s0505a:735_7: Rassakāti tāsu tāsu jātīsu vāmanādayo dīghamajjhimehi omakappamāṇā sattā. Aṇukāti
atk-s0505a:735_8: maṃsacakkhussa agocarā, dibbacakkhuvisayā udakādīsu nibbattā sukhumattabhāvā sattā,
atk-s0505a:735_9: ūkādayo vā. Apica ye tāsu tāsu jātīsu mahantamajjhimehi thūlamajjhimehi ca omakappamāṇā
atk-s0505a:735_10: sattā, te aṇukāti veditabbā. Thūlāti parimaṇḍalattabhāvā macchakummasippikasambukādayo sattā.
atk-s0505a:736: 147. Evaṃ tīhi tikehi anavasesato satte dassetvā idāni “diṭṭhā vā yeva adiṭṭhā”tiādīhi tīhi dukehipi te saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0505a:737_0: Tattha diṭṭhāti ye attano cakkhussa āpāthamāgatavasena diṭṭhapubbā. Adiṭṭhāti ye
atk-s0505a:737_1: parasamuddaparaselaparacakkavāḷādīsu ṭhitā. “Yeva dūre vasanti avidūre”ti iminā pana
atk-s0505a:737_2: dukena attano attabhāvassa dūre ca avidūre ca vasante satte dasseti. Te upādāyupādāvasena
atk-s0505a:737_3: veditabbā. Attano hi kāye vasantā sattā avidūre, bahikāye vasantā dūre. Tathā antoupacāre
atk-s0505a:737_4: vasantā avidūre, bahiupacāre vasantā dūre. Attano vihāre gāme janapade dīpe cakkavāḷe
atk-s0505a:737_5: vasantā avidūre, paracakkavāḷe vasantā dūre vasantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:738_0: Bhūtāti jātā, abhinibbattā. Ye bhūtā eva, na puna bhavissantīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0505a:738_1: tesaṃ khīṇāsavānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sambhavamesantīti sambhavesī. Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā
atk-s0505a:738_2: āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Atha vā catūsu
atk-s0505a:738_3: yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti, tāva sambhavesī
atk-s0505a:738_4: nāma. Aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma. Saṃsedajā opapātikā
atk-s0505a:738_5: ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma. Dutiyacittakkhaṇato pabhuti bhūtā nāma. Yena
atk-s0505a:738_6: vā iriyāpathena jāyanti, yāva tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāva sambhavesī nāma. Tato paraṃ bhūtāti.
atk-s0505a:739_0: 148. Evaṃ bhagavā “sukhino vā”tiādīhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi nānappakārato tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:739_1: hitasukhāgamapatthanāvasena sattesu mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasenāpi
atk-s0505a:739_2: taṃ dassento āha “na paro paraṃ nikubbethā”ti. Esa porāṇapāṭho, idāni pana “paraṃ
atk-s0505a:740_0: Tattha paroti parajano. Paranti parajanaṃ. Na nikubbethāti na vañceyya. Nātimaññethāti
atk-s0505a:740_1: na atikkamitvā maññeyya. Katthacīti katthaci okāse, gāme vā nigame vā khette vā ñātimajjhe
atk-s0505a:740_2: vā pūgamajjhe vātiādi. Nanti etaṃ. Kañcīti yaṃ kañci khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā gahaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0505a:740_3: vā pabbajitaṃ vā sugataṃ vā duggataṃ vātiādi. Byārosanā paṭighasaññāti kāyavacīvikārehi
atk-s0505a:740_4: byārosanāya ca, manovikārena paṭighasaññāya ca. “Byārosanāya paṭighasaññāyā”ti hi
atk-s0505a:740_5: vattabbe “byārosanā paṭighasaññā”ti vuccati yathā “samma daññāya vimuttā”ti vattabbe
atk-s0505a:740_6: “samma daññā vimuttā”ti, yathā ca “anupubbasikkhāya anupubbakiriyāya anupubbapaṭipadāyā”ti
atk-s0505a:740_8: aññamaññassa dukkhaṃ na iccheyya. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Na kevalaṃ “sukhino vā khemino
atk-s0505a:740_9: vā hontū”tiādi manasikāravaseneva mettaṃ bhāveyya. Kiṃ pana “aho vata yo koci parapuggalo
atk-s0505a:740_10: yaṃ kañci parapuggalaṃ vañcanādīhi nikatīhi na nikubbetha, jātiādīhi ca navahi mānavatthūhi
atk-s0505a:740_11: katthaci padese yaṃ kañci parapuggalaṃ nātimaññeyya, aññamaññassa ca byārosanāya
atk-s0505a:740_12: vā paṭighasaññāya vā dukkhaṃ na iccheyyā”ti evampi manasi karonto bhāveyyāti.
atk-s0505a:741: 149. Evaṃ ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasena atthato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva upamāya dassento āha “mātā yathā niyaṃ putta”nti.
atk-s0505a:742_0: Tassattho – yathā mātā niyaṃ puttaṃ attani jātaṃ orasaṃ puttaṃ, tañca ekaputtameva
atk-s0505a:742_1: āyusā anurakkhe, tassa dukkhāgamapaṭibāhanatthaṃ attano āyumpi cajitvā taṃ anurakkhe,
atk-s0505a:742_2: evampi sabbabhūtesu idaṃ mettamānasaṃ bhāvaye, punappunaṃ janaye vaḍḍhaye, tañca
atk-s0505a:742_3: aparimāṇasattārammaṇavasena ekasmiṃ vā satte anavasesapharaṇavasena aparimāṇaṃ bhāvayeti.
atk-s0505a:743: 150. Evaṃ sabbākārena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva vaḍḍhanaṃ dassento āha “mettañca sabbalokasmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:744_0: Tattha mijjati tāyati cāti mitto, hitajjhāsayatāya siniyhati, ahitāgamato rakkhati
atk-s0505a:744_1: cāti attho. Mittassa bhāvo mettaṃ. Sabbasminti anavasese. Lokasminti sattaloke. Manasi
atk-s0505a:744_2: bhavanti mānasaṃ. Tañhi cittasampayuttattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhāvayeti vaḍḍhaye. Nāssa
atk-s0505a:744_3: parimāṇanti aparimāṇaṃ, appamāṇasattārammaṇatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Uddhanti upari. Tena
atk-s0505a:744_4: arūpabhavaṃ gaṇhāti. Adhoti heṭṭhā. Tena kāmabhavaṃ gaṇhāti. Tiriyanti vemajjhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:744_5: Tena rūpabhavaṃ gaṇhāti. Asambādhanti sambādhavirahitaṃ, bhinnasīmanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:744_6: Sīmā nāma paccatthiko vuccati, tasmimpi pavattanti attho. Averanti veravirahitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:744_7: antarantarāpi veracetanāpātubhāvavirahitanti vuttaṃ hoti. Asapattanti vigatapaccatthikaṃ.
atk-s0505a:744_8: Mettāvihārī hi puggalo manussānaṃ piyo hoti, amanussānaṃ piyo hoti, nāssa koci paccatthiko
atk-s0505a:744_9: hoti, tenassa taṃ mānasaṃ vigatapaccatthikattā “asapatta”nti vuccati. Pariyāyavacanañhi
atk-s0505a:744_10: etaṃ, yadidaṃ paccatthiko sapattoti. Ayaṃ anupadato atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0505a:745_0: Ayaṃ panettha adhippetatthavaṇṇanā – yadetaṃ “evampi sabbabhūtesu mānasaṃ bhāvaye
atk-s0505a:745_1: aparimāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Tañcetaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhaye,
atk-s0505a:745_2: vuḍḍhiṃ, virūḷhiṃ, vepullaṃ gamaye. Kathaṃ? Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañca, uddhaṃ yāva
atk-s0505a:745_3: bhavaggā, adho yāva avīcito, tiriyaṃ yāva avasesadisā. Uddhaṃ vā āruppaṃ, adho kāmadhātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:745_4: tiriyaṃ rūpadhātuṃ anavasesaṃ pharanto. Evaṃ bhāventopi ca taṃ yathā asambādhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:745_5: averaṃ, asapattañca, hoti tathā sambādhaverasapattābhāvaṃ karonto bhāvaye. Yaṃ vā
atk-s0505a:745_6: taṃ bhāvanāsampadaṃ pattaṃ sabbattha okāsalābhavasena asambādhaṃ. Attano paresu āghātapaṭivinayena
atk-s0505a:745_7: averaṃ, attani ca paresaṃ āghātapaṭivinayena asapattaṃ hoti, taṃ asambādhaṃ averaṃ
atk-s0505a:745_8: asapattaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāti tividhaparicchede sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhayeti.
atk-s0505a:746: 151. Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa viharato iriyāpathaniyamābhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ…pe… adhiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:747_0: Tassattho – evametaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ bhāvento so “nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā, ujuṃ
atk-s0505a:747_1: kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”tiādīsu viya iriyāpathaniyamaṃ akatvā yathāsukhaṃ aññataraññatarairiyāpathabādhanavinodanaṃ
atk-s0505a:747_2: karonto tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā vigatamiddho assa, atha etaṃ
atk-s0505a:748_0: Atha vā evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni vasībhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0505a:748_1: cara”nti. Vasippatto hi tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā iriyāpathena
atk-s0505a:748_2: etaṃ mettājhānassatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti. Atha vā tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vāti na tassa
atk-s0505a:748_3: ṭhānādīni antarāyakarāni honti, apica kho so yāvatā etaṃ mettājhānassatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo
atk-s0505a:748_4: hoti, tāvatā vitamiddho hutvā adhiṭṭhāti, natthi tassa tattha dandhāyitattaṃ. Tenāha
atk-s0505a:748_5: “tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno va sayāno, yāvatāssa vitamiddho. Etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:749_0: Tassāyamadhippāyo – yaṃ taṃ “mettañca sabbalokasmi, mānasaṃ bhāvaye”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0505a:749_1: tathā bhāvaye, yathā ṭhānādīsu yāvatā iriyāpathena, ṭhānādīni vā anādiyitvā yāvatā
atk-s0505a:749_2: etaṃ mettājhānassatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo assa, tāvatā vitamiddho hutvā etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyāti.
atk-s0505a:750: Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vasībhāvaṃ dassento “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti tasmiṃ mettāvihāre niyojetvā idāni taṃ vihāraṃ thunanto āha “brahmametaṃ vihāramidhamāhū”ti.
atk-s0505a:751_0: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ “sukhinova khemino hontū”tiādiṃ katvā yāva “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti
atk-s0505a:751_1: saṃvaṇṇito mettāvihāro, etaṃ catūsu dibbabrahmaariyairiyāpathavihāresu niddosattā
atk-s0505a:751_2: attanopi paresampi atthakarattā ca idha ariyassa dhammavinaye brahmavihāramāhu, seṭṭhavihāramāhūti.
atk-s0505a:751_3: Yato satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatāssa vitamiddho,
atk-s0505a:752_0: 152. Evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nānappakārato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā
atk-s0505a:752_1: mettā sattārammaṇattā attadiṭṭhiyā āsannā hoti tasmā diṭṭhigahaṇanisedhanamukhena
atk-s0505a:752_2: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tadeva mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ariyabhūmippattiṃ dassento āha
atk-s0505a:753_0: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ “brahmametaṃ vihāramidhamāhū”ti saṃvaṇṇito mettājhānavihāro, tato
atk-s0505a:753_1: vuṭṭhāya ye tattha vitakkavicārādayo dhammā, te, tesañca vatthādianusārena rūpadhamme
atk-s0505a:753_2: pariggahetvā iminā nāmarūpaparicchedena “suddhasaṅkhārapuñjoyaṃ, na idha sattūpalabbhatī”ti
atk-s0505a:753_3: evaṃ diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma anupubbena lokuttarasīlena sīlavā hutvā lokuttarasīlasampayutteneva
atk-s0505a:753_4: sotāpattimaggasammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena dassanena sampanno. Tato paraṃ yopāyaṃ vatthukāmesu
atk-s0505a:753_5: gedho kilesakāmo appahīno hoti, tampi sakadāgāmianāgāmimaggehi tanubhāvena anavasesappahānena
atk-s0505a:753_6: ca kāmesu gedhaṃ vineyya vinayitvā vūpasametvā na hi jātu gabbhaseyya puna reti ekaṃseneva
atk-s0505a:753_7: puna gabbhaseyyaṃ na eti, suddhāvāsesu nibbattitvā tattheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā parinibbātīti.
atk-s0505a:754_0: Evaṃ bhagavā desanaṃ samāpetvā te bhikkhū āha – “gacchatha, bhikkhave, tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0505a:754_1: vanasaṇḍe viharatha. Imañca suttaṃ māsassa aṭṭhasu dhammassavanadivasesu gaṇḍiṃ ākoṭetvā
atk-s0505a:754_2: ussāretha, dhammakathaṃ karotha, sākacchatha, anumodatha, idameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ āsevatha,
atk-s0505a:754_3: bhāvetha, bahulīkarotha. Tepi vo amanussā taṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ na dassessanti, aññadatthu
atk-s0505a:754_4: atthakāmā hitakāmā bhavissantī”ti. Te “sādhū”ti bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0505a:754_5: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā, padakkhiṇaṃ katvā, tattha gantvā, tathā akaṃsu. Devatāyo
atk-s0505a:754_6: ca “bhadantā amhākaṃ atthakāmā hitakāmā”ti pītisomanassajātā hutvā sayameva senāsanaṃ
atk-s0505a:754_7: sammajjanti, uṇhodakaṃ paṭiyādenti, piṭṭhiparikammapādaparikammaṃ karonti, ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:754_8: saṃvidahanti. Te bhikkhū tatheva mettaṃ bhāvetvā tameva ca pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:754_9: ārabhitvā sabbeva tasmiṃyeva antotemāse aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā mahāpavāraṇāya
atk-s0505a:766_0: Ajja pannarasoti hemavatasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Pucchāvasikā uppatti. Hemavatena hi
atk-s0505a:766_1: puṭṭho bhagavā “chasu loko samuppanno”tiādīni abhāsi. Tattha “ajja pannaraso”tiādi
atk-s0505a:766_3: “chasu loko”tiādi bhagavatā, taṃ sabbampi samodhānetvā “hemavatasutta”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:767_0: Tattha yāyaṃ “ajja pannaraso”tiādi gāthā. Tassā uppatti – imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe
atk-s0505a:767_1: vīsativassasahassāyukesu purisesu uppajjitvā soḷasavassasahassāyukāni ṭhatvā parinibbutassa
atk-s0505a:767_2: bhagavato kassapasammāsambuddhassa mahatiyā pūjāya sarīrakiccaṃ akaṃsu. Tassa dhātuyo
atk-s0505a:767_3: avikiritvā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi esā
atk-s0505a:767_4: dhammatā. Appāyukabuddhā pana yasmā bahutarena janena adiṭṭhā eva parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0505a:767_5: tasmā dhātupūjampi katvā “tattha tattha janā puññaṃ pasavissantī”ti anukampāya “dhātuyo
atk-s0505a:767_6: vikirantū”ti adhiṭṭhahanti. Tena tesaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇāni viya dhātuyo vikiranti, seyyathāpi amhākaṃ bhagavato.
atk-s0505a:768_0: Manussā tassa bhagavato ekaṃyeva dhātugharaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ yojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:768_1: ubbedhena parikkhepena ca. Tassa ekekagāvutantarāni cattāri dvārāni ahesuṃ. Ekaṃ
atk-s0505a:768_2: dvāraṃ kikī rājā aggahesi; ekaṃ tasseva putto pathavindharo nāma; ekaṃ senāpatipamukhā
atk-s0505a:768_3: amaccā; ekaṃ seṭṭhipamukhā jānapadā rattasuvaṇṇamayā ekagghanā suvaṇṇarasapaṭibhāgā
atk-s0505a:768_4: ca nānāratanamayā iṭṭhakā ahesuṃ ekekā satasahassagghanikā. Te haritālamanosilāhi
atk-s0505a:768_5: mattikākiccaṃ surabhitelena udakakiccañca katvā taṃ cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:769_0: Evaṃ patiṭṭhite cetiye dve kulaputtā sahāyakā nikkhamitvā sammukhasāvakānaṃ therānaṃ
atk-s0505a:769_1: santike pabbajiṃsu. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi sammukhasāvakāyeva pabbājenti, upasampādenti,
atk-s0505a:769_2: nissayaṃ denti, itare na labhanti. Tato te kulaputtā “sāsane, bhante, kati dhurānī”ti
atk-s0505a:769_3: pucchiṃsu. Therā “dve dhurānī”ti kathesuṃ – “vāsadhuraṃ, pariyattidhurañcā”ti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:769_4: pabbajitena kulaputtena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike pañca vassāni vasitvā, vattapaṭivattaṃ
atk-s0505a:769_5: pūretvā, pātimokkhaṃ dve tīṇi bhāṇavārasuttantāni ca paguṇaṃ katvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:769_6: uggahetvā, kule vā gaṇe vā nirālayena araññaṃ pavisitvā, arahattasacchikiriyāya ghaṭitabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:769_7: vāyamitabbaṃ, etaṃ vāsadhuraṃ. Attano thāmena pana ekaṃ vā nikāyaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā
atk-s0505a:769_8: dve vā pañca vā nikāye pariyattito ca atthato ca suvisadaṃ sāsanaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:769_9: etaṃ pariyattidhuranti. Atha te kulaputtā “dvinnaṃ dhurānaṃ vāsadhurameva seṭṭha”nti
atk-s0505a:769_10: vatvā “mayaṃ panamhā daharā, vuḍḍhakāle vāsadhuraṃ paripūressāma, pariyattidhuraṃ
atk-s0505a:769_11: tāva pūremā”ti pariyattiṃ ārabhiṃsu. Te pakatiyāva paññavanto nacirasseva sakale
atk-s0505a:769_12: buddhavacane pakataññano vinaye ca ativiya vinicchayakusalā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ pariyattiṃ
atk-s0505a:769_13: nissāya parivāro uppajji, parivāraṃ nissāya lābho, ekamekassa pañcasatapañcasatā
atk-s0505a:769_14: bhikkhū parivārā ahesuṃ. Te satthusāsanaṃ dīpentā vihariṃsu, puna buddhakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0505a:770_0: Tadā dve bhikkhū gāmakāvāse viharanti dhammavādī ca adhammavādī ca. Adhammavādī caṇḍo
atk-s0505a:770_1: hoti pharuso, mukharo, tassa ajjhācāro itarassa pākaṭo hoti. Tato naṃ “idaṃ te, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:770_2: kammaṃ sāsanassa appatirūpa”nti codesi. So “kiṃ te diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ suta”nti vikkhipati.
atk-s0505a:770_3: Itaro “vinayadharā jānissantī”ti āha. Tato adhammavādī “sace imaṃ vatthuṃ vinayadharā
atk-s0505a:770_4: vinicchinissanti, addhā me sāsane patiṭṭhā na bhavissatī”ti ñatvā attano pakkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:770_5: kātukāmo tāvadeva parikkhāre ādāya te dve there upasaṅkamitvā samaṇaparikkhāre datvā
atk-s0505a:770_6: tesaṃ nissayena viharitumāraddho. Sabbañca nesaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ
atk-s0505a:770_7: pūretukāmo viya akāsi. Tato ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā tehi vissajjiyamānopi
atk-s0505a:770_8: aṭṭhāsiyeva. Therā “kiñci vattabbamatthī”ti taṃ pucchiṃsu. So “āma, bhante, ekena
atk-s0505a:770_9: me bhikkhunā saha ajjhācāraṃ paṭicca vivādo atthi. So yadi taṃ vatthuṃ idhāgantvā
atk-s0505a:770_10: āroceti, yathāvinicchayaṃ na vinicchinitabba”nti. Therā “osaṭaṃ vatthuṃ yathāvinicchayaṃ
atk-s0505a:770_11: na vinicchinituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu. So “evaṃ kariyamāne, bhante, mama sāsane patiṭṭhā
atk-s0505a:770_12: natthi, mayhetaṃ pāpaṃ hotu, mā tumhe vinicchinathā”ti. Te tena nippīḷiyamānā sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:770_13: So tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā puna taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā “sabbaṃ vinayadharānaṃ santike niṭṭhita”nti
atk-s0505a:770_14: taṃ dhammavādiṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ avamaññanto pharusena samudācarati. Dhammavādī “nissaṅko
atk-s0505a:770_15: ayaṃ jāto”ti tāvadeva nikkhamitvā therānaṃ parivāraṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0505a:770_16: āha – “nanu, āvuso, osaṭaṃ vatthu yathādhammaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ, anosarāpetvā eva
atk-s0505a:770_17: vā aññamaññaṃ accayaṃ desāpetvā sāmaggī kātabbā. Ime pana therā neva vatthuṃ vinicchiniṃsu,
atk-s0505a:770_18: na sāmaggiṃ akaṃsu. Kiṃ nāmeta”nti? Tepi sutvā tuṇhī ahesuṃ – “nūna kiñci ācariyehi
atk-s0505a:770_19: ñāta”nti. Tato adhammavādī okāsaṃ labhitvā “tvaṃ pubbe ‘vinayadharā jānissantī’ti
atk-s0505a:770_20: bhaṇasi. Idāni tesaṃ vinayadharānaṃ ārocehi taṃ vatthu”nti dhammavādiṃ pīḷetvā “ajjatagge
atk-s0505a:770_21: parājito tvaṃ, mā taṃ āvāsaṃ āgacchī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Tato dhammavādī there upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0505a:770_22: “tumhe sāsanaṃ anapekkhitvā ‘amhe upaṭṭhesi paritosesī’ti puggalameva apekkhittha,
atk-s0505a:770_23: sāsanaṃ arakkhitvā puggalaṃ rakkhittha, ajjatagge dāni tumhākaṃ vinicchayaṃ vinicchinituṃ
atk-s0505a:770_24: na vaṭṭati, ajja parinibbuto kassapo bhagavā”ti mahāsaddena kanditvā “naṭṭhaṃ satthu
atk-s0505a:771_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū saṃviggamānasā “mayaṃ puggalamanurakkhantā sāsanaratanaṃ sobbhe
atk-s0505a:771_1: pakkhipimhā”ti kukkuccaṃ uppādesuṃ. Te teneva kukkuccena upahatāsayattā kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:771_2: sagge nibbattitumasakkontā ekācariyo himavati hemavate pabbate nibbatti hemavato
atk-s0505a:771_3: yakkhoti nāmena. Dutiyācariyo majjhimadese sātapabbate sātāgiroti nāmena. Tepi nesaṃ
atk-s0505a:771_4: parivārā bhikkhū tesaṃyeva anuvattitvā sagge nibbattitumasakkontā tesaṃ parivārā
atk-s0505a:771_5: yakkhāva hutvā nibbattiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana paccayadāyakā gahaṭṭhā devaloke nibbatiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:772_0: Yakkhasenāpatīnañca ayaṃ dhammatā – māse māse aṭṭha divasāni dhammavinicchayatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:772_1: himavati manosilātale nāgavatimaṇḍape devatānaṃ sannipāto hoti, tattha sannipatitabbanti.
atk-s0505a:772_2: Atha sātāgirahemavatā tasmiṃ samāgame aññamaññaṃ disvā sañjāniṃsu – “tvaṃ, samma,
atk-s0505a:772_3: kuhiṃ uppanno, tvaṃ kuhi”nti attano attano uppattiṭṭhānañca pucchitvā vippaṭisārino
atk-s0505a:772_4: ahesuṃ. “Naṭṭhā mayaṃ, samma, pubbe vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ekaṃ
atk-s0505a:772_5: pāpasahāyaṃ nissāya yakkhayoniyaṃ uppannā, amhākaṃ pana paccayadāyakā kāmāvacaradevesu
atk-s0505a:772_6: nibbattā”ti. Atha sātāgiro āha – “mārisa, himavā nāma acchariyabbhutasammato, kiñci
atk-s0505a:772_7: acchariyaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā mamāpi āroceyyāsī”ti. Hemavatopi āha – “mārisa, majjhimadeso
atk-s0505a:772_8: nāma acchariyabbhutasammato, kiñci acchariyaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā mamāpi āroceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0505a:772_9: Evaṃ tesu dvīsu sahāyesu aññamaññaṃ katikaṃ katvā, tameva uppattiṃ avivajjetvā vasamānesu
atk-s0505a:772_10: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vītivattaṃ, mahāpathavī ekayojanatigāvutamattaṃ ussadā.
atk-s0505a:773_0: Athamhākaṃ bodhisatto dīpaṅkarapādamūle katapaṇidhāno yāva vessantarajātakaṃ, tāva
atk-s0505a:773_1: pāramiyo pūretvā, tusitabhavane uppajjitvā, tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā, dhammapadanidāne
atk-s0505a:773_2: vuttanayena devatāhi āyācito pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā, devatānaṃ ārocetvā,
atk-s0505a:773_3: dvattiṃsāya pubbanimittesu vattamānesu idha paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0505a:773_4: kampetvā. Tāni disvāpi ime rājayakkhā “iminā kāraṇena nibbattānī”ti na jāniṃsu. “Khiḍḍāpasutattā
atk-s0505a:773_5: nevāddasaṃsū”ti eke. Esa nayo jātiyaṃ abhinikkhamane bodhiyañca. Dhammacakkappavattane
atk-s0505a:773_6: pana pañcavaggiye āmantetvā bhagavati tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ varadhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0505a:773_7: pavattente mahābhūmicālaṃ pubbanimittaṃ pāṭihāriyāni ca etesaṃ eko sātāgiroyeva paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0505a:773_8: addasa. Nibbattikāraṇañca tesaṃ ñatvā sapariso bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0505a:773_9: assosi, na ca kiñci visesaṃ adhigacchi. Kasmā? So hi dhammaṃ suṇanto hemavataṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0505a:773_10: “āgato nu kho me sahāyako, no”ti parisaṃ oloketvā taṃ apassanto “vañcito me sahāyo,
atk-s0505a:773_11: yo evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ na suṇātī”ti vikkhittacitto ahosi.
atk-s0505a:773_12: Bhagavā ca atthaṅgatepi ca sūriye desanaṃ na niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:774_0: Atha sātāgiro “sahāyaṃ gahetvā tena sahāgamma dhammadesanaṃ sossāmī”ti hatthiyānaassayānagaruḷayānādīni
atk-s0505a:774_1: māpetvā pañcahi yakkhasatehi parivuto himavantābhimukho pāyāsi, tadā hemavatopi.
atk-s0505a:774_3: hutvāva pativigacchanti, na ciraṭṭhitikāni honti, dhammacakkapavattane pana tāni
atk-s0505a:774_4: savisesāni hutvā, cirataraṃ ṭhatvā nirujjhanti, tasmā himavati taṃ acchariyapātubhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:774_5: disvā “yato ahaṃ jāto, na kadāci ayaṃ pabbato evaṃ abhirāmo bhūtapubbo, handa dāni
atk-s0505a:774_6: mama sahāyaṃ gahetvā āgamma tena saha imaṃ pupphasiriṃ anubhavissāmī”ti tatheva majjhimadesābhimukho
atk-s0505a:774_7: āgacchati. Te ubhopi rājagahassa upari samāgantvā aññamaññassa āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:774_8: Hemavato āha – “yato ahaṃ, mārisa, jāto, nāyaṃ pabbato evaṃ akālakusumitehi rukkhehi
atk-s0505a:774_9: abhirāmo bhūtapubbo, tasmā etaṃ pupphasiriṃ tayā saddhiṃ anubhavissāmīti āgatomhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:774_10: Sātāgiro āha – “jānāsi, pana, tvaṃ mārisa, yena kāraṇena imaṃ akālapupphapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0505a:774_11: jāta”nti? “Na jānāmi, mārisā”ti. “Imaṃ, mārisa, pāṭihāriyaṃ na kevala himavanteyeva,
atk-s0505a:774_12: apica kho pana dasasahassilokadhātūsu nibbattaṃ, sammāsambuddho loke uppanno, ajja
atk-s0505a:774_13: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, tena kāraṇenā”ti. Evaṃ sātāgiro hemavatassa buddhuppādaṃ
atk-s0505a:774_14: kathetvā, taṃ bhagavato santikaṃ ānetukāmo imaṃ gāthamāha. Keci pana gotamake cetiye
atk-s0505a:775_0: 153. Tattha ajjāti ayaṃ rattindivo pakkhagaṇanato pannaraso, upavasitabbato uposatho.
atk-s0505a:775_1: Tīsu vā uposathesu ajja pannaraso uposatho, na cātuddasī uposatho, na sāmaggīuposatho.
atk-s0505a:775_3: vattati. “Āyāmāvuso, kappina, uposathaṃ gamissāmā”tiādīsu hi pātimokkhuddese uposathasaddo.
atk-s0505a:775_4: “Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādikesu
atk-s0505a:775_5: aṭṭhaṅgesu. “Suddhassa ve sadā phaggu, suddhassuposatho sadā”tiādīsu upavāse. “Uposatho
atk-s0505a:775_7: divase. Tasmā avasesatthaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivasaṃyeva niyāmento āha –
atk-s0505a:775_8: “ajja pannaraso uposatho”ti. Pāṭipado dutiyoti evaṃ gaṇiyamāne ajja pannaraso divasoti attho.
atk-s0505a:776_0: Divi bhavāni dibbāni, dibbāni ettha atthīti dibbā. Kāni tāni? Rūpāni. Tañhi rattiṃ
atk-s0505a:776_2: candappabhāya ca sakalajambudīpo alaṅkato ahosi. Visesālaṅkato ca paramavisuddhidevassa
atk-s0505a:777_0: Evaṃ rattiguṇavaṇṇanāpadesenāpi sahāyassa cittappasādaṃ janento buddhuppādaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0505a:777_1: āha “anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ, handa passāma gotama”nti. Tattha anomehi alāmakehi sabbākāraparipūrehi
atk-s0505a:777_2: guṇehi nāmaṃ assāti anomanāmo. Tathā hissa “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti
atk-s0505a:777_3: buddho”tiādinā nayena buddhoti anomehi guṇehi nāmaṃ, “bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti
atk-s0505a:777_4: bhagavā”tiādinā nayena ca anomehi guṇehi nāmaṃ. Esa nayo “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno”tiādīsu.
atk-s0505a:777_5: Diṭṭhadhammikādīsu atthesu devamanusse anusāsati “imaṃ pajahatha, imaṃ samādāya vattathā”ti
atk-s0505a:777_6: satthā. Apica “satthā bhagavā satthavāho, yathā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāretī”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:777_7: niddese vuttanayenāpi satthā. Taṃ anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ. Handāti byavasānatthe nipāto.
atk-s0505a:777_8: Passāmāti tena attānaṃ saha saṅgahetvā paccuppannavacanaṃ. Gotamanti gotamagottaṃ.
atk-s0505a:777_9: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? “Satthā, na satthā”ti mā vimatiṃ akāsi, ekantabyavasito hutvāva
atk-s0505a:778_0: 154. Evaṃ vutte hemavato “ayaṃ sātāgiro ‘anomanāmaṃ satthāra’nti bhaṇanto tassa sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0505a:778_1: pakāseti, sabbaññuno ca dullabhā loke, sabbaññupaṭiññehi pūraṇādisadiseheva loko
atk-s0505a:778_2: upadduto. So pana yadi sabbaññū, addhā tādilakkhaṇappatto bhavissati, tena taṃ evaṃ
atk-s0505a:778_3: pariggaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā tādilakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto āha – “kacci mano”ti.
atk-s0505a:779_0: Tattha kaccīti pucchā. Manoti cittaṃ. Supaṇihitoti suṭṭhu ṭhapito, acalo asampavedhī.
atk-s0505a:779_1: Sabbesu bhūtesu sabbabhūtesu. Tādinoti tādilakkhaṇappattasseva sato. Pucchā eva vā
atk-s0505a:779_2: ayaṃ “so te satthā sabbabhūtesu tādī, udāhu no”ti. Iṭṭhe aniṭṭhe cāti evarūpe ārammaṇe.
atk-s0505a:779_3: Saṅkappāti vitakkā. Vasīkatāti vasaṃ gamitā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ tvaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0505a:779_4: vadasi, tassa te satthuno kacci tādilakkhaṇappattassa sato sabbabhūtesu mano supaṇihito,
atk-s0505a:779_5: udāhu yāva calanapaccayaṃ na labhati, tāva supaṇihito viya khāyati. So vā te satthā
atk-s0505a:779_6: kacci sabbabhūtesu samacittena tādī, udāhu no, ye ca kho iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0505a:779_7: rāgadosavasena saṅkappā uppajjeyyuṃ, tyāssa kacci vasīkatā, udāhu kadāci tesampi vasena vattatīti.
atk-s0505a:780_0: 155. Tato sātāgiro bhagavato sabbaññubhāve byavasitattā sabbe sabbaññuguṇe anujānanto
atk-s0505a:780_1: āha “mano cassa supaṇihito”tiādi. Tattha supaṇihitoti suṭṭhu ṭhapito, pathavīsamo
atk-s0505a:780_3: akampiyaṭṭhena. Anacchariyañcetaṃ, bhagavato idāni sabbākārasampannattā sabbaññubhāve
atk-s0505a:780_4: ṭhitassa mano supaṇihito acalo bhaveyya. Yassa tiracchānabhūtassāpi sarāgādikāle
atk-s0505a:780_5: chaddantanāgakule uppannassa savisena sallena viddhassa acalo ahosi, vadhakepi tasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:780_6: nappadussi, aññadatthu tasseva attano dante chetvā adāsi; tathā mahākapibhūtassa
atk-s0505a:780_7: mahatiyā silāya sīse pahaṭassāpi tasseva ca maggaṃ dassesi; tathā vidhurapaṇḍitabhūtassa
atk-s0505a:780_8: pādesu gahetvā saṭṭhiyojane kāḷapabbatapapāte pakkhittassāpi aññadatthu tasseva yakkhassatthāya
atk-s0505a:780_9: dhammaṃ desesi. Tasmā sammadeva āha sātāgiro – “mano cassa supaṇihito”ti.
atk-s0505a:781: Sabbabhūtesu tādinoti sabbasattesu tādilakkhaṇappattasseva sato mano supaṇihito, na yāva paccayaṃ na labhatīti attho. Tattha bhagavato tādilakkhaṇaṃ pañcadhā veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:782: “Bhagavā pañcahākārehi tādī, iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādī, cattāvīti tādī, muttāvīti tādī, tiṇṇāvīti tādī, tanniddesāti tādī. Kathaṃ bhagavā iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādī? Bhagavā lābhepi tādī”ti.
atk-s0505a:783_0: Evamādi sabbaṃ niddese vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. Lābhādayo ca tassa mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:783_1: vitthāritanayena veditabbā. “Pucchā eva vā ayaṃ. So te satthā sabbabhūtesu tādī,
atk-s0505a:783_2: udāhu no”ti imasmimpi vikappe sabbabhūtesu samacittatāya tādī amhākaṃ satthāti attho.
atk-s0505a:783_3: Ayañhi bhagavā sukhūpasaṃhārakāmatāya dukkhāpanayanakāmatāya ca sabbasattesu samacitto,
atk-s0505a:783_4: yādiso attani, tādiso paresu, yādiso mātari mahāmāyāya, tādiso ciñcamāṇavikāya, yādiso
atk-s0505a:783_5: pitari suddhodane, tādiso suppabuddhe, yādiso putte rāhule, tādiso vadhakesu devadattadhanapālakaaṅgulimālādīsu.
atk-s0505a:783_6: Sadevake lokepi tādī. Tasmā sammadevāha sātāgiro – “sabbabhūtesu tādino”ti.
atk-s0505a:784_0: Atho iṭṭhe aniṭṭhe cāti. Ettha pana evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo – yaṃ kiñci iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0505a:784_1: vā ārammaṇaṃ, sabbappakārehi tattha ye rāgadosavasena saṅkappā uppajjeyyuṃ, tyāssa
atk-s0505a:784_2: anuttarena maggena rāgādīnaṃ pahīnattā vasīkatā, na kadāci tesaṃ vase vattati. So
atk-s0505a:784_3: hi bhagavā anāvilasaṅkappo suvimuttacitto suvimuttapaññoti. Ettha ca supaṇihitamanatāya
atk-s0505a:784_4: ayonisomanasikārābhāvo vutto. Sabbabhūtesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhehi so yattha bhaveyya, taṃ
atk-s0505a:784_5: sattasaṅkhārabhedato duvidhamārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Saṅkappavasībhāvena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe
atk-s0505a:784_6: tassa manasikārābhāvato kilesappahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Supaṇihitamanatāya ca manosamācārasuddhi,
atk-s0505a:784_7: sabbabhūtesu tāditāya kāyasamācārasuddhi, saṅkappavasībhāvena vitakkamūlakattā vācāya
atk-s0505a:784_10: ariyiddhi, tāya cassa sabbaññubhāvo vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:785_0: 156. Evaṃ hemavato pubbe manodvāravaseneva tādibhāvaṃ pucchitvā tañca paṭijānantamimaṃ
atk-s0505a:785_1: sutvā daḷhīkammatthaṃ idāni dvārattayavasenāpi, pubbe vā saṅkhepena kāyavacīmanodvārasuddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:785_2: pucchitvā tañca paṭijānantamimaṃ sutvā daḷhīkammatthameva vitthārenāpi pucchanto
atk-s0505a:785_3: āha “kacci adinna”nti. Tattha gāthābandhasukhatthāya paṭhamaṃ adinnādānaviratiṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:785_4: Ārā pamādamhāti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggato dūrībhāvena abrahmacariyaviratiṃ
atk-s0505a:785_5: pucchati. “Ārā pamadamhā”tipi paṭhanti, ārā mātugāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Jhānaṃ na riñcatīti
atk-s0505a:785_6: iminā pana tassāyeva tividhāya kāyaduccaritaviratiyā balavabhāvaṃ pucchati. Jhānayuttassa
atk-s0505a:786_0: 157. Atha sātāgiro yasmā bhagavā na kevalaṃ etarahi, atītepi addhāne dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0505a:786_1: adinnādānādīhi paṭivirato, tassā tassāyeva ca viratiyā ānubhāvena taṃ taṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:786_2: paṭilabhi, sadevako cassa loko “adinnādānā paṭivirato samaṇo gotamo”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:786_3: vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Tasmā vissaṭṭhāya vācāya sīhanādaṃ nadanto āha “na so adinnaṃ ādiyatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:786_4: Taṃ atthato pākaṭameva. Imissāpi gāthāya tatiyapāde “pamādamhā pamadamhā”ti dvidhā
atk-s0505a:786_5: pāṭho. Catutthapāde ca jhānaṃ na riñcatīti jhānaṃ rittakaṃ suññakaṃ na karoti, na
atk-s0505a:787_0: 158. Evaṃ kāyadvāre suddhiṃ sutvā idāni vacīdvāre suddhiṃ pucchanto āha – “kacci
atk-s0505a:787_1: musā na bhaṇatī”ti. Ettha khīṇātīti khīṇo, vihiṃsati badhatīti attho. Vācāya patho
atk-s0505a:787_2: byappatho, khīṇo byappatho assāti khīṇabyappatho. Taṃ na-kārena paṭisedhetvā pucchati
atk-s0505a:787_3: “na khīṇabyappatho”ti, na pharusavācoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Nākhīṇabyappatho”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0505a:787_4: na akhīṇavacanoti attho. Pharusavacanañhi paresaṃ hadaye akhīyamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Tādisavacano
atk-s0505a:787_5: kacci na soti vuttaṃ hoti. Vibhūtīti vināso, vibhūtiṃ kāsati karoti vāti vibhūtikaṃ,
atk-s0505a:787_6: vibhūtikameva vebhūtikaṃ, vebhūtiyantipi vuccati, pesuññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tañhi
atk-s0505a:787_7: sattānaṃ aññamaññato bhedanena vināsaṃ karoti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0505a:788_0: 159. Atha sātāgiro yasmā bhagavā na kevalaṃ etarahi, atītepi addhāne dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0505a:788_1: musāvādādīhi paṭivirato, tassā tassāyeva ca viratiyā ānubhāvena taṃ taṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:788_2: paṭilabhi, sadevako cassa loko “musāvādā paṭivirato samaṇo gotamo”ti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0505a:788_3: Tasmā vissaṭṭhāya vācāya sīhanādaṃ nadanto āha, “musā ca so na bhaṇatī”ti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:788_4: musāti vinidhāya diṭṭhādīni paravisaṃvādanavacanaṃ. Taṃ so na bhaṇati. Dutiyapāde
atk-s0505a:788_5: pana paṭhamatthavasena na khīṇabyappathoti, dutiyatthavasena nākhīṇabyappathoti pāṭho.
atk-s0505a:788_6: Catutthapāde mantāti paññā vuccati. Bhagavā yasmā tāya mantāya paricchinditvā atthameva
atk-s0505a:788_7: bhāsati atthato anapetavacanaṃ, na samphaṃ. Aññāṇapurekkhārañhi niratthakavacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:788_8: buddhānaṃ natthi. Tasmā āha – “mantā atthaṃ so bhāsatī”ti. Sesamettha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:789_0: 160. Evaṃ vacīdvārasuddhimpi sutvā idāni manodvārasuddhiṃ pucchanto āha “kacci na
atk-s0505a:789_1: rajjati kāmesū”ti. Tattha kāmāti vatthukāmā. Tesu kilesakāmena na rajjatīti pucchanto
atk-s0505a:789_2: anabhijjhālutaṃ pucchati. Anāvilanti pucchanto byāpādena āvilabhāvaṃ sandhāya abyāpādataṃ
atk-s0505a:789_3: pucchati. Mohaṃ atikkantoti pucchanto yena mohena mūḷho micchādiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, tassātikkamena
atk-s0505a:789_4: sammādiṭṭhitaṃ pucchati. Dhammesu cakkhumāti pucchanto sabbadhammesu appaṭihatassa
atk-s0505a:789_5: ñāṇacakkhuno, pañcacakkhuvisayesu vā dhammesu pañcannampi cakkhūnaṃ vasena sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0505a:790_0: 161. Atha sātāgiro yasmā bhagavā appatvāva arahattaṃ anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ
atk-s0505a:790_1: pahīnattā neva kāmesu rajjati, na byāpādena āvilacitto, sotāpattimaggeneva ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayassa
atk-s0505a:790_2: saccapaṭicchādakamohassa pahīnattā mohaṃ atikkanto, sāmañca saccāni abhisambujjhitvā
atk-s0505a:790_3: buddhoti vimokkhantikaṃ nāmaṃ yathāvuttāni ca cakkhūni paṭilabhi, tasmā tassa manodvārasuddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:790_4: sabbaññutañca ugghosento āha “na so rajjati kāmesū”ti.
atk-s0505a:791_0: 162. Evaṃ hemavato bhagavato dvārattayapārisuddhiṃ sabbaññutañca sutvā haṭṭho udaggo
atk-s0505a:791_1: atītajātiyaṃ bāhusaccavisadāya paññāya asajjamānavacanappatho hutvā acchariyabbhutarūpe
atk-s0505a:791_2: sabbaññuguṇe sotukāmo āha “kacci vijjāya sampanno”ti. Tattha vijjāya sampannoti iminā
atk-s0505a:791_3: dassanasampattiṃ pucchati, saṃsuddhacāraṇoti iminā gamanasampattiṃ. Chandavasena
atk-s0505a:791_4: cettha dīghaṃ katvā cākāramāha, saṃsuddhacaraṇoti attho. Āsavā khīṇāti iminā etāya
atk-s0505a:791_6: pucchati, natthi punabbhavoti iminā dutiyanibbānadhātupattisamatthataṃ, paccavekkhaṇañāṇena
atk-s0505a:792_0: 163. Tato yā esā “so anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsa”ntiādinā nayena bhayabheravādīsu tividhā,
atk-s0505a:792_1: “so evaṃ samāhite citte…pe… āneñjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharatī”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:792_2: nayena ambaṭṭhādīsu aṭṭhavidhā vijjā vuttā, tāya yasmā sabbāyapi sabbākārasampannāya
atk-s0505a:792_3: bhagavā upeto. Yañcetaṃ “idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hoti, indriyesu
atk-s0505a:792_4: guttadvāro hoti, bhojane mattaññū hoti, jāgariyaṃ anuyutto hoti, sattahi saddhammehi
atk-s0505a:792_5: samannāgato hoti, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī
atk-s0505a:792_6: hotī”ti evaṃ uddisitvā “kathañca, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hotī”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:792_7: nayena sekhasutte niddiṭṭhaṃ pannarasappabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ. Tañca yasmā sabbūpakkilesappahānena
atk-s0505a:792_8: bhagavato ativiya saṃsuddhaṃ. Yepime kāmāsavādayo cattāro āsavā, tepi yasmā sabbe
atk-s0505a:792_9: saparivārā savāsanā bhagavato khīṇā. Yasmā ca imāya vijjācaraṇasampadāya khīṇāsavo
atk-s0505a:792_10: hutvā tadā bhagavā “natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti paccavekkhitvā ṭhito, tasmā sātāgiro
atk-s0505a:792_11: bhagavato sabbaññubhāve byavasāyena samussāhitahadayo sabbepi guṇe anujānanto āha
atk-s0505a:793_0: 164. Tato hemavato “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti bhagavati nikkaṅkho hutvā ākāse ṭhitoyeva
atk-s0505a:793_1: bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto sātāgirañca ārādhento āha “sampannaṃ munino citta”nti. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:793_2: – sampannaṃ munino cittaṃ, “mano cassa supaṇihito”ti ettha vuttatādibhāvena puṇṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:793_3: sampuṇṇaṃ, “na so adinnaṃ ādiyatī”ti ettha vuttakāyakammunā, “na so rajjati kāmesū”ti
atk-s0505a:793_4: ettha vuttamanokammunā ca puṇṇaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ, “musā ca so na bhaṇatī”ti ettha vuttabyappathena
atk-s0505a:793_5: ca vacīkammunāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ sampannacittañca anuttarāya vijjācaraṇasampadāya
atk-s0505a:793_6: sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampannañca imehi guṇehi “mano cassa supaṇihito”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:793_7: dhammato naṃ pasaṃsasi, sabhāvato tacchato bhūtato eva naṃ pasaṃsasi, na kevalaṃ
atk-s0505a:794_0: 165-166. Tato sātāgiropi “evametaṃ, mārisa, suṭṭhu tayā ñātañca anumoditañcā”ti adhippāyena
atk-s0505a:794_1: tameva saṃrādhento āha – “sampannaṃ munino…pe… dhammato anumodasī”ti. Evañca pana
atk-s0505a:794_2: vatvā puna bhagavato dassane taṃ abhitthavayamāno āha “sampannaṃ…pe… handa passāma gotama”nti.
atk-s0505a:795_0: 167. Atha hemavato attano abhirucitaguṇehi purimajātibāhusaccabalena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:795_1: abhitthunanto sātāgiraṃ āha – “eṇijaṅghaṃ…pe… ehi passāma gotama”nti. Tassattho –
atk-s0505a:795_2: eṇimigasseva jaṅghā assāti eṇijaṅgho. Buddhānañhi eṇimigasseva anupubbavaṭṭā jaṅghā
atk-s0505a:795_3: honti, na purato nimmaṃsā pacchato susumārakucchi viya uddhumātā. Kisā ca buddhā
atk-s0505a:795_4: honti dīgharassasamavaṭṭitayuttaṭṭhānesu tathārūpāya aṅgapaccaṅgasampattiyā, na vaṭharapurisā
atk-s0505a:795_5: viya thūlā. Paññāya vilikhitakilesattā vā kisā. Ajjhattikabāhirasapattaviddhaṃsanato
atk-s0505a:795_6: vīrā. Ekāsanabhojitāya parimitabhojitāya ca appāhārā, na dvattimattālopabhojitāya. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:796_0: “Ahaṃ kho pana, udāyi, appekadā iminā pattena samatittikampi bhuñjāmi, bhiyyopi bhuñjāmi.
atk-s0505a:796_1: ‘Appāhāro samaṇo gotamo appāhāratāya ca vaṇṇavādī’ti iti ce maṃ, udāyi, sāvakā sakkareyyuṃ,
atk-s0505a:796_2: garuṃ kareyyuṃ, māneyyuṃ, pūjeyyuṃ, sakkatvā, garuṃ katvā, upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
atk-s0505a:796_3: Ye te, udāyi, mama sāvakā kosakāhārāpi aḍḍhakosakāhārāpi beluvāhārāpi aḍḍhabeluvāhārāpi,
atk-s0505a:796_4: na maṃ te iminā dhammena sakkareyyuṃ…pe… upanissāya vihareyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:797_0: Āhāre chandarāgābhāvena alolupā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhārenti moneyyasampattiyā
atk-s0505a:797_1: munino. Anagārikatāya vivekaninnamānasatāya ca vane jhāyanti. Tenāha hemavato yakkho
atk-s0505a:798_0: 168. Evañca vatvā puna tassa bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sotukāmatāya “sīhaṃvekacara”nti
atk-s0505a:798_1: imaṃ gāthamāha. Tassattho – sīhaṃvāti durāsadaṭṭhena khamanaṭṭhena nibbhayaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:798_2: ca kesarasīhasadisaṃ. Yāya taṇhāya “taṇhādutiyo puriso”ti vuccati, tassā abhāvena
