atk-s0505a:798_3: ekacaraṃ, ekissā lokadhātuyā dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ anuppattitopi ekacaraṃ. Khaggavisāṇasutte
atk-s0505a:798_4: vuttanayenāpi cettha taṃ taṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. Nāganti punabbhavaṃ neva gantāraṃ nāgantāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:798_5: Atha vā āguṃ na karotītipi nāgo. Balavātipi nāgo. Taṃ nāgaṃ. Kāmesu anapekkhinanti
atk-s0505a:798_6: dvīsupi kāmesu chandarāgābhāvena anapekkhinaṃ. Upasaṅkamma pucchāma, maccupāsappamocananti
atk-s0505a:798_7: taṃ evarūpaṃ mahesiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tebhūmakavaṭṭassa maccupāsassa pamocanaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0505a:798_8: nibbānaṃ pucchāma. Yena vā upāyena dukkhasamudayasaṅkhātā maccupāsā pamuccati, taṃ
atk-s0505a:798_9: maccupāsappamocanaṃ pucchāmāti. Imaṃ gāthaṃ hemavato sātāgirañca sātāgiraparisañca
atk-s0505a:799_0: Tena kho pana samayena āsāḷhīnakkhattaṃ ghositaṃ ahosi. Atha samantato alaṅkatapaṭiyatte
atk-s0505a:799_1: devanagare siriṃ paccanubhontī viya rājagahe kāḷī nāma kuraragharikā upāsikā pāsādamāruyha
atk-s0505a:799_2: sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā gabbhaparissamaṃ vinodentī savātappadese utuggahaṇatthaṃ ṭhitā
atk-s0505a:799_3: tesaṃ yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ taṃ buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānato
atk-s0505a:799_4: assosi. Sutvā ca “evaṃ vividhaguṇasamannāgatā buddhā”ti buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0505a:799_5: tāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā tattheva ṭhitā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Tato eva
atk-s0505a:799_6: bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ, yadidaṃ
atk-s0505a:800_0: 169. Tepi yakkhasenāpatayo sahassayakkhaparivārā majjhimayāmasamaye isipatanaṃ patvā,
atk-s0505a:800_1: dhammacakkappavattitapallaṅkeneva nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā, imāya
atk-s0505a:800_2: gāthāya bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā okāsamakārayiṃsu “akkhātāraṃ pavattāra”nti. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:800_3: – ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmake dhamme “idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādinā
atk-s0505a:800_4: nayena saccānaṃ vavatthānakathāya akkhātāraṃ, “‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
atk-s0505a:800_5: pariññeyya’nti me bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena tesu kiccañāṇakatañāṇappavattanena pavattāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:800_6: Ye vā dhammā yathā voharitabbā, tesu tathā vohārakathanena akkhātāraṃ, tesaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:800_7: dhammānaṃ sattānurūpato pavattāraṃ. Ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññūnaṃ vā desanāya akkhātāraṃ,
atk-s0505a:800_8: neyyānaṃ paṭipādanena pavattāraṃ. Uddesena vā akkhātāraṃ, vibhaṅgena tehi tehi pakārehi
atk-s0505a:800_9: vacanato pavattāraṃ. Bodhipakkhiyānaṃ vā salakkhaṇakathanena akkhātāraṃ, sattānaṃ
atk-s0505a:800_10: cittasantāne pavattanena pavattāraṃ. Saṅkhepato vā tīhi parivaṭṭehi saccānaṃ kathanena
atk-s0505a:800_11: akkhātāraṃ, vitthārato pavattāraṃ. “Saddhindriyaṃ dhammo, taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti
atk-s0505a:800_12: dhammacakka”nti evamādinā paṭisambhidānayena vitthāritassa dhammacakkassa pavattanato pavattāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:801_0: Sabbadhammānanti catubhūmakadhammānaṃ. Pāragunti chahākārehi pāraṃ gataṃ abhiññāya,
atk-s0505a:801_1: pariññāya, pahānena, bhāvanāya, sacchikiriyāya, samāpattiyā. So hi bhagavā sabbadhamme
atk-s0505a:801_2: abhijānanto gatoti abhiññāpāragū, pañcupādānakkhandhe parijānanto gatoti pariññāpāragū,
atk-s0505a:801_3: sabbakilese pajahanto gatoti pahānapāragū, cattāro magge bhāvento gatoti bhāvanāpāragū,
atk-s0505a:801_4: nirodhaṃ sacchikaronto gatoti sacchikiriyāpāragū, sabbā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto
atk-s0505a:801_5: gatoti samāpattipāragū. Evaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ pāraguṃ. Buddhaṃ verabhayātītanti aññāṇasayanato
atk-s0505a:801_6: paṭibuddhattā buddhaṃ, sabbena vā saraṇavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttenatthena buddhaṃ, pañcaverabhayānaṃ
atk-s0505a:801_7: atītattā verabhayātītaṃ. Evaṃ bhagavantaṃ atitthavantā “mayaṃ pucchāma gotama”nti okāsamakārayiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:802_0: 170. Atha nesaṃ yakkhānaṃ tejena ca paññāya ca aggo hemavato yathādhippetaṃ pucchitabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:802_1: pucchanto “kismiṃ loko”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tassādipāde kisminti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe
atk-s0505a:802_2: bhummavacanaṃ, kismiṃ uppanne loko samuppanno hotīti ayañhettha adhippāyo. Sattalokasaṅkhāraloke
atk-s0505a:802_3: sandhāya pucchati. Kismiṃ kubbati santhavanti ahanti vā mamanti vā taṇhādiṭṭhisanthavaṃ
atk-s0505a:802_4: kismiṃ kubbati, adhikaraṇatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Kissa lokoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:802_5: kiṃ upādāya lokoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti ayañhettha adhippāyo. Kismiṃ lokoti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇakāraṇatthesu
atk-s0505a:802_6: bhummavacanaṃ. Kismiṃ sati kena kāraṇena loko vihaññati pīḷīyati bādhīyatīti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:803_0: 171. Atha bhagavā yasmā chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu uppannesu sattaloko ca
atk-s0505a:803_1: dhanadhaññādivasena saṅkhāraloko ca uppanno hoti, yasmā cettha sattaloko tesveva
atk-s0505a:803_2: chasu duvidhampi santhavaṃ karoti. Cakkhāyatanaṃ vā hi “ahaṃ mama”nti gaṇhāti avasesesu
atk-s0505a:803_3: vā aññataraṃ. Yathāha – “cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya, taṃ na upapajjatī”tiādi. Yasmā
atk-s0505a:803_4: ca etāniyeva cha upādāya duvidhopi lokoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, yasmā ca tesveva chasu
atk-s0505a:804_0: “Hatthesu, bhikkhave, sati ādānanikkhepanaṃ hoti, pādesu sati abhikkamapaṭikkamo
atk-s0505a:804_1: hoti, pabbesu sati samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hoti, kucchismiṃ sati jighacchāpipāsā hoti;
atk-s0505a:804_2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ sati cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0505a:805: Tathā tesu ādhārabhūtesu paṭihato saṅkhāraloko vihaññati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:808: Tathā tehiyeva kāraṇabhūtehi duvidhopi loko vihaññati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:810: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā. Kena ādittaṃ? Rāgagginā”ti evamādi.
atk-s0505a:811: Tasmā chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanavasena taṃ pucchaṃ vissajjento āha “chasu loko samuppanno”ti.
atk-s0505a:812_0: 172. Atha so yakkho attanā vaṭṭavasena puṭṭhapañhaṃ bhagavatā dvādasāyatanavasena
atk-s0505a:812_1: saṅkhipitvā vissajjitaṃ na suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā tañca atthaṃ tappaṭipakkhañca ñātukāmo
atk-s0505a:812_2: saṅkhepeneva vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto āha “katamaṃ ta”nti. Tattha upādātabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:812_3: upādānaṃ, dukkhasaccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yattha loko vihaññatīti “chasu loko vihaññatī”ti
atk-s0505a:812_4: evaṃ bhagavatā yattha chabbidhe upādāne loko vihaññatīti vutto, taṃ katamaṃ upādānanti?
atk-s0505a:812_5: Evaṃ upaḍḍhagāthāya sarūpeneva dukkhasaccaṃ pucchi. Samudayasaccaṃ pana tassa kāraṇabhāvena
atk-s0505a:812_6: gahitameva hoti. Niyyānaṃ pucchitoti imāya pana upaḍḍhagāthāya maggasaccaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:812_7: Maggasaccena hi ariyasāvako dukkhaṃ parijānanto, samudayaṃ pajahanto, nirodhaṃ sacchikaronto,
atk-s0505a:812_8: maggaṃ bhāvento lokamhā niyyāti, tasmā niyyānanti vuccati. Kathanti kena pakārena.
atk-s0505a:812_9: Dukkhā pamuccatīti “upādāna”nti vuttā vaṭṭadukkhā pamokkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Evamettha sarūpeneva
atk-s0505a:812_10: maggasaccaṃ pucchi, nirodhasaccaṃ pana tassa visayabhāvena gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0505a:813_0: 173. Evaṃ yakkhena sarūpena dassetvā ca adassetvā ca catusaccavasena pañhaṃ puṭṭho
atk-s0505a:813_1: bhagavā teneva nayena vissajjento āha “pañca kāmaguṇā”ti. Tattha pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātagocaraggahaṇena
atk-s0505a:813_2: taggocarāni pañcāyatanāni gahitāneva honti. Mano chaṭṭho etesanti manochaṭṭhā. Paveditāti
atk-s0505a:813_3: pakāsitā. Ettha ajjhattikesu chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa gahaṇena tassa visayabhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:813_4: dhammāyatanaṃ gahitameva hoti. Evaṃ “katamaṃ taṃ upādāna”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento
atk-s0505a:813_5: punapi dvādasāyatanānaṃ vaseneva dukkhasaccaṃ pakāsesi. Manogahaṇena vā sattannaṃ
atk-s0505a:813_6: viññāṇadhātūnaṃ gahitattā tāsu purimapañcaviññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tāsaṃ vatthūni pañca
atk-s0505a:813_8: dhammāyatanaṃ gahitamevāti evampi dvādasāyatanavasena dukkhasaccaṃ pakāsesi. Lokuttaramanāyatanadhammāyatanekadeso
atk-s0505a:813_9: panettha yattha loko vihaññati, taṃ sandhāya niddiṭṭhattā na saṅgayhati.
atk-s0505a:814_0: Ettha chandaṃ virājetvāti ettha dvādasāyatanabhede dukkhasacce tānevāyatanāni khandhato
atk-s0505a:814_1: dhātuto nāmarūpatoti tathā tathā vavatthapetvā, tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā, vipassanto
atk-s0505a:814_2: arahattamaggapariyosānāya vipassanāya taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ chandaṃ sabbaso virājetvā vinetvā
atk-s0505a:814_3: viddhaṃsetvāti attho. Evaṃ dukkhā pamuccatīti iminā pakārena etasmā vaṭṭadukkhā pamuccatīti.
atk-s0505a:814_4: Evamimāya upaḍḍhagāthāya “niyyānaṃ pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ dukkhā pamuccatī”ti ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:814_5: pañho vissajjito hoti, maggasaccañca pakāsitaṃ samudayanirodhasaccāni panettha purimanayeneva
atk-s0505a:814_6: saṅgahitattā pakāsitāneva hontīti veditabbāni. Upaḍḍhagāthāya vā dukkhasaccaṃ, chandena
atk-s0505a:814_8: vā maggasaccaṃ. “Eva”nti upāyanidassanena maggasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhanti vacanato
atk-s0505a:814_9: vā. “Dukkhā pamuccatī”ti dukkhapamokkhena nirodhasaccanti evamettha cattāri saccāni
atk-s0505a:815_0: 174. Evaṃ catusaccagabbhāya gāthāya lakkhaṇato niyyānaṃ pakāsetvā puna tadeva sakena
atk-s0505a:815_1: niruttābhilāpena nigamento āha “etaṃ lokassa niyyāna”nti. Ettha etanti pubbe vuttassa
atk-s0505a:815_2: niddeso, lokassāti tedhātukalokassa. Yathātathanti aviparītaṃ. Etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmīti
atk-s0505a:815_3: sacepi maṃ sahassakkhattuṃ puccheyyātha, etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmi, na aññaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā
atk-s0505a:815_4: evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati, na aññathāti adhippāyo. Atha vā etena niyyānena ekadvattikkhatuṃ
atk-s0505a:815_5: niggatānampi etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmi, uparivisesādhigamāyapi etadeva ahamakkhāmīti attho.
atk-s0505a:815_6: Kasmā? Yasmā evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati asesanissesāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:815_7: Desanāpariyosāne dvepi yakkhasenāpatayo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu saddhiṃ yakkhasahassena.
atk-s0505a:816_0: 175. Atha hemavato pakatiyāpi dhammagaru idāni ariyabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0505a:816_1: atitto bhagavato vicitrapaṭibhānāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ sekkhāsekkhabhūmiṃ pucchanto
atk-s0505a:816_2: “ko sūdha taratī”ti gāthamabhāsi. Tattha ko sūdha tarati oghanti iminā caturoghaṃ
atk-s0505a:816_3: ko taratīti sekkhabhūmiṃ pucchati avisesena. Yasmā aṇṇavanti na vitthatamattaṃ nāpi
atk-s0505a:816_4: gambhīramattaṃ apica pana yaṃ vitthatatarañca gambhīratarañca, taṃ vuccati. Tādiso
atk-s0505a:816_5: ca saṃsāraṇṇavo. Ayañhi samantato pariyantābhāvena vitthato, heṭṭhā patiṭṭhābhāvena
atk-s0505a:816_6: upari ālambanābhāvena ca gambhīro, tasmā “ko idha tarati aṇṇavaṃ, tasmiñca appatiṭṭhe
atk-s0505a:816_7: anālambe gambhīre aṇṇave ko na sīdatī”ti asekkhabhūmiṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:817_0: 176. Atha bhagavā yo bhikkhu jīvitahetupi vītikkamaṃ akaronto sabbadā sīlasampanno
atk-s0505a:817_1: lokiyalokuttarāya ca paññāya paññavā, upacārappanāsamādhinā iriyāpathaheṭṭhimamaggaphalehi
atk-s0505a:817_2: ca susamāhito, tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāya niyakajjhattacintanasīlo, sātaccakiriyāvahāya
atk-s0505a:817_3: appamādasatiyā ca samannāgato. Yasmā so catutthena maggena imaṃ suduttaraṃ oghaṃ
atk-s0505a:817_4: anavasesaṃ tarati, tasmā sekkhabhūmiṃ vissajjento “sabbadā sīlasampanno”ti imaṃ tisikkhāgabbhaṃ
atk-s0505a:817_5: gāthamāha. Ettha hi sīlasampadāya adhisīlasikkhā, satisamādhīhi adhicittasikkhā,
atk-s0505a:817_6: ajjhattacintitāpaññāhi adhipaññāsikkhāti tisso sikkhā saupakārā sānisaṃsā ca vuttā.
atk-s0505a:817_7: Upakāro hi sikkhānaṃ lokiyapaññā sati ca, anisaṃso sāmaññaphalānīti.
atk-s0505a:818_0: 177. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya sekkhabhūmiṃ dassetvā idāni asekkhabhūmiṃ dassento dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:818_1: Tassattho virato kāmasaññāyāti yā kāci kāmasaññā, tato sabbato catutthamaggasampayuttāya
atk-s0505a:818_3: hoti, sagāthāvagge pana “kāmasaññāsū”tipi pāṭho. Catūhipi maggehi dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0505a:818_4: atītattā sabbasaṃyojanātigo, catuttheneva vā uddhambhāgiyasabbasaṃyojanātigo, tatratatrābhinandinītaṇhāsaṅkhātāya
atk-s0505a:818_5: nandiyā tiṇṇañca bhavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā nandībhavaparikkhīṇo so tādiso khīṇāsavo
atk-s0505a:818_6: bhikkhu gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdati nandīparikkhayena saupādisesaṃ, bhavaparikkhayena
atk-s0505a:819_0: 178. Atha hemavato sahāyañca yakkhaparisañca oloketvā pītisomanassajāto “gambhīrapañña”nti
atk-s0505a:819_1: evamādīhi gāthāhi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā sabbāvatiyā parisāya sahāyena ca saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:819_2: abhivādetvā, padakkhiṇaṃ katvā, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:820_0: Tāsaṃ pana gāthānaṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – gambhīrapaññanti gambhīrāya paññāya samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0505a:820_1: Tattha paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayena gambhīrapaññā veditabbā. Vuttañhi tattha “gambhīresu
atk-s0505a:820_2: khandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti gambhīrapaññā”tiādi. Nipuṇatthadassinti nipuṇehi khattiyapaṇḍitādīhi
atk-s0505a:820_3: abhisaṅkhatānaṃ pañhānaṃ atthadassiṃ atthānaṃ vā yāni nipuṇāni kāraṇāni duppaṭivijjhāni
atk-s0505a:820_4: aññehi tesaṃ dassanena nipuṇatthadassiṃ. Rāgādikiñcanābhāvena akiñcanaṃ. Duvidhe
atk-s0505a:820_5: kāme tividhe ce bhave alagganena kāmabhave asattaṃ. Khandhādibhedesu sabbārammaṇesu
atk-s0505a:820_6: chandarāgabandhanābhāvena sabbadhi vippamuttaṃ. Dibbe pathe kamamānanti aṭṭhasamāpattibhede
atk-s0505a:820_7: dibbe pathe samāpajjanavasena caṅkamantaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi na tāya velāya bhagavā
atk-s0505a:820_8: dibbe pathe kamati, apica kho pubbe kamanaṃ upādāya kamanasattisabbhāvena tattha
atk-s0505a:820_9: laddhavasībhāvatāya evaṃ vuccati. Atha vā ye te visuddhidevā arahanto, tesaṃ pathe
atk-s0505a:820_10: santavihāre kamanenāpetaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahantānaṃ guṇānaṃ esanena mahesiṃ.
atk-s0505a:821_0: 179. Dutiyagāthāya aparena pariyāyena thuti āraddhāti katvā puna nipuṇatthadassiggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:821_1: nidasseti. Atha vā nipuṇatthe dassetāranti attho. Paññādadanti paññāpaṭilābhasaṃvattanikāya
atk-s0505a:821_2: paṭipattiyā kathanena paññādāyakaṃ. Kāmālaye asattanti yvāyaṃkāmesu taṇhādiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0505a:821_3: duvidho ālayo, tattha asattaṃ. Sabbavidunti sabbadhammaviduṃ, sabbaññunti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:821_4: hoti. Sumedhanti tassa sabbaññubhāvassa maggabhūtāya pāramīpaññāsaṅkhātāya medhāya
atk-s0505a:821_5: samannāgataṃ. Ariye patheti aṭṭhaṅgike magge, phalasamāpattiyaṃ vā. Kamamānanti paññāya
atk-s0505a:821_6: ajjhogāhamānaṃ maggalakkhaṇaṃ ñatvā desanato, pavisamānaṃ vā khaṇe khaṇe phalasamāpattisamāpajjanato,
atk-s0505a:822_0: 180. Sudiṭṭhaṃ vata no ajjāti. Ajja amhehi sundaraṃ diṭṭhaṃ, ajja vā amhākaṃ sundaraṃ
atk-s0505a:822_1: diṭṭhaṃ, dassananti attho. Suppabhātaṃ suhuṭṭhitanti ajja amhākaṃ suṭṭhu pabhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:822_2: sobhanaṃ vā pabhātaṃ ahosi. Ajja ca no sundaraṃ uṭṭhitaṃ ahosi, anuparodhena sayanato
atk-s0505a:822_3: uṭṭhitaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Yaṃ addasāma sambuddhaṃ, yasmā sambuddhaṃ addasāmāti attano
atk-s0505a:823_1: Saraṇaṃ yantīti kiñcāpi maggeneva gatā, tathāpi sotāpannabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ pasādadassanatthañca vācaṃ bhindati.
atk-s0505a:824_0: 182. Gāmā gāmanti devagāmā devagāmaṃ. Nagā naganti devapabbatā devapabbataṃ. Namassamānā
atk-s0505a:824_1: sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammatanti “sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā, svākkhāto vata
atk-s0505a:824_3: vata bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā saṅgha-suppaṭipattiñca abhitthavitvā abhitthavitvā
atk-s0505a:824_4: namassamānā dhammaghosakā hutvā vicarissāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0505a:828_0: Evaṃ me sutanti āḷavakasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Atthavaṇṇanānayenevassa uppatti āvibhavissati.
atk-s0505a:828_1: Atthavaṇṇanāya ca “evaṃ me sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā”ti etaṃ vuttatthameva. Āḷaviyaṃ
atk-s0505a:828_2: viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavaneti ettha pana kā āḷavī, kasmā ca bhagavā tassa
atk-s0505a:828_3: yakkhassa bhavane viharatīti? Vuccate – āḷavīti raṭṭhampi nagarampi vuccati, tadubhayampi
atk-s0505a:828_4: idha vaṭṭati. Āḷavīnagarassa hi samīpe viharantopi “āḷaviyaṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:828_5: Tassa ca nagarassa samīpe avidūre gāvutamatte taṃ bhavanaṃ, āḷavīraṭṭhe viharantopi
atk-s0505a:829_0: Yasmā pana āḷavako rājā vividhanāṭakūpabhogaṃ chaḍḍetvā corapaṭibāhanatthaṃ paṭirājanisedhanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:829_1: byāyāmakaraṇatthañca sattame sattame divase migavaṃ gacchanto ekadivasaṃ balakāyena
atk-s0505a:829_2: saddhiṃ katikaṃ akāsi – “yassa passena migo palāyati, tasseva so bhāro”ti. Atha tasseva
atk-s0505a:829_3: passena migo palāyi, javasampanno rājā dhanuṃ gahetvā pattikova tiyojanaṃ taṃ migaṃ
atk-s0505a:829_4: anubandhi. Eṇimigā ca tiyojanavegā eva honti. Atha parikkhīṇajavaṃ taṃ migaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0505a:829_5: pavisitvā, ṭhitaṃ vadhitvā, dvidhā chetvā, anatthikopi maṃsena “nāsakkhi migaṃ gahetu”nti
atk-s0505a:829_6: apavādamocanatthaṃ kājenādāya āgacchanto nagarassāvidūre bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ
atk-s0505a:829_7: disvā parissamavinodanatthaṃ tassa mūlamupagato. Tasmiñca nigrodhe āḷavako yakkho
atk-s0505a:829_8: mahārājasantikā varaṃ labhitvā majjhanhikasamaye tassa rukkhassa chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:829_9: paviṭṭhe pāṇino khādanto paṭivasati. So taṃ disvā khādituṃ upagato. Atha rājā tena
atk-s0505a:829_10: saddhiṃ katikaṃ akāsi – “muñca maṃ, ahaṃ te divase divase manussañca thālipākañca
atk-s0505a:829_11: pesessāmī”ti. Yakkho “tvaṃ rājūpabhogena pamatto sammussasi, ahaṃ pana bhavanaṃ anupagatañca
atk-s0505a:829_12: ananuññātañca khādituṃ na labhāmi, svāhaṃ bhavantampi jīyeyya”nti na muñci. Rājā
atk-s0505a:829_13: “yaṃ divasaṃ na pesemi, taṃ divasaṃ maṃ gahetvā khādāhī”ti attānaṃ anujānitvā tena
atk-s0505a:830_0: Balakāyo magge khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā ṭhito rājānaṃ disvā – “kiṃ, mahārāja, ayasamattabhayā
atk-s0505a:830_1: evaṃ kilantosī”ti vadanto paccuggantvā paṭiggahesi. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ anārocetvā
atk-s0505a:830_2: nagaraṃ gantvā, katapātarāso nagaraguttikaṃ āmantetvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Nagaraguttiko
atk-s0505a:830_3: – “kiṃ, deva, kālaparicchedo kato”ti āha. Rājā “na kato, bhaṇe”ti āha. “Duṭṭhu kataṃ,
atk-s0505a:830_4: deva, amanussā hi paricchinnamattameva labhanti, aparicchinne pana janapadassa ābādho
atk-s0505a:830_5: bhavissati. Hotu, deva, kiñcāpi evamakāsi, appossukko tvaṃ rajjasukhaṃ anubhohi,
atk-s0505a:830_6: ahamettha kātabbaṃ karissāmī”ti. So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya bandhanāgāraṃ gantvā ye ye
atk-s0505a:830_7: vajjhā honti, te te sandhāya – “yo jīvitatthiko hoti, so nikkhamatū”ti bhaṇati. Yo
atk-s0505a:830_8: paṭhamaṃ nikkhamati taṃ gehaṃ netvā, nhāpetvā, bhojetvā ca, “imaṃ thālipākaṃ yakkhassa
atk-s0505a:830_9: dehī”ti peseti. Taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ paviṭṭhamattaṃyeva yakkho bheravaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā
atk-s0505a:830_10: mūlakandaṃ viya khādati. Yakkhānubhāvena kira manussānaṃ kesādīni upādāya sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0505a:830_11: navanītapiṇḍo viya hoti. Yakkhassa bhattaṃ gāhāpettuṃ gatapurisā taṃ disvā bhītā
atk-s0505a:830_12: yathāmittaṃ ārocesuṃ. Tato pabhuti “rājā core gahetvā yakkhassa detī”ti manussā corakammato
atk-s0505a:830_13: paṭiviratā. Tato aparena samayena navacorānaṃ abhāvena purāṇacorānañca parikkhayena
atk-s0505a:831_0: Atha nagaraguttiko rañño ārocesi. Rājā attano dhanaṃ nagararacchāsu chaḍḍāpesi –
atk-s0505a:831_1: “appeva nāma koci lobhena gaṇheyyā”ti. Taṃ pādenapi na koci chupi. So core alabhanto
atk-s0505a:831_2: amaccānaṃ ārocesi. Amaccā “kulapaṭipāṭiyā ekamekaṃ jiṇṇakaṃ pesema, so pakatiyāpi
atk-s0505a:831_3: maccumukhe vattatī”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā “‘amhākaṃ pitaraṃ, amhākaṃ pitāmahaṃ pesetī’ti
atk-s0505a:831_4: manussā khobhaṃ karissanti, mā vo etaṃ ruccī”ti nivāresi. “Tena hi, deva, dārakaṃ
atk-s0505a:831_5: pesema uttānaseyyakaṃ, tathāvidhassa hi ‘mātā me pitā me’ti sineho natthī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:831_6: Rājā anujāni. Te tathā akaṃsu. Nagare dārakamātaro ca dārake gahetvā gabbhiniyo ca
atk-s0505a:831_7: palāyitvā parajanapade dārake saṃvaḍḍhetvā ānenti. Evaṃ sabbānipi dvādasa vassāni gatāni.
atk-s0505a:832_0: Tato ekadivasaṃ sakalanagaraṃ vicinitvā ekampi dārakaṃ alabhitvā rañño ārocesuṃ –
atk-s0505a:832_1: “natthi, deva, nagare dārako ṭhapetvā antepure tava puttaṃ āḷavakakumāra”nti. Rājā
atk-s0505a:832_2: “yathā mama putto piyo, evaṃ sabbalokassa, attanā pana piyataraṃ natthi, gacchatha,
atk-s0505a:832_3: tampi datvā mama jīvitaṃ rakkhathā”ti āha. Tena ca samayena āḷavakakumārassa mātā
atk-s0505a:832_4: puttaṃ nhāpetvā, maṇḍetvā, dukūlacumbaṭake katvā, aṅke sayāpetvā, nisinnā hoti. Rājapurisā
atk-s0505a:832_5: rañño āṇāya tattha gantvā vippalapantiyā tassā soḷasannañca itthisahassānaṃ saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:832_6: dhātiyā taṃ ādāya pakkamiṃsu “sve yakkhabhakkho bhavissatī”ti. Taṃ divasañca bhagavā
atk-s0505a:832_7: paccūsasamaye paccuṭṭhāya jetavanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0505a:832_8: puna buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento addasa āḷavakassa kumārassa anāgāmiphaluppattiyā
atk-s0505a:832_9: upanissayaṃ, yakkhassa ca sotāpattiphaluppattiyā upanissayaṃ desanāpariyosāne ca
atk-s0505a:832_10: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammacakkhupaṭilābhassāti. Tasmā vibhātāya rattiyā purebhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0505a:832_11: katvā aniṭṭhitapacchābhattakiccova kāḷapakkhauposathadivase vattamāne oggate sūriye
atk-s0505a:832_12: ekakova adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya pādagamaneneva sāvatthito tiṃsa yojanāni gantvā
atk-s0505a:832_13: tassa yakkhassa bhavanaṃ pāvisi. Tena vuttaṃ “āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0505a:833_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā yasmiṃ nigrodhe āḷavakassa bhavanaṃ, tassa mūle vihāsi, udāhu bhavaneyevāti?
atk-s0505a:833_1: Vuccate – bhavaneyeva. Yatheva hi yakkhā attano bhavanaṃ passanti, tathā bhagavāpi.
atk-s0505a:833_2: So tattha gantvā bhavanadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Tadā āḷavako himavante yakkhasamāgamaṃ gato
atk-s0505a:833_3: hoti. Tato āḷavakassa dvārapālo gadrabho nāma yakkho bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vanditvā
atk-s0505a:833_4: – “kiṃ, bhante, bhagavā vikāle āgato”ti āha. “Āma, gadrabha, āgatomhi. Sace te agaru,
atk-s0505a:833_5: vihareyyāmekarattiṃ āḷavakassa bhavane”ti. “Na me, bhante, garu, apica kho so yakkho
atk-s0505a:833_6: kakkhaḷo pharuso, mātāpitūnampi abhivādanādīni na karoti, mā rucci bhagavato idha
atk-s0505a:833_7: vāso”ti. “Jānāmi, gadrabha, tassa kakkhaḷattaṃ, na koci mamantarāyo bhavissati, sace
atk-s0505a:834_0: Dutiyampi gadrabho yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “aggitattakapālasadiso, bhante,
atk-s0505a:834_1: āḷavako, ‘mātāpitaro’ti vā ‘samaṇabrāhmaṇā’ti vā ‘dhammo’ti vā na jānāti, idhāgatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:834_2: cittakkhepampi karoti, hadayampi phāleti, pādepi gahetvā parasamudde vā paracakkavāḷe
atk-s0505a:834_3: vā khipatī”ti. Dutiyampi bhagavā āha – “jānāmi, gadrabha, sace te agaru, vihareyyāmekaratti”nti.
atk-s0505a:834_4: Tatiyampi gadrabho yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “aggitattakapālasadiso, bhante,
atk-s0505a:834_5: āḷavako, ‘mātāpitaro’ti vā ‘samaṇabrāhmaṇā’ti vā ‘dhammo’ti vā na jānāti, idhāgatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:834_6: cittakkhepampi karoti, hadayampi phāleti, pādepi gahetvā parasamudde vā paracakkavāḷe
atk-s0505a:834_7: vā khipatī”ti. Tatiyampi bhagavā āha – “jānāmi, gadrabha, sace te agaru, vihareyyāmekaratti”nti.
atk-s0505a:834_8: “Na me, bhante, garu, apica kho so yakkho attano anārocetvā anujānantaṃ maṃ jīvitā
atk-s0505a:834_9: voropeyya, ārocemi, bhante, tassā”ti. “Yathāsukhaṃ, gadrabha, ārocehī”ti. “Tena hi,
atk-s0505a:834_10: bhante, tvameva jānāhī”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā himavantābhimukho pakkāmi. Bhavanadvārampi
atk-s0505a:834_11: sayameva bhagavato vivaramadāsi. Bhagavā antobhavanaṃ pavisitvā yattha abhilakkhitesu
atk-s0505a:834_12: maṅgaladivasādīsu nisīditvā āḷavako siriṃ anubhoti, tasmiṃyeva dibbaratanapallaṅke
atk-s0505a:834_13: nisīditvā suvaṇṇābhaṃ muñci. Taṃ disvā yakkhassa itthiyo āgantvā, bhagavantaṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0505a:834_14: samparivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Bhagavā “pubbe tumhe dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, pūjaneyyaṃ
atk-s0505a:834_15: pūjetvā, imaṃ sampattiṃ pattā, idānipi tatheva karotha, mā aññamaññaṃ issāmacchariyābhibhūtā
atk-s0505a:834_16: viharathā”tiādinā nayena tāsaṃ pakiṇṇakadhammakathaṃ kathesi. Tā ca bhagavato madhuranigghosaṃ
atk-s0505a:834_17: sutvā, sādhukārasahassāni datvā, bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsuyeva. Gadrabhopi
atk-s0505a:834_18: himavantaṃ gantvā āḷavakassa ārocesi – “yagghe, mārisa, jāneyyāsi, vimāne te bhagavā
atk-s0505a:834_19: nisinno”ti. So gadrabhassa saññamakāsi “tuṇhī hohi, gantvā kattabbaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:834_20: Purisamānena kira lajjito ahosi, tasmā “mā koci parisamajjhe suṇeyyā”ti vāresi.
atk-s0505a:835_0: Tadā sātāgirahemavatā bhagavantaṃ jetavaneyeva vanditvā “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gamissāmā”ti
atk-s0505a:835_1: saparivārā nānāyānehi ākāsena gacchanti. Ākāse ca yakkhānaṃ na sabbattha maggo atthi,
atk-s0505a:835_2: ākāsaṭṭhāni vimānāni pariharitvā maggaṭṭhāneneva maggo hoti. Āḷavakassa pana vimānaṃ
atk-s0505a:835_3: bhūmaṭṭhaṃ suguttaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ susaṃvihitadvāraṭṭālakagopuraṃ, upari kaṃsajālasañchannaṃ
atk-s0505a:835_4: mañjūsasadisaṃ tiyojanaṃ ubbedhena. Tassa upari maggo hoti. Te taṃ padesamāgamma
atk-s0505a:835_5: gantuṃ asamatthā ahesuṃ. Buddhānañhi nisinnokāsassa uparibhāgena yāva bhavaggā, tāva
atk-s0505a:835_6: koci gantuṃ asamattho. Te “kimida”nti āvajjetvā bhagavantaṃ disvā ākāse khittaleḍḍu
atk-s0505a:835_7: viya oruyha vanditvā, dhammaṃ sutvā, padakkhiṇaṃ katvā “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchāma
atk-s0505a:835_8: bhagavā”ti tīṇi vatthūni pasaṃsantā yakkhasamāgamaṃ agamaṃsu. Āḷavako te disvā “idha
atk-s0505a:835_9: nisīdathā”ti paṭikkamma okāsamadāsi. Te āḷavakassa nivedesuṃ “lābhā te, āḷavaka,
atk-s0505a:835_10: yassa te bhavane bhagavā viharati, gacchāvuso bhagavantaṃ payirupāsassū”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:835_11: bhagavā bhavaneyeva vihāsi, na yasmiṃ nigrodhe āḷavakassa bhavanaṃ, tassa mūleti.
atk-s0505a:835_12: Tena vuttaṃ “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0505a:836_0: Atha kho āḷavako…pe… bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “nikkhama samaṇā”ti. “Kasmā panāyaṃ etadavocā”ti?
atk-s0505a:836_1: Vuccate – rosetukāmatāya. Tatrevaṃ ādito pabhuti sambandho veditabbo – ayañhi yasmā
atk-s0505a:836_2: assaddhassa saddhākathā dukkathā hoti dussīlādīnaṃ sīlādikathā viya, tasmā tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_3: yakkhānaṃ santikā bhagavato pasaṃsaṃ sutvā eva aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya
atk-s0505a:836_4: abbhantarakopena taṭataṭāyamānahadayo hutvā “ko so bhagavā nāma, yo mama bhavanaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_5: paviṭṭho”ti āha. Te āhaṃsu – “na tvaṃ, āvuso, jānāsi bhagavantaṃ amhākaṃ satthāraṃ,
atk-s0505a:836_6: yo tusitabhavane ṭhito pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā”tiādinā nayena yāva dhammacakkappavattanaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_7: kathentā paṭisandhiādinā dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni vatvā “imānipi tvaṃ, āvuso, acchariyāni
atk-s0505a:836_8: nāddasā”ti codesuṃ. So disvāpi kodhavasena “nāddasa”nti āha. Āvuso āḷavaka passeyyāsi
atk-s0505a:836_9: vā tvaṃ, na vā, ko tayā attho passatā vā apassatā vā, kiṃ tvaṃ karissasi amhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_10: satthuno, yo tvaṃ taṃ upanidhāya calakkakudhamahāusabhasamīpe tadahujātavacchako
atk-s0505a:836_13: chinnapakkhakākapotako viya khāyasi, gaccha yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohīti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_14: vutte kuddho āḷavako uṭṭhahitvā manosilātale vāmapādena ṭhatvā “passatha dāni tumhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_15: vā satthā mahānubhāvo, ahaṃ vā”ti dakkhiṇapādena saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ kelāsapabbatakūṭaṃ
atk-s0505a:836_16: akkami, taṃ ayokūṭapahaṭo niddhantaayopiṇḍo viya papaṭikāyo muñci. So tatra ṭhatvā
atk-s0505a:837_0: Cattāro kira saddā sakalajambudīpe suyyiṃsu – yañca puṇṇako yakkhasenāpati dhanañcayakorabyarājānaṃ
atk-s0505a:837_1: jūte jinitvā apphoṭetvā “ahaṃ jini”nti ugghosesi, yañca sakko devānamindo kassapassa
atk-s0505a:837_2: bhagavato sāsane parihāyamāne vissakammaṃ devaputtaṃ sunakhaṃ kāretvā “ahaṃ pāpabhikkhū
atk-s0505a:837_3: ca pāpabhikkhuniyo ca upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca sabbeva adhammavādino khādāmī”ti ugghosāpesi,
atk-s0505a:837_4: yañca kusajātake pabhāvatihetu sattahi rājūhi nagare uparuddhe pabhāvatiṃ attanā
atk-s0505a:837_5: saha hatthikkhandhaṃ āropetvā nagarā nikkhamma “ahaṃ sīhassarakusamahārājā”ti mahāpuriso
atk-s0505a:837_6: ugghosesi, yañca āḷavako kelāsamuddhani ṭhatvā “ahaṃ āḷavako”ti. Tadā hi sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0505a:837_7: dvāre dvāre ṭhatvā ugghositasadisaṃ ahosi, tiyojanasahassavitthato ca himavāpi saṅkampi
atk-s0505a:838_0: So vātamaṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi – “eteneva samaṇaṃ palāpessāmī”ti. Te puratthimādibhedā
atk-s0505a:838_2: vanagaccharukkhādīni ummūletvā āḷavīnagaraṃ pakkhantā jiṇṇahatthisālādīni cuṇṇentā
atk-s0505a:838_3: chadaniṭṭhakā ākāse bhamentā. Bhagavā “mā kassaci uparodho hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Te
atk-s0505a:838_4: vātā dasabalaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tato mahāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi
atk-s0505a:838_5: “udakena ajjhottharitvā samaṇaṃ māressāmī”ti. Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā
atk-s0505a:838_6: valāhakā uṭṭhahitvā vassiṃsu, vuṭṭhidhārāvegena pathavī chiddā ahosi, vanarukkhādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:838_7: upari mahogho āgantvā dasabalassa cīvare ussāvabindumattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi. Tato
atk-s0505a:838_8: pāsāṇavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi, mahantāni mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni
atk-s0505a:838_9: ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbamālāguḷāni sampajjiṃsu. Tato paharaṇavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0505a:838_10: ekatodhārāubhatodhārā asisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0505a:838_11: patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ. Tato aṅgāravassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi, kiṃsukavaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0505a:838_12: dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā vikiriṃsu. Tato kukkulavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0505a:838_13: accuṇho kukkulo ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle candanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipati. Tato
atk-s0505a:838_14: vālukāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi, atisukhumā vālukā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0505a:838_15: dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu. Tato kalalavassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0505a:838_16: taṃ kalalavassaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbagandhaṃ
atk-s0505a:838_17: hutvā nipati. Tato andhakāraṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “bhiṃsetvā samaṇaṃ palāpessāmī”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0505a:838_18: caturaṅgasamannāgatandhakārasadisaṃ hutvā dasabalaṃ patvā sūriyappabhāvihatamivandhakāraṃ antaradhāyi.
atk-s0505a:839_2: caturaṅginiyā senāya sayameva bhagavantaṃ abhigato. Te bhūtagaṇā anekappakāre vikāre
atk-s0505a:839_3: katvā “gaṇhatha hanathā”ti bhagavato upari āgacchantā viya honti, apica te niddhantalohapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0505a:839_4: viya makkhikā, bhagavantaṃ allīyituṃ asamatthā evaṃ ahesuṃ. Evaṃ santepi yathā bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0505a:839_5: māro āgatavelāyameva nivatto, tathā anivattitvā upaḍḍharattimattaṃ byākulamakaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:839_7: āḷavako cintesi – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ kenaci ajeyyaṃ dussāvudhaṃ muñceyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:840_0: Cattāri kira āvudhāni loke seṭṭhāni – sakkassa vajirāvudhaṃ, vessavaṇassa gadāvudhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:840_1: yamassa nayanāvudhaṃ, āḷavakassa dussāvudhanti. Yadi hi sakko kuddho vajirāvudhaṃ
atk-s0505a:840_3: heṭṭhato gaccheyya. Vessavaṇassa puthujjanakāle vissajjitagadā bahūnaṃ yakkhasahassānaṃ
atk-s0505a:840_4: sīsaṃ pātetvā puna hatthapāsaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati. Yamena kuddhena nayanāvudhena olokitamatte
atk-s0505a:840_5: anekāni kumbhaṇḍasahassāni tattakapāle tilā viya vipphurantāni vinassanti. Āḷavako
atk-s0505a:840_6: kuddho sace ākāse dussāvudhaṃ muñceyya, dvādasa vassāni devo na vasseyya. Sace pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0505a:840_7: muñceyya, sabbarukkhatiṇādīni sussitvā dvādasavassantaraṃ na puna ruheyyuṃ. Sace
atk-s0505a:840_8: samudde muñceyya, tattakapāle udakabindu viya sabbamudakaṃ susseyya. Sace sinerusadisepi
atk-s0505a:840_9: pabbate muñceyya, khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ hutvā vikireyya. So evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ dussāvudhaṃ
atk-s0505a:840_10: uttarīyakataṃ muñcitvā aggahesi. Yebhuyyena dasasahassilokadhātudevatā vegena sannipatiṃsu
atk-s0505a:840_11: – “ajja bhagavā āḷavakaṃ damessati, tattha dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti. Yuddhadassanakāmāpi
atk-s0505a:840_12: devatā sannipatiṃsu. Evaṃ sakalampi ākāsaṃ devatāhi puripuṇṇamahosi.
atk-s0505a:841_0: Atha āḷavako bhagavato samīpe uparūpari vicaritvā vatthāvudhaṃ muñci. Taṃ asanivicakkaṃ
atk-s0505a:841_1: viya ākāse bheravasaddaṃ karontaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ patvā yakkhassa
atk-s0505a:841_2: mānamaddanatthaṃ pādamuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā pādamūle nipati. Āḷavako taṃ disvā chinnavisāṇo
atk-s0505a:841_3: viya usabho, uddhaṭadāṭho viya sappo, nittejo nimmado nipatitamānaddhajo hutvā cintesi
atk-s0505a:841_4: – “dussāvudhampi samaṇaṃ nabhibhosi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti? Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ, mettāvihārayutto
atk-s0505a:841_5: samaṇo, handa naṃ rosetvā mettāya viyojemīti. Iminā sambandhenetaṃ vuttaṃ – “atha
atk-s0505a:841_6: kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā…pe… nikkhama samaṇā”ti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – kasmā
atk-s0505a:841_7: mayā ananuññāto mama bhavanaṃ pavisitvā gharasāmiko viya itthāgārassa majjhe nisinnosi,
atk-s0505a:841_8: nanu ayuttametaṃ samaṇassa yadidaṃ adinnapaṭibhogo itthisaṃsaggo ca, tasmā yadi tvaṃ
atk-s0505a:841_9: samaṇadhamme ṭhito, nikkhama samaṇāti. Eke pana “etāni aññāni ca pharusavacanāni
atk-s0505a:842_0: Atha bhagavā “yasmā thaddho paṭithaddhabhāvena vinetuṃ na sakkā, so hi paṭithaddhabhāve
atk-s0505a:842_1: kariyamāne seyyathāpi caṇḍassa kukkurassa nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyya, so bhiyyoso mattāya
atk-s0505a:842_2: caṇḍataro assa, evaṃ thaddhataro hoti, mudunā pana so sakkā vinetu”nti ñatvā “sādhāvuso”ti
atk-s0505a:842_3: piyavacanena tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ “sādhāvusoti bhagavā nikkhamī”ti.
atk-s0505a:843_0: Tato āḷavako “suvaco vatāyaṃ samaṇo ekavacaneneva nikkhanto, evaṃ nāma nikkhametuṃ
atk-s0505a:843_1: sukhaṃ samaṇaṃ akāraṇenevāhaṃ sakalarattiṃ yuddhena abbhuyyāsi”nti muducitto hutvā
atk-s0505a:843_2: puna cintesi “idānipi na sakkā jānituṃ, kiṃ nu kho suvacatāya nikkhanto, udāhu kodhena,
atk-s0505a:843_3: handa naṃ vīmaṃsāmī”ti. Tato “pavisa samaṇā”ti āha. Atha “suvaco”ti mudubhūtacittavavatthānakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:843_4: punapi piyavacanaṃ vadanto sādhāvusoti bhagavā pāvisi. Āḷavako punappunaṃ tameva
atk-s0505a:843_5: suvacabhāvaṃ vīmaṃsanto dutiyampi tatiyampi “nikkhama pavisā”ti āha. Bhagavāpi tathā
atk-s0505a:843_6: akāsi. Yadi na kareyya, pakatiyāpi thaddhayakkhassa cittaṃ thaddhataraṃ hutvā dhammakathāya
atk-s0505a:843_7: bhājanaṃ na bhaveyya. Tasmā yathā nāma mātā rodantaṃ puttakaṃ yaṃ so icchati, taṃ
atk-s0505a:843_8: datvā vā katvā vā saññāpeti, tathā bhagavā kilesarodanena rodantaṃ yakkhaṃ saññāpetuṃ
atk-s0505a:843_9: yaṃ so bhaṇati, taṃ akāsi. Yathā ca dhātī thaññaṃ apivantaṃ dārakaṃ kiñci datvā upalāḷetvā
atk-s0505a:843_10: pāyeti, tathā bhagavā yakkhaṃ lokuttaradhammakhīraṃ pāyetuṃ tassa patthitavacanakaraṇena
atk-s0505a:843_11: upalāḷento evamakāsi. Yathā ca puriso lābumhi catumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassabbhantaraṃ
atk-s0505a:843_12: sodheti, evaṃ bhagavā yakkhassa citte lokuttaracatumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassa abbhantare
atk-s0505a:843_13: kodhamalaṃ sodhetuṃ yāva tatiyaṃ nikkhamanapavesanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:844_0: Atha āḷavako “suvaco ayaṃ samaṇo, ‘nikkhamā’ti vutto nikkhamati, ‘pavisā’ti vutto
atk-s0505a:844_1: pavisati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ evamevaṃ sakalarattiṃ kilametvā, pāde gahetvā,
atk-s0505a:844_2: pāragaṅgāya khipeyya”nti pāpakaṃ citaṃ uppādetvā catutthavāraṃ āha – “nikkhama samaṇā”ti.
atk-s0505a:844_3: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā “na khvāhaṃ ta”nti āha. “Evaṃ vutte taduttariṃ karaṇīyaṃ pariyesamāno
atk-s0505a:844_4: pañhaṃ pucchitabbaṃ maññissati, taṃ dhammakathāya mukhaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “na
atk-s0505a:844_5: khvāhaṃ ta”nti āha. Tattha naiti paṭikkhepe, khoiti avadhāraṇe. Ahanti attanidassanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:844_6: nti hetuvacanaṃ. Tenettha “yasmā tvaṃ evaṃ cintesi, tasmā ahaṃ āvuso neva nikkhamissāmi,
atk-s0505a:844_7: yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohī”ti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:845_0: Tato āḷavako yasmā pubbepi ākāsenāgamanavelāyaṃ “kiṃ nu kho, etaṃ suvaṇṇavimānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:845_1: udāhu rajatamaṇivimānānaṃ aññataraṃ, handa naṃ passāmā”ti evaṃ attano vimānaṃ āgate
atk-s0505a:845_2: iddhimante tāpasaparibbājake pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetumasakkonte cittakkhepādīhi
atk-s0505a:845_3: viheṭheti. Kathaṃ? Amanussā hi bhiṃsanakarūpadassanena vā hadayavatthuparimaddanena
atk-s0505a:845_4: vāti dvīhākārehi cittakkhepaṃ karonti. Ayaṃ pana yasmā “iddhimanto bhiṃsanakarūpadassanena
atk-s0505a:845_5: na tasantī”ti ñatvā attano iddhippabhāvena sukhumattabhāvaṃ nimminitvā, tesaṃ anto
atk-s0505a:845_6: pavisitvā hadayavatthuṃ parimaddati, tato cittasantati na saṇṭhāti, tassā asaṇṭhamānāya
atk-s0505a:845_7: ummattakā honti khittacittā. Evaṃ khittacittānaṃ etesaṃ urampi phāleti, pādepi ne
atk-s0505a:845_8: gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipati “māssu me puna evarūpā bhavanamāgamiṃsū”ti, tasmā te
atk-s0505a:845_9: pañhe saritvā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ idāni evaṃ viheṭheyya”nti cintetvā āha “pañhaṃ taṃ samaṇā”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:846_0: Kuto panassa te pañhāti? Tassa kira mātāpitaro kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsitvā
atk-s0505a:846_1: aṭṭha pañhe savissajjane uggahesuṃ. Te daharakāle āḷavakaṃ pariyāpuṇāpesuṃ. So kālaccayena
atk-s0505a:846_2: vissajjanaṃ sammussi. Tato “ime pañhāpi mā vinassantū”ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭe jātihiṅgulakena
atk-s0505a:846_3: likhāpetvā vimāne nikkhipi. Evamete buddhapañhā buddhavisayā eva honti. Bhagavā taṃ
atk-s0505a:846_4: sutvā yasmā buddhānaṃ pariccattalābhantarāyo vā jīvitantarāyo vā sabbaññutaññāṇabyāmappabhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:846_5: paṭighāto vā na sakkā kenaci kātuṃ, tasmā taṃ loke asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:846_6: āha “na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke”ti.
atk-s0505a:847_1: atthamattadassanena saṅkhepo vutto, na anusandhiyojanākkamena vitthāro. Svāyaṃ vuccati
atk-s0505a:847_2: – sadevakavacanena hi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbadevesu gahitesupi yesaṃ tattha sannipatite
atk-s0505a:847_3: devagaṇe vimati ahosi “māro mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī paccanīkasāto
atk-s0505a:847_4: dhammadessī kururakammanto, kiṃ nu kho, sopissa cittakkhepādīni na kareyyā”ti, tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:847_5: vimatipaṭibāhanatthaṃ “samārake”ti āha. Tato yesaṃ ahosi – “brahmā mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā
atk-s0505a:847_6: ekacakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ karoti, dvīhi…pe… dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu,
atk-s0505a:847_7: anuttarañca jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, kiṃ sopi na kareyyā”ti, tesaṃ vimatipaṭibāhanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:847_8: “sabrahmake”ti āha. Atha yesaṃ ahosi “puthu samaṇabrāhmaṇā sāsanassa paccatthikā
atk-s0505a:847_9: paccāmittā mantādibalasamannāgatā, kiṃ tepi na kareyyu”nti, tesaṃ vimatipaṭibāhanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:847_10: “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyā”ti āha. Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṭṭhānesu kassaci abhāvaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0505a:847_11: idāni sadevamanussāyāti vacanena sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavaseneva
atk-s0505a:847_12: sesasattalokepi kassaci abhāvaṃ dassesīti evamettha anusandhiyojanākkamo veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:848_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa bādhanacittaṃ paṭisedhetvā pañhapucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha “apica
atk-s0505a:848_1: tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti. Tassattho – puccha, yadi ākaṅkhasi, na me pañhavissajjane
atk-s0505a:848_2: bhāro atthi. Atha vā “puccha yaṃ ākaṅkhasi, te sabbaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:848_3: pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvakamahāsāvakehi. Te hi “pucchāvuso sutvā
atk-s0505a:848_4: vedissāmā”ti vadanti. Buddhā pana “pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī”ti vā,
atk-s0505a:849: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti vā. ;
atk-s0505a:851: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti vā. –
atk-s0505a:852_0: Evamādinā nayena devamanussānaṃ sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavārenti. Anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ
atk-s0505a:852_1: bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā evaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya, yo bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ padesañāṇe vattamānopi –
atk-s0505a:853: “Koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohi, yācanti taṃ isayo sādhurūpā;
atk-s0505a:854: Koṇḍañña eso manujesu dhammo, yaṃ vuddhamāgacchati esa bhāro”ti. –
atk-s0505a:856: “Katāvakāsā pucchantu bhonto, yaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ;
atk-s0505a:857: Ahañhi taṃ taṃ vo viyākarissaṃ, ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañcā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:858_0: Evaṃ sarabhaṅgakāle sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpe tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:858_1: antakaraṃ adisvā jātiyā sattavassiko rathikāya paṃsukīḷikaṃ kīḷanto suciratena brāhmaṇena puṭṭho –
atk-s0505a:860: Rājā ca kho naṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:861: Evaṃ sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi. Evaṃ bhagavatā āḷavakassa sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi “kiṃ sūdha vitta”nti.
atk-s0505a:862_0: 183. Tattha kinti pucchāvacanaṃ. Sūti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke.
atk-s0505a:862_1: Vittanti vidati, pītiṃ karotīti vittaṃ, dhanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Suciṇṇanti sukataṃ.
atk-s0505a:862_2: Sukhanti kāyikacetasikaṃ sātaṃ. Āvahātīti āvahati, āneti, deti, appetīti vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0505a:862_3: haveti daḷhatthe nipāto. Sādutaranti atisayena sāduṃ. “Sādhutara”ntipi pāṭho. Rasānanti
atk-s0505a:862_4: rasasaññitānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Kathanti kena pakārena, kathaṃjīvino jīvitaṃ kathaṃjīvijīvitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:862_5: gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana sānunāsikaṃ vuccati. “Kathaṃjīviṃ jīvata”nti vā pāṭho.
atk-s0505a:862_6: Tassa jīvantānaṃ kathaṃjīvinti attho. Sesamettha pākaṭameva. Evamimāya gāthāya “kiṃ
atk-s0505a:862_7: su idha loke purisassa vittaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ sukhamāvahāti, kiṃ rasānaṃ
atk-s0505a:862_8: sādutaraṃ, kathaṃjīvino jīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhū”ti ime cattāro pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0505a:863_0: 184. Athassa bhagavā kassapadasabalena vissajjitanayeneva vissajjento imaṃ gāthamāha
atk-s0505a:863_1: “saddhīdha vitta”nti. Tattha yathā hiraññasuvaṇṇādi vittaṃ upabhogaparibhogasukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:863_2: āvahati, khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ paṭibāhati, dāliddiyaṃ vūpasameti, muttādiratanapaṭilābhahetu
atk-s0505a:863_3: hoti, lokasanthutiñca āvahati, evaṃ lokiyalokuttarā saddhāpi yathāsambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttaravipākasukhamāvahati,
atk-s0505a:863_4: saddhādhurena paṭipannānaṃ jātijarādidukkhaṃ paṭibāhati, guṇadāliddiyaṃ vūpasameti,
atk-s0505a:865: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. –
atk-s0505a:866_0: Vacanato lokasanthutiñca āvahatīti katvā “vitta”nti vuttā. Yasmā panetaṃ saddhāvittaṃ
atk-s0505a:866_2: nidānaṃ. Saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā vittaṃ adhigacchati, assaddhassa pana
atk-s0505a:866_3: vittaṃ yāvadeva anatthāya hoti, tasmā “seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ. Purisassāti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedadesanā;
atk-s0505a:866_4: tasmā na kevalaṃ purisassa, itthiādīnampi saddhāvittameva seṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:867_0: Dhammoti dasakusalakammapathadhammo, dānasīlabhāvanādhammo vā. Suciṇṇoti sukato sucarito.
atk-s0505a:867_1: Sukhamāvahātīti soṇaseṭṭhiputtaraṭṭhapālādīnaṃ viya manussasukhaṃ, sakkādīnaṃ viya
atk-s0505a:867_2: dibbasukhaṃ, pariyosāne ca mahāpadumādīnaṃ viya nibbānasukhañca āvahatīti.
atk-s0505a:868_0: Saccanti ayaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Seyyathidaṃ – “saccaṃ bhaṇe na
atk-s0505a:868_1: kujjheyyā”tiādīsu vācāsacce. “Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādīsu viratisacce.
atk-s0505a:868_2: “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā, pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce. “Cattārimāni,
atk-s0505a:868_3: bhikkhave, brāhmaṇasaccānī”tiādīsu brāhmaṇasacce. “Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutīyamatthī”tiādīsu
atk-s0505a:868_4: paramatthasacce. “Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalā”tiādīsu ariyasacce. Idha pana paramatthasaccaṃ
atk-s0505a:868_5: nibbānaṃ, viratisaccaṃ vā abbhantaraṃ katvā vācāsaccaṃ adhippetaṃ, yassānubhāvena
atk-s0505a:868_6: udakādīni vase vattenti jātijarāmaraṇapāraṃ taranti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:869: “Saccena vācenudakampi dhāvati, visampi saccena hananti paṇḍitā;
atk-s0505a:870: Saccena devo thanayaṃ pavassati, sacce ṭhitā nibbutiṃ patthayanti.
atk-s0505a:871: “Ye kecime atthi rasā pathabyā, saccaṃ tesaṃ sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ;
atk-s0505a:872: Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, taranti jātimaraṇassa pāra”nti. ;
atk-s0505a:873_0: Sādutaranti madhurataraṃ, paṇītataraṃ. Rasānanti ye ime “mūlaraso, khandharaso”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:873_1: nayena sāyanīyadhammā, ye cime “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ phalarasaṃ arasarūpo
atk-s0505a:873_2: bhavaṃ gotamo, ye te, brāhmaṇa, rūparasā, saddarasā, anāpatti rasarase, ayaṃ dhammavinayo
atk-s0505a:873_3: ekaraso vimuttiraso, bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassā”tiādinā nayena vācārasūpavajjā
atk-s0505a:873_4: avasesabyañjanādayo dhammā “rasā”ti vuccanti, tesaṃ rasānaṃ saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ
atk-s0505a:873_5: saccameva sādutaraṃ, sādhutaraṃ vā seṭṭhataraṃ, uttamataraṃ. Mūlarasādayo hi sarīraṃ
atk-s0505a:873_6: upabrūhenti, saṃkilesikañca sukhamāvahanti. Saccarase viratisaccavācāsaccarasā samathavipassanādīhi
atk-s0505a:873_8: sādu, attharasadhammarasā ca tadadhigamūpāyabhūtaṃ atthañca dhammañca nissāya pavattitoti.
atk-s0505a:874_0: Paññājīvinti ettha pana yvāyaṃ andhekacakkhudvicakkhukesu dvicakkhupuggalo gahaṭṭho
atk-s0505a:874_2: pabbajito vā avippaṭisārakarasīlasaṅkhātaṃ taduttaricittavisuddhiādibhedaṃ vā pabbajitapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0505a:874_3: paññāya ārādhetvā jīvati, tassa paññājīvino jīvitaṃ, taṃ vā paññājīviṃ jīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhūti
atk-s0505a:875_0: 185-6. Evaṃ bhagavatā vissajjite cattāropi pañhe sutvā attamano yakkho avasesepi
atk-s0505a:875_1: cattāro pañhe pucchanto “kathaṃ su tarati ogha”nti gāthamāha. Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva
atk-s0505a:875_2: vissajjento “saddhāya taratī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha kiñcāpi yo catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ tarati,
atk-s0505a:875_3: so saṃsāraṇṇavampi tarati, vaṭṭadukkhampi acceti, kilesamalāpi parisujjhati, evaṃ
atk-s0505a:875_4: santepi pana yasmā assaddho oghataraṇaṃ asaddahanto na pakkhandati, pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0505a:875_5: cittavossaggena pamatto tattheva sattavisattatāya saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ na tarati, kusīto
atk-s0505a:875_6: dukkhaṃ viharati vokiṇṇo akusalehi dhammehi, appañño suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto na parisujjhati,
atk-s0505a:875_7: tasmā tappaṭipakkhaṃ dassentena bhagavatā ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0505a:876_0: Evaṃ vuttāya cetāya yasmā sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyaṃ, tasmā “saddhāya
atk-s0505a:876_1: tarati ogha”nti iminā padena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ sotāpannañca pakāseti.
atk-s0505a:876_2: Yasmā pana sotāpanno kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya sātaccakiriyāsaṅkhātena appamādena
atk-s0505a:876_3: samannāgato dutiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhapetvā sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgamanamattaṃ avasesaṃ
atk-s0505a:876_4: sotāpattimaggena atiṇṇaṃ bhavoghavatthuṃ saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ tarati, tasmā “appamādena
atk-s0505a:876_5: aṇṇava”nti iminā padena bhavoghataraṇaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sakadāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0505a:876_6: Yasmā sakadāgāmī vīriyena tatiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā sakadāgāmimaggena anatītaṃ kāmoghavatthuṃ;
atk-s0505a:876_7: kāmoghasaññitañca kāmadukkhamacceti, tasmā “vīriyena dukkhamaccetī”ti iminā padena
atk-s0505a:876_8: kāmoghataraṇaṃ anāgāmimaggaṃ anāgāmiñca pakāseti. Yasmā pana anāgāmī vigatakāmapaṅkatāya
atk-s0505a:876_9: parisuddhāya paññāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ catutthamaggapaññaṃ ārādhetvā anāgāmimaggena
atk-s0505a:876_10: appahīnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ paramamalaṃ pajahati, tasmā “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti iminā
atk-s0505a:876_11: padena avijjoghataraṇaṃ arahattamaggaṃ arahantañca pakāseti. Imāya ca arahattanikūṭena
atk-s0505a:876_12: kathitāya gāthāya pariyosāne yakkho sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:877_0: 187. Idāni tameva “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ paññāpadaṃ gahetvā attano
atk-s0505a:877_1: paṭibhānena lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”nti
atk-s0505a:877_2: imaṃ chappadagāthamāha. Tattha kathaṃ sūti sabbattheva atthayuttipucchā hoti. Ayañhi
atk-s0505a:877_3: paññādiatthaṃ ñatvā tassa yuttiṃ pucchati “kathaṃ kāya yuttiyā kena kāraṇena paññaṃ
atk-s0505a:878_0: 188. Athassa bhagavā catūhi kāraṇehi paññālābhaṃ dassento “saddahāno”tiādimāha. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:878_1: – yena pubbabhāge kāyasucaritādibhedena, aparabhāge ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena
atk-s0505a:878_2: dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā, taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ
atk-s0505a:878_3: dhammaṃ nibbānappattiyā lokiyalokuttaraṃ paññaṃ labhati. Tañca kho na saddhāmattakeneva,
atk-s0505a:878_4: yasmā pana saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ
atk-s0505a:878_5: odahati, ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, tasmā upasaṅkamanato pabhuti yāva dhammassavanena
atk-s0505a:878_6: sussūsaṃ labhati. Ki vuttaṃ hoti – taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena
atk-s0505a:878_7: upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci
atk-s0505a:878_8: vattukāmā honti. Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:878_9: susūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva
atk-s0505a:879_0: Evaṃ yasmā saddhāya paññālābhasaṃvattanikaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati, sussūsāya sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0505a:879_1: paññādhigamūpāyaṃ suṇāti, appamādena gahitaṃ na sammussati, vicakkhaṇatāya anūnādhikaṃ
atk-s0505a:879_2: aviparītañca gahetvā vitthārikaṃ karoti. Sussūsāya vā ohitasoto paññāpaṭilābhahetuṃ
atk-s0505a:879_3: dhammaṃ suṇāti, appamādena sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, vicakkhaṇatāya dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0505a:879_4: atthamupaparikkhati, athānupubbena paramatthasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, tasmāssa bhagavā
atk-s0505a:879_5: “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”nti puṭṭho imāni cattāri kāraṇāni dassento imaṃ gāthamāha
atk-s0505a:880_0: 189. Idāni tato pare tayo pañhe vissajjento “patirūpakārī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:880_1: desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa vā dhanassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:880_2: karotīti patirūpakārī. Dhuravāti cetasikavīriyavasena anikkhittadhuro. Uṭṭhātāti
atk-s0505a:880_3: “yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatī”tiādinā nayena kāyikavīriyavasena
atk-s0505a:880_4: uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo. Vindate dhananti ekamūsikāya na cirasseva dvesatasahassasaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:880_5: cūḷantevāsī viya lokiyadhanañca, mahallakamahātissatthero viya lokuttaradhanañca
atk-s0505a:880_6: labhati. So hi “tīhi iriyāpathehi viharissāmī”ti vattaṃ katvā thinamiddhāgamanavelāya
atk-s0505a:880_7: palālacumbaṭakaṃ temetvā, sīse katvā, galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā, thinamiddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:880_8: paṭibāhento dvādasahi vassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Saccenāti vacīsaccenāpi “saccavādī
atk-s0505a:880_9: bhūtavādī”ti, paramatthasaccenāpi “buddho paccekabuddho ariyasāvako”ti evaṃ kittiṃ
atk-s0505a:880_10: pappoti. Dadanti yaṃkiñci icchitapatthitaṃ dadanto mittāni ganthati, sampādeti karotīti
atk-s0505a:880_11: attho. Duddadaṃ vā dadaṃ ganthati, dānamukhena vā cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti
atk-s0505a:880_12: veditabbāni. Tehi mittāni karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:881_0: 190. Evaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇena lokiyalokuttaramissakena nayena cattāro
atk-s0505a:881_1: pañhe vissajjetvā idāni “kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ pañhaṃ gahaṭṭhavasena
atk-s0505a:881_2: vissajjento āha “yassete”ti. Tassattho – yassa “saddahāno arahata”nti ettha vuttāya
atk-s0505a:881_3: sabbakalyāṇadhammuppādikāya saddhāya samannāgatattā saddhassa gharamesino gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:881_4: pañca vā kāmaguṇe esantassa gavesantassa kāmabhogino gahaṭṭhassa “saccena kittiṃ
atk-s0505a:881_5: pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakāraṃ saccaṃ, “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsapaññānāmena
atk-s0505a:881_6: vutto dhammo, “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttā dhīti,
atk-s0505a:881_7: “dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakāro cāgo cāti ete caturo dhammā santi.
atk-s0505a:881_8: Sa ve pecca na socatīti idhalokā paralokaṃ gantvā sa ve na socatīti.
atk-s0505a:882_0: 191. Evaṃ bhagavā pañcamampi pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ yakkhaṃ codento āha – “iṅgha
atk-s0505a:882_1: aññepī”ti. Tattha iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Aññepīti aññepi dhamme puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe
atk-s0505a:882_2: pucchassu, aññepi vā pūraṇādayo sabbaññupaṭiññe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu. Yadi
atk-s0505a:882_3: amhehi “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakārā saccā bhiyyo kittippattikāraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:882_4: vā, “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsanapaññāpadesena vuttā damā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttarapaññāpaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:882_5: vā. “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakārā cāgā bhiyyo mittaganthanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:882_6: vā, “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena
atk-s0505a:882_7: ca vuttāya mahābhārasahanaṭṭhena ussoḷhībhāvappattāya vīriyasaṅkhātāya khantyā bhiyyo
atk-s0505a:882_8: lokiyalokuttaradhanavindanakāraṇaṃ vā, “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”ti evaṃ vuttehi
atk-s0505a:882_9: imeheva catūhi dhammehi bhiyyo asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca asocanakāraṇaṃ vā idha
atk-s0505a:882_10: vijjatīti ayamettha saddhiṃ saṅkhepayojanāya atthavaṇṇanā. Vitthārato pana ekamekaṃ
atk-s0505a:883_0: 192. Evaṃ vutte yakkho yena saṃsayena aññe puccheyya, tassa pahīnattā “kathaṃ nu
atk-s0505a:883_1: dāni puccheyyaṃ, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti vatvā yepissa apucchanakāraṇaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0505a:883_2: tepi jānāpento “yohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yo attho samparāyiko”ti āha. Tattha ajjāti ajjādiṃ
atk-s0505a:883_3: katvāti adhippāyo. Pajānāmīti yathāvuttena pakārena jānāmi. Yo atthoti ettāvatā “sussūsaṃ
atk-s0505a:883_4: labhate pañña”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ dasseti samparāyikoti iminā
atk-s0505a:883_5: “yassete caturo dhammā”ti vuttaṃ pecca sokābhāvakaraṃ samparāyikaṃ. Atthoti ca kāraṇassetaṃ
atk-s0505a:883_6: adhivacanaṃ. Ayañhi atthasaddo “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti evamādīsu pāṭhatthe vattati.
atk-s0505a:883_7: “Attho me, gahapati, hiraññasuvaṇṇenā”tiādīsu kiccatthe “hoti sīlavataṃ attho”tiādīsu
atk-s0505a:883_9: hite. “Atthe jāte ca paṇḍita”ntiādīsu kāraṇe. Idha pana kāraṇe. Tasmā yaṃ paññādilābhādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:883_10: kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, yañca pecca sokābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ samparāyikaṃ, taṃ yohaṃ
atk-s0505a:883_11: ajja bhagavatā vuttanayena sāmaṃyeva pajānāmi, so kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ puthū
atk-s0505a:884_0: 193. Evaṃ yakkho “pajānāmi yo attho samparāyiko”ti vatvā tassa ñāṇassa bhagavaṃmūlakattaṃ
atk-s0505a:884_1: dassento “atthāya vata me buddho”ti āha. Tattha atthāyāti hitāya, vuḍḍhiyā vā. Yattha
atk-s0505a:884_2: dinnaṃ mahapphalanti “yassete caturo dhammā”ti ettha vuttacāgena yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0505a:884_3: hoti, taṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ buddhaṃ pajānāmīti attho. Keci pana “saṅghaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0505a:885: 194. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya attano hitādhigamaṃ dassetvā idāni parahitāya paṭipattiṃ dīpento āha “so ahaṃ vicarissāmī”ti. Tassattho hemavatasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:886_0: Evamimāya gāthāya pariyosānañca rattivibhāyanañca sādhukārasadduṭṭhānañca āḷavakakumārassa
atk-s0505a:886_1: yakkhassa bhavanaṃ ānayanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi. Rājapurisā sādhukārasaddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:886_2: “evarūpo sādhukārasaddo ṭhapetvā buddhe na aññesaṃ abbhuggacchati, āgato nu kho bhagavā”ti
atk-s0505a:886_3: āvajjentā bhagavato sarīrappabhaṃ disvā, pubbe viya bahi aṭṭhatvā, nibbisaṅkā antoyeva
atk-s0505a:886_4: pavisitvā, addasaṃsu bhagavantaṃ yakkhassa bhavane nisinnaṃ, yakkhañca añjaliṃ paggahetvā
atk-s0505a:886_5: ṭhitaṃ. Disvāna yakkhaṃ āhaṃsu – “ayaṃ te, mahāyakkha, rājakumāro balikammāya ānīto,
atk-s0505a:886_6: handa naṃ khāda vā bhuñja vā, yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti. So sotāpannattā lajjito
atk-s0505a:886_7: visesato ca bhagavato purato evaṃ vuccamāno, atha taṃ kumāraṃ ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0505a:886_8: bhagavato upanāmesi – “ayaṃ bhante kumāro mayhaṃ pesito, imāhaṃ bhagavato dammi,
atk-s0505a:886_9: hitānukampakā buddhā, paṭiggaṇhātu, bhante, bhagavā imaṃ dārakaṃ imassa hitatthāya
atk-s0505a:888: Udaggacitto sumano dadāmi te, paṭiggaha lokahitāya cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0505a:889_0: Paṭiggahesi bhagavā kumāraṃ, paṭiggaṇhanto ca yakkhassa ca kumārassa ca maṅgalakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:889_1: pādūnagāthaṃ abhāsi. Taṃ yakkho kumāraṃ saraṇaṃ gamento tikkhattuṃ catutthapādena
atk-s0505a:893: Ayaṃ kumāro saraṇamupeti buddhaṃ…pe… dhammaṃ…pe… saṅgha”nti.
atk-s0505a:894_0: Bhagavā kumāraṃ rājapurisānaṃ adāsi – “imaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puna mameva dethā”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:894_1: so kumāro rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ yakkhassa hatthato bhagavato hatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:894_2: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato “hatthako āḷavako”ti
atk-s0505a:894_3: jāto. Taṃ ādāya paṭinivatte rājapurise disvā kassakavanakammikādayo “kiṃ yakkho kumāraṃ
atk-s0505a:894_4: atidaharattā na icchatī”ti bhītā pucchiṃsu. Rājapurisā “mā bhāyatha, khemaṃ kataṃ
atk-s0505a:894_5: bhagavatā”ti sabbamārocesuṃ. Tato “sādhu sādhū”ti sakalaṃ āḷavīnagaraṃ ekakolāhalena
atk-s0505a:894_6: yakkhābhimukhaṃ ahosi. Yakkhopi bhagavato bhikkhācārakāle anuppatte pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0505a:895_0: Atha bhagavā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nagaradvāre aññatarasmiṃ vivitte
atk-s0505a:895_1: rukkhamūle paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi. Tato mahājanakāyena saddhiṃ rājā ca nāgarā
atk-s0505a:895_2: ca ekato sampiṇḍitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā parivāretvā nisinnā “kathaṃ,
atk-s0505a:895_3: bhante, evaṃ dāruṇaṃ yakkhaṃ damayitthā”ti pucchiṃsu. Tesaṃ bhagavā yuddhamādiṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:895_4: “evaṃ navavidhavassaṃ vassi, evaṃ vibhiṃsanakaṃ akāsi, evaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, tassāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:895_5: evaṃ vissajjesi”nti tamevāḷavakasuttaṃ kathesi. Kathāpariyosāne caturāsītipāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-s0505a:895_6: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tato rājā ca nāgarā ca vessavaṇamahārājassa bhavanasamīpe
atk-s0505a:895_7: yakkhassa bhavanaṃ katvā pupphagandhādisakkārūpetaṃ niccaṃ baliṃ pavattesuṃ. Tañca
atk-s0505a:895_8: kumāraṃ viññutaṃ pattaṃ “tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhi, gaccha, bhagavantaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:895_9: payirupāsassu bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti vissajjesuṃ. So bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0505a:895_10: payirupāsamāno na cirasseva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā
atk-s0505a:895_11: pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ahosi. Bhagavā ca naṃ etadagge niddisi “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:895_12: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ yadidaṃ hatthako
atk-s0505a:899_0: Caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhanti nandasuttaṃ. “Vijayasuttaṃ kāyavicchandanikasutta”ntipi
atk-s0505a:899_1: vuccati. Kā uppatti? Idaṃ kira suttaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu vuttaṃ, tasmā assa duvidhā uppatti.
atk-s0505a:899_2: Tattha bhagavatā anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ anuppatvā, sākiye vinetvā nandādayo pabbājetvā,
atk-s0505a:899_3: anuññātāya mātugāmassa pabbajjāya ānandattherassa bhaginī nandā, khemakasakkarañño
atk-s0505a:899_4: dhītā abhirūpanandā, janapadakalyāṇī nandāti tisso nandāyo pabbajiṃsu. Tena ca samayena
atk-s0505a:899_5: bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Abhirūpanandā abhirūpā eva ahosi dassanīyā pāsādikā,
atk-s0505a:899_6: tenevassā abhirūpanandāti nāmamakaṃsu. Janapadakalyāṇī nandāpi rūpena attanā sadisaṃ
atk-s0505a:899_7: na passati. Tā ubhopi rūpamadamattā “bhagavā rūpaṃ vivaṇṇeti, garahati, anekapariyāyena
atk-s0505a:899_8: rūpe ādīnavaṃ dassetī”ti bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchanti, daṭṭhumpi na icchanti.
atk-s0505a:899_9: Evaṃ appasannā kasmā pabbajitāti ce? Agatiyā. Abhirūpanandāya hi vāreyyadivaseyeva
atk-s0505a:899_10: sāmiko sakyakumāro kālamakāsi. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro akāmakaṃ pabbājesuṃ. Janapadakalyāṇī
atk-s0505a:899_11: nandāpi āyasmante nande arahattaṃ patte nirāsā hutvā “mayhaṃ sāmiko ca mātā ca mahāpajāpati
atk-s0505a:899_12: aññe ca ñātakā pabbajitā, ñātīhi vinā dukkho gharāvāso”ti gharāvāse assādamalabhantī
atk-s0505a:900_0: Atha bhagavā tāsaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ viditvā mahāpajāpatiṃ āṇāpesi “sabbāpi bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0505a:900_1: paṭipāṭiyā ovādaṃ āgacchantū”ti. Tā attano vāre sampatte aññaṃ pesenti. Tato bhagavā
atk-s0505a:900_2: “sampatte vāre attanāva āgantabbaṃ, na aññā pesetabbā”ti āha. Athekadivasaṃ abhirūpanandā
atk-s0505a:900_3: agamāsi. Taṃ bhagavā nimmitarūpena saṃvejetvā “aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ kata”nti imāya dhammapadagāthāya –
atk-s0505a:905_0: Imāhi therīgāthāhi ca anupubbena arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Athekadivasaṃ sāvatthivāsino
atk-s0505a:905_1: purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā samādinnuposathā sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya
atk-s0505a:905_2: dhammassavanatthāya jetavanaṃ gantvā dhammassavanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0505a:905_3: nagaraṃ pavisanti. Bhikkhunisaṅghopi dhammakathaṃ sutvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0505a:905_4: Tattha manussā ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. Catuppamāṇike hi lokasannivāse
atk-s0505a:905_5: sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā appasīdanto nāma natthi. Rūpappamāṇikā hi puggalā bhagavato
atk-s0505a:905_7: lokassa samuppannaṃ rūpaṃ disvā pasīdanti, ghosappamāṇikā anekasatesu jātakesu kittighosaṃ
atk-s0505a:905_9: pattacīvarādilūkhataṃ dukkarakārikalūkhataṃ vā disvā, dhammappamāṇikā sīlakkhandhādīsu
atk-s0505a:905_10: yaṃkiñci dhammakkhandhaṃ upaparikkhitvā. Tasmā sabbaṭṭhānesu bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0505a:905_11: Janapadakalyāṇī nandā bhikkhunipassayaṃ patvāpi anekapariyāyena bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:905_12: bhāsantānaṃ tesaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ upagantukāmā hutvā bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocesi. Bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0505a:906_0: Bhagavā paṭikacceva tassāgamanaṃ viditvā kaṇṭakena kaṇṭakaṃ, āṇiyā ca āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo
atk-s0505a:906_1: puriso viya rūpeneva rūpamadaṃ vinetuṃ attano iddhibalena pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikaṃ
atk-s0505a:906_2: atidassanīyaṃ itthiṃ passe ṭhatvā bījamānaṃ abhinimmini. Nandā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:906_3: upasaṅkamitvā, bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa antare nisīditvā, pādatalā
atk-s0505a:906_4: pabhuti yāva kesaggā bhagavato rūpasampattiṃ disvā puna taṃ bhagavato passe ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0505a:906_5: nimmatarūpañca disvā “aho ayaṃ itthī rūpavatī”ti attano rūpamadaṃ jahitvā tassā rūpe
atk-s0505a:906_6: abhirattabhāvā ahosi. Tato bhagavā taṃ itthiṃ vīsativassappamāṇaṃ katvā dassesi.
atk-s0505a:906_7: Mātugāmo hi soḷasavassuddesikoyeva sobhati, na tato uddhaṃ. Atha tassā rūpaparihāniṃ
atk-s0505a:906_8: disvā nandāya tasmiṃ rūpe chandarāgo tanuko ahosi. Tato bhagavā avijātavaṇṇaṃ, sakiṃvijātavaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:906_9: majjhimitthivaṇṇaṃ, mahitthivaṇṇanti evaṃ yāva vassasatikaṃ obhaggaṃ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:906_10: tilakāhatagattaṃ katvā, dassetvā passamānāyeva nandāya tassā maraṇaṃ uddhumātakādibhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:906_11: kākādīhi samparivāretvā khajjamānaṃ duggandhaṃ jegucchapaṭikūlabhāvañca dassesi.
atk-s0505a:906_12: Nandāya taṃ kamaṃ disvā “evamevaṃ mamapi aññesampi sabbasādhāraṇo ayaṃ kamo”ti aniccasaññā
atk-s0505a:906_13: saṇṭhāsi, tadanusārena ca dukkhanattasaññāpi, tayo bhavā ādittamiva agāraṃ appaṭisaraṇā
atk-s0505a:906_14: hutvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha bhagavā “kammaṭṭhāne pakkhantaṃ nandāya citta”nti ñatvā
atk-s0505a:909: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
atk-s0505a:910: Dhātuso suññato passa, mā lokaṃ punarāgami;
atk-s0505a:912: Gāthāpariyosāne nandā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Athassā bhagavā uparimaggādhigamatthaṃ suññataparivāraṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento imaṃ suttamabhāsi. Ayaṃ tāvassa ekā uppatti.
atk-s0505a:913_0: Bhagavati pana rājagahe viharante yā sā cīvarakkhandhake vitthārato vuttasamuṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:913_1: sālavatiyā gaṇikāya dhītā jīvakassa kaniṭṭhā sirimā nāma mātu accayena taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:913_2: labhitvā “akkodhena jine kodha”nti imissā gāthāya vatthumhi puṇṇakaseṭṭhidhītaraṃ
atk-s0505a:913_3: avamaññitvā, bhagavantaṃ khamāpentī dhammadesanaṃ sutvā, sotāpannā hutvā aṭṭha niccabhattāni
atk-s0505a:913_4: pavattesi. Taṃ ārabbha aññataro niccabhattiko bhikkhu rāgaṃ uppādesi. Āhārakiccampi
atk-s0505a:913_5: ca kātuṃ asakkonto nirāhāro nipajjīti dhammapadagāthāvatthumhi vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ tathānipanneyeva
atk-s0505a:913_6: sirimā kālaṃ katvā yāmabhavane suyāmassa devī ahosi. Atha tassā sarīrassa aggikiccaṃ
atk-s0505a:913_7: nivāretvā āmakasusāne raññā nikkhipāpitaṃ sarīraṃ dassanāya bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0505a:913_8: agamāsi, tampi bhikkhuṃ ādāya, tathā nāgarā ca rājā ca. Tattha manussā bhaṇanti “pubbe
atk-s0505a:913_9: sirimāya aṭṭhuttarasahassenāpi dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ, taṃ dānajja kākaṇikāyāpi daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0505a:913_10: natthī”ti. Sirimāpi devakaññā pañcahi rathasatehi parivutā tatrāgamāsi. Tatrāpi bhagavā
atk-s0505a:913_11: sannipatitānaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttaṃ tassa bhikkhuno ovādatthaṃ “passa cittakataṃ
atk-s0505a:913_12: bimba”nti imañca dhammapadagāthaṃ abhāsi. Ayamassa dutiyā uppatti.
atk-s0505a:914_0: 195. Tattha caraṃ vāti sakalarūpakāyassa gantabbadisābhimukhenābhinīhārena gacchanto
atk-s0505a:914_1: vā. Yadi vā tiṭṭhanti tasseva ussāpanabhāvena tiṭṭhanto vā. Nisinno uda vā sayanti
atk-s0505a:914_3: pasāraṇabhāvena sayanto vā. Samiñjeti pasāretīti tāni tāni pabbāni samiñjeti ca pasāreti ca.
atk-s0505a:915_0: Esā kāyassa iñjanāti sabbāpesā imasseva saviññāṇakassa kāyassa iñjanā calanā phandanā,
atk-s0505a:915_1: natthettha añño koci caranto vā pasārento vā, apica kho pana “carāmī”ti citte uppajjante
atk-s0505a:915_2: taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati, tenassa gantabbadisābhimukho abhinīhāro hoti,
atk-s0505a:915_3: desantare rūpantarapātubhāvoti attho. Tena “cara”nti vuccati. Tathā “tiṭṭhāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:915_4: citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati, tenassa samussāpanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:915_5: uparūpariṭṭhānena rūpapātubhāvoti attho. Tena “tiṭṭha”nti vuccati. Tathā “nisīdāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:915_6: citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati, tenassa heṭṭhimabhāgasamiñjanañca
atk-s0505a:915_7: uparimabhāgasamussāpanañca hoti, tathābhāvena rūpapātubhāvoti attho. Tena “nisinno”ti
atk-s0505a:915_8: vuccati. Tathā “sayāmī”ti citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati,
atk-s0505a:915_9: tenassa tiriyaṃ pasāraṇaṃ hoti, tathābhāvena rūpapātubhāvoti attho. Tena “saya”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:916_0: Evaṃ cāyamāyasmā yo koci itthannāmo caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno uda vā sayaṃ
atk-s0505a:916_1: yametaṃ tattha tattha iriyāpathe tesaṃ tesaṃ pabbānaṃ samiñjanappasāraṇavasena samiñjeti
atk-s0505a:916_2: pasāretīti vuccati. Tampi yasmā samiñjanappasāraṇacitte uppajjamāne yathāvutteneva
atk-s0505a:916_3: nayena hoti, tasmā esā kāyassa iñjanā, natthettha añño koci, suññamidaṃ kenaci carantena
atk-s0505a:916_4: vā pasārentena vā sattena vā puggalena vā. Kevalaṃ pana –
atk-s0505a:920_0: Evametāya gāthāya bhagavā yasmā ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe ciraviniyogena kāyapīḷanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:920_1: tassa ca vinodanatthaṃ iriyāpathaparivattanaṃ karīyati, tasmā “caraṃ vā”tiādīhi iriyāpathapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0505a:920_2: dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ dīpeti, tathā caraṇakāle ṭhānādīnamabhāvato sabbametaṃ caraṇādibhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:920_3: “esā kāyassa iñjanā”ti bhaṇanto santatipaṭicchannaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ. Tāya tāya sāmaggiyā
atk-s0505a:920_4: pavattāya “esā kāyassa iñjanā”ti ca attapaṭikkhepena bhaṇanto attasaññāghanapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0505a:921_0: 196. Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayadīpanena suññatakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā puna saviññāṇakāviññāṇakaasubhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:921_1: “aṭṭhinahārusaṃyutto”ti ārabhi. Tassattho – yassa cesā kāyassa iñjanā, svāyaṃ kāyo
atk-s0505a:921_3: ca pakāsitehi saṭṭhādhikehi tīhi aṭṭhisatehi navahi nhārusatehi ca saṃyuttattā aṭṭhinahārusaṃyutto.
atk-s0505a:921_4: Tattheva pakāsitena aggapādaṅgulitacādinā tacena ca navapesisatappabhedena ca maṃsena
atk-s0505a:921_6: veditabbaṃ siyā, yadi esa yā sā majjhimassa purisassa sakalasarīrato saṃkaḍḍhitā
atk-s0505a:921_7: badaraṭṭhippamāṇā bhaveyya, tāya makkhikāpattasukhumacchaviyā nīlādiraṅgajātena gehabhitti
atk-s0505a:921_8: viya paṭicchanno na bhaveyya, ayaṃ pana evaṃ sukhumāyapi chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno
atk-s0505a:921_9: paññācakkhuvirahitehi bālaputhujjanehi yathābhūtaṃ na dissati. Chavirāgarañjito hissa
atk-s0505a:921_10: paramajegucchapaṭikūladhammasaṅkhāto tacopi tacapaliveṭhitaṃ yaṃ taṃ pabhedato –
atk-s0505a:924: Evaṃ vuttaṃ navamaṃsasatampi, maṃsāvalittā ye te –
atk-s0505a:927_0: Tepi, nhārusamuṭṭhitāni paṭipāṭiyā avaṭṭhitāni pūtīni duggandhāni tīṇi saṭṭhādhikāni
atk-s0505a:927_1: aṭṭhisatānipi yathābhūtaṃ na dissanti yato anādiyitvā taṃ makkhikāpattasukhumacchaviṃ.
atk-s0505a:927_2: Yāni panassa chavirāgarattena tacena paliveṭhitattā sabbalokassa apākaṭāni nānappakārāni
atk-s0505a:927_4: paṭivijjhitvā evaṃ passitabbo “antapūro udarapūro…pe… pittassa ca vasāya cā”ti.
atk-s0505a:928_0: 197. Tattha antassa pūro antapūro. Udarassa pūro udarapūro. Udaranti ca udariyassetaṃ
atk-s0505a:928_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tañhi ṭhānanāmena “udara”nti vuttaṃ. Yakanapeḷassāti yakanapiṇḍassa.
atk-s0505a:928_2: Vatthinoti muttassa. Ṭhānūpacārena panetaṃ “vatthī”ti vuttaṃ. Pūroti adhikāro, tasmā
atk-s0505a:928_3: yakanapeḷassa pūro vatthino pūroti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Esa nayo hadayassātiādīsu. Sabbāneva
atk-s0505a:928_4: cetāni antādīni vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedabhedena abyāpāranayena ca visuddhimagge
atk-s0505a:929_0: 199-200. Evaṃ bhagavā “na kiñcettha ekampi gayhūpagaṃ muttāmaṇisadisaṃ atthi, aññadatthu
atk-s0505a:929_1: asuciparipūrovāyaṃ kāyo”ti abbhantarakuṇapaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva abbhantarakuṇapaṃ
atk-s0505a:929_2: bahinikkhamanakuṇapena pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento pubbe vuttañca saṅgaṇhitvā “athassa
atk-s0505a:930_0: Tattha athāti pariyāyantaranidassanaṃ, aparenāpi pariyāyena asucibhāvaṃ passāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:930_1: hoti. Assāti imassa kāyassa. Navahi sotehīti ubhoakkhicchiddakaṇṇacchiddanāsāchiddamukhavaccamaggapassāvamaggehi.
atk-s0505a:930_3: sandati, paggharati, na aññaṃ kiñci agarucandanādigandhajātaṃ vā maṇimuttādiratanajātaṃ
atk-s0505a:930_4: vā. Sabbadāti tañca kho sabbadā rattimpi divāpi pubbaṇhepi sāyanhepi tiṭṭhatopi gacchatopīti.
atk-s0505a:930_5: Kiṃ taṃ asucīti ce? “Akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādi. Etassa hi dvīhi akkhicchiddehi
atk-s0505a:930_7: nāsāchiddehi pubbasadisā siṅghāṇikā ca savati, mukhena ca vamati. Kiṃ vamatīti ce?
atk-s0505a:930_8: Ekadā pittaṃ, yadā abaddhapittaṃ kuppitaṃ hoti, tadā taṃ vamatīti adhippāyo. Semhañcāti
atk-s0505a:930_9: na kevalañca pittaṃ, yampi udarapaṭale ekapatthapūrappamāṇaṃ semhaṃ tiṭṭhati, tampi
atk-s0505a:930_10: ekadā vamati. Taṃ panetaṃ vaṇṇādito visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. “Semhañcā”ti
atk-s0505a:930_11: ca-saddena semhañca aññañca evarūpaṃ udariyalohitādiasuciṃ vamatīti dasseti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:930_12: sattahi dvārehi asucivamanaṃ dassetvā kālaññū puggalaññū parisaññū ca bhagavā taduttari
atk-s0505a:930_13: dve dvārāni visesavacanena anāmasitvā aparena pariyāyena sabbasmāpi kāyā asucisavanaṃ
atk-s0505a:930_14: dassento āha “kāyamhā sedajallikā”ti. Tattha sedajallikāti sedo ca loṇapaṭalamalabhedā
atk-s0505a:930_15: jallikā ca, tassa “savati sabbadā”ti iminā saddhiṃ sambandho.
atk-s0505a:931_0: 201. Evaṃ bhagavā yathā nāma bhatte paccamāne taṇḍulamalañca udakamalañca pheṇena
atk-s0505a:931_1: saddhiṃ uṭṭhahitvā ukkhalimukhaṃ makkhetvā bahi gaḷati, tathā asitapītādibhede āhāre
atk-s0505a:931_2: kammajena agginā paccamāne yaṃ asitapītādimalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:931_3: bhedena nikkhamantaṃ akkhiādīni makkhetvā bahi gaḷati, tassāpi vasena imassa kāyassa
atk-s0505a:931_4: asucibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yaṃ loke uttamaṅgasammataṃ sīsaṃ ativisiṭṭhabhāvato paccentā
atk-s0505a:931_5: vandaneyyānampi vandanaṃ na karonti, tassāpi nissāratāya asucitāya cassa asucibhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:932_0: Tattha susiranti chiddaṃ. Matthaluṅgassa pūritanti dadhibharitaalābukaṃ viya matthaluṅgabharitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:932_1: Tañca panetaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Subhato naṃ maññati
atk-s0505a:932_2: bāloti tamenaṃ evaṃ nānāvidhakuṇapabharitampi kāyaṃ duccintitacintī bālo subhato
atk-s0505a:932_3: maññati, subhaṃ suciṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpanti tīhipi taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0505a:932_4: Kasmā? Yasmā avijjāya purakkhato catusaccapaṭicchādakena mohena purakkhato, codito,
atk-s0505a:932_5: pavattito, “evaṃ ādiya, evaṃ abhinivisa evaṃ maññāhī”ti gāhitoti adhippāyo. Passa
atk-s0505a:933_0: 202. Evaṃ bhagavā saviññāṇakavasena asubhaṃ dassetvā idāni aviññāṇakavasena dassetuṃ,
atk-s0505a:933_1: yasmā vā cakkavattiraññopi kāyo yathāvuttakuṇapabharitoyeva hoti, tasmā sabbappakārenapi
atk-s0505a:933_2: sampattibhave asubhaṃ dassetvā idāni vipattibhave dassetuṃ “yadā ca so mato setī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:934_0: Tassattho – svāyamevaṃvidho kāyo yadā āyuusmāviññāṇāpagamena mato vātabharitabhastā
atk-s0505a:934_1: viya uddhumātako vaṇṇaparibhedena vinīlako susānasmiṃ niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ chaḍḍitattā
atk-s0505a:934_2: apaviddho seti, atha “na dānissa puna uṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ekaṃsatoyeva anapekkhā
atk-s0505a:934_3: honti ñātayo. Tattha matoti aniccataṃ dasseti, setīti nirīhakattaṃ. Tadubhayena ca
atk-s0505a:934_4: jīvitabalamadappahāne niyojeti. Uddhumātoti saṇṭhānavipattiṃ dasseti, vinīlakoti
atk-s0505a:934_5: chavirāgavipattiṃ. Tadubhayena ca rūpamadappahāne vaṇṇapokkharataṃ paṭicca mānappahāne
atk-s0505a:934_6: ca niyojeti. Apaviddhoti gahetabbābhāvaṃ dasseti, susānasminti anto adhivāsetumanarahaṃ
atk-s0505a:934_7: jigucchanīyabhāvaṃ. Tadubhayenapi “mama”nti gāhassa subhasaññāya ca pahāne niyojeti.
atk-s0505a:934_8: Anapekkhā honti ñātayoti paṭikiriyābhāvaṃ dasseti, tena ca parivāramadappahāne niyojeti.
atk-s0505a:935_0: 203. Evamimāya gāthāya aparibhinnāviññāṇakavasena asubhaṃ dassetvā idāni paribhinnavasenāpi
atk-s0505a:935_1: dassetuṃ “khādanti na”nti gāthamāha. Tattha ye caññeti ye ca aññepi kākakulalādayo
atk-s0505a:935_2: kuṇapabhakkhā pāṇino santi, tepi naṃ khādantīti attho. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0505a:936_1: saviññāṇakāsubhavasena “yadā ca so mato setī”tiādinā aviññāṇakāsubhavasena kāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:936_2: dassetvā evaṃ niccasukhattabhāvasuññe ekantaasubhe cāpi kāyasmiṃ “subhato naṃ maññati
atk-s0505a:936_3: bālo, avijjāya purakkhato”ti iminā bālassa vuttiṃ pakāsetvā avijjāmukhena ca vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0505a:936_4: dassetvā idāni tattha paṇḍitassa vuttiṃ pariññāmukhena ca vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ “sutvāna
atk-s0505a:937_0: Tattha sutvānāti yoniso nisāmetvā. Buddhavacananti kāyavicchandanakaraṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:937_1: Bhikkhūti sekkho vā puthujjano vā. Paññāṇavāti paññāṇaṃ vuccati vipassanā aniccādippakāresu
atk-s0505a:937_2: pavattattā, tāya samannāgatoti attho. Idhāti sāsane. So kho naṃ parijānātīti so imaṃ
atk-s0505a:937_3: kāyaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti. Kathaṃ? Yathā nāma kusalo vāṇijo idañcidañcāti bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0505a:937_4: oloketvā “ettakena gahite ettako nāma udayo bhavissatī”ti tulayitvā tathā katvā puna
atk-s0505a:937_5: saudayaṃ mūlaṃ gaṇhanto taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍeti, evamevaṃ “aṭṭhinhāruādayo ime kesalomādayo
atk-s0505a:937_6: cā”ti ñāṇacakkhunā olokento ñātapariññāya parijānāti, “aniccā ete dhammā dukkhā anattā”ti
atk-s0505a:937_7: tulayanto tīraṇapariññāya parijānāti, evaṃ tīrayitvā ariyamaggaṃ pāpuṇanto tattha
atk-s0505a:937_9: vā passanto ñātapariññāya parijānāti, aniccādivasena passanto tīraṇapariññāya, arahattamaggena
atk-s0505a:937_10: tato chandarāgaṃ apakaḍḍhitvā taṃ pajahanto pahānapariññāya parijānāti.
atk-s0505a:938_0: Kasmā so evaṃ parijānātīti ce? Yathābhūtañhi passati, yasmā yathābhūtaṃ passatīti
atk-s0505a:938_1: attho. “Paññāṇavā”tiādinā eva ca etasmiṃ atthe siddhe yasmā buddhavacanaṃ sutvā tassa
atk-s0505a:938_2: paññāṇavattaṃ hoti, yasmā ca sabbajanassa pākaṭopāyaṃ kāyo asutvā buddhavacanaṃ na
atk-s0505a:938_3: sakkā parijānituṃ, tasmā tassa ñāṇahetuṃ ito bāhirānaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asamatthatañca
atk-s0505a:938_4: dassetuṃ “sutvāna buddhavacana”nti āha. Nandābhikkhuniṃ tañca vipallatthacittaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0505a:938_5: ārabbha desanāpavattito aggaparisato tappaṭipattippattānaṃ bhikkhubhāvadassanato ca “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:939_0: 205. Idāni “yathābhūtañhi passatī”ti ettha yathā passanto yathābhūtaṃ passati, taṃ
atk-s0505a:939_1: dassetuṃ āha “yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā ida”nti. Tassattho – yathā
atk-s0505a:939_2: idaṃ saviññāṇakāsubhaṃ āyuusmāviññāṇānaṃ anapagamā carati, tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, sayati;
atk-s0505a:939_3: tathā etaṃ etarahi susāne sayitaṃ aviññāṇakampi pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anapagamā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:939_4: Yathā ca etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā na carati, na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0505a:939_5: na nisīdati, na seyyaṃ kappeti, tathā idaṃ saviññāṇakampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā
atk-s0505a:939_6: bhavissati. Yathā ca idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ etarahi na susāne mataṃ seti, na uddhumātakādibhāvamupagataṃ,
atk-s0505a:939_7: tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ahosi. Yathā panetaṃ etarahi aviññāṇakāsubhaṃ
atk-s0505a:939_8: mataṃ susāne seti, uddhumātakādibhāvañca upagataṃ, tathā idaṃ saviññāṇakampi bhavissatīti.
atk-s0505a:940_0: Tattha yathā idaṃ tathā etanti attanā matassa sarīrassa samānabhāvaṃ karonto bāhire
atk-s0505a:940_1: dosaṃ pajahati. Yathā etaṃ tathā idanti matasarīrena attano samānabhāvaṃ karonto
atk-s0505a:940_2: ajjhattike rāgaṃ pajahati. Yenākārena ubhayaṃ sabhaṃ karoti, taṃ pajānanto ubhayattha
atk-s0505a:940_3: mohaṃ pajahati. Evaṃ yathābhūtadassanena pubbabhāgeyeva akusalamūlappahānaṃ sādhetvā,
atk-s0505a:940_4: yasmā evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu anupubbena arahattamaggaṃ patvā sabbaṃ chandarāgaṃ virājetuṃ
atk-s0505a:940_5: samattho hoti, tasmā āha “ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, kāye chandaṃ virājaye”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:941_0: 206. Evaṃ sekkhabhūmiṃ dassetvā idāni asekkhabhūmiṃ dassento āha “chandarāgaviratto
atk-s0505a:941_1: so”ti. Tassattho – so bhikkhu arahattamaggañāṇena paññāṇavā maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0505a:941_2: pāpuṇāti, atha sabbaso chandarāgassa pahīnattā “chandarāgaviratto”ti ca, maraṇābhāvena
atk-s0505a:941_3: paṇītaṭṭhena vā amataṃ sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamanato santiṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātavānābhāvato
atk-s0505a:941_4: nibbānaṃ, cavanābhāvato accutanti saṃvaṇṇitaṃ padamajjhagāti ca vuccati. Atha vā
atk-s0505a:941_5: so bhikkhu arahattamaggañāṇena paññāṇavā maggānantaraphale ṭhito chandarāgaviratto
atk-s0505a:941_6: nāma hoti, vuttappakārañca padamajjhagāti veditabbo. Tena “idamassa pahīnaṃ, idañcānena laddha”nti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:942_0: 207-208. Evaṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ saha nipphattiyā kathetvā
atk-s0505a:942_1: puna saṅkhepadesanāya evaṃ mahato ānisaṃsassa antarāyakaraṃ pamādavihāraṃ garahanto
atk-s0505a:942_2: “dvipādakoya”nti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha kiñcāpi apādakādayopi kāyā asucīyeva, idhādhikāravasena
atk-s0505a:942_3: pana ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena vā, yasmā vā aññe asucibhūtāpi kāyā loṇambilādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā
atk-s0505a:942_4: manussānaṃ bhojanepi upanīyanti, na tveva manussakāyo, tasmā asucitarabhāvamassa
atk-s0505a:943_0: Ayanti manussakāyaṃ dasseti. Duggandho parihīratīti duggandho samāno pupphagandhādīhi
atk-s0505a:943_2: Vissavanto tato tatoti pupphagandhādīhi paṭicchādetuṃ ghaṭentānampi taṃ vāyāmaṃ nipphalaṃ
atk-s0505a:943_3: katvā navahi dvārehi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīni, lomakūpehi ca sedajallikaṃ vissavantoyeva.
atk-s0505a:943_4: Tattha dāni passatha – etādisena kāyena yo puriso vā itthī vā koci bālo maññe uṇṇametave
atk-s0505a:943_5: taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññanāhi “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā “nicco”ti vātiādinā nayena yo uṇṇamituṃ
atk-s0505a:943_6: maññeyya, paraṃ vā jātiādīhi avajāneyya attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapento, kimaññatra adassanā
atk-s0505a:943_7: ṭhapetvā ariyamaggena ariyasaccadassanābhāvaṃ kimaññaṃ tassa evaṃ uṇṇamāvajānanakāraṇaṃ siyāti.
atk-s0505a:944_0: Desanāpariyosāne nandā bhikkhunī saṃvegamāpādi – “aho vata re, ahaṃ bālā, yā maṃyeva
atk-s0505a:944_1: ārabbha evaṃ vividhadhammadesanāpavattakassa bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ nāgamāsi”nti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:944_2: saṃviggā ca tameva dhammadesanaṃ samannāharitvā teneva kammaṭṭhānena katipayadivasabbhantare
atk-s0505a:944_3: arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Dutiyaṭṭhānepi kira desanāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-s0505a:944_4: dhammābhisamayo ahosi, sirimā devakaññā anāgāmiphalaṃ pattā, so ca bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0505a:948_0: 209. Santhavāto bhayaṃ jātanti munisuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Na sabbasseva suttassa ekā
atk-s0505a:948_1: uppatti, apicettha ādito tāva catunnaṃ gāthānaṃ ayamuppatti – bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:948_2: viharante gāmakāvāse aññatarā duggatitthī matapatikā puttaṃ bhikkhūsu pabbājetvā
atk-s0505a:948_3: attanāpi bhikkhunīsu pabbaji. Te ubhopi sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā abhiṇhaṃ aññamaññassa
atk-s0505a:948_4: dassanakāmā ahesuṃ. Mātā kiñci labhitvā puttassa harati, puttopi mātu. Evaṃ sāyampi
atk-s0505a:948_5: pātopi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ saṃvibhajamānā, sammodamānā, sukhadukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:948_6: pucchamānā, nirāsaṅkā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ evaṃ abhiṇhadassanena saṃsaggo uppajji, saṃsaggā
atk-s0505a:948_7: vissāso, vissāsā otāro, rāgena otiṇṇacittānaṃ pabbajitasaññā ca mātuputtasaññā ca
atk-s0505a:948_8: antaradhāyi. Tato mariyādavītikkamaṃ katvā asaddhammaṃ paṭiseviṃsu, ayasappattā ca
atk-s0505a:948_9: vibbhamitvā agāramajjhe vasiṃsu. Bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. “Kiṃ nu so, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:948_10: moghapuriso maññati na mātā putte sārajjati, putto vā pana mātarī”ti garahitvā “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:948_11: bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmī”tiādinā avasesasuttenapi bhikkhū saṃvejetvā
atk-s0505a:951: Vatvā puna bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ – “santhavāto bhayaṃ jāta”nti imā attupanāyikā catasso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:952_0: Tattha santhavo taṇhādiṭṭhimittabhedena tividhoti pubbe vutto. Idha taṇhādiṭṭhisanthavo
atk-s0505a:952_1: adhippeto. Taṃ sandhāya bhagavā āha – “passatha, bhikkhave, yathā idaṃ tassa moghapurisassa
atk-s0505a:952_2: santhavāto bhayaṃ jāta”nti. Tañhi tassa abhiṇhadassanakāmatāditaṇhāya balavakilesabhayaṃ
atk-s0505a:952_3: jātaṃ, yena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto mātari vippaṭipajji. Attānuvādādikaṃ vā mahābhayaṃ,
