atk-s0505a:952_4: yena sāsanaṃ chaḍḍetvā vibbhanto. Niketāti “rūpanimittaniketavisāravinibandhā kho,
atk-s0505a:952_5: gahapati, ‘niketasārī’ti vuccatī”tiādinā nayena vuttā ārammaṇappabhedā. Jāyate rajoti
atk-s0505a:952_6: rāgadosamoharajo jāyate. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Na kevalañca tassa santhavāto bhayaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0505a:952_7: apica kho pana yadetaṃ kilesānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhena sāsavārammaṇaṃ “niketa”nti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:952_8: idānissa bhinnasaṃvarattā atikkantamariyādattā suṭṭhutaraṃ tato niketā jāyate rajo,
atk-s0505a:952_9: yena saṃkiliṭṭhacitto anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇissati. Atha vā passatha, bhikkhave, yathā
atk-s0505a:952_10: idaṃ tassa moghapurisassa santhavāto bhayaṃ jātaṃ, yathā ca sabbaputhujjanānaṃ niketā
atk-s0505a:953_0: Sabbathā pana iminā purimaddhena bhagavā puthujjanadassanaṃ garahitvā attano dassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:953_2: santhavapaṭikkhepena ca asanthavaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ nibbānassādhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:953_3: Etaṃ ve munidassananti etaṃ aniketamasanthavaṃ buddhamuninā diṭṭhanti attho. Tattha
atk-s0505a:953_4: veti vimhayatthe nipāto daṭṭhabbo. Tena ca yaṃ nāma niketasanthavavasena mātāputtesu
atk-s0505a:953_5: vippaṭipajjamānesu aniketamasanthavaṃ, etaṃ muninā diṭṭhaṃ aho abbhutanti ayamadhippāyo
atk-s0505a:953_6: siddho hoti. Atha vā munino dassanantipi munidassanaṃ, dassanaṃ nāma khanti ruci,
atk-s0505a:954_0: 210. Dutiyagāthāya yo jātamucchijjāti yo kismiñcideva vatthusmiṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattaṃ
atk-s0505a:954_1: kilesaṃ yathā uppannākusalappahānaṃ hoti, tathā vāyamanto tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ puna
atk-s0505a:954_2: anibbattanavasena ucchinditvā yo anāgatopi kileso tathārūpappaccayasamodhāne nibbattituṃ
atk-s0505a:954_4: na ropayeyya jāyantaṃ, yathā anuppannākusalānuppādo hoti, tathā vāyamanto na nibbatteyyāti
atk-s0505a:954_5: attho. Kathañca na nibbatteyya? Assa nānuppavecche, yena paccayena so nibbatteyya
atk-s0505a:954_6: taṃ nānuppaveseyya na samodhāneyya. Evaṃ sambhāravekallakaraṇena taṃ na ropayeyya
atk-s0505a:954_7: jāyantaṃ. Atha vā yasmā maggabhāvanāya atītāpi kilesā ucchijjanti āyatiṃ vipākābhāvena
atk-s0505a:954_8: vattamānāpi na ropīyanti tadabhāvena, anāgatāpi cittasantatiṃ nānuppavesīyanti uppattisāmatthiyavighātena,
atk-s0505a:954_9: tasmā yo ariyamaggabhāvanāya jātamucchijja na ropayeyya jāyantaṃ, anāgatampi cassa
atk-s0505a:954_10: jāyantassa nānuppavecche, tamāhu ekaṃ muninaṃ carantaṃ, so ca addakkhi santipadaṃ
atk-s0505a:954_11: mahesīti evampettha yojanā veditabbā. Ekantanikkilesatāya ekaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhena vā ekaṃ.
atk-s0505a:954_12: Muninanti muniṃ, munīsu vā ekaṃ. Carantanti sabbākāraparipūrāya lokatthacariyāya
atk-s0505a:954_13: avasesacariyāhi ca carantaṃ. Addakkhīti addasa. Soti yo jātamucchijja aropane ananuppavesane
atk-s0505a:954_14: ca samatthatāya “na ropayeyya jāyantamassa nānuppavecche”ti vutto buddhamuni. Santipadanti
atk-s0505a:954_16: accantasantīsu seṭṭhaṃ evaṃ anupasante loke accantasantiṃ addasa mahesīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:955_0: 211. Tatiyagāthāya saṅkhāyāti gaṇayitvā, paricchinditvā vīmaṃsitvā yathābhūtato ñatvā,
atk-s0505a:955_1: dukkhapariññāya parijānitvāti attho. Vatthūnīti yesu evamayaṃ loko sajjati, tāni
atk-s0505a:955_2: khandhāyatanadhātubhedāni kilesaṭṭhānāni. Pamāya bījanti yaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ bījaṃ
atk-s0505a:955_3: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ, taṃ pamāya hiṃsitvā, bādhitvā, samucchedappahānena pajahitvāti
atk-s0505a:955_4: attho. Sinehamassa nānuppaveccheti yena taṇhādiṭṭhisinehena sinehitaṃ taṃ bījaṃ āyatiṃ
atk-s0505a:955_5: paṭisandhivasena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ vatthusassaṃ viruheyya, taṃ sinehamassa nānuppavecche,
atk-s0505a:955_6: tappaṭipakkhāya maggabhāvanāya taṃ nānuppaveseyyāti attho. Sa ve muni jātikhayantadassīti
atk-s0505a:955_7: so evarūpo buddhamuni nibbānasacchikiriyāya jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca antabhūtassa nibbānassa
atk-s0505a:955_8: diṭṭhattā jātikkhayantadassī takkaṃ pahāya na upeti saṅkhaṃ. Imāya catusaccabhāvanāya
atk-s0505a:955_9: navappabhedampi akusalavitakkaṃ pahāya saupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ patvā lokatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0505a:955_10: karonto anupubbena carimaviññāṇakkhayā anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā “devo vā manusso
atk-s0505a:955_11: vā”ti na upeti saṅkhaṃ. Aparinibbuto eva vā yathā kāmavitakkādino vitakkassa appahīnattā
atk-s0505a:955_12: “ayaṃ puggalo ratto”ti vā “duṭṭho”ti vā saṅkhaṃ upeti, evaṃ takkaṃ pahāya na upeti
atk-s0505a:956_0: 212. Catutthagāthāya aññāyāti aniccādinayena jānitvā. Sabbānīti anavasesāni, nivesanānīti
atk-s0505a:956_1: kāmabhavādike bhave. Nivasanti hi tesu sattā, tasmā “nivesanānī”ti vuccanti. Anikāmayaṃ
atk-s0505a:956_2: aññatarampi tesanti evaṃ diṭṭhādīnavattā tesaṃ nivesanānaṃ ekampi apatthento so evarūpo
atk-s0505a:956_3: buddhamuni maggabhāvanābalena taṇhāgedhassa vigatattā vītagedho, vītagedhattā eva
atk-s0505a:956_4: ca agiddho, na yathā eke avītagedhā eva samānā “agiddhamhā”ti paṭijānanti, evaṃ.
atk-s0505a:956_5: Nāyūhatīti tassa tassa nivesanassa nibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na karoti.
atk-s0505a:956_6: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Pāragato hi hoti, yasmā evarūpo sabbanivesanānaṃ pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato hotīti attho.
atk-s0505a:957_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya puthujjanadassanaṃ garahitvā attano dassanaṃ pasaṃsanto dutiyagāthāya
atk-s0505a:957_1: yehi kilesehi puthujjano anupasanto hoti, tesaṃ abhāvena attano santipadādhigamaṃ
atk-s0505a:957_2: pasaṃsanto tatiyagāthāya yesu vatthūsu puthujjano takkaṃ appahāya tathā tathā saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:957_3: upeti, tesu catusaccabhāvanāya takkaṃ pahāya attano saṅkhānupagamanaṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0505a:957_4: catutthagāthāya āyatimpi yāni nivesanāni kāmayamāno puthujjano bhavataṇhāya āyūhati,
atk-s0505a:957_5: tesu taṇhābhāvena attano anāyūhanaṃ pasaṃsanto catūhi gāthāhi arahattanikūṭeneva
atk-s0505a:958_0: 213. Sabbābhibhunti kā uppatti? Mahāpuriso mahābhinikkhamanaṃ katvā anupubbena sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0505a:958_1: patvā dhammacakkappavattanatthāya bārāṇasiṃ gacchanto bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca
atk-s0505a:958_2: antare upakenājīvakena samāgacchi. Tena ca “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyānī”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:958_3: nayena puṭṭho “sabbābhibhū”tiādīni āha. Upako “hupeyyāvuso”ti vatvā, sīsaṃ okampetvā,
atk-s0505a:958_4: ummaggaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi. Anukkamena ca vaṅkahārajanapade aññataraṃ māgavikagāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:958_5: pāpuṇi. Tamenaṃ māgavikajeṭṭhako disvā – “aho appiccho samaṇo vatthampi na nivāseti,
atk-s0505a:958_6: ayaṃ loke arahā”ti gharaṃ netvā maṃsarasena parivisitvā bhuttāviñca naṃ saputtadāro
atk-s0505a:958_7: vanditvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha, ahaṃ paccayena upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti nimantetvā, vasanokāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:959_0: Māgaviko gimhakāle udakasampanne sītale padese carituṃ dūraṃ apakkantesu migesu tattha
atk-s0505a:959_1: gacchanto “amhākaṃ arahantaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahassū”ti chāvaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā
atk-s0505a:959_2: agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi. Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā. Dutiyadivase
atk-s0505a:959_3: upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā, parivisituṃ upagataṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:959_4: rāgena abhibhūto bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0505a:959_5: bhattaṃ ekamante nikkhipitvā – “sace chāvaṃ labhāmi, jīvāmi, no ce, marāmī”ti nirāhāro
atk-s0505a:959_6: sayi. Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi. Sā – “ekadivasameva
atk-s0505a:959_7: āgantvā puna nāgatapubbo”ti āha. Māgaviko “āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:959_8: taṅkhaṇaññeva gantvā – “kiṃ, bhante, aphāsuka”nti pāde parāmasanto pucchi. Upako
atk-s0505a:959_9: nitthunanto parivattatiyeva. So “vada, bhante, yaṃ mayā sakkā kātuṃ, sabbaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:959_10: āha. Upako – “sace chāvaṃ labhāmi, jīvāmi, no ce, idheva maraṇaṃ seyyo”ti āha. “Jānāsi
atk-s0505a:959_11: pana, bhante, kiñci sippa”nti? “Na jānāmī”ti. “Na, bhante, kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena
atk-s0505a:959_12: sakkā gharāvāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti? So āha – “nāhaṃ kiñci sippaṃ jānāmi, apica tumhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:959_13: maṃsahārako bhavissāmi, maṃsañca vikkiṇissāmī”ti. Māgavikopi “amhākaṃ etadeva ruccatī”ti
atk-s0505a:959_14: uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā, gharaṃ ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi. Tesaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya putto vijāyi.
atk-s0505a:959_15: Subhaddotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Chāvā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi. So taṃ asahanto
atk-s0505a:959_16: “bhadde, ahaṃ anantajinassa santikaṃ gacchāmī”ti majjhimadesābhimukho pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:960_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavanamahāvihāre. Atha kho bhagavā
atk-s0505a:960_1: paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “yo, bhikkhave, anantajinoti pucchamāno āgacchati,
atk-s0505a:960_2: tassa maṃ dasseyyāthā”ti. Upakopi kho anupubbeneva sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe
atk-s0505a:960_3: ṭhatvā “imasmiṃ vihāre mama sahāyo anantajino nāma atthi, so kuhiṃ vasatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0505a:960_4: Taṃ bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ nayiṃsu. Bhagavā tassānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. So desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0505a:960_5: anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Bhikkhū tassa pubbappavattiṃ sutvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0505a:960_6: – “bhagavā paṭhamaṃ nissirikassa naggasamaṇassa dhammaṃ desesī”ti. Bhagavā taṃ kathāsamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:960_7: viditvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena buddhāsane nisīditvā
atk-s0505a:960_8: bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti? Te sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:960_9: kathesuṃ. Tato bhagavā – “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato ahetuappaccayā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0505a:960_10: nimmalā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā, na sakkā tattha dosaṃ daṭṭhuṃ. Tena, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:960_11: dhammadesanūpanissayena upako etarahi anāgāmī jāto”ti vatvā attano desanāmalābhāvadīpikaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:961_0: Tassattho – sāsavesu sabbakhandhāyatanadhātūsu chandarāgappahānena tehi anabhibhūtattā
atk-s0505a:961_1: sayañca te dhamme sabbe abhibhuyya pavattattā sabbābhibhuṃ. Tesañca aññesañca sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0505a:961_2: sabbākārena viditattā sabbaviduṃ. Sabbadhammadesanasamatthāya sobhanāya medhāya samannāgatattā
atk-s0505a:961_3: sumedhaṃ. Yesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ vasena sāsavakhandhādibhedesu sabbadhammesu upalimpati,
atk-s0505a:961_4: tesaṃ lepānaṃ abhāvā tesu sabbesu dhammesu anupalittaṃ. Tesu ca sabbadhammesu chandarāgābhāvena
atk-s0505a:961_5: sabbe te dhamme jahitvā ṭhitattā sabbañjahaṃ. Upadhivivekaninnena cittena taṇhakkhaye
atk-s0505a:961_6: nibbāne visesena muttattā taṇhakkhaye vimuttaṃ, adhimuttanti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ vāpi
atk-s0505a:961_7: dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi paṇḍitā sattā muniṃ vedayanti jānanti. Passatha yāva
atk-s0505a:961_8: paṭivisiṭṭhovāyaṃ muni, tassa kuto desanāmalanti attānaṃ vibhāveti. Vibhāvanattho
atk-s0505a:961_9: hi ettha vāsaddoti. Keci pana vaṇṇayanti – “upako tadā tathāgataṃ disvāpi ‘ayaṃ buddhamunī’ti
atk-s0505a:961_10: na saddahī”ti evaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tato bhagavā “saddahatu vā mā vā,
atk-s0505a:961_11: dhīrā pana taṃ muniṃ vedayantī”ti dassento imaṃ gāthamabhāsīti.
atk-s0505a:962_0: 214. Paññābalanti kā uppatti? Ayaṃ gāthā revatattheraṃ ārabbha vuttā. Tattha “gāme
atk-s0505a:962_1: vā yadi vāraññe”ti imissā gāthāya vuttanayeneva revatattherassa ādito pabhuti pabbajjā,
atk-s0505a:962_2: pabbajitassa khadiravane vihāro, tattha viharato visesādhigamo, bhagavato tattha
atk-s0505a:962_3: gamanapaccāgamanañca veditabbaṃ. Paccāgate pana bhagavati yo so mahallakabhikkhu
atk-s0505a:962_4: upāhanaṃ sammussitvā paṭinivatto khadirarukkhe ālaggitaṃ disvā sāvatthiṃ anuppatto
atk-s0505a:962_5: visākhāya upāsikāya “kiṃ, bhante, revatattherassa vasanokāso ramaṇīyo”ti bhikkhū
atk-s0505a:962_6: pucchamānāya yehi bhikkhūhi pasaṃsito, te apasādento “upāsike, ete tucchaṃ bhaṇanti,
atk-s0505a:962_7: na sundaro bhūmippadeso, atilūkhakakkhaḷaṃ khadiravanamevā”ti āha. So visākhāya āgantukabhattaṃ
atk-s0505a:962_8: bhuñjitvā pacchābhattaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatite bhikkhū ujjhāpento āha – “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:962_9: revatattherassa senāsane ramaṇīyaṃ tumhehi diṭṭha”nti. Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭito
atk-s0505a:962_10: nikkhamma taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena parisamajjhaṃ patvā, buddhāsane nisīditvā
atk-s0505a:962_11: bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti? Te āhaṃsu
atk-s0505a:962_12: – “revataṃ, bhante, ārabbha kathā uppannā ‘evaṃ navakammiko kadā samaṇadhammaṃ karissatī”’ti.
atk-s0505a:962_13: “Na, bhikkhave, revato navakammiko, arahā revato khīṇāsavo”ti vatvā taṃ ārabbha tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:963_1: samannāgatattā paññābalaṃ, catupārisuddhisīlena dhutaṅgavatena ca upapannattā sīlavatūpapannaṃ,
atk-s0505a:963_2: maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā iriyāpathasamādhinā ca samāhitaṃ, upacārappanābhedena
atk-s0505a:963_3: jhānena jhāne vā ratattā jhānarataṃ, sativepullappattattā satimaṃ, rāgādisaṅgato
atk-s0505a:963_4: pamuttatā saṅgā pamuttaṃ, pañcacetokhilacatuāsavābhāvena akhilaṃ anāsavaṃ taṃ vāpi
atk-s0505a:963_5: dhīrā muniṃ vedayanti. Tampi evaṃ paññādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ saṅgādidosavisaṃyuttaṃ paṇḍitā
atk-s0505a:963_6: sattā muniṃ vā vedayanti. Passatha yāva paṭivisiṭṭhovāyaṃ khīṇāsavamuni, so “navakammiko”ti
atk-s0505a:963_7: vā “kadā samaṇadhammaṃ karissatī”ti vā kathaṃ vattabbo. So hi paññābalena taṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0505a:963_8: niṭṭhāpesi, na navakammakaraṇena, katakiccova so, na idāni samaṇadhammaṃ karissatīti
atk-s0505a:963_9: revatattheraṃ vibhāveti. Vibhāvanattho hi ettha vā-saddoti.
atk-s0505a:964_0: 215. Ekaṃ carantanti kā uppatti? Bodhimaṇḍato pabhuti yathākkamaṃ kapilavatthuṃ anuppatte
atk-s0505a:964_1: bhagavati pitāputtasamāgame vattamāne bhagavā sammodamānena raññā suddhodanena “tumhe,
atk-s0505a:964_2: bhante, gahaṭṭhakāle gandhakaraṇḍake vāsitāni kāsikādīni dussāni nivāsetvā idāni
atk-s0505a:964_3: kathaṃ chinnakāni paṃsukūlāni dhārethā”ti evamādinā vutto rājānaṃ anunayamāno –
atk-s0505a:965: “Yaṃ tvaṃ tāta vade mayhaṃ, paṭṭuṇṇaṃ dukūlakāsikaṃ;
atk-s0505a:966: Paṃsukūlaṃ tato seyyaṃ, etaṃ me abhipatthita”nti. –
atk-s0505a:967: Ādīni vatvā lokadhammehi attano avikampabhāvaṃ dassento rañño dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ sattapadagāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:968_0: Tassattho – pabbajjāsaṅkhātādīhi ekaṃ, iriyāpathādīhi cariyāhi carantaṃ. Moneyyadhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0505a:968_1: muniṃ. Sabbaṭṭhānesu pamādābhāvato appamattaṃ. Akkosanagarahanādibhedāya nindāya
atk-s0505a:968_2: vaṇṇanathomanādibhedāya pasaṃsāya cāti imāsu nindāpasaṃsāsu paṭighānunayavasena avedhamānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:968_3: Nindāpasaṃsāmukhena cettha aṭṭhapi lokadhammā vuttāti veditabbā. Sīhaṃva bherisaddādīsu
atk-s0505a:968_4: saddesu aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu pakativikārānupagamena asantasantaṃ, pantesu vā senāsanesu
atk-s0505a:968_5: santāsābhāvena. Vātaṃva suttamayādibhede jālamhi catūhi maggehi taṇhādiṭṭhijāle asajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:968_6: aṭṭhasu vā lokadhammesu paṭighānunayavasena asajjamānaṃ. Padumaṃva toyena loke jātampi
atk-s0505a:968_7: yesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ vasena sattā lokena lippanti, tesaṃ lepānaṃ pahīnattā lokena
atk-s0505a:968_8: alippamānaṃ, nibbānagāmimaggaṃ uppādetvā tena maggena netāramaññesaṃ devamanussānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:968_9: Attano pana aññena kenaci maggaṃ dassetvā anetabbattā anaññaneyyaṃ taṃ vāpi dhīrā
atk-s0505a:968_10: muni vedayanti buddhamuniṃ vedayantīti attānaṃ vibhāveti. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:969_0: 216. Yo ogahaṇeti kā uppatti? Bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0505a:969_2: pūretvā tusitabhavane abhinibbattiguṇaṃ tattha nivāsaguṇaṃ mahāvilokanaguṇaṃ gabbhavokkantiṃ
atk-s0505a:969_3: gabbhavāsaṃ gabbhanikkhamanaṃ padavītihāraṃ disāvilokanaṃ brahmagajjanaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0505a:969_4: mahāpadhānaṃ abhisambodhiṃ dhammacakkappavattanaṃ catubbidhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:969_5: aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇaṃ, dasabalañāṇaṃ, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ, pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:969_9: asahamānehi titthiyehi uyyojitāya ciñcamāṇavikāya “ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassā”ti imissā
atk-s0505a:969_10: gāthāya vatthumhi vuttanayena catuparisamajjhe bhagavato ayase uppādite tappaccayā
atk-s0505a:969_11: bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “evarūpepi nāma ayase uppanne na bhagavato cittassa
atk-s0505a:969_12: aññathattaṃ atthī”ti. Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena
atk-s0505a:969_13: parisamajjhaṃ patvā, buddhāsane nisīditvā, bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:969_14: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti? Te sabbaṃ ārocesuṃ. Tato bhagavā – “buddhā nāma, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:969_15: aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu tādino hontī”ti vatvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:970_0: Tassattho – yathā nāma ogahaṇe manussānaṃ nhānatitthe aṅgaghaṃsanatthāya caturasse
atk-s0505a:970_1: vā aṭṭhaṃse vā thambhe nikhāte uccakulīnāpi nīcakulīnāpi aṅgaṃ ghaṃsanti, na tena
atk-s0505a:970_2: thambhassa unnati vā onati vā hoti. Evamevaṃ yo ogahaṇe thambhorivābhijāyati yasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:970_3: pare vācāpariyantaṃ vadanti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pare titthiyā vā
atk-s0505a:970_4: aññe vā vaṇṇavasena uparimaṃ vā avaṇṇavasena heṭṭhimaṃ vā vācāpariyantaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0505a:970_5: tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ anunayaṃ vā paṭighaṃ vā anāpajjamāno tādibhāvena yo ogahaṇe thambhoriva
atk-s0505a:970_6: bhavatīti. Taṃ vītarāgaṃ susamāhitindriyanti taṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe rāgābhāvena vītarāgaṃ,
atk-s0505a:970_7: aniṭṭhārammaṇe ca dosamohābhāvena susamāhitindriyaṃ, suṭṭhu vā samodhānetvā ṭhapitindriyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:970_8: rakkhitindriyaṃ, gopitindriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti buddhamuniṃ
atk-s0505a:970_9: vedayanti, tassa kathaṃ cittassa aññathattaṃ bhavissatīti attānaṃ vibhāveti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:971_0: 217. Yo ve ṭhitattoti kā uppatti? Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññatarā seṭṭhidhītā pāsādā oruyha
atk-s0505a:971_1: heṭṭhāpāsāde tantavāyasālaṃ gantvā tasaraṃ vaṭṭente disvā tassa ujubhāvena tappaṭibhāganimittaṃ
atk-s0505a:971_2: aggahesi – “aho vata sabbe sattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkaṃ pahāya tasaraṃ viya ujucittā
atk-s0505a:971_3: bhaveyyu”nti. Sā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvāpi punappunaṃ tadeva nimittaṃ āvajjentī nisīdi.
atk-s0505a:971_4: Evaṃ paṭipannāya cassā na cirasseva aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi, tadanusāreneva
atk-s0505a:971_5: ca dukkhānattalakkhaṇānipi. Athassā tayopi bhavā ādittā viya upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Taṃ tathā
atk-s0505a:971_6: vipassamānaṃ ñatvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ muñci. Sā taṃ disvā “kiṃ
atk-s0505a:971_7: ida”nti āvajjentī bhagavantaṃ passe nisinnamiva disvā uṭṭhāya pañjalikā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:971_8: Athassā bhagavā sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammadesanāvasena imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:972_0: Tassattho – yo ve ekaggacittatāya akuppavimuttitāya ca vuḍḍhihānīnaṃ abhāvato vikkhīṇajātisaṃsārattā
atk-s0505a:972_2: vā tasaraṃva uju, hirottappasampannattā jigucchati kammehi pāpakehi, pāpakāni kammāni
atk-s0505a:972_3: gūthagataṃ viya muttagataṃ viya ca jigucchati, hirīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yogavibhāgena
atk-s0505a:972_4: hi upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ saddasatthe sijjhati. Vīmaṃsamāno visamaṃ samañcāti
atk-s0505a:972_6: upaparikkhamāno. Taṃ vāpi khīṇāsavaṃ dhīrā muniṃ vedayantīti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathāvuttanayena
atk-s0505a:972_7: maggapaññāya vīmaṃsamāno visamaṃ samañca yo ve ṭhitatto hoti, so evaṃ tasaraṃva uju
atk-s0505a:972_8: hutvā kiñci vītikkamaṃ anāpajjanto jigucchati kammehi pāpakehi. Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muniṃ
atk-s0505a:972_9: vedayanti. Yato īdiso hotīti khīṇāsavamuniṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ desesi.
atk-s0505a:972_10: Desanāpariyosāne seṭṭhidhītā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Ettha ca vikappe vā samuccaye
atk-s0505a:973_0: 218. Yo saññatattoti kā uppatti? Bhagavati kira āḷaviyaṃ viharante āḷavīnagare aññataro
atk-s0505a:973_1: tantavāyo sattavassikaṃ dhītaraṃ āṇāpesi – “amma, hiyyo avasiṭṭhatasaraṃ na bahu,
atk-s0505a:973_2: tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā lahuṃ tantavāyasālaṃ āgaccheyyāsi, mā kho cirāyī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0505a:973_3: sampaṭicchi. So sālaṃ gantvā tantaṃ vinento aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ divasañca bhagavā mahākaruṇāsamāpattito
atk-s0505a:973_4: vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento tassā dārikāya sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0505a:973_5: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānañca dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā pageva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:973_6: pattacīvaramādāya nagaraṃ pāvisi. Manussā bhagavantaṃ disvā – “addhā ajja koci anuggahetabbo
atk-s0505a:973_7: atthi, pageva paviṭṭho bhagavā”ti bhagavantaṃ upagacchiṃsu. Bhagavā yena maggena
atk-s0505a:973_8: sā dārikā pitusantikaṃ gacchati, tasmiṃ aṭṭhāsi. Nagaravāsino taṃ padesaṃ sammajjitvā,
atk-s0505a:973_9: paripphositvā, pupphūpahāraṃ katvā, vitānaṃ bandhitvā, āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Nisīdi
atk-s0505a:973_10: bhagavā paññatte āsane, mahājanakāyo parivāretvā aṭṭhāsi. Sā dārikā taṃ padesaṃ pattā
atk-s0505a:973_11: mahājanaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. Taṃ bhagavā āmantetvā
atk-s0505a:973_12: – “dārike kuto āgatāsī”ti pucchi. “Na jānāmi bhagavā”ti. “Kuhiṃ gamissasī”ti? “Na
atk-s0505a:973_13: jānāmi bhagavā”ti. “Na jānāsī”ti? “Jānāmi bhagavā”ti. “Jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmi bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0505a:974_0: Taṃ sutvā manussā ujjhāyanti – “passatha, bho, ayaṃ dārikā attano gharā āgatāpi bhagavatā
atk-s0505a:974_1: pucchiyamānā ‘na jānāmī’ti āha, tantavāyasālaṃ gacchantī cāpi pucchiyamānā ‘na jānāmī’ti
atk-s0505a:974_2: āha, ‘na jānāsī’ti vuttā ‘jānāmī’ti āha, ‘jānāsī’ti vuttā ‘na jānāmī’ti āha, sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:974_3: paccanīkameva karotī”ti. Bhagavā manussānaṃ tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo taṃ pucchi
atk-s0505a:974_4: – “kiṃ mayā pucchitaṃ, kiṃ tayā vutta”nti? Sā āha – “na maṃ, bhante, koci na jānāti,
atk-s0505a:974_5: gharato āgatā tantavāyasālaṃ gacchatī”ti; apica maṃ tumhe paṭisandhivasena pucchatha,
atk-s0505a:974_6: “kuto āgatāsī”ti, cutivasena pucchatha, “kuhiṃ gamissasī”ti ahañca na jānāmi. “Kuto
atk-s0505a:974_7: camhi āgatā; nirayā vā devalokā vā”ti, na hi jānāmi, “kuhimpi gamissāmi nirayaṃ vā
atk-s0505a:974_8: devalokaṃ vā”ti, tasmā “na jānāmī”ti avacaṃ. Tato maṃ bhagavā maraṇaṃ sandhāya pucchi
atk-s0505a:974_9: – “na jānāsī”ti, ahañca jānāmi. “Sabbesaṃ maraṇaṃ dhuva”nti, tenāvocaṃ “jānāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:974_10: Tato maṃ bhagavā maraṇakālaṃ sandhāya pucchi “jānāsī”ti, ahañca na jānāmi “kadā marissāmi
atk-s0505a:974_11: kiṃ ajja vā udāhu sve vā”ti, tenāvocaṃ “na jānāmī”ti. Bhagavā tāya vissajjitaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0505a:974_12: “sādhu sādhū”ti anumodi. Mahājanakāyopi “yāva paṇḍitā ayaṃ dārikā”ti sādhukārasahassāni
atk-s0505a:974_13: adāsi. Atha bhagavā dārikāya sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0505a:977: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Sā gāthāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānañca dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0505a:978_0: Sā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Pitā taṃ disvā “cirenāgatā”ti kuddho
atk-s0505a:978_1: vegena tante vemaṃ pakkhipi. Taṃ nikkhamitvā dārikāya kucchiṃ bhindi. Sā tattheva
atk-s0505a:978_2: kālamakāsi. So disvā – “nāhaṃ mama dhītaraṃ pahariṃ, apica kho imaṃ vemaṃ vegasā
atk-s0505a:978_3: nikkhamitvā imissā kucchiṃ bhindi. Jīvati nu kho nanu kho”ti vīmaṃsanto mataṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:978_4: cintesi – “manussā maṃ ‘iminā dhītā māritā’ti ñatvā upakkoseyyuṃ, tena rājāpi garukaṃ
atk-s0505a:978_5: daṇḍaṃ paṇeyya, handāhaṃ paṭikacceva palāyāmī”ti. So daṇḍabhayena palāyanto bhagavato
atk-s0505a:978_6: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanokāsaṃ pāpuṇi. Te
atk-s0505a:978_7: ca bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Te taṃ pabbājetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:978_8: adaṃsu. So taṃ uggahetvā vāyamanto na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, te cassa ācariyupajjhāyā.
atk-s0505a:978_9: Atha mahāpavāraṇāya sabbeva bhagavato santikaṃ agamaṃsu – “visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmā”ti.
atk-s0505a:978_10: Bhagavā pavāretvā vutthavasso bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmanigamādīsu cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0505a:978_11: anupubbena āḷaviṃ agamāsi. Tattha manussā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā dānādīni karontā
atk-s0505a:978_12: taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “dhītaraṃ māretvā idāni kaṃ māretuṃ āgatosī”tiādīni vatvā uppaṇḍesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:978_13: Bhikkhū taṃ sutvā upaṭṭhānavelāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0505a:978_14: – “na, bhikkhave, ayaṃ bhikkhu dhītaraṃ māresi, sā attano kammena matā”ti vatvā tassa
atk-s0505a:978_15: bhikkhuno manussehi dubbijānaṃ khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ pakāsento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:979_0: Tassattho – yo tīsupi kammadvāresu sīlasaṃyamena saṃyatatto kāyena vā vācāya vā cetasā
atk-s0505a:979_1: vā hiṃsādikaṃ na karoti pāpaṃ, tañca kho pana daharo vā daharavaye ṭhito, majjhimo
atk-s0505a:979_2: vā majjhimavaye ṭhito, eteneva nayena thero vā pacchimavaye ṭhitoti kadācipi na karoti.
atk-s0505a:979_3: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Yatatto, yasmā anuttarāya viratiyā sabbapāpehi uparatacittoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:980_0: Idāni muni arosaneyyo na so roseti kañcīti etesaṃ padānaṃ ayaṃ yojanā ca adhippāyo
atk-s0505a:980_1: ca – so khīṇāsavamuni arosaneyyo “dhītumārako”ti vā “pesakāro”ti vā evamādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:980_2: kāyena vā vācāya vā rosetuṃ, ghaṭṭetuṃ, bādhetuṃ araho na hoti. Sopi hi na roseti
atk-s0505a:980_3: kañci, “nāhaṃ mama dhītaraṃ māremi, tvaṃ māresi, tumhādiso vā māretī”tiādīni vatvā
atk-s0505a:980_4: kañci na roseti, na ghaṭṭeti, na bādheti, tasmā sopi na rosaneyyo. Apica kho pana
atk-s0505a:980_5: “tiṭṭhatu nāgo, mā nāgaṃ ghaṭṭesi, namo karohi nāgassā”ti vuttanayena namassitabboyeva
atk-s0505a:980_6: hoti. Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti ettha pana tampi dhīrāva muniṃ vedayantīti
atk-s0505a:980_7: evaṃ padavibhāgo veditabbo. Adhippāyo cettha – taṃ “ayaṃ arosaneyyo”ti ete bālamanussā
atk-s0505a:980_8: ajānitvā rosenti. Ye pana dhīrā honti, te dhīrāva tampi muniṃ vedayanti, ayaṃ khīṇāsavamunīti jānantīti.
atk-s0505a:981_0: 219. Yadaggatoti kā uppatti? Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcaggadāyako nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0505a:981_1: So nipphajjamānesu sassesu khettaggaṃ, rāsaggaṃ, koṭṭhaggaṃ, kumbhiaggaṃ, bhojanagganti
atk-s0505a:981_2: imāni pañca aggāni deti. Tattha paṭhamapakkāniyeva sāli-yava-godhūma-sīsāni āharāpetvā
atk-s0505a:981_3: yāgupāyāsaputhukādīni paṭiyādetvā “aggassa dātā medhāvī, aggaṃ so adhigacchatī”ti
atk-s0505a:981_4: evaṃdiṭṭhiko hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti, idamassa khettaggadānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:981_5: Nipphannesu pana sassesu lāyitesu madditesu ca varadhaññāni gahetvā tatheva dānaṃ
atk-s0505a:981_6: deti, idamassa rāsaggadānaṃ. Puna tehi dhaññehi koṭṭhāgārāni pūrāpetvā paṭhamakoṭṭhāgāravivaraṇe
atk-s0505a:981_7: paṭhamanīhaṭāni dhaññāni gahetvā tatheva dānaṃ deti, idamassa koṭṭhaggadānaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-s0505a:981_8: yadeva panassa ghare randheti, tato aggaṃ anuppattapabbajitānaṃ adatvā antamaso dārakānampi
atk-s0505a:981_9: na kiñci deti, idamassa kumbhiaggadānaṃ. Puna attano bhojanakāle paṭhamūpanītaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:981_10: purebhattakāle saṅghassa, pacchābhattakāle sampattayācakānaṃ, tadabhāve antamaso
atk-s0505a:981_11: sunakhānampi adatvā na bhuñjati, idamassa bhojanaggadānaṃ. Evaṃ so pañcaggadāyakotveva abhilakkhito ahosi.
atk-s0505a:982_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā paccūsasamaye buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:982_1: brāhmaṇiyā ca sotāpattimaggaupanissayaṃ disvā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā atippageva
atk-s0505a:982_2: gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Bhikkhū pihitadvāraṃ gandhakuṭiṃ disvā – “ajja bhagavā ekakova
atk-s0505a:982_3: gāmaṃ pavisitukāmo”ti ñatvā bhikkhācāravelāya gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:982_4: pavisiṃsu. Bhagavāpi brāhmaṇassa bhojanavelāyaṃ nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ pāvisi. Manussā
atk-s0505a:982_5: bhagavantaṃ disvā evaṃ – “nūnajja koci satto anuggahetabbo atthi, tathā hi bhagavā
atk-s0505a:982_6: ekakova paviṭṭho”ti ñatvā na bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu nimantanatthāya. Bhagavāpi
atk-s0505a:982_7: anupubbena brāhmaṇassa gharadvāraṃ sampatvā aṭṭhāsi. Tena ca samayena brāhmaṇo bhojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:982_8: gahetvā nisinno hoti, brāhmaṇī panassa bījaniṃ gahetvā ṭhitā. Sā bhagavantaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:982_9: “sacāyaṃ brāhmaṇo passeyya, pattaṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ bhojanaṃ dadeyya, tato me puna
atk-s0505a:982_10: pacitabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti cintetvā appasādañca maccherañca uppādetvā yathā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:982_11: bhagavantaṃ na passati, evaṃ tālavaṇṭena paṭicchādesi. Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā sarīrābhaṃ
atk-s0505a:982_12: muñci. Taṃ brāhmaṇo suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ disvā “kimeta”nti ullokento addasa bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:982_13: dvāre ṭhitaṃ. Brāhmaṇīpi “diṭṭhonena bhagavā”ti tāvadeva tālavaṇṭaṃ nikkhipitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:982_14: upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi, vanditvā cassā uṭṭhahantiyā sappāyaṃ viditvā –
atk-s0505a:984: Asatā ca na socati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:985_0: Imaṃ gāthamabhāsi. Sā gāthāpariyosāneyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇopi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:985_1: antogharaṃ pavesetvā, varāsane nisīdāpetvā, dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā, attano upanītabhojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:985_2: upanāmesi – “tumhe, bhante, sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā, sādhu, me taṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:985_3: attano patte patiṭṭhāpethā”ti. Bhagavā tassa anuggahatthaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji.
atk-s0505a:985_4: Katabhattakicco ca brāhmaṇassa sappāyaṃ viditvā imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:986_0: Tassattho – yaṃ kumbhito paṭhamameva gahitattā aggato, addhāvasesāya kumbhiyā āgantvā
atk-s0505a:986_1: tato gahitattā majjhato, ekadvikaṭacchumattāvasesāya kumbhiyā āgantvā tato gahitattā
atk-s0505a:986_2: sesato vā piṇḍaṃ labhetha. Paradattūpajīvīti pabbajito. So hi udakadantapoṇaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0505a:986_3: avasesaṃ pareneva dattaṃ upajīvati, tasmā “paradattūpajīvī”ti vuccati. Nālaṃ thutuṃ
atk-s0505a:986_4: nopi nipaccavādīti aggato laddhā attānaṃ vā dāyakaṃ vā thometumpi nārahati pahīnānunayattā.
atk-s0505a:986_5: Sesato laddhā “kiṃ etaṃ iminā dinna”ntiādinā nayena dāyakaṃ nipātetvā appiyavacanāni
atk-s0505a:986_6: vattāpi na hoti pahīnapaṭighattā. Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi pahīnānunayapaṭighaṃ
atk-s0505a:986_7: dhīrāva muniṃ vedayantīti brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ desesi. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0505a:987_0: 220. Muniṃ carantanti kā uppatti? Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññataro seṭṭhiputto utuvasena
atk-s0505a:987_1: tīsu pāsādesu sabbasampattīhi paricārayamāno daharova pabbajitukāmo hutvā, mātāpitaro
atk-s0505a:987_2: yācitvā, khaggavisāṇasutte “kāmā hi citrā”ti imissā gāthāya aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0505a:987_3: tikkhattuṃ pabbajitvā ca uppabbajitvā ca catutthavāre arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ pubbaparicayena
atk-s0505a:987_4: bhikkhū bhaṇanti – “samayo, āvuso, uppabbajitu”nti. So “abhabbo dānāhaṃ, āvuso, vibbhamitu”nti
atk-s0505a:987_5: āha. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā “evametaṃ, bhikkhave, abhabbo
atk-s0505a:987_6: so dāni vibbhamitu”nti tassa khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ āvikaronto imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:988_0: Tassattho – moneyyadhammasamannāgamena muniṃ, ekavihāritāya, pubbe vuttappakārāsu
atk-s0505a:988_1: vā cariyāsu yāya kāyaci cariyāya carantaṃ, pubbe viya methunadhamme cittaṃ akatvā
atk-s0505a:988_2: anuttarāya viratiyā virataṃ methunasmā. Dutiyapādassa sambandho – kīdisaṃ muniṃ carantaṃ
atk-s0505a:988_3: virataṃ methunasmāti ce? Yo yobbane nopanibajjhate kvaci, yo bhadrepi yobbane vattamāne
atk-s0505a:988_4: kvaci itthirūpe yathā pure, evaṃ methunarāgena na upanibajjhati. Atha vā kvaci attano
atk-s0505a:988_5: vā parassa vā yobbane “yuvā tāvamhi, ayaṃ vā yuvāti paṭisevāmi tāva kāme”ti evaṃ
atk-s0505a:988_6: yo rāgena na upanibajjhatīti ayampettha attho. Na kevalañca virataṃ methunasmā, apica
atk-s0505a:988_7: kho pana jātimadādibhedā madā, kāmaguṇesu sativippavāsasaṅkhātā pamādāpi ca virataṃ,
atk-s0505a:988_8: evaṃ madappamādā viratattā eva ca vippamuttaṃ sabbakilesabandhanehi. Yathā vā eko
atk-s0505a:988_9: lokikāyapi viratiyā virato hoti, na evaṃ, kiṃ pana vippamuttaṃ virataṃ, sabbakilesabandhanehi
atk-s0505a:988_10: vippamuttattā lokuttaraviratiyā viratantipi attho. Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti
atk-s0505a:988_11: tampi dhīrā eva muniṃ vedayanti, tumhe pana naṃ na vedayatha, tena naṃ evaṃ bhaṇathāti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:989_0: 221. Aññāya lokanti kā uppatti? Bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṃ viharati. Tena samayena
atk-s0505a:989_1: nandassa ābharaṇamaṅgalaṃ, abhisekamaṅgalaṃ, āvāhamaṅgalanti tīṇi maṅgalāni akaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:989_2: Bhagavāpi tattha nimantito pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā bhuñjitvā
atk-s0505a:989_3: nikkhamanto nandassa hatthe pattaṃ adāsi. Taṃ nikkhamantaṃ disvā janapadakalyāṇī
atk-s0505a:989_4: “tuvaṭṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti āha. So bhagavato gāravena “handa bhagavā
atk-s0505a:989_5: patta”nti vattuṃ asakkonto vihārameva gato. Bhagavā gandhakuṭipariveṇe ṭhatvā “āhara,
atk-s0505a:989_6: nanda, patta”nti gahetvā “pabbajissasī”ti āha. So bhagavato gāravena paṭikkhipituṃ
atk-s0505a:989_7: asakkonto “pabbajāmi, bhagavā”ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā pabbājesi. So pana janapadakalyāṇiyā
atk-s0505a:989_8: vacanaṃ punappunaṃ saranto ukkaṇṭhi. Bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā nandassa
atk-s0505a:989_9: anabhiratiṃ vinodetukāmo “tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gatapubbosi, nandā”ti āha. Nando “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:990_0: Tato naṃ bhagavā attano ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā vejayantapāsādadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:990_1: Bhagavato āgamanaṃ viditvā sakko accharāgaṇaparivuto pāsādā orohi. Tā sabbāpi kassapassa
atk-s0505a:990_2: bhagavato sāvakānaṃ pādamakkhanatelaṃ datvā kakuṭapādiniyo ahesuṃ. Atha bhagavā nandaṃ
atk-s0505a:990_3: āmantesi – “passasi no, tvaṃ nanda, imāni pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:990_4: vitthāretabbaṃ. Mātugāmassa nāma nimittānubyañjanaṃ gahetabbanti sakalepi buddhavacane
atk-s0505a:990_5: etaṃ natthi. Atha ca panettha bhagavā upāyakusalatāya āturassa dose uggiletvā nīharitukāmo
atk-s0505a:990_6: vejjo subhojanaṃ viya nandassa rāgaṃ uggiletvā nīharitukāmo nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:990_7: anuññāsi yathā taṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathi. Tato bhagavā accharāhetu nandassa
atk-s0505a:990_8: brahmacariye abhiratiṃ disvā bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “bhatakavādena nandaṃ codethā”ti.
atk-s0505a:990_9: So tehi codiyamāno lajjito yoniso manasi karonto paṭipajjitvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ
atk-s0505a:990_10: sacchākāsi. Tassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā bhagavato etamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:990_11: ārocesi. Bhagavatopi ñāṇaṃ udapādi. Bhikkhū ajānantā tathevāyasmantaṃ codenti. Bhagavā
atk-s0505a:990_12: “na, bhikkhave, idāni nando evaṃ codetabbo”ti tassa khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ dīpento tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:991_0: Tassattho – dukkhasaccavavatthānakaraṇena khandhādilokaṃ aññāya jānitvā vavatthapetvā
atk-s0505a:991_3: atikkamitvā maggabhāvanāya, “tanniddesā tādī”ti imāya tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādiṃ.
atk-s0505a:991_4: Yo vāyaṃ kāmarāgādikilesarāsiyeva avahananaṭṭhena ogho, kucchitagatipariyāyena samuddanaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:991_5: samuddo, samudayappahāneneva taṃ oghaṃ samuddañca atitariya atitiṇṇoghattā idāni
atk-s0505a:991_6: tumhehi evaṃ vuccamānepi vikāramanāpajjanatāya tādimpi evampettha attho ca adhippāyo
atk-s0505a:991_7: ca veditabbo. Taṃ chinnaganthaṃ asitaṃ anāsavanti idaṃ panassa thutivacanameva, imāya
atk-s0505a:991_8: catusaccabhāvanāya catunnaṃ ganthānaṃ chinnattā chinnaganthaṃ, diṭṭhiyā taṇhāya vā
atk-s0505a:991_9: katthaci anissitattā asitaṃ, catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavanti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ
atk-s0505a:991_10: vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi dhīrāva khīṇāsavamuniṃ vedayanti tumhe pana avedayamānā
atk-s0505a:992_0: 222. Asamā ubhoti kā uppatti? Aññataro bhikkhu kosalaraṭṭhe paccantagāmaṃ nissāya
atk-s0505a:992_1: araññe viharati. Tasmiñca gāme migaluddako tassa bhikkhuno vasanokāsaṃ gantvā mige
atk-s0505a:992_2: bandhati. So araññaṃ pavisanto theraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantampi passati, araññā
atk-s0505a:992_3: āgacchanto gāmato nikkhamantampi passati. Evaṃ abhiṇhadassanena there jātasineho
atk-s0505a:992_4: ahosi. So yadā bahuṃ maṃsaṃ labhati, tadā therassāpi rasapiṇḍapātaṃ deti. Manussā
atk-s0505a:992_5: ujjhāyanti – “ayaṃ bhikkhu ‘amukasmiṃ padese migā tiṭṭhanti, caranti, pānīyaṃ pivantī’ti
atk-s0505a:992_6: luddakassa āroceti. Tato luddako mige māreti, tena ubho saṅgamma jīvikaṃ kappentī”ti.
atk-s0505a:992_7: Atha bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caramāno taṃ janapadaṃ agamāsi. Bhikkhū gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:992_8: pavisantā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā luddakena saddhiṃ samānajīvikābhāvasādhakaṃ
atk-s0505a:992_9: tassa bhikkhuno khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ dīpento tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:993_0: Tassattho – yo ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, yo ca luddako, ete asamā ubho. Yaṃ manussā
atk-s0505a:993_1: bhaṇanti “samānajīvikā”ti, taṃ micchā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Dūravihāravuttino, dūre vihāro
atk-s0505a:993_2: ca vutti ca nesanti dūravihāravuttino. Vihāroti vasanokāso, so ca bhikkhuno araññe,
atk-s0505a:993_3: luddakassa ca gāme. Vuttīti jīvikā, sā ca bhikkhuno gāme sapadānabhikkhācariyā, luddakassa
atk-s0505a:993_4: ca araññe migasakuṇamāraṇā. Puna caparaṃ gihī dāraposī, so luddako tena kammena puttadāraṃ
atk-s0505a:993_5: poseti. Amamo ca subbato, puttadāresu taṇhādiṭṭhimamattavirahito sucivatattā sundaravatattā
atk-s0505a:993_6: ca subbato so khīṇāsavabhikkhu. Puna caparaṃ parapāṇarodhāya gihī asaññato, so luddako
atk-s0505a:993_7: gihī parapāṇarodhāya tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedāya kāyavācācittehi asaṃyato.
atk-s0505a:993_8: Niccaṃ munī rakkhati pāṇine yato, itaro pana khīṇāsavamuni kāyavācācittehi niccaṃ
atk-s0505a:993_9: yato saṃyato pāṇino rakkhati. Evaṃ sante te kathaṃ samānajīvikā bhavissantīti?
atk-s0505a:994_0: 223. Sikhī yathāti kā uppatti? Bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante sākiyānaṃ kathā
atk-s0505a:994_1: udapādi – “paṭhamakasotāpanno pacchā sotāpattiṃ pattassa dhammena vuḍḍhataro hoti,
atk-s0505a:994_2: tasmā pacchā sotāpannena bhikkhunā paṭhamasotāpannassa gihino abhivādanādīni kattabbānī”ti
atk-s0505a:994_3: taṃ kathaṃ aññataro piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu sutvā bhagavato ārocesi. Bhagavā “aññā eva
atk-s0505a:994_4: hi ayaṃ jāti, pūjaneyyavatthu liṅga”nti sandhāya “anāgāmīpi ce, bhikkhave, gihī hoti,
atk-s0505a:994_5: tena tadahupabbajitassāpi sāmaṇerassa abhivādanādīni kattabbānevā”ti vatvā puna pacchā
atk-s0505a:994_6: sotāpannassāpi bhikkhuno paṭhamasotāpannagahaṭṭhato atimahantaṃ visesaṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:995_0: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ matthake jātāya sikhāya sabbhāvena sikhī, maṇidaṇḍasadisāya gīvāya
atk-s0505a:995_1: nīlagīvoti ca mayūravihaṅgamo vuccati. So yathā haritahaṃsatambahaṃsakhīrahaṃsakāḷahaṃsapākahaṃsasuvaṇṇahaṃsesu
atk-s0505a:995_2: yvāyaṃ suvaṇṇahaṃso, tassa haṃsassa javena soḷasimpi kalaṃ na upeti. Suvaṇṇahaṃso
atk-s0505a:995_3: hi muhuttakena yojanasahassampi gacchati, yojanampi asamattho itaro. Dassanīyatāya
atk-s0505a:995_4: pana ubhopi dassanīyā honti, evaṃ gihī paṭhamasotāpannopi kiñcāpi maggadassanena
atk-s0505a:995_5: dassanīyo hoti. Atha kho so pacchā sotāpannassāpi maggadassanena tulyadassanīyabhāvassāpi
atk-s0505a:995_6: bhikkhuno javena nānukaroti. Katamena javena? Uparimaggavipassanāñāṇajavena. Gihino
atk-s0505a:995_7: hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ dandhaṃ hoti puttadārādijaṭāya jaṭitattā, bhikkhuno pana tikkhaṃ hoti
atk-s0505a:995_8: tassā jaṭāya vijaṭitattā. Svāyamattho bhagavatā “munino vivittassa vanamhi jhāyato”ti
atk-s0505a:995_9: iminā pādena dīpito. Ayañhi sekkhamuni bhikkhu kāyacittavivekena ca vivitto hoti,
atk-s0505a:995_10: lakkhaṇārammaṇūpanijjhānena ca niccaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyati. Kuto gihino evarūpo viveko
atk-s0505a:998: Niṭṭhito ca paṭhamo vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
atk-s0505a:1002_0: Yānīdha bhūtānīti ratanasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Atīte kira vesāliyaṃ dubbhikkhādayo upaddavā
atk-s0505a:1002_1: uppajjiṃsu. Tesaṃ vūpasamanatthāya licchavayo rājagahaṃ gantvā, yācitvā, bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1002_2: vesālimānayiṃsu. Evaṃ ānīto bhagavā tesaṃ upaddavānaṃ vūpasamanatthāya idaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1002_3: Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Porāṇā panassa vesālivatthuto pabhuti uppattiṃ vaṇṇayanti. Sā
atk-s0505a:1002_4: evaṃ veditabbā – bārāṇasirañño kira aggamahesiyā kucchimhi gabbho saṇṭhāsi. Sā taṃ
atk-s0505a:1002_5: ñatvā rañño nivedesi. Rājā gabbhaparihāraṃ adāsi. Sā sammā parihariyamānagabbhā gabbhaparipākakāle
atk-s0505a:1002_6: vijāyanagharaṃ pāvisi. Puññavatīnaṃ paccūsasamaye gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sā ca tāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:1002_7: aññatarā, tena paccūsasamaye alattakapaṭalabandhujīvakapupphasadisaṃ maṃsapesiṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0505a:1002_8: Tato “aññā deviyo suvaṇṇabimbasadise putte vijāyanti, aggamahesī maṃsapesinti rañño
atk-s0505a:1002_9: purato mama avaṇṇo uppajjeyyā”ti cintetvā tena avaṇṇabhayena taṃ maṃsapesiṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:1002_10: bhājane pakkhipitvā aññena paṭikujjitvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā gaṅgāya sote pakkhipāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1002_11: Manussehi chaḍḍitamatte devatā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahiṃsu. Suvaṇṇapaṭṭikañcettha jātihiṅgulakena
atk-s0505a:1002_12: “bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā pajā”ti likhitvā bandhiṃsu. Tato taṃ bhājanaṃ ūmibhayādīhi
atk-s0505a:1003_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro tāpaso gopālakulaṃ nissāya gaṅgāya tīre vasati. So pātovagaṅgaṃ
atk-s0505a:1003_1: otiṇṇo taṃ bhājanaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya aggahesi. Tato tattha taṃ
atk-s0505a:1003_2: akkharapaṭṭikaṃ rājamuddikālañchanañca disvā muñcitvā taṃ maṃsapesiṃ addasa. Disvānassa
atk-s0505a:1003_3: etadahosi – “siyā gabbho, tathā hissa duggandhapūtibhāvo natthī”ti taṃ assamaṃ netvā
atk-s0505a:1003_4: suddhe okāse ṭhapesi. Atha aḍḍhamāsaccayena dve maṃsapesiyo ahesuṃ. Tāpaso disvā
atk-s0505a:1003_5: sādhukataraṃ ṭhapesi. Tato puna addhamāsaccayena ekamekissā pesiyā hatthapādasīsānamatthāya
atk-s0505a:1003_6: pañca pañca piḷakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha tato addhamāsaccayena ekā maṃsapesi suvaṇṇabimbasadiso
atk-s0505a:1003_7: dārako; ekā dārikā ahosi. Tesu tāpasassa puttasineho uppajji, aṅguṭṭhato cassa khīraṃ
atk-s0505a:1003_8: nibbatti, tato pabhuti ca khīrabhattaṃ labhati. So bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khīraṃ dārakānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1003_9: mukhe āsiñcati. Tesaṃ yaṃ yaṃ udaraṃ pavisati, taṃ sabbaṃ maṇibhājanagataṃ viya dissati.
atk-s0505a:1003_10: Evaṃ nicchavī ahesuṃ. Apare pana āhu – “sibbitvā ṭhapitā viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā
atk-s0505a:1003_11: chavi ahosī”ti. Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya vā licchavīti paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1004_0: Tāpaso dārake posento ussūre gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati. Tassa taṃ
atk-s0505a:1004_1: byāpāraṃ ñatvā gopālakā āhaṃsu – “bhante, pabbajitānaṃ dārakaposanaṃ palibodho, amhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:1004_2: dārake detha, mayaṃ posessāma, tumhe attano kammaṃ karothā”ti. Tāpaso “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇi.
atk-s0505a:1004_3: Gopālakā dutiyadivase maggaṃ samaṃ katvā, pupphehi okiritvā; dhajapaṭākā ussāpetvā
atk-s0505a:1004_4: tūriyehi vajjamānehi assamaṃ āgatā. Tāpaso “mahāpuññā dārakā, appamādena vaḍḍhetha,
atk-s0505a:1004_5: vaḍḍhetvā ca aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ karotha, pañcagorasena rājānaṃ tosetvā bhūmibhāgaṃ
atk-s0505a:1004_6: gahetvā nagaraṃ māpetha, tatra kumāraṃ abhisiñcathā”ti vatvā dārake adāsi. Te “sādhū”ti
atk-s0505a:1005_0: Dārakā vaḍḍhimanvāya kīḷantā vivādaṭṭhānesu aññe gopāladārake hatthenapi pādenapi
atk-s0505a:1005_1: paharanti, te rodanti. “Kissa rodathā”ti ca mātāpitūhi vuttā “ime nimmātāpitikā tāpasapositā
atk-s0505a:1005_2: amhe atīva paharantī”ti vadanti. Tato tesaṃ mātāpitaro “ime dārakā aññe dārake viheṭhenti
atk-s0505a:1005_3: dukkhāpenti, na ime saṅgahetabbā, vajjetabbā ime”ti āhaṃsu. Tato pabhuti kira so
atk-s0505a:1005_4: padeso “vajjī”ti vuccati yojanasataṃ parimāṇena. Atha taṃ padesaṃ gopālakā rājānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1005_5: tosetvā aggahesuṃ. Tattheva nagaraṃ māpetvā soḷasavassuddesikaṃ kumāraṃ abhisiñcitvā
atk-s0505a:1005_6: rājānaṃ akaṃsu. Tāya cassa dārikāya saddhiṃ vāreyyaṃ katvā katikaṃ akaṃsu – “na bāhirato
atk-s0505a:1005_7: dārikā ānetabbā, ito dārikā na kassaci dātabbā”ti. Tesaṃ paṭhamasaṃvāsena dve dārakā
atk-s0505a:1005_8: jātā dhītā ca putto ca, evaṃ soḷasakkhattuṃ dve dve jātā. Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1005_9: vaḍḍhantānaṃ ārāmuyyānanivāsanaṭṭhānaparivārasampattiṃ gahetuṃ appahontaṃ taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0505a:1005_10: tikkhattuṃ gāvutantarena gāvutantarena pākārena parikkhipiṃsu. Tassa punappunaṃ visālīkatattā
atk-s0505a:1006_0: Ayaṃ pana vesālī bhagavato uppannakāle iddhā vepullappattā ahosi. Tattha hi rājūnaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:1006_1: satta sahassāni satta ca satāni satta ca rājāno ahesuṃ, tathā yuvarājasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikappabhutīnaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1007_0: “Tena kho pana samayena vesālī iddhā ceva hoti phītā ca bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā subhikkhā
atk-s0505a:1007_1: ca, satta ca pāsādasahassāni, satta ca pāsādasatāni, satta ca pāsādā, satta ca kūṭāgārasahassāni,
atk-s0505a:1007_2: satta ca kūṭāgārasatāni, satta ca kūṭāgārāni, satta ca ārāmasahassāni, satta ca ārāmasatāni,
atk-s0505a:1007_3: satta ca ārāmā, satta ca pokkharaṇisahassāni, satta ca pokkharaṇisatāni, satta ca pokkharaṇiyo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1008_0: Sā aparena samayena dubbhikkhā ahosi dubbuṭṭhikā dussassā. Paṭhamaṃ duggatamanussā
atk-s0505a:1008_1: maranti, te bahiddhā chaḍḍenti. Matamanussānaṃ kuṇapagandhena amanussā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1008_2: Tato bahutarā mīyanti, tāya paṭikūlatāya ca sattānaṃ ahivātakarogo uppajji. Iti tīhi
atk-s0505a:1008_3: dubbhikkhaamanussarogabhayehi upaddutāya vesāliyā nagaravāsino upasaṅkamitvā rājānamāhaṃsu
atk-s0505a:1008_4: – “mahārāja, imasmiṃ nagare tividhaṃ bhayamuppannaṃ, ito pubbe yāva sattamā rājakulaparivaṭṭā
atk-s0505a:1008_5: evarūpaṃ anuppannapubbaṃ, tumhākaṃ maññe adhammikattena etarahi uppanna”nti. Rājā
atk-s0505a:1008_6: sabbe santhāgāre sannipātāpetvā, “mayhaṃ adhammikabhāvaṃ vicinathā”ti āha. Te sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1009_0: Tato rañño dosaṃ adisvā “idaṃ bhayaṃ amhākaṃ kathaṃ vūpasameyyā”ti cintesuṃ. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1009_1: ekacce cha satthāro apadisiṃsu – “etehi okkantamatte vūpasamissatī”ti. Ekacce āhaṃsu
atk-s0505a:1009_2: – “buddho kira loke uppanno, so bhagavā sabbasattahitāya dhammaṃ deseti mahiddhiko
atk-s0505a:1009_3: mahānubhāvo, tena okkantamatte sabbabhayāni vūpasameyyu”nti. Tena te attamanā hutvā
atk-s0505a:1009_4: “kahaṃ pana so bhagavā etarahi viharati, amhehi vā pesite āgaccheyyā”ti āhaṃsu. Athāpare
atk-s0505a:1009_5: āhaṃsu – “buddhā nāma anukampakā, kissa nāgaccheyyuṃ, so pana bhagavā etarahi rājagahe
atk-s0505a:1009_6: viharati, rājā ca bimbisāro taṃ upaṭṭhahati, kadāci so āgantuṃ na dadeyyā”ti. “Tena
atk-s0505a:1009_7: hi rājānaṃ saññāpetvā ānessāmā”ti dve licchavirājāno mahatā balakāyena pahūtaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1009_8: datvā rañño santikaṃ pesesuṃ – “bimbisāraṃ saññāpetvā bhagavantaṃ ānethā”ti. Te gantvā
atk-s0505a:1009_9: rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ nivedetvā “mahārāja, bhagavantaṃ amhākaṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0505a:1009_10: pesehī”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā na sampaṭicchi – “tumhe eva jānāthā”ti āha. Te bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1009_11: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā evamāhaṃsu – “bhante, amhākaṃ nagare tīṇi bhayāni uppannāni.
atk-s0505a:1009_12: Sace bhagavā āgaccheyya, sotthi no bhaveyyā”ti. Bhagavā āvajjetvā “vesāliyaṃ ratanasutte
atk-s0505a:1009_13: vutte sā rakkhā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni pharissati, suttapariyosāne caturāsītiyā
atk-s0505a:1009_14: pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti adhivāsesi. Atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavato
atk-s0505a:1009_15: adhivāsanaṃ sutvā “bhagavatā vesāligamanaṃ adhivāsita”nti nagare ghosanaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0505a:1009_16: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “kiṃ, bhante, sampaṭicchittha vesāligamana”nti? “Āma,
atk-s0505a:1009_17: mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, āgametha, yāva maggaṃ paṭiyādemī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1010_0: Atha kho rājā bimbisāro rājagahassa ca gaṅgāya ca antarā pañcayojanaṃ bhūmiṃ samaṃ
atk-s0505a:1010_1: katvā, yojane yojane vihāraṃ māpetvā, bhagavato gamanakālaṃ paṭivedesi. Bhagavā pañcahi
atk-s0505a:1010_2: bhikkhusatehi parivuto pāyāsi. Rājā pañcayojanaṃ maggaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi jāṇumattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1010_3: okirāpetvā dhajapaṭākāpuṇṇaghaṭakadaliādīni ussāpetvā bhagavato dve setacchattāni,
atk-s0505a:1010_4: ekekassa ca bhikkhussa ekamekaṃ ukkhipāpetvā saddhiṃ attano parivārena pupphagandhādīhi
atk-s0505a:1010_5: pūjaṃ karonto ekekasmiṃ vihāre bhagavantaṃ vasāpetvā mahādānāni datvā pañcahi divasehi
atk-s0505a:1010_6: gaṅgātīraṃ nesi. Tattha sabbālaṅkārehi nāvaṃ alaṅkaronto vesālikānaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi
atk-s0505a:1010_7: – “āgato bhagavā, maggaṃ paṭiyādetvā sabbe bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ karothā”ti. Te
atk-s0505a:1010_8: “diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karissāmā”ti vesāliyā ca gaṅgāya ca antarā tiyojanaṃ bhūmiṃ samaṃ
atk-s0505a:1010_9: katvā bhagavato cattāri, ekekassa ca bhikkhuno dve dve setacchattāni sajjetvā pūjaṃ
atk-s0505a:1011_0: Bimbisāro dve nāvāyo saṅghāṭetvā, maṇḍapaṃ katvā, pupphadāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā tattha
atk-s0505a:1011_1: sabbaratanamayaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpesi. Bhagavā tasmiṃ nisīdi. Pañcasatā bhikkhūpi
atk-s0505a:1011_2: nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā yathānurūpaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Rājā bhagavantaṃ anugacchanto galappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1011_3: udakaṃ orohitvā “yāva, bhante, bhagavā āgacchati, tāvāhaṃ idheva gaṅgātīre vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:1011_4: vatvā nivatto. Upari devatā yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā pūjamakaṃsu, heṭṭhā gaṅgānivāsino
atk-s0505a:1011_5: kambalassatarādayo nāgā pūjamakaṃsu. Evaṃ mahatiyā pūjāya bhagavā yojanamattaṃ addhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1012_0: Tato licchavirājāno tena bimbisārena katapūjāya diguṇaṃ karontā galappamāṇe udake
atk-s0505a:1012_1: bhagavantaṃ paccuggacchiṃsu. Teneva khaṇena tena muhuttena vijjuppabhāvinaddhandhakāravisaṭakūṭo
atk-s0505a:1012_2: gaḷagaḷāyanto catūsu disāsu mahāmegho vuṭṭhāsi. Atha bhagavatā paṭhamapāde gaṅgātīre
atk-s0505a:1012_3: nikkhittamatte pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Ye temetukāmā, te eva tementi, atemetukāmā na
atk-s0505a:1012_4: tementi. Sabbattha jāṇumattaṃ ūrumattaṃ kaṭimattaṃ galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ vahati, sabbakuṇapāni
atk-s0505a:1012_5: udakena gaṅgaṃ pavesitāni parisuddho bhūmibhāgo ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1013_0: Licchavirājāno bhagavantaṃ antarā yojane yojane vāsāpetvā mahādānāni datvā tīhi divasehi
atk-s0505a:1013_1: diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karontā vesāliṃ nayiṃsu. Vesāliṃ sampatte bhagavati sakko devānamindo
atk-s0505a:1013_2: devasaṅghapurakkhato āgacchi, mahesakkhānaṃ devānaṃ sannipātena amanussā yebhuyyena
atk-s0505a:1013_3: palāyiṃsu. Bhagavā nagaradvāre ṭhatvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “imaṃ ānanda, ratanasuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1013_4: uggahetvā balikammūpakaraṇāni gahetvā licchavikumārehi saddhiṃ vesāliyā tīsu pākārantaresu
atk-s0505a:1013_5: vicaranto parittaṃ karohī”ti ratanasuttaṃ abhāsi. Evaṃ “kena panetaṃ suttaṃ, kadā,
atk-s0505a:1013_6: kattha, kasmā ca vutta”nti etesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanā vitthārena vesālivatthuto pabhuti porāṇehi vaṇṇiyati.
atk-s0505a:1014_0: Evaṃ bhagavato vesāliṃ anuppattadivaseyeva vesālinagaradvāre tesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭighātatthāya
atk-s0505a:1014_1: vuttamidaṃ ratanasuttaṃ uggahetvā āyasmā ānando parittatthāya bhāsamāno bhagavato
atk-s0505a:1014_2: pattena udakaṃ ādāya sabbanagaraṃ abbhukkiranto anuvicari. “Yaṃ kiñcī”ti vuttamatteyeva
atk-s0505a:1014_3: ca therena ye pubbe apalātā saṅkārakūṭabhittippadesādinissitā amanussā, te catūhi
atk-s0505a:1014_4: dvārehi palāyiṃsu, dvārāni anokāsāni ahesuṃ. Tato ekacce dvāresu okāsaṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0505a:1014_5: pākāraṃ bhinditvā palātā. Amanussesu gatamattesu manussānaṃ gattesu rogo vūpasanto,
atk-s0505a:1014_6: te nikkhamitvā sabbagandhapupphādīhi theraṃ pūjesuṃ. Mahājano nagaramajjhe santhāgāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1014_7: sabbagandhehi limpitvā vitānaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā tattha buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1015_0: Bhagavā santhāgāraṃ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi kho rājāno manussā
atk-s0505a:1015_1: ca patirūpe okāse nisīdiṃsu. Sakkopi devānamindo dvīsu devalokesu devaparisāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1015_2: upanisīdi aññe ca devā. Ānandattheropi sabbaṃ vesāliṃ anuvicaranto ārakkhaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:1015_3: vesālinagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tattha bhagavā sabbesaṃ tadeva
atk-s0505a:1016_0: 224. Tattha yānīdha bhūtānīti paṭhamagāthāyaṃ yānīti yādisāni appesakkhāni vā mahesakkhāni
atk-s0505a:1016_1: vā. Idhāti imasmiṃ padese, tasmiṃ khaṇe sannipatitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhūtānīti
atk-s0505a:1016_2: kiñcāpi bhūtasaddo “bhūtasmiṃ pācittiya”nti evamādīsu vijjamāne, “bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:1016_3: samanupassathā”ti evamādīsu khandhapañcake, “cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetū”ti
atk-s0505a:1016_4: evamādīsu catubbidhe pathavīdhātvādirūpe, “yo ca kālaghaso bhūto”ti evamādīsu khīṇāsave,
atk-s0505a:1016_5: “sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya”nti evamādīsu sabbasatte, “bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”ti
atk-s0505a:1016_6: evamādīsu rukkhādike, “bhūtaṃ bhūtato sañjānātī”ti evamādīsu cātumahārājikānaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0505a:1016_7: sattanikāyaṃ upādāya vattati. Idha pana avisesato amanussesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:1017_0: Samāgatānīti sannipatitāni. Bhummānīti bhūmiyaṃ nibbattāni. Vāti vikappane. Tena
atk-s0505a:1017_1: yānīdha bhummāni vā bhūtāni samāgatānīti imamekaṃ vikappaṃ katvā puna dutiyaṃ vikappaṃ
atk-s0505a:1017_2: kātuṃ “yāni vā antalikkhe”ti āha. Antalikkhe vā yāni bhūtāni nibbattāni, tāni sabbāni
atk-s0505a:1017_3: idha samāgatānīti attho. Ettha ca yāmato yāva akaniṭṭhaṃ, tāva nibbattāni bhūtāni
atk-s0505a:1017_4: ākāse pātubhūtavimānesu nibbattattā “antalikkhe bhūtānī”ti veditabbāni. Tato heṭṭhā
atk-s0505a:1017_5: sineruto pabhuti yāva bhūmiyaṃ rukkhalatādīsu adhivatthāni pathaviyañca nibbattāni
atk-s0505a:1017_6: bhūtāni, tāni sabbāni bhūmiyaṃ bhūmipaṭibaddhesu ca rukkhalatāpabbatādīsu nibbattattā
atk-s0505a:1018_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbāneva amanussabhūtāni “bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe”ti dvīhi padehi
atk-s0505a:1018_1: vikappetvā puna ekena padena pariggahetvā “sabbeva bhūtā sumanā bhavantū”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:1018_2: Sabbeti anavasesā. Evāti avadhāraṇe, ekampi anapanetvāti adhippāyo. Bhūtāti amanussā.
atk-s0505a:1018_3: Sumanā bhavantūti sukhitamanā, pītisomanassajātā bhavantūti attho. Athopīti kiccantarasanniyojanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1018_4: vākyopādāne nipātadvayaṃ. Sakkacca suṇantu bhāsitanti aṭṭhiṃ katvā, manasi katvā,
atk-s0505a:1018_5: sabbacetaso samannāharitvā dibbasampattilokuttarasukhāvahaṃ mama desanaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0505a:1019_0: Evamettha bhagavā “yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatānī”ti aniyamitavacanena bhūtāni pariggahetvā
atk-s0505a:1019_1: puna “bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe”ti dvidhā vikappetvā tato “sabbeva bhūtā”ti
atk-s0505a:1019_2: puna ekajjhaṃ katvā “sumanā bhavantū”ti iminā vacanena āsayasampattiyaṃ niyojento
atk-s0505a:1020_0: 225. Tasmā hi bhūtāti dutiyagāthā. Tattha tasmāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Bhūtāti āmantanavacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1020_1: Nisāmethāti suṇātha. Sabbeti anavasesā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmā tumhe dibbaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0505a:1020_2: tattha upabhogasampadañca pahāya dhammassavanatthaṃ idha samāgatā, na naṭanaccanādidassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1020_3: tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbeti. Atha vā “sumanā bhavantu sakkacca suṇantū”ti vacanena
atk-s0505a:1020_4: tesaṃ sumanabhāvaṃ sakkaccaṃ sotukamyatañca disvā āha – yasmā tumhe sumanabhāvena
atk-s0505a:1020_6: payogasuddhīhi ca yuttā, tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbeti. Atha vā yaṃ purimagāthāya
atk-s0505a:1020_7: ante “bhāsita”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kāraṇabhāvena apadisanto āha – “yasmā mama bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1020_8: nāma atidullabhaṃ aṭṭhakkhaṇaparivajjitassa khaṇassa dullabhattā, anekānisaṃsañca
atk-s0505a:1020_9: paññākaruṇāguṇena pavattattā, tañcāhaṃ vattukāmo ‘suṇantu bhāsita’nti avocaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:1020_10: hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbe”ti idaṃ iminā gāthāpadena vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1021_0: Evametaṃ kāraṇaṃ niropento attano bhāsitanisāmane niyojetvā nisāmetabbaṃ vattumāraddho
atk-s0505a:1021_1: “mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāyā”ti. Tassattho – yāyaṃ tīhi upaddavehi upaddutā mānusī
atk-s0505a:1021_2: pajā, tassā mānusiyā pajāya mittabhāvaṃ hitajjhāsayataṃ paccupaṭṭhāpethāti. Keci
atk-s0505a:1021_3: pana “mānusiyaṃ paja”nti paṭhanti, taṃ bhummatthāsambhavā na yujjati. Yampi caññe
atk-s0505a:1021_4: atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti, sopi na yujjati. Adhippāyo panettha – nāhaṃ buddhoti issariyabalena
atk-s0505a:1021_5: vadāmi, apica pana tumhākañca imissā ca mānusiyā pajāya hitatthaṃ vadāmi – “mettaṃ
atk-s0505a:1022: “Ye sattasaṇḍaṃ pathaviṃ vijetvā, rājisayo yajamānā anupariyagā;
atk-s0505a:1024: “Mettassa cittassa subhāvitassa, kalampi te nānubhavanti soḷasiṃ.
atk-s0505a:1025: “Ekampi ce pāṇamaduṭṭhacitto, mettāyati kusalī tena hoti;
atk-s0505a:1026: Sabbe ca pāṇe manasānukampī, pahūtamariyo pakaroti puñña”nti. –
atk-s0505a:1027: Evamādīnaṃ suttānaṃ ekādasānisaṃsānañca vasena ye mettaṃ karonti, tesaṃ mettā hitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1029: Evamādīnaṃ vasena yesu karīyati, tesampi hitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1030_0: Evaṃ ubhayesampi hitabhāvaṃ dassento “mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāyā”ti vatvā idāni
atk-s0505a:1030_1: upakārampi dassento āha “divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha
atk-s0505a:1030_2: appamattā”ti. Tassattho – ye manussā cittakammakaṭṭhakammādīhipi devatā katvā cetiyarukkhādīni
atk-s0505a:1030_3: ca upasaṅkamitvā devatā uddissa divā baliṃ karonti, kāḷapakkhādīsu ca rattiṃ baliṃ
atk-s0505a:1030_4: karonti. Salākabhattādīni vā datvā ārakkhadevatā upādāya yāva brahmadevatānaṃ pattidānaniyyātanena
atk-s0505a:1030_5: divā baliṃ karonti, chattāropanadīpamālā sabbarattikadhammassavanādīni kārāpetvā
atk-s0505a:1030_6: pattidānaniyyātanena ca rattiṃ baliṃ karonti, te kathaṃ na rakkhitabbā. Yato evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1030_7: divā ca ratto ca tumhe uddissa karonti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha. Tasmā balikammakāraṇāpi
atk-s0505a:1030_8: te manusse rakkhatha gopayatha, ahitaṃ tesaṃ apanetha, hitaṃ upanetha appamattā hutvā
atk-s0505a:1031_0: 226. Evaṃ devatāsu manussānaṃ upakārakabhāvaṃ dassetvā tesaṃ upaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1031_2: nayena saccavacanaṃ payujjitumāraddho. Tattha yaṃkiñcīti aniyamitavasena anavasesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1031_3: pariyādiyati yaṃkiñci tattha tattha vohārūpagaṃ. Vittanti dhanaṃ. Tañhi vittiṃ janetīti
atk-s0505a:1031_4: vittaṃ. Idha vāti manussalokaṃ niddisati, huraṃ vāti tato paraṃ avasesalokaṃ. Tena
atk-s0505a:1031_5: ca ṭhapetvā manusse sabbalokaggahaṇe patte “saggesu vā”ti parato vuttattā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0505a:1031_6: manusse ca sagge ca avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ imehi dvīhi
atk-s0505a:1031_9: bhavanesu uppannānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ vittaṃ, taṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1032_0: Saggesu vāti kāmāvacararūpāvacaradevalokesu. Te hi sobhanena kammena ajīyanti gammantīti
atk-s0505a:1032_1: saggā, suṭṭhu vā aggātipi saggā. Yanti yaṃ sassāmikaṃ vā assāmikaṃ vā. Ratananti
atk-s0505a:1032_2: ratiṃ nayati, vahati, janayati, vaḍḍhetīti ratanaṃ, yaṃkiñci cittīkataṃ mahagghaṃ
atk-s0505a:1032_3: atulaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ anomasattaparibhogañca, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1035_0: Paṇītanti uttamaṃ, seṭṭhaṃ, atappakaṃ. Evaṃ iminā gāthāpadena yaṃ saggesu anekayojanasatappamāṇasabbaratanamayavimānesu
atk-s0505a:1035_1: sudhammavejayantappabhutīsu sassāmikaṃ, yañca buddhuppādavirahena apāyameva paripūrentesu
atk-s0505a:1035_2: sattesu suññavimānapaṭibaddhaṃ assāmikaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi pathavīmahāsamuddahimavantādinissitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1036_0: Na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenāti na-iti paṭisedhe, no-iti avadhāraṇe. Samanti tulyaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1036_1: Atthīti vijjati. Tathāgatenāti buddhena. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ etaṃ vittañca ratanañca
atk-s0505a:1036_2: pakāsitaṃ, ettha ekampi buddharatanena sadisaṃ ratanaṃ nevatthi. Yampi hi taṃ cittīkataṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:1036_3: ratanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ maṇiratanañca, yamhi uppanne
atk-s0505a:1036_4: mahājano na aññattha cittīkāraṃ karoti, na koci pupphagandhādīni gahetvā yakkhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1036_5: vā bhūtaṭṭhānaṃ vā gacchati, sabbopi jano cakkaratanamaṇiratanameva cittiṃ karoti
atk-s0505a:1036_6: pūjeti, taṃ taṃ varaṃ pattheti, patthitapatthitañcassa ekaccaṃ samijjhati, tampi
atk-s0505a:1036_7: ratanaṃ buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova
atk-s0505a:1036_8: ratanaṃ. Tathāgate hi uppanne ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā, na te aññatra cittīkāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1036_9: karonti, na kañci aññaṃ pūjenti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena
atk-s0505a:1036_10: tathāgataṃ pūjesi, yathābalañca aññe devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājaanāthapiṇḍikādayo.
atk-s0505a:1036_11: Parinibbutampi ca bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā asokamahārājā
atk-s0505a:1036_12: sakalajambudīpe caturāsīti vihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpesi, ko pana vādo aññesaṃ cittīkārānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1036_14: paṭimācetiyādīni vā uddissa evaṃ cittīkāragarukāro vattati yathā bhagavato. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1037_0: Tathā yampi taṃ mahagghaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1037_1: “jiṇṇampi, bhikkhave, kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ vaṇṇavantañceva hoti sukhasamphassañca mahagghañcā”ti,
atk-s0505a:1037_2: tampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi mahagghaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1037_3: Tathāgato hi yesaṃ paṃsukampi paṭiggaṇhāti, tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1037_4: seyyathāpi asokassa rañño. Idamassa mahagghatāya. Evaṃ mahagghatāvacane cettha dosābhāvasādhakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1038_1: tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Idamassa mahagghatāya vadāmi. Seyyathāpi
atk-s0505a:1038_2: taṃ, bhikkhave, kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ mahagghaṃ, tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1040_0: Tathā yampi taṃ atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1040_2: yassa dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ upari ekaṃ muṇḍāraṃ hoti vātaṃ gahetvā saddakaraṇatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1040_3: yena kato saddo sukusalappatāḷitapañcaṅgikatūriyasaddo viya hoti. Yassa nābhiyā ubhosu
atk-s0505a:1040_4: passesu dve sīhamukhāni honti, abbhantaraṃ sakaṭacakkasseva susiraṃ, tassa kattā
atk-s0505a:1040_5: vā kāretā vā natthi, kammapaccayena ututo samuṭṭhāti. Yaṃ rājā dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1040_6: pūretvā tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇamadivase sīsaṃnhāto uposathiko uparipāsādavaragato
atk-s0505a:1040_7: sīlāni sodhento nisinno puṇṇacandaṃ viya sūriyaṃ viya ca uṭṭhentaṃ passati, yassa
atk-s0505a:1040_8: dvādasayojanato saddo suyyati, yojanato vaṇṇo dissati, yaṃ mahājanena “dutiyo maññe
atk-s0505a:1040_9: cando sūriyo vā uṭṭhito”ti ativiya kotūhalajātena dissamānaṃ nagarassa upari āgantvā
atk-s0505a:1040_10: rañño antepurassa pācīnapasse nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ hutvā mahājanassa gandhapupphādīhi
atk-s0505a:1041_0: Tadeva anubandhamānaṃ hatthiratanaṃ uppajjati, sabbaseto rattapādo sattappatiṭṭho
atk-s0505a:1041_1: iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo uposathakulā vā chaddantakulā vā āgacchati. Uposathakulā āgacchanto
atk-s0505a:1041_2: hi sabbajeṭṭho āgacchati, chaddantakulā sabbakaniṭṭho sikkhitasikkho damathūpeto.
atk-s0505a:1041_3: So dvādasayojanaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā purepātarāsameva
atk-s0505a:1042: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ assaratanaṃ uppajjati, sabbaseto rattapādo kākasīso muñjakeso valāhakassa rājakulā āgacchati. Sesamettha hatthiratanasadisameva.
atk-s0505a:1043_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uppajjati. So hoti maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṃso
atk-s0505a:1043_1: suparikammakato āyāmato cakkanābhisadiso, vepullapabbatā āgacchati, so caturaṅgasamannāgatepi
atk-s0505a:1043_2: andhakāre rañño dhajaggato yojanaṃ obhāseti, yassobhāsena manussā “divā”ti maññamānā
atk-s0505a:1043_3: kammante payojenti, antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya passanti.
atk-s0505a:1044_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ itthiratanaṃ uppajjati. Pakatiaggamahesī vā hoti, uttarakuruto
atk-s0505a:1044_1: vā āgacchati maddarājakulato vā, atidīghādichadosavivajjitā atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1044_2: appattā dibbaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, yassā rañño sītakāle uṇhāni gattāni honti, uṇhakāle sītāni,
atk-s0505a:1044_3: satadhā phoṭitatūlapicuno viya samphasso hoti, kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato
atk-s0505a:1045_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ uppajjati rañño pakatikammakaro seṭṭhi, yassa
atk-s0505a:1045_1: cakkaratane uppannamatte dibbaṃ cakkhu pātubhavati, yena samantato yojanamatte nidhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1045_2: passati sassāmikampi assāmikampi. So rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti “appossukko tvaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1045_3: deva, hohi, ahaṃ te dhanena dhanakaraṇīyaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1046_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ uppajjati rañño pakatijeṭṭhaputto, cakkaratane
atk-s0505a:1046_1: uppannamatte atirekapaññāveyyattiyena samannāgato hoti, dvādasayojanāya parisāya
atk-s0505a:1046_2: cetasā cittaṃ parijānitvā niggahapaggahasamattho hoti. So rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti
atk-s0505a:1046_3: – “appossukko tvaṃ, deva, hohi, ahaṃ te rajjaṃ anusāsissāmī”ti. Yaṃ vā panaññampi
atk-s0505a:1046_4: evarūpaṃ atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, yassa na sakkā tulayitvā tīrayitvā aggho kātuṃ “sataṃ
atk-s0505a:1046_5: vā sahassaṃ vā agghati koṭiṃ vā”ti. Tattha ekaratanampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi.
atk-s0505a:1046_6: Yadi hi atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Tathāgato hi na sakkā sīlato vā
atk-s0505a:1046_7: samādhito vā paññādīnaṃ vā aññatarato kenaci tulayitvā tīrayitvā “ettakaguṇo vā iminā
atk-s0505a:1046_8: samo vā sappaṭibhāgo vā”ti paricchindituṃ. Evaṃ atulaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0505a:1047_0: Tathā yampi taṃ dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – dullabhapātubhāvo rājā
atk-s0505a:1047_1: cakkavatti cakkādīni ca tassa ratanāni, tampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi
atk-s0505a:1047_2: dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ, kuto cakkavattiādīnaṃ ratanattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1047_3: yāni ekasmiṃyeva kappe anekāni uppajjanti. Yasmā pana asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe tathāgatasuñño
atk-s0505a:1047_4: loko hoti, tasmā tathāgato eva kadāci karahaci uppajjanato dullabhadassano. Vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1048_0: “Devatā, ānanda, ujjhāyanti – ‘dūrā ca vatamha āgatā tathāgataṃ dassanāya, kadāci
atk-s0505a:1048_1: karahaci tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, ajjeva rattiyā pacchime
atk-s0505a:1048_2: yāme tathāgatassa parinibbānaṃ bhavissati, ayañca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato
atk-s0505a:1048_3: ṭhito ovārento, na mayaṃ labhāma pacchime kāle tathāgataṃ dassanāyā”’ti.
atk-s0505a:1050_0: Tathā yampi taṃ anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa
atk-s0505a:1050_3: na nibbattati. Ubhato sujātassa pana rañño khattiyasseva paripūritadasavidhacakkavattivattassa
atk-s0505a:1050_4: paribhogatthāya nibbattanato anomasattaparibhogaṃyeva hoti, tampi buddharatanena
atk-s0505a:1050_5: samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Tathāgato
atk-s0505a:1050_6: hi loke anomasattasammatānampi anupanissayasampannānaṃ viparītadassanānaṃ pūraṇakassapādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1050_7: channaṃ satthārānaṃ aññesañca evarūpānaṃ supinantepi aparibhogo, upanissayasampannānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1050_8: pana catuppadāyapi gāthāya pariyosāne arahattamadhigantuṃ samatthānaṃ nibbedhikañāṇadassanānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1050_10: Te hi taṃ dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyapāricariyānuttariyādīni sādhentā tathā tathā
atk-s0505a:1050_11: paribhuñjanti. Evaṃ anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0505a:1051_0: Yampi taṃ avisesato ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1051_1: Tañhi disvā rājā cakkavatti attamano hoti, evampi taṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti. Puna caparaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_2: rājā cakkavatti vāmena hatthena suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_3: abbhukkirati “pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratanaṃ, abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti.
atk-s0505a:1051_4: Tato cakkaratanaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ viya tūriyaṃ madhurassaraṃ niccharantaṃ ākāsena puratthimaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_5: disaṃ gacchati, anvadeva rājā cakkavatti cakkānubhāvena dvādasayojanavitthiṇṇāya
atk-s0505a:1051_6: caturaṅginiyā senāya nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ uccarukkhānaṃ heṭṭhābhāgena, nīcarukkhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_7: uparibhāgena, rukkhesu pupphaphalapallavādipaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgatānaṃ hatthato paṇṇākārañca
atk-s0505a:1051_8: gaṇhanto “ehi kho mahārājā”tievamādinā paramanipaccakārena āgate paṭirājāno “pāṇo
atk-s0505a:1051_9: na hantabbo”tiādinā nayena anusāsanto gacchati. Yattha pana rājā bhuñjitukāmo vā
atk-s0505a:1051_10: divāseyyaṃ vā kappetukāmo hoti, tattha cakkaratanaṃ ākāsā otaritvā udakādisabbakiccakkhame
atk-s0505a:1051_11: same bhūmibhāge akkhāhataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Puna rañño gamanacitte uppanne purimanayeneva
atk-s0505a:1051_12: saddaṃ karontaṃ gacchati, yaṃ sutvā dvādasayojanikāpi parisā ākāsena gacchati. Cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_13: anupubbena puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati, tasmiṃ ajjhogāhante udakaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_14: apagantvā bhittīkataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Mahājano yathākāmaṃ satta ratanāni gaṇhāti.
atk-s0505a:1051_15: Puna rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā “ito paṭṭhāya mama rajja”nti udakena abbhukkiritvā
atk-s0505a:1051_16: nivattati. Senā purato hoti, cakkaratanaṃ pacchato, rājā majjhe. Cakkaratanassa osakkitosakkitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1051_17: udakaṃ paripūrati. Eteneva upāyena dakkhiṇapacchimauttarepi samudde gacchati.
atk-s0505a:1052_0: Evaṃ catuddisaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā cakkaratanaṃ tiyojanappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ ārohati. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1052_1: ṭhito rājā cakkaratanānubhāvena vijitaṃ pañcasataparittadīpapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sattayojanasahassaparimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0505a:1052_4: ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ suphullapuṇḍarīkavanaṃ viya oloketi. Evaṃ olokayato cassa anappikā
atk-s0505a:1052_5: rati uppajjati. Evampi taṃ cakkaratanaṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti, tampi buddharatanasamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1052_6: natthi. Yadi hi ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Kiṃ karissati etaṃ
atk-s0505a:1052_7: cakkaratanaṃ? Tathāgato hi yassā dibbāya ratiyā cakkaratanādīhi sabbehipi janitā
atk-s0505a:1052_8: cakkavattirati saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upeti, tatopi ratito uttaritarañca
atk-s0505a:1052_9: paṇītatarañca attano ovādappatikarānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānampi devamanussānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaratiṃ,
atk-s0505a:1052_12: janeti. Evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0505a:1053_0: Apica ratanaṃ nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakañca. Tattha aviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1053_1: cakkaratanaṃ maṇiratanaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi anindriyabaddhaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādi, saviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1053_2: hatthiratanādi pariṇāyakaratanapariyosānaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ indriyabaddhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1053_3: Evaṃ duvidhe cettha saviññāṇakaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1054_0: Saviññāṇakaratanampi duvidhaṃ tiracchānagataratanaṃ, manussaratanañca. Tattha manussaratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1054_1: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanassa opavayhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1054_2: Manussaratanampi duvidhaṃ itthiratanaṃ, purisaratanañca. Tattha purisaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0505a:1054_3: Kasmā? Yasmā itthiratanaṃ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṃ āpajjati. Purisaratanampi
atk-s0505a:1054_4: duvidhaṃ agārikaratanaṃ, anagārikaratanañca. Tattha anagārikaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0505a:1054_5: Kasmā? Yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattīpi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1054_6: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā ca dibbamānusikā sampattiyo
atk-s0505a:1055_0: Evaṃ anagārikaratanampi duvidhaṃ – ariyaputhujjanavasena. Ariyaratanampi duvidhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1055_2: samathayānikaratanampi duvidhaṃ sāvakapāramippattaṃ, appattañca. Tattha sāvakapāramippattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1055_4: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Guṇamahantatāya. Sāriputtamoggallānasadisāpi hi anekasatā
atk-s0505a:1055_5: sāvakā ekassa paccekabuddhassa guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upenti. Paccekabuddharatanatopi
atk-s0505a:1055_6: sammāsambuddharatanaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Guṇamahantatāya. Sakalampi hi jambudīpaṃ
atk-s0505a:1055_7: pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭṭentā nisinnā paccekabuddhā ekassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0505a:1055_8: guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhaṃ na kalaṃ na kalabhāgaṃ upenti. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā – “yāvatā,
atk-s0505a:1055_9: bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi. Evaṃ kenacipi
atk-s0505a:1055_10: pariyāyena tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi. Tenāha bhagavā “na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1056_0: Evaṃ bhagavā buddharatanassa aññehi ratanehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1056_1: uppannaupaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ neva jātiṃ na gottaṃ na kolaputtiyaṃ na vaṇṇapokkharatādiṃ
atk-s0505a:1056_2: nissāya, apica kho avīcimupādāya bhavaggapariyante loke sīlasamādhikkhandhādīhi guṇehi
atk-s0505a:1056_3: buddharatanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1057_0: Tassattho – idampi idha vā huraṃ vā saggesu vā yaṃkiñci atthi vittaṃ vā ratanaṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:1057_1: tena saddhiṃ tehi tehi guṇehi asamattā buddharatanaṃ paṇītaṃ. Yadi etaṃ saccaṃ, etena
atk-s0505a:1057_2: saccena imesaṃ pāṇīnaṃ sotthi hotu, sobhanānaṃ atthitā hotu, arogatā nirupaddavatāti.
atk-s0505a:1057_3: Ettha ca yathā “cakkhuṃ kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”tievamādīsu attabhāvena
atk-s0505a:1057_4: vā attaniyabhāvena vāti attho. Itarathā hi cakkhu attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti appaṭisiddhameva
atk-s0505a:1057_5: siyā. Evaṃ ratanaṃ paṇītanti ratanattaṃ paṇītaṃ, ratanabhāvo paṇītoti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1057_6: Itarathā hi buddho neva ratananti sijjheyya. Na hi yattha ratanaṃ atthi, taṃ ratananti
atk-s0505a:1057_7: sijjhati. Yattha pana cittīkatādiatthasaṅkhātaṃ yena vā tena vā vidhinā sambandhagataṃ
atk-s0505a:1057_8: ratanattaṃ atthi, yasmā taṃ ratanattamupādāya ratananti paññāpīyati, tasmā tassa
atk-s0505a:1057_9: ratanattassa atthitāya ratananti sijjhati. Atha vā idampi buddhe ratananti imināpi
atk-s0505a:1057_10: kāraṇena buddhova ratananti evampettha attho veditabbo. Vuttamattāya ca bhagavatā
atk-s0505a:1057_11: imāya gāthāya rājakulassa sotthi jātā, bhayaṃ vūpasantaṃ. Imissā gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:1058_0: 227. Evaṃ buddhaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni nibbānadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “khayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1058_1: virāga”nti. Tattha yasmā nibbānasacchikiriyāya rāgādayo khīṇā honti parikkhīṇā, yasmā
atk-s0505a:1058_2: vā taṃ tesaṃ anuppādanirodhakkhayamattaṃ, yasmā ca taṃ rāgādiviyuttaṃ sampayogato
atk-s0505a:1058_3: ca ārammaṇato ca, yasmā vā tamhi sacchikate rāgādayo accantaṃ virattā honti vigatā
atk-s0505a:1058_4: viddhastā, tasmā “khaya”nti ca “virāga”nti ca vuccati. Yasmā panassa na uppādo paññāyati,
atk-s0505a:1058_5: na vayo na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ, tasmā taṃ na jāyati na jīyati na mīyatīti katvā
atk-s0505a:1058_6: “amata”nti vuccati, uttamaṭṭhena pana atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇītanti. Yadajjhagāti yaṃ
atk-s0505a:1058_7: ajjhagā vindi, paṭilabhi, attano ñāṇabalena sacchākāsi. Sakyamunīti sakyakulappasutattā
atk-s0505a:1058_8: sakyo, moneyyadhammasamannāgatattā muni, sakyo eva muni sakyamuni. Samāhitoti ariyamaggasamādhinā
atk-s0505a:1058_9: samāhitacitto. Na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcīti tena khayādināmakena sakyamuninā
atk-s0505a:1058_10: adhigatena dhammena samaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ natthi. Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ “yāvatā,
atk-s0505a:1058_11: bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:1059_0: Evaṃ bhagavā nibbānadhammassa aññehi dhammehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1059_2: asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ etena
atk-s0505a:1059_3: saccena suvatthi hotū”ti. Tassattho purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi
atk-s0505a:1060_0: 228. Evaṃ nibbānadhammaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni maggadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho
atk-s0505a:1060_1: “yaṃ buddhaseṭṭho”ti. Tattha “bujjhitā saccānī”tiādinā nayena buddho, uttamo pasaṃsanīyo
atk-s0505a:1060_2: cāti seṭṭho, buddho ca so seṭṭho cāti buddhaseṭṭho. Anubuddhapaccekabuddhasaṅkhātesu
atk-s0505a:1060_3: vā buddhesu seṭṭhoti buddhaseṭṭho. So buddhaseṭṭho yaṃ parivaṇṇayī, “aṭṭhaṅgiko ca
atk-s0505a:1060_4: maggānaṃ, khemaṃ nibbānappattiyā”ti ca “ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi
atk-s0505a:1060_5: saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti ca evamādinā nayena tattha tattha pasaṃsi pakāsayi. Sucinti
atk-s0505a:1060_7: pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phaladānato “ānantarikasamādhī”ti āhu. Na hi maggasamādhiñhi
atk-s0505a:1060_8: uppanne tassa phaluppattinisedhako koci antarāyo atthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1061_0: “Ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā
atk-s0505a:1061_1: assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya, yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0505a:1061_2: ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ṭhitakappī. Sabbepi maggasamaṅgino puggalā ṭhitakappino”ti.
atk-s0505a:1062_0: Samādhinā tena samo na vijjatīti tena buddhaseṭṭhaparivaṇṇitena sucinā ānantarikasamādhinā
atk-s0505a:1062_1: samo rūpāvacarasamādhi vā arūpāvacarasamādhi vā koci na vijjati. Kasmā? Tesaṃ bhāvitattā
atk-s0505a:1062_2: tattha tattha brahmaloke uppannassāpi puna nirayādīsu uppattisambhavato, imassa ca
atk-s0505a:1062_4: suttantarepi vuttaṃ “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1063_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ānantarikasamādhissa aññehi samādhīhi asamataṃ vatvā idāni purimanayeneva
atk-s0505a:1063_1: maggadhammaratanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme…pe…
atk-s0505a:1063_2: hotū”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:1064_0: 229. Evaṃ maggadhammaguṇenāpi saccaṃ vatvā idāni saṅghaguṇenāpi vattumāraddho “ye
atk-s0505a:1064_1: puggalā”ti. Tattha yeti aniyametvā uddeso. Puggalāti sattā. Aṭṭhāti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0505a:1064_2: Te hi cattāro ca paṭipannā cattāro ca phale ṭhitāti aṭṭha honti. Sataṃ pasatthāti
atk-s0505a:1064_3: sappurisehi buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi aññehi ca devamanussehi pasatthā. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:1064_5: viya sahajātasīlasamādhiādayo guṇā. Tena te vaṇṇagandhādisampannāni viya pupphāni
atk-s0505a:1064_6: devamanussānaṃ sataṃ piyā manāpā pasaṃsanīyā ca honti. Tena vuttaṃ “ye puggalā aṭṭhasataṃ pasatthā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1065_0: Atha vā yeti aniyametvā uddeso. Puggalāti sattā. Aṭṭhasatanti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0505a:1065_1: Te hi ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tayo sotāpannā, kāmarūpārūpabhavesu
atk-s0505a:1065_2: adhigatapphalā tayo sakadāgāmino, te sabbepi catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati,
atk-s0505a:1065_4: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti, avihesu pañca, tathā atappasudassasudassīsu. Akaniṭṭhesu
atk-s0505a:1065_5: pana uddhaṃsotavajjā cattāroti catuvīsati anāgāmino, sukkhavipassako samathayānikoti
atk-s0505a:1065_6: dve arahanto, cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa. Te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1065_7: vasena diguṇā hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ honti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:1066_0: Cattāri etāni yugāni hontīti te sabbepi aṭṭha vā aṭṭhasataṃ vāti vitthāravasena uddiṭṭhapuggalā,
atk-s0505a:1066_1: saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ, evaṃ yāva arahattamaggaṭṭho
atk-s0505a:1066_2: phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yuganti cattāri yugāni honti. Te dakkhiṇeyyāti ettha teti pubbe
atk-s0505a:1066_3: aniyametvā uddiṭṭhānaṃ niyametvā niddeso. Ye puggalā vitthāravasena aṭṭha vā aṭṭhasataṃ
atk-s0505a:1066_4: vā, saṅkhepavasena cattāri yugāni hontīti vuttā, sabbepi te dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti
atk-s0505a:1066_5: dakkhiṇeyyā. Dakkhiṇā nāma kammañca kammavipākañca saddahitvā “esa me idaṃ vejjakammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1066_6: vā jaṅghapesanikaṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādīni anapekkhitvā dīyamāno deyyadhammo, taṃ
atk-s0505a:1066_7: arahanti nāma sīlādiguṇayuttā puggalā. Ime ca tādisā, tena vuccanti te “dakkhiṇeyyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1067_0: Sugatassa sāvakāti bhagavā sobhanena gamanena yuttattā, sobhanañca ṭhānaṃ gatattā,
atk-s0505a:1067_1: suṭṭhu ca gatattā suṭṭhu eva ca gadattā sugato, tassa sugatassa. Sabbepi te vacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1067_2: suṇantīti sāvakā. Kāmañca aññepi suṇanti, na pana sutvā kattabbakiccaṃ karonti. Ime
atk-s0505a:1067_3: pana sutvā kattabbaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipattiṃ katvā maggaphalāni pattā, tasmā “sāvakā”ti
atk-s0505a:1067_4: vuccanti. Etesu dinnāni mahapphalānīti etesu sugatasāvakesu appakānipi dānāni dinnāni
atk-s0505a:1067_5: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhibhāvaṃ upagatattā mahapphalāni honti. Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0505a:1068_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, saṅghā vā gaṇā vā, tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati,
atk-s0505a:1068_1: yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
atk-s0505a:1069_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbesampi maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0505a:1069_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0505a:1069_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0505a:1070_0: 230. Evaṃ maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅghaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni tato ekacciyānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1070_2: suppayuttā”ti. Tattha yeti aniyamituddesavacanaṃ. Suppayuttāti suṭṭhu payuttā, anekavihitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1070_3: anesanaṃ pahāya suddhājīvitaṃ nissāya vipassanāya attānaṃ payuñjitumāraddhāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1070_4: Atha vā suppayuttāti parisuddhakāyavacīpayogasamannāgatā. Tena tesaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1070_5: dasseti. Manasā daḷhenāti daḷhena manasā, thirasamādhiyuttena cetasāti attho. Tena
