atk-s0505a:1070_6: tesaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ dasseti. Nikkāminoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā hutvā paññādhurena
atk-s0505a:1070_7: vīriyena sabbakilesehi katanikkamanā. Tena tesaṃ vīriyasampannaṃ paññākkhandhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1071_0: Gotamasāsanamhīti gottato gotamassa tathāgatasseva sāsanamhi. Tena ito bahiddhā nānappakārampi
atk-s0505a:1071_1: amaratapaṃ karontānaṃ suppayogādiguṇābhāvato kilesehi nikkamanābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Teti
atk-s0505a:1071_2: pubbe uddiṭṭhānaṃ niddesavacanaṃ. Pattipattāti ettha pattabbāti patti, pattabbā nāma
atk-s0505a:1071_3: pattuṃ arahā, yaṃ patvā accantayogakkhemino honti, arahattaphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1071_4: taṃ pattiṃ pattāti pattipattā. Amatanti nibbānaṃ. Vigayhāti ārammaṇavasena vigāhitvā.
atk-s0505a:1071_5: Laddhāti labhitvā. Mudhāti abyayena kākaṇikamattampi byayaṃ akatvā. Nibbutinti paṭippassaddhakilesadarathaṃ
atk-s0505a:1071_6: phalasamāpattiṃ. Bhuñjamānāti anubhavamānā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ye imasmiṃ gotamasāsanamhi
atk-s0505a:1071_7: sīlasampannattā suppayuttā, samādhisampannattā manasā daḷhena, paññāsampannattā nikkāmino,
atk-s0505a:1071_8: te imāya sammāpaṭipadāya amataṃ vigayha mudhā laddhā phalasamāpattisaññitaṃ nibbutiṃ
atk-s0505a:1072_0: Evaṃ bhagavā phalasamāpattisukhamanubhavantānaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānaṃyeva vasena saṅgharatanassa
atk-s0505a:1072_1: guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0505a:1072_2: Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:1073_0: 231. Evaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānaṃ guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni bahujanapaccakkhena
atk-s0505a:1073_1: sotāpannasseva guṇena vattumāraddho “yathindakhīlo”ti. Tattha yathāti upamāvacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1073_2: Indakhīloti nagaradvāranivāraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ
atk-s0505a:1073_3: khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāradārumayathambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pathavinti bhūmiṃ. Sitoti
atk-s0505a:1073_4: anto pavisitvā nissito. Siyāti bhaveyya. Catubbhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi āgatavātehi.
atk-s0505a:1073_5: Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tathūpamanti tathāvidhaṃ. Sappurisanti
atk-s0505a:1073_6: uttamapurisaṃ. Vadāmīti bhaṇāmi. Yo ariyasaccāni avecca passatīti yo cattāri ariyasaccāni
atk-s0505a:1073_7: paññāya ajjhogāhetvā passati. Tattha ariyasaccāni visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:1074_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā hi indakhīlo gambhīranematāya pathavissito catubbhi
atk-s0505a:1074_1: vātehi asampakampiyo siyā, imampi sappurisaṃ tathūpamameva vadāmi, yo ariyasaccāni
atk-s0505a:1074_2: avecca passati. Kasmā? Yasmā sopi indakhīlo viya catūhi vātehi sabbatitthiyavādavātehi
atk-s0505a:1074_3: asampakampiyo hoti, tamhā dassanā kenaci kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:1075_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gambhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampī,
atk-s0505a:1075_1: puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya
atk-s0505a:1075_2: na sampacāleyya. Pacchimāya…pe… dakkhiṇāya… uttarāya cepi…pe… na sampacāleyya. Taṃ
atk-s0505a:1075_3: kissa hetu? Gambhīrattā, bhikkhave, nemassa sunikhātattā indakhīlassa. Evameva kho,
atk-s0505a:1075_4: bhikkhave, ye ca kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhanti…pe… paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:1075_5: pajānanti, te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ olokenti ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ
atk-s0505a:1075_6: jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passatī’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sudiṭṭhattā, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccāna”nti.
atk-s0505a:1076_0: Evaṃ bhagavā bahujanapaccakkhassa sotāpannasseva vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0505a:1076_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0505a:1076_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0505a:1077: 232. Evaṃ avisesato sotāpannassa guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye te tayo sotāpannā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1078_0: “Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti…pe… so ekaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:1078_1: bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ekabījī. Tathā dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni
atk-s0505a:1078_2: sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo. Tathā sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0505a:1078_3: devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1079_0: Tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭhassa sattakkhattuparamassa guṇena vattumāraddho “ye ariyasaccānī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1079_1: Tattha ye ariyasaccānīti etaṃ vuttanayameva. Vibhāvayantīti paññāobhāsena saccapaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1079_2: kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti. Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya
atk-s0505a:1079_3: sadevakassapi lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhapaññena, sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1079_4: Sudesitānīti samāsabyāsasākalyavekalyādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0505a:1079_5: te honti bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kiñcāpi devarajjacakkavattirajjādippamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1079_6: āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti, tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-s0505a:1079_7: nirodhā ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1079_8: niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti, sattamabhave eva pana vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1080_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sattakkhattuparamavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1080_1: nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1080_2: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0505a:1081_0: 233. Evaṃ sattakkhattuparamassa aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ anādiyanaguṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1081_1: saccaṃ vatvā idāni tasseva satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi
atk-s0505a:1081_2: visiṭṭhena guṇena vattumāraddho “sahāvassā”ti. Tattha sahāvāti saddhiṃyeva. Assāti
atk-s0505a:1081_3: “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti vuttesu aññatarassa. Dassanasampadāyāti sotāpattimaggasampattiyā.
atk-s0505a:1081_4: Sotāpattimaggo hi nibbānaṃ disvā kattabbakiccasampadāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato
atk-s0505a:1081_5: “dassana”nti vuccati. Tassa attani pātubhāvo dassanasampadā, tāya dassanasampadāya
atk-s0505a:1081_6: saha eva. Tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavantīti ettha suiti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. “Idaṃsu
atk-s0505a:1081_7: me, sāriputta, mahāvikaṭabhojanasmiṃ hotī”tievamādīsu viya. Yato sahāvassa dassanasampadāya
atk-s0505a:1081_8: tayo dhammā jahitā bhavanti pahīnā bhavantīti ayamevettha attho.
atk-s0505a:1082_0: Idāni jahitadhammadassanatthaṃ āha “sakkāyadiṭṭhī vicikicchitañca, sīlabbataṃ vāpi
atk-s0505a:1082_1: yadatthi kiñcī”ti. Tattha sati kāye vijjamāne upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye
atk-s0505a:1082_2: vīsativatthukā diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, satī vā tattha kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0505a:1082_3: yathāvuttappakāre kāye vijjamānā diṭṭhīti attho. Satiyeva vā kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0505a:1082_4: yathāvuttappakāre kāye vijjamāne rūpādisaṅkhāto attāti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhīti attho.
atk-s0505a:1082_5: Tassā ca pahīnattā sabbadiṭṭhigatāni pahīnāniyeva honti. Sā hi nesaṃ mūlaṃ. Sabbakilesabyādhivūpasamanato
atk-s0505a:1082_6: paññā “cikicchita”nti vuccati, taṃ paññācikicchitaṃ ito vigataṃ, tato vā paññācikicchitā
atk-s0505a:1082_7: idaṃ vigatanti vicikicchitaṃ, “satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya
atk-s0505a:1082_8: vimatiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tassā pahīnattā sabbavicikicchitāni pahīnāni honti. Tañhi
atk-s0505a:1082_9: nesaṃ mūlaṃ. “Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”tievamādīsu
atk-s0505a:1082_11: vuccati. Tassa pahīnattā sabbampi naggiyamuṇḍikādi amaratapaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti. Tañhi
atk-s0505a:1082_12: tassa mūlaṃ. Tena sabbāvasāne vuttaṃ “yadatthi kiñcī”ti. Dukkhadassanasampadāya cettha
atk-s0505a:1083_0: 234. Evamassa kilesavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃ kilesavaṭṭe sati yena vipākavaṭṭena
atk-s0505a:1083_1: bhavitabbaṃ, tappahānā tassāpi pahānaṃ dīpento āha “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto”ti.
atk-s0505a:1083_2: Tattha cattāro apāyā nāma nirayatiracchānapettivisayaasurakāyā, tehi esa satta bhave
atk-s0505a:1084_0: Evamassa vipākavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni yaṃ imassa vipākavaṭṭassa mūlabhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:1084_1: kammavaṭṭaṃ, tassāpi pahānaṃ dassento āha “chaccābhiṭhānāni abhabba kātu”nti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1084_2: abhiṭhānānīti oḷārikaṭṭhānāni, tāni esa cha abhabbo kātuṃ. Tāni ca “aṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1084_3: bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:1084_5: veditabbāni. Tāni hi kiñcāpi diṭṭhisampanno ariyasāvako kunthakipillikampi jīvitā
atk-s0505a:1084_6: na voropeti, apica kho pana puthujjanabhāvassa vigarahaṇatthaṃ vuttāni. Puthujjano
atk-s0505a:1084_7: hi adiṭṭhisampannattā evaṃmahāsāvajjāni abhiṭhānānipi karoti, dassanasampanno pana
atk-s0505a:1084_8: abhabbo tāni kātunti. Abhabbaggahaṇañcettha bhavantarepi akaraṇadassanatthaṃ. Bhavantarepi
atk-s0505a:1084_9: hi esa attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantopi dhammatāya eva etāni vā cha, pakatipāṇātipātādīni
atk-s0505a:1084_10: vā pañca verāni aññasatthāruddesena saha cha ṭhānāni na karoti, yāni sandhāya ekacce
atk-s0505a:1085_0: Evaṃ bhagavā satta bhave ādiyatopi ariyasāvakassa aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi
atk-s0505a:1085_1: visiṭṭhaguṇavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1085_2: payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya
atk-s0505a:1086_0: 235. Evaṃ satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhaguṇavasena
atk-s0505a:1086_1: saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni “na kevalaṃ dassanasampanno cha abhiṭhānāni abhabbo
atk-s0505a:1086_2: kātuṃ, kiṃ pana appamattakampi pāpaṃ kammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādanāyapi abhabbo”ti
atk-s0505a:1087_0: Tassattho – so dassanasampanno kiñcāpi satisammosena pamādavihāraṃ āgamma yaṃ taṃ
atk-s0505a:1087_1: bhagavatā lokavajjasañciccānatikkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0505a:1087_2: paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kuṭikārasahaseyyādiṃ
atk-s0505a:1087_3: vā paṇṇattivajjavītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ kāyena pāpakammaṃ karoti, padasodhammauttarichappañcavācādhammadesanāsamphappalāpapharusavacanādiṃ
atk-s0505a:1087_4: vā vācāya, uda cetasā vā katthaci lobhadosuppādanajātarūpādisādiyanaṃ cīvarādiparibhogesu
atk-s0505a:1087_5: apaccavekkhaṇādiṃ vā pāpakammaṃ karoti. Abhabbo so tassa paṭicchadāya, na so taṃ
atk-s0505a:1087_6: “idaṃ akappiyamakaraṇīya”nti jānitvā muhuttampi paṭicchādeti, taṅkhaṇaññeva pana
atk-s0505a:1087_7: satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu āvi katvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, “na puna
atk-s0505a:1087_8: karissāmī”ti evaṃ saṃvaritabbaṃ vā saṃvarati. Kasmā? Yasmā abhabbatā diṭṭhapadassa
atk-s0505a:1087_9: vuttā, evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādāya diṭṭhanibbānapadassa dassanasampannassa
atk-s0505a:1089_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako hatthena vā pādena vā aṅgāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1089_1: akkamitvā khippameva paṭisaṃharati, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ghammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa
atk-s0505a:1089_2: puggalassa, kiñcāpi tathārūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, yathārūpāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0505a:1089_3: atha kho naṃ khippameva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti,
atk-s0505a:1089_4: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1090_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pamādavihārinopi dassanasampannassa katapaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena saṅgharatanassa
atk-s0505a:1090_1: guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0505a:1090_2: Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:1091_0: 236. Evaṃ saṅghapariyāpannānaṃ puggalānaṃ tena tena guṇappakārena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1091_1: saccaṃ vatvā idāni yvāyaṃ bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ dīpentena idha saṅkhepena aññatra
atk-s0505a:1091_2: ca vitthārena pariyattidhammo desito, tampi nissāya puna buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ
atk-s0505a:1091_4: rukkhānaṃ samūho vanaṃ, mūlasārapheggutacasākhāpalāsehi pavuḍḍho gumbo pagumbo, vane
atk-s0505a:1091_5: pagumbo vanappagumbo, svāyaṃ “vanappagumbe”ti vutto. Evampi hi vattuṃ labbhati “atthi
atk-s0505a:1091_6: savitakkasavicāre, atthi avitakkavicāramatte, sukhe dukkhe jīve”tiādīsu viya. Yathāti
atk-s0505a:1091_7: opammavacanaṃ. Phussitāni aggāni assāti phussitaggo, sabbasākhāpasākhāsu sañjātapupphoti
atk-s0505a:1091_8: attho. So pubbe vuttanayeneva “phussitagge”ti vutto. Gimhāna māse paṭhamasmiṃ gimheti
atk-s0505a:1091_9: ye cattāro gimhamāsā, tesaṃ catunnaṃ gimhānaṃ ekasmiṃ māse. Katamasmiṃ māse iti ce?
atk-s0505a:1091_10: Paṭhamasmiṃ gimhe, citramāseti attho. So hi “paṭhamagimho”ti ca “bālavasanto”ti ca
atk-s0505a:1092_0: Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – yathā paṭhamagimhanāmake bālavasante nānāvidharukkhagahane
atk-s0505a:1092_1: vane supupphitaggasākho taruṇarukkhagacchapariyāyanāmo pagumbo ativiya sassiriko
atk-s0505a:1092_3: vā nānappakārehi atthappabhedapupphehi ativiya sassirikattā tathūpamaṃ nibbānagāmimaggadīpanato
atk-s0505a:1092_4: nibbānagāmiṃ pariyattidhammavaraṃ neva lābhahetu na sakkārādihetu, kevalañhi mahākaruṇāya
atk-s0505a:1092_5: abbhussāhitahadayo sattānaṃ paramaṃhitāya adesayīti. Paramaṃhitāyāti ettha ca gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1093_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ supupphitaggavanappagumbasadisaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vatvā idāni tameva
atk-s0505a:1093_1: nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0505a:1093_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo, kevalaṃ pana idampi yathāvuttappakārapariyattidhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:1093_3: buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti yojetabbaṃ. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:1094_0: 237. Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammena buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni lokuttaradhammena
atk-s0505a:1094_1: vattumāraddho “varo varaññū”ti. Tattha varoti paṇītādhimuttikehi icchito “aho vata
atk-s0505a:1094_2: mayampi evarūpā assāmā”ti, varaguṇayogato vā varo, uttamo seṭṭhoti attho. Varaññūti
atk-s0505a:1094_3: nibbānaññū. Nibbānañhi sabbadhammānaṃ uttamaṭṭhena varaṃ, tañcesa bodhimūle sayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1094_4: paṭivijjhitvā aññāsi. Varadoti pañcavaggiyabhaddavaggiyajaṭilādīnaṃ aññesañca devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1094_6: varāharoti vuccati. So hi bhagavā dīpaṅkarato pabhuti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūrento
atk-s0505a:1094_7: pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṃ purāṇaṃ maggavaraṃ āhari, tena varāharoti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1094_8: Apica sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhena varo, nibbānasacchikiriyāya varaññū, sattānaṃ vimuttisukhadānena
atk-s0505a:1094_9: varado, uttamapaṭipadāharaṇena varāharo, etehi lokuttaraguṇehi adhikassa kassaci abhāvato anuttaro.
atk-s0505a:1095_0: Aparo nayo – varo upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varaññū paññādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena,
atk-s0505a:1095_1: varado cāgādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varāharo saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varaṃ maggasaccamāharīti.
atk-s0505a:1095_2: Tathā varo puññussayena, varaññū paññussayena, varado buddhabhāvatthikānaṃ tadupāyasampadānena,
atk-s0505a:1095_3: varāharo paccekabuddhabhāvatthikānaṃ tadupāyāharaṇena, anuttaro tattha tattha asadisatāya,
atk-s0505a:1095_4: attanā vā anācariyako hutvā paresaṃ ācariyabhāvena, dhammavaraṃ adesayi sāvakabhāvatthikānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1095_5: tadatthāya svākhātatādiguṇayuttassa varadhammassa desanato. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0505a:1096_0: Evaṃ bhagavā navavidhena lokuttaradhammena attano guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1096_1: nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0505a:1096_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana yaṃ varaṃ navalokuttaradhammaṃ esa aññāsi,
atk-s0505a:1096_3: yañca adāsi, yañca āhari, yañca adesayi, idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1096_4: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0505a:1097_0: 238. Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammaṃ lokuttaradhammañca nissāya dvīhi gāthāhi buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1097_1: saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye taṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ sutānusārena ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi
atk-s0505a:1097_2: lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānappattiguṇaṃ nissāya puna saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1097_3: saccaṃ vattumāraddho “khīṇaṃ purāṇa”nti. Tattha khīṇanti samucchinnaṃ. Purāṇanti
atk-s0505a:1097_4: purātanaṃ. Navanti sampati vattamānaṃ. Natthisambhavanti avijjamānapātubhāvaṃ. Virattacittāti
atk-s0505a:1097_5: vigatarāgacittā. Āyatike bhavasminti anāgatamaddhānaṃ punabbhave. Teti yesaṃ khīṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1097_6: purāṇaṃ navaṃ natthisambhavaṃ, ye ca āyatike bhavasmiṃ virattacittā, te khīṇāsavā
atk-s0505a:1097_7: bhikkhū. Khīṇabījāti ucchinnabījā. Avirūḷhichandāti virūḷhichandavirahitā. Nibbantīti
atk-s0505a:1097_8: vijjhāyanti. Dhīrāti dhitisampannā. Yathāyaṃ padīpoti ayaṃ padīpo viya.
atk-s0505a:1098_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ taṃ sattānaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhampi purāṇaṃ atītakālikaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1098_1: taṇhāsinehassa appahīnattā paṭisandhiāharaṇasamatthatāya akhīṇaṃyeva hoti, taṃ purāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1098_2: kammaṃ yesaṃ arahattamaggena taṇhāsinehassa sositattā agginā daḍḍhabījamiva āyatiṃ
atk-s0505a:1098_3: vipākadānāsamatthatāya khīṇaṃ. Yañca nesaṃ buddhapūjādivasena idāni pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1098_4: kammaṃ navanti vuccati, tañca taṇhāpahāneneva chinnamūlapādapapupphamiva āyatiṃ phaladānāsamatthatāya
atk-s0505a:1098_5: yesaṃ natthisambhavaṃ, ye ca taṇhāpahāneneva āyatike bhavasmiṃ virattacittā, te khīṇāsavā
atk-s0505a:1098_6: bhikkhū “kammaṃ khettaṃ viññāṇaṃ bīja”nti ettha vuttassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa kammakkhayeneva
atk-s0505a:1098_7: khīṇattā khīṇabījā. Yopi pubbe punabbhavasaṅkhātāya virūḷhiyā chando ahosi, tassāpi
atk-s0505a:1098_8: samudayappahāneneva pahīnattā pubbe viya cutikāle asambhavena avirūḷhichandā dhitisampannattā
atk-s0505a:1098_9: dhīrā carimaviññāṇanirodhena yathāyaṃ padīpo nibbuto, evaṃ nibbanti, puna “rūpino
atk-s0505a:1098_10: vā arūpino vā”ti evamādiṃ paññattipathaṃ accentīti. Tasmiṃ kira samaye nagaradevatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1098_11: pūjanatthāya jālitesu padīpesu eko padīpo vijjhāyi, taṃ dassento āha – “yathāyaṃ padīpo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1099_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ye taṃ purimāhi dvīhi gāthāhi vuttaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ, sutānusāreneva
atk-s0505a:1099_1: paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānappattiguṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1099_2: vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjanto desanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1099_3: samāpesi “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo, kevalaṃ pana
atk-s0505a:1099_4: idampi yathāvuttena pakārena khīṇāsavabhikkhūnaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅghe ratanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1099_5: paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0505a:1100: Desanāpariyosāne rājakulassa sotthi ahosi, sabbūpaddavā vūpasamiṃsu caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1101_0: 239-241. Atha sakko devānamindo “bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1101_1: payuñjamānena nāgarassa sotthi katā, mayāpi nāgarassa sotthitthaṃ ratanattayaguṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1101_2: nissāya kiñci vattabba”nti cintetvā avasāne gāthāttayaṃ abhāsi “yānīdha bhūtānī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1101_3: Tattha yasmā buddho yathā lokahitatthāya ussukkaṃ āpannehi āgantabbaṃ, tathā āgatato,
atk-s0505a:1101_4: yathā ca etehi gantabbaṃ, tathā gatato, yathā vā etehi ājānitabbaṃ, tathā ājānanato,
atk-s0505a:1101_5: yathā ca jānitabbaṃ, tathā jānanato, yañca tatheva hoti, tassa gadanato ca “tathāgato”ti
atk-s0505a:1101_6: vuccati. Yasmā ca so devamanussehi pupphagandhādinā bahinibbattena upakaraṇena, dhammānudhammappaṭipattādinā
atk-s0505a:1101_7: ca attani nibbattena ativiya pūjito, tasmā sakko devānamindo sabbadevaparisaṃ attanā
atk-s0505a:1101_8: saddhiṃ sampiṇḍetvā āha “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, buddhaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”ti.
atk-s0505a:1102_0: Yasmā pana dhamme maggadhammo yathā yuganandha samathavipassanābalena gantabbaṃ kilesapakkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1102_1: samucchindantena, tathā gatoti tathāgato. Nibbānadhammopi yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho
atk-s0505a:1102_2: sabbadukkhavighātāya sampajjati, buddhādīhi tathā avagato, tasmā “tathāgato”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1102_3: Yasmā ca saṅghopi yathā attahitāya paṭipannehi gantabbaṃ tena tena maggena, tathā
atk-s0505a:1102_4: gato, tasmā “tathāgato” tveva vuccati. Tasmā avasesagāthādvayepi tathāgataṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1102_5: namassāma suvatthi hotu, tathāgataṃ saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotūti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0505a:1103_0: Evaṃ sakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthāttayaṃ bhāsitvā bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā devapurameva
atk-s0505a:1103_1: gato saddhiṃ devaparisāya. Bhagavā pana tadeva ratanasuttaṃ dutiyadivasepi desesi,
atk-s0505a:1103_2: puna caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Evaṃ bhagavā yāva sattamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1103_3: divasaṃ desesi, divase divase tatheva dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Bhagavā aḍḍhamāsameva
atk-s0505a:1103_4: vesāliyaṃ viharitvā rājūnaṃ “gacchāmā”ti paṭivedesi. Tato rājāno diguṇena sakkārena
atk-s0505a:1103_5: puna tīhi divasehi bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ nayiṃsu. Gaṅgāyaṃ nibbattā nāgarājāno cintesuṃ
atk-s0505a:1103_6: – “manussā tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā
atk-s0505a:1103_7: nāvāyo māpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimaye eva pallaṅke paññāpetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1103_8: udakaṃ karitvā “amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti bhagavantaṃ upagatā. Bhagavā adhivāsetvā
atk-s0505a:1103_9: ratananāvamārūḷho pañca ca bhikkhusatāni sakaṃ sakaṃ nāvaṃ. Nāgarājāno bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1103_10: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nāgabhavanaṃ pavesesuṃ. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sabbarattiṃ nāgaparisāya
atk-s0505a:1103_11: dhammaṃ desesi. Dutiyadivase dibbehi khādanīyabhojanīyehi mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. Bhagavā
atk-s0505a:1104_0: Bhūmaṭṭhā devā “manussā ca nāgā ca tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti
atk-s0505a:1104_1: cintetvā vanagumbarukkhapabbatādīsu chattātichattāni ukkhipiṃsu. Eteneva upāyena
atk-s0505a:1104_2: yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmabhavanaṃ, tāva mahāsakkāraviseso nibbatti. Bimbisāropi licchavīhi
atk-s0505a:1104_3: āgatakāle katasakkārato diguṇamakāsi, pubbe vuttanayeneva pañcahi divasehi bhagavantaṃ rājagahaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0505a:1105_0: Rājagahamanuppatte bhagavati pacchābhattaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1105_1: ayamantarakathā udapādi – “aho buddhassa bhagavato ānubhāvo, yaṃ uddissa gaṅgāya
atk-s0505a:1105_2: orato ca pārato ca aṭṭhayojano bhūmibhāgo ninnañca thalañca samaṃ katvā vālukāya
atk-s0505a:1105_3: okiritvā pupphehi sañchanno, yojanappamāṇaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ nānāvaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1105_4: yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā chattātichattāni ussitānī”ti. Bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭito
atk-s0505a:1105_5: nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā maṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0505a:1105_6: nisīdi. Nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0505a:1105_7: sannisinnā”ti? Bhikkhū sabbaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā etadavoca – “na, bhikkhave, ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1105_8: pūjāviseso mayhaṃ buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena, apica kho
atk-s0505a:1105_9: pubbe appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena nibbatto”ti. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “na mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:1105_10: taṃ appamattakaṃ pariccāgaṃ jānāma, sādhu no bhagavā tathā kathetu, yathā mayaṃ taṃ jāneyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1106_0: Bhagavā āha – bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, takkasilāyaṃ saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi. Tassa
atk-s0505a:1106_1: putto susīmo nāma māṇavo soḷasavassuddesiko vayena, so ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0505a:1106_2: abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ pitā āha – “kiṃ, tāta susīmā”ti? So āha – “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1106_3: tāta, bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetu”nti. “Tena hi, tāta susīma, asuko nāma brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:1106_4: mama sahāyako, tassa santikaṃ gantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti kahāpaṇasahassaṃ adāsi. So taṃ
atk-s0505a:1106_5: gahetvā mātāpitaro abhivādetvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā upacārayuttena vidhinā
atk-s0505a:1106_6: ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā attānaṃ nivedesi. Ācariyo “mama sahāyakassa putto”ti
atk-s0505a:1106_7: māṇavaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ pāhuneyyamakāsi. So addhānakilamathaṃ paṭivinodetvā
atk-s0505a:1106_8: taṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ ācariyassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā sippaṃ uggahetuṃ okāsaṃ yāci. Ācariyo
atk-s0505a:1107_0: So lahuñca gaṇhanto bahuñca gaṇhanto gahitagahitañca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittamiva
atk-s0505a:1107_1: sīhatelaṃ avinassamānaṃ dhārento dvādasavassikaṃ sippaṃ katipayamāseneva pariyosāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1107_2: So sajjhāyaṃ karonto ādimajjhaṃyeva passati, no pariyosānaṃ. Atha ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0505a:1107_3: āha – “imassa sippassa ādimajjhameva passāmi, pariyosānaṃ na passāmī”ti. Ācariyo
atk-s0505a:1107_4: āha – “ahampi, tāta, evamevā”ti. “Atha ko, ācariya, imassa sippassa pariyosānaṃ jānātī”ti?
atk-s0505a:1107_5: “Isipatane, tāta, isayo atthi, te jāneyyu”nti. Te upasaṅkamitvā “pucchāmi, ācariyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1107_6: “Puccha, tāta, yathāsukha”nti. So isipatanaṃ gantvā paccekabuddhe upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0505a:1107_8: “Tena, hāvuso, pabbajāhi, na sakkā apabbajitena sikkhitu”nti. “Sādhu, bhante, pabbājetha
atk-s0505a:1107_9: vā maṃ, yaṃ vā icchatha, taṃ katvā pariyosānaṃ jānāpethā”ti. Te taṃ pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0505a:1107_10: niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ, evaṃ pārupitabba”ntiādinā nayena ābhisamācārikaṃ
atk-s0505a:1107_11: sikkhāpesuṃ. So tattha sikkhanto upanissayasampannattā na cireneva paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1107_13: sampannaparivāro. So appāyukasaṃvattanikassa kammassa katattā na cireneva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0505a:1107_14: Tassa paccekabuddhā ca mahājanakāyo ca sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuto gahetvā nagaradvāre
atk-s0505a:1108_0: Atha kho saṅkho brāhmaṇo “putto me ciragato, na cassa pavattiṃ jānāmī”ti puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0505a:1108_1: takkasilāya nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā mahājanakāyaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:1108_2: “addhā bahūsu ekopi me puttassa pavattiṃ jānissatī”ti cintento upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0505a:1108_3: – “susīmo nāma māṇavo idha āgato atthi, api nu tassa pavattiṃ jānāthā”ti? Te “āma,
atk-s0505a:1108_4: brāhmaṇa, jānāma, asmiṃ nagare brāhmaṇassa santike tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1108_5: santike pabbajitvā paccekabuddho hutvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0505a:1108_6: ayamassa thūpo patiṭṭhāpito”ti āhaṃsu. So bhūmiṃ hatthena paharitvā, roditvā ca paridevitvā
atk-s0505a:1108_7: ca taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā tiṇāni uddharitvā uttarasāṭakena vālukaṃ ānetvā, paccekabuddhacetiyaṅgaṇe
atk-s0505a:1108_8: ākiritvā, kamaṇḍaluto udakena samantato bhūmiṃ paripphositvā vanapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:1108_9: uttarasāṭakena paṭākaṃ āropetvā thūpassa upari attano chattaṃ bandhitvā pakkāmīti.
atk-s0505a:1109_0: Evaṃ atītaṃ dassetvā taṃ jātakaṃ paccuppannena anusandhento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0505a:1109_1: kathesi – “siyā kho pana vo, bhikkhave, evamassa añño nūna tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:1109_2: ahosī”ti, na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ahaṃ tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ,
atk-s0505a:1109_3: mayā susīmassa paccekabuddhassa cetiyaṅgaṇe tiṇāni uddhaṭāni, tassa me kammassa nissandena
atk-s0505a:1109_4: aṭṭhayojanamaggaṃ vigatakhāṇukaṇṭakaṃ katvā samaṃ suddhamakaṃsu, mayā tattha vālukā
atk-s0505a:1109_5: okiṇṇā, tassa me nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge vālukaṃ okiriṃsu. Mayā tattha vanakusumehi
atk-s0505a:1109_6: pūjā katā, tassa me nissandena navayojanamagge thale ca udake ca nānāpupphehi pupphasantharaṃ
atk-s0505a:1109_7: akaṃsu. Mayā tattha kamaṇḍaludakena bhūmi paripphositā, tassa me nissandena vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1109_8: pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Mayā tasmiṃ cetiye paṭākā āropitā, chattañca baddhaṃ, tassa
atk-s0505a:1109_9: me nissandena yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā paṭākā ca āropitā, chattātichattāni ca ussitāni.
atk-s0505a:1109_10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, ayaṃ mayhaṃ pūjāviseso neva buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena,
atk-s0505a:1109_11: apica kho appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena nibbatto”ti. Dhammakathāpariyosāne imaṃ gāthamabhāsi –
atk-s0505a:1111: Caje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0505a:1115_0: Sāmākaciṅgūlakacīnakāni cāti āmagandhasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Anuppanne bhagavati āmagandho
atk-s0505a:1115_1: nāma brāhmaṇo pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1115_2: pavisitvā pabbatantare assamaṃ kārāpetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro hutvā tattha paṭivasati,
atk-s0505a:1115_3: na kadāci macchamaṃsaṃ khādati. Atha tesaṃ tāpasānaṃ loṇambilādīni aparibhuñjantānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1115_4: paṇḍurogo uppajji. Tato te “loṇambilādisevanatthāya manussapathaṃ gacchāmā”ti paccantagāmaṃ
atk-s0505a:1115_5: sampattā. Tattha manussā tesu pasīditvā nimantetvā bhojesuṃ, katabhattakiccānaṃ nesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1115_7: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā pakkamiṃsu. Dutiyadivasepi nesaṃ dānaṃ datvā puna gharapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0505a:1115_8: ekekadivasaṃ dānamadaṃsu. Tāpasā catumāsaṃ tattha vasitvā loṇambilādisevanāya thirabhāvappattasarīrā
atk-s0505a:1115_9: hutvā “mayaṃ, āvuso, gacchāmā”ti manussānaṃ ārocesuṃ. Manussā tesaṃ telataṇḍulādīni
atk-s0505a:1115_10: adaṃsu. Te tāni ādāya attano assamameva agamaṃsu. Tañca gāmaṃ tatheva saṃvacchare
atk-s0505a:1115_11: saṃvacchare āgamiṃsu. Manussāpi tesaṃ āgamanakālaṃ viditvā dānatthāya taṇḍulādīni
atk-s0505a:1115_12: sajjetvāva acchanti, āgate ca ne tatheva sammānenti.
atk-s0505a:1116_0: Atha bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā
atk-s0505a:1116_1: tattha viharanto tesaṃ tāpasānaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tato nikkhamma bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0505a:1116_2: cārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ anuppatto. Manussā bhagavantaṃ disvā mahādānāni
atk-s0505a:1116_3: adaṃsu. Bhagavā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Te tāya dhammadesanāya appekacce sotāpannā,
atk-s0505a:1116_4: ekacce sakadāgāmino, ekacce anāgāmino ahesuṃ, ekacce pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1116_5: Bhagavā punadeva sāvatthiṃ paccāgamāsi. Atha te tāpasā taṃ gāmaṃ āgamiṃsu. Manussā
atk-s0505a:1116_6: tāpase disvā na pubbasadisaṃ kotūhalamakaṃsu. Tāpasā taṃ pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:1116_7: ime manussā na pubbasadisā, kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ gāmo rājadaṇḍena upadduto, udāhu dubbhikkhena,
atk-s0505a:1116_8: udāhu amhehi sīlādiguṇehi sampannataro koci pabbajito imaṃ gāmamanuppatto”ti? Te
atk-s0505a:1116_9: āhaṃsu – “na, bhante, rājadaṇḍena, na dubbhikkhenāyaṃ gāmo upadduto, apica buddho
atk-s0505a:1116_10: loke uppanno, so bhagavā bahujanahitāya dhammaṃ desento idhāgato”ti.
atk-s0505a:1117_0: Taṃ sutvā āmagandhatāpaso “buddhoti, gahapatayo, vadethā”ti? “Buddhoti, bhante, vadāmā”ti
atk-s0505a:1117_1: tikkhattuṃ vatvā “ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmiṃ, yadidaṃ buddho”ti attamano attamanavācaṃ
atk-s0505a:1117_2: nicchāretvā pucchi – “kiṃ nu kho so buddho āmagandhaṃ bhuñjati, na bhuñjatī”ti? “Ko,
atk-s0505a:1117_3: bhante, āmagandho”ti? “Āmagandho nāma macchamaṃsaṃ, gahapatayo”ti. “Bhagavā, bhante,
atk-s0505a:1117_4: macchamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjatī”ti. Taṃ sutvā tāpaso vippaṭisārī ahosi – “māheva kho pana
atk-s0505a:1117_5: buddho siyā”ti. Puna cintesi – “buddhānaṃ pātubhāvo nāma dullabho, gantvā buddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1117_6: disvā pucchitvā jānissāmī”ti. Tato yena bhagavā gato, taṃ maggaṃ manusse pucchitvā
atk-s0505a:1117_7: vacchagiddhinī gāvī viya turitaturito sabbattha ekarattivāsena sāvatthiṃ anuppatvā
atk-s0505a:1117_8: jetavanameva pāvisi saddhiṃ sakāya parisāya. Bhagavāpi tasmiṃ samaye dhammadesanatthāya
atk-s0505a:1117_9: āsane nisinno eva hoti. Tāpasā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma tuṇhībhūtā anabhivādetvāva
atk-s0505a:1117_10: ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Bhagavā “kacci vo isayo khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1117_11: paṭisammodi. Tepi “khamanīyaṃ, bho gotamā”tiādimāhaṃsu. Tato āmagandho bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1117_12: pucchi – “āmagandhaṃ, bho gotama, bhuñjasi, na bhuñjasī”ti? “Ko so, brāhmaṇa, āmagandho
atk-s0505a:1117_13: nāmā”ti? “Macchamaṃsaṃ, bho gotamā”ti. Bhagavā “na, brāhmaṇa, macchamaṃsaṃ āmagandho.
atk-s0505a:1117_14: Apica kho āmagandho nāma sabbe kilesā pāpakā akusalā dhammā”ti vatvā “na, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0505a:1117_15: idāni tvameva āmagandhaṃ pucchi, atītepi tisso nāma brāhmaṇo kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1117_16: pucchi. Evañca so pucchi, evañcassa bhagavā byākāsī”ti tissena ca brāhmaṇena kassapena
atk-s0505a:1117_17: ca bhagavatā vuttagāthāyo eva ānetvā tāhi gāthāhi brāhmaṇaṃ saññāpento āha – “sāmākaciṅgūlakacīnakāni
atk-s0505a:1117_18: cā”ti. Ayaṃ tāva imassa suttassa idha uppatti.
atk-s0505a:1118_0: Atīte pana kassapo kira bodhisatto aṭṭhāsaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo
atk-s0505a:1118_1: pūretvā bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattassa brāhmaṇassa dhanavatī nāma brāhmaṇī, tassā kucchimhi
atk-s0505a:1118_2: paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Aggasāvakopi taṃ divasaṃyeva devalokā cavitvā anupurohitabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:1118_3: pajāpatiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. Evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivasameva paṭisandhiggahaṇañca gabbhavuṭṭhānañca
atk-s0505a:1118_4: ahosi, ekadivasameva etesaṃ ekassa kassapo, ekassa tissoti nāmamakaṃsu. Te sahapaṃsukīḷanakā
atk-s0505a:1118_5: dve sahāyā anupubbena vuḍḍhiṃ agamiṃsu. Tissassa pitā puttaṃ āṇāpesi – “ayaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0505a:1118_6: kassapo nikkhamma pabbajitvā buddho bhavissati, tvampissa santike pabbajitvā bhavanissaraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1118_7: kareyyāsī”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “ubhopi, samma,
atk-s0505a:1118_8: pabbajissāmā”ti āha. Bodhisatto “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇi. Tato vuḍḍhiṃ anuppattakālepi
atk-s0505a:1118_9: tisso bodhisattaṃ āha – “ehi, samma, pabbajissāmā”ti bodhisatto na nikkhami. Tisso
atk-s0505a:1118_10: “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti sayaṃ nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe
atk-s0505a:1118_11: pabbatapāde assamaṃ kārāpetvā vasati. Bodhisattopi aparena samayena ghare ṭhitoyeva
atk-s0505a:1118_12: ānāpānassatiṃ pariggahetvā cattāri jhānāni abhiññāyo ca uppādetvā pāsādena bodhimaṇḍasamīpaṃ
atk-s0505a:1118_13: gantvā “puna pāsādo yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhātū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi, so sakaṭṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1118_14: Apabbajitena kira bodhimaṇḍaṃ upagantuṃ na sakkāti. So pabbajitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ patvā
atk-s0505a:1118_15: nisīditvā satta divase padhānayogaṃ katvā sattahi divasehi sammāsambodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1119_0: Tadā isipatane vīsatisahassā pabbajitā paṭivasanti. Atha kassapo bhagavā te āmantetvā
atk-s0505a:1119_1: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Suttapariyosāne sabbeva arahanto ahesuṃ. So sudaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0505a:1119_2: vīsatibhikkhusahassaparivuto tattheva isipatane vasati. Kikī ca naṃ kāsirājā catūhi
atk-s0505a:1119_3: paccayehi upaṭṭhāti. Athekadivasaṃ bārāṇasivāsī eko puriso pabbate candanasārādīni
atk-s0505a:1119_4: gavesanto tissassa tāpasassa assamaṃ patvā taṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Tāpaso
atk-s0505a:1119_5: taṃ disvā “kuto āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Bārāṇasito, bhante”ti. “Kā tattha pavattī”ti?
atk-s0505a:1119_6: “Tattha, bhante, kassapo nāma sammāsambuddho uppanno”ti. Tāpaso dullabhavacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:1119_7: pītisomanassajāto pucchi – “kiṃ so āmagandhaṃ bhuñjati, na bhuñjatī”ti? “Ko bhante,
atk-s0505a:1119_9: Taṃ sutvā tāpaso vippaṭisārī hutvā puna cintesi – “gantvā taṃ pucchissāmi, sace ‘āmagandhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1119_10: paribhuñjāmī’ti vakkhati, tato naṃ ‘tumhākaṃ, bhante, jātiyā ca kulassa ca gottassa
atk-s0505a:1119_11: ca ananucchavikameta’nti nivāretvā tassa santike pabbajitvā bhavanissaraṇaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:1119_12: sallahukaṃ upakaraṇaṃ gahetvā sabbattha ekarattivāsena sāyanhasamaye bārāṇasiṃ patvā
atk-s0505a:1119_13: isipatanameva pāvisi. Bhagavāpi tasmiṃ samaye dhammadesanatthāya āsane nisinnoyeva
atk-s0505a:1119_14: hoti. Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma anabhivādetvā tuṇhībhūto ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1119_15: Bhagavā taṃ disvā pubbe vuttanayeneva paṭisammodi. Sopi “khamanīyaṃ, bho kassapā”tiādīni
atk-s0505a:1119_16: vatvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi – “āmagandhaṃ, bho kassapa, bhuñjasi,
atk-s0505a:1119_17: na bhuñjasī”ti? “Nāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, āmagandhaṃ bhuñjāmī”ti. “Sādhu, sādhu, bho kassapa,
atk-s0505a:1119_18: parakuṇapaṃ akhādanto sundaramakāsi, yuttametaṃ bhoto kassapassa jātiyā ca kulassa
atk-s0505a:1119_19: ca gottassa cā”ti. Tato bhagavā “ahaṃ kilese sandhāya ‘āmagandhaṃ na bhuñjāmī’ti
atk-s0505a:1119_20: vadāmi, brāhmaṇo macchamaṃsaṃ pacceti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ sve gāmaṃ piṇḍāya apavisitvā kikīrañño
atk-s0505a:1119_21: gehā ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeyyaṃ, evaṃ āmagandhaṃ ārabbha kathā pavattissati.
atk-s0505a:1119_22: Tato brāhmaṇaṃ dhammadesanāya saññāpessāmī”ti dutiyadivase kālasseva sarīraparikammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1119_23: katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Bhikkhū gandhakuṭidvāraṃ pihitaṃ disvā “na bhagavā ajja
atk-s0505a:1119_24: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ pavisitukāmo”ti ñatvā gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1120_0: Bhagavāpi gandhakuṭito nikkhamma paññattāsane nisīdi. Tāpasopi kho pattasākaṃ pacitvā
atk-s0505a:1120_1: khāditvā bhagavato santike nisīdi. Kikī kāsirājā bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante disvā “kuhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1120_2: bhagavā, bhante”ti pucchitvā “vihāre, mahārājā”ti ca sutvā nānābyañjanarasamanekamaṃsavikatisampannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1120_3: bhojanaṃ bhagavato pāhesi. Amaccā vihāraṃ netvā bhagavato ārocetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1120_4: datvā parivisantā paṭhamaṃ nānāmaṃsavikatisampannaṃ yāguṃ adaṃsu, tāpaso disvā “khādati
atk-s0505a:1120_5: nu kho no”ti cintento aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā tassa passatoyeva yāguṃ pivanto maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0505a:1120_6: mukhe pakkhipi. Tāpaso disvā kuddho. Puna yāgupītassa nānārasabyañjanaṃ bhojanamadaṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1120_7: tampi gahetvā bhuñjantaṃ disvā ativiya kuddho “macchamaṃsaṃ khādantoyeva ‘na khādāmī’ti
atk-s0505a:1120_8: bhaṇatī”ti. Atha bhagavantaṃ katabhattakiccaṃ hatthapāde dhovitvā nisinnaṃ upasaṅkamma
atk-s0505a:1120_9: “bho kassapa, musā tvaṃ bhaṇasi, netaṃ paṇḍitakiccaṃ. Musāvādo hi garahito buddhānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1120_10: yepi te pabbatapāde vanamūlaphalādīhi yāpentā isayo vasanti, tepi musā na bhaṇantī”ti
atk-s0505a:1120_11: vatvā puna isīnaṃ guṇe gāthāya vaṇṇento āha “sāmākaciṅgūlakacīnakāni cā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1121_0: 242. Tattha sāmākāti dhunitvā vā sīsāni uccinitvā vā gayhūpagā tiṇadhaññajāti. Tathā
atk-s0505a:1121_1: ciṅgūlakā kaṇavīrapupphasaṇṭhānasīsā honti. Cīnakānīti aṭavipabbatapādesu aropitajātā
atk-s0505a:1121_2: cīnamuggā. Pattapphalanti yaṃkiñci haritapaṇṇaṃ. Mūlaphalanti yaṃkiñci kandamūlaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1121_3: Gavipphalanti yaṃkiñci rukkhavalliphalaṃ. Mūlaggahaṇena vā kandamūlaṃ, phalaggahaṇena
atk-s0505a:1121_5: Dhammena laddhanti dūteyyapahiṇagamanādimicchājīvaṃ pahāya vane uñchācariyāya laddhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1121_6: Satanti santo ariyā. Asnamānāti bhuñjamānā. Na kāmakāmā alikaṃ bhaṇantīti te evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1121_7: amamā apariggahā etāni sāmākādīni bhuñjamānā isayo yathā tvaṃ sādurasādike kāme patthayanto
atk-s0505a:1121_8: āmagandhaṃ bhuñjantoyeva “nāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, āmagandhaṃ bhuñjāmī”ti bhaṇanto alikaṃ
atk-s0505a:1121_9: bhaṇasi, tathā na kāmakāmā alikaṃ bhaṇanti, kāme kāmayantā musā na bhaṇantīti isīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1122_0: 243. Evaṃ isīnaṃ pasaṃsāpadesena bhagavantaṃ ninditvā idāni attanā adhippetaṃ nindāvatthuṃ
atk-s0505a:1122_1: dassetvā nippariyāyeneva bhagavantaṃ nindanto āha “yadasnamāno”ti tattha da-kāro
atk-s0505a:1122_2: padasandhikaro. Ayaṃ panattho – yaṃ kiñcideva sasamaṃsaṃ vā tittiramaṃsaṃ vā dhovanacchedanādinā
atk-s0505a:1122_3: pubbaparikammena sukataṃ, pacanavāsanādinā pacchāparikammena suniṭṭhitaṃ, na mātarā
atk-s0505a:1122_4: na pitarā, apica kho pana “dakkhiṇeyyo aya”nti maññamānehi dhammakāmehi parehi dinnaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1122_5: sakkārakaraṇena payataṃ paṇītamalaṅkataṃ, uttamarasatāya ojavantatāya thāmabalabharaṇasamatthatāya
atk-s0505a:1122_6: ca paṇītaṃ asnamāno āhārayamāno, na kevalañca yaṃkiñci maṃsameva, apica kho pana
atk-s0505a:1122_7: idampi sālīnamannaṃ vicitakāḷakaṃ sālitaṇḍulodanaṃ paribhuñjamāno so bhuñjasi, kassapa,
atk-s0505a:1122_8: āmagandhaṃ, so tvaṃ yaṃkiñci maṃsaṃ bhuñjamāno idañca sālīnamannaṃ paribhuñjamāno
atk-s0505a:1122_9: bhuñjasi, kassapa, āmagandhanti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati.
atk-s0505a:1123_0: 244. Evaṃ āhārato bhagavantaṃ ninditvā idāni musāvādaṃ āropetvā nindanto āha “na
atk-s0505a:1123_1: āmagandho…pe… susaṅkhatehī”ti. Tassattho – pubbe mayā pucchito samāno “na āmagandho
atk-s0505a:1123_2: mama kappatī”ti icceva tvaṃ bhāsasi, evaṃ ekaṃseneva tvaṃ bhāsasi brahmabandhu brāhmaṇaguṇavirahitajātimattabrāhmaṇāti
atk-s0505a:1123_3: paribhāsanto bhaṇati. Sālīnamannanti sālitaṇḍulodanaṃ. Paribhuñjamānoti bhuñjamāno.
atk-s0505a:1123_4: Sakuntamaṃsehi susaṅkhatehīti tadā bhagavato abhihaṭaṃ sakuṇamaṃsaṃ niddisanto bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1124_0: Evaṃ bhaṇanto eva ca bhagavato heṭṭhā pādatalā pabhuti yāva upari kesaggā sarīramullokento
atk-s0505a:1124_2: mahāpurisalakkhaṇādipaṭimaṇḍitakāyo na musā bhaṇituṃ arahati. Ayaṃ hissa bhavantarepi
atk-s0505a:1124_3: saccavācānissandeneva uṇṇā bhamukantare jātā odātā mudu tūlasannibhā, ekekāni ca
atk-s0505a:1124_4: lomakūpesu lomāni. Svāyaṃ kathamidāni musā bhaṇissati. Addhā añño imassa āmagandho
atk-s0505a:1124_5: bhavissati, yaṃ sandhāya etadavoca – ‘nāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, āmagandhaṃ bhuñjāmī’ti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1124_6: etaṃ puccheyya”nti cintetvā sañjātabahumāno gotteneva ālapanto imaṃ gāthāsesaṃ āha –
atk-s0505a:1125: “Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃpakāro tava āmagandho”ti.
atk-s0505a:1126_0: 245. Athassa bhagavā āmagandhaṃ vissajjetuṃ “pāṇātipāto”ti evamādimāha. Tattha pāṇātipātoti
atk-s0505a:1126_1: pāṇavadho. Vadhachedabandhananti ettha sattānaṃ daṇḍādīhi ākoṭanaṃ vadho, hatthapādādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1126_2: chedanaṃ chedo, rajjuādīhi bandho bandhanaṃ. Theyyaṃ musāvādoti theyyañca musāvādo
atk-s0505a:1126_3: ca. Nikatīti “dassāmi, karissāmī”tiādinā nayena āsaṃ uppādetvā nirāsākaraṇaṃ. Vañcanānīti
atk-s0505a:1126_5: Paradārasevanāti parapariggahitāsu cārittāpajjanaṃ. Esāmagandho na hi maṃsabhojananti
atk-s0505a:1126_6: esa pāṇātipātādiakusaladhammasamudācāro āmagandho vissagandho kuṇapagandho. Kiṃ kāraṇā?
atk-s0505a:1126_8: ca. Ye hi ussannakilesā sattā, te tehi atiduggandhā honti, nikkilesānaṃ matasarīrampi
atk-s0505a:1126_9: duggandhaṃ na hoti, tasmā esāmagandho. Maṃsabhojanaṃ pana adiṭṭhamasutamaparisaṅkitañca
atk-s0505a:1126_10: anavajjaṃ, tasmā na hi maṃsabhojanaṃ āmagandhoti.
atk-s0505a:1127_0: 246. Evaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya ekena nayena āmagandhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni yasmā
atk-s0505a:1127_1: te te sattā tehi tehi āmagandhehi samannāgatā, na eko eva sabbehi, na ca sabbe ekeneva,
atk-s0505a:1127_2: tasmā nesaṃ te te āmagandhe pakāsetuṃ “ye idha kāmesu asaññatā janā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:1127_3: puggalādhiṭṭhānāya tāva desanāya āmagandhe vissajjento dve gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1128_0: Tattha ye idha kāmesu asaññatā janāti ye keci idha loke kāmapaṭisevanasaṅkhātesu
atk-s0505a:1128_1: kāmesu mātimātucchādīsupi mariyādāvirahena bhinnasaṃvaratāya asaṃyatā puthujjanā.
atk-s0505a:1128_2: Rasesu giddhāti jivhāviññeyyesu rasesu giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā anādīnavadassāvino
atk-s0505a:1128_3: anissaraṇapaññā rase paribhuñjanti. Asucibhāvamassitāti tāya rasagiddhiyā rasapaṭilābhatthāya
atk-s0505a:1128_5: Visamāti visamena kāyakammādinā samannāgatā. Durannayāti duviññāpayā sandiṭṭhiparāmāsīādhānaggāhīduppaṭinissaggitāsamannāgatā.
atk-s0505a:1128_6: Esāmagandhoti esa etāya gāthāya puggale adhiṭṭhāya niddiṭṭho “kāmesu asaṃyatatā rasagiddhatā
atk-s0505a:1128_8: vuttenevatthena chabbidho āmagandho veditabbo. Na hi maṃsabhojananti maṃsabhojanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1129_0: 247. Dutiyagāthāyapi ye lūkhasāti ye lūkhā nirasā, attakilamathānuyuttāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1129_1: Dāruṇāti kakkhaḷā dovacassatāyuttā. Piṭṭhimaṃsikāti purato madhuraṃ bhaṇitvā parammukhe
atk-s0505a:1129_2: avaṇṇabhāsino. Ete hi abhimukhaṃ oloketumasakkontā parammukhānaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsakhādakā
atk-s0505a:1129_3: viya honti, tena “piṭṭhimaṃsikā”ti vuccanti. Mittaddunoti mittadūhakā, dāradhanajīvitesu
atk-s0505a:1129_4: vissāsamāpannānaṃ mittānaṃ tattha micchāpaṭipajjanakāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nikkaruṇāti
atk-s0505a:1129_5: karuṇāvirahitā sattānaṃ anatthakāmā. Atimāninoti “idhekacco jātiyā vā…pe… aññataraññatarena
atk-s0505a:1129_6: vatthunā pare atimaññati, yo evarūpo māno ketukamyatā cittassā”ti evaṃ vuttena atimānena
atk-s0505a:1129_7: samannāgatā. Adānasīlāti adānapakatikā, adānādhimuttā asaṃvibhāgaratāti attho. Na
atk-s0505a:1129_8: ca denti kassacīti tāya ca pana adānasīlatāya yācitāpi santā kassaci kiñci na denti,
atk-s0505a:1129_9: adinnapubbakakule manussasadisā nijjhāmataṇhikapetaparāyaṇā honti. Keci pana “ādānasīlā”tipi
atk-s0505a:1129_10: paṭhanti, kevalaṃ gahaṇasīlā, kassaci pana kiñci na dentīti. Esāmagandho na hi maṃsabhojananti
atk-s0505a:1129_11: esa etāya gāthāya puggale adhiṭṭhāya niddiṭṭho “lūkhatā, dāruṇatā, piṭṭhimaṃsikatā,
atk-s0505a:1129_12: mittadūbhitā, nikkaruṇatā, atimānitā, adānasīlatā, adāna”nti aparopi pubbe vuttenevatthena
atk-s0505a:1129_13: aṭṭhavidho āmagandho veditabbo, na hi maṃsabhojananti.
atk-s0505a:1130_0: 248. Evaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya dve gāthāyo vatvā puna tassa tāpasassa āsayānuparivattanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1130_1: viditvā dhammādhiṭṭhānāyeva desanāya ekaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi. Tattha kodho uragasutte
atk-s0505a:1130_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Madoti “jātimado, gottamado, ārogyamado”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge
atk-s0505a:1130_3: vuttappabhedo cittassa majjanabhāvo. Thambhoti thaddhabhāvo. Paccupaṭṭhāpanāti paccanīkaṭṭhāpanā,
atk-s0505a:1130_4: dhammena nayena vuttassa paṭivirujjhitvā ṭhānaṃ. Māyāti “idhekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ
atk-s0505a:1130_5: caritvā”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge vibhattā katapāpapaṭicchādanatā. Usūyāti paralābhasakkārādīsu
atk-s0505a:1130_6: issā. Bhassasamussayoti samussitaṃ bhassaṃ, attukkaṃsanatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Mānātimānoti
atk-s0505a:1130_7: “idhekacco jātiyā vā…pe… aññataraññatarena vatthunā pubbakālaṃ parehi sadisaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1130_8: dahati, aparakālaṃ attānaṃ seyyaṃ dahati, pare hīne dahati, yo evarūpo māno…pe… ketukamyatā
atk-s0505a:1130_9: cittassā”ti vibhaṅge vibhatto. Asabbhi santhavoti asappurisehi santhavo. Esāmagandho
atk-s0505a:1130_10: na hi maṃsabhojananti esa kodhādi navavidho akusalarāsi pubbe vuttenevatthena āmagandhoti
atk-s0505a:1131_0: 249. Evaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya navavidhaṃ āmagandhaṃ dassetvā punapi pubbe
atk-s0505a:1131_1: vuttanayeneva puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya āmagandhe vissajjento tisso gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1131_2: Tattha ye pāpasīlāti ye pāpasamācāratāya “pāpasīlā”ti loke pākaṭā. Iṇaghātasūcakāti
atk-s0505a:1131_3: vasalasutte vuttanayena iṇaṃ gahetvā tassa appadānena iṇaghātā, pesuññena sūcakā
atk-s0505a:1131_4: ca. Vohārakūṭā idha pāṭirūpikāti dhammaṭṭaṭṭhāne ṭhitā lañjaṃ gahetvā sāmike parājentā
atk-s0505a:1131_5: kūṭena vohārena samannāgatattā vohārakūṭā, dhammaṭṭhapaṭirūpakattā pāṭirūpikā. Atha
atk-s0505a:1131_6: vā idhāti sāsane. Pāṭirūpikāti dussīlā. Te hi yasmā nesaṃ iriyāpathasampadādīhi sīlavantapaṭirūpaṃ
atk-s0505a:1131_7: atthi, tasmā paṭirūpā, paṭirūpā eva pāṭirūpikā. Narādhamā yedha karonti kibbisanti
atk-s0505a:1131_8: ye idha loke narādhamā mātāpitūsu buddhapaccekabuddhādīsu ca micchāpaṭipattisaññitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1131_9: kibbisaṃ karonti. Esāmagandho na hi maṃsabhojananti esa etāya gāthāya puggale adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0505a:1131_10: niddiṭṭho “pāpasīlatā, iṇaghātatā, sūcakatā, vohārakūṭatā, pāṭirūpikatā, kibbisakāritā”ti
atk-s0505a:1131_11: aparopi pubbe vuttenevatthena chabbidho āmagandho veditabbo, na hi maṃsabhojananti.
atk-s0505a:1132_0: 250. Ye idha pāṇesu asaññatā janāti ye janā idhaloke pāṇesu yathākāmacāritāya satampi
atk-s0505a:1132_1: sahassampi māretvā anuddayāmattassāpi akaraṇena asaṃyatā. Paresamādāya vihesamuyyutāti
atk-s0505a:1132_2: paresaṃ santakaṃ ādāya dhanaṃ vā jīvitaṃ vā tato “mā evaṃ karothā”ti yācantānaṃ vā
atk-s0505a:1132_3: nivārentānaṃ vā pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi vihesaṃ uyyutā. Pare vā satte samādāya “ajja dasa,
atk-s0505a:1132_4: ajja vīsa”nti evaṃ samādiyitvā tesaṃ vadhabandhanādīhi vihesamuyyutā. Dussīlaluddāti
atk-s0505a:1132_5: nissīlā ca durācārattā, luddā ca kurūrakammantā lohitapāṇitāya, macchaghātakamigabandhakasākuṇikādayo
atk-s0505a:1132_6: idhādhippetā. Pharusāti pharusavācā. Anādarāti “idāni na karissāma, viramissāma evarūpā”ti
atk-s0505a:1132_7: evaṃ ādaravirahitā. Esāmagandho na hi maṃsabhojananti esa etāya gāthāya puggale adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0505a:1132_8: niddiṭṭho “pāṇātipāto vadhachedabandhana”ntiādinā nayena pubbe vutto ca avutto ca
atk-s0505a:1132_9: “pāṇesu asaṃyatatā paresaṃ vihesatā dussīlatā luddatā pharusatā anādaro”ti chabbidho
atk-s0505a:1132_10: āmagandho veditabbo, na hi maṃsabhojananti. Pubbe vuttampi hi sotūnaṃ sotukāmatāya
atk-s0505a:1132_11: avadhāraṇatāya daḷhīkaraṇatāyāti evamādīhi kāraṇehi puna vuccati. Teneva ca parato
atk-s0505a:1132_12: vakkhati “iccetamatthaṃ bhagavā punappunaṃ, akkhāsi naṃ vedayi mantapāragū”ti.
atk-s0505a:1133_0: 251. Etesu giddhā viruddhātipātinoti etesu pāṇesu gedhena giddhā, dosena viruddhā,
atk-s0505a:1133_1: mohena ādīnavaṃ apassantā punappunaṃ ajjhācārappattiyā atipātino, etesu vā “pāṇātipāto
atk-s0505a:1133_2: vadhachedabandhana”ntiādinā nayena vuttesu pāpakammesu yathāsambhavaṃ ye gedhavirodhātipātasaṅkhātā
atk-s0505a:1133_3: rāgadosamohā, tehi giddhā viruddhā atipātino ca. Niccuyyutāti akusalakaraṇe niccaṃ
atk-s0505a:1133_4: uyyutā, kadāci paṭisaṅkhāya appaṭiviratā. Peccāti asmā lokā paraṃ gantvā. Tamaṃ vajanti
atk-s0505a:1133_5: ye, patanti sattā nirayaṃ avaṃsirāti ye lokantarikandhakārasaṅkhātaṃ nīcakulatādibhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:1133_6: vā tamaṃ vajanti, ye ca patanti sattā avīciādibhedaṃ nirayaṃ avaṃsirā adhogatasīsā.
atk-s0505a:1133_7: Esāmagandhoti tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamavajananirayapatanahetu esa gedhavirodhātipātabhedo
atk-s0505a:1133_8: sabbāmagandhamūlabhūto yathāvuttenatthena tividho āmagandho. Na hi maṃsabhojananti
atk-s0505a:1134_0: 252. Evaṃ bhagavā paramatthato āmagandhaṃ vissajjetvā duggatimaggabhāvañcassa pakāsetvā
atk-s0505a:1134_1: idāni yasmiṃ macchamaṃsabhojane tāpaso āmagandhasaññī duggatimaggasaññī ca hutvā
atk-s0505a:1134_2: tassa abhojanena suddhikāmo hutvā taṃ na bhuñjati, tassa ca aññassa ca tathāvidhassa
atk-s0505a:1134_3: sodhetuṃ asamatthabhāvaṃ dassento “na macchamaṃsa”nti imaṃ chappadaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1134_4: sabbapadāni antimapādena yojetabbāni – na macchamaṃsaṃ sodheti maccaṃ avitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1134_5: na āhutiyaññamutūpasevanā sodheti maccaṃ avitiṇṇakaṅkhanti evaṃ. Ettha ca na macchamaṃsanti
atk-s0505a:1134_6: akhādiyamānaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ na sodheti, tathā anāsakattanti evaṃ porāṇā vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0505a:1134_7: Evaṃ pana sundarataraṃ siyā “na macchamaṃsānaṃ anāsakattaṃ na macchamaṃsānānāsakattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1134_8: macchamaṃsānaṃ anāsakattaṃ na sodheti, macca”nti athāpi siyā, evaṃ sante anāsakattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1134_9: ohīyatīti? Tañca na, amaratapena saṅgahitattā. “Ye vāpi loke amarā bahū tapā”ti ettha
atk-s0505a:1134_10: hi sabbopi vuttāvaseso attakilamatho saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti. Naggiyanti acelakattaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1134_11: Muṇḍiyanti muṇḍabhāvo. Jaṭājallanti jaṭā ca rajojallañca. Kharājinānīti kharāni ajinacammāni.
atk-s0505a:1134_13: Bahūti ukkuṭikappadhānādibhedato aneke. Tapāti sarīrasantāpā. Mantāti vedā. Āhutīti
atk-s0505a:1134_14: aggihomakammaṃ. Yaññamutūpasevanāti assamedhādiyaññā ca utūpasevanā ca. Utūpasevanā
atk-s0505a:1134_15: nāma gimhe ātapaṭṭhānasevanā, vasse rukkhamūlasevanā, hemante jalappavesasevanā.
atk-s0505a:1134_16: Na sodhenti maccaṃ avitiṇṇakaṅkhanti kilesasuddhiyā vā bhavasuddhiyā vā avitiṇṇavicikicchaṃ
atk-s0505a:1134_17: maccaṃ na sodhenti. Kaṅkhāmale hi sati na visuddho hoti, tvañca sakaṅkhoyevāti. Ettha
atk-s0505a:1134_18: ca “avitiṇṇakaṅkha”nti etaṃ “na macchamaṃsa”ntiādīni sutvā “kiṃ nu kho macchamaṃsānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1134_19: abhojanādinā siyā visuddhimaggo”ti tāpasassa kaṅkhāya uppannāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1134_20: siyāti no adhippāyo. Yā cassa “so macchamaṃsaṃ bhuñjatī”ti sutvāva buddhe kaṅkhā
atk-s0505a:1135_0: 253. Evaṃ macchamaṃsānāsakattādīnaṃ sodhetuṃ asamatthabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sodhetuṃ
atk-s0505a:1135_1: samatthe dhamme dassento “sotesu gutto”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha sotesūti chasu indriyesu.
atk-s0505a:1135_2: Guttoti indriyasaṃvaraguttiyā samannāgato. Ettāvatā indriyasaṃvaraparivārasīlaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1135_3: Viditindriyo careti ñātapariññāya chaḷindriyāni viditvā pākaṭāni katvā careyya, vihareyyāti
atk-s0505a:1135_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā visuddhasīlassa nāmarūpaparicchedaṃ dasseti. Dhamme ṭhitoti
atk-s0505a:1135_5: ariyamaggena abhisametabbacatusaccadhamme ṭhito. Etena sotāpattibhūmiṃ dasseti. Ajjavamaddave
atk-s0505a:1135_6: ratoti ujubhāve ca mudubhāve ca rato. Etena sakadāgāmibhūmiṃ dasseti. Sakadāgāmī
atk-s0505a:1135_7: hi kāyavaṅkādikarānaṃ cittathaddhabhāvakarānañca rāgadosānaṃ tanubhāvā ajjavamaddave
atk-s0505a:1135_8: rato hoti. Saṅgātigoti rāgadosasaṅgātigo. Etena anāgāmibhūmiṃ dasseti. Sabbadukkhappahīnoti
atk-s0505a:1135_9: sabbassa vaṭṭadukkhassa hetuppahānena pahīnasabbadukkho. Etena arahattabhūmiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1135_10: Na lippati diṭṭhasutesu dhīroti so evaṃ anupubbena arahattaṃ patto dhitisampadāya
atk-s0505a:1135_11: dhīro diṭṭhasutesu dhammesu kenaci kilesena na lippati. Na kevalañca diṭṭhasutesu,
atk-s0505a:1135_12: mutaviññātesu ca na lippati, aññadatthu paramavisuddhippatto hotīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1136_0: 254-5. Ito paraṃ “iccetamattha”nti dve gāthā saṅgītikārehi vuttā. Tāsamattho – iti
atk-s0505a:1136_1: bhagavā kassapo etamatthaṃ punappunaṃ anekāhi gāthāhi dhammādhiṭṭhānāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:1136_2: ca desanāya yāva tāpaso aññāsi, tāva so akkhāsi kathesi vitthāresi. Naṃ vedayi mantapāragūti
atk-s0505a:1136_3: sopi tañca atthaṃ mantapāragū, vedapāragū, tisso brāhmaṇo vedayi aññāsi. Kiṃ kāraṇā?
atk-s0505a:1136_4: Yasmā atthato ca padato ca desanānayato ca citrāhi gāthāhi munī pakāsayi. Kīdiso?
atk-s0505a:1136_5: Nirāmagandho asito durannayo, āmagandhakilesābhāvā nirāmagandho, taṇhādiṭṭhinissayābhāvā
atk-s0505a:1136_6: asito, bāhiradiṭṭhivasena “idaṃ seyyo idaṃ vara”nti kenaci netuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā durannayo.
atk-s0505a:1136_7: Evaṃ pakāsitavato cassa sutvāna buddhassa subhāsitaṃ padaṃ sukathitaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1136_9: nīcamano nīcacitto hutvā vandi tathāgatassa, tisso brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa pāde pañcapatiṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1136_10: katvā vandi. Tattheva pabbajjamarocayitthāti tattheva ca naṃ āsane nisinnaṃ kassapaṃ
atk-s0505a:1136_11: bhagavantaṃ tisso tāpaso pabbajjamarocayittha, ayācīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ bhagavā “ehi
atk-s0505a:1136_12: bhikkhū”ti āha. So taṅkhaṇaṃyeva aṭṭhaparikkhārayutto hutvā ākāsenāgantvā vassasatikatthero
atk-s0505a:1136_13: viya bhagavantaṃ vanditvā katipāheneva sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tisso nāma
atk-s0505a:1136_14: aggasāvako ahosi, puna dutiyo bhāradvājo nāma. Evaṃ tassa bhagavato tissabhāradvājaṃ
atk-s0505a:1137_0: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavā yā ca tissena brāhmaṇena ādito tisso gāthā vuttā, yā ca kassapena
atk-s0505a:1137_1: bhagavatā majjhe nava, yā ca tadā saṅgītikārehi ante dve, tā sabbāpi cuddasa gāthā
atk-s0505a:1137_2: ānetvā paripuṇṇaṃ katvā imaṃ āmagandhasuttaṃ ācariyappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ tāpasasatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1137_3: āmagandhaṃ byākāsi. Taṃ sutvā so brāhmaṇo tatheva nīcamano hutvā bhagavato pāde vanditvā
atk-s0505a:1137_4: pabbajjaṃ yāci saddhiṃ parisāya. “Etha bhikkhavo”ti bhagavā avoca. Te tatheva ehibhikkhubhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:1137_5: patvā ākāsenāgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā katipāheneva sabbeva aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0505a:1141_0: Hiriṃ tarantanti hirisuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Anuppanne bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ aññataro
atk-s0505a:1141_1: brāhmaṇamahāsālo aḍḍho ahosi asītikoṭidhanavibhavo. Tassa ekaputtako ahosi piyo manāpo.
atk-s0505a:1141_2: So taṃ devakumāraṃ viya nānappakārehi sukhūpakaraṇehi saṃvaḍḍhento taṃ sāpateyyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_3: tassa aniyyātetvāva kālamakāsi saddhiṃ brāhmaṇiyā. Tato tassa māṇavassa mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_4: accayena bhaṇḍāgāriko sāragabbhaṃ vivaritvā sāpateyyaṃ niyyātento āha – “idaṃ te,
atk-s0505a:1141_5: sāmi, mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ, idaṃ ayyakapayyakānaṃ santakaṃ, idaṃ sattakulaparivaṭṭena
atk-s0505a:1141_6: āgata”nti. Māṇavo dhanaṃ disvā cintesi – “idaṃ dhanaṃyeva dissati, yehi pana idaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_7: sañcitaṃ, te na dissanti, sabbeva maccuvasaṃ gatā. Gacchantā ca na ito kiñci ādāya
atk-s0505a:1141_8: agamaṃsu, evaṃ nāma bhoge pahāya gantabbo paraloko, na sakkā kiñci ādāya gantuṃ aññatra
atk-s0505a:1141_9: sucaritena. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā sucaritadhanaṃ gaṇheyyaṃ, yaṃ sakkā
atk-s0505a:1141_10: ādāya gantu”nti. So divase divase satasahassaṃ vissajjento puna cintesi – “pahūtamidaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_11: dhanaṃ, kiṃ iminā evamappakena pariccāgena, yaṃnūnāhaṃ mahādānaṃ dadeyya”nti. So
atk-s0505a:1141_12: rañño ārocesi – “mahārāja, mama ghare ettakaṃ dhanaṃ atthi, icchāmi tena mahādānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_13: dātuṃ. Sādhu, mahārāja, nagare ghosanaṃ kārāpethā”ti. Rājā tathā kārāpesi. So āgatāgatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_14: bhājanāni pūretvā sattahi divasehi sabbadhanamadāsi, datvā ca cintesi – “evaṃ mahāpariccāgaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_15: katvā ayuttaṃ ghare vasituṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ pabbajeyya”nti. Tato parijanassa etamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1141_16: ārocesi. Te “mā, tvaṃ sāmi, ‘dhanaṃ parikkhīṇa’nti cintayi, mayaṃ appakeneva kālena
atk-s0505a:1141_17: nānāvidhehi upāyehi dhanasañcayaṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā nānappakārehi taṃ yāciṃsu. So
atk-s0505a:1142_0: Tattha aṭṭhavidhā tāpasā – saputtabhariyā, uñchācārikā, sampattakālikā, anaggipakkikā,
atk-s0505a:1142_1: asmamuṭṭhikā, dantaluyyakā, pavattaphalikā, vaṇṭamuttikā cāti. Tattha saputtabhariyāti
atk-s0505a:1142_2: puttadārena saddhiṃ pabbajitvā kasivaṇijjādīhi jīvikaṃ kappayamānā keṇiyajaṭilādayo.
atk-s0505a:1142_3: Uñchācārikāti nagaradvāre assamaṃ kārāpetvā tattha khattiyabrāhmaṇakumārādayo sippādīni
atk-s0505a:1142_5: te saputtabhariyehi seṭṭhatarā. Sampattakālikāti āhāravelāya sampattaṃ āhāraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0505a:1142_6: yāpentā, te uñchācārikehi seṭṭhatarā. Anaggipakkikāti agginā apakkapattaphalāni khāditvā
atk-s0505a:1142_7: yāpentā, te sampattakālikehi seṭṭhatarā. Asmamuṭṭhikāti muṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ
atk-s0505a:1142_8: vā kiñci vāsisatthakādiṃ gahetvā vicarantā yadā chātā honti, tadā sampattarukkhato
atk-s0505a:1142_9: tacaṃ gahetvā khāditvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya cattāro brahmavihāre bhāventi, te
atk-s0505a:1142_10: anaggipakkikehi seṭṭhatarā. Dantaluyyakāti muṭṭhipāsāṇādīnipi agahetvā carantā khudākāle
atk-s0505a:1142_11: sampattarukkhato dantehi uppāṭetvā tacaṃ khāditvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya brahmavihāre
atk-s0505a:1142_12: bhāventi, te asmamuṭṭhikehi seṭṭhatarā. Pavattaphalikāti jātassaraṃ vā vanasaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0505a:1142_13: vā nissāya vasantā yaṃ tattha sare bhisamuḷālādi, yaṃ vā vanasaṇḍe pupphakāle pupphaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1142_14: phalakāle phalaṃ, tameva khādanti. Pupphaphale asati antamaso tattha rukkhapapaṭikampi
atk-s0505a:1142_15: khāditvā vasanti, na tveva āhāratthāya aññatra gacchanti. Uposathaṅgādhiṭṭhānaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1142_16: ca karonti, te dantaluyyakehi seṭṭhatarā. Vaṇṭamuttikā nāma vaṇṭamuttāni bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1142_17: patitāni paṇṇāniyeva khādanti, sesaṃ purimasadisameva, te sabbaseṭṭhā.
atk-s0505a:1143_0: Ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇakulaputto “tāpasapabbajjāsu aggapabbajjaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vaṇṭamuttikapabbajjameva
atk-s0505a:1143_1: pabbajitvā himavante dve tayo pabbate atikkamma assamaṃ kārāpetvā paṭivasati. Atha
atk-s0505a:1143_2: bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1143_3: viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthivāsī eko
atk-s0505a:1143_4: puriso pabbate candanasārādīni gavesanto tassa assamaṃ patvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1143_5: aṭṭhāsi. So taṃ disvā “kuto āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Sāvatthito, bhante”ti. “Kā tattha
atk-s0505a:1143_6: pavattī”ti? “Tattha, bhante, manussā appamattā dānādīni puññāni karontī”ti. “Kassa
atk-s0505a:1143_7: ovādaṃ sutvā”ti? “Buddhassa bhagavato”ti. Tāpaso buddhasaddassavanena vimhito “buddhoti
atk-s0505a:1143_8: tvaṃ, bho purisa, vadesī”ti āmagandhe vuttanayeneva tikkhattuṃ pucchitvā “ghosopi
atk-s0505a:1143_9: kho eso dullabho”ti attamano bhagavato santikaṃ gantukāmo hutvā cintesi – “na yuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1143_10: buddhassa santikaṃ tucchameva gantuṃ, kiṃ nu kho gahetvā gaccheyya”nti. Puna cintesi
atk-s0505a:1143_11: – “buddhā nāma āmisagarukā na honti, handāhaṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gacchāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:1144: “Kīdiso mitto na sevitabbo, kīdiso mitto sevitabbo;
atk-s0505a:1145: Kīdiso payogo payuñjitabbo, kiṃ rasānaṃ agga”nti.
atk-s0505a:1146_0: So te pañhe gahetvā majjhimadesābhimukho pakkamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1146_1: paviṭṭho. Bhagavāpi tasmiṃ samaye dhammadesanatthāya āsane nisinnoyeva hoti. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1146_2: disvā avanditvāva ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā “kacci, isi, khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:1146_3: sammodi. Sopi “khamanīyaṃ, bho gotamā”tiādinā nayena paṭisammoditvā “yadi buddho
atk-s0505a:1146_4: bhavissati, manasā pucchite pañhe vācāya eva vissajjessatī”ti manasā eva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1146_5: te pañhe pucchi. Bhagavā brāhmaṇena puṭṭho ādipañhaṃ tāva vissajjetuṃ hiriṃ tarantanti
atk-s0505a:1147_0: 256. Tāsaṃ attho – hiriṃ tarantanti hiriṃ atikkamantaṃ ahirikaṃ nillajjaṃ. Vijigucchamānanti
atk-s0505a:1147_1: asucimiva passamānaṃ. Ahiriko hi hiriṃ jigucchati asucimiva passati, tena naṃ na
atk-s0505a:1147_2: bhajati na allīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “vijigucchamāna”nti. Tavāhamasmi iti bhāsamānanti
atk-s0505a:1147_3: “ahaṃ, samma, tava sahāyo hitakāmo sukhakāmo, jīvitampi me tuyhaṃ atthāya pariccatta”nti
atk-s0505a:1147_4: evamādinā nayena bhāsamānaṃ. Sayhāni kammāni anādiyantanti evaṃ bhāsitvāpi ca sayhāni
atk-s0505a:1147_5: kātuṃ sakkānipi tassa kammāni anādiyantaṃ karaṇatthāya asamādiyantaṃ. Atha vā cittena
atk-s0505a:1147_6: tattha ādaramattampi akarontaṃ, apica kho pana uppannesu kiccesu byasanameva dassentaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1147_7: Neso mamanti iti naṃ vijaññāti taṃ evarūpaṃ “mittapaṭirūpako eso, neso me mitto”ti
atk-s0505a:1148_0: 257. Ananvayanti yaṃ atthaṃ dassāmi, karissāmīti ca bhāsati, tena ananugataṃ. Piyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1148_1: vācaṃ yo mittesu pakubbatīti yo atītānāgatehi padehi paṭisantharanto niratthakena
atk-s0505a:1148_2: saṅgaṇhanto kevalaṃ byañjanacchāyāmatteneva piyaṃ mittesu vācaṃ pavatteti. Akarontaṃ
atk-s0505a:1148_3: bhāsamānaṃ, parijānanti paṇḍitāti evarūpaṃ yaṃ bhāsati, taṃ akarontaṃ, kevalaṃ vācāya
atk-s0505a:1148_4: bhāsamānaṃ “vacīparamo nāmesa amitto mittapaṭirūpako”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā paṇḍitā jānanti.
atk-s0505a:1149_0: 258. Na so mitto yo sadā appamatto, bhedāsaṅkī randhamevānupassīti yo bhedameva āsaṅkamāno
atk-s0505a:1149_1: katamadhurena upacārena sadā appamatto viharati, yaṃkiñci assatiyā amanasikārena
atk-s0505a:1149_2: kataṃ, aññāṇakena vā akataṃ, “yadā maṃ garahissati, tadā naṃ etena paṭicodessāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:1149_3: evaṃ randhameva anupassati, na so mitto sevitabboti.
atk-s0505a:1150_0: Evaṃ bhagavā “kīdiso mitto na sevitabbo”ti imaṃ ādipañhaṃ vissajjetvā dutiyaṃ vissajjetuṃ
atk-s0505a:1150_1: “yasmiñca setī”ti imaṃ upaḍḍhagāthamāha. Tassattho yasmiñca mitte mitto tassa hadayamanupavisitvā
atk-s0505a:1150_2: sayanena yathā nāma pitu urasi putto “imassa mayi urasi sayante dukkhaṃ vā anattamanatā
atk-s0505a:1150_3: vā bhaveyyā”tiādīhi aparisaṅkamāno nibbisaṅko hutvā seti, evamevaṃ dāradhanajīvitādīsu
atk-s0505a:1150_4: vissāsaṃ karonto mittabhāvena nibbisaṅko seti. Yo ca parehi kāraṇasataṃ kāraṇasahassampi
atk-s0505a:1150_5: vatvā abhejjo, sa ve mitto sevitabboti.
atk-s0505a:1151_0: 259. Evaṃ bhagavā “kīdiso mitto sevitabbo”ti evaṃ dutiyapañhaṃ vissajjetvā tatiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1151_1: vissajjetuṃ “pāmujjakaraṇa”nti gāthamāha. Tassattho – pāmujjaṃ karotīti pāmujjakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1151_2: Ṭhānanti kāraṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Vīriyaṃ. Tañhi dhammūpasañhitaṃ pītipāmojjasukhamuppādanato
atk-s0505a:1151_3: pāmujjakaraṇanti vuccati. Yathāha “svākhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo,
atk-s0505a:1151_4: so sukhaṃ viharatī”ti. Pasaṃsaṃ āvahatīti pasaṃsāvahanaṃ. Ādito dibbamānusakasukhānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1151_5: pariyosāne nibbānasukhassa āvahanato phalūpacārena sukhaṃ. Phalaṃ paṭikaṅkhamāno
atk-s0505a:1151_6: phalānisaṃso. Bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti. Vahanto porisaṃ dhuranti purisānucchavikaṃ bhāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1151_7: ādāya viharanto etaṃ sammappadhānavīriyasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhāveti, īdiso payogo sevitabboti.
atk-s0505a:1152_0: 260. Evaṃ bhagavā “kīdiso payogo payuñjitabbo”ti tatiyapañhaṃ vissajjetvā catutthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1152_1: vissajjetuṃ “pavivekarasa”nti gāthamāha. Tattha pavivekoti kilesavivekato jātattā
atk-s0505a:1152_2: aggaphalaṃ vuccati, tassa rasoti assādanaṭṭhena taṃsampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ. Upasamopi
atk-s0505a:1152_3: kilesūpasamante jātattā nibbānasaṅkhātaupasamārammaṇattā vā tadeva, dhammapītirasopi
atk-s0505a:1152_4: ariyadhammato anapetāya nibbānasaṅkhāte dhamme uppannāya pītiyā rasattā tadeva. Taṃ
atk-s0505a:1152_5: pavivekarasaṃ upasamassa ca rasaṃ pitvā tadeva dhammapītirasaṃ pivaṃ niddaro hoti
atk-s0505a:1152_6: nippāpo, pivitvāpi kilesapariḷāhābhāvena niddaro, pivantopi pahīnapāpattā nippāpo
atk-s0505a:1152_7: hoti, tasmā etaṃ rasānamagganti. Keci pana “jhānanibbānapaccavekkhaṇānaṃ kāyacittaupadhivivekānañca
atk-s0505a:1152_8: vasena pavivekarasādayo tayo eva ete dhammā”ti yojenti, purimameva sundaraṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1152_9: bhagavā catutthapañhaṃ vissajjento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0505a:1152_10: brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajitvā katipāheneva paṭisambhidāppatto arahā ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:1162_0: Evaṃ me sutanti maṅgalasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Jambudīpe kira tattha tattha nagaradvārasanthāgārasabhādīsu
atk-s0505a:1162_1: mahājanā sannipatitvā hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ datvā nānappakāraṃ sītāharaṇādibāhirakakathaṃ
atk-s0505a:1162_2: kathāpenti, ekekā kathā catumāsaccayena niṭṭhāti. Tattha ekadivasaṃ maṅgalakathā
atk-s0505a:1162_3: samuṭṭhāsi – “kiṃ nu kho maṅgalaṃ, kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ maṅgalaṃ, sutaṃ maṅgalaṃ, mutaṃ maṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1163_0: Atha diṭṭhamaṅgaliko nāmeko puriso āha – “ahaṃ maṅgalaṃ jānāmi, diṭṭhaṃ loke maṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1163_1: diṭṭhaṃ nāma abhimaṅgalasammataṃ rūpaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco kālasseva vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0505a:1163_2: cātakasakuṇaṃ vā passati, beluvalaṭṭhiṃ vā gabbhiniṃ vā kumārake vā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte
atk-s0505a:1163_3: puṇṇaghaṭaṃ vā allarohitamacchaṃ vā ājaññaṃ vā ājaññarathaṃ vā usabhaṃ vā gāviṃ vā
atk-s0505a:1163_4: kapilaṃ vā, yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci evarūpaṃ abhimaṅgalasammataṃ rūpaṃ passati, idaṃ
atk-s0505a:1163_5: vuccati diṭṭhamaṅgala”nti. Tassa vacanaṃ ekacce aggahesuṃ, ekacce nāggahesuṃ. Ye
atk-s0505a:1164_0: Atha sutamaṅgaliko nāmeko puriso āha – “cakkhu nāmetaṃ, bho, sucimpi asucimpi passati,
atk-s0505a:1164_1: tathā sundarampi asundarampi, manāpampi amanāpampi. Yadi tena diṭṭhaṃ maṅgalaṃ siyā,
atk-s0505a:1164_2: sabbampi maṅgalaṃ siyā, tasmā na diṭṭhaṃ maṅgalaṃ, apica kho pana sutaṃ maṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1164_3: sutaṃ nāma abhimaṅgalasammato saddo. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vaḍḍhāti
atk-s0505a:1164_4: vā vaḍḍhamānāti vā puṇṇāti vā phussāti vā sumanāti vā sirīti vā sirivaḍḍhāti vā ajja
atk-s0505a:1164_5: sunakkhattaṃ sumuhuttaṃ sudivasaṃ sumaṅgalanti evarūpaṃ vā yaṃkiñci abhimaṅgalasammataṃ
atk-s0505a:1164_6: saddaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ vuccati sutamaṅgala”nti. Tassapi vacanaṃ ekacce aggahesuṃ, ekacce
atk-s0505a:1164_7: nāggahesuṃ. Ye nāggahesuṃ, te tena saha vivadiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1165_0: Atha mutamaṅgaliko nāmeko puriso āha – “sotampi hi nāmetaṃ bho sādhumpi asādhumpi
atk-s0505a:1165_1: manāpampi amanāpampi suṇāti. Yadi tena sutaṃ maṅgalaṃ siyā, sabbampi maṅgalaṃ siyā,
atk-s0505a:1165_2: tasmā na sutaṃ maṅgalaṃ, apica kho pana mutaṃ maṅgalaṃ, mutaṃ nāma abhimaṅgalasammataṃ
atk-s0505a:1165_3: gandharasaphoṭṭhabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco kālasseva vuṭṭhāya padumagandhādipupphagandhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1165_4: vā ghāyati, phussadantakaṭṭhaṃ vā khādati, pathaviṃ vā āmasati, haritasassaṃ vā allagomayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1165_5: vā kacchapaṃ vā tilavāhaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā āmasati, phussamattikāya vā sammā
atk-s0505a:1165_6: limpati, phussasāṭakaṃ vā nivāseti, phussaveṭhanaṃ vā dhāreti, yaṃ vā panaññampi
atk-s0505a:1165_7: kiñci evarūpaṃ abhimaṅgalasammataṃ gandhaṃ vā ghāyati, rasaṃ vā sāyati, phoṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1165_8: vā phusati, idaṃ vuccati mutamaṅgala”nti. Tassapi vacanaṃ ekacce aggahesuṃ, ekacce nāggahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1166_0: Tattha na diṭṭhamaṅgaliko sutamutamaṅgalike asakkhi saññāpetuṃ. Na tesaṃ aññataro
atk-s0505a:1166_1: itare dve. Tesu ca manussesu ye diṭṭhamaṅgalikassa vacanaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, te “diṭṭhaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:1166_2: maṅgala”nti gatā. Ye sutamutamaṅgalikānaṃ vacanaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, te “sutaṃyeva mutaṃyeva
atk-s0505a:1166_3: maṅgala”nti gatā. Evamayaṃ maṅgalakathā sakalajambudīpe pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0505a:1167_0: Atha sakalajambudīpe manussā gumbagumbā hutvā “kiṃ nu kho maṅgala”nti maṅgalāni cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1167_1: Tesaṃ manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tatheva maṅgalāni cintayiṃsu. Tāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:1167_2: devatānaṃ bhummadevatā mittā honti, atha tato sutvā bhummadevatāpi tatheva maṅgalāni
atk-s0505a:1167_3: cintayiṃsu. Tāsampi devatānaṃ ākāsaṭṭhadevatā mittā honti, ākāsaṭṭhadevatānaṃ cātumahārājikadevatā.
atk-s0505a:1167_4: Eteneva upāyena yāva sudassīdevatānaṃ akaniṭṭhadevatā mittā honti, atha tato sutvā
atk-s0505a:1167_5: akaniṭṭhadevatāpi tatheva gumbagumbā hutvā maṅgalāni cintayiṃsu. Evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0505a:1167_6: sabbattha maṅgalacintā udapādi. Uppannā ca sā “idaṃ maṅgalaṃ idaṃ maṅgala”nti vinicchiyamānāpi
atk-s0505a:1167_7: appattā eva vinicchayaṃ dvādasa vassāni aṭṭhāsi. Sabbe manussā ca devā ca brahmāno
atk-s0505a:1167_8: ca ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake diṭṭhasutamutavasena tidhā bhinnā. Ekopi “idameva maṅgala”nti
atk-s0505a:1167_9: yathābhuccato niṭṭhaṅgato nāhosi, maṅgalakolāhalaṃ loke uppajji.
atk-s0505a:1168_0: Kolāhalaṃ nāma pañcavidhaṃ – kappakolāhalaṃ, cakkavattikolāhalaṃ, buddhakolāhalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1168_1: maṅgalakolāhalaṃ, moneyyakolāhalanti. Tattha kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā vikiṇṇakesā
atk-s0505a:1168_2: rudammukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino
atk-s0505a:1168_3: hutvā, “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati. Ayaṃ loko vinassissati,
atk-s0505a:1168_4: mahāsamuddo sussissati, ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uḍḍhayhissati vinassissati,
atk-s0505a:1168_5: yāva brahmalokā lokavināso bhavissati. Mettaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha, karuṇaṃ muditaṃ
atk-s0505a:1168_6: upekkhaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha, mātaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, pitaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino
atk-s0505a:1168_7: hotha, jāgaratha mā pamādatthā”ti manussapathe vicaritvā ārocenti. Idaṃ kappakolāhalaṃ nāma.
atk-s0505a:1169: Kāmāvacaradevāyeva “vassasatassaccayena cakkavattirājā loke uppajjissatī”ti manussapathe vicaritvā ārocenti. Idaṃ cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma.
atk-s0505a:1170_0: Suddhāvāsā pana devā brahmābharaṇena alaṅkaritvā brahmaveṭhanaṃ sīse katvā pītisomanassajātā
atk-s0505a:1170_1: buddhaguṇavādino “vassasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissatī”ti manussapathe
atk-s0505a:1171: Suddhāvāsā eva devā manussānaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā “dvādasannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena sammāsambuddho maṅgalaṃ kathessatī”ti manussapathe vicaritvā ārocenti. Idaṃ maṅgalakolāhalaṃ nāma.
atk-s0505a:1172_0: Suddhāvāsā eva devā “sattannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavatā saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1172_1: samāgamma moneyyapaṭipadaṃ pucchissatī”ti manussapathe vicaritvā ārocenti. Idaṃ moneyyakolāhalaṃ
atk-s0505a:1172_2: nāma. Imesu pañcasu kolāhalesu diṭṭhamaṅgalādivasena tidhā bhinnesu devamanussesu
atk-s0505a:1173_0: Atha devesu ca manussesu ca vicinitvā vicinitvā maṅgalāni alabhamānesu dvādasannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1173_1: vassānaṃ accayena tāvatiṃsakāyikā devatā saṅgamma samāgamma evaṃ samacintesuṃ – “seyyathāpi
atk-s0505a:1173_2: nāma, mārisā, gharasāmiko antogharajanānaṃ, gāmasāmiko gāmavāsīnaṃ, rājā sabbamanussānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1173_3: evamevaṃ ayaṃ sakko devānamindo amhākaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca yadidaṃ puññena tejena
atk-s0505a:1173_4: issariyena paññāya dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ adhipati. Yaṃnūna mayaṃ sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ
atk-s0505a:1173_5: etamatthaṃ puccheyyāmā”ti. Tā sakkassa santikaṃ gantvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ taṅkhaṇānurūpanivāsanābharaṇasassirikasarīraṃ
atk-s0505a:1173_7: abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā etadavocuṃ – “yagghe, mārisa, jāneyyāsi, etarahi maṅgalapañhā
atk-s0505a:1173_8: samuṭṭhitā, eke diṭṭhaṃ maṅgalanti vadanti, eke sutaṃ maṅgalanti vadanti, eke mutaṃ
atk-s0505a:1173_9: maṅgalanti vadanti. Tattha mayañca aññe ca aniṭṭhaṅgatā, sādhu vata no tvaṃ yāthāvato
atk-s0505a:1173_10: byākarohī”ti. Devarājā pakatiyāpi paññavā “ayaṃ maṅgalakathā kattha paṭhamaṃ samuṭṭhitā”ti
atk-s0505a:1173_11: āha. “Mayaṃ deva cātumahārājikānaṃ assumhā”ti āhaṃsu. Tato cātumahārājikā ākāsaṭṭhadevatānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1174_0: Atha devānamindo “sammāsambuddho kattha vasatī”ti pucchi. “Manussaloke, devā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1174_1: “Taṃ bhagavantaṃ koci pucchī”ti āha. “Na koci devā”ti. “Kiṃ nu kho nāma tumhe mārisā
atk-s0505a:1174_2: aggiṃ chaḍḍetvā khajjopanakaṃ ujjāletha, ye anavasesamaṅgaladesakaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1174_3: atikkamitvā maṃ pucchitabbaṃ maññatha? Āgacchatha, mārisā, taṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchāma,
atk-s0505a:1174_4: addhā sassirikaṃ pañhabyākaraṇaṃ labhissāmā”ti ekaṃ devaputtaṃ āṇāpesi – “tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1174_5: pucchā”ti. So devaputto taṅkhaṇānurūpena alaṅkārena attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā vijjuriva
atk-s0505a:1174_6: vijjotamāno devagaṇaparivuto jetavanamahāvihāraṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0505a:1174_7: ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā maṅgalapañhaṃ pucchanto gāthāya ajjhabhāsi. Bhagavā tassa taṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1175_0: Tattha evaṃ me sutantiādīnamattho saṅkhepato kasibhāradvājasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto,
atk-s0505a:1175_1: vitthāraṃ pana icchantehi papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena gahetabbo.
atk-s0505a:1175_2: Kasibhāradvājasutte ca “magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme”ti
atk-s0505a:1175_3: vuttaṃ, idha “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti. Tasmā “sāvatthiya”nti
atk-s0505a:1175_4: imaṃ padaṃ ādiṃ katvā idha apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0505a:1176_0: Seyyathidaṃ, sāvatthiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Taṃ kira savatthassa nāma isino nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1176_1: ahosi. Tasmā yathā kusambassa nivāso kosambī, kākaṇḍassa nivāso kākaṇḍīti, evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena
atk-s0505a:1176_2: “sāvatthī”ti vuccati. Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – yasmā tasmiṃ ṭhāne satthasamāyoge
atk-s0505a:1176_4: vuccati. Tassaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ. Etenassa gocaragāmo dīpito hoti. Jeto nāma rājakumāro,
atk-s0505a:1176_5: tena ropitasaṃvaḍḍhitattā tassa jetassa vananti jetavanaṃ, tasmiṃ jetavane. Anāthānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1176_6: piṇḍo etasmiṃ atthīti anāthapiṇḍiko, tassa anāthapiṇḍikassa. Anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā
atk-s0505a:1176_7: catupaṇṇāsakoṭipariccāgena niṭṭhāpitārāmeti attho. Etenassa pabbajitānurūpanivāsokāso dīpito hoti.
atk-s0505a:1177_0: Athāti avicchedatthe, khoti adhikārantaranidassanatthe nipāto. Tena avicchinneyeva
atk-s0505a:1177_1: tattha bhagavato vihāre “idamadhikārantaraṃ udapādī”ti dasseti. Kiṃ tanti? Aññatarā
atk-s0505a:1177_2: devatātiādi. Tattha aññatarāti aniyamitaniddeso. Sā hi nāmagottato apākaṭā, tasmā
atk-s0505a:1177_3: “aññatarā”ti vuttā. Devo eva devatā, itthipurisasādhāraṇametaṃ. Idha pana puriso
atk-s0505a:1177_4: eva so devaputto, kintu sādhāraṇanāmavasena “devatā”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:1178_1: dissati. Tattha “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho.
atk-s0505a:1178_2: Uddisatu, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ imesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1178_3: catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0505a:1179: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0505a:1181: Evamādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā”ti evamādīsu abbhanumodane. Idha pana khaye. Tena abhikkantāya rattiyā, parikkhīṇāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1182_0: Abhikkantavaṇṇāti ettha abhikkantasaddo abhirūpe, vaṇṇasaddo pana chavithutikulavaggakāraṇasaṇṭhānappamāṇarūpāyatanādīsu
atk-s0505a:1182_1: dissati. Tattha “suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā”ti evamādīsu chaviyaṃ. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana
atk-s0505a:1182_2: te, gahapati, ime samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ. “Cattārome, bho
atk-s0505a:1182_3: gotama, vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu kulavagge. “Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti
atk-s0505a:1182_4: evamādīsu kāraṇe. “Mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”ti evamādīsu saṇṭhāne.
atk-s0505a:1182_5: “Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu pamāṇe. “Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā”ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane.
atk-s0505a:1182_6: So idha chaviyaṃ daṭṭhabbo. Tena abhikkantavaṇṇā abhirūpacchavīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1183_1: Tathā hissa “kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya”nti evamādīsu anavasesatā
atk-s0505a:1183_2: attho. “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamāgadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti
atk-s0505a:1183_3: evamādīsu yebhuyyatā. “Kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti evamādīsu abyāmissatā.
atk-s0505a:1183_4: “Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ nūna ayamāyasmā”ti evamādīsu anatirekatā. “Āyasmato bhante
atk-s0505a:1183_5: anuruddhassa bāhiko nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0505a:1183_6: daḷhatthatā. “Kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu visaṃyogo. Idha
atk-s0505a:1184_1: Tathā hissa “okappaniyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yatā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
atk-s0505a:1184_2: evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ
atk-s0505a:1184_3: paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0505a:1184_4: kālo. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti evamādīsu paññatti. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0505a:1184_5: chedanaṃ. “Kappati dvaṅgulakappo”ti evamādīsu vikappo. “Atthi kappo nipajjitu”nti
atk-s0505a:1184_6: evamādīsu leso. “Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā”ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo. Idha
atk-s0505a:1184_7: panassa samantabhāvo atthoti adhippeto. Yato kevalakappaṃ jetavananti ettha anavasesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1185: Obhāsetvāti ābhāya pharitvā, candimā viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1186_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, yato yattha bhagavā, tattha
atk-s0505a:1186_1: upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0505a:1186_2: teneva kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena bhagavā
atk-s0505a:1186_4: dijagaṇehi niccaphalitamahārukkho viya. Upasaṅkamīti ca gatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti
atk-s0505a:1186_5: upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ. Atha vā evaṃ gatā tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0505a:1186_6: samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti. Bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvāti bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0505a:1187: Ekamantanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, ekokāsaṃ ekapassanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhummatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ. Aṭṭhāsīti nisajjādipaṭikkhepo, ṭhānaṃ kappesi, ṭhitā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0505a:1188: Kathaṃ ṭhitā pana sā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ahūti?
atk-s0505a:1190: Na kacche nopi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate;
atk-s0505a:1191: Ime dose vivajjetvā, ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ahū”ti.
atk-s0505a:1192_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ aṭṭhāsi eva, na nisīdīti? Lahuṃ nivattitukāmatāya. Devatā hi kañcideva
atk-s0505a:1192_1: atthavasaṃ paṭicca sucipuriso viya vaccaṭṭhānaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchanti. Pakatiyā
atk-s0505a:1192_2: panetāsaṃ yojanasatato pabhuti manussaloko duggandhatāya paṭikūlo hoti, na tattha
atk-s0505a:1192_3: abhiramanti. Tena sā āgatakiccaṃ katvā lahuṃ nivattitukāmatāya na nisīdi. Yassa ca
atk-s0505a:1192_4: gamanādiiriyāpathaparissamassa vinodanatthaṃ nisīdanti, so devānaṃ parissamo natthi,
atk-s0505a:1192_5: tasmāpi na nisīdi. Ye ca mahāsāvakā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā, te patimānesi,
atk-s0505a:1192_6: tasmāpi na nisīdi. Apica bhagavati gāraveneva na nisīdi. Devānañhi nisīditukāmānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1192_7: āsanaṃ nibbattati, taṃ anicchamānā nisajjāya cittampi akatvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1193_0: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatāti evaṃ imehi kāraṇehi ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā.
atk-s0505a:1193_1: Bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsīti bhagavantaṃ gāthāya akkharapadaniyamitaganthitena
