atk-s0505a:1608_9: vicinitvā puna taṃ parisaṃ manasākāsi – “attajjhāsayena nu kho jāneyya, parajjhāsayena,
atk-s0505a:1608_10: aṭṭhuppattivasena, pucchāvasenā”ti. Tato “pucchāvasena jāneyyā”ti ñatvā “pañhaṃ pucchituṃ
atk-s0505a:1608_11: samattho atthi, natthī”ti puna sakalaparisaṃ āvajjetvā “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā “sace
atk-s0505a:1608_12: ahameva pucchitvā ahameva vissajjeyyaṃ, evamassā parisāya sappāyaṃ na hoti. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1608_13: nimmitabuddhaṃ māpeyyanti pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya manomayiddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā
atk-s0505a:1608_14: nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī lakkhaṇasampanno pattacīvaradharo ālokitavilokitādisampanno
atk-s0505a:1608_15: hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānacittena saha pāturahosi. So pācīnalokadhātuto āgantvā bhagavato
atk-s0505a:1608_16: samasame āsane nisinno evaṃ āgantvā yāni bhagavatā imamhi samāgame cariyavasena cha
atk-s0505a:1608_17: suttāni kathitāni. Seyyathidaṃ – purābhedasuttaṃ kalahavivādasuttaṃ cūḷabyūhaṃ mahābyūhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1608_18: tuvaṭakaṃ idameva sammāparibbājanīyanti. Tesu rāgacaritadevatānaṃ sappāyavasena kathetabbassa
atk-s0505a:1608_19: imassa suttassa pavattanatthaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto “pucchāmi muniṃ pahūtapañña”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1609_0: Tattha pahūtapaññanti mahāpaññaṃ. Tiṇṇanti caturoghatiṇṇaṃ. Pāraṅgatanti nibbānappattaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1609_1: Parinibbutanti saupādisesanibbānavasena parinibbutaṃ. Ṭhitattanti lokadhammehi akampanīyacittaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1609_2: Nikkhamma gharā panujja kāmeti vatthukāme panuditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma. Kathaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0505a:1609_3: sammā so loke paribbajeyyāti so bhikkhu kathaṃ loke sammā paribbajeyya vihareyya
atk-s0505a:1609_4: anupalitto lokena hutvā, lokaṃ atikkameyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:1610_0: 363. Atha bhagavā yasmā āsavakkhayaṃ appatvā loke sammā paribbajanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0505a:1610_1: tasmā tasmiṃ rāgacaritādivasena pariggahite sabbapuggalasamūhe taṃ taṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1610_2: samānadosānaṃ devatāgaṇānaṃ āciṇṇadosappahānatthaṃ “yassa maṅgalā”ti ārabhitvā arahattanikūṭeneva
atk-s0505a:1611_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva maṅgalāti maṅgalasutte vuttānaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnametaṃ
atk-s0505a:1611_1: adhivacanaṃ. Samūhatāti suṭṭhu ūhatā paññāsatthena samucchinnā. Uppātāti “ukkāpātadisāḍāhādayo
atk-s0505a:1611_2: evaṃ vipākā hontī”ti evaṃ pavattā uppātābhinivesā. Supināti “pubbaṇhasamaye supinaṃ
atk-s0505a:1611_3: disvā idaṃ nāma hoti, majjhanhikādīsu idaṃ, vāmapassena sayatā diṭṭhe idaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:1611_4: dakkhiṇapassādīhi idaṃ, supinante candaṃ disvā idaṃ nāma hoti, sūriyādayo disvā ida”nti
atk-s0505a:1611_5: evaṃ pavattā supinābhinivesā. Lakkhaṇāti daṇḍalakkhaṇavatthalakkhaṇādipāṭhaṃ paṭhitvā
atk-s0505a:1611_6: “iminā idaṃ nāma hotī”ti evaṃ pavattā lakkhaṇābhinivesā. Te sabbepi brahmajāle vuttanayeneva
atk-s0505a:1611_7: veditabbā. So maṅgaladosavippahīnoti aṭṭhatiṃsa mahāmaṅgalāni ṭhapetvā avasesā maṅgaladosā
atk-s0505a:1611_8: nāma. Yassa panete maṅgalādayo samūhatā, so maṅgaladosavippahīno hoti. Atha vā maṅgalānañca
atk-s0505a:1611_9: uppātādidosānañca pahīnattā maṅgaladosavippahīno hoti, na maṅgalādīhi suddhiṃ pacceti
atk-s0505a:1611_10: ariyamaggassa adhigatattā. Tasmā sammā so loke paribbajeyya, so khīṇāsavo sammā loke
atk-s0505a:1612_0: 364. Dutiyagāthāya rāgaṃ vinayetha mānusesu, dibbesu kāmesu cāpi bhikkhūti mānusesu
atk-s0505a:1612_1: ca dibbesu ca kāmaguṇesu anāgāmimaggena anuppattidhammataṃ nento rāgaṃ vinayetha.
atk-s0505a:1612_2: Atikkamma bhavaṃ samecca dhammanti evaṃ rāgaṃ vinetvā tato paraṃ arahattamaggena
atk-s0505a:1612_3: sabbappakārato pariññābhisamayādayo sādhento catusaccabhedampi samecca dhammaṃ imāya
atk-s0505a:1612_4: paṭipadāya tividhampi atikkamma bhavaṃ. Sammā soti sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyya.
atk-s0505a:1613_1: vuttanayameva sabbagāthāsu ca “sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyyā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1613_2: Ito parañhi yojanampi avatvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:1614_0: 366. Catutthagāthāya sattasaṅkhāravasena duvidhaṃ piyañca appiyañca veditabbaṃ, tattha
atk-s0505a:1614_1: chandarāgapaṭighappahānena hitvā. Anupādāyāti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā.
atk-s0505a:1614_2: Anissito kuhiñcīti aṭṭhasatabhedena taṇhānissayena dvāsaṭṭhibhedena diṭṭhinissayena
atk-s0505a:1614_3: ca kuhiñci rūpādidhamme bhave vā anissito. Saṃyojaniyehi vippamuttoti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā
atk-s0505a:1614_4: dasavidhasaṃyojanassa visayattā saṃyojaniyā, tehi sabbappakārato maggabhāvanāya pariññātattā
atk-s0505a:1614_5: ca vippamuttoti attho. Paṭhamapādena cettha rāgadosappahānaṃ vuttaṃ, dutiyena upādānanissayābhāvo,
atk-s0505a:1614_6: tatiyena sesākusalehi akusalavatthūhi ca vippamokkho. Paṭhamena vā rāgadosappahānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1614_7: dutiyena tadupāyo, tatiyena tesaṃ pahīnattā saṃyojaniyehi vippamokkhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1615_0: 367. Pañcamagāthāya upadhīsūti khandhupadhīsu. Ādānanti ādātabbaṭṭhena teyeva vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:1615_1: Anaññaneyyoti aniccādīnaṃ sudiṭṭhattā “idaṃ seyyo”ti kenaci anetabbo. Sesaṃ uttānapadatthameva.
atk-s0505a:1615_2: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ādānesu catutthamaggena sabbaso chandarāgaṃ vinetvā so vinītachandarāgo,
atk-s0505a:1615_3: tesu upadhīsu na sārameti, sabbe upadhī asārakatteneva passati. Tato tesu duvidhenapi
atk-s0505a:1615_4: nissayena anissito aññena vā kenaci “idaṃ seyyo”ti anetabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0505a:1616_0: 368. Chaṭṭhagāthāya aviruddhoti etesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ duccaritānaṃ pahīnattā sucaritehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1616_1: aviruddho. Viditvā dhammanti maggena catusaccadhammaṃ ñatvā. Nibbānapadābhipatthayānoti
atk-s0505a:1617_0: 369. Sattamagāthāya akkuṭṭhoti dasahi akkosavatthūhi abhisatto. Na sandhiyethāti
atk-s0505a:1617_1: na upanayhetha na kuppeyya. Laddhā parabhojanaṃ na majjeti parehi dinnaṃ saddhādeyyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1617_2: labhitvā “ahaṃ ñāto yasassī lābhī”ti na majjeyya. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0505a:1618_0: 370. Aṭṭhamagāthāya lobhanti visamalobhaṃ. Bhavanti kāmabhavādibhavaṃ. Evaṃ dvīhi
atk-s0505a:1618_1: padehi bhavabhogataṇhā vuttā. Purimena vā sabbāpi taṇhā, pacchimena kammabhavo. Virato
atk-s0505a:1618_2: chedanabandhanā cāti evametesaṃ kammakilesānaṃ pahīnattā parasattachedanabandhanā
atk-s0505a:1619_0: 371. Navamagāthāya sāruppaṃ attano viditvāti attano bhikkhubhāvassa patirūpaṃ anesanādiṃ
atk-s0505a:1619_1: pahāya sammāesanādiājīvasuddhiṃ aññañca sammāpaṭipattiṃ tattha patiṭṭhahanena viditvā.
atk-s0505a:1619_2: Na hi ñātamatteneva kiñci hoti. Yathātathiyanti yathātathaṃ yathābhūtaṃ. Dhammanti
atk-s0505a:1619_3: khandhāyatanādibhedaṃ yathābhūtañāṇena, catusaccadhammaṃ vā maggena viditvā. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0505a:1620_0: 372. Dasamagāthāya so nirāso anāsisānoti yassa ariyamaggena vināsitattā anusayā ca
atk-s0505a:1620_1: na santi, akusalamūlā ca samūhatā, so nirāso nittaṇho hoti. Tato āsāya abhāvena kañci
atk-s0505a:1620_2: rūpādidhammaṃ nāsīsati. Tenāha “nirāso anāsisāno”ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:1621_2: atikkanto. Dantoti sabbadvāravisevanaṃ hitvā ariyena damathena dantabhūmiṃ patto.
atk-s0505a:1622_1: aveccappasādena samannāgato, na parassa saddhāya paṭipattiyaṃ gamanabhāvena. Yathāha
atk-s0505a:1622_2: – “na khvāhaṃ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī”ti. Sutavāti vositasutakiccattā
atk-s0505a:1622_4: sammattaniyāmabhūtassa maggassa dassāvī, diṭṭhamaggoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vaggagatesu na
atk-s0505a:1622_5: vaggasārīti vaggagatā nāma dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatikā aññamaññaṃ paṭilomattā, evaṃ vaggāhi
atk-s0505a:1622_6: diṭṭhīhi gatesu sattesu na vaggasārī – “idaṃ ucchijjissati, idaṃ tatheva bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0505a:1622_7: evaṃ diṭṭhivasena agamanato. Paṭighanti paṭighātakaṃ, cittavighātakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1623_0: 375. Terasamagāthāya saṃsuddhajinoti saṃsuddhena arahattamaggena vijitakileso. Vivaṭṭacchadoti
atk-s0505a:1623_1: vivaṭarāgadosamohachadano. Dhammesu vasīti catusaccadhammesu vasippatto. Na hissa
atk-s0505a:1623_2: sakkā te dhammā yathā ñātā kenaci aññathā kātuṃ, tena khīṇāsavo “dhammesu vasī”ti
atk-s0505a:1623_3: vuccati. Pāragūti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ gato, saupādisesavasena adhigatoti
atk-s0505a:1623_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Anejoti apagatataṇhācalano. Saṅkhāranirodhañāṇakusaloti saṅkhāranirodho
atk-s0505a:1623_5: vuccati nibbānaṃ, tamhi ñāṇaṃ ariyamaggapaññā, tattha kusalo, catukkhattuṃ bhāvitattā
atk-s0505a:1624_0: 376. Cuddasamagāthāya atītesūti pavattiṃ patvā atikkantesu pañcakkhandhesu. Anāgatesūti
atk-s0505a:1624_1: pavattiṃ appattesu pañcakkhandhesu eva. Kappātītoti “ahaṃ mama”nti kappanaṃ sabbampi
atk-s0505a:1624_2: vā taṇhādiṭṭhikappaṃ atīto. Aticca suddhipaññoti atīva suddhipañño, atikkamitvā vā
atk-s0505a:1624_3: suddhipañño. Kiṃ atikkamitvā? Addhattayaṃ. Arahā hi yvāyaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhāto
atk-s0505a:1624_4: atīto addhā, jātijarāmaraṇasaṅkhāto anāgato addhā, viññāṇādibhavapariyanto paccuppanno
atk-s0505a:1624_5: ca addhā, taṃ sabbampi atikkamma kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā paramasuddhippattapañño hutvā
atk-s0505a:1624_6: ṭhito. Tena vuccati “aticca suddhipañño”ti. Sabbāyatanehīti dvādasahāyatanehi. Arahā
atk-s0505a:1624_7: hi evaṃ kappātīto. Kappātītattā aticca suddhipaññattā ca āyatiṃ na kiñci āyatanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1625_0: 377. Pannarasamagāthāya aññāya padanti ye te “saccānaṃ caturo padā”ti vuttā, tesu
atk-s0505a:1625_1: ekekapadaṃ pubbabhāgasaccavavatthāpanapaññāya ñatvā. Samecca dhammanti tato paraṃ
atk-s0505a:1625_2: catūhi ariyamaggehi catusaccadhammaṃ samecca. Vivaṭaṃ disvāna pahānamāsavānanti atha
atk-s0505a:1625_3: paccavekkhaṇañāṇena āsavakkhayasaññitaṃ nibbānaṃ vivaṭaṃ pākaṭamanāvaṭaṃ disvā. Sabbupadhīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1625_5: katthaci asajjamāno bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya vihareyya, anallīyanto lokaṃ
atk-s0505a:1626_0: 378. Tato so nimmito dhammadesanaṃ thomento “addhā hi bhagavā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1626_1: Tattha yo so evaṃ vihārīti yo so maṅgalādīni samūhanitvā sabbamaṅgaladosappahānavihārī,
atk-s0505a:1626_2: yopi so dibbamānusakesu kāmesu rāgaṃ vineyya bhavātikkamma dhammābhisamayavihārīti
atk-s0505a:1626_3: evaṃ tāya tāya gāthāya niddiṭṭhabhikkhuṃ dassento āha. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0505a:1626_4: yojanā – addhā hi bhagavā tatheva etaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ “yassa maṅgalā samūhatā”tiādīni vatvā
atk-s0505a:1626_5: tassā tassā gāthāya pariyosāne “sammā so loke paribbajeyyā”ti avaca. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
atk-s0505a:1626_6: Yo so evaṃvihārī bhikkhu, so uttamena damathena danto, sabbāni ca dasapi saṃyojanāni
atk-s0505a:1626_7: caturo ca yoge vītivatto hoti. Tasmā sammā so loke paribbajeyya, natthi me ettha
atk-s0505a:1626_8: vicikicchāti iti desanāthomanagāthampi vatvā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1631_0: Evaṃ me sutanti dhammikasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Tiṭṭhamāne kira bhagavati lokanāthe dhammiko
atk-s0505a:1631_1: nāma upāsako ahosi nāmena ca paṭipattiyā ca. So kira saraṇasampanno sīlasampanno
atk-s0505a:1631_2: bahussuto piṭakattayadharo anāgāmī abhiññālābhī ākāsacārī ahosi. Tassa parivārā pañcasatā
atk-s0505a:1631_3: upāsakā, tepi tādisā eva ahesuṃ. Tassekadivasaṃ uposathikassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa
atk-s0505a:1631_5: paṭipadaṃ puccheyya”nti. So pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0505a:1631_6: tamatthaṃ pucchi, bhagavā cassa byākāsi. Tattha pubbe vaṇṇitasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0505a:1632_0: 379. Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva kathaṃkaroti kathaṃ karonto kathaṃ paṭipajjanto.
atk-s0505a:1632_1: Sādhu hotīti sundaro anavajjo atthasādhano hoti. Upāsakāseti upāsakāicceva vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1632_2: hoti. Sesamatthato pākaṭameva. Ayaṃ pana yojanā – yo vā agārā anagārameti pabbajati,
atk-s0505a:1632_3: ye vā agārino upāsakā, etesu duvidhesu sāvakesu kathaṃkaro sāvako sādhu hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1633_0: 380-1. Idāni evaṃ puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇasamatthataṃ dīpento “tuvañhī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1633_1: Tattha gatinti ajjhāsayagatiṃ. Parāyaṇanti nipphattiṃ. Atha vā gatinti nirayādipañcappabhedaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1633_2: Parāyaṇanti gatito paraṃ ayanaṃ gativippamokkhaṃ parinibbānaṃ, na catthi tulyoti
atk-s0505a:1633_3: tayā sadiso natthi. Sabbaṃ tuvaṃ ñāṇamavecca dhammaṃ, pakāsesi satte anukampamānoti
atk-s0505a:1633_4: tvaṃ bhagavā yadatthi ñeyyaṃ nāma, taṃ anavasesaṃ avecca paṭivijjhitvā satte anukampamāno
atk-s0505a:1633_5: sabbaṃ ñāṇañca dhammañca pakāsesi. Yaṃ yaṃ yassa hitaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ tassa āvikāsiyeva
atk-s0505a:1633_6: desesiyeva, na te atthi ācariyamuṭṭhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Virocasi vimaloti dhūmarajādivirahito
atk-s0505a:1633_7: viya cando, rāgādimalābhāvena vimalo virocasi. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0505a:1634_0: 382. Idāni yesaṃ tadā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, te devaputte kittetvā bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0505a:1634_1: “āgañchī te santike”ti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha nāgarājā erāvaṇo nāmāti ayaṃ kira erāvaṇo
atk-s0505a:1634_2: nāma devaputto kāmarūpī dibbe vimāne vasati. So yadā sakko uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:1634_3: tadā diyaḍḍhasatayojanaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminitvā tettiṃsa kumbhe māpetvā erāvaṇo nāma
atk-s0505a:1634_4: hatthī hoti. Tassa ekekasmiṃ kumbhe dve dve dantā honti, ekekasmiṃ dante satta satta
atk-s0505a:1634_5: pokkharaṇiyo, ekekissā pokkharaṇiyā satta satta paduminiyo, ekekissā paduminiyā satta
atk-s0505a:1634_6: satta pupphāni, ekekasmiṃ pupphe satta satta pattāni, ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta
atk-s0505a:1634_7: accharāyo naccanti padumaccharāyotveva vissutā sakkassa nāṭakitthiyo, yā ca vimānavatthusmimpi
atk-s0505a:1634_8: “bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā”ti āgatā. Tesaṃ pana tettisaṃkumbhānaṃ majjhe sudassanakumbho
atk-s0505a:1634_9: nāma tiṃsayojanamatto hoti, tattha yojanappamāṇo maṇipallaṅko tiyojanubbedhe pupphamaṇḍape
atk-s0505a:1634_10: attharīyati. Tattha sakko devānamindo accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbasampattiṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0505a:1634_11: Sakke pana devānaminde uyyānakīḷāto paṭinivatte puna taṃ rūpaṃ saṃharitvāna devaputtova
atk-s0505a:1634_12: hoti. Taṃ sandhāyāha – “āgañchi te santike nāgarājā erāvaṇo nāmā”ti. Jinoti sutvāti
atk-s0505a:1634_13: “vijitapāpadhammo esa bhagavā”ti evaṃ sutvā. Sopi tayā mantayitvāti tayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1634_14: mantayitvā, pañhaṃ pucchitvāti adhippāyo. Ajjhagamāti adhiagamā, gatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1634_15: Sādhūti sutvāna patītarūpoti taṃ pañhaṃ sutvā “sādhu bhante”ti abhinanditvā tuṭṭharūpo gatoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1635_0: 383. Rājāpi taṃ vessavaṇo kuveroti ettha so yakkho rañjanaṭṭhena rājā, visāṇāya rājadhāniyā
atk-s0505a:1635_1: rajjaṃ kāretīti vessavaṇo, purimanāmena kuveroti veditabbo. So kira kuvero nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo
atk-s0505a:1635_2: hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā visāṇāya rājadhāniyā adhipati hutvā nibbatto. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:1636: “Kuverassa kho pana, mārisa, mahārājassa visāṇā nāma rājadhānī, tasmā kuvero mahārājā ‘vessavaṇo’ti pavuccatī”ti –
atk-s0505a:1638_0: Tattha siyā – kasmā pana dūratare tāvatiṃsabhavane vasanto erāvaṇo paṭhamaṃ āgato,
atk-s0505a:1638_1: vessavaṇo pacchā, ekanagareva vasanto ayaṃ upāsako sabbapacchā, kathañca so tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1638_2: āgamanaṃ aññāsi, yena evamāhāti? Vuccate – vessavaṇo kira tadā anekasahassapavāḷapallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0505a:1638_3: dvādasayojanaṃ nārivāhanaṃ abhiruyha pavāḷakuntaṃ uccāretvā dasasahassakoṭiyakkhehi
atk-s0505a:1638_4: parivuto “bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni pariharitvā maggena
atk-s0505a:1638_5: maggaṃ āgacchanto veḷukaṇḍakanagare nandamātāya upāsikāya nivesanassa uparibhāgaṃ
atk-s0505a:1638_6: sampatto. Upāsikāya ayamānubhāvo – parisuddhasīlā hoti, niccaṃ vikālabhojanā paṭiviratā,
atk-s0505a:1638_7: piṭakattayadhārinī, anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhitā. Sā tamhi samaye sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā
atk-s0505a:1638_8: utuggahaṇatthāya māluteritokāse ṭhatvā aṭṭhakapārāyanavagge parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi
atk-s0505a:1638_9: madhurena sarena bhāsati. Vessavaṇo tattheva yānāni ṭhapetvā yāva upāsikā “idamavoca
atk-s0505a:1638_10: bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye paricārakasoḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇāna”nti nigamanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1638_11: abhāsi, tāva sabbaṃ sutvā vaggapariyosāne suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ mahantaṃ gīvaṃ paggahetvā
atk-s0505a:1638_12: “sādhu sādhu bhaginī”ti sādhukāramadāsi. Sā “ko etthā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ bhagini vessavaṇo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1638_13: Upāsikā kira paṭhamaṃ sotāpannā ahosi, pacchā vessavaṇo. Taṃ so dhammato sahodarabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:1638_14: sandhāya upāsikaṃ bhaginivādena samudācarati. Upāsikāya ca “vikālo, bhātika bhadramukha,
atk-s0505a:1638_15: yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasī”ti vutto “ahaṃ bhagini tayi pasanno pasannākāraṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0505a:1638_16: āha. Tena hi bhadramukha, mama khette nipphannaṃ sāliṃ kammakarā āharituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0505a:1638_17: taṃ tava parisāya āṇāpehīti. So “sādhu bhaginī”ti yakkhe āṇāpesi. Te aḍḍhaterasa
atk-s0505a:1638_18: koṭṭhāgārasatāni pūresuṃ. Tato pabhuti koṭṭhāgāraṃ ūnaṃ nāma nāhosi, “nandamātu koṭṭhāgāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1638_19: viyā”ti loke nidassanaṃ ahosi. Vessavaṇo koṭṭhāgārāni pūretvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0505a:1638_20: Bhagavā “vikāle āgatosī”ti āha. Atha bhagavato sabbaṃ ārocesi. Iminā kāraṇena āsannatarepi
atk-s0505a:1638_21: cātumahārājikabhavane vasanto vessavaṇo pacchā āgato. Erāvaṇassa pana na kiñci antarā
atk-s0505a:1638_22: karaṇīyaṃ ahosi, tena so paṭhamataraṃ āgato.
atk-s0505a:1639_0: Ayaṃ pana upāsako kiñcāpi anāgāmī pakatiyāva ekabhattiko, tathāpi tadā uposathadivasoti
atk-s0505a:1639_1: katvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sāyanhasamayaṃ sunivattho supāruto pañcasataupāsakaparivuto
atk-s0505a:1639_2: jetavanaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā attano gharaṃ āgamma tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ saraṇasīlauposathānisaṃsādibhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:1639_3: upāsakadhammaṃ kathetvā te upāsake uyyojesi. Tesañca tasseva ghare muṭṭhihatthappamāṇapādakāni
atk-s0505a:1639_4: pañca kappiyamañcasatāni pāṭekkovarakesu paññattāni honti. Te attano attano ovarakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1639_5: pavisitvā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu, upāsakopi tathevākāsi. Tena ca samayena sāvatthinagare
atk-s0505a:1639_6: sattapaññāsa kulasatasahassāni vasanti, manussagaṇanāya aṭṭhārasakoṭimanussā. Tena
atk-s0505a:1639_7: paṭhamayāme hatthiassamanussabherisaddādīhi sāvatthinagaraṃ mahāsamuddo viya ekasaddaṃ
atk-s0505a:1639_8: hoti. Majjhimayāmasamanantare so saddo paṭippassambhati. Tamhi kāle upāsako samāpattito
atk-s0505a:1639_9: vuṭṭhāya attano guṇe āvajjetvā “yenāhaṃ maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhito viharāmi,
atk-s0505a:1639_10: idaṃ sukhaṃ kaṃ nissāya laddha”nti cintetvā “bhagavantaṃ nissāyā”ti bhagavati cittaṃ
atk-s0505a:1639_11: pasādetvā “bhagavā etarahi katamena vihārena viharatī”ti āvajjento dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0505a:1639_12: erāvaṇavessavaṇe disvā dibbāya sotadhātuyā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā cetopariyañāṇena tesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1639_13: pasannacittataṃ ñatvā “yaṃnūnāhampi bhagavantaṃ ubhayahitaṃ paṭipadaṃ puccheyya”nti
atk-s0505a:1639_14: cintesi. Tasmā so ekanagare vasantopi sabbapacchā āgato, evañca nesaṃ āgamanaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0505a:1639_15: Tenāha – “āgañchi te santike nāgarājā…pe… so cāpi sutvāna patītarūpo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1640_0: 384. Idāni ito bahiddhā lokasammatehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi ukkaṭṭhabhāvena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1640_1: pasaṃsanto “ye kecime”ti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha titthiyāti nandavacchasaṃkiccehi
atk-s0505a:1640_2: ādipuggalehi tīhi titthakarehi kate diṭṭhititthe jātā, tesaṃ sāsane pabbajitā pūraṇādayo
atk-s0505a:1640_3: cha satthāro. Tattha nāṭaputto nigaṇṭho, avasesā ājīvakāti te sabbe dassento āha
atk-s0505a:1640_4: “ye kecime titthiyā vādasīlā”ti, “mayaṃ sammā paṭipannā, aññe micchā paṭipannā”ti
atk-s0505a:1640_5: evaṃ vādakaraṇasīlā lokaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā vicaranti. Ājīvakā vāti te ekajjhamuddiṭṭhe
atk-s0505a:1640_6: bhinditvā dasseti. Nātitarantīti nātikkamanti. Sabbeti aññepi ye keci titthiyasāvakādayo,
atk-s0505a:1640_7: tepi pariggaṇhanto āha. “Ṭhito vajantaṃ viyā”ti yathā koci ṭhito gativikalo sīghagāminaṃ
atk-s0505a:1640_8: purisaṃ gacchantaṃ nātitareyya, evaṃ te paññāgatiyā abhāvena te te atthappabhede
atk-s0505a:1640_9: bujjhituṃ asakkontā ṭhitā, atijavanapaññaṃ bhagavantaṃ nātitarantīti attho.
atk-s0505a:1641_0: 385. Brāhmaṇā vādasīlā vuddhā cāti ettāvatā caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātijāṇussoṇiādayo
atk-s0505a:1641_1: dasseti, api brāhmaṇā santi kecīti iminā majjhimāpi daharāpi kevalaṃ brāhmaṇā santi
atk-s0505a:1641_3: Atthabaddhāti “api nu kho imaṃ pañhaṃ byākareyya, imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindeyyā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1641_4: atthabaddhā bhavanti. Ye cāpi aññeti aññepi ye “mayaṃ vādino”ti evaṃ maññamānā vicaranti
atk-s0505a:1641_5: khattiyapaṇḍitabrāhmaṇabrahmadevayakkhādayo aparimāṇā. Tepi sabbe tayi atthabaddhā bhavantīti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1642_0: 386-7. Evaṃ nānappakārehi bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsitvā idāni dhammeneva taṃ pasaṃsitvā
atk-s0505a:1642_1: dhammakathaṃ yācanto “ayañhi dhammo”ti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha ayañhi dhammoti sattatiṃsa
atk-s0505a:1642_2: bodhipakkhiyadhamme sandhāyāha. Nipuṇoti saṇho duppaṭivijjho. Sukhoti paṭividdho
atk-s0505a:1642_3: samāno lokuttarasukhamāvahati, tasmā sukhāvahattā “sukho”ti vuccati. Suppavuttoti
atk-s0505a:1642_4: sudesito. Sussūsamānāti sotukāmamhāti attho. Taṃ no vadāti taṃ dhammaṃ amhākaṃ vada.
atk-s0505a:1642_5: “Tvaṃ no”tipi pāṭho, tvaṃ amhākaṃ vadāti attho. Sabbepime bhikkhavoti taṅkhaṇaṃ nisinnāni
atk-s0505a:1642_6: kira pañca bhikkhusatāni honti, tāni dassento yācati. Upāsakā cāpīti attano parivāre
atk-s0505a:1643_0: 388. Atha bhagavā anagāriyapaṭipadaṃ tāva dassetuṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā “suṇātha me
atk-s0505a:1643_1: bhikkhavo”tiādimāha. Tattha dhammaṃ dhutaṃ tañca carātha sabbeti kilese dhunātīti
atk-s0505a:1643_2: dhuto, evarūpaṃ kilesadhunanakaṃ paṭipadādhammaṃ sāvayāmi vo, tañca mayā sāvitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1643_3: sabbe caratha paṭipajjatha, mā pamāditthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Iriyāpathanti gamanādicatubbidhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1643_5: pavattamevāti apare. Sevetha nanti taṃ iriyāpathaṃ bhajeyya. Atthadasoti hitānupassī.
atk-s0505a:1644_0: 389. No ve vikāleti evaṃ pabbajitānulomikaṃ iriyāpathaṃ sevamāno ca divāmajjhanhikavītikkamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1644_1: upādāya vikāle na careyya bhikkhu, yuttakāle eva pana gāmaṃ piṇḍāya careyya. Kiṃ
atk-s0505a:1644_2: kāraṇaṃ? Akālacāriñhi sajanti saṅgā, akālacāriṃ puggalaṃ rāgasaṅgādayo aneke saṅgā
atk-s0505a:1644_3: sajanti parissajanti upaguhanti allīyanti. Tasmā vikāle na caranti buddhā, tasmā
atk-s0505a:1644_4: ye catusaccabuddhā ariyapuggalā, na te vikāle piṇḍāya carantīti. Tena kira samayena
atk-s0505a:1644_5: vikālabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ appaññattaṃ hoti, tasmā dhammadesanāvasenevettha puthujjanānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1644_6: ādīnavaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha. Ariyā pana saha maggapaṭilābhā eva tato paṭiviratā
atk-s0505a:1645_0: 390. Evaṃ vikālacariyaṃ paṭisedhetvā “kāle carantenapi evaṃ caritabba”nti dassento
atk-s0505a:1645_1: āha “rūpā ca saddā cā”ti. Tassattho – ye te rūpādayo nānappakārakaṃ madaṃ janentā
atk-s0505a:1645_2: satte sammadayanti, tesu piṇḍapātapārisuddhisuttādīsu vuttanayena chandaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0505a:1645_3: yuttakāleneva pātarāsaṃ paviseyyāti. Ettha ca pāto asitabboti pātarāso, piṇḍapātassetaṃ
atk-s0505a:1645_4: nāmaṃ. Yo yattha labbhati, so padesopi taṃ yogena “pātarāso”ti idha vutto. Yato piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0505a:1645_5: labhati, taṃ okāsaṃ gaccheyyāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1651_0: Tattha piṇḍanti missakabhikkhaṃ, sā hi tato tato samodhānetvā sampiṇḍitaṭṭhena “piṇḍo”ti
atk-s0505a:1651_1: vuccati. Samayenāti antomajjhanhikakāle. Eko paṭikkammāti kāyavivekaṃ sampādento
atk-s0505a:1651_2: adutiyo nivattitvā. Ajjhattacintīti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā khandhasantānaṃ cintento.
atk-s0505a:1651_3: Na mano bahiddhā nicchārayeti bahiddhā rūpādīsu rāgavasena cittaṃ na nīhare. Saṅgahitattabhāvoti suṭṭhu gahitacitto.
atk-s0505a:1657_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? So yogāvacaro kiñcideva sotukāmatāya upagatena sāvakena vā kenaci
atk-s0505a:1657_1: aññatitthiyagahaṭṭhādinā vā idheva pabbajitena bhikkhunā vā saddhiṃ sacepi sallape,
atk-s0505a:1657_2: atha yvāyaṃ maggaphalādipaṭisaṃyutto dasakathāvatthubhedo vā atappakaṭṭhena paṇīto
atk-s0505a:1657_3: dhammo. Taṃ dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ udāhareyya, aññaṃ pana pisuṇavacanaṃ vā parūpavādaṃ vā
atk-s0505a:1658_0: 393. Idāni tasmiṃ parūpavāde dosaṃ dassento āha “vādañhi eke”ti. Tassattho – idhekacce
atk-s0505a:1658_1: moghapurisā parūpavādasañhitaṃ nānappakāraṃ viggāhikakathābhedaṃ vādaṃ paṭiseniyanti
atk-s0505a:1658_2: virujjhanti, yujjhitukāmā hutvā senāya paṭimukhaṃ gacchantā viya honti, te mayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1658_3: lāmakapaññe na pasaṃsāma. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Tato tato ne pasajanti saṅgā, yasmā te tādisake
atk-s0505a:1658_4: puggale tato tato vacanapathato samuṭṭhāya vivādasaṅgā sajanti allīyanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā
atk-s0505a:1658_5: sajantīti? Cittañhi te tattha gamenti dūre, yasmā te paṭiseniyantā cittaṃ tattha
atk-s0505a:1658_6: gamenti, yattha gataṃ samathavipassanānaṃ dūre hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1659_0: 394-5. Evaṃ parittapaññānaṃ pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni mahāpaññānaṃ pavattiṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:1659_1: āha “piṇḍaṃ vihāraṃ…pe… sāvako”ti. Tattha vihārena patissayo, sayanāsanena mañcapīṭhanti
atk-s0505a:1659_2: tīhipi padehi senāsanameva vuttaṃ. Āpanti udakaṃ. Saṅghāṭirajūpavāhananti paṃsumalādino
atk-s0505a:1659_3: saṅghāṭirajassa dhovanaṃ. Sutvāna dhammaṃ sugatena desitanti sabbāsavasaṃvarādīsu
atk-s0505a:1659_4: “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā
atk-s0505a:1659_5: desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā. Saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvakoti etaṃ idha piṇḍanti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1659_6: piṇḍapātaṃ, vihārādīhi vuttaṃ senāsanaṃ, āpamukhena dassitaṃ gilānapaccayaṃ, saṅghāṭiyā
atk-s0505a:1659_7: cīvaranti catubbidhampi paccayaṃ saṅkhāya “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:1659_8: nayena paccavekkhitvā seve varapaññasāvako, sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya varapaññassa tathāgatassa
atk-s0505a:1659_9: sāvako sekkho vā puthujjano vā, nippariyāyena ca arahā. So hi caturāpasseno “saṅkhāyekaṃ
atk-s0505a:1659_10: paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī”ti
atk-s0505a:1659_11: vutto. Yassā ca saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvako, tasmā hi piṇḍe…pe… yathā pokkhare
atk-s0505a:1660_0: 396. Evaṃ khīṇāsavapaṭipattiṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena anagāriyapaṭipadaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0505a:1660_1: idāni agāriyapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “gahaṭṭhavattaṃ pana vo”tiādimāha. Tattha paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0505a:1660_2: tāva sāvakoti agāriyasāvako. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Ayaṃ pana yojanā – yo mayā ito
atk-s0505a:1660_3: pubbe kevalo abyāmisso sakalo paripuṇṇo bhikkhudhammo kathito. Esa khettavatthuādipariggahehi
atk-s0505a:1660_4: sapariggahena na labbhā phassetuṃ na sakkā adhigantunti.
atk-s0505a:1661_0: 397. Evaṃ tassa bhikkhudhammaṃ paṭisedhetvā gahaṭṭhadhammameva dassento āha “pāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1661_1: na hane”ti. Tattha purimaḍḍhena tikoṭiparisuddhā pāṇātipātāveramaṇi vuttā, pacchimaḍḍhena
atk-s0505a:1661_2: sattesu hitapaṭipatti. Tatiyapādo cettha khaggavisāṇasutte catutthapāde thāvaratasabhedo
atk-s0505a:1661_3: mettasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ sabbappakārato vaṇṇito. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Uppaṭipāṭiyā pana
atk-s0505a:1661_4: yojanā kātabbā – tasathāvaresu sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ na hane na ghātayeyya
atk-s0505a:1661_5: nānujaññāti. “Nidhāya daṇḍa”nti ito vā paraṃ “vatteyyā”ti pāṭhaseso āharitabbo. Itarathā
atk-s0505a:1662_0: 398. Evaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā idāni dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ dassento āha “tato
atk-s0505a:1662_1: adinna”nti. Tattha kiñcīti appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā. Kvacīti gāme vā araññe vā. Sāvakoti
atk-s0505a:1662_2: agāriyasāvako. Bujjhamānoti “parasantakamida”nti jānamāno. Sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjayeyyāti
atk-s0505a:1662_3: evañhi paṭipajjamāno sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjeyya, no aññathāti dīpeti. Sesamettha
atk-s0505a:1663: 399. Evaṃ dutiyasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato pabhuti tatiyaṃ dassento āha “abrahmacariya”nti. Tattha asambhuṇantoti asakkonto.
atk-s0505a:1664: 400. Idāni catutthasikkhāpadaṃ dassento āha “sabhaggato vā”ti. Tattha sabhaggatoti santhāgārādigato. Parisaggatoti pūgamajjagato. Sesamettha vuttanayañca pākaṭañcāti.
atk-s0505a:1665_0: 401. Evaṃ catutthasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā pañcamaṃ dassento āha
atk-s0505a:1665_1: “majjañca pāna”nti. Tattha majjañca pānanti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1665_2: panattho “majjapānañca na samācareyyā”ti. Dhammaṃ imanti imaṃ majjapānaveramaṇīdhammaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1665_3: Ummādanantanti ummādanapariyosānaṃ. Yo hi sabbalahuko majjapānassa vipāko, so manussabhūtassa
atk-s0505a:1665_4: ummattakasaṃvattaniko hoti. Iti naṃ viditvāti iti naṃ majjapānaṃ ñatvā. Sesamettha
atk-s0505a:1666_0: 402. Evaṃ pañcamasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā idāni purimasikkhāpadānampi
atk-s0505a:1666_1: majjapānameva saṃkilesakarañca bhedakarañca dassetvā daḷhataraṃ tato veramaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1666_2: niyojento āha “madā hi pāpāni karontī”ti. Tattha madāti madahetu. Hikāro padapūraṇamatte
atk-s0505a:1666_3: nipāto. Pāpāni karontīti pāṇātipātādīni sabbākusalāni karonti. Ummādanaṃ mohananti
atk-s0505a:1666_4: paraloke ummādanaṃ ihaloke mohanaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0505a:1667_0: 403-4. Ettāvatā agāriyasāvakassa niccasīlaṃ dassetvā idāni uposathaṅgāni dassento
atk-s0505a:1667_1: “pāṇaṃ na hane”ti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha abrahmacariyāti aseṭṭhacariyabhūtā. Methunāti
atk-s0505a:1667_2: methunadhammasamāpattito. Rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojananti rattimpi na bhuñjeyya,
atk-s0505a:1667_3: divāpi kālātikkantabhojanaṃ na bhuñjeyya. Na ca gandhanti ettha gandhaggahaṇena vilepanacuṇṇādīnipi
atk-s0505a:1667_4: gahitānevāti veditabbāni. Mañceti kappiyamañce. Santhateti taṭṭikādīhi kappiyattharaṇehi
atk-s0505a:1667_5: atthate. Chamāyaṃ pana gonakādisanthatāyapi vaṭṭati. Aṭṭhaṅgikanti pañcaṅgikaṃ viya
atk-s0505a:1667_6: tūriyaṃ, na aṅgavinimuttaṃ. Dukkhantagunāti vaṭṭadukkhassa antagatena. Sesamettha
atk-s0505a:1667_7: pākaṭameva. Pacchimaḍḍhuṃ pana saṅgītikārakehi vuttantipi āhu.
atk-s0505a:1668_0: 405. Evaṃ uposathaṅgāni dassetvā idāni uposathakālaṃ dassento āha “tato ca pakkhassā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1668_1: Tattha tatoti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Pakkhassupavassuposathanti evaṃ parapadena
atk-s0505a:1668_2: yojetabbaṃ “pakkhassa cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhaminti ete tayo divase upavassa uposathaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1668_3: etaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikauposathaṃ upagamma vasitvā”ti. Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti ettha pana vassūpanāyikāya
atk-s0505a:1668_4: purimabhāge āsāḷhamāso, antovassaṃ tayo māsā, kattikamāsoti ime pañca māsā “pāṭihāriyapakkho”ti
atk-s0505a:1668_5: vuccanti. Āsāḷhakattikaphagguṇamāsā tayo evāti apare. Pakkhuposathadivasānaṃ purimapacchimadivasavasena
atk-s0505a:1668_6: pakkhe pakkhe terasīpāṭipadasattamīnavamīsaṅkhātā cattāro cattāro divasāti apare.
atk-s0505a:1668_7: Yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ. Sabbaṃ vā pana puññakāmīnaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ. Evametaṃ pāṭihāriyapakkhañca
atk-s0505a:1668_8: pasannamānaso susamattarūpaṃ suparipuṇṇarūpaṃ ekampi divasaṃ apariccajanto aṭṭhaṅgupetaṃ
atk-s0505a:1669_0: 406. Evaṃ uposathakālaṃ dassetvā idāni tesu kālesu etaṃ uposathaṃ upavassa yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1669_1: taṃ dassento āha “tato ca pāto”ti. Etthāpi tatoti padapūraṇamatte nipāto, anantaratthe
atk-s0505a:1669_2: vā, athāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pātoti aparajjudivasapubbabhāge. Upavutthuposathoti upavasitauposatho.
atk-s0505a:1669_3: Annenāti yāgubhattādinā. Pānenāti aṭṭhavidhapānena. Anumodamānoti anupamodamāno,
atk-s0505a:1669_4: nirantaraṃ modamānoti attho. Yathārahanti attano anurūpena, yathāsatti yathābalanti
atk-s0505a:1669_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃvibhajethāti bhājeyya patimāneyya. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:1670_0: 407. Evaṃ upavutthuposathassa kiccaṃ vatvā idāni yāvajīvikaṃ garuvattaṃ ājīvapārisuddhiñca
atk-s0505a:1670_1: kathetvā tāya paṭipadāya adhigantabbaṭṭhānaṃ dassento āha “dhammena mātāpitaro”ti.
atk-s0505a:1670_2: Tattha dhammenāti dhammaladdhena bhogena. Bhareyyāti poseyya. Dhammikaṃ so vaṇijjanti
atk-s0505a:1670_3: sattavaṇijjā, satthavaṇijjā, visavaṇijjā, maṃsavaṇijjā, surāvaṇijjāti imā pañca adhammavaṇijjā
atk-s0505a:1670_4: vajjetvā avasesā dhammikavaṇijjā. Vaṇijjāmukhena cettha kasigorakkhādi aparopi dhammiko
atk-s0505a:1670_5: vohāro saṅgahito. Sesamuttānatthameva. Ayaṃ pana yojanā – so niccasīlauposathasīladānadhammasamannāgato
atk-s0505a:1670_6: ariyasāvako payojaye dhammikaṃ vaṇijjaṃ, tato laddhena ca dhammato anapetattā dhammena
atk-s0505a:1670_7: bhogena mātāpitaro bhareyya. Atha so gihī evaṃ appamatto ādito pabhuti vuttaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0505a:1670_8: vattaṃ vattayanto kāyassa bhedā ye te attano ābhāya andhakāraṃ vidhametvā ālokakaraṇena
atk-s0505a:1670_9: sayampabhāti laddhanāmā cha kāmāvacaradevā, te sayampabhe nāma deve upeti bhajati
atk-s0505a:1673: Niṭṭhito ca dutiyo vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
atk-s0505a:1677_0: 408. Pabbajjaṃ kittayissāmīti pabbajjāsuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1677_1: viharante āyasmato ānandassa parivitakko udapādi – “sāriputtādīnaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1677_2: pabbajjā kittitā, taṃ bhikkhū ca upāsakā ca jānanti. Bhagavato pana akittitā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1677_3: kitteyya”nti. So jetavanavihāre āsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0505a:1678_0: Tattha yasmā pabbajjaṃ kittentena yathā pabbaji, taṃ kittetabbaṃ. Yathā ca pabbaji,
atk-s0505a:1678_1: taṃ kittentena yathā vīmaṃsamāno pabbajjaṃ rocesi, taṃ kittetabbaṃ. Tasmā “pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:1678_2: kittayissāmī”ti vatvā “yathā pabbajī”tiādimāha. Cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā
atk-s0505a:1679_0: 409. Idāni “yathā vīmaṃsamāno”ti tamatthaṃ pakāsento āha “sambādhoya”nti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1679_1: sambādhoti puttadārādisampīḷanena kilesasampīḷanena ca kusalakiriyāya okāsarahito.
atk-s0505a:1679_2: Rajassāyatananti kambojādayo viya assādīnaṃ, rāgādirajassa uppattideso. Abbhokāsoti
atk-s0505a:1679_3: vuttasambādhapaṭipakkhabhāvena ākāso viya vivaṭā. Iti disvāna pabbajīti iti gharāvāsapabbajjāsu
atk-s0505a:1679_4: byādhijarāmaraṇehi suṭṭhutaraṃ codiyamānahadayo ādīnavamānisaṃsañca vīmaṃsitvā, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1679_5: nikkhamitvā, anomānadītīre khaggena kese chinditvā, tāvadeva ca dvaṅgulamattasaṇṭhitasamaṇasāruppakesamassu
atk-s0505a:1679_6: hutvā ghaṭikārena brahmunā upanīte aṭṭha parikkhāre gahetvā “evaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ pārupitabba”nti
atk-s0505a:1679_7: kenaci ananusiṭṭho anekajātisahassapavattitena attano pabbajjāciṇṇeneva sikkhāpiyamāno
atk-s0505a:1679_8: pabbaji. Ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ekaṃ cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā
atk-s0505a:1679_9: mattikāpattaṃ aṃse ālaggetvā pabbajitavesaṃ adhiṭṭhāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-s0505a:1680_0: 410. Evaṃ bhagavato pabbajjaṃ kittetvā tato paraṃ pabbajitapaṭipattiṃ anomānadītīraṃ
atk-s0505a:1680_1: hitvā padhānāya gamanañca pakāsetuṃ “pabbajitvāna kāyenā”tiādiṃ sabbamabhāsi. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1680_2: kāyena pāpakammaṃ vivajjayīti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ vajjesi. Vacīduccaritanti catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1680_3: vacīduccaritaṃ. Ājīvaṃ parisodhayīti micchājīvaṃ hitvā sammājīvameva pavattayi.
atk-s0505a:1681_0: 411. Evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ sodhetvā anomānadītīrato tiṃsayojanappamāṇaṃ sattāhena
atk-s0505a:1681_1: agamā rājagahaṃ buddho. Tattha kiñcāpi yadā rājagahaṃ agamāsi, tadā buddho na hoti,
atk-s0505a:1681_2: tathāpi buddhassa pubbacariyāti katvā evaṃ vattuṃ labbhati – “idha rājā jāto, idha
atk-s0505a:1681_3: rajjaṃ aggahesī”tiādi lokiyavohāravacanaṃ viya. Magadhānanti magadhānaṃ janapadassa
atk-s0505a:1681_4: nagaranti vuttaṃ hoti. Giribbajanti idampi tassa nāmaṃ. Tañhi paṇḍavagijjhakūṭavebhāraisigilivepullanāmakānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1681_5: pañcannaṃ girīnaṃ majjhe vajo viya ṭhitaṃ, tasmā “giribbaja”nti vuccati. Piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:1681_6: abhihāresīti bhikkhatthāya tasmiṃ nagare cari. So kira nagaradvāre ṭhatvā cintesi
atk-s0505a:1681_7: – “sacāhaṃ rañño bimbisārassa attano āgamanaṃ nivedeyyaṃ, ‘suddhodanassa putto siddhattho
atk-s0505a:1681_8: nāma kumāro āgato’ti bahumpi me paccayaṃ abhihareyya. Na kho pana me taṃ patirūpaṃ
atk-s0505a:1681_9: pabbajitassa ārocetvā paccayagahaṇaṃ, handāhaṃ piṇḍāya carāmī”ti devadattiyaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0505a:1681_10: pārupitvā mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā anugharaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:1681_11: acari. Tenāha āyasmā ānando – “piṇḍāya abhihāresī”ti. Ākiṇṇavaralakkhaṇoti sarīre
atk-s0505a:1681_12: ākiritvā viya ṭhapitavaralakkhaṇo vipulavaralakkhaṇo vā. Vipulampi hi “ākiṇṇa”nti
atk-s0505a:1681_13: vuccati. Yathāha – “ākiṇṇaluddo puriso, dhāticelaṃva makkhito”ti. Vipulaluddoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1682_0: 412. Tamaddasāti tato kira purimāni satta divasāni nagare nakkhattaṃ ghositaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1682_1: Taṃ divasaṃ pana “nakkhattaṃ vītivattaṃ, kammantā payojetabbā”ti bheri cari. Atha
atk-s0505a:1682_2: mahājano rājaṅgaṇe sannipati. Rājāpi “kammantaṃ saṃvidahissāmī”ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0505a:1682_3: balakāyaṃ passanto taṃ piṇḍāya abhihārentaṃ mahāsattaṃ addasa. Tenāha āyasmā ānando
atk-s0505a:1682_4: – “tamaddasā bimbisāro, pāsādasmiṃ patiṭṭhito”ti. Imamatthaṃ abhāsathāti imaṃ atthaṃ amaccānaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1683_0: 413. Idāni taṃ tesaṃ amaccānaṃ bhāsitamatthaṃ dassento āha – “imaṃ bhonto”ti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1683_1: imanti so rājā bodhisattaṃ dasseti, bhontoti amacce ālapati. Nisāmethāti passatha.
atk-s0505a:1683_2: Abhirūpoti dassanīyaṅgapaccaṅgo. Brahmāti ārohapariṇāhasampanno. Sucīti parisuddhachavivaṇṇo.
atk-s0505a:1684_0: 414-5. Nīcakulāmivāti nīcakulā iva pabbajito na hotīti attho. Makāro padasandhikaro.
atk-s0505a:1684_1: Kuhiṃ bhikkhu gamissatīti ayaṃ bhikkhu kuhiṃ gamissati, ajja kattha vasissatīti jānituṃ
atk-s0505a:1684_2: rājadūtā sīghaṃ gacchantu. Dassanakāmā hi mayaṃ assāti iminā adhippāyena āha. Guttadvāro
atk-s0505a:1684_3: okkhittacakkhutāya, susaṃvuto satiyā. Guttadvāro vā satiyā, susaṃvuto pāsādikena
atk-s0505a:1685_0: 416. Khippaṃ pattaṃ apūresīti sampajānattā patissatattā ca adhikaṃ agaṇhanto “alaṃ
atk-s0505a:1685_1: ettāvatā”ti ajjhāsayapūraṇena khippaṃ pattaṃ apūresi. Munīti monatthāya paṭipannattā
atk-s0505a:1685_2: appattamunibhāvopi muniicceva vutto, lokavohārena vā. Lokiyā hi amonasampattampi
atk-s0505a:1685_3: pabbajitaṃ “munī”ti bhaṇanti. Paṇḍavaṃ abhihāresīti taṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhi. So kira
atk-s0505a:1685_4: manusse pucchi “imasmiṃ nagare pabbajitā kattha vasantī”ti. Athassa te “paṇḍavassa
atk-s0505a:1685_5: upari puratthābhimukhapabbhāre”ti ārocesuṃ. Tasmā tameva paṇḍavaṃ abhihāresi “ettha
atk-s0505a:1686_0: 419-23. Byagghusabhova sīhova girigabbhareti giriguhāyaṃ byaggho viya usabho viya
atk-s0505a:1686_1: sīho viya ca nisinnoti attho. Ete hi tayo seṭṭhā vigatabhayabheravā girigabbhare
atk-s0505a:1686_2: nisīdanti, tasmā evaṃ upamaṃ akāsi. Bhaddayānenāti hatthiassarathasivikādinā uttamayānena.
atk-s0505a:1686_3: Sayānabhūmiṃ yāyitvāti yāvatikā bhūmi hatthiassādinā yānena sakkā gantuṃ, taṃ gantvā.
atk-s0505a:1686_4: Āsajjāti patvā, samīpamassa gantvāti attho. Upāvisīti nisīdi. Yuvāti yobbanasampanno.
atk-s0505a:1686_5: Daharoti jātiyā taruṇo. Paṭhamuppattiko susūti tadubhayavisesanameva. Yuvā susūti
atk-s0505a:1686_6: atiyobbano. Paṭhamuppattikoti paṭhameneva yobbanavesena uṭṭhito. Daharo cāsīti sati
atk-s0505a:1686_7: ca daharatte susu bālako viya khāyasīti.
atk-s0505a:1687_0: 424-5. Anīkagganti balakāyaṃ senāmukhaṃ. Dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassūti ettha “ahaṃ te
atk-s0505a:1687_1: aṅgamagadhesu yāvicchasi, tāva dadāmi bhoge. Taṃ tvaṃ sobhayanto anīkaggaṃ nāgasaṅghapurakkhato
atk-s0505a:1687_2: bhuñjassū”ti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Ujuṃ janapado rājāti “dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassu,
atk-s0505a:1687_3: jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito”ti evaṃ kira vutto mahāpuriso cintesi – “sace ahaṃ rajjena
atk-s0505a:1687_4: atthiko assaṃ, cātumahārājikādayopi maṃ attano attano rajjena nimanteyyuṃ, gehe ṭhito
atk-s0505a:1687_5: eva vā cakkavattirajjaṃ kāreyyaṃ. Ayaṃ pana rājā ajānanto evamāha – ‘handāhaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0505a:1687_6: jānāpemī”’ti bāhaṃ uccāretvā attano āgatadisābhāgaṃ niddisanto “ujuṃ janapado rājā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1687_7: Tattha himavantassa passatoti bhaṇanto sassasampattivekallābhāvaṃ dasseti. Himavantañhi
atk-s0505a:1687_8: nissāya pāsāṇavivarasambhavā mahāsālāpi pañcahi vuddhīhi vaḍḍhanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana
atk-s0505a:1687_9: khette vuttāni sassāni. Dhanavīriyena sampannoti bhaṇanto sattahi ratanehi avekallattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1687_10: pararājūhi atakkanīyaṃ vīrapurisādhiṭṭhitabhāvañcassa dasseti. Kosalesu niketinoti
atk-s0505a:1687_11: bhaṇanto navakarājabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Navakarājā hi niketīti na vuccati. Yassa
atk-s0505a:1687_12: pana ādikālato pabhuti anvayavasena so eva janapado nivāso, so niketīti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1687_13: Tathārūpo ca rājā suddhodano, yaṃ sandhāyāha “kosalesu niketino”ti. Tena anvayāgatampi
atk-s0505a:1688_0: 426. Ettāvatā attano bhogasampattiṃ dīpetvā “ādiccā nāma gottena, sākiyā nāma jātiyā”ti
atk-s0505a:1688_1: iminā jātisampattiñca ācikkhitvā yaṃ vuttaṃ raññā “dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassū”ti, taṃ
atk-s0505a:1688_2: paṭikkhipanto āha – “tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, na kāme abhipatthaya”nti. Yadi hi ahaṃ
atk-s0505a:1688_3: kāme abhipatthayeyyaṃ, na īdisaṃ dhanavīriyasampannaṃ dvāsītisahassavīrapurisasamākulaṃ
atk-s0505a:1688_4: kulaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajeyyanti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1689_0: 427. Evaṃ rañño vacanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tato paraṃ attano pabbajjāhetuṃ dassento āha
atk-s0505a:1689_1: – “kāmesvādīnavaṃ disvā, nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti. Etaṃ “pabbajitomhī”ti iminā
atk-s0505a:1689_2: sambandhitabbaṃ. Tattha daṭṭhūti disvā. Sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṃ yaṃ na
atk-s0505a:1689_3: vicāritaṃ, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthattā eva na vicāritanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ attano
atk-s0505a:1689_4: pabbajjāhetuṃ vatvā padhānatthāya gantukāmo rājānaṃ āmantento āha – “padhānāya gamissāmi,
atk-s0505a:1689_5: ettha me rañjatī mano”ti. Tassattho – yasmāhaṃ, mahārāja, nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato
atk-s0505a:1689_6: pabbajito, tasmā taṃ paramatthanekkhammaṃ nibbānāmataṃ sabbadhammānaṃ aggaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:1689_7: padhānaṃ patthento padhānatthāya gamissāmi, ettha me padhāne rañjati mano, na kāmesūti.
atk-s0505a:1689_8: Evaṃ vutte kira rājā bodhisattaṃ āha – “pubbeva metaṃ, bhante, sutaṃ ‘suddhodanarañño
atk-s0505a:1689_9: kira putto siddhatthakumāro cattāri pubbanimittāni disvā pabbajitvā buddho bhavissatī’ti,
atk-s0505a:1689_10: sohaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ adhimuttiṃ disvā evaṃpasanno ‘addhā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇissathā’ti.
atk-s0505a:1689_11: Sādhu, bhante, buddhattaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ okkameyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1693_0: 428. Taṃ maṃ padhānapahitattanti padhānasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? “Padhānāya gamissāmi,
atk-s0505a:1693_1: ettha me rañjatī mano”ti āyasmā ānando pabbajjāsuttaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1693_2: nisinno cintesi – “mayā chabbassāni padhānaṃ patthayamānena dukkarakārikā katā, taṃ
atk-s0505a:1693_3: ajja bhikkhūnaṃ kathessāmī”ti. Atha gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā buddhāsane nisinno “taṃ
atk-s0505a:1694_0: Tattha taṃ manti dvīhipi vacanehi attānameva niddisati. Padhānapahitattanti nibbānatthāya
atk-s0505a:1694_1: pesitacittaṃ pariccattaattabhāvaṃ vā. Nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ patīti lakkhaṇaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0505a:1694_2: Lakkhaṇañhi padhānapahitattāya nerañjarā nadī. Teneva cettha upayogavacanaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1694_3: panattho “nadiyā nerañjarāyā”ti, nerañjarāya tīreti vuttaṃ hoti. Viparakkammāti atīva
atk-s0505a:1694_4: parakkamitvā. Jhāyantanti appāṇakajjhānamanuyuñjantaṃ. Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti catūhi
atk-s0505a:1695_0: 429. Namucīti māro. So hi attano visayā nikkhamitukāme devamanusse na muñcati, antarāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1695_1: nesaṃ karoti, tasmā “namucī”ti vuccati. Karuṇaṃ vācanti anuddayāyuttaṃ vācaṃ. Bhāsamāno
atk-s0505a:1695_2: upāgamīti idaṃ uttānameva. Kasmā pana upāgato? Mahāpuriso kira ekadivasaṃ cintesi
atk-s0505a:1695_3: – “sabbadā āhāraṃ pariyesamāno jīvite sāpekkho hoti, na ca sakkā jīvite sāpekkhena
atk-s0505a:1695_4: amataṃ adhigantu”nti. Tato āhārupacchedāya paṭipajji, tena kiso dubbaṇṇo ca ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1695_5: Atha māro “ayaṃ sambodhāya maggo hoti, na hotīti ajānanto atighoraṃ tapaṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:1695_6: kadāci mama visayaṃ atikkameyyā”ti bhīto “idañcidañca vatvā vāressāmī”ti āgato. Tenevāha
atk-s0505a:1696_0: 430. Evañca pana vatvā athassa maraṇasantikabhāvaṃ sāvento āha – “sahassabhāgo maraṇassa,
atk-s0505a:1696_1: ekaṃso tava jīvita”nti. Tassattho – sahassaṃ bhāgānaṃ assāti sahassabhāgo. Ko so?
atk-s0505a:1696_2: Maraṇassa paccayoti pāṭhaseso. Eko aṃsoti ekaṃso. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ayaṃ appāṇakajjhānādisahassabhāgo
atk-s0505a:1696_3: tava maraṇassa paccayo, tato pana te eko eva bhāgo jīvitaṃ, evaṃ santike maraṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1696_4: tavāti. Evaṃ maraṇassa santikabhāvaṃ sāvetvā atha naṃ jīvite samussāhento āha “jīva
atk-s0505a:1696_5: bho jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti. Kathaṃ seyyoti ce. Jīvaṃ puññāni kāhasīti.
atk-s0505a:1697_0: 431. Atha attanā sammatāni puññāni dassento āha – “carato ca te brahmacariya”nti.
atk-s0505a:1697_1: Tattha brahmacariyanti kālena kālaṃ methunaviratiṃ sandhāyāha, yaṃ tāpasā karonti.
atk-s0505a:1698_0: 432. Duggo maggoti imaṃ pana aḍḍhagāthaṃ padhānavicchandaṃ janento āha. Tattha appāṇakajjhānādigahanattā
atk-s0505a:1698_1: dukkhena gantabboti duggo, dukkhitakāyacittena kattabbattā dukkaro, santikamaraṇena
atk-s0505a:1698_2: tādisenāpi pāpuṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyato durabhisambhavoti evamattho veditabbo. Ito paraṃ
atk-s0505a:1698_3: imā gāthā bhaṇaṃ māro, aṭṭhā buddhassa santiketi ayamupaḍḍhagāthā saṅgītikārehi vuttā.
atk-s0505a:1698_4: Sakalagāthāpīti eke. Bhagavatā eva pana paraṃ viya attānaṃ niddisantena sabbamettha
atk-s0505a:1698_5: evaṃjātikaṃ vuttanti ayamamhākaṃ khanti. Tattha aṭṭhāti aṭṭhāsi. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0505a:1699: 433. Chaṭṭhagāthāya yenatthenāti ettha paresaṃ antarāyakaraṇena attano atthena tvaṃ, pāpima, āgatosīti ayamadhippāyo. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0505a:1700: 434. “Jīvaṃ puññāni kāhasī”ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto “aṇumattopī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha puññenāti vaṭṭagāmiṃ mārena vuttaṃ puññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0505a:1701_0: 435. Idāni “ekaṃso tava jīvita”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ ārabbha māraṃ santajjento “atthi
atk-s0505a:1701_1: saddhā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – are, māra, yo anuttare santivarapade
atk-s0505a:1701_2: assaddho bhaveyya, saddhopi vā kusīto, saddho āraddhavīriyo samānopi vā duppañño,
atk-s0505a:1701_3: taṃ tvaṃ jīvitamanupucchamāno sobheyyāsi, mayhaṃ pana anuttare santivarapade okappanasaddhā
atk-s0505a:1701_5: ca mama vijjati, so tvaṃ evaṃ maṃ pahitattaṃ uttamajjhāsayaṃ kiṃ jīvamanupucchasi,
atk-s0505a:1701_6: kasmā jīvitaṃ pucchasi. Paññā ca mamāti ettha ca saddena sati samādhi ca. Evaṃ sante
atk-s0505a:1701_7: yehi pañcahi indriyehi samannāgatā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti, tesu ekenāpi avirahitaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1701_8: maṃ pahitattaṃ kiṃ jīvamanupucchasi? Nanu – ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, vīriyamārabhato
atk-s0505a:1702_0: 436-8. Evaṃ māraṃ santajjetvā attano dehacittappavattiṃ dassento “nadīnamapī”pi gāthāttayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1702_1: Tamatthato pākaṭameva. Ayaṃ pana adhippāyavaṇṇanā – yvāyaṃ mama sarīre appāṇakajjhānavīriyavegasamuṭṭhito
atk-s0505a:1702_2: vāto vattati, loke gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ nadīnampi sotāni ayaṃ visosaye, kiñca me evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1702_3: pahitattassa catunāḷimattaṃ lohitaṃ na upasoseyya. Na kevalañca me lohitameva sussati,
atk-s0505a:1702_4: apica kho pana tamhi lohite sussamānamhi baddhābaddhabhedaṃ sarīrānugataṃ pittaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1702_5: asitapītādipaṭicchādakaṃ catunāḷimattameva semhañca, kiñcāparaṃ tattakameva muttañca
atk-s0505a:1702_6: ojañca sussati, tesu ca sussamānesu maṃsānipi khīyanti, tassa me evaṃ anupubbena
atk-s0505a:1702_7: maṃsesu khīyamānesu bhiyyo cittaṃ pasīdati, na tveva tappaccayā saṃsīdati. So tvaṃ
atk-s0505a:1702_8: īdisaṃ cittamajānanto sarīramattameva disvā bhaṇasi “kiso tvamasi dubbaṇṇo, santike
atk-s0505a:1702_9: maraṇaṃ tavā”ti. Na kevalañca me cittameva pasīdati, apica kho pana bhiyyo sati ca
atk-s0505a:1702_10: paññā ca samādhi mama tiṭṭhati, aṇumattopi pamādo vā sammoho vā cittavikkhepo vā
atk-s0505a:1702_11: natthi, tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ viharato ye keci samaṇabrāhmaṇā atītaṃ vā addhānaṃ anāgataṃ
atk-s0505a:1702_12: vā etarahi vā opakkamikā vedanā vedayanti, tāsaṃ nidassanabhūtaṃ pattassa uttamavedanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1702_13: Yathā aññesaṃ dukkhena phuṭṭhānaṃ sukhaṃ, sītena uṇhaṃ, uṇhena sītaṃ, khudāya bhojanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1702_14: pipāsāya phuṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ apekkhate cittaṃ, evaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ekakāmampi nāpekkhake
atk-s0505a:1702_15: cittaṃ. “Aho vatāhaṃ subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sukhaseyyaṃ sayeyya”nti īdisenākārena mama
atk-s0505a:1702_16: cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, passa, tvaṃ māra, sattassa suddhatanti.
atk-s0505a:1703_0: 439-41. Evaṃ attano suddhataṃ dassetvā “nivāressāmi ta”nti āgatassa mārassa manorathabhañjanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1703_1: mārasenaṃ kittetvā tāya aparājitabhāvaṃ dassento “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādikā cha gāthāyo āha.
atk-s0505a:1704_0: Tattha yasmā āditova agāriyabhūte satte vatthukāmesu kilesakāmā mohayanti, te abhibhuyya
atk-s0505a:1704_1: anagāriyabhāvaṃ upagatānaṃ pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu
atk-s0505a:1704_2: dhammesu arati uppajjati. Vuttañcetaṃ “pabbajitena kho, āvuso, abhirati dukkarā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1704_3: Tato te parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā khuppipāsā bādheti, tāya bādhitānaṃ pariyesanataṇhā
atk-s0505a:1704_4: cittaṃ kilamayati, atha nesaṃ kilantacittānaṃ thinamiddhaṃ okkamati. Tato visesamanadhigacchantānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1704_5: durabhisambhavesu araññavanapatthesu senāsanesu viharataṃ utrāsasaññitā bhīru jāyati,
atk-s0505a:1704_7: “na siyā nu kho esa maggo”ti paṭipattiyaṃ vicikicchā uppajjati, taṃ vinodetvā viharataṃ
atk-s0505a:1704_8: appamattakena visesādhigamena mānamakkhathambhā jāyanti, tepi vinodetvā viharataṃ
atk-s0505a:1704_9: tato adhikataraṃ visesādhigamaṃ nissāya lābhasakkārasilokā uppajjanti, lābhādimucchitā
atk-s0505a:1704_10: dhammapatirūpakāni pakāsentā micchāyasaṃ adhigantvā tattha ṭhitā jātiādīhi attānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1704_11: ukkaṃsenti, paraṃ vambhenti, tasmā kāmādīnaṃ paṭhamasenādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1705_0: 442-3. Evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ senaṃ uddisitvā yasmā sā kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā kaṇhassa
atk-s0505a:1705_1: namucino upakārāya saṃvattati, tasmā naṃ tava senāti niddisanto āha – “esā namuci
atk-s0505a:1705_2: te senā, kaṇhassābhippahārinī”ti. Tattha abhippahārinīti samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ghātanī
atk-s0505a:1705_3: nippothanī, antarāyakarīti attho. Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukhanti
atk-s0505a:1705_4: evaṃ tava senaṃ asūro kāye ca jīvite ca sāpekkho puriso na jināti, sūro pana jināti,
atk-s0505a:1705_5: jetvā ca maggasukhaṃ phalasukhañca adhigacchati. Yasmā ca labhate sukhaṃ, tasmā sukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1705_6: patthayamāno ahampi esa muñjaṃ parihareti. Saṅgāmāvacarā anivattino purisā attano
atk-s0505a:1705_7: anivattanakabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ sīse vā dhaje vā āvudhe vā muñjatiṇaṃ bandhanti,
atk-s0505a:1705_8: taṃ ayampi pariharaticceva maṃ dhārehi. Tava senāya parājitassa dhiratthu mama jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1705_9: tasmā evaṃ dhārehi – saṅgāme me mataṃ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito, yena jīvitena parājito
atk-s0505a:1705_10: jīve, tasmā jīvitā tayā sammāpaṭipannānaṃ antarāyakarena saddhiṃ saṅgāme mataṃ mama seyyoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1706_0: 444. Kasmā mataṃ seyyoti ce? Yasmā pagāḷhettha…pe… subbatā, ettha kāmādikāya attukkaṃsanaparavambhanapariyosānāya
atk-s0505a:1706_1: tava senāya pagāḷhā nimuggā anupaviṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na dissanti, sīlādīhi
atk-s0505a:1706_2: guṇehi nappakāsanti, andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya honti. Ete evaṃ pagāḷhā samānā sacepi
atk-s0505a:1706_3: kadāci ummujjitvā nimujjanapuriso viya “sāhu saddhā”tiādinā nayena ummujjanti, tathāpi
atk-s0505a:1706_4: tāya senāya ajjhotthaṭattā tañca maggaṃ na jānanti khemaṃ nibbānagāmīnaṃ, sabbepi
atk-s0505a:1706_5: buddhapaccekabuddhādayo yena gacchanti subbatāti. Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvā māro puna
atk-s0505a:1707_0: 445-6. Pakkante pana tasmiṃ mahāsatto tāya dukkarakārikāya kiñcipi visesaṃ anadhigacchanto
atk-s0505a:1707_1: anukkamena “siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā”tiādīni cintetvā oḷārikāhāraṃ āhāretvā,
atk-s0505a:1707_2: balaṃ gahetvā, visākhapuṇṇamadivase pageva sujātāya pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā, bhadravanasaṇḍe
atk-s0505a:1707_3: divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā, tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattento divasaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0505a:1707_4: mahābodhimaṇḍābhimukho gantvā sotthiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo bodhimūle vikiritvā
atk-s0505a:1708: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0505a:1710_0: Caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā “na dāni buddhattaṃ apāpuṇitvā pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:1710_1: paṭiññaṃ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisīdi. Taṃ ñatvā māro pāpimā “ajja siddhattho paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0505a:1710_2: katvā nisinno, ajjeva dānissa sā paṭiññā paṭibāhitabbā”ti bodhimaṇḍato yāva cakkavāḷamāyataṃ
atk-s0505a:1710_3: dvādasayojanavitthāraṃ uddhaṃ navayojanamuggataṃ mārasenaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1710_4: girimekhalaṃ hatthirājānaṃ āruyha bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā nānāvudhāni gahetvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0505a:1710_5: hanatha, paharathā”ti bhaṇanto āḷavakasutte vuttappakārā vuṭṭhiyo māpesi, tā mahāpurisaṃ
atk-s0505a:1710_6: patvā tattha vuttappakārā eva sampajjiṃsu. Tato vajiraṅkusena hatthiṃ kumbhe paharitvā
atk-s0505a:1710_7: mahāpurisassa samīpaṃ netvā “uṭṭhehi, bho siddhattha, pallaṅkā”ti āha. Mahāpuriso
atk-s0505a:1710_8: “na uṭṭhahāmi mārā”ti vatvā taṃ dhajiniṃ samantā vilokento imā gāthāyo abhāsi “samantā dhajini”nti.
atk-s0505a:1711_0: Tattha dhajininti senaṃ. Yuttanti uyyuttaṃ. Savāhananti girimekhalanāgarājasahitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1711_1: Paccuggacchāmīti abhimukho upari gamissāmi, so ca kho tejeneva, na kāyena. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:1711_2: Mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi, maṃ etasmā ṭhānā aparājitapallaṅkā māro mā cālesīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1711_3: hoti. Nappasahatīti sahituṃ na sakkoti, nābhibhavati vā. Āmaṃ pattanti kācajātaṃ
atk-s0505a:1712_0: 447-8. Idāni “etaṃ te mārasenaṃ bhinditvā tato paraṃ vijitasaṅgāmo sampattadhammarājābhiseko
atk-s0505a:1712_1: idaṃ karissāmī”ti dassento āha “vasīkaritvā”ti. Tattha vasīkaritvā saṅkappanti maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0505a:1712_2: sabbaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ pahāya sammāsaṅkappasseva pavattanena vasīkaritvā saṅkappaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1712_3: Satiñca sūpatiṭṭhitanti kāyādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu attano satiñca suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1712_4: karitvā evaṃ vasīkatasaṅkappo suppatiṭṭhitassati raṭṭhā raṭṭhaṃ vicarissāmi devamanussabhede
atk-s0505a:1712_5: puthū sāvake vinayanto. Atha mayā vinīyamānā te appamattā…pe… na socare, taṃ nibbānāmatamevāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1713_0: 449-51. Atha māro imā gāthāyo sutvā āha – “evarūpaṃ pakkhaṃ disvā na bhāyasi bhikkhū”ti?
atk-s0505a:1713_1: “Āma, māra, na bhāyāmī”ti. “Kasmā na bhāyasī”ti? “Dānādīnaṃ pāramipuññānaṃ katattā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1713_2: “Ko etaṃ jānāti dānādīni tvamakāsī”ti? “Kiṃ ettha pāpima sakkhikiccena, apica ekasmiṃyeva
atk-s0505a:1713_3: bhave vessantaro hutvā yaṃ dānamadāsiṃ, tassānubhāvena sattakkhattuṃ chahi pakārehi
atk-s0505a:1713_4: sañjātakampā ayaṃ mahāpathavīyeva sakkhī”ti. Evaṃ vutte udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī
atk-s0505a:1713_5: kampi bheravasaddaṃ muñcamānā, yaṃ sutvā māro asanihato viya bhīto dhajaṃ paṇāmetvā
atk-s0505a:1713_6: palāyi saddhiṃ parisāya. Atha mahāpuriso tīhi yāmehi tisso vijjā sacchikatvā aruṇuggamane
atk-s0505a:1713_7: “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Māro udānasaddena
atk-s0505a:1713_8: āgantvā “ayaṃ‘buddho aha’nti paṭijānāti, handa naṃ anubandhāmi ābhisamācārikaṃ passituṃ.
atk-s0505a:1713_9: Sacassa kiñci kāyena vā vācāya vā khalitaṃ bhavissati, viheṭhessāmi na”nti pubbe
atk-s0505a:1713_10: bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ chabbassāni anubandhitvā buddhattaṃ pattaṃ ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0505a:1713_11: Tato bhagavato kiñci khalitaṃ apassanto “satta vassānī”ti imā nibbejanīyagāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1714_0: Tattha otāranti randhaṃ vivaraṃ. Nādhigacchissanti nādhigamiṃ. Medavaṇṇanti medapiṇḍasadisaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1714_1: Anupariyagāti parito parito agamāsi. Mudunti mudukaṃ. Vindemāti adhigaccheyyāma.
atk-s0505a:1714_2: Assādanāti sādubhāvo. Vāyasettoti vāyaso etto. Sesamettha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:1715_0: Ayaṃ pana yojanā – satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ otārāpekkho anubandhiṃ katthaci avijahanto
atk-s0505a:1715_1: padāpadaṃ, evaṃ anubandhitvāpi ca otāraṃ nādhigamiṃ. Sohaṃ yathā nāma medavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1715_2: pāsāṇaṃ medasaññī vāyaso ekasmiṃ passe mukhatuṇḍakena vijjhitvā assādaṃ avindamāno
atk-s0505a:1715_3: “appeva nāma ettha mudu vindema, api ito assādanā siyā”ti samantā tatheva vijjhanto
atk-s0505a:1715_4: anupariyāyitvā katthaci assādaṃ aladdhā “pāsāṇovāya”nti nibbijja pakkameyya, evamevāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1715_5: bhagavantaṃ kāyakammādīsu attano parittapaññāmukhatuṇḍakena vijjhanto samantā anupariyagā
atk-s0505a:1715_6: “appeva nāma katthaci aparisuddhakāyasamācārādimudubhāvaṃ vindema, kutoci assādanā
atk-s0505a:1715_7: siyā”ti, te dāni mayaṃ assādaṃ alabhamānā kākova selamāsajja nibbijjāpema gotamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1715_8: āsajja tato gotamā nibbijja apemāti. Evaṃ vadato kira mārassa satta vassāni nipphalaparissamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1715_9: nissāya balavasoko udapādi. Tenassa visīdamānaṅgapaccaṅgassa beluvapaṇḍu nāma vīṇā
atk-s0505a:1715_10: kacchato patitā. Yā sakiṃ kusalehi vāditā cattāro māse madhurassaraṃ muñcati, yaṃ
atk-s0505a:1715_11: gahetvā sakko pañcasikhassa adāsi. Taṃ so patamānampi na bujjhi. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0505a:1719: Saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsūti eke, amhākaṃ panetaṃ nakkhamatīti.
atk-s0505a:1723_0: Evaṃ me sutanti subhāsitasuttaṃ. Attajjhāsayato cassa uppatti. Bhagavā hi subhāsitappiyo,
atk-s0505a:1723_1: so attano subhāsitasamudācārappakāsanena sattānaṃ dubbhāsitasamudācāraṃ paṭisedhento
atk-s0505a:1723_2: imaṃ suttamabhāsi. Tattha evaṃ me sutantiādi saṅgītikāravacanaṃ. Tattha tatra kho
atk-s0505a:1723_3: bhagavā…pe… bhadanteti te bhikkhūti etaṃ apubbaṃ, sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Tasmā apubbapadavaṇṇanatthamidaṃ
atk-s0505a:1723_4: vuccati – tatrāti desakālaparidīpanaṃ. Tañhi yaṃ samayaṃ viharati, tatra samaye,
atk-s0505a:1723_5: yasmiñca ārāme viharati, tatra ārāmeti dīpeti. Bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:1723_6: Na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle vā dhammaṃ bhāsati. “Akālo kho, tāva, bāhiyā”tiādi
atk-s0505a:1723_7: cettha sādhakaṃ. Khoti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇādikālatthe vā nipāto. Bhagavāti
atk-s0505a:1723_8: lokagaruparidīpanaṃ. Bhikkhūti kathāsavanayuttapuggalaparidīpanaṃ. Āmantesīti ālapi abhāsi sambodhesi.
atk-s0505a:1724_1: Tena nesaṃ hīnādhikajanasevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:1724_3: te attano mukhābhimukhe karitvā teneva kathetukamyatādīpakena vacanena tesaṃ sotukamyataṃ
atk-s0505a:1724_4: janeti, teneva ca sambodhanatthena vacanena sādhukasavanamanasikārepi te niyojeti.
atk-s0505a:1724_5: Sādhukasavanamanasikārāyattā hi sāsanasampatti. Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu
atk-s0505a:1724_6: kasmā bhikkhū eva āmantesīti ce? Jeṭṭhaseṭṭhāsannasadāsannihitabhāvato. Sabbaparisasādhāraṇā
atk-s0505a:1724_7: hi ayaṃ dhammadesanā, na pāṭipuggalikā. Parisāya ca jeṭṭhā bhikkhū paṭhamuppannattā,
atk-s0505a:1724_8: seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthu cariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā
atk-s0505a:1724_9: ca. Āsannā tattha nisinnesu satthu santikattā, sadā sannihitā satthu santikāvacarattā.
atk-s0505a:1724_10: Tena bhagavā sabbaparisasādhāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ desento bhikkhū eva āmantesi. Apica bhājanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1724_11: te imāya kathāya yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvatotipi te eva āmantesi. Bhadanteti
atk-s0505a:1724_12: gāravādhivacanametaṃ. Te bhikkhūti ye bhagavā āmantesi, te evaṃ bhagavantaṃ ālapantā
atk-s0505a:1725_0: Catūhi aṅgehīti catūhi kāraṇehi avayavehi vā. Musāvādāveramaṇiādīni hi cattāri subhāsitavācāya
atk-s0505a:1725_1: kāraṇāni. Saccavacanādayo cattāro avayavā, kāraṇatthe ca aṅgasaddo. Catūhīti nissakkavacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1725_2: hoti, avayavatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Samannāgatāti samanuāgatā pavattā yuttā ca. Vācāti
atk-s0505a:1725_3: samullapanavācā. Yā sā “vācā girā byappatho”ti ca, “nelā kaṇṇasukhā”ti ca evamādīsu
atk-s0505a:1725_4: āgacchati. Yā pana “vācāya ce kataṃ kamma”nti evaṃ viññatti ca, “yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi
atk-s0505a:1725_5: ārati virati…pe… ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā”ti evaṃ virati ca, “pharusavācā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0505a:1725_6: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nirayasaṃvattanikā hotī”ti evaṃ cetanā ca vācāti āgacchati,
atk-s0505a:1725_7: sā idha na adhippetā. Kasmā? Abhāsitabbato. Subhāsitā hotīti suṭṭhu bhāsitā hoti.
atk-s0505a:1725_8: Tenassā atthāvahanataṃ dīpeti. Na dubbhāsitāti na duṭṭhu bhāsitā. Tenassā anatthānāvahanataṃ
atk-s0505a:1725_9: dīpeti. Anavajjāti vajjasaṅkhātarāgādidosavirahitā. Tenassā kāraṇasuddhiṃ vuttadosābhāvañca
atk-s0505a:1725_10: dīpeti. Ananuvajjā cāti anuvādavimuttā. Tenassā sabbākārasampattiṃ dīpeti. Viññūnanti
atk-s0505a:1725_11: paṇḍitānaṃ. Tena nindāpasaṃsāsu bālā appamāṇāti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:1726_0: Katamehi catūhīti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Bhikkhaveti yesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1726_2: bhāsatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya catūsu vācaṅgesu aññataraṅganiddesavacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1726_3: No dubbhāsitanti tasseva vācaṅgassa paṭipakkhabhāsananivāraṇaṃ. Tena “musāvādādayopi
atk-s0505a:1726_4: kadāci vattabbā”ti diṭṭhiṃ nisedheti. “No dubbhāsita”nti iminā vā micchāvācappahānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1726_5: dīpeti, “subhāsita”nti iminā pahīnamicchāvācena satā bhāsitabbavacanalakkhaṇaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0505a:1726_6: pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadaṃ. Aṅgaparidīpanatthaṃ pana abhāsitabbaṃ pubbe
atk-s0505a:1727_0: Ettha ca “subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsati no dubbhāsita”nti iminā pisuṇadosarahitaṃ samaggakaraṇavacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1727_1: vuttaṃ, “dhammaṃyeva bhāsati no adhamma”nti iminā samphadosarahitaṃ dhammato anapetaṃ
atk-s0505a:1727_2: mantāvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, itarehi dvīhi pharusālikarahitāni piyasaccavacanāni vuttāni.
atk-s0505a:1727_3: Imehi khotiādinā pana tāni aṅgāni paccakkhato dassento taṃ vācaṃ nigameti. Visesato
atk-s0505a:1727_4: cettha “imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hotī”ti bhaṇanto
atk-s0505a:1727_5: yadaññe paṭiññādīhi avayavehi nāmādīhi padehi liṅgavacanavibhattikālakārakādīhi sampattīhi
atk-s0505a:1727_6: ca samannāgataṃ vācaṃ “subhāsita”nti maññanti, taṃ dhammato paṭisedheti. Avayavādisampannāpi
atk-s0505a:1727_7: hi pesuññādisamannāgatā vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano paresañca anatthāvahattā. Imehi
atk-s0505a:1727_8: pana catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannā
atk-s0505a:1727_9: vā hoti, tathāpi subhāsitā eva lokiyalokuttarahitasukhāvahattā. Sīhaḷadīpe maggapasse
atk-s0505a:1727_10: sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gītaṃ
atk-s0505a:1727_11: gāyantiyā sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakabhikkhū cettha arahattaṃ pattā
atk-s0505a:1727_12: nidassanaṃ. Tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumasarasamīpena gacchanto
atk-s0505a:1730: Imaṃ gītaṃ gāyantiyā ceṭikāya sutvā arahattaṃ patto, buddhantare ca aññataro puriso sattahi puttehi saddhiṃ vanā āgamma aññatarāya itthiyā musalena taṇḍule koṭṭentiyā –
atk-s0505a:1735_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ sutvā saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto, aññe ca īdisehi upāyehi ariyabhūmiṃ
atk-s0505a:1735_1: pattā nidassanaṃ. Anacchariyaṃ panetaṃ, yaṃ bhagavatā āsayānusayakusalena “sabbe
atk-s0505a:1735_2: saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena vuttā gāthāyo sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1735_3: aññe ca khandhāyatanādipaṭisaṃyuttā kathā sutvā aneke devamanussāti. Evaṃ imehi catūhi
atk-s0505a:1735_4: aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā, ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannā
atk-s0505a:1735_5: vā hoti, tathāpi “subhāsitā”ti veditabbā. Subhāsitattā eva ca anavajjā ca ananuvajjā
atk-s0505a:1735_6: ca viññūnaṃ atthatthikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ atthapaṭisaraṇānaṃ, no byañjanapaṭisaraṇānanti.
atk-s0505a:1736_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ subhāsitalakkhaṇaṃ bhagavā avoca. Idaṃ vatvāna sugato, athāparaṃ
atk-s0505a:1736_1: etadavoca satthāti idañca lakkhaṇaṃ vatvā atha aññampi etaṃ avoca satthā. Idāni vattabbagāthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1736_2: dassetvā sabbametaṃ saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsu. Tattha aparanti gāthābandhavacanaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0505a:1736_3: vuccati. Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – pacchā āgataparisaṃ assavanasussavanaādhāraṇadaḷhīkaraṇādīni
atk-s0505a:1736_4: vā sandhāya tadatthadīpakameva ca. Pubbe kenaci kāraṇena parihāpitassa atthassa dīpanena
atk-s0505a:1736_5: atthavisesadīpakañca “purisassa hi jātassa, kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe”tiādīsu viya. Idha
atk-s0505a:1737_0: 453. Tattha santoti buddhādayo. Te hi subhāsitaṃ “uttamaṃ seṭṭha”nti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0505a:1737_1: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthanti idaṃ pana pubbe niddiṭṭhakkamaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0505a:1738_0: So yaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi, yañca vacanaṃ bhagavā abhāsi, taṃ dassentā saṅgītikārakā
atk-s0505a:1738_1: “atha kho āyasmā”tiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha paṭibhāti manti mama bhāgo pakāsati. Paṭibhātu
atk-s0505a:1738_2: tanti tava bhāgo pakāsatu. Sāruppāhīti anucchavikāhi. Abhitthavīti pasaṃsi.
atk-s0505a:1739: 454. Na tāpayeti vippaṭisārena na tāpeyya. Na vihiṃseyyāti aññamaññaṃ bhindanto na bādheyya. Sā ve vācāti sā vācā ekaṃseneva subhāsitā. Ettāvatā apisuṇavācāya bhagavantaṃ thometi.
atk-s0505a:1740_0: 455. Paṭinanditāti haṭṭhena hadayena paṭimukhaṃ gantvā nanditā sampiyāyitā. Yaṃ anādāya
atk-s0505a:1740_1: pāpāni, paresaṃ bhāsate piyanti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto paresaṃ pāpāni appiyāni paṭikkūlāni
atk-s0505a:1740_2: pharusavacanāni anādāya atthabyañjanamadhuraṃ piyameva vacanaṃ bhāsati, taṃ piyavācameva
atk-s0505a:1740_3: bhāseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Imāya gāthāya piyavacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavi.
atk-s0505a:1741_0: 456. Amatāti amatasadisā sādubhāvena. Vuttampi cetaṃ “saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasāna”nti.
atk-s0505a:1741_1: Nibbānāmatapaccayattā vā amatā. Esa dhammo sanantanoti yāyaṃ saccavācā nāma, esa
atk-s0505a:1741_2: porāṇo dhammo cariyā paveṇī, idameva hi porāṇānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, na te alikaṃ bhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1741_3: Tenevāha – “sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, ahu santo patiṭṭhitā”ti. Tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0505a:1741_4: eva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā. Atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva ca dhamme patiṭṭhitā
atk-s0505a:1741_5: hontīti veditabbā. Paraṃ vā dvayaṃ saccavisesanamicceva veditabbaṃ. Sacce patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0505a:1741_6: Kīdise? Atthe ca dhamme ca, yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhaṃ karotīti
atk-s0505a:1741_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Satipi ca anuparodhakaratte dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ, yaṃ dhammikameva
atk-s0505a:1741_8: atthaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Imāya gāthāya saccavacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavi.
atk-s0505a:1742_0: 457. Khemanti abhayaṃ nirupaddavaṃ. Kena kāraṇenāti ce? Nibbānappattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāya,
atk-s0505a:1742_1: yasmā kilesanibbānaṃ pāpeti, vaṭṭadukkhassa ca antakiriyāya saṃvattatīti attho. Atha
atk-s0505a:1742_2: vā yaṃ buddho nibbānappattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāyāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnamatthāya
atk-s0505a:1742_3: khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, sā ve vācānamuttamāti sā vācā sabbavācānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1742_4: seṭṭhāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Imāya gāthāya mantāvacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto
atk-s0505a:1742_5: arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti ayamettha apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-s0505a:1746_0: Evaṃ me sutanti pūraḷāsasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Bhagavā pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0505a:1746_1: lokaṃ volokento sundarikabhāradvājabrāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa upanissayasampannaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:1746_2: “tattha mayi gate kathā pavattissati, tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:1746_3: pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ca ñatvā tattha gantvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1747_0: Tattha evaṃ me sutantiādi saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ. Kiṃjacco bhavantiādi tassa brāhmaṇassa,
atk-s0505a:1747_1: na brāhmaṇo nomhītiādi bhagavato. Taṃ sabbampi samodhānetvā “pūraḷāsasutta”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1747_2: Tattha vuttasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, avuttaṃ vaṇṇayissāma, tañca kho uttānatthāni
atk-s0505a:1747_3: padāni anāmasantā. Kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā. Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi
atk-s0505a:1747_4: janapado ruḷhisaddena “kosalā”ti vuccati. Tasmiṃ kosalesu janapade. Keci pana “yasmā
atk-s0505a:1747_5: pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakādīni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā
atk-s0505a:1747_6: āṇāpesi ‘yo mama puttaṃ hasāpeti, sabbābharaṇehi naṃ alaṅkaromī’ti. Tato naṅgalāni
atk-s0505a:1747_7: chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāyo sannipati. Te ca manussā atirekasattavassāni nānākīḷikādayo
atk-s0505a:1747_8: dassentāpi taṃ nāsakkhiṃsu hasāpetuṃ. Tato sakko devanaṭaṃ pesesi, so dibbanāṭakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1747_9: dassetvā hasāpesi. Atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu. Te
atk-s0505a:1747_10: paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāramakaṃsu ‘kacci bho kusalaṃ, kacci bho
atk-s0505a:1747_11: kusala’nti. Tasmā taṃ ‘kusala’nti saddaṃ upādāya so padeso ‘kosalo’ti vuccatī”ti
atk-s0505a:1747_12: vaṇṇayanti. Sundarikāya nadiyā tīreti sundarikāti evaṃnāmikāya nadiyā tīre.
atk-s0505a:1748_0: Tena kho panāti yena samayena bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vinetukāmo gantvā tassā nadiyā
atk-s0505a:1748_1: tīre sasīsaṃ pārupitvā rukkhamūle nisajjāsaṅkhātena iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
atk-s0505a:1748_2: Sundarikabhāradvājoti so brāhmaṇo tassā nadiyā tīre vasati aggiñca juhati, bhāradvājoti
atk-s0505a:1748_3: cassa gottaṃ, tasmā evaṃ vuccati. Aggiṃ juhatīti āhutipakkhipanena jāleti. Aggihuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1748_4: paricaratīti agyāyatanaṃ sammajjanūpalepanabalikammādinā payirupāsati. Ko nu kho
atk-s0505a:1748_5: imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyāti so kira brāhmaṇo aggimhi juhitvā avasesaṃ pāyāsaṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:1748_6: cintesi – “aggimhi tāva pakkhittapāyāso mahābrahmunā bhutto, ayaṃ pana avaseso atthi.
atk-s0505a:1748_7: Taṃ yadi brahmuno mukhato jātassa brāhmaṇasseva dadeyyaṃ, evaṃ me pitarā saha puttopi
atk-s0505a:1748_8: santappito bhaveyya, suvisodhito ca brahmalokagāmimaggo assa, handāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1748_9: gavesāmī”ti. Tato brāhmaṇadassanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā catuddisā anuvilokesi – “ko nu
atk-s0505a:1749_0: Aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūleti tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe seṭṭharukkhamūle. Sasīsaṃ pārutanti saha
atk-s0505a:1749_1: sīsena pārutakāyaṃ. Kasmā pana bhagavā evamakāsi, kiṃ nārāyanasaṅkhātabalopi hutvā
atk-s0505a:1749_2: nāsakkhi himapātaṃ sītavātañca paṭibāhitunti? Atthetaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Na hi buddhā sabbaso
atk-s0505a:1749_3: kāyapaṭijagganaṃ karonti eva, apica bhagavā “āgate brāhmaṇe sīsaṃ vivarissāmi, maṃ
atk-s0505a:1749_4: disvā brāhmaṇo kathaṃ pavattessati, athassa kathānusārena dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti kathāpavattanatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1749_5: evamakāsi. Disvāna vāmena…pe… tenupasaṅkamīti so kira bhagavantaṃ disvā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:1749_6: “ayaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā sabbarattiṃ padhānamanuyutto, imassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā
atk-s0505a:1749_7: imaṃ habyasesaṃ dassāmī”ti brāhmaṇasaññī hutvā eva upasaṅkami. Muṇḍo ayaṃ bhavaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1749_8: muṇḍako ayaṃ bhavanti sīse vivaritamatteva kesantaṃ disvā “muṇḍo”ti āha. Tato suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0505a:1749_9: olokento parittampi sikhaṃ adisvā hīḷento “muṇḍako”ti āha. Evarūpā hi nesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1749_10: diṭṭhi. Tato vāti yattha ṭhito addasa, tamhā padesā muṇḍāpīti kenaci kāraṇena muṇḍitasīsāpi honti.
atk-s0505a:1750_0: 458. Na brāhmaṇo nomhīti ettha nakāro paṭisedhe, nokāro avadhāraṇe “na no sama”ntiādīsu
atk-s0505a:1750_1: viya. Tena nevamhi brāhmaṇoti dasseti. Na rājaputtoti khattiyo namhi. Na vessāyanoti
atk-s0505a:1750_2: vessopi namhi. Udakoci nomhīti aññopi suddo vā caṇḍālo vā koci na homīti evaṃ ekaṃseneva
atk-s0505a:1750_3: jātivādasamudācāraṃ paṭikkhipati. Kasmā? Mahāsamuddaṃ pattā viya hi nadiyo pabbajjūpagatā
atk-s0505a:1750_4: kulaputtā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni. Pahārādasuttañcettha sādhakaṃ. Evaṃ jātivādaṃ
atk-s0505a:1750_5: paṭikkhipitvā yathābhūtamattānaṃ āvikaronto āha – “gottaṃ pariññāya puthujjanānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1750_6: akiñcano manta carāmi loke”ti. Kathaṃ gottaṃ pariññāsīti ce? Bhagavā hi tīhi pariññāhi
atk-s0505a:1750_7: pañcakkhandhe pariññāsi, tesu ca pariññātesu gottaṃ pariññātameva hoti. Rāgādikiñcanānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1750_8: pana abhāvena so akiñcano mantā jānitvā ñāṇānuparivattīhi kāyakammādīhi carati. Tenāha
atk-s0505a:1750_9: – “gottaṃ…pe… loke”ti. Mantā vuccati paññā, tāya cesa carati. Tenevāha – “mantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1751_0: 459-60. Evaṃ attānaṃ āvikatvā idāni “evaṃ oḷārikaṃ liṅgampi disvā pucchitabbāpucchitabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1751_1: na jānāsī”ti brāhmaṇassa upārambhaṃ āropento āha – “saṅghāṭivāsī…pe… gottapañha”nti.
atk-s0505a:1751_2: Ettha ca chinnasaṅghaṭitaṭṭhena tīṇipi cīvarāni “saṅghāṭī”ti adhippetāni, tāni nivāseti
atk-s0505a:1751_3: paridahatīti saṅghāṭivāsī. Agahoti ageho, nittaṇhoti adhippāyo. Nivāsāgāraṃ pana
atk-s0505a:1751_5: taṃ sandhāya na yujjati. Nivuttakesoti apanītakeso, ohāritakesamassūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1751_6: Abhinibbutattoti atīva vūpasantapariḷāhacitto, guttacitto vā. Alippamāno idha māṇavehīti
atk-s0505a:1751_7: upakaraṇasinehassa pahīnattā manussehi alitto asaṃsaṭṭho ekantavivitto. Akallaṃ maṃ
atk-s0505a:1751_8: brāhmaṇāti yvāhaṃ evaṃ saṅghāṭivāsī…pe… alippamāno idha māṇavehi, taṃ maṃ tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0505a:1751_9: pākatikāni nāmagottāni atītaṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ appatirūpaṃ gottapañhaṃ pucchasīti.
atk-s0505a:1752_0: Evaṃ vutte upārambhaṃ mocento brāhmaṇo āha – pucchanti ve, bho brāhmaṇā, brāhmaṇebhi
atk-s0505a:1752_1: saha “brāhmaṇo no bhava”nti. Tattha brāhmaṇo noti brāhmaṇo nūti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1752_2: hoti – nāhaṃ bho akallaṃ pucchāmi. Amhākañhi brāhmaṇasamaye brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇehi saha
atk-s0505a:1752_3: samāgantvā “brāhmaṇo nu bhavaṃ, bhāradvājo nu bhava”nti evaṃ jātimpi gottampi pucchanti evāti.
atk-s0505a:1753_0: 461-2. Evaṃ vutte bhagavā brāhmaṇassa cittamudubhāvakaraṇatthaṃ mantesu attano pakataññutaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_1: pakāsento āha – “brāhmaṇo hi ce tvaṃ brūsi…pe… catuvīsatakkhara”nti. Tassattho –
atk-s0505a:1753_2: sace tvaṃ “brāhmaṇo ahaṃ”ti brūsi, mañca abrāhmaṇaṃ brūsi, tasmā bhavantaṃ sāvittiṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_3: pucchāmi tipadaṃ catuvīsatakkharaṃ, taṃ me brūhīti. Ettha ca bhagavā paramatthavedānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_4: tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ ādibhūtaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇehi sabbabuddhehi pakāsitaṃ atthasampannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_5: byañjanasampannañca “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, saṅghaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_6: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti imaṃ ariyasāvittiṃ sandhāya pucchati. Yadipi hi brāhmaṇo aññaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_7: vadeyya, addhā naṃ bhagavā “nāyaṃ, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye sāvittīti vuccatī”ti
atk-s0505a:1753_8: tassa asārakattaṃ dassetvā idheva patiṭṭhāpeyya. Brāhmaṇo pana “sāvittiṃ pucchāmi
atk-s0505a:1753_9: tipadaṃ catuvīsatakkhara”nti idaṃ attano samayasiddhaṃ sāvittilakkhaṇabyañjanakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_10: brahmassarena nicchāritavacanaṃ sutvāva “addhāyaṃ samaṇo brāhmaṇasamaye niṭṭhaṃ gato,
atk-s0505a:1753_11: ahaṃ pana aññāṇena ‘abrāhmaṇo aya’nti paribhaviṃ, sādhurūpo mantapāragū brāhmaṇova
atk-s0505a:1753_12: eso”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā “handa naṃ yaññavidhiṃ dakkhiṇeyyavidhiñca pucchāmī”ti tamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_13: pucchanto “kiṃnissitā…pe… loke”ti imaṃ visamagāthāpadattayamāha. Tassattho – kiṃnissitā
atk-s0505a:1753_14: kimadhippāyā kiṃ patthentā isayo ca khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca aññe ca manujā devatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1753_15: atthāya yaññaṃ akappayiṃsu. Yaññamakappayiṃsūti makāro padasandhikaro. Akappayiṃsūti
atk-s0505a:1753_16: saṃvidahiṃsu akaṃsu. Puthūti bahū annapānadānādinā bhedena anekappakāre puthū vā
atk-s0505a:1753_17: isayo manujā khattiyā brāhmaṇā ca kiṃnissitā yaññamakappayiṃsu. Kathaṃ nesaṃ taṃ
atk-s0505a:1754_0: 463. Athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto “yadantagū vedagū yaññakāle. Yassāhutiṃ
atk-s0505a:1754_1: labhe tassijjheti brūmī”ti idaṃ sesapadadvayamāha. Tattha yadantagūti yo antagū,
atk-s0505a:1754_2: okārassa akāro, dakāro ca padasandhikaro “asādhāraṇamaññesa”ntiādīsu makāro viya.
atk-s0505a:1754_3: Ayaṃ pana attho – yo vaṭṭadukkhassa tīhi pariññāhi antagatattā antagū, catūhi ca
atk-s0505a:1754_4: maggañāṇavedehi kilese vijjhitvā gatattā vedagū, so yassa isimanujakhattiyabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1754_5: aññatarassa yaññakāle yasmiṃ kismiñci āhāre paccupaṭṭhite antamaso vanapaṇṇamūlaphalādimhipi
atk-s0505a:1754_6: āhutiṃ labhe, tato kiñci deyyadhammaṃ labheyya, tassa taṃ yaññakammaṃ ijjhe samijjheyya,
atk-s0505a:1755_0: 464. Atha brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato paramatthayogagambhīraṃ atimadhuragiranibbikārasarasampannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1755_1: desanaṃ sutvā sarīrasampattisūcitañcassa sabbaguṇasampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0505a:1755_2: “addhā hi tassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha iti brāhmaṇoti saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ, sesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1755_3: brāhmaṇassa. Tassattho – addhā hi tassa mayhaṃ hutamijjhe, ayaṃ ajja deyyadhammo
atk-s0505a:1755_4: ijjhissati samijjhissati mahapphalo bhavissati yaṃ tādisaṃ vedagumaddasāma, yasmā
atk-s0505a:1755_5: tādisaṃ bhavantarūpaṃ vedaguṃ addasāma. Tvaññeva hi so vedagū, na añño. Ito pubbe
atk-s0505a:1755_6: pana tumhādisānaṃ vedagūnaṃ antagūnañca adassanena amhādisānaṃ yaññe paṭiyattaṃ añño
atk-s0505a:1756_0: 465. Tato bhagavā attani pasannaṃ vacanapaṭiggahaṇasajjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ viditvā yathāssa
atk-s0505a:1756_1: suṭṭhu pākaṭā honti, evaṃ nānappakārehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsetukāmo “tasmātiha tva”nti
atk-s0505a:1756_2: gāthamāha. Tassattho – yasmā mayi pasannosi, tasmā pana iha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, upasaṅkamma
atk-s0505a:1756_3: pucchāti attānaṃ dassento āha. Idāni ito pubbaṃ atthenaatthikapadaṃ parapadena sambandhitabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1756_4: – atthena atthiko tassa atthatthikabhāvassa anurūpaṃ kilesaggivūpasamena santaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1756_5: kodhadhūmavigamena vidhūmaṃ, dukkhābhāvena anīghaṃ, anekavidhaāsābhāvena nirāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:1756_6: appevidha ekaṃsena idha ṭhitova idha vā sāsane abhivinde lacchasi adhigacchissasi
atk-s0505a:1756_7: sumedhaṃ varapaññaṃ khīṇāsavadakkhiṇeyyanti. Atha vā yasmā mayi pasannosi, tasmātiha,
atk-s0505a:1756_8: tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, atthena atthiko samāno upasaṅkamma puccha santaṃ vidhūmaṃ anīghaṃ
atk-s0505a:1756_9: nirāsanti attānaṃ dassento āha. Evaṃ pucchanto appevidha abhivinde sumedhaṃ khīṇāsavadakkhiṇeyyanti
atk-s0505a:1757_0: 466. Atha brāhmaṇo yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno bhagavantaṃ āha – “yaññe ratohaṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:1757_1: brūhi meta”nti. Tattha yañño yāgo dānanti atthato ekaṃ. Tasmā dānarato ahaṃ, tāya
atk-s0505a:1757_2: eva dānārāmatāya dānaṃ dātukāmo, na pana jānāmi, evaṃ ajānantaṃ anusāsatu maṃ bhavaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1757_3: Anusāsanto ca uttāneneva nayena yattha hutaṃ ijjhate brūhi metanti evamettha atthayojanā
atk-s0505a:1758_0: 467. Athassa bhagavā vattukāmo āha – “tena hi…pe… desessāmī”ti. Ohitasotassa cassa
atk-s0505a:1758_1: anusāsanatthaṃ tāva “mā jātiṃ pucchī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha mā jātiṃ pucchīti yadi
atk-s0505a:1758_2: hutasamiddhiṃ dānamahapphalataṃ paccāsīsasi, jātiṃ mā puccha. Akāraṇañhi dakkhiṇeyyavicāraṇāya
atk-s0505a:1758_3: jāti. Caraṇañca pucchāti apica kho sīlādiguṇabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ puccha. Etañhi dakkhiṇeyyavicāraṇāya kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1759_0: Idānissa tamatthaṃ vibhāvento nidassanamāha – “kaṭṭhā have jāyati jātavedo”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:1759_1: Tatrāyamadhippāyo – idha kaṭṭhā aggi jāyati, na ca so sālādikaṭṭhā jāto eva aggikiccaṃ
atk-s0505a:1759_2: karoti, sāpānadoṇiādikaṭṭhā jāto na karoti, apica kho attano acciādiguṇasampannattā
atk-s0505a:1759_3: eva karoti. Evaṃ na brāhmaṇakulādīsu jāto eva dakkhiṇeyyo hoti, caṇḍālakulādīsu jāto
atk-s0505a:1759_4: na hoti, apica kho nīcākulīnopi uccākulīnopi khīṇāsavamuni dhitimā hirīnisedho ājāniyo
atk-s0505a:1759_5: hoti, imāya dhitihiripamukhāya guṇasampattiyā jātimā uttamadakkhiṇeyyo hoti. So hi
atk-s0505a:1759_6: dhitiyā guṇe dhārayati, hiriyā dose nisedheti. Vuttañcetaṃ “hiriyā hi santo na karonti
atk-s0505a:1764: Esa saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana assalāyanasuttānusārena veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1765_0: 468. Evametaṃ bhagavā cātuvaṇṇisuddhiyā anusāsitvā idāni yattha hutaṃ ijjhate, yathā
atk-s0505a:1765_1: ca hutaṃ ijjhate, tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “saccena danto”tiādigāthamāha. Tattha saccenāti
atk-s0505a:1765_2: paramatthasaccena. Tañhi patto danto hoti. Tenāha – “saccena danto”ti. Damasā upetoti
atk-s0505a:1765_3: indriyadamena samannāgato. Vedantagūti vedehi vā kilesānaṃ antaṃ gato, vedānaṃ vā
atk-s0505a:1765_4: antaṃ catutthamaggañāṇaṃ gato. Vūsitabrahmacariyoti puna vasitabbābhāvato vutthamaggabrahmacariyo.
atk-s0505a:1765_5: Kālena tamhi habyaṃ paveccheti attano deyyadhammaṭṭhitakālaṃ tassa sammukhībhāvakālañca
atk-s0505a:1765_6: upalakkhetvā tena kālena tādise dakkhiṇeyye deyyadhammaṃ paveccheyya, paveseyya paṭipādeyya.
atk-s0505a:1766_0: 469-71. Kāmeti vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca. Susamāhitindriyāti suṭṭhu samāhitaindriyā,
atk-s0505a:1766_1: avikkhittaindriyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Candova rāhuggahaṇā pamuttāti yathā cando rāhuggahaṇā,
atk-s0505a:1766_2: evaṃ kilesaggahaṇā pamuttā ye atīva bhāsanti ceva tapanti ca. Satāti satisampannā.
atk-s0505a:1767_0: 472. Yo kāme hitvāti ito pabhuti attānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tattha kāme hitvāti kilesakāme
atk-s0505a:1767_1: pahāya. Abhibhuyyacārīti tesaṃ pahīnattā vatthukāme abhibhuyyacārī. Jātimaraṇassa
