atk-s0505a:1767_2: antaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ vuccati, tañca yo vedi attano paññābalena aññāsi. Udakarahado
atk-s0505a:1767_3: vāti ye ime anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho
atk-s0505a:1767_4: sīhappapātadahoti himavati satta mahārahadā aggisūriyasantāpehi asamphuṭṭhattā niccaṃ
atk-s0505a:1767_5: sītalā, tesaṃ aññataro udakarahadova sīto parinibbutakilesapariḷāhattā.
atk-s0505a:1768_0: 473. Samoti tulyo. Samehīti vipassiādīhi buddhehi. Te hi paṭivedhasamattā “samā”ti
atk-s0505a:1768_1: vuccanti. Natthi tesaṃ paṭivedhenādhigantabbesu guṇesu, pahātabbesu vā dosesu vemattatā,
atk-s0505a:1768_3: Tathā hi te heṭṭhimaparicchedena catūhi asaṅkhyeyyehi kappasatasahassena ca pāramiyo
atk-s0505a:1768_4: pūrenti, uparimaparicchedena soḷasahi asaṅkhyeyyehi kappasatasahassena ca. Ayaṃ nesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1768_5: addhānavemattatā. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena ca vassasatāyukakāle uppajjanti, uparimaparicchedena
atk-s0505a:1768_6: vassasatasahassāyukakāle. Ayaṃ nesaṃ āyuvemattatā. Khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā
atk-s0505a:1768_7: uppajjanti. Ayaṃ kulavemattatā. Uccā vā honti aṭṭhāsītihatthappamāṇā, nīcā vā pannarasaaṭṭhārasahatthappamāṇā.
atk-s0505a:1768_8: Ayaṃ pamāṇavemattatā. Hatthiassarathasivikādīhi nikkhamanti vehāsena vā. Tathā hi
atk-s0505a:1768_9: vipassikakusandhā assarathena nikkhamiṃsu, sikhīkoṇāgamanā hatthikkhandhena, vessabhū
atk-s0505a:1768_10: sivikāya, kassapo vehāsena, sakyamuni assapiṭṭhiyā. Ayaṃ nekkhammavemattatā. Sattāhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1768_11: vā padhānamanuyuñjanti, aḍḍhamāsaṃ, māsaṃ, dvemāsaṃ, temāsaṃ, catumāsaṃ, pañcamāsaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1768_12: chamāsaṃ, ekavassaṃ dviticatupañcachavassāni vā. Ayaṃ padhānavemattatā. Assattho
atk-s0505a:1768_13: vā bodhirukkho hoti nigrodhādīnaṃ vā aññataro. Ayaṃ bodhivemattatā. Byāmāsītianantapabhāyuttā
atk-s0505a:1768_14: honti. Tattha byāmappabhā vā asītippabhā vā sabbesaṃ samānā, anantappabhā pana dūrampi
atk-s0505a:1768_15: gacchati āsannampi, ekagāvutaṃ dvigāvutaṃ yojanaṃ anekayojanaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantampi,
atk-s0505a:1768_16: maṅgalassa buddhassa sarīrappabhā dasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ santepi manasā
atk-s0505a:1768_17: cintāyattāva sabbabuddhānaṃ, yo yattakamicchati, tassa tattakaṃ gacchati. Ayaṃ rasmivemattatā.
atk-s0505a:1768_18: Imā aṭṭha vemattatā ṭhapetvā avasesesu paṭivedhenādhigantabbesu guṇesu, pahātabbesu
atk-s0505a:1768_19: vā dosesu natthi nesaṃ viseso, tasmā “samā”ti vuccanti. Evametehi samo samehi.
atk-s0505a:1769_0: Visamehi dūreti na samā visamā, paccekabuddhādayo avasesasabbasattā. Tehi visamehi
atk-s0505a:1769_1: asadisatāya dūre. Sakalajambudīpaṃ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ saṅghaṭṭetvā nisinnā
atk-s0505a:1769_2: paccekabuddhāpi hi guṇehi ekassa sammāsambuddhassa kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ, ko pana
atk-s0505a:1769_3: vādo sāvakādīsu. Tenāha – “visamehi dūre”ti. Tathāgato hotīti ubhayapadehi dūreti
atk-s0505a:1769_4: yojetabbaṃ. Anantapaññoti aparimitapañño. Lokiyamanussānañhi paññaṃ upanidhāya aṭṭhamakassa
atk-s0505a:1769_5: paññā adhikā, tassa paññaṃ upanidhāya sotāpannassa. Evaṃ yāva arahato paññaṃ upanidhāya
atk-s0505a:1769_6: paccekabuddhassa paññā adhikā, paccekabuddhassa paññaṃ pana upanidhāya tathāgatassa
atk-s0505a:1769_7: paññā adhikāti na vattabbā, anantā icceva pana vattabbā. Tenāha – “anantapañño”ti.
atk-s0505a:1769_8: Anūpalittoti taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi alitto. Idha vā huraṃ vāti idhaloke vā paraloke vā.
atk-s0505a:1769_9: Yojanā panettha – samo samehi visamehi dūre tathāgato hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā anantapañño
atk-s0505a:1769_10: anupalitto idha vā huraṃ vā, tena tathāgato arahati pūraḷāsanti.
atk-s0505a:1770_0: 474. Yamhi na māyāti ayaṃ pana gāthā aññā ca īdisā māyādidosayuttesu brāhmaṇesu dakkhiṇeyyasaññāpahānatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1770_1: vuttāti veditabbā. Tattha amamoti sattasaṅkhāresu “idaṃ mamā”ti pahīnamamāyitabhāvo.
atk-s0505a:1771_0: 475. Nivesananti taṇhādiṭṭhinivesanaṃ. Tena hi mano tīsu bhavesu nivisati, tena taṃ
atk-s0505a:1771_1: “nivesanaṃ manaso”ti vuccati. Tattheva vā nivisati taṃ hitvā gantuṃ asamatthatāya.
atk-s0505a:1771_2: Tenapi “nivesana”nti vuccati. Pariggahāti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo eva, tāhi pariggahitadhammā
atk-s0505a:1771_3: vā. Kecīti appamattakāpi. Anupādiyānoti tesaṃ nivesanapariggahānaṃ abhāvā kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyamāno.
atk-s0505a:1772: 476. Samāhito maggasamādhinā. Udatārīti uttiṇṇo. Dhammaṃ caññāsīti sabbañca ñeyyadhammaṃ aññāsi. Paramāya diṭṭhiyāti sabbaññutaññāṇena.
atk-s0505a:1773_1: kakkhaḷā pharusā. Vidhūpitāti daḍḍhā. Atthagatāti atthaṅgatā. Na santīti vidhūpitattā
atk-s0505a:1773_2: atthaṅgatattā ca. Ubhayehi pana ubhayaṃ yojetabbaṃ sabbadhīti sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu.
atk-s0505a:1774: 478. Mānasattesūti mānena laggesu. Dukkhaṃ pariññāyāti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. Sakhettavatthunti sahetupaccayaṃ, saddhiṃ kammakilesehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1775_0: 479. Āsaṃ anissāyāti taṇhaṃ anallīyitvā. Vivekadassīti nibbānadassī. Paravediyanti
atk-s0505a:1775_1: parehi ñāpetabbaṃ. Diṭṭhimupātivattoti dvāsaṭṭhibhedampi micchādiṭṭhiṃ atikkanto.
atk-s0505a:1776_0: 480. Paroparāti varāvarā sundarāsundarā. Parā vā bāhirā, aparā ajjhattikā. Sameccāti
atk-s0505a:1776_1: ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā. Dhammāti khandhāyatanādayo dhammā. Upādānakhaye vimuttoti nibbāne
atk-s0505a:1777_1: Saṃyojanakkhayantena cettha saupādisesā nibbānadhātu, jātikkhayantena anupādisesā
atk-s0505a:1777_2: vuttā. Khayantoti hi accantakhayassa samucchedappahānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Anunāsikalopo
atk-s0505a:1777_3: cettha “vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntiādīsu viya na kato. Yopānudīti yo apanudi. Rāgapathanti
atk-s0505a:1777_4: rāgārammaṇaṃ, rāgameva vā. Rāgopi hi duggatīnaṃ pathattā “rāgapatho”ti vuccati kammapatho
atk-s0505a:1777_5: viya. Suddho nidoso vimalo akācoti parisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya suddho. Yehi “rāgadosā
atk-s0505a:1777_6: ayaṃ pajā, dosadosā, mohadosā”ti vuccati. Tesaṃ abhāvā nidoso. Aṭṭhapurisamalavigamā
atk-s0505a:1777_7: vimalo, upakkilesābhāvato akāco. Upakkiliṭṭho hi upakkilesena “sakāco”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1777_8: Suddho vā yasmā niddoso, niddosatāya vimalo, bāhiramalābhāvena vimalattā akāco. Samalo
atk-s0505a:1777_9: hi “sakāco”ti vuccati. Vimalattā vā āguṃ na karoti, tena akāco. Āgukiriyā hi upaghātakaraṇato “kāco”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1778_0: 482. Attano attānaṃ nānupassatīti ñāṇasampayuttena cittena vipassanto attano khandhesu
atk-s0505a:1778_1: aññaṃ attānaṃ nāma na passati, khandhamattameva passati. Yā cāyaṃ “attanāva attānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1778_2: sañjānāmī”ti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati, tassā abhāvā attano attānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1778_3: nānupassati, aññadatthu paññāya khandhe passati. Maggasamādhinā samāhito, kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1778_4: abhāvā ujjugato, lokadhammehi akampanīyato ṭhitatto, taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya pañcannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1778_5: cetokhilānañca aṭṭhaṭṭhānāya kaṅkhāya ca abhāvā anejo akhilo akaṅkho.
atk-s0505a:1779_0: 483. Mohantarāti mohakāraṇā mohapaccayā, sabbakilesānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sabbesu
atk-s0505a:1779_1: dhammesu ca ñāṇadassīti sacchikatasabbaññutaññāṇo. Tañhi sabbesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1779_2: tañca bhagavā passi, “adhigataṃ me”ti sacchikatvā vihāsi. Tena vuccati “sabbesu dhammesu
atk-s0505a:1779_3: ca ñāṇadassī”ti. Sambodhinti arahattaṃ. Anuttaranti paccekabuddhasāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1779_4: Sivanti khemaṃ nirupaddavaṃ sassirikaṃ vā. Yakkhassāti purisassa. Suddhīti vodānatā.
atk-s0505a:1779_5: Ettha hi mohantarābhāvena sabbadosābhāvo, tena saṃsārakāraṇasamucchedo antimasarīradhāritā,
atk-s0505a:1779_6: ñāṇadassitāya sabbaguṇasambhavo. Tena anuttarā sambodhipatti, ito parañca pahātabbamadhigantabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1780_0: 484. Evaṃ vutte brāhmaṇo bhiyyosomattāya bhagavati pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto āha
atk-s0505a:1780_1: “hutañca mayha”nti. Tassattho – yamahaṃ ito pubbe brahmānaṃ ārabbha aggimhi ajuhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1780_2: taṃ me hutaṃ saccaṃ vā hoti, alikaṃ vāti na jānāmi. Ajja pana idaṃ hutañca mayhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1780_3: hutamatthu saccaṃ, saccahutameva atthūti yācanto bhaṇati. Yaṃ tādisaṃ vedagunaṃ alatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1780_4: yasmā idheva ṭhito bhavantarūpaṃ vedaguṃ alatthaṃ. Brahmā hi sakkhi, paccakkhameva
atk-s0505a:1780_5: hi tvaṃ brahmā, yato paṭiggaṇhātu me bhagavā, paṭiggahetvā ca bhuñjatu me bhagavā
atk-s0505a:1781_0: 487. Atha bhagavā kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayena gāthādvayamabhāsi. Tato brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:1781_1: “ayaṃ attanā na icchati, kampi caññaṃ sandhāya ‘kevalinaṃ mahesiṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kukkuccavūpasantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1781_2: annena pānena upaṭṭhahassū’ti bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ gāthāya atthaṃ asallakkhetvā taṃ ñātukāmo
atk-s0505a:1781_3: āha “sādhāhaṃ bhagavā”ti. Tattha sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto. Tathāti yena tvamāha,
atk-s0505a:1781_4: tena pakārena. Vijaññanti jāneyyaṃ. Yanti yaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ yaññakāle pariyesamāno
atk-s0505a:1781_5: upaṭṭhaheyyanti pāṭhaseso. Pappuyyāti patvā. Tava sāsananti tava ovādaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1781_6: hoti. Sādhāhaṃ bhagavā tava ovādaṃ āgamma tathā vijaññaṃ ārocehi me taṃ kevalinanti
atk-s0505a:1781_7: adhippāyo. Yo dakkhiṇaṃ bhuñjeyya mādisassa, yaṃ cāhaṃ yaññakāle pariyesamāno upaṭṭhaheyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1781_8: tathārūpaṃ me dakkhiṇeyyaṃ dassehi, sace tvaṃ na bhuñjasīti.
atk-s0505a:1782_0: 488-90. Athassa bhagavā pākaṭena nayena tathārūpaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ dassento “sārambhā
atk-s0505a:1782_1: yassā”ti gāthāttayamāha. Tattha sīmantānaṃ vinetāranti sīmāti mariyādā sādhujanavutti,
atk-s0505a:1782_2: tassā antā pariyosānā aparabhāgāti katvā sīmantā vuccanti kilesā, tesaṃ vinetāranti
atk-s0505a:1782_3: attho. Sīmantāti buddhaveneyyā sekkhā ca puthujjanā ca, tesaṃ vinetārantipi eke.
atk-s0505a:1782_4: Jātimaraṇakovidanti “evaṃ jāti evaṃ maraṇa”nti ettha kusalaṃ. Moneyyasampannanti
atk-s0505a:1782_5: paññāsampannaṃ, kāyamoneyyādisampannaṃ vā. Bhakuṭiṃ vinayitvānāti yaṃ ekacce dubbuddhino
atk-s0505a:1782_6: yācakaṃ disvā bhakuṭiṃ karonti, taṃ vinayitvā, pasannamukhā hutvāti attho. Pañjalikāti
atk-s0505a:1783_0: 491. Atha brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ thomayamāno “buddho bhava”nti gāthamāha. Tattha āyāgoti
atk-s0505a:1783_1: āyajitabbo, tato tato āgamma vā yajitabbametthātipi āyāgo, deyyadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtoti
atk-s0505a:1783_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṃ na vaṇṇitaṃ, taṃ sakkā avaṇṇitampi
atk-s0505a:1783_3: jānitunti uttānatthattāyeva na vaṇṇitaṃ. Ito paraṃ pana kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0505a:1787_0: Evaṃ me sutanti māghasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. Ayañhi māgho
atk-s0505a:1787_1: māṇavo dāyako ahosi dānapati. Tassetadahosi – “sampattakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānaṃ dinnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1787_2: mahapphalaṃ hoti, udāhu noti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ etamatthaṃ pucchissāmi, samaṇo kira
atk-s0505a:1787_3: gotamo atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ jānātī”ti. So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. Bhagavā
atk-s0505a:1787_4: cassa pucchānurūpaṃ byākāsi. Tayidaṃ saṅgītikārānaṃ brāhmaṇassa bhagavatoti tiṇṇampi
atk-s0505a:1788_0: Tattha rājagaheti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tañhi mandhātumahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā
atk-s0505a:1788_1: “rājagaha”nti vuccati. Aññepettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti. Kiṃ tehi, nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassa?
atk-s0505a:1788_2: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1788_3: tesaṃ vasantavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā nivāsaṭṭhānamāha – “gijjhakūṭe
atk-s0505a:1788_4: pabbate”ti. So ca gijjhā tassa kūṭesu vasiṃsu, gijjhasadisāni vāssa kūṭāni, tasmā
atk-s0505a:1789_0: Atha kho…pe… avocāti ettha māghoti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ. Māṇavoti antevāsivāsaṃ
atk-s0505a:1789_1: anatītabhāvena vuccati, jātiyā pana mahallako. “Pubbāciṇṇavasenā”ti eke piṅgiyo māṇavo
atk-s0505a:1789_2: viya. So hi vīsavassasatikopi pubbāciṇṇavasena “piṅgiyo māṇavo” tveva saṅkhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:1790_0: Ahañhi, bho gotama…pe… pasavāmīti ettha dāyako dānapatīti dāyako ceva dānapati ca.
atk-s0505a:1790_1: Yo hi aññassa santakaṃ tenāṇatto deti, sopi dāyako hoti, tasmiṃ pana dāne issariyābhāvato
atk-s0505a:1790_2: na dānapati. Ayaṃ pana attano santakaṃyeva deti. Tenāha – “ahañhi, bho gotama, dāyako
atk-s0505a:1790_3: dānapatī”ti. Ayameva hi ettha attho, aññatra pana antarantarā maccherena abhibhuyyamāno
atk-s0505a:1790_4: dāyako anabhibhūto dānapatītiādināpi nayena vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Vadaññūti yācakānaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1790_6: vā. Yācayogoti yācituṃ yutto. Yo hi yācake disvāva bhakuṭiṃ katvā pharusavacanādīni
atk-s0505a:1790_7: bhaṇati, so na yācayogo hoti. Ahaṃ pana na tādisoti dīpeti. Dhammenāti adinnādānanikativañcanādīni
atk-s0505a:1790_8: vajjetvā bhikkhācariyāya, yācanāyāti attho. Yācanā hi brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogapariyesane
atk-s0505a:1790_9: dhammo, yācamānānañca nesaṃ parehi anuggahakāmehi dinnā bhogā dhammaladdhā nāma dhammādhigatā
atk-s0505a:1790_10: ca honti, so ca tathā pariyesitvā labhi. Tenāha – “dhammena bhoge pariyesāmi…pe…
atk-s0505a:1790_11: dhammādhigatehī”ti. Bhiyyopi dadāmīti tato uttaripi dadāmi, pamāṇaṃ natthi, ettha
atk-s0505a:1791_0: Tagghāti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. Ekaṃseneva hi sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi pasatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1791_1: dānaṃ antamaso tiracchānagatānampi dīyamānaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ “sabbattha vaṇṇitaṃ dānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1791_2: na dānaṃ garahitaṃ kvacī”ti. Tasmā bhagavāpi ekaṃseneva taṃ pasaṃsanto āha – “taggha
atk-s0505a:1791_3: tvaṃ māṇava…pe… pasavasī”ti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Evaṃ bhagavatā “bahuṃ so puññaṃ
atk-s0505a:1791_4: pasavatī”ti vuttepi dakkhiṇeyyato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ sotukāmo brāhmaṇo uttari bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1791_5: pucchi. Tenāhu saṅgītikārā – “atha kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1792_0: 492. Pucchāmahantiādigāthāsu pana vadaññunti vacanaviduṃ, sabbākārena sattānaṃ vuttavacanādhippāyaññunti
atk-s0505a:1792_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Sujjheti dakkhiṇeyyavasena suddhaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhaveyya. Yojanā panettha
atk-s0505a:1792_2: – yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho puññatthiko hutvā paresaṃ annapānaṃ dadaṃ yajati,
atk-s0505a:1792_3: na aggimhi āhutimattaṃ pakkhipanto, tañca kho puññapekkhova na paccupakārakalyāṇakittisaddādiapekkho,
atk-s0505a:1792_4: tassa evarūpassa yajamānassa hutaṃ kathaṃ sujjheyyāti?
atk-s0505a:1793_0: 493. Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādīti tādiso yācayogo dakkhiṇeyyehi ārādhaye sampādaye
atk-s0505a:1793_1: sodhaye, mahapphalaṃ taṃ hutaṃ kareyya, na aññathāti attho. Imināssa “kathaṃ hutaṃ
atk-s0505a:1794: 494. Akkhāhi me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyyeti ettha yo yācayogo dadaṃ paresaṃ yajati, tassa me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye akkhāhīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1795_0: 495. Athassa bhagavā nānappakārehi nayehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsento “ye ve asattā”tiādikā
atk-s0505a:1795_1: gāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha asattāti rāgādisaṅgavasena alaggā. Kevalinoti pariniṭṭhitakiccā.
atk-s0505a:1796_0: 496-7. Dantā anuttarena damathena, vimuttā paññācetovimuttīhi, anīghā āyatiṃ vaṭṭadukkhābhāvena,
atk-s0505a:1796_1: nirāsā sampati kilesābhāvena. Imissā pana gāthāya dutiyagāthā bhāvanānubhāvappakāsananayena
atk-s0505a:1796_2: vuttāti veditabbā. “Bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi
atk-s0505a:1796_3: na evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucceyyā’ti, atha
atk-s0505a:1796_4: khvāssa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti idaṃ cettha suttaṃ sādhakaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1797_0: 498-502. Rāgañca…pe… yesu na māyā…pe… na taṇhāsu upātipannāti kāmataṇhādīsu nādhimuttā.
atk-s0505a:1797_1: Vitareyyāti vitaritvā. Taṇhāti rūpataṇhādichabbidhā. Bhavābhavāyāti sassatāya vā
atk-s0505a:1797_2: ucchedāya vā. Atha vā bhavassa abhavāya bhavābhavāya, punabbhavābhinibbattiyāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1797_3: hoti. Idha vā huraṃ vāti idaṃ pana “kuhiñci loke”ti imassa vitthāravacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1798_0: 504. Ye vītarāgā…pe… samitāvinoti samitavanto, kilesavūpasamakārinoti attho. Samitāvitattā
atk-s0505a:1798_1: ca vītarāgā akopā. Idha vippahāyāti idhaloke vattamāne khandhe vihāya, tato paraṃ
atk-s0505a:1798_2: yesaṃ gamanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ito paraṃ “ye kāme hitvā agahā caranti, susaññatattā
atk-s0505a:1798_3: tasaraṃva ujju”nti imampi gāthaṃ keci paṭhanti.
atk-s0505a:1799_0: 506-8. Jahitvāti hitvā. “Jahitvānā”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. Attadīpāti attano guṇe
atk-s0505a:1799_1: eva attano dīpaṃ katvā vicarantā khīṇāsavā vuccanti. Ye hetthāti hakāro nipāto padapūraṇamatte.
atk-s0505a:1799_2: Ayaṃ panattho – ye ettha khandhāyatanādisantāne yathā idaṃ khandhāyatanādi tathā
atk-s0505a:1799_3: jānanti, yaṃsabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvaṃyeva sañjānanti aniccādivasena jānantā. Ayamantimā
atk-s0505a:1799_4: natthi punabbhavoti ayaṃ no antimā jāti, idāni natthi punabbhavoti evañca ye jānantīti.
atk-s0505a:1800_0: 509. Yo vedagūti idāni attānaṃ sandhāya bhagavā imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha satimāti chasatatavihārasatiyā
atk-s0505a:1800_1: samannāgato. Sambodhipattoti sabbaññutaṃ patto. Saraṇaṃ bahūnanti bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1801_0: 510. Evaṃ dakkhiṇeyye sutvā attamano brāhmaṇo āha – “addhā amoghā”ti. Tattha tvañhettha
atk-s0505a:1801_1: jānāsi yathā tathā idanti tvañhi ettha loke idaṃ sabbampi ñeyyaṃ yathā tathā jānāsi
atk-s0505a:1801_2: yāthāvato jānāsi, yādisaṃ taṃ tādisameva jānāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi te vidito
atk-s0505a:1801_3: esa dhammoti tathā hi te esā dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā, yassā suppaṭividdhatā yaṃ
atk-s0505a:1801_4: yaṃ icchasi, taṃ taṃ jānāsīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1802_0: 511. Evaṃ so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsitvā dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya yaññasampadaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0505a:1802_1: dāyakasampadāyapi taṃ chaḷaṅgaparipūraṃ yaññasampadaṃ sotukāmo “yo yācayogo”ti uttaripañhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1802_2: pucchi. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – yo yācayogo dadaṃ paresaṃ yajati, tassa akkhāhi me bhagavā yaññasampadanti.
atk-s0505a:1803: 512. Athassa bhagavā dvīhi gāthāhi akkhāsi. Tatthāyaṃ atthayojanā – yajassu māgha, yajamāno ca sabbattha vippasādehi cittaṃ, tīsupi kālesu cittaṃ pasādehi. Evaṃ te yāyaṃ –
atk-s0505a:1805: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:1806_0: Yaññasampadā vuttā, tāya sampanno yañño bhavissati. Tattha siyā “kathaṃ cittaṃ pasādetabba”nti?
atk-s0505a:1806_1: Dosappahānena. Kathaṃ dosappahānaṃ hoti? Yaññārammaṇatāya. Ayañhi ārammaṇaṃ yajamānassa
atk-s0505a:1806_2: yañño ettha patiṭṭhāya jahāti dosaṃ, ayañhi sattesu mettāpubbaṅgamena sammādiṭṭhipadīpavihatamohandhakārena
atk-s0505a:1806_3: cittena yajamānassa deyyadhammasaṅkhāto yañño ārammaṇaṃ hoti, so ettha yaññe ārammaṇavasena
atk-s0505a:1806_4: pavattiyā patiṭṭhāya deyyadhammapaccayaṃ lobhaṃ, paṭiggāhakapaccayaṃ kodhaṃ, tadubhayanidānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1806_5: mohanti evaṃ tividhampi jahāti dosaṃ. So evaṃ bhogesu vītarāgo, sattesu ca pavineyya
atk-s0505a:1806_6: dosaṃ tappahāneneva pahīnapañcanīvaraṇo anukkamena upacārappanābhedaṃ aparimāṇasattapharaṇena
atk-s0505a:1806_7: ekasatte vā anavasesapharaṇena appamāṇaṃ mettaṃ cittaṃ bhāvento puna bhāvanāvepullatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1806_8: rattindivaṃ satataṃ sabbairiyāpathesu appamatto hutvā tameva mettajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:1807_0: 514. Atha brāhmaṇo taṃ mettaṃ “brahmalokamaggo aya”nti ajānanto kevalaṃ attano visayātītaṃ
atk-s0505a:1807_1: mettābhāvanaṃ sutvā suṭṭhutaraṃ sañjātasabbaññusambhāvano bhagavati attanā brahmalokādhimuttattā
atk-s0505a:1807_2: brahmalokūpapattimeva ca suddhiṃ muttiñca maññamāno brahmalokamaggaṃ pucchanto “ko
atk-s0505a:1807_3: sujjhatī”ti gāthamāha. Tatra ca brahmalokagāmiṃ puññaṃ karontaṃ sandhāyāha – “ko
atk-s0505a:1807_4: sujjhati muccatī”ti, akarontaṃ sandhāya “bajjhatī cā”ti. Kenattanāti kena kāraṇena.
atk-s0505a:1807_5: Sakkhi brahmajjadiṭṭhoti brahmā ajja sakkhi diṭṭho. Saccanti bhagavato brahmasamattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1807_6: ārabbha accādarena sapathaṃ karoti. Kathaṃ upapajjatīti accādareneva punapi pucchati.
atk-s0505a:1808_0: Tattha yasmā yo bhikkhu mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:1808_1: vipassanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sujjhati muccati ca, tathārūpo ca brahmalokaṃ na
atk-s0505a:1808_2: gacchati. Yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppādetvā “santā esā samāpattī”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:1808_3: nayena taṃ assādeti, so bajjhati. Aparihīnajjhāno ca teneva jhānena brahmalokaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:1808_4: tasmā bhagavā yo sujjhati muccati ca, tassa brahmalokagamanaṃ ananujānanto anāmasitvāva
atk-s0505a:1808_5: taṃ puggalaṃ yo bajjhati. Tassa tena jhānena brahmalokagamanaṃ dassento brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:1809_0: 515. Tattha tividhanti tikālappasādaṃ sandhāyāha. Tena dāyakato aṅgattayaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1809_1: Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādīti tañca so tādiso tividhasampattisādhako puggalo tividhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1809_2: yaññasampadaṃ dakkhiṇeyyehi khīṇāsavehi sādheyya sampādeyya. Iminā paṭiggāhakato
atk-s0505a:1809_3: aṅgattayaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ yajitvā sammā yācayogoti evaṃ mettajjhānapadaṭṭhānabhāvena
atk-s0505a:1809_4: chaḷaṅgasamannāgataṃ yaññaṃ sammā yajitvā so yācayogo tena chaḷaṅgayaññūpanissayena
atk-s0505a:1809_5: mettajjhānena upapajjati brahmalokanti brūmīti brāhmaṇaṃ samussāhento desanaṃ samāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1809_6: Sesaṃ sabbagāthāsu uttānatthameva. Ito parañca pubbe vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0505a:1813_0: Evaṃ me sutanti sabhiyasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. Atthavaṇṇanākkamepi
atk-s0505a:1813_1: cassa pubbasadisaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana apubbaṃ, taṃ uttānatthāni
atk-s0505a:1813_2: padāni pariharantā vaṇṇayissāma. Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa
atk-s0505a:1813_3: nāmaṃ. Taṃ kira veḷūhi ca parikkhittaṃ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena, gopuradvāraṭṭālakayuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1813_4: nīlobhāsaṃ manoramaṃ, tena “veḷuvana”nti vuccati. Kalandakānañcettha nivāpaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1813_5: tena “kalandakanivāpo”ti vuccati. Kalandakā nāma kāḷakā vuccanti. Pubbe kira aññataro
atk-s0505a:1813_6: rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṃ supi. Parijanopissa
atk-s0505a:1813_7: “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi. Atha surāgandhena
atk-s0505a:1813_8: aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0505a:1813_9: rukkhadevatā “rañño jīvitaṃ dassāmī”ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi.
atk-s0505a:1813_10: Rājā paṭibujjhi, kaṇhasappo nivatto. So taṃ disvā “imāya mama kāḷakāya jīvitaṃ dinna”nti
atk-s0505a:1813_11: kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi, abhayaghosanañca ghosāpesi. Tasmā taṃ tato pabhuti
atk-s0505a:1814_0: Sabhiyassa paribbājakassāti sabhiyoti tassa nāmaṃ, paribbājakoti bāhira pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:1814_1: upādāya vuccati. Purāṇasālohitāya devatāyāti na mātā na pitā, apica kho panassa mātā
atk-s0505a:1814_2: viya pitā viya ca hitajjhāsayattā so devaputto “purāṇasālohitā devatā”ti vutto. Parinibbute
atk-s0505a:1814_3: kira kassape bhagavati patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye tayo kulaputtā sammukhasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1814_4: santike pabbajitvā cariyānurūpāni kammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā paccantajanapadaṃ gantvā
atk-s0505a:1814_5: araññāyatane samaṇadhammaṃ karonti, antarantarā ca cetiyavandanatthāya dhammassavanatthāya
atk-s0505a:1814_6: ca nagaraṃ gacchanti. Aparena ca samayena tāvatakampi araññe vippavāsaṃ arocayamānā
atk-s0505a:1814_7: tattheva appamattā vihariṃsu, evaṃ viharantāpi na ca kiñci visesaṃ adhigamiṃsu. Tato
atk-s0505a:1814_8: nesaṃ ahosi – “mayaṃ piṇḍāya gacchantā jīvite sāpekkhā homa, jīvite sāpekkhena ca
atk-s0505a:1814_9: na sakkā lokuttaradhammo adhigantuṃ, puthujjanakālakiriyāpi dukkhā, handa mayaṃ nisseṇiṃ
atk-s0505a:1814_10: bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṃ karomā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1815_0: Atha nesaṃ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiññāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1815_1: sacchākāsi. So iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍāya
atk-s0505a:1815_2: caritvā katabhattakicco puna aññampi padesaṃ gantvā pattaṃ pūretvā anotattaudakañca
atk-s0505a:1815_3: nāgalatādantapoṇañca gahetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā āha – “passathāvuso mamānubhāvaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1815_4: ayaṃ uttarakuruto piṇḍapāto, idaṃ himavantato udakadantapoṇaṃ ābhataṃ, imaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0505a:1815_5: samaṇadhammaṃ karotha, evāhaṃ tumhe sadā upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti. Te taṃ sutvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0505a:1815_6: “tumhe, bhante, katakiccā, tumhehi saha sallāpamattampi amhākaṃ papañco, mā dāni
atk-s0505a:1815_7: tumhe puna amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgamitthā”ti. So kenaci pariyāyena te sampaṭicchāpetuṃ asakkonto pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:1816_0: Tato tesaṃ eko dvīhatīhaccayena pañcābhiñño anāgāmī ahosi. Sopi tatheva akāsi, itarena
atk-s0505a:1816_1: ca paṭikkhitto tatheva agamāsi. So taṃ paṭikkhipitvā vāyamanto pabbataṃ āruhanadivasato
atk-s0505a:1816_2: sattame divase kiñci visesaṃ anadhigantvāva kālakato devaloke nibbatti. Khīṇāsavattheropi
atk-s0505a:1816_3: taṃ divasameva parinibbāyi, anāgāmī suddhāvāsesu uppajji. Devaputto chasu kāmāvacaradevalokesu
atk-s0505a:1816_4: anulomapaṭilomena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokā cavitvā
atk-s0505a:1816_5: aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Sā kira aññatarassa khattiyassa
atk-s0505a:1816_6: dhītā, taṃ mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ dhītā samayantaraṃ jānātū”ti ekassa paribbājakassa
atk-s0505a:1816_7: niyyātesuṃ. Tasseko antevāsiko paribbājako tāya saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji. Sā tena gabbhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1816_8: gaṇhi. Taṃ gabbhiniṃ disvā paribbājikā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu. Sā aññattha gacchantī antarāmagge
atk-s0505a:1816_9: sabhāyaṃ vijāyi, tenassa “sabhiyo”tveva nāmaṃ akāsi. Sopi sabhiyo vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0505a:1816_10: pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā mahāvādī hutvā vādakkhittatāya sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0505a:1816_11: vicaranto attano sadisaṃ vādiṃ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṃ kārāpetvā khattiyakumārādayo
atk-s0505a:1817_0: Atha bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā veḷuvane viharati
atk-s0505a:1817_1: kalandakanivāpe. Sabhiyo pana buddhuppādaṃ na jānāti. Atha so suddhāvāsabrahmā samāpattito
atk-s0505a:1817_2: vuṭṭhāya “imāhaṃ visesaṃ kassānubhāvena patto”ti āvajjento kassapassa bhagavato sāsane
atk-s0505a:1817_3: samaṇadhammakiriyaṃ te ca sahāye anussaritvā “tesu eko parinibbuto, eko idāni katthā”ti
atk-s0505a:1817_4: āvajjento “devalokā cavitvā jambudīpe uppanno buddhuppādampi na jānātī”ti ñatvā “handa
atk-s0505a:1817_5: naṃ buddhupasevanāya niyojemī”ti vīsati pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā rattibhāge tassa assamamāgamma
atk-s0505a:1817_6: ākāse ṭhatvā “sabhiya, sabhiyā”ti pakkosi. So niddāyamāno tikkhattuṃ taṃ saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:1817_7: nikkhamma obhāsaṃ disvā pañjaliko aṭṭhāsi. Tato taṃ brahmā āha – “ahaṃ sabhiya tavatthāya
atk-s0505a:1817_8: vīsati pañhe āhariṃ, te tvaṃ uggaṇha. Yo ca te samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime pañhe puṭṭho
atk-s0505a:1817_9: byākaroti, tassa santike brahmacariyaṃ careyyāsī”ti. Imaṃ devaputtaṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0505a:1817_10: vuttaṃ “purāṇasālohitāya devatāya pañhā uddiṭṭhā hontī”ti. Uddiṭṭhāti uddesamatteneva
atk-s0505a:1818_0: Evaṃ vutte ca ne sabhiyo ekavacaneneva padapaṭipāṭiyā uggahesi. Atha so brahmā jānantopi
atk-s0505a:1818_1: tassa buddhuppādaṃ nācikkhi. “Atthaṃ gavesamāno paribbājako sayameva satthāraṃ ñassati.
atk-s0505a:1818_2: Ito bahiddhā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tucchabhāva”nti iminā panādhippāyena evamāha –
atk-s0505a:1818_3: “yo te sabhiya…pe… careyyāsī”ti. Theragāthāsu pana catukkanipāte sabhiyattherāpadānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1818_4: vaṇṇentā bhaṇanti “sā cassa mātā attano vippaṭipattiṃ cintetvā taṃ jigucchamānā jhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1818_5: uppādetvā brahmaloke uppannā, tāya brahmadevatāya te pañhā uddiṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1819_0: Ye teti idāni vattabbānaṃ uddesapaccuddeso. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti pabbajjūpagamanena lokasammutiyā
atk-s0505a:1819_1: ca samaṇā ceva brāhmaṇā ca. Saṅghinoti gaṇavanto. Gaṇinoti satthāro, “sabbaññuno
atk-s0505a:1819_2: maya”nti evaṃ paṭiññātāro. Gaṇācariyāti uddesaparipucchādivasena pabbajitagahaṭṭhagaṇassa
atk-s0505a:1819_3: ācariyā. Ñātāti abhiññātā, vissutā pākaṭāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yasassinoti lābhaparivārasampannā.
atk-s0505a:1819_4: Titthakarāti tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantehi otaritabbānaṃ ogāhitabbānaṃ diṭṭhititthānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1819_5: kattāro. Sādhusammatā bahujanassāti “sādhavo ete santo sappurisā”ti evaṃ bahujanassa sammatā.
atk-s0505a:1820_0: Seyyathidanti katame teti ce-iccetasmiṃ atthe nipāto. Pūraṇoti nāmaṃ, kassapoti gottaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1820_1: So kira jātiyā dāso, dāsasataṃ pūrento jāto. Tenassa “pūraṇo”ti nāmamakaṃsu. Palāyitvā
atk-s0505a:1820_2: pana naggesu pabbajitvā “kassapo aha”nti gottaṃ uddisi, sabbaññutañca paccaññāsi.
atk-s0505a:1820_3: Makkhalīti nāmaṃ, gosālāya jātattā gosālotipi vuccati. Sopi kira jātiyā dāso eva,
atk-s0505a:1820_4: palāyitvā pabbaji, sabbaññutañca paccaññāsi. Ajitoti nāmaṃ, appicchatāya kesakambalaṃ
atk-s0505a:1820_5: dhāreti, tena kesakambalotipi vuccati, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi. Pakudhoti nāmaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1820_6: kaccāyanoti gottaṃ. Appicchavasena udake jīvasaññāya ca nhānamukhadhovanādi paṭikkhitto,
atk-s0505a:1820_7: sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi. Sañcayoti nāmaṃ, belaṭṭho panassa pitā, tasmā belaṭṭhaputtoti
atk-s0505a:1820_8: vuccati, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi. Nigaṇṭhoti pabbajjānāmena, nāṭaputtoti pitunāmena
atk-s0505a:1820_9: vuccati. Nāṭoti kira nāmassa pitā, tassa puttoti nāṭaputto, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi.
atk-s0505a:1820_10: Sabbepi pañcasatapañcasatasissaparivārā ahesuṃ. Teti te cha satthāro. Te pañheti
atk-s0505a:1820_11: te vīsati pañhe. Teti te cha satthāro. Na sampāyantīti na sampādenti. Kopanti cittacetasikānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1820_12: āvilabhāvaṃ. Dosanti paduṭṭhacittataṃ, tadubhayampetaṃ mandatikkhabhedassa kodhassevādhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1820_13: Appaccayanti appatītatā, domanassanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pātukarontīti kāyavacīvikārena
atk-s0505a:1821_0: Hīnāyāti gahaṭṭhabhāvāya. Gahaṭṭhabhāvo hi pabbajjaṃ upanidhāya sīlādiguṇahīnato
atk-s0505a:1821_1: hīnakāmasukhapaṭisevanato vā “hīno”ti vuccati. Uccā pabbajjā. Āvattitvāti osakkitvā.
atk-s0505a:1821_2: Kāme paribhuñjeyyanti kāme paṭiseveyyaṃ. Iti kirassa sabbaññupaṭiññānampi pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1821_3: tucchakattaṃ disvā ahosi. Uppannaparivitakkavaseneva ca āgantvā punappunaṃ vīmaṃsamānassa
atk-s0505a:1821_4: atha kho sabhiyassa paribbājakassa etadahosi – “ayampi kho samaṇo”ti ca “yepi kho
atk-s0505a:1821_5: te bhonto”ti ca “samaṇo kho daharoti na uññātabbo”ti cāti evamādi. Tattha jiṇṇātiādīni
atk-s0505a:1821_6: padāni vuttanayāneva. Therāti attano samaṇadhamme thirabhāvappattā. Rattaññūti ratanaññū,
atk-s0505a:1821_7: “nibbānaratanaṃ jānāma maya”nti evaṃ sakāya paṭiññāya lokenāpi sammatā, bahurattividū
atk-s0505a:1821_8: vā. Ciraṃ pabbajitānaṃ etesanti cirapabbajitā. Na uññātabboti na avajānitabbo, na
atk-s0505a:1821_9: nīcaṃ katvā jānitabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Na paribhotabboti na paribhavitabbo, “kimesa
atk-s0505a:1821_10: ñassatī”ti evaṃ na gahetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1822_0: 516. Kaṅkhī vecikicchīti sabhiyo bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodamāno evaṃ bhagavato rūpasampattidamūpasamasūcitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1822_1: sabbaññutaṃ sambhāvayamāno vigatuddhacco hutvā āha – “kaṅkhī vecikicchī”ti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1822_2: “labheyyaṃ nu kho imesaṃ byākaraṇa”nti evaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇakaṅkhāya kaṅkhī. “Ko
atk-s0505a:1822_3: nu kho imassimassa ca pañhassa attho”ti evaṃ vicikicchāya vecikicchī. Dubbalavicikicchāya
atk-s0505a:1822_4: vā tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthe kaṅkhanato kaṅkhī, balavatiyā vicinanto kicchatiyeva, na
atk-s0505a:1822_5: sakkoti sanniṭṭhātunti vecikicchī. Abhikaṅkhamānoti ativiya patthayamāno. Tesantakaroti
atk-s0505a:1822_6: tesaṃ pañhānaṃ antakaro. Bhavantova evaṃ bhavāhīti dassento āha “pañhe me puṭṭho…pe…
atk-s0505a:1822_7: byākarohi me”ti. Tattha pañhe meti pañhe mayā. Puṭṭhoti pucchito. Anupubbanti pañhapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0505a:1822_8: anudhammanti atthānurūpaṃ pāḷiṃ āropento. Byākarohi meti mayhaṃ byākarohi.
atk-s0505a:1823: 517. Dūratoti so kira ito cito cāhiṇḍanto sattayojanasatamaggato āgato. Tenāha – bhagavā “dūrato āgatosī”ti, kassapassa bhagavato vā sāsanato āgatattā “dūrato āgatosī”ti naṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:1824: 518. Puccha manti imāya panassa gāthāya sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti. Tattha manasicchasīti manasā icchasi.
atk-s0505a:1825_0: Yaṃ vatāhanti yaṃ vata ahaṃ. Attamanoti pītipāmojjasomanassehi phuṭacitto. Udaggoti
atk-s0505a:1825_1: kāyena cittena ca abbhunnato. Idaṃ pana padaṃ na sabbapāṭhesu atthi. Idāni yehi dhammehi
atk-s0505a:1826_0: 519. Kiṃ pattinanti kiṃ pattaṃ kimadhigataṃ. Soratanti suvūpasantaṃ. “Surata”ntipi
atk-s0505a:1826_1: pāṭho, suṭṭhu uparatanti attho. Dantanti damitaṃ. Buddhoti vibuddho, buddhaboddhabbo
atk-s0505a:1826_2: vā. Evaṃ sabhiyo ekekāya gāthāya cattāro cattāro katvā pañcahi gāthāhi vīsati pañhe
atk-s0505a:1826_3: pucchi. Bhagavā panassa ekamekaṃ pañhaṃ ekamekāya gāthāya katvā arahattanikūṭeneva
atk-s0505a:1827_0: 520. Tattha yasmā bhinnakileso paramatthabhikkhu, so ca nibbānappatto hoti, tasmā
atk-s0505a:1827_1: assa “kiṃ pattinamāhu bhikkhuna”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ byākaronto “pajjenā”tiādimāha. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:1827_2: – yo attanā bhāvitena maggena parinibbānagato kilesaparinibbānaṃ patto, parinibbānagatattā
atk-s0505a:1827_4: bhavañca vippahāya, maggavāsaṃ vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavoti ca etesaṃ thutivacanānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1828_0: 521. Yasmā pana vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena nānappakārakilesavūpasamena
atk-s0505a:1828_1: ca sorato hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “sabbattha upekkhako”tiādinā nayena dutiyapañhabyākaraṇamāha.
atk-s0505a:1828_2: Tassattho – yo sabbattha rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
atk-s0505a:1828_3: na dummano”ti evaṃ pavattāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya upekkhako, vepullappattāya satiyā satimā,
atk-s0505a:1828_4: na so hiṃsati neva hiṃsati kañci tasathāvarādibhedaṃ sattaṃ sabbaloke sabbasmimpi
atk-s0505a:1828_5: loke, tiṇṇoghattā tiṇṇo, samitapāpattā samaṇo, āvilasaṅkappappahānā anāvilo. Yassa
atk-s0505a:1828_6: cime rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritasaṅkhātā sattussadā keci oḷārikā vā sukhumā
atk-s0505a:1828_7: vā na santi, so imāya upekkhāvihāritāya sativepullatāya ahiṃsakatāya ca vippaṭipattito
atk-s0505a:1828_8: suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena iminā oghādinānappakārakilesavūpasamena ca soratoti.
atk-s0505a:1829_0: 522. Yasmā ca bhāvitindriyo nibbhayo nibbikāro danto hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:1829_1: “yassindriyānī”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tassattho – yassa cakkhādīni chaḷindriyāni
atk-s0505a:1829_3: gāhāpetvā ca bhāvitāni, tāni ca kho yathā ajjhattaṃ gocarabhāvanāya, evaṃ pana bahiddhā
atk-s0505a:1829_4: ca sabbaloketi yattha yattha indriyānaṃ vekallatā vekallatāya vā sambhavo, tattha
atk-s0505a:1829_5: tattha nābhijjhādivasena bhāvitānīti evaṃ nibbijjha ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā imaṃ parañca
atk-s0505a:1829_7: kālaṃ kaṅkhati, jīvitakkhayakālaṃ āgameti patimāneti, na bhāyati maraṇassa. Yathāha thero –
atk-s0505a:1830: “Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, nikanti natthi jīvite”; ;
atk-s0505a:1833: Bhāvito sa dantoti evaṃ bhāvitindriyo so dantoti.
atk-s0505a:1834_0: 523. Yasmā pana buddho nāma buddhisampanno kilesaniddā vibuddho ca, tasmā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1834_1: dassento “kappānī”ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tattha kappānīti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0505a:1834_2: Tā hi tathā tathā vikappanato “kappānī”ti vuccanti. Viceyyāti aniccādibhāvena sammasitvā.
atk-s0505a:1837_0: Evaṃ khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāto saṃsāro, taṃ saṃsārañca kevalaṃ viceyya. Ettāvatā
atk-s0505a:1837_1: khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtesu kammakilesesu khandhesu cāti evaṃ tīsupi vaṭṭesu vipassanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1837_2: āha. Dubhayaṃ cutūpapātanti sattānaṃ cutiṃ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṃ viceyya ñatvāti
atk-s0505a:1837_3: attho. Etena cutūpapātañāṇaṃ āha. Vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṃ visuddhanti rāgādirajānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1837_4: vigamā aṅgaṇānaṃ abhāvā malānañca vigamā vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṃ visuddhaṃ. Pattaṃ jātikhayanti
atk-s0505a:1837_5: nibbānaṃ pattaṃ. Tamāhu buddhanti taṃ imāya lokuttaravipassanāya cutūpapātañāṇabhedāya
atk-s0505a:1837_6: buddhiyā sampannattā imāya ca vigatarajāditāya kilesaniddā vibuddhattā tāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0505a:1838_0: Atha vā kappāni viceyya kevalānīti “anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe amutrāsi”ntiādinā
atk-s0505a:1838_1: nayena vicinitvāti attho. Etena paṭhamavijjamāha. Saṃsāraṃ dubhayaṃ cutūpapātanti
atk-s0505a:1838_2: sattānaṃ cutiṃ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṃ saṃsāraṃ “ime vata bhonto sattā”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:1838_3: nayena vicinitvāti attho. Etena dutiyavijjamāha. Avasesena tatiyavijjamāha. Āsavakkhayañāṇena
atk-s0505a:1838_4: hi vigatarajāditā ca nibbānappatti ca hotīti. Tamāhu buddhanti evaṃ vijjattayabhedabuddhisampannaṃ taṃ buddhamāhūti.
atk-s0505a:1839_0: 525. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā
atk-s0505a:1839_1: brahmabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ patto paramatthabrāhmaṇo bāhitasabbapāpo hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1839_2: dassento “bāhitvā”ti gāthāya paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi. Tassattho – yo catutthamaggena
atk-s0505a:1839_3: bāhitvā sabbapāpakāni ṭhitatto, ṭhito icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Bāhitapāpattā eva ca vimalo,
atk-s0505a:1839_6: kevalī, so taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anissitattā asito, lokadhammehi nibbikārattā “tādī”ti ca
atk-s0505a:1839_7: pavuccati. Evaṃ thutiraho sa brahmā so brāhmaṇoti.
atk-s0505a:1840_0: 526. Yasmā pana samitapāpatāya samaṇo, nhātapāpatāya nhātako, āgūnaṃ akaraṇena ca
atk-s0505a:1840_1: nāgoti pavuccati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento tato aparāhi tīhi gāthāhi tayo pañhe byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1840_2: Tattha samitāvīti ariyamaggena kilese sametvā ṭhito. Samaṇo pavuccate tathattāti
atk-s0505a:1840_3: tathārūpo samaṇo pavuccatīti. Ettāvatā pañho byākato hoti, sesaṃ tasmiṃ samaṇe sabhiyassa
atk-s0505a:1840_4: bahumānajananatthaṃ thutivacanaṃ. Yo hi samitāvī, so puññapāpānaṃ apaṭisandhikaraṇena
atk-s0505a:1840_5: pahāya puññapāpaṃ rajānaṃ vigamena virajo, aniccādivasena ñatvā imaṃ parañca lokaṃ
atk-s0505a:1841_0: 527. Ninhāya…pe… nhātakoti ettha pana yo ajjhattabahiddhāsaṅkhāte sabbasmimpi āyatanaloke
atk-s0505a:1841_1: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena uppattirahāni sabbapāpakāni maggañāṇena ninhāya dhovitvā
atk-s0505a:1841_2: tāya ninhātapāpakatāya taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi kappiyesu devamanussesu kappaṃ na eti,
atk-s0505a:1842_0: 528. Catutthagāthāyapi āguṃ na karoti kiñci loketi yo loke appamattakampi pāpasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0505a:1842_1: āguṃ na karoti, nāgo pavuccate tathattāti. Ettāvatā pañho byākato hoti, sesaṃ pubbanayeneva
atk-s0505a:1842_2: thutivacanaṃ. Yo hi maggena pahīnaāguttā āguṃ na karoti, so kāmayogādike sabbayoge
atk-s0505a:1842_3: dasasaññojanabhedāni ca sabbabandhanāni visajja jahitvā sabbattha khandhādīsu kenaci
atk-s0505a:1842_4: saṅgena na sajjati, dvīhi ca vimuttīhi vimutto, tādi ca hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1843_0: 530. Evaṃ dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā
atk-s0505a:1843_2: vatthupeta”nti. Tāni vijeyya vijetvā abhibhavitvā, viceyya vā aniccādibhāvena vicinitvā
atk-s0505a:1843_3: upaparikkhitvā kevalāni anavasesāni, visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṃ dibbaṃ mānusakañca
atk-s0505a:1843_4: brahmakhettaṃ, yaṃ dibbaṃ dvādasāyatanabhedaṃ tathā mānusakañca, yañca brahmakhettaṃ
atk-s0505a:1843_5: chaḷāyatane cakkhāyatanādidvādasāyatanabhedaṃ, taṃ sabbampi vijeyya viceyya vā. Yato
atk-s0505a:1843_6: yadetaṃ sabbesaṃ khettānaṃ mūlabandhanaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādi, tasmā sabbakhettamūlabandhanā
atk-s0505a:1843_7: pamutto. Evametesaṃ khettānaṃ vijitattā vicinitattā vā khettajino nāma hoti, tasmā
atk-s0505a:1843_8: “khettānī”ti imāya gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tattha keci “kammaṃ khettaṃ, viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1843_9: bījaṃ, taṇhā sneho”ti vacanato kammāni khettānīti vadanti. Dibbaṃ mānusakañca brahmakhettanti
atk-s0505a:1843_10: ettha ca devūpagaṃ kammaṃ dibbaṃ, manussūpagaṃ kammaṃ mānusakaṃ, brahmūpagaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1844_0: 531. Yasmā pana sakaṭṭhena kosasadisattā “kosānī”ti kammāni vuccanti, tesañca lunanā
atk-s0505a:1844_1: samucchedanā kusalo hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “kosānī”ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1844_2: byākāsi. Tassattho – lokiyalokuttaravipassanāya visayato kiccato ca aniccādibhāvena
atk-s0505a:1844_3: kusalākusalakammasaṅkhātāni kosāni viceyya kevalāni, visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:1844_5: brahmakosaṃ viceyya. Tato imāya maggabhāvanāya avijjābhavataṇhādibhedā sabbakosānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1844_6: mūlabandhanā pamutto, evametesaṃ kosānaṃ lunanā “kusalo”ti pavuccati, tathattā tādī
atk-s0505a:1844_7: ca hotīti. Atha vā sattānaṃ dhammānañca nivāsaṭṭhena asikosasadisattā “kosānī”ti
atk-s0505a:1844_8: tayo bhavā dvādasāyatanāni ca veditabbāni. Evamettha yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0505a:1845_0: 532. Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ paṇḍatīti imināva “paṇḍito”ti vuccati, apica kho pana paṇḍarāni
atk-s0505a:1845_1: ito upagato pavicayapaññāya allīnotipi “paṇḍito”ti vuccati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:1845_2: “dubhayānī”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tassattho – ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1845_3: ubhayāni aniccādibhāvena viceyya. Paṇḍarānīti āyatanāni. Tāni hi pakatiparisuddhattā
atk-s0505a:1845_4: ruḷhiyā ca evaṃ vuccanti, tāni viceyya imāya paṭipattiyā niddhantamalattā suddhipañño
atk-s0505a:1845_5: paṇḍitoti pavuccati tathattā, yasmā tāni paṇḍarāni paññāya ito hoti, sesamassa thutivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1845_6: So hi pāpapuññasaṅkhātaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ upātivatto tādī ca hoti, tasmā evaṃ thuto.
atk-s0505a:1846_0: 533. Yasmā pana “monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, yā paññā pajānanā…pe… sammādiṭṭhi, tena ñāṇena
atk-s0505a:1846_1: samannāgato munī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “asatañcā”ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1846_2: byākāsi. Tassattho – yvāyaṃ akusalakusalappabhedo asatañca satañca dhammo, taṃ ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1846_3: bahiddhāti imasmiṃ sabbaloke pavicayañāṇena asatañca satañca ñatvā dhammaṃ tassa
atk-s0505a:1846_4: ñātattā eva rāgādibhedato sattavidhaṃ saṅgaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato duvidhaṃ jālañca
atk-s0505a:1846_5: aticca atikkamitvā ṭhito. So tena monasaṅkhātena pavicayañāṇena samannāgatattā muni.
atk-s0505a:1846_6: Devamanussehi pūjanīyoti idaṃ panassa thutivacanaṃ. So hi khīṇāsavamunittā devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1847_0: 535. Evaṃ tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā catutthagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā
atk-s0505a:1847_1: yo catūhi maggañāṇavedehi kilesakkhayaṃ karonto gato, so paramatthato vedagū nāma
atk-s0505a:1847_2: hoti. Yo ca sabbasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ satthasaññitāni vedāni, tāyeva maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0505a:1847_3: kiccato aniccādivasena viceyya. Tattha chandarāgappahānena tameva sabbaṃ vedamaticca
atk-s0505a:1847_4: yā vedapaccayā vā aññathā vā uppajjanti vedanā, tāsu sabbavedanāsu vītarāgo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1847_5: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “idaṃ pattina”nti avatvā “vedānī”ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1847_6: byākāsi. Yasmā vā yo pavicayapaññāya vedāni viceyya, tattha chandarāgappahānena sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1847_7: vedamaticca vattati, so satthasaññitāni vedāni gato ñāto atikkanto ca hoti. Yo vedanāsu
atk-s0505a:1847_8: vītarāgo, sopi vedanāsaññitāni vedāni gato atikkanto ca hoti. Vedāni gatotipi vedagū,
atk-s0505a:1847_9: tasmā tampi atthaṃ dassento “idaṃ pattina”nti avatvā imāya gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1848_0: 536. Yasmā pana dutiyapañhe “anuvidito”ti anubuddho vuccati, so ca anuvicca papañcanāmarūpaṃ
atk-s0505a:1848_1: ajjhattaṃ attano santāne taṇhāmānadiṭṭhibhedaṃ papañcaṃ tappaccayā nāmarūpañca aniccānupassanādīhi
atk-s0505a:1848_2: anuvicca anuviditvā, na kevalañca ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā ca rogamūlaṃ, parasantāne ca
atk-s0505a:1848_3: imassa nāmarūparogassa mūlaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādiṃ, tameva vā papañcaṃ anuvicca tāya
atk-s0505a:1848_4: bhāvanāya sabbesaṃ rogānaṃ mūlabandhanā, sabbasmā vā rogānaṃ mūlabandhanā, avijjābhavataṇhādibhedā,
atk-s0505a:1848_5: tasmā eva vā papañcā pamutto hoti, tasmā taṃ dassento “anuviccā”ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1849_0: 537. “Kathañca vīriyavā”ti ettha pana yasmā yo ariyamaggena sabbapāpakehi virato,
atk-s0505a:1849_1: tathā viratattā ca āyatiṃ apaṭisandhitāya nirayadukkhaṃ aticca ṭhito vīriyavāso vīriyaniketo,
atk-s0505a:1849_2: so khīṇāsavo “vīriyavā”ti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “virato”ti
atk-s0505a:1849_3: gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. Padhānavā dhīro tādīti imāni panassa thutivacanāni.
atk-s0505a:1849_4: So hi padhānavā maggajhānapadhānena, dhīro kilesārividdhaṃsanasamatthatāya, tādī
atk-s0505a:1849_5: nibbikāratāya, tasmā evaṃ thuto. Sesaṃ yojetvā vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1850_0: 538. “Ājāniyo kinti nāma hotī”ti ettha pana yasmā pahīnasabbavaṅkadoso kāraṇākāraṇaññū
atk-s0505a:1850_1: asso vā hatthī vā “ājāniyo hotī”ti loke vuccati, na ca tassa sabbaso te dosā pahīnā
atk-s0505a:1850_2: eva, khīṇāsavassa pana te pahīnā, tasmā so “ājāniyo”ti paramatthato vattabbataṃ arahatīti
atk-s0505a:1850_3: dassento “yassā”ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tassattho – ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā
atk-s0505a:1850_4: cāti evaṃ ajjhattabahiddhāsaññojanasaṅkhātāni yassa assu lunāni bandhanāni paññāsatthena
atk-s0505a:1850_5: chinnāni padālitāni. Saṅgamūlanti yāni tesu tesu vatthūsu saṅgassa sajjanāya anatikkamanāya
atk-s0505a:1850_6: mūlaṃ honti, atha vā yassa assu lunāni rāgādīni bandhanāni yāni ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā
atk-s0505a:1850_7: ca saṅgamūlāni honti, so sabbasmā saṅgānaṃ mūlabhūtā sabbasaṅgānaṃ vā mūlabhūtā bandhanā
atk-s0505a:1850_8: pamutto “ājāniyo”ti vuccati, tathattā tādi ca hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1851_0: 540. Evaṃ catutthagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā pañcamagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā
atk-s0505a:1851_1: yaṃ chandajjhenamattena akkharacintakā sottiyaṃ vaṇṇayanti, vohāramattasottiyo so.
atk-s0505a:1851_2: Ariyo pana bāhusaccena nissutapāpatāya ca paramatthasottiyo hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1851_3: dassento “idaṃ pattina”nti avatvā “sutvā”ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tassattho
atk-s0505a:1851_4: – yo imasmiṃ loke sutamayapaññākiccavasena sutvā kātabbakiccavasena vā sutvā vipassanūpagaṃ
atk-s0505a:1851_5: sabbadhammaṃ aniccādivasena abhiññāya sāvajjānavajjaṃ yadatthi kiñci, imāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0505a:1851_6: kilese kilesaṭṭhāniye ca dhamme abhibhavitvā abhibhūti saṅkhaṃ gato, taṃ sutvā sabbadhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1851_7: abhiññāya loke sāvajjānavajjaṃ yadatthi kiñci, abhibhuṃ sutavattā sottiyoti āhu.
atk-s0505a:1851_8: Yasmā ca yo akathaṃkathī kilesabandhanehi vimutto, rāgādīhi īghehi anīgho ca hoti
atk-s0505a:1851_9: sabbadhi sabbesu dhammesu khandhāyatanādīsu, tasmā taṃ akathaṃkathiṃ vimuttaṃ anīghaṃ
atk-s0505a:1852_0: 541. Yasmā pana hitakāmena janena araṇīyato ariyo hoti, abhigamanīyatoti attho. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:1852_1: yehi guṇehi so araṇīyo hoti, te dassentā “chetvā”ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1852_2: Tassattho – cattāri āsavāni dve ca ālayāni paññāsatthena chetvā vidvā viññū vibhāvī
atk-s0505a:1852_3: catumaggañāṇī so punabbhavavasena na upeti gabbhaseyyaṃ, kañci yoniṃ na upagacchati,
atk-s0505a:1852_4: kāmādibhedañca saññaṃ tividhaṃ. Kāmaguṇasaṅkhātañca paṅkaṃ panujja panuditvā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1852_5: aññatarampi kappaṃ na eti, evaṃ āsavacchedādiguṇasamannāgataṃ tamāhu ariyoti. Yasmā
atk-s0505a:1852_6: vā pāpakehi ārakattā ariyo hoti anaye ca anirīyanā, tasmā tampi atthaṃ dassento imāya
atk-s0505a:1852_7: gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. Āsavādayo hi pāpakā dhammā anayasammatā, te cānena
atk-s0505a:1852_8: chinnā panunnā, na ca tehi kampati, iccassa te ārakā honti, na ca tesu irīyati tasmā
atk-s0505a:1852_9: ārakāssa honti pāpakā dhammāti imināpatthena. Anaye na irīyatīti imināpatthena tamāhu
atk-s0505a:1852_10: ariyoti ca evampettha yojanā veditabbā. “Vidvā so na upeti gabbhaseyya”nti idaṃ pana
atk-s0505a:1853_0: 542. “Kathaṃ caraṇavā”ti ettha pana yasmā caraṇehi pattabbaṃ patto “caraṇavā”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0505a:1853_1: arahati, tasmā taṃ dassento “yo idhā”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tattha yo idhāti
atk-s0505a:1853_2: yo imasmiṃ sāsane. Caraṇesūti sīlādīsu hemavatasutte vuttapannarasadhammesu. Nimittatthe
atk-s0505a:1853_3: bhummavacanaṃ. Pattipattoti pattabbaṃ patto. Yo caraṇanimittaṃ caraṇahetu caraṇapaccayā
atk-s0505a:1853_4: pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Caraṇavā soti so imāya caraṇehi pattabbapattiyā
atk-s0505a:1853_5: caraṇavā hotīti. Ettāvatā pañho byākato hoti, sesamassa thutivacanaṃ. Yo hi caraṇehi
atk-s0505a:1853_6: pattipatto, so kusalo ca hoti cheko, sabbadā ca ājānāti nibbānadhammaṃ, niccaṃ nibbānaninnacittatāya
atk-s0505a:1853_7: sabbattha ca khandhādīsu na sajjati. Dvīhi ca vimuttīhi vimuttacitto hoti, paṭighā yassa na santīti.
atk-s0505a:1854_0: 543. Yasmā pana kammādīnaṃ paribbājanena paribbājako nāma hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:1854_1: “dukkhavepakka”nti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. Tattha vipāko eva vepakkaṃ, dukkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1854_2: vepakkamassāti dukkhavepakkaṃ. Pavattidukkhajananato sabbampi tedhātukakammaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1854_3: Uddhanti atītaṃ. Adhoti anāgataṃ. Tiriyaṃ vāpi majjheti paccuppannaṃ. Tañhi na uddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1854_4: na adho, tiriyaṃ ubhinnañca antarā, tena “majjhe”ti vuttaṃ. Paribbājayitvāti nikkhāmetvā
atk-s0505a:1854_5: niddhametvā. Pariññacārīti paññāya paricchinditvā caranto. Ayaṃ tāva apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0505a:1854_6: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā – yo tiyaddhapariyāpannampi dukkhajanakaṃ yadatthi kiñci
atk-s0505a:1854_7: kammaṃ, taṃ sabbampi ariyamaggena taṇhāvijjāsinehe sosento apaṭisandhijanakabhāvakaraṇena
atk-s0505a:1854_8: paribbājayitvā tathā paribbājitattā eva ca taṃ kammaṃ pariññāya caraṇato pariññacārī.
atk-s0505a:1854_9: Na kevalañca kammameva, māyaṃ mānamathopi lobhakodhaṃ imepi dhamme pahānapariññāya
atk-s0505a:1854_10: pariññacārī, pariyantamakāsi nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpassa ca pariyantamakāsi paribbājesi
atk-s0505a:1854_11: iccevattho. Imesaṃ kammādīnaṃ paribbājanena taṃ paribbājakamāhu. Pattipattanti idaṃ
atk-s0505a:1855_0: 544. Evaṃ pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhassa pana sabhiyassa “yāni ca tīṇī”tiādīsu abhitthavanagāthāsu
atk-s0505a:1855_1: osaraṇānīti ogahaṇāni titthāni, diṭṭhiyoti attho. Tāni yasmā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā saha
atk-s0505a:1855_2: brahmajāle vuttadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatāni gahetvā tesaṭṭhi honti, yasmā ca tāni aññatitthiyasamaṇānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1855_3: pavādabhūtāni satthāni sitāni upadisitabbavasena, na uppattivasena. Uppattivasena
atk-s0505a:1855_4: pana yadetaṃ “itthī puriso”ti saññakkharaṃ vohāranāmaṃ, yā cāyaṃ micchāparivitakkānussavādivasena
atk-s0505a:1855_5: “evarūpena attanā bhavitabba”nti bālānaṃ viparītasaññā uppajjati, tadubhayanissitāni
atk-s0505a:1855_6: tesaṃ vasena uppajjanti, na attapaccakkhāni. Tāni ca bhagavā vineyya vinayitvā oghatamagā
atk-s0505a:1855_7: oghatamaṃ oghandhakāraṃ agā atikkanto. “Oghantamagā”tipi pāṭho, oghānaṃ antaṃ agā,
atk-s0505a:1856_0: 545. Tato paraṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pārañca nibbānaṃ tappattiyā dukkhābhāvato tappaṭipakkhato
atk-s0505a:1856_1: ca taṃ sandhāyāha, “antagūsi pāragū dukkhassā”ti. Atha vā pāragū bhagavā nibbānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1856_2: gatattā, taṃ ālapanto āha, “pāragū antagūsi dukkhassā”ti ayamettha sambandho. Sammā
atk-s0505a:1856_3: ca buddho sāmañca buddhoti sammāsambuddho. Taṃ maññeti tameva maññāmi, na aññanti
atk-s0505a:1856_4: accādarena bhaṇati. Jutimāti paresampi andhakāravidhamanena jutisampanno. Mutimāti
atk-s0505a:1856_5: aparappaccayañeyyañāṇasamatthāya mutiyā paññāya sampanno. Pahūtapaññoti anantapañño.
atk-s0505a:1856_6: Idha sabbaññutaññāṇamadhippetaṃ. Dukkhassantakarāti āmantento āha. Atāresi manti
atk-s0505a:1857_0: 546-9. Yaṃ metiādigāthāya namakkārakaraṇaṃ bhaṇati. Tattha kaṅkhittanti vīsatipañhanissitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1857_1: atthaṃ sandhāyāha. So hi tena kaṅkhito ahosi. Monapathesūti ñāṇapathesu. Vinaḷīkatāti
atk-s0505a:1857_2: vigatanaḷā katā, ucchinnāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nāga nāgassāti ekaṃ āmantanavacanaṃ, ekassa
atk-s0505a:1857_3: “bhāsato anumodantī”ti iminā sambandho. “Dhammadesana”nti pāṭhaseso. Sabbe devāti
atk-s0505a:1857_4: ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā ca. Nāradapabbatāti tepi kira dve devagaṇā paññavanto, tepi
atk-s0505a:1857_5: anumodantīti sabbaṃ pasādena ca namakkārakaraṇaṃ bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1858_0: 550-53. Anumodanārahaṃ byākaraṇasampadaṃ sutvā “namo te”ti añjaliṃ paggahetvā āha.
atk-s0505a:1858_1: Purisājaññāti purisesu jātisampannaṃ. Paṭipuggaloti paṭibhāgo puggalo tuvaṃ buddho
atk-s0505a:1858_2: catusaccapaṭivedhena, satthā anusāsaniyā satthavāhatāya ca, mārābhibhū catumārābhibhavena,
atk-s0505a:1858_3: muni buddhamuni. Upadhīti khandhakilesakāmaguṇābhisaṅkhārabhedā cattāro. Vaggūti
atk-s0505a:1858_4: abhirūpaṃ. Puññe cāti lokiye na limpasi tesaṃ akaraṇena, pubbe katānampi vā āyatiṃ
atk-s0505a:1858_5: phalūpabhogābhāvena. Taṃnimittena vā taṇhādiṭṭhilepena. Vandati satthunoti evaṃ bhaṇanto
atk-s0505a:1859_0: Aññatitthiyapubboti aññatitthiyo eva. Ākaṅkhatīti icchati. Āraddhacittāti abhirādhitacittā.
atk-s0505a:1859_1: Apica mettha puggalavemattatā viditāti apica mayā ettha aññatitthiyānaṃ parivāse
atk-s0505a:1859_2: puggalanānattaṃ viditaṃ, na sabbeneva parivasitabbanti. Kena pana na parivasitabbaṃ?
atk-s0505a:1859_3: Aggiyehi jaṭilehi, sākiyena jātiyā, liṅgaṃ vijahitvā āgatena. Avijahitvā āgatopi
atk-s0505a:1859_4: ca yo maggaphalapaṭilābhāya hetusampanno hoti, tādisova sabhiyo paribbājako. Tasmā
atk-s0505a:1859_5: bhagavā “tava pana, sabhiya, titthiyavattapūraṇatthāya parivāsakāraṇaṃ natthi, atthatthiko
atk-s0505a:1859_6: tvaṃ ‘maggaphalapaṭilābhāya hetusampanno’ti viditametaṃ mayā”ti tassa pabbajjaṃ anujānanto
atk-s0505a:1859_7: āha – “apica mettha puggalavemattatā viditā”ti. Sabhiyo pana attano ādaraṃ dassento
atk-s0505a:1859_8: āha “sace bhante”ti. Taṃ sabbaṃ aññañca tathārūpaṃ uttānatthattā pubbe vuttanayattā
atk-s0505a:1859_9: ca idha na vaṇṇitaṃ, yato pubbe vaṇṇitānusārena veditabbanti.
atk-s0505a:1863_0: Evaṃ me sutanti selasuttaṃ. Kā uppatti? Ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. Atthavaṇṇanākkamepi
atk-s0505a:1863_1: cassa pubbasadisaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana apubbaṃ, taṃ uttānatthāni
atk-s0505a:1863_2: padāni pariharantā vaṇṇayissāma. Aṅguttarāpesūti aṅgā eva so janapado, gaṅgāya pana
atk-s0505a:1863_3: yā uttarena āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā “uttarāpo”tipi vuccati. Kataragaṅgāya uttarena
atk-s0505a:1864_0: Tatrāyaṃ tassā nadiyā āvibhāvatthaṃ ādito pabhuti vaṇṇanā – ayaṃ kira jambudīpo dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo.
atk-s0505a:1864_1: Tattha catusahassayojanaparimāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo “samuddo”ti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0505a:1864_2: Tisahassayojanapamāṇe manussā vasanti. Tisahassayojanapamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena
atk-s0505a:1864_4: Yattha āyāmavitthārena gambhīratāya ca paññāsapaññāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā
atk-s0505a:1864_5: pūraḷāsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttā anotattādayo satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0505a:1865_0: Tesu anotatto sudassanakūṭaṃ, citrakūṭaṃ, kāḷakūṭaṃ, gandhamādanakūṭaṃ, kelāsakūṭanti
atk-s0505a:1865_1: imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto. Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1865_2: antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ, citrakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1865_3: kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ, gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1865_4: kāḷapakkhuposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati, kelāsakūṭaṃ rajatamayaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1865_5: Sabbāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. Sabbāni
atk-s0505a:1865_6: devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti, nadiyo ca tesu sandanti. Taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1865_7: anotattameva pavisati. Candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena
atk-s0505a:1865_8: taṃ obhāsenti, ujuṃ gacchantā na obhāsenti. Tenevassa “anotatta”nti saṅkhā udapādi.
atk-s0505a:1866_1: suppaṭiyattāni honti, yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā isigaṇā ca nhāyanti, devayakkhādayo
atk-s0505a:1867_0: Catūsu cassa passesu sīhamukhaṃ, hatthimukhaṃ, assamukhaṃ, usabhamukhanti cattāri
atk-s0505a:1867_1: mukhāni honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. Sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā
atk-s0505a:1867_2: honti, hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1867_3: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ
atk-s0505a:1867_4: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi
atk-s0505a:1867_5: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ
atk-s0505a:1867_6: gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:1867_7: katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā
atk-s0505a:1867_8: vuṭṭhāya pariṇāhena tigāvutapamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā
atk-s0505a:1867_9: tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. Tatra paññāsayojanapamāṇā
atk-s0505a:1867_10: tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā. Pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisiya saṭṭhi
atk-s0505a:1867_11: yojanāni gatā. Tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā viñjhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1867_12: nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattati.
atk-s0505a:1867_13: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne “āvaṭṭagaṅgā”ti vuccati. Ujukaṃ
atk-s0505a:1867_14: pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “kaṇhagaṅgā”ti vuccati. Ākāsena saṭṭhi
atk-s0505a:1867_16: vuccati. Kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisiya saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “bahalagaṅgā”ti
atk-s0505a:1867_17: vuccati. Pathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “umaṅgagaṅgā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1867_18: Viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne “gaṅgā,
atk-s0505a:1867_19: yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī”ti pañcadhā vuccati. Evametā pañca mahāgaṅgā himavatā
atk-s0505a:1867_20: sambhavanti. Tāsu yā ayaṃ pañcamī mahī nāma, sā idha “mahāmahīgaṅgā”ti adhippetā.
atk-s0505a:1867_21: Tassā gaṅgāya uttarena yā āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado “aṅguttarāpo”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1868_0: Cārikaṃ caramānoti addhānagamanaṃ kurumāno. Tattha bhagavato duvidhā cārikā turitacārikā,
atk-s0505a:1868_1: aturitacārikā ca. Tattha dūrepi bhabbapuggale disvā sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā.
atk-s0505a:1868_2: Sā mahākassapapaccuggamanādīsu daṭṭhabbā. Taṃ paccuggacchanto hi bhagavā muhutteneva
atk-s0505a:1868_3: tigāvutaṃ agamāsi, āḷavakadamanatthaṃ tiṃsayojanaṃ, tathā aṅgulimālassatthāya. Pukkusātissa
atk-s0505a:1868_4: pana pañcattālīsayojanaṃ, mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ, dhaniyassatthāya sattayojanasataṃ
atk-s0505a:1868_5: addhānaṃ agamāsi. Ayaṃ turitacārikā nāma. Gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā pana piṇḍapātacariyādīhi
atk-s0505a:1868_6: lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ aturitacārikā nāma. Ayaṃ idha adhippetā. Evaṃ cārikaṃ
atk-s0505a:1868_7: caramāno. Mahatāti saṅkhyāmahatā guṇamahatā ca. Bhikkhusaṅghenāti samaṇagaṇena. Aḍḍhateḷasehīti
atk-s0505a:1868_8: aḍḍhena teḷasahi, dvādasahi satehi paññāsāya ca bhikkhūhi saddhinti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1868_9: Yena…pe… tadavasarīti āpaṇabahulatāya so nigamo “āpaṇo” tveva nāmaṃ labhi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0505a:1868_10: kira vīsatiāpaṇamukhasahassāni vibhattāni ahesuṃ. Yena disābhāgena maggena vā so
atk-s0505a:1868_11: aṅguttarāpānaṃ raṭṭhassa nigamo osaritabbo, tena avasari tadavasari agamāsi, taṃ
atk-s0505a:1869_0: Keṇiyo jaṭiloti keṇiyoti nāmena, jaṭiloti tāpaso. So kira brāhmaṇamahāsālo, dhanarakkhaṇatthāya
atk-s0505a:1869_1: pana tāpasapabbajjaṃ samādāya rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā tattha assamaṃ
atk-s0505a:1869_2: kāretvā vasati kulasahassassa nissayo hutvā. Assamepi cassa eko tālarukkho divase
atk-s0505a:1869_3: divase ekaṃ suvaṇṇaphalaṃ muñcatīti vadanti. So divā kāsāyāni dhāreti jaṭā ca bandhati,
atk-s0505a:1869_4: rattiṃ yathāsukhaṃ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti. Sakyaputtoti
atk-s0505a:1869_5: uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. Sakyakulā pabbajitoti saddhāya pabbajitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ, kenaci
atk-s0505a:1869_6: pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1869_7: hoti. Taṃ kho panāti itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti
atk-s0505a:1869_8: attho. Kalyāṇoti kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato, seṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kittisaddoti kittiyeva thutighoso vā.
atk-s0505a:1870_0: Itipi so bhagavāti ādimhi pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā – so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi
atk-s0505a:1870_1: sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavāti, iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1870_2: ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi
atk-s0505a:1870_3: tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo. Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi maggena savāsanānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1870_4: kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ. Te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1870_5: hatattāpi arahaṃ. Yañcetaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhi, puññādiabhisaṅkhārānaṃ jarāmaraṇanemi,
atk-s0505a:1870_6: āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālapavattaṃ
atk-s0505a:1870_7: saṃsāracakkaṃ. Tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena
atk-s0505a:1870_8: kammakkhayakarañāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattātipi arahaṃ. Aggadakkhiṇeyyattā
atk-s0505a:1870_9: ca cīvarādipaccaye sakkāragarukārādīni ca arahatīti paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1870_10: Yathā ca loke keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti, evaṃ nāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1870_11: kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ. Hoti cettha –
atk-s0505a:1873: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena pavuccatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1874_0: Sammā sāmañca saccānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho. Atisayavisuddhāhi vijjāhi abbhuttamena
atk-s0505a:1874_1: caraṇena ca samannāgatattā vijjācaraṇasampanno. Sobhanagamanattā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1874_2: gatattā suṭṭhu gatattā sammā gadattā ca sugato. Sabbathāpi viditalokattā lokavidū.
atk-s0505a:1874_3: So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā khandhāyatanādibhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:1874_4: saṅkhāralokaṃ avedi, “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Dve lokā nāmañca rūpañca.
atk-s0505a:1874_5: Tayo lokā tisso vedanā. Cattāro lokā cattāro āhārā. Pañca lokā pañcupādānakkhandhā.
atk-s0505a:1874_6: Cha lokā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni. Satta lokā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Aṭṭha lokā
atk-s0505a:1874_7: aṭṭha lokadhammā. Nava lokā nava sattāvāsā. Dasa lokā dasāyatanāni. Dvādasa lokā
atk-s0505a:1874_8: dvādasāyatanāni. Aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti evaṃ sabbathā saṅkhāralokaṃ
atk-s0505a:1874_9: avedi. Sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti,
atk-s0505a:1874_10: apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye
atk-s0505a:1874_11: bhabbe abhabbe satte jānātīti sabbathā sattalokaṃ avedi. Tathā ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato
atk-s0505a:1874_12: vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni aḍḍhapañcamāni ca satāni,
atk-s0505a:1874_13: parikkhepato chattiṃsa satasahassāni dasa sahassāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni ca satāni.
atk-s0505a:1881: Saṭṭhi ceva sahassāni, esā lokassa saṇṭhiti”.
atk-s0505a:1901_0: Tattha candamaṇḍalaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāsayojanaṃ, tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1901_1: dasasahassayojanaṃ, tathā asurabhavanaṃ avīcimahānirayo jambudīpo ca. Aparagoyānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1901_2: sattasahassayojanaṃ, tathā pubbavideho, uttarakuru aṭṭhasahassayojano. Ekameko cettha
atk-s0505a:1901_3: mahādīpo pañcasatapañcasataparittadīpaparivāro. Taṃ sabbampi ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ ekā
atk-s0505a:1901_4: lokadhātu. Cakkavāḷantaresu lokantarikanirayā. Evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo,
atk-s0505a:1901_5: anantena buddhañāṇena aññāsīti sabbathā okāsalokaṃ avedi. Evaṃ so bhagavā sabbathā.
atk-s0505a:1902_0: Attano pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvā anuttaro. Vicittehi vinayanūpāyehi
atk-s0505a:1902_2: anusāsati nitthāreti cāti satthā. Devamanussaggahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena bhabbapuggalapariggahavasena
atk-s0505a:1902_3: ca kataṃ, nāgādikepi pana esa lokiyatthena anusāsati. Yadatthi neyyaṃ nāma, sabbassa
atk-s0505a:1902_4: buddhattā vimokkhantikañāṇavasena buddho. Yato pana so –
atk-s0505a:1905: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetāni padāni visuddhimagge vuttāni.
atk-s0505a:1906_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ. Idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. Sadevakantiādīni
atk-s0505a:1906_1: kasibhāradvājaāḷavakasuttesu vuttanayāneva. Sayanti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā. Abhiññāti
atk-s0505a:1906_2: abhiññāya. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Pavedetīti bodheti ñāpeti pakāseti. So
atk-s0505a:1906_3: dhammaṃ deseti…pe… pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca anuttaraṃ
atk-s0505a:1906_4: vivekasukhaṃ hitvāpi dhammaṃ deseti. Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva
atk-s0505a:1906_5: deseti. Kathaṃ? Ekagāthāpi hi samantabhaddakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā,
atk-s0505a:1906_7: suttaṃ nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesena majjhekalyāṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1906_8: Nānānusandhikaṃ paṭhamānusandhinā ādikalyāṇaṃ, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesehi
atk-s0505a:1906_9: majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo, samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi
atk-s0505a:1906_10: majjhekalyāṇo, nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo. Sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo, vipassanāmaggehi
atk-s0505a:1906_11: majjhekalyāṇo, phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo. Buddhasubodhitāya vā ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0505a:1906_12: dhammasudhammatāya majjhekalyāṇo, saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:1906_13: tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo, paccekabodhiyā
atk-s0505a:1906_14: majjhekalyāṇo, sāvakabodhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanato
atk-s0505a:1906_15: savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo, paṭipajjamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato
atk-s0505a:1906_16: paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo, tathā paṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale
atk-s0505a:1906_17: niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo.
atk-s0505a:1906_18: Nāthappabhavattā ca pabhavasuddhiyā ādikalyāṇo, atthasuddhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, kiccasuddhiyā
atk-s0505a:1906_19: pariyosānakalyāṇo. Yato appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva desetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1907_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu pana yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1907_1: maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, nānānayehi dīpeti, tañca yathāsambhavaṃ atthasampattiyā
atk-s0505a:1907_6: sātthaṃ, saddheyyato lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjanaṃ. Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1907_8: apanetabbassa abhāvato niddosabhāvena parisuddhaṃ. Sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi
atk-s0505a:1907_9: seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesañca cariyabhāvato brahmacariyaṃ. Tasmā “sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:1908_0: Apica yasmā sanidānaṃ sauppattikañca desento ādikalyāṇaṃ deseti, vineyyānaṃ anurūpato
atk-s0505a:1908_1: atthassa aviparītatāya hetudāharaṇayogato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ, sotūnaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhena
atk-s0505a:1908_2: nigamanena ca pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ. Evaṃ desento ca brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. Tañca paṭipattiyā
atk-s0505a:1908_3: adhigamabyattito sātthaṃ, pariyattiyā āgamabyattito sabyañjanaṃ, sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttato
atk-s0505a:1908_5: ca parisuddhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ cariyato
atk-s0505a:1908_6: brahmacariyanti vuccati, tasmāpi “so dhammaṃ deseti…pe… brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1909_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana, atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammiyā
atk-s0505a:1909_1: kathāyāti pānakānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya. Ayañhi keṇiyo sāyanhasamaye bhagavato āgamanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1909_2: assosi. “Tucchahattho bhagavantaṃ dassanāya gantuṃ lajjamāno vikālabhojanā viratānampi
atk-s0505a:1909_3: pānakaṃ kappatī”ti cintetvā pañcahi kājasatehi susaṅkhataṃ badarapānaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0505a:1909_4: agamāsi. Yathāha bhesajjakkhandhake “atha kho keṇiyassa jaṭilassa etadahosi, kiṃ
atk-s0505a:1909_5: nu kho ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa harāpeyya”nti sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tato naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0505a:1909_6: yathā sekkhasutte sākiye āvasathānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya, gosiṅgasālavane tayo
atk-s0505a:1909_7: kulaputte sāmaggirasānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya, rathavinīte jātibhūmake bhikkhū dasakathāvatthupaṭisaṃyuttāya,
atk-s0505a:1909_8: evaṃ taṅkhaṇānurūpāya pānakānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya pānakadānānisaṃsaṃ sandassesi,
atk-s0505a:1909_9: tathārūpānaṃ puññānaṃ punapi kattabbatāya niyojento samādapesi, abbhussāhaṃ janento
atk-s0505a:1909_10: samuttejesi, sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikena phalavisesena pahaṃsento sampahaṃsesi. Tenāha
atk-s0505a:1909_11: “dhammiyā kathāya…pe… sampahaṃsesī”ti. So bhiyyosomattāya bhagavati pasanno bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:1909_12: nimantesi, bhagavā cassa tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā adhivāsesi. Tenāha “atha kho keṇiyo
atk-s0505a:1910_0: Kimatthaṃ pana paṭikkhipi bhagavāti? Punappunaṃ yācanāya cassa puññavuḍḍhi bhavissati,
atk-s0505a:1910_1: bahutarañca paṭiyādessati, tato aḍḍhatelasānaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ paṭiyattaṃ aḍḍhasoḷasannaṃ
atk-s0505a:1910_2: pāpuṇissatīti. Kuto aparāni tīṇi satānīti ce? Appaṭiyatteyeva hi bhatte selo brāhmaṇo
atk-s0505a:1910_3: tīhi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajissati, taṃ disvā bhagavā evamāhāti. Mittāmacceti
atk-s0505a:1910_4: mitte ca kammakare ca. Ñātisālohiteti samānalohite ekayonisambandhe puttadhītādayo
atk-s0505a:1910_5: avasesabandhave ca. Yenāti yasmā. Meti mayhaṃ. Kāyaveyyāvaṭikanti kāyena veyyāvaccaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1911_0: Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti irubbedayajubbedasāmavedānaṃ. Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1911_1: Nighaṇḍūti nāmanighaṇḍurukkhādīnaṃ vevacanappakāsakaṃ satthaṃ. Keṭubhanti kiriyākappavikappo
atk-s0505a:1911_2: kavīnaṃ upakārāya satthaṃ. Saha akkharappabhedena sākkharappabhedānaṃ. Akkharappabhedoti
atk-s0505a:1911_3: sikkhā ca nirutti ca. Itihāsapañcamānanti athabbanavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā “itiha āsa
atk-s0505a:1911_4: itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti
atk-s0505a:1911_5: itihāsapañcamā. Tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ. Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ ajjheti vedeti
atk-s0505a:1911_6: cāti padako veyyākaraṇo. Lokāyate vitaṇḍavādasatthe mahāpurisalakkhaṇādhikāre ca
atk-s0505a:1911_8: anavayo, avayo na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0505a:1912_0: Jaṅghāya hitaṃ vihāraṃ jaṅghāvihāraṃ, cirāsanādijanitaṃ parissamaṃ vinodetuṃ jaṅghāpasāraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1912_1: adīghacārikanti vuttaṃ hoti. Anucaṅkamamānoti caṅkamamāno eva. Anuvicaramānoti ito
atk-s0505a:1912_2: cito ca caramāno. Keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamoti keṇiyassa assamaṃ nivesanaṃ. Āvāhoti
atk-s0505a:1912_3: kaññāgahaṇaṃ. Vivāhoti kaññādānaṃ. Mahāyaññoti mahāyajanaṃ. Māgadhoti magadhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1912_4: issaro. Mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā seniyo. Bimbīti suvaṇṇaṃ, tasmā sārasuvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇatāya
atk-s0505a:1912_5: bimbisāro. So me nimantitoti so mayā nimantito.
atk-s0505a:1913_0: Atha brāhmaṇo pubbe katādhikārattā buddhasaddaṃ sutvāva amatenevābhisitto vimhayarūpattā
atk-s0505a:1913_1: āha – “buddhoti, bho keṇiya, vadesī”ti. Itaro yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhanto āha – “buddhoti,
atk-s0505a:1913_2: bho sela, vadāmī”ti. Tato naṃ punapi daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ pucchi, itaropi tatheva ārocesi.
atk-s0505a:1913_3: Atha kappasatasahassehipi buddhasaddassa dullabhabhāvaṃ dassento āha – “ghosopi kho
atk-s0505a:1913_4: eso dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho”ti. Tattha yadidanti nipāto, yo esoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1914_0: Atha brāhmaṇo buddhasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho so saccameva buddho, udāhu nāmamattamevassa
atk-s0505a:1914_1: buddho”ti vīmaṃsitukāmo cintesi, abhāsi eva vā “āgatāni kho pana…pe… vivaṭṭacchado”ti.
atk-s0505a:1914_2: Tattha “mantesū”ti vedesu. “Tathāgato kira uppajjissatī”ti paṭikacceva suddhāvāsadevā
atk-s0505a:1914_3: brāhmaṇavesena lakkhaṇāni pakkhipitvā vede vācenti “tadanusārena mahesakkhā sattā
atk-s0505a:1914_4: tathāgataṃ jānissantī”ti. Tena pubbe vedesu mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni āgacchanti. Parinibbute
atk-s0505a:1914_5: pana tathāgate kamena antaradhāyanti, tena etarahi natthi. Mahāpurisassāti paṇidhisamādānañāṇasamādānakaruṇādiguṇamahato
atk-s0505a:1914_6: purisassa. Dveva gatiyoti dve eva niṭṭhā. Kāmañcāyaṃ gatisaddo “pañca kho imā, sāriputta,
atk-s0505a:1914_7: gatiyo”tiādīsu bhavabhede, “gatī migānaṃ pavana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhāne, “evaṃ adhimattagatimanto”tiādīsu
atk-s0505a:1914_8: paññāyaṃ, “gatigata”ntiādīsu visaṭabhāve vattati, idha pana niṭṭhāyaṃ veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1914_9: Tattha kiñcāpi yehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā hoti cakkavatti, na tehi eva buddho.
atk-s0505a:1914_10: Jātisāmaññato pana tāniyeva tānīti vuccanti. Tasmā vuttaṃ “yehi samannāgatassā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1915_0: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasatīti yadi agāre vasati. Rājā hoti cakkavattīti catūhi acchariyadhammehi
atk-s0505a:1915_1: saṅgahavatthūhi ca lokaṃ rañjanato rājā. Cakkaratanaṃ vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi,
atk-s0505a:1915_2: vattati, tehi ca paraṃ vatteti, parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti
atk-s0505a:1915_3: cakkavatti. Ettha ca rājāti sāmaññaṃ, cakkavattīti visesanaṃ. Dhammena caratīti dhammiko,
atk-s0505a:1915_4: ñāyena samena vattatīti attho. Dhammena rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti dhammarājā. Parahitadhammakaraṇena
atk-s0505a:1915_5: vā dhammiko, attahitadhammakaraṇena dhammarājā. Caturantāya issaroti cāturanto, catusamuddantāya
atk-s0505a:1915_6: cattubbidhadīpavibhūsitāya ca pathaviyā issaroti attho. Ajjhattaṃ kodhādipaccatthike
atk-s0505a:1915_7: bahiddhā ca sabbarājāno vijesīti vijitāvī. Janapadatthāvariyappattoti janapade dhuvabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:1915_8: thāvarabhāvaṃ patto, na sakkā kenaci cāletuṃ, janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anussukko
atk-s0505a:1916_0: Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa etāni katamānīti attho. Cakkaratanaṃ…pe… pariṇāyakaratanameva
atk-s0505a:1916_1: sattamanti tāni sabbappakārato ratanasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāni. Tesu ayaṃ cakkavattirājā

atk-s0505a:1917_0: Parosahassanti atirekasahassaṃ. Sūrāti abhīrukajātikā. Vīraṅgarūpāti devaputtasadisakāyā,

atk-s0505a:1917_2: vīrakāraṇaṃ vīriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vīraṅgaṃ rūpaṃ etesanti vīraṅgarūpā, vīriyamayasarīrā
atk-s0505a:1917_3: viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Parasenappamaddanāti sace paṭimukhaṃ tiṭṭheyya parasenā, taṃ
atk-s0505a:1917_4: pamaddituṃ samatthāti adhippāyo. Dhammenāti “pāṇo na hantabbo”tiādinā pañcasīladhammena.
atk-s0505a:1917_5: Arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchadoti ettha rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhiavijjāduccaritachadanehi
atk-s0505a:1917_6: sattahi paṭicchanne kilesandhakāre loke taṃ chadanaṃ vivaṭṭetvā samantato sañjātāloko
atk-s0505a:1917_7: hutvā ṭhitoti vivaṭṭacchado. Tattha paṭhamena padena pūjārahatā, dutiyena tassā hetu
atk-s0505a:1917_8: yasmā sammāsambuddhoti. Tatiyena buddhattahetu vivaṭṭacchadatā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1917_9: Atha vā vivaṭṭo ca vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado, vaṭṭarahito chadanarahito cāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1917_10: hoti. Tena arahaṃ vaṭṭābhāvena sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenāti evaṃ purimapadadvayasseva
atk-s0505a:1917_11: hetudvayaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Dutiyena vesārajjena cettha purimasiddhi, paṭhamena dutiyasiddhi,
atk-s0505a:1917_12: tatiyacatutthehi tatiyasiddhi hoti. Purimañca dhammacakkhuṃ, dutiyaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1918_0: Idāni bhagavato santikaṃ gantukāmo āha – “kahaṃ pana bho…pe… sammāsambuddho”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0505a:1918_1: vuttetiādīsu yenesāti yena disābhāgena esā. Nīlavanarājīti nīlavaṇṇarukkhapanti.
atk-s0505a:1918_2: Vanaṃ kira meghapantisadisaṃ. Yattha bhagavā tadā vihāsi, taṃ niddisanto āha – “yenesā
atk-s0505a:1918_3: bho, sela, nīlavanarājī”ti. Tattha “so viharatī”ti ayaṃ panettha pāṭhaseso, bhummatthe
atk-s0505a:1918_4: vā karaṇavacanaṃ. Pade padanti padasamīpe padaṃ. Tena turitagamanaṃ paṭisedheti.
atk-s0505a:1918_5: Durāsadā hīti kāraṇaṃ āha, yasmā te durāsadā, tasmā evaṃ bhonto āgacchantūti. Kiṃ
atk-s0505a:1918_6: pana kāraṇā durāsadāti ce? Sīhāva ekacarā. Yathā hi sīhā sahāyakiccābhāvato ekacarā,
atk-s0505a:1918_7: evaṃ tepi vivekakāmatāya. “Yadā cāha”ntiādinā pana te māṇavake upacāraṃ sikkhāpeti.
atk-s0505a:1918_8: Tattha mā opātethāti mā pavesetha, mā kathethāti vuttaṃ hoti. Āgamentūti paṭimānentu,
atk-s0505a:1918_9: yāva kathā pariyosānaṃ gacchati, tāva tuṇhī bhavantūti attho.
atk-s0505a:1919_0: Samannesīti gavesi. Yebhuyyenāti bahukāni addasa, appakāni nāddasa. Tato yāni na
atk-s0505a:1919_1: addasa, tāni dīpento āha “ṭhapetvā dve”ti. Kaṅkhatīti kaṅkhaṃ uppādeti patthanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1919_2: “aho vata passeyya”nti. Vicikicchatīti tato tato tāni vicinanto kicchati na sakkoti
atk-s0505a:1919_3: daṭṭhuṃ. Nādhimuccatīti tāya vicikicchāya sanniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati. Na sampasīdatīti
atk-s0505a:1919_4: tato “paripuṇṇalakkhaṇo aya”nti bhagavati pasādaṃ nāpajjati. Kaṅkhāya vā sudubbalavimati
atk-s0505a:1919_5: vuttā, vicikicchāya majjhimā, anadhimuccanatāya balavatī, asampasādena tehi tīhi
atk-s0505a:1920_0: Kosohiteti vatthikosena paṭicchanne. Vatthaguyheti aṅgajāte. Bhagavato hi varavāraṇasseva

atk-s0505a:1920_3: kaṅkhī ahosi vicikicchī. Tathārūpanti kathaṃ rūpaṃ? Kimettha amhehi vattabbaṃ, vuttametaṃ
atk-s0505a:1921_0: “Dukkaraṃ, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā katanti. Kiṃ, mahārājāti? Mahājanena hirikaraṇokāsaṃ

atk-s0505a:1921_2: selassa brāhmaṇassa antevāsīnaṃ tisatamāṇavānañca dassesi, bhanteti. Na, mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:1921_3: bhagavā guyhaṃ dasseti, chāyaṃ bhagavā dasseti, iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nivāsananivatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:1921_4: kāyabandhanabaddhaṃ cīvarapārutaṃ chāyārūpakamattaṃ dasseti, mahārājāti. Chāyārūpe
atk-s0505a:1921_5: diṭṭhe sati diṭṭho eva nanu, bhanteti. Tiṭṭhatetaṃ, mahārāja, hadayarūpaṃ disvā bujjhanakasatto
atk-s0505a:1921_6: bhaveyya, hadayamaṃsaṃ nīharitvā dasseyya sammāsambuddhoti. Kallosi, bhante, nāgasenā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1922_0: Ninnāmetvāti nīharitvā. Kaṇṇasotānumasanena cettha dīghabhāvo, nāsikāsotānumasanena
atk-s0505a:1922_1: tanubhāvo, nalāṭacchādanena puthulabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo. Ācariyapācariyānanti
atk-s0505a:1922_2: ācariyānañceva ācariyācariyānañca. Sake vaṇṇeti attano guṇe.
atk-s0505a:1923_0: 554. Paripuṇṇakāyoti lakkhaṇehi paripuṇṇatāya ahīnaṅgapaccaṅgatāya ca paripuṇṇasarīro.
atk-s0505a:1923_2: ca sunibbatto. Cārudassanoti sucirampi passantānaṃ atittijanakaṃ appaṭikūlaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0505a:1923_3: cāru eva dassanaṃ assāti cārudassano. Keci pana bhaṇanti “cārudassanoti sundaranetto”ti.
atk-s0505a:1923_4: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇoti suvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇo. Asīti bhavasi. Etaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. Susukkadāṭhoti
atk-s0505a:1923_5: suṭṭhu sukkadāṭho. Bhagavato hi dāṭhāhi candakiraṇā viya ativiya paṇḍararaṃsiyo niccharanti.
atk-s0505a:1924: 555. Mahāpurisalakkhaṇāti pubbe vuttabyañjanāneva vacanantarena nigamento āha.
atk-s0505a:1925_0: 556. Idāni tesu lakkhaṇesu attano abhirucitehi lakkhaṇehi bhagavantaṃ thunanto āha
atk-s0505a:1925_2: sumukho, ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā brahā, bahmujugattatāya uju, jutimantatāya patāpavā.
atk-s0505a:1925_3: Yampi cettha pubbe vuttaṃ, taṃ “majjhe samaṇasaṅghassā”ti iminā pariyāyena thunatā
atk-s0505a:1925_4: puna vuttaṃ. Īdiso hi evaṃ virocati. Esa nayo uttaragāthāyapi.
atk-s0505a:1926: 557-8. Uttamavaṇṇinoti uttamavaṇṇasampannassa. Jambusaṇḍassāti jambudīpassa. Pākaṭena issariyaṃ vaṇṇayanto āha, apica cakkavatti catunnampi dīpānaṃ issaro hoti.
atk-s0505a:1927_0: 559. Khattiyāti jātikhattiyā. Bhojāti bhogiyā. Rājānoti ye keci rajjaṃ kārentā. Anuyantāti
atk-s0505a:1927_1: anugāmino sevakā. Rājābhirājāti rājūnaṃ pūjaniyo rājā hutvā, cakkavattīti adhippāyo.

atk-s0505a:1928_1: attānaṃ pātukarontī”ti imaṃ selassa manorathaṃ pūrento āha “rājāhamasmī”ti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo

atk-s0505a:1928_7: hi apadadvipadādibhedā sattā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aggo. Na hi me koci sīlena vā…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanena

atk-s0505a:1928_9: dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi “idaṃ pajahatha, idaṃ upasampajja viharathā”tiādinā āṇācakkaṃ,

atk-s0505a:1928_11: vā. Cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti yaṃ cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti samaṇena vā…pe… kenaci lokasminti.
atk-s0505a:1929_0: 561-2. Evaṃ attānaṃ āvikarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto selo daḷhikaraṇatthaṃ

atk-s0505a:1930_1: viya siriyā sobhamāno, taṃ dassento bhagavā “mayā pavattita”nti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:1930_2: anujāto tathāgatanti tathāgatahetu anujāto, tathāgatena hetunā jātoti attho.

atk-s0505a:1931_2: kāraṇena buddho”ti ñāpetuṃ “abhiññeyya”nti gāthamāha. Tattha abhiññeyyanti vijjā

atk-s0505a:1931_4: pana phalasiddhito tesaṃ phalāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi vuttāneva bhavanti.
atk-s0505a:1931_5: Yato sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātanti evampettha vuttameva hoti.
