atk-s0505a:2573_6: rattindivaṃ nibbānaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā passa. Etenassa diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ katheti.
atk-s0505a:2574_0: 1078-9. Idāni “kāme pahāyā”ti sutvā vikkhambhanavasena attanā pahīne kāme sampassamāno
atk-s0505a:2574_1: “sabbesū”ti gāthamāha. Tattha hitvā maññanti aññaṃ tato heṭṭhā chabbidhampi samāpattiṃ
atk-s0505a:2574_2: hitvā. Saññāvimokkhe parameti sattasu saññāvimokkhesu uttame ākiñcaññāyatane. Tiṭṭhe
atk-s0505a:2574_3: nu so tattha anānuyāyīti so puggalo tattha ākiñcaññāyatanabrahmaloke avigacchamāno
atk-s0505a:2574_4: tiṭṭheyya nūti pucchati. Athassa bhagavā saṭṭhikappasahassamattaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ anujānanto tatiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2575_0: 1080. Evaṃ tassa tattha ṭhānaṃ sutvā idānissa sassatucchedabhāvaṃ pucchanto “tiṭṭhe
atk-s0505a:2575_1: ce”ti gāthamāha. Tattha pūgampi vassānanti anekasaṅkhyampi vassānaṃ, gaṇarāsinti
atk-s0505a:2575_2: attho. “Pūgampi vassānī”tipi pāṭho, tattha vibhattibyattayena sāmivacanassa paccattavacanaṃ
atk-s0505a:2575_3: kattabbaṃ, pūganti vā etassa bahūnīti attho vattabbo. “Pūgānī”ti vāpi paṭhanti, purimapāṭhoyeva
atk-s0505a:2575_4: sabbasundaro. Tattheva so sīti siyā vimuttoti so puggalo tatthevākiñcaññāyatane nānādukkhehi
atk-s0505a:2575_5: vimutto sītibhāvappatto bhaveyya, nibbānappatto sassato hutvā tiṭṭheyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:2575_6: Cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassāti udāhu tathāvidhassa viññāṇaṃ anupādāya parinibbāyeyyāti
atk-s0505a:2575_7: ucchedaṃ pucchati, paṭisandhiggahaṇatthaṃ vāpi bhaveyyāti paṭisandhimpi tassa pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2576_0: 1081. Athassa bhagavā ucchedasassataṃ anupagamma tattha uppannassa ariyasāvakassa
atk-s0505a:2576_1: anupādāya parinibbānaṃ dassento “accī yathā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha atthaṃ paletīti
atk-s0505a:2576_2: atthaṃ gacchati. Na upeti saṅkhanti “asukaṃ nāma disaṃ gato”ti vohāraṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0505a:2576_3: Evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimuttoti evaṃ tattha uppanno sekkhamuni pakatiyā pubbeva rūpakāyā
atk-s0505a:2576_4: vimutto tattha catutthamaggaṃ nibbattetvā dhammakāyassa pariññātattā puna nāmakāyāpi
atk-s0505a:2576_5: vimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto khīṇāsavo hutvā anupādāparinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ paleti,
atk-s0505a:2576_6: na upeti saṅkhaṃ “khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā”ti evamādikaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2577_0: 1082. Idāni “atthaṃ paletī”ti sutvā tassa yoniso atthaṃ asallakkhento “atthaṅgato
atk-s0505a:2577_1: so”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – so atthaṅgato udāhu natthi, udāhu ve sassatiyā sassatabhāvena
atk-s0505a:2577_2: arogo avipariṇāmadhammo soti evaṃ taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Tathā
atk-s0505a:2578_0: 1083. Athassa bhagavā tathā avattabbataṃ dassento “atthaṅgatassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:2578_1: atthaṅgatassāti anupādāparinibbutassa. Na pamāṇamatthīti rūpādippamāṇaṃ natthi. Yena
atk-s0505a:2578_2: naṃ vajjunti yena rāgādinā naṃ vadeyyuṃ. Sabbesu dhammesūti sabbesu khandhādidhammesu.
atk-s0505a:2579: Evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2583_0: 1084-5. Santi loketi nandasuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamagāthāya attho – loke khattiyādayo
atk-s0505a:2583_1: janā ājīvakanigaṇṭhādike sandhāya “santi munayo”ti vadanti, tayidaṃ kathaṃsūti kiṃ
atk-s0505a:2583_2: nu kho te samāpattiñāṇādinā ñāṇena uppannattā ñāṇūpapannaṃ no muniṃ vadanti, evaṃvidhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2583_3: nu vadanti, udāhu ve nānappakārakena lūkhajīvitasaṅkhātena jīvitenūpapannanti athassa
atk-s0505a:2583_4: bhagavā tadubhayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā muniṃ dassento “na diṭṭhiyā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2584_0: 1086-7. Idāni “diṭṭhādīhi suddhī”ti vadantānaṃ vāde kaṅkhāpahānatthaṃ “ye kecime”ti
atk-s0505a:2584_1: pucchati. Tattha anekarūpenāti kotūhalamaṅgalādinā. Tattha yatā carantāti tattha
atk-s0505a:2584_2: sakāya diṭṭhiyā guttā viharantā. Athassa tathā suddhiabhāvaṃ dīpento bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2585_0: 1088-90. Evaṃ “nātariṃsū”ti sutvā idāni yo atari, taṃ sotukāmo “ye kecime”ti pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2585_1: Athassa bhagavā oghatiṇṇamukhena jātijarātiṇṇe dassento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:2585_2: nivutāti ovuṭā pariyonaddhā. Yesīdhāti yesu idha. Ettha ca su-iti nipātamattaṃ. Taṇhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2585_3: pariññāyāti tīhi pariññāhi taṇhaṃ parijānitvā. Sesaṃ sabbattha pubbe vuttanayattā pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2586_0: Evaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne pana nando bhagavato
atk-s0505a:2586_1: bhāsitaṃ abhinandamāno “etābhinandāmī”ti gāthamāha. Idhāpi ca pubbe vuttasadiso eva
atk-s0505a:2590_0: 1091-4. Ye me pubbeti hemakasuttaṃ. Tattha ye me pubbe viyākaṃsūti ye bāvariādayo
atk-s0505a:2590_1: pubbe mayhaṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ viyākaṃsu. Huraṃ gotamasāsanāti gotamasāsanā pubbataraṃ.
atk-s0505a:2590_2: Sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhananti sabbaṃ taṃ kāmavitakkādivaḍḍhanaṃ. Taṇhānigghātananti
atk-s0505a:2590_3: taṇhāvināsanaṃ. Athassa bhagavā taṃ dhammaṃ ācikkhanto “idhā”ti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:2590_4: etadaññāya ye satāti etaṃ nibbānapadamaccutaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:2590_5: vipassantā anupubbena jānitvā ye kāyānupassanāsatiādīhi satā. Diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutāti
atk-s0505a:2590_6: viditadhammattā, diṭṭhadhammattā, rāgādinibbānena ca abhinibbutā. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2591: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2595_0: 1095. Yasmiṃ kāmāti todeyyasuttaṃ. Tattha vimokkho tassa kīdisoti tassa kīdiso vimokkho
atk-s0505a:2595_1: icchitabboti pucchati. Idāni tassa aññavimokkhābhāvaṃ dassento bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2595_2: Tattha vimokkho tassa nāparoti tassa añño vimokkho natthi.
atk-s0505a:2596_0: 1097-8. Evaṃ “taṇhakkhayo eva vimokkho”ti vuttepi tamatthaṃ asallakkhento “nirāsaso
atk-s0505a:2596_1: so uda āsasāno”ti puna pucchati. Tattha uda paññakappīti udāhu samāpattiñāṇādinā
atk-s0505a:2596_2: ñāṇena taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappayati. Athassa bhagavā taṃ ācikkhanto dutiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:2596_3: gāthamāha. Tattha kāmabhaveti kāme ca bhave ca. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2597: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2601_0: 1099. Majjhe sarasminti kappasuttaṃ. Tattha majjhe sarasminti purimapacchimakoṭipaññāṇābhāvato
atk-s0505a:2601_1: majjhabhūte saṃsāreti vuttaṃ hoti. Tiṭṭhatanti tiṭṭhamānānaṃ. Yathāyidaṃ nāparaṃ
atk-s0505a:2601_2: siyāti yathā idaṃ dukkhaṃ puna na bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:2602_0: 1101-2. Athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto tisso gāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha akiñcananti
atk-s0505a:2602_1: kiñcanapaṭipakkhaṃ. Anādānanti ādānapaṭipakkhaṃ, kiñcanādānavūpasamanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2602_2: Anāparanti aparapaṭibhāgadīpavirahitaṃ, seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Na te mārassa paddhagūti
atk-s0505a:2602_3: te mārassa paddhacarā paricārakā sissā na honti. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2603: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2607_0: 1103-4. Sutvānahanti jatukaṇṇisuttaṃ. Tattha sutvānahaṃ vīramakāmakāminti ahaṃ “itipi
atk-s0505a:2607_1: so bhagavā”tiādinā nayena vīraṃ kāmānaṃ akāmanato akāmakāmiṃ buddhaṃ sutvā. Akāmamāgamanti
atk-s0505a:2607_2: nikkāmaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ āgatomhi. Sahajanettāti sahajātasabbaññutaññāṇacakkhu.
atk-s0505a:2607_3: Yathātacchanti yathātathaṃ. Brūhi meti puna yācanto bhaṇati. Yācanto hi sahassakkhattumpi
atk-s0505a:2607_4: bhaṇeyya, ko pana vādo dvikkhattuṃ. Tejī tejasāti tejena samannāgato tejasā abhibhuyya.
atk-s0505a:2607_5: Yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ jātijarāya idha vippahānanti yamahaṃ jātijarānaṃ pahānabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ idheva jāneyyaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2608_0: 1105-7. Athassa bhagavā taṃ dhammamācikkhanto tisso gāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha nekkhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:2608_1: daṭṭhu khematoti nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ “khema”nti disvā. Uggahitanti
atk-s0505a:2608_2: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena gahitaṃ. Nirattaṃ vāti nirassitabbaṃ vā, muñcitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2608_3: Mā te vijjitthāti mā te ahosi. Kiñcananti rāgādikiñcanaṃ vāpi te mā vijjittha. Pubbeti
atk-s0505a:2608_4: atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha uppannakilesā. Brāhmaṇāti bhagavā jatukaṇṇiṃ ālapati. Sesaṃ
atk-s0505a:2609: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2613_0: 1108-9. Okañjahanti bhadrāvudhasuttaṃ. Tattha okañjahanti ālayaṃ jahaṃ. Taṇhacchidanti
atk-s0505a:2613_1: chataṇhākāyacchidaṃ. Anejanti lokadhammesu nikkampaṃ. Nandiñjahanti anāgatarūpādipatthanājahaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2613_2: Ekā eva hi taṇhā thutivasena idha nānappakārato vuttā. Kappañjahanti duvidhakappajahaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2613_3: Abhiyāceti ativiya yācāmi. Sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti itoti nāgassa tava bhagavā
atk-s0505a:2613_4: vacanaṃ sutvā ito pāsāṇakacetiyato bahū janā pakkamissantīti adhippāyo. Janapadehi
atk-s0505a:2613_5: saṅgatāti aṅgādīhi janapadehi idha samāgatā. Viyākarohīti dhammaṃ desehi.
atk-s0505a:2614_0: 1110. Athassa āsayānulomena dhammaṃ desento bhagavā dve gāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha ādānataṇhanti
atk-s0505a:2614_1: rūpādīnaṃ ādāyikaṃ gahaṇataṇhaṃ, taṇhupādānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyantīti
atk-s0505a:2614_2: etesu uddhādibhedesu yaṃ yaṃ gaṇhanti. Teneva māro anveti jantunti teneva upādānapaccayanibbattakammābhisaṅkhāranibbattavasena
atk-s0505a:2615_0: 1111. Tasmā pajānanti tasmā etamādīnavaṃ aniccādivasena vā saṅkhāre jānanto. Ādānasatte
atk-s0505a:2615_1: iti pekkhamāno, pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visattanti ādātabbaṭṭhena ādānesu rūpādīsu
atk-s0505a:2615_2: satte sabbaloke imaṃ pajaṃ maccudheyye laggaṃ pekkhamāno. Ādānasatte vā ādānābhiniviṭṭhe
atk-s0505a:2615_3: puggale ādānasaṅgahetuñca imaṃ pajaṃ maccudheyye laggaṃ tato vītikkamituṃ asamatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:2615_4: iti pekkhamāno kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke na uppādiyethāti sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2616: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2620_0: 1112-3. Jhāyinti udayasuttaṃ. Tattha aññāvimokkhanti paññānubhāvanijjhātaṃ vimokkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2620_1: pucchati. Atha bhagavā yasmā udayo catutthajjhānalābhī, tasmāssa paṭiladdhajjhānavasena
atk-s0505a:2620_2: nānappakārato aññāvimokkhaṃ dassento gāthādvayamāha. Tattha pahānaṃ kāmacchandānanti
atk-s0505a:2620_3: yamidaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattentassa kāmacchandappahānaṃ, tampi aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmi.
atk-s0505a:2621_1: iminā tasmiṃ catutthajjhānavimokkhe ṭhatvā jhānaṅgāni vipassitvā adhigataṃ arahattavimokkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2621_2: vadati. Arahattavimokkhassa hi maggasampayuttasammāsaṅkappādibhedo dhammatakko purejavo
atk-s0505a:2621_3: hoti. Tenāha – “dhammatakkapurejava”nti. Avijjāya pabhedananti etameva ca aññāvimokkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2621_4: avijjāpabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nissāya jātattā kāraṇopacārena “avijjāya pabhedana”nti pabrūmīti.
atk-s0505a:2622_0: 1115-6. Evaṃ avijjāpabhedanavacanena vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ sutvā “taṃ kissa vippahānena
atk-s0505a:2622_1: vuccatī”ti pucchanto “kiṃsu saṃyojano”ti gāthamāha. Tattha kiṃsu saṃyojanoti kiṃ
atk-s0505a:2622_2: saṃyojano. Vicāraṇanti vicaraṇakāraṇaṃ. Kissassa vippahānenāti kiṃ nāmakassa assa
atk-s0505a:2622_3: dhammassa vippahānena. Athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto “nandisaṃyojano”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2623_0: 1117-8. Idāni tassa nibbānassa maggaṃ pucchanto “kathaṃ satassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0505a:2623_1: viññāṇanti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ. Athassa maggaṃ kathento bhagavā “ajjhattañcā”ti
atk-s0505a:2623_2: gāthamāha. Tattha evaṃ satassāti evaṃ satassa sampajānassa. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2624: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2628_0: 1119-20. Yo atītanti posālasuttaṃ. Tattha yo atītaṃ ādisatīti yo bhagavā attano ca
atk-s0505a:2628_1: paresañca “ekampi jāti”ntiādibhedaṃ atītaṃ ādisati. Vibhūtarūpasaññissāti samatikkantarūpasaññissa.
atk-s0505a:2628_3: adhippāyo. Natthi kiñcīti passatoti viññāṇābhāvavipassanena “natthi kiñcī”ti passato,
atk-s0505a:2628_4: ākiñcaññāyatanalābhinoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmīti sakkāti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:2628_5: ālapanto āha. Tassa puggalassa ñāṇaṃ pucchāmi, kīdisaṃ pucchitabbanti. Kathaṃ neyyoti
atk-s0505a:2628_6: kathaṃ so netabbo, kathamassa uttariñāṇaṃ uppādetabbanti.
atk-s0505a:2629_0: 1121. Athassa bhagavā tādise puggale attano appaṭihatañāṇataṃ pakāsetvā taṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:2629_1: byākātuṃ gāthādvayamāha. Tattha viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbā, abhijānaṃ tathāgatoti abhisaṅkhāravasena
atk-s0505a:2629_2: catasso paṭisandhivasena sattāti evaṃ sabbā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo abhijānanto tathāgato.
atk-s0505a:2629_3: Tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānātīti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena tiṭṭhantaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ jānāti “āyatiṃ
atk-s0505a:2629_4: ayaṃ evaṃgatiko bhavissatī”ti. Vimuttanti ākiñcaññāyatanādīsu adhimuttaṃ. Tapparāyaṇanti tammayaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2630_1: palibodho aya”nti. Nandī saṃyojanaṃ itīti yā ca tattha arūparāgasaṅkhātā nandī, tañca
atk-s0505a:2630_2: saṃyojanaṃ iti ñatvā. Tato tattha vipassatīti tato ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0505a:2630_3: taṃ samāpattiṃ aniccādivasena vipassati. Etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassāti etaṃ tassa puggalassa
atk-s0505a:2630_4: evaṃ vipassato anukkameneva uppannaṃ arahattañāṇaṃ aviparītaṃ. Vusīmatoti vusitavantassa.
atk-s0505a:2631: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2635_0: 1123. Dvāhaṃ sakkanti mogharājasuttaṃ. Tattha dvāhanti dve vāre ahaṃ. So hi pubbe
atk-s0505a:2635_1: ajitasuttassa ca tissametteyyasuttassa ca avasāne dvikkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:2635_2: Bhagavā panassa indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno na byākāsi. Tenāha – “dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ
atk-s0505a:2635_3: apucchissa”nti. Yāvatatiyañca devīsi, byākarotīti me sutanti yāvatatiyañca sahadhammikaṃ
atk-s0505a:2635_4: puṭṭho visuddhidevabhūto isi bhagavā sammāsambuddho byākarotīti evaṃ me sutaṃ. Godhāvarītīreyeva
atk-s0505a:2635_5: kira so evamassosi. Tenāha – “byākarotīti me suta”nti.
atk-s0505a:2636_0: 1124. Ayaṃ lokoti manussaloko. Paro lokoti taṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso. Sadevakoti brahmalokaṃ
atk-s0505a:2636_1: ṭhapetvā avaseso upapattidevasammutidevayutto, “brahmaloko sadevako”ti etaṃ vā “sadevake
atk-s0505a:2636_2: loke”tiādinayanidassanamattaṃ, tena sabbopi tathāvuttappakāro loko veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:2637: 1125. Evaṃ abhikkantadassāvinti evaṃ aggadassāviṃ, sadevakassa lokassa ajjhāsayādhimuttigatiparāyaṇādīni passituṃ samatthanti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:2638_0: 1126. Suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena
atk-s0505a:2638_1: vāti dvīhi kāraṇehi suññato lokaṃ passa. Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ uddharitvā.
atk-s0505a:2639: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2643_0: 1127. Jiṇṇohamasmīti piṅgiyasuttaṃ. Tattha jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇoti so kira
atk-s0505a:2643_1: brāhmaṇo jarābhibhūto vīsavassasatiko jātiyā, dubbalo ca “idha padaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0505a:2643_2: aññattheva karoti, vinaṭṭhapurimacchavivaṇṇo ca. Tenāha – “jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇo”ti.
atk-s0505a:2643_3: Māhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāvāti māhaṃ tuyhaṃ dhammaṃ asacchikatvā antarāyeva avidvā
atk-s0505a:2643_4: hutvā anassiṃ. Jātijarāya idha vippahānanti idheva tava pādamūle pāsāṇake vā cetiya
atk-s0505a:2643_5: jātijarāya vippahānaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ, taṃ me ācikkha.
atk-s0505a:2644_0: 1128. Idāni yasmā piṅgiyo kāye sāpekkhatāya “jiṇṇohamasmī”ti gāthamāha tenassa bhagavā
atk-s0505a:2644_1: kāye sinehappahānatthaṃ “disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne”ti gāthamāha. Tattha rūpesūti
atk-s0505a:2644_2: rūpahetu rūpapaccayā. Vihaññamāneti kammakāraṇādīhi upahaññamāne. Ruppanti rūpesūti
atk-s0505a:2644_3: cakkhurogādīhi ca rūpahetuyeva janā ruppanti bādhīyanti.
atk-s0505a:2645_0: 1129-30. Evaṃ bhagavatā yāva arahattaṃ tāva kathitaṃ paṭipattiṃ sutvāpi piṅgiyo jarādubbalatāya
atk-s0505a:2645_1: visesaṃ anadhigantvāva puna “disā catasso”ti imāya gāthāya bhagavantaṃ thomento desanaṃ
atk-s0505a:2645_2: yācati. Athassa bhagavā punapi yāva arahattaṃ, tāva paṭipadaṃ dassento “taṇhādhipanne”ti
atk-s0505a:2646_0: Imampi suttaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ca piṅgiyo anāgāmiphale
atk-s0505a:2646_1: patiṭṭhāsi. So kira antarantarā cintesi – “evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ nāma desanaṃ na
atk-s0505a:2646_2: labhi mayhaṃ mātulo bāvarī savanāyā”ti. Tena sinehavikkhepena arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ
atk-s0505a:2646_3: nāsakkhi. Antevāsino panassa sahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sabbeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0505a:2650_0: Ito paraṃ saṅgītikārā desanaṃ thomentā “idamavoca bhagavā”tiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha idamavocāti
atk-s0505a:2650_1: idaṃ parāyanaṃ avoca. Paricārakasoḷasānanti bāvarissa paricārakena piṅgiyena saha
atk-s0505a:2650_2: soḷasannaṃ buddhassa vā bhagavato paricārakānaṃ soḷasannanti paricārakasoḷasannaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2650_3: Te eva ca brāhmaṇā. Tattha soḷasaparisā pana purato ca pacchato ca vāmapassato ca
atk-s0505a:2650_4: dakkhiṇapassato ca cha cha yojanāni nisinnā ujukena dvādasayojanikā ahosi. Ajjhiṭṭhoti
atk-s0505a:2650_5: yācito atthamaññāyāti pāḷiatthamaññāya. Dhammamaññāyāti pāḷimaññāya. Pārāyananti
atk-s0505a:2650_6: evaṃ imassa dhammapariyāyassa adhivacanaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ nāmāni kittayantā
atk-s0505a:2651_1: Isinti mahesiṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Tato paraṃ brahmacariyamacariṃsūti maggabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0505a:2651_2: acariṃsu. Tasmā pārāyananti tassa pārabhūtassa nibbānassa ayananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2653_0: 1138. Pārāyanamanugāyissanti assa ayaṃ sambandho – bhagavatā hi pārāyane desite soḷasasahassā
atk-s0505a:2653_1: jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, avasesānañca cuddasakoṭisaṅkhānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0505a:2656_0: Niṭṭhitāya pana dhammadesanāya tato tato āgatā manussā bhagavato ānubhāvena attano
atk-s0505a:2656_1: attano gāmanigamādīsveva pāturahesuṃ. Bhagavāpi sāvatthimeva agamāsi paricārakasoḷasādīhi
atk-s0505a:2656_2: anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parivuto. Tattha piṅgiyo bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āha – “gacchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2656_3: bhante, bāvarissa buddhuppādaṃ ārocetuṃ, paṭissutañhi tassa mayā”ti. Atha bhagavatā
atk-s0505a:2656_4: anuññāto ñāṇagamaneneva godhāvarītīraṃ gantvā pādagamanena assamābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:2656_5: Tamenaṃ bāvarī brāhmaṇo maggaṃ olokento nisinno dūratova khārijaṭādivirahitaṃ bhikkhuvesena
atk-s0505a:2656_6: āgacchantaṃ disvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi. Sampattañcāpi naṃ pucchi
atk-s0505a:2656_7: – “kiṃ, piṅgiya, buddho loke uppanno”ti. “Āma, brāhmaṇa, uppanno, pāsāṇake cetiye
atk-s0505a:2656_8: nisinno amhākaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, tamahaṃ tuyhaṃ desessāmī”ti. Tato bāvarī mahatā sakkārena
atk-s0505a:2656_9: sapariso taṃ pūjetvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi. Tattha nisīditvā piṅgiyo “pārāyanamanugāyissa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:2657_0: Tattha anugāyissanti bhagavatā gītaṃ anugāyissaṃ. Yathāddakkhīti yathā sāmaṃ saccābhisambodhena
atk-s0505a:2657_1: asādhāraṇañāṇena ca addakkhi. Nikkāmoti pahīnakāmo. “Nikkamo”tipi pāṭho, vīriyavāti
atk-s0505a:2657_2: attho nikkhanto vā akusalapakkhā. Nibbanoti kilesavanavirahito, taṇhāvirahito eva
atk-s0505a:2657_3: vā. Kissa hetu musā bhaṇeti yehi kilesehi musā bhaṇeyya, ete tassa pahīnāti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:2658_1: nāmena yutto. Brahmeti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ālapati. Kubbanakanti parittavanaṃ. Bahupphalaṃ
atk-s0505a:2658_2: kānanamāvaseyyāti anekaphalādivikatibharitaṃ kānanaṃ āgamma vaseyya. Appadasseti
atk-s0505a:2658_3: bāvaripabhutike parittapaññe. Mahodadhinti anotattādiṃ mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ.
atk-s0505a:2659_0: 1142-4. Yeme pubbeti ye ime pubbe. Tamanudāsinoti tamonudo āsino. Bhūripaññāṇoti
atk-s0505a:2659_1: ñāṇadhajo. Bhūrimedhasoti vipulapañño. Sandiṭṭhikamakālikanti sāmaṃ passitabbaphalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2659_2: na ca kālantare pattabbaphalaṃ. Anītikanti kilesaītivirahitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2660_0: 1145-50. Atha naṃ bāvarī āha “kiṃ nu tamhā”ti dve gāthā. Tato piṅgiyo bhagavato santikā
atk-s0505a:2660_1: avippavāsameva dīpento “nāhaṃ tamhā”tiādimāha. Passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāvāti taṃ
atk-s0505a:2660_2: buddhaṃ ahaṃ cakkhunā viya manasā passāmi. Namassamāno vivasemi rattinti namassamānova
atk-s0505a:2660_3: rattiṃ atināmemi. Tena teneva natoti yena disābhāgena buddho, tena tenevāhampi nato
atk-s0505a:2661_0: 1151. Dubbalathāmakassāti appathāmakassa, atha vā dubbalassa dutthāmakassa ca balavīriyahīnassāti
atk-s0505a:2661_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Teneva kāyo na paletīti teneva dubbalathāmakattena kāyo na gacchati,
atk-s0505a:2661_2: yena vā buddho, tena na gacchati. “Na paretī”tipi pāṭho, so evattho. Tatthāti buddhassa
atk-s0505a:2661_3: santike. Saṅkappayantāyāti saṅkappagamanena. Tena yuttoti yena buddho, tena yutto
atk-s0505a:2662_0: 1152. Paṅke sayānoti kāmakaddame sayamāno. Dīpā dīpaṃ upaplavinti satthārādito satthārādiṃ
atk-s0505a:2662_1: abhigacchiṃ. Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhanti sohaṃ evaṃ duddiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā anvāhiṇḍanto
atk-s0505a:2663_0: 1153. Imissā gāthāya avasāne piṅgiyassa ca bāvarissa ca indriyaparipākaṃ viditvā
atk-s0505a:2663_1: bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ muñci. Piṅgiyo bāvarissa buddhaguṇe vaṇṇayanto
atk-s0505a:2663_2: nisinno eva taṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “kiṃ ida”nti vilokento bhagavantaṃ attano purato ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0505a:2663_3: viya disvā bāvaribrāhmaṇassa “buddho āgato”ti ārocesi, brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ
atk-s0505a:2663_4: paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavāpi obhāsaṃ pharitvā brāhmaṇassa attānaṃ dassento ubhinnampi
atk-s0505a:2663_5: sappāyaṃ viditvā piṅgiyameva ālapamāno “yathā ahū vakkalī”ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2664_0: Tassattho – yathā vakkalitthero saddhādhimutto ahosi, saddhādhurena ca arahattaṃ
atk-s0505a:2664_1: pāpuṇi. Yathā ca soḷasannaṃ eko bhadrāvudho nāma yathā ca āḷavi gotamo, evameva tvampi
atk-s0505a:2664_2: pamuñcassu saddhaṃ. Tato saddhāya adhimuccanto “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0505a:2664_3: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā maccudheyyassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissasīti arahattanikūṭeneva
atk-s0505a:2664_4: desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Desanāpariyosāne piṅgiyo arahatte bāvarī anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0505a:2664_5: Bāvaribrāhmaṇassa sissā pana pañcasatā sotāpannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:2665_0: 1154-5. Idāni piṅgiyo attano pasādaṃ pavedento “esa bhiyyo”tiādimāha. Tattha paṭibhānavāti
atk-s0505a:2665_1: paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya upeto. Adhideve abhiññāyāti adhidevakare dhamme ñatvā. Parovaranti
atk-s0505a:2665_2: hīnapaṇītaṃ, attano ca parassa ca adhidevattakaraṃ sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ vedīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:2665_3: hoti. Kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānatanti kaṅkhīnaṃyeva sataṃ “nikkaṅkhamhā”ti paṭijānantānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2666_0: 1156. Asaṃhīranti rāgādīhi asaṃhāriyaṃ. Asaṃkuppanti akuppaṃ avipariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2666_1: Dvīhipi padehi nibbānaṃ bhaṇati. Addhā gamissāmīti ekaṃseneva taṃ anupādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ
atk-s0505a:2666_2: gamissāmi. Na mettha kaṅkhāti natthi me ettha nibbāne kaṅkhā. Evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacittanti
atk-s0505a:2666_3: piṅgiyo “evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddha”nti. Iminā bhagavato ovādena attani saddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2666_4: uppādetvā saddhādhureneva ca vimuñcitvā taṃ saddhādhimuttataṃ pakāsento bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:2666_5: āha – “evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta”nti. Ayamettha adhippāyo “yathā maṃ tvaṃ avaca,
atk-s0505a:2669: Niṭṭhito ca pañcamo vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
atk-s0505a:2677: Ettha uragavaggādipañcavaggasaṅgahitassa uragasuttādisattatisuttappabhedassa suttanipātassa atthavaṇṇanā katā hoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0505a:2681: Vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ, pāpuṇātu ayaṃ jano”ti.
atk-s0505a:2683_6: therena katā ayaṃ paramatthajotikā nāma suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathā –
